alt_text: A large dark bird of prey attacking a smaller, lighter bird, with feathers falling around them
long_description: The image depicts a large, dark bird of prey attacking a smaller, lighter-colored bird against a plain, light brown background. The large bird, positioned in the upper left and extending towards the lower right, has dark brown and black feathers with lighter brown undersides. Its wings are spread, and its tail feathers are fanned out. It has bright yellow eyes with dark pupils and a sharp, dark beak. Its talons are engaged with the smaller bird. The smaller bird, positioned below and slightly to the right of the larger bird, is lighter brown with intricate patterns of black and white on its feathers, and a yellow head. Its wings are also spread, and its beak is open. Several small, light-colored feathers are scattered in the air around the two birds, particularly below them. In the upper left corner of the light brown background, there is a vertical column of dark characters and a red square seal with more characters. In the lower left corner, there is a small, dark inscription that reads "29/00.0344". The central image is framed by a wide border of speckled gold.

metadata.title: 十鷹書画冊|Album of Hawks and Calligraphy
metadata.medium: Album of ten paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three vertical scrolls depict a waterfall scene with a figure, a gathering of sages, and cranes by a pine tree.
long_description:
Three vertical paintings are presented as a triptych of hanging scrolls. Each painting features a light, aged parchment-colored background with ink wash and subtle color details. The scrolls are framed by a narrow patterned border in green and gold, and wider sections of dark blue fabric with a circular pattern at the top and bottom.

The left scroll shows a dynamic waterfall cascading down a rocky cliff on the left side. A gnarled tree with long, hanging vines and clusters of white and pink flowers extends from the upper left. At the base of the waterfall, a robed figure with a staff sits on a rock. Misty mountains are visible in the background, and several small birds fly in the sky.

The center scroll features a group of approximately seven robed figures, possibly sages or arhats, gathered in the lower half of the composition. They exhibit various expressions and postures; some are bald, some have beards. One figure appears to be conjuring, with a plume of smoke or mist rising from a vessel. Another figure holds a scroll or fan. A branch with white blossoms extends from the upper left, and a few birds fly in the upper right.

The right scroll depicts a large, gnarled pine tree with dark green needles on the right side, its branches reaching towards the left. Several white cranes are positioned around the tree and in the sky; some stand on the ground, while others are in flight. Misty mountains are visible in the background, similar to the left scroll, creating a continuous landscape across the triptych.

metadata.title: 八仙猿鶴図|Eight Daoist Immortals, Cranes, and Gibbons
metadata.medium: Triptych of hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A green and yellow bird perches on a dark, flowering branch against a light, plain background
long_description: The image is a vertical composition featuring a bird on a flowering branch against a plain, light background. The background is a uniform, pale beige or off-white color, with no discernible features. On the right side of the composition, a dark, gnarled branch extends diagonally upwards and to the left, then branches out further. The branch is rendered with dark ink washes, showing variations in tone that suggest texture. Numerous small, light-colored flowers, each with five petals, bloom along the branches. Some flowers are clustered, while others are more sparsely distributed. A bird is perched on one of the lower, more central branches. The bird faces slightly to the left, with its body angled towards the viewer. Its head and upper back are a light green, transitioning to a pale yellow on its chest and belly. Its wings and tail feathers are a muted green-brown. The bird's beak is small and dark, and a small dark eye is visible. Its thin, dark legs grip the branch. The left side of the image is largely empty, providing a sense of open space around the central subject.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A white crane with black wing tips flies under a red sun above a landscape with trees and water
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a white crane flying under a red sun above a landscape. The background is a light tan or golden color. In the upper center, a solid red disc, representing the sun, is positioned with a faint, lighter red reflection directly below it. Below and to the left of the sun, a large white crane is shown in flight, extending its wings horizontally. Its wingtips are black, and it has a black neck and a red patch on its head. Its beak is open, and its long legs are extended backward. The lower third of the painting features a landscape with a body of water, rendered in light grey tones, winding from the left towards the center. Several dark rocks are visible along the water's edge. To the right of the water, two slender pine trees with dark green needles stand upright, accompanied by a cluster of leafy branches, possibly maple, extending from the right edge into the scene. A small red seal and some black calligraphic text are visible in the lower right corner. The main painted area is framed by a blue-green border adorned with gold cloud-like patterns.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two gold-leaf panels with heart-shaped medallions showing birds, flowering trees, and water scenes
long_description: This artwork is a multi-panel screen featuring two large, lobed medallions set against a gold-leaf background. The gold background has a textured, slightly mottled appearance, and the entire piece is framed by thin, dark borders with a repeating geometric pattern.The left medallion depicts a serene landscape. In the lower half, a dark blue body of water with lighter blue ripples extends across the scene. A light-colored duck or bird floats on the water, facing right, with tall green reeds growing from the water's edge nearby. On the left, green, rounded hills rise from the water. A gnarled tree with delicate light pink blossoms and green leaves extends from the left side, its branches reaching over the water. Small white flowers are scattered on the ground near the water. Two blue birds with long, flowing tails are in flight: one in the upper left, and another flying rightward from the tree's branches.The right medallion presents a complementary natural scene. It also features a dark blue body of water in the lower section, bordered by green, undulating hills. A prominent cluster of flowering plants dominates the left side of this medallion, showcasing large pink peonies, white and yellow chrysanthemums, and smaller red and white blossoms amidst lush green foliage. A small, dark bird perches among these flowers, facing left. To the right, a smaller grouping of flowering plants, primarily white and blue, grows from the green ground. A small white bird is depicted flying in the upper right area of this medallion.

metadata.title: 狩野周信筆　秋冬花鳥図屏風|Birds and Flowers of Autumn and Winter
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of a hawk perched on a branch beneath a pine tree on a hanging scroll
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on a light tan paper depicts a large hawk perched on a dark, gnarled branch or rock. The hawk, rendered in shades of black, white, and gray, faces towards the upper right, its head turned upwards with a sharp, alert gaze. Its feathers show detailed patterns, with lighter plumage on its chest and head, and darker, spotted feathers on its back and wings. Its talons, subtly highlighted with a yellowish hue, grip the dark perch. Above the hawk, a thick, dark pine branch extends from the upper left, adorned with clusters of pine needles and a few small cones, all rendered with expressive ink strokes. The background is a plain, light tan. A small red seal is visible in the lower right corner of the main painting area. The artwork is framed by decorative borders: a narrow band of gold and black pattern at the very top and bottom, and wider teal-green borders with a subtle pattern running vertically along the left and right sides.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts tall, slender mountains rising from water with boats and sparse trees
long_description: The image is a vertical ink wash painting, predominantly in shades of black and gray on a light, off-white ground, framed by a decorative gold-toned border. The upper third of the painting is largely empty, light-colored space, suggesting an expansive sky or dense mist. Below this, a landscape unfolds with tall, slender, jagged mountains rising from a body of water. In the mid-ground, a prominent, dark, and sharply defined mountain peak stands on the left, its slopes adorned with sparse, dark green trees, including a small, pagoda-like structure at its summit. Its base is softened by lighter ink washes, suggesting mist. To its right and slightly behind, several other very tall, slender peaks emerge from the mist, rendered with lighter, more ethereal ink, indicating distance. On the right side of the foreground, a larger, darker, and more detailed mountain mass descends steeply into the water. This mountain features numerous dark green pine-like trees clinging to its ledges and a small, multi-tiered pagoda-like building nestled into its side. A small, vertical inscription in dark ink is visible on the right slope of this mountain. The base of this mountain forms a rocky shoreline with dark, textured rocks visible in the water. The lower half of the painting depicts a calm body of water. On the left side of the water, a sailboat with a reddish-brown, rectangular sail and a dark hull moves towards the right. Further to its right, a smaller, flat-bottomed boat with a single, indistinct figure is also on the water. The water is rendered with subtle horizontal brushstrokes, creating a sense of gentle ripples. The overall composition emphasizes verticality and depth, with elements gradually fading into the background mist.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A bald figure in red robes sits on a lotus, holding a staff and jewel, with a golden halo, on a vertical scroll
long_description: The image is a vertical painting on a light brown background, framed by decorative borders. At the center, a bald figure with light skin sits cross-legged on a large green lotus flower. The figure wears flowing robes, primarily red with green and blue patterns, and gold accents. The figure's eyes are downcast, and a faint smile is on the lips. Behind the figure's head is a golden halo, and behind the body is a larger, concentric halo with shades of yellow, green, and blue. The figure holds a long staff with a finial at the top in the right hand, resting it on the shoulder. In the left hand, held near the chest, is a small, flaming jewel or orb. The lotus flower has multiple layers of green petals, and beneath it are swirling pink and white clouds. The background is a plain, light brown color. The painting is bordered on the top, bottom, and sides by decorative patterns. The side borders feature repeating dark blue tree-like motifs on a gold background. The top and bottom borders have a band of repeating gold floral patterns on a dark gray-green background, above and below the tree motifs. There is some faint, vertical text on the right side of the figure, near the bottom. It appears to be a column of small, dark characters.

metadata.title: 英一蝶筆 地蔵菩薩図|Jizō Bosatsu
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold paint on paper

alt_text: Two quails on light ground beneath tall grass with feathery plumes
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a light beige background with a sparse natural scene. In the upper right quadrant, several stalks of tall grass with long, slender green leaves and light yellow-orange feathery plumes curve gently towards the left. The plumes are delicate and appear to sway. Below the grass, in the lower half of the painting, two birds rest on undulating ground rendered in light brown and grey tones. The bird on the left is round, fluffy, and predominantly white, facing towards the left. To its right and slightly behind it, a second bird, speckled brown and grey, faces towards the right. The ground beneath the birds is subtly textured with sparse, dark green and black brushstrokes suggesting small clumps of vegetation. In the bottom right corner, there is a column of vertical text in black ink, followed by two square red seals.

metadata.title: 粟に鶉図|Quail and Millet
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a waterfall cascading down misty mountains with a tree bearing red leaves.
long_description: The vertical scroll painting features a dynamic waterfall scene rendered in a muted color palette with vibrant accents. The background is a light beige, suggesting a misty atmosphere. In the upper left, dark, rounded mountain forms emerge from a hazy green and gray mist, from which a powerful white waterfall begins its descent. The waterfall flows diagonally from the upper left towards the center, then cascades vertically down the right side of the composition, creating a strong visual line. The water is depicted with fine vertical lines, indicating its flow, and some white foam at the top. In the mid-ground, a gnarled tree trunk with dark branches extends from the left, arching over the waterfall. Its branches are adorned with numerous small, star-shaped leaves in shades of bright red and pink, suggesting autumn foliage. Several individual red leaves appear to be falling into the waterfall, adding a sense of movement. The lower portion of the waterfall dissipates into a soft, light gray mist. On the lower left, near the base of the tree, there is a vertical inscription in dark script, followed by a rectangular red seal. The central artwork is bordered by a light blue fabric with a repeating diamond pattern on the sides, and a beige fabric with a repeating circular motif at the top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures, one in green and one in blue, stand by a white railing under a pine tree.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts two figures in traditional attire standing near a white and green railing, with natural elements in the background. The taller figure, positioned on the left, wears an elaborate robe primarily in light green and cream, with wide sleeves and white fluffy trim. Her hair is styled high with decorative elements, and she holds a white fan in her hands, which are held at chest level. She faces towards the right, looking down at the shorter figure. The shorter figure, on the right, wears a blue robe with subtle patterns and stands slightly bowed, facing the taller figure. Behind the figures is a white balustrade with green accents and decorative posts. To the right of the railing, green bamboo shoots are visible. In the upper right portion of the painting, a gnarled, dark pine tree branch extends downwards and to the left, with clusters of green needles. Below the pine branch and to its right, a dark, rocky outcrop or cliff face is depicted. The background is a plain, light golden-brown color, creating a soft contrast with the figures and natural elements.

metadata.title: 西王母図|Queen Mother of the West
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Vertical scroll painting depicting misty mountains, a pagoda, buildings along a rocky shore, and a boat on water.
long_description: The vertical scroll painting features a serene, misty landscape rendered in ink wash and subtle colors. The upper portion is dominated by towering, jagged mountain peaks that emerge from and are partially obscured by swirling mist, which fills the vast central area of the composition. The peaks are depicted with dark, angular brushstrokes, contrasting with the lighter, ethereal mist. Below the highest peaks, a multi-tiered pagoda with a pointed roof is visible on a lower, tree-covered hillside, also partially enveloped in mist. Further down, the landscape becomes more defined. On the right, a steep, rocky coastline descends to a body of water. Numerous buildings, including houses with tiled roofs and what appear to be temple structures, are nestled among dense green trees and rocky outcrops along the shore. The trees are rendered with varying shades of green and dark ink, suggesting pine trees and other foliage. The water, depicted with soft, horizontal washes, extends across the lower left of the painting. A small, dark boat with a single figure is visible on the water near the rocky shore. In the distance, across the water, faint, undulating hills rise from the mist. The overall color palette is dominated by muted greens, grays, and browns, with touches of warmer earth tones on the buildings and rocks, all set against a light, yellowish-tan background. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text and a red seal.

metadata.title: 狩野探水守常筆　蓬莱山・瀟湘八景図|Mount Penglai with Eight Views of Xiao and Xiang
metadata.medium: One from a triptych of hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a misty mountainous landscape with a village, temples, and water
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a vast, misty mountainous landscape with a village and water. The upper portion is dominated by a light, hazy sky in shades of beige and pale grey. On the left, tall, jagged mountains with dark grey and green accents rise dramatically from the mist. A small, multi-tiered pagoda-like structure is perched on a cliff face near the top of these mountains. Further to the right, more rounded, misty mountains and clouds stretch across the mid-ground, with a distant, snow-capped peak visible on the horizon. As the eye moves downwards, the mountains on the left become less steep, revealing a series of smaller hills and valleys. A village with numerous thatched-roof houses, rendered in muted browns and greys, is nestled among clusters of green trees and pines. This settlement extends towards a wide body of water on the right side of the painting. Several small, dark boats are visible on the water, and faint bridges connect various landmasses. The lower left corner contains a small red seal and some faint vertical script. The overall palette is subdued, featuring greens, blues, greys, and browns, all softened by the pervasive mist.

metadata.title: 狩野探水守常筆　蓬莱山・瀟湘八景図|Mount Penglai with Eight Views of Xiao and Xiang
metadata.medium: One from a triptych of hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An old man with a long beard and a staff stands beside a white deer on a plain background
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting featuring an old man and a deer on a plain, light brown background. The central panel is framed by a dark teal border with a subtle, repeating pattern. The old man stands slightly to the left of the center, facing towards the right side of the frame. He has a long, flowing white beard and mustache, and his skin appears light. He wears a dark, soft cap that covers his head and a dark, wide-sleeved cloak over a long, white robe. The white robe has dark outlines and subtle green and blue decorative elements, including a patterned border near the bottom with geometric shapes and floral motifs. He holds a gnarled, dark brown wooden staff vertically in his right hand, which is positioned in front of his chest. His left hand is mostly obscured by the folds of his robe. To the right of the man stands a white deer, facing left towards the man. The deer has small, branched antlers and its head is positioned roughly at the man's waist level. Its body is depicted in a soft white, with minimal shading. A small, square red seal is visible near the deer's hind legs, along with some faint, vertical, dark script. The figures occupy the lower two-thirds of the central panel, leaving a significant amount of empty, light brown space above them. The overall impression is of two figures standing in a serene, unadorned setting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Four figures in traditional attire in a landscape with a building, a fence, and water
long_description: The image is a painting depicting a scene with four figures in traditional attire within a landscape setting, rendered in a muted color palette dominated by ochre and earthy tones. The background is a light, warm ochre, with several irregular, cloud-like shapes in a slightly darker, reddish-brown hue scattered across the top and middle. On the far left, a woman kneels or sits, facing right. She wears a long, flowing robe primarily in shades of pink and light green, with a red undergarment visible at the bottom. Her long, dark hair is visible. Behind her, a dark blue body of water is visible, bordered by a light brown bank and a vertical wooden post. In the center, a man stands, facing the woman. He wears a long, loose-fitting green robe over a light blue garment, and a tall, dark cap. A dark object, possibly a sword hilt, protrudes from his waist. Behind him, a tall, light brown fence or screen extends diagonally upwards to the right, with green, leafy plants growing on it. To the right of the man in green, another man sits on the ground, facing left. He wears a white robe and a dark, pointed cap. Next to him, a smaller figure, possibly a child or attendant, is partially visible, wearing a red garment and a dark cap, with a red fan-like object in front. Behind these two figures is a dark green, rectangular structure with a peaked roof, adorned with small yellow star-like shapes. A white, flowing fabric hangs from the top of this structure. Below the sitting figures, a dark, wavy, fan-like object rests on the ground. Further to the right, small green pine-like trees are depicted on a light brown ground.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Matted painting; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Six-panel screen with green plants and grasses on a gold and silver-flecked background
long_description: A six-panel screen features a repeating pattern of green plants and grasses against a gold and silver background. Each vertical panel is framed by a dark border. The background is predominantly gold, with areas of silver flecks and washes that create a textured, shimmering effect. Two main types of plants are depicted: clumps of tall, thin grasses and clusters of leafy, vine-like plants. The grasses are rendered with fine, parallel green lines, forming dense, upright tufts of varying sizes and densities. The leafy plants have small, dark green, oval-shaped leaves on thin stems, often clustered together and appearing to grow upwards or cascade. The plants are distributed unevenly but rhythmically across the six panels, creating a sense of depth. Some plants appear to grow from the bottom, while others are positioned higher, suggesting a rolling landscape. The vibrant green of the foliage contrasts with the luminous gold and silver background. Silver flecks are more prominent in certain areas, particularly around the bases of the plant clusters and in the upper sections of some panels, suggesting mist or dew. The overall composition evokes a natural landscape rendered in a decorative style.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink and color on gilt paper

alt_text: Ink wash landscape with mountains, a river, an arched bridge, a boat, and trees, featuring numerous red seals
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape in shades of gray and black, accented by numerous red seals and some black text. In the background, soft, hazy mountains stretch across the upper portion of the scene. Below them, a wide river flows horizontally, spanned by a multi-arched bridge with a light gray tone, suggesting distance. In the lower left foreground, a small boat with a single figure seated inside floats on the river. A tree with a few leaves leans over the water from the left bank. Moving towards the center and right foreground, several bare trees with intricate, dark branches stand on the riverbank, some appearing tall and slender, others more gnarled. Interspersed among them are a few smaller trees with darker, denser foliage. The riverbank itself is rendered with darker ink, showing rocky textures. On the far right, a steep, sloping bank or mountain face rises, partially obscuring the background. The upper and right sections of the painting are heavily marked with numerous red seals of various square, circular, and rectangular shapes, some overlapping the landscape elements. Vertical black calligraphic text is visible along the far right edge, partially covered by seals, which reads: "唐子畏寫意李端詩意".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A panoramic painting of a bustling town with many people in traditional clothing, buildings, and gold clouds.
long_description: This horizontal painting depicts a lively scene within a Japanese-style compound or town, rendered in a warm, light brown background with large, irregular patches of shimmering gold. These gold areas represent clouds or mist, visually segmenting the scene into different sections. The composition unfolds from left to right across multiple levels. In the upper left, several figures are visible near buildings with light roofs and white walls, including one figure in a white robe near a low stone wall. Below this, a small building with a green roof and a pine tree is depicted. A wide, light-colored path or bridge-like structure traverses the middle ground, populated by numerous figures in colorful kimonos. These figures are shown in various poses, some walking, some conversing, with their clothing featuring shades of red, blue, green, orange, and black. Above this central path, more buildings with dark roofs and light-colored walls are seen. Some figures are seated inside these open-sided structures, appearing to engage in activities on green mats. In the mid-right, a prominent building with a dark brown roof and red railings on its stairs and balconies stands out. Several figures are seen ascending and descending these stairs, some carrying red umbrellas. Below the central path, more residential-style buildings with light roofs and intricate wooden details are depicted, with figures seated on verandas or within rooms. A gnarled tree with bare branches is visible in the lower center. The gold clouds act as both separators and unifiers, creating a sense of depth and movement across the horizontal expanse.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A full-length painting of a woman in elaborate robes holding a branch, with extensive calligraphy
long_description: This vertical painting depicts a full-length figure of a woman standing against a plain, light tan background. The woman is positioned slightly to the left of center, facing towards the right with her head turned to look in that direction. She has dark hair styled in a high bun, adorned with red ribbons and a gold-colored ornament. Her face is pale with light red lips. She wears a long, flowing robe, predominantly off-white or cream, featuring a subtle pattern of small, light dots. Beneath her outer robe, a darker garment with a pattern of blue and white leaves or flowers is visible. Her right hand, crossed over her chest, holds a slender branch with green leaves and small blue flowers. Long, light blue and red sashes or ribbons trail from her waist and sleeves, extending downwards and to the left in graceful, swirling forms. Her feet are not visible, obscured by the voluminous fabric. To the right and left of the woman, and above her, are columns of black calligraphy. The calligraphy on the upper right is larger and more prominent, accompanied by several red square seals. Smaller columns of calligraphy and additional red seals are present along the far left edge of the painting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two ornate drum-like structures with swirling patterns and two stylized blue and green animal figures on a light background
long_description: The image is a horizontal painting on a light, tan-colored background. On the left, two large, highly decorated, drum-like structures are depicted. The leftmost structure is partially visible, showing a large, circular central element with a black and white swirling pattern, surrounded by concentric rings of various colors including black, white, blue, and silver. This circular element is set within a larger, ornate frame that is predominantly red, green, and gold, featuring intricate cloud-like motifs and golden, bird-like figures at the top. Below this circular element is a rectangular platform or base, colored in a vibrant green with gold patterns, topped with a red railing. White tassels hang from the bottom edge of the green fabric. To the right and slightly behind the first structure is a second, similar drum-like structure, also with a green patterned base and red railing, but its circular top is mostly obscured. On the right side of the image, against the plain tan background, are two stylized, animal-like figures. Both figures are predominantly blue and green, with white and red accents. They have large, rounded heads, small faces, and bodies that are a mix of blue and green, with flowing, ribbon-like tails. The figure on the left is slightly larger and stands upright, while the figure on the right is smaller and appears to be in a more dynamic pose. Both figures have intricate patterns on their bodies. In the upper right corner, there is vertical text in black characters that reads: 納 蘇 利.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll from set of two; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: Black ink painting of bamboo branches and leaves with vertical calligraphic text and red seals on light paper.
long_description: This horizontal ink painting on light, off-white paper depicts bamboo branches and leaves with calligraphic text and red seals. From the top left, a thick, dark bamboo branch extends horizontally towards the center, with thinner, lighter branches sprouting downwards. From the top right, another set of bamboo branches, some thicker and darker, others thinner and lighter, extends downwards and towards the center. Clusters of bamboo leaves, rendered in varying shades of black ink from light gray to dark black, hang from these branches, primarily in the upper half of the composition. The leaves are elongated and pointed. On the right side of the painting, several columns of vertical black calligraphic text are present. Below the text, a small, square red seal is visible. Further to the left, in the lower-center portion of the image, more columns of vertical black calligraphic text appear. Below and to the left of this text, a cluster of three square red seals is stacked vertically. The overall impression is a sparse yet detailed depiction of bamboo, balanced by the presence of the text and seals.

metadata.title: 明  唐寅  墨竹圖  卷|Ink bamboo
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A six-panel screen depicts various garments, some folded, some hanging on a rack, against a gold background.
long_description: A six-panel folding screen features a gold-leaf background with a subtle texture. The screen is bordered by a dark blue band with a repeating light blue pattern, and a thin reddish-brown inner border. On the left side, spanning the first three panels, a large pile of folded garments or textiles rests on the floor, angled towards the lower right. These textiles display a complex geometric pattern in shades of light gray, brown, dark green, and light blue. On the right side, spanning the last three panels, a dark, two-tiered wooden rack stands vertically. Various garments are draped over the horizontal bars of this rack. The top bar holds a brown garment and a lighter, possibly gray, garment. The bottom bar supports a light gray garment and a brown garment, which partially covers a white textile patterned with numerous dark green butterflies. The overall composition places the folded items on the left and the hanging items on the right, both against the shimmering gold backdrop.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A full-length black and white artwork of a person in a patterned kimono, looking down and holding a long object
long_description: This black and white artwork depicts a full-length figure, likely a woman, standing centrally against a plain, light gray background. The figure's head is tilted downwards and slightly to the left, with dark hair pulled back into a ponytail. Her face is light-toned with simple, rounded features. She wears a kimono-like garment with wide sleeves, cinched at the waist by a dark sash. The garment features a complex pattern of large geometric shapes, including triangles and stripes, combined with smaller textured patterns of dots and cross-hatching, all rendered in varying shades of gray. Her left hand holds a long, narrow, light-colored object with dark markings, possibly a folded fan or a scroll, extending downwards. Her right hand is partially visible, resting at her side. Bare feet are visible at the bottom of the garment. The central panel is flanked on both the left and right by vertical decorative borders, which display intricate geometric and floral patterns in darker gray tones, contrasting with the lighter central area.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Six figures in patterned robes stand across a multi-panel artwork with a textured background.
long_description:
A horizontal, multi-panel artwork in black and white features six standing figures against a textured background. The artwork is divided into six vertical panels of equal width, each containing one full-length figure. The background of all panels is a light, mottled gray with a visible texture. From left to right, the figures are arranged in a line, each generally facing towards the right or slightly forward. All figures appear to be of similar height and slender build, with dark hair pulled back. Each figure wears a dark, heavily patterned robe with wide sleeves.

The first figure on the far left stands facing right, holding a large, open fan in the right hand, angled upwards. The robe has light floral or star-like motifs. The second figure stands facing right, wearing a dark robe with lighter, possibly floral, patterns, and a lighter undergarment visible at the neck and hem. The third figure stands facing right, wearing a dark robe with large, circular or spiral patterns, and holds a small, light-colored object in the left hand. The fourth figure stands with the body angled to the right, wearing a dark robe with large, irregular light-colored shapes and smaller patterns that appear to flow around the figure. The fifth figure stands with the body angled to the right, wearing a dark robe with lighter patterns, and has the left arm raised, holding a light-colored object above the head. The sixth figure on the far right stands facing right, wearing a dark robe with lighter, possibly floral or circular patterns, and holds a large, open fan in the left hand, angled downwards.

metadata.title: 舞伎図屏風|Dancers
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a moonlit landscape with a boat, sparse trees, and dark calligraphy in the upper right.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a serene, moonlit landscape in shades of gray and black. The upper portion of the artwork features a pale, circular moon positioned in the upper left quadrant against a light gray, hazy sky. Below the moon, a faint horizontal line suggests a distant shore or landmass, separating the sky from a body of water that fills the lower two-thirds of the composition. In the foreground, on the left side, a dense cluster of dark, slender trees or reeds with sparse branches rises from the water. To the right of this cluster, a small, simple boat with a pointed bow and stern floats on the water, with a single vertical pole extending upwards from its center. Further to the right, another, less dense cluster of similar trees or reeds is visible. The upper right portion of the painting contains dark ink calligraphy arranged in vertical lines. The text reads: "柿萬事者 繁作 船 三更月上當萬頃 老 漁網醉喚不醒 起未 霜印筆衣黑 唐寅畫". Below this text, several red square seals are stamped. Additional red square seals are visible in the lower left corner of the painting, and one red seal is in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: 明　唐寅　葦渚醉漁圖　軸|Drunken fisherman by a reed bank
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Two figures in elaborate robes stand on a light background with sparse vegetation and gold flecks
long_description: Two figures in ornate robes are depicted against a light, muted background with subtle details. The figure on the left stands facing right, with their left arm extended forward and palm open. They wear a long, flowing red outer robe with a lighter red, possibly floral, pattern, over a white garment with black floral designs. A green sash is tied around their waist. Their long, dark hair flows down their back. The figure on the right stands facing left, slightly turned away from the viewer. They wear a wide, light-colored conical hat that covers most of their head, with dark hair visible beneath it. Their outer robe is dark blue or grey, adorned with intricate patterns in white, light blue, green, and gold. A dark sash cinches their waist. Layers of white, light blue, and green garments are visible beneath the outer robe, and they wear red footwear. The background is a uniform light beige or tan, with sparse, light green or brown grass-like vegetation in the lower left and center. Scattered gold flecks or small, abstract gold shapes are visible across the background, particularly in the upper center and lower left areas.

metadata.title: Untitled

alt_text: A woman in a blue kimono sits on a raised platform, looking up at cherry blossoms, with a landscape screen and rock garden
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting with decorative fabric borders. The central scene depicts an interior and exterior view. In the lower left, a woman sits on a light-colored, raised wooden platform with a grid pattern. She is dressed in a blue kimono adorned with small white and red floral patterns, and a red obi. Her dark hair is styled in an elaborate bun, and her face, painted in light tones, is turned upwards and to the right. Her left hand rests on her lap, while her right hand is near her knee. Next to her on the platform is a small, rectangular wooden tray holding two green, lidded containers. To the left of the woman, a folding screen with a light green border displays a painted landscape scene featuring tall, light-colored grasses and two dark birds in flight against a pale background. Below this screen, a light green floor with diagonal dark lines is visible. Behind the woman, a reddish-brown wall section features a circular window with a white grid pattern. To the right of the woman, the background is a plain, light brown. A dark branch laden with numerous small white cherry blossoms extends from the upper right corner, curving downwards. Below the blossoms, a large, irregular rock formation in shades of green and gray is depicted, with small red flowers growing around its base. The painting is bordered by a gold fabric with a floral pattern at the top and bottom, and a brown fabric with circular motifs on the left and right. In the lower left corner, vertical dark script is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled

alt_text: Two figures, an adult adjusting hair and a child, under flowering branches on a dark background
long_description: A vertical, monochromatic painting depicts two figures under flowering branches against a dark background. In the upper left and extending towards the center, several dark, gnarled branches are covered with clusters of small, light-colored blossoms. Below these branches, slightly right of center, a larger figure is seated on a light-colored, angular platform or bench. This figure faces slightly left, shown from the waist up with their legs extending to the lower right. They wear a dark, loose-fitting robe with a lighter sash tied around the waist. Both hands are raised to the top of their head, appearing to adjust their dark hair. Their face is light-toned. To the left of the seated figure, a smaller figure stands, facing the seated figure. This figure is depicted full-body, wearing a dark, patterned robe with a large, light-colored bow tied at the back. Their dark hair is styled in a bun on top of their head. The background is a uniform dark tone, with a faint suggestion of a tree trunk on the far left behind the standing figure. A small vertical line of text is visible in the lower left corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled

alt_text: Three women in traditional garments, one playing a stringed instrument, another resting, and a third observing
long_description: The artwork depicts three women in traditional attire against a plain, light beige background. The figures are arranged in the lower-center portion of the horizontal composition. On the right, a woman sits upright, facing left, holding a long-necked, three-stringed instrument with a small, dark, crescent-shaped headstock. She wears a vibrant red kimono with green and white patterns, including large, stylized bamboo leaves on the lower half. Her hair is styled in a dark bun. In the center, another woman sits, facing right, with her head slightly turned towards the viewer. She wears a blue and white striped kimono with a darker blue sash or folded fabric at her waist. Her hair is also styled in a dark bun with decorative elements. To the left and slightly below the central figure, a third woman reclines on her side, resting her head on her right arm. She wears a white kimono with a red patterned overlay, featuring a geometric design of interconnected white dots and lines. Her dark hair is styled with gold-colored ornaments. Near the reclining woman's left hand, a small, round, dark red tray holds several items: two rectangular, light-colored sweets, a small blue fan, and a small, cylindrical container. In the upper right corner, vertical black text is visible, followed by two red square seals.

metadata.title: Untitled

alt_text: Two figures in traditional garments, one holding a fan, on a light brown scroll with decorative borders.
long_description:
The image depicts a scroll painting with two figures against a plain, light brown background, framed by decorative borders. The main painting area is a horizontal rectangle.

On the left, a taller figure stands facing right, holding a small, white, open fan in her raised right hand. She wears a long, flowing garment, primarily white with green and gold floral patterns, and a prominent red inner layer visible at the chest and sleeves. A red sash or obi is tied around her waist. Her hair is black and styled in an elaborate updo.

To her right, a slightly shorter figure stands facing left, looking towards the first figure. This figure wears a white garment with green and gold patterns on the upper portion, and a red sash or obi around her waist. Her hair is also black and styled upwards.

The background behind the figures is a uniform, light brown or tan color. In the lower right corner of this background, there is a vertical column of dark characters, followed by a square red seal.

The entire painting is bordered. The top and bottom borders are narrow, dark blue strips with a subtle, darker floral pattern. The wider side borders feature an intricate geometric design in shades of gold, light blue, and brown, composed of interlocking octagons and squares.

alt_text: Two women in long robes stand near a large tree with drooping branches beside a body of water.
long_description: The vertical, monochromatic artwork depicts two women standing near a large tree beside a body of water, rendered in shades of gray. The upper two-thirds of the image feature a plain, light gray background. On the right side, a dark, gnarled tree trunk rises vertically, with branches extending upwards and to the left. Numerous small, dark leaves or blossoms droop from the branches, creating a cascading effect. To the right of the tree trunk, a woman stands facing left, her body angled slightly away from the viewer. She wears a long, patterned robe with lighter sections, and her hair is styled in an elaborate updo. Her head is tilted downwards, and her hands are near her chest. To the left of the tree, a second woman walks towards the left, her body in profile. She wears a dark, long-sleeved robe that flows to her feet. Her hair is also styled in an updo, and she holds a round, light-toned fan in her right hand, which is visible at her side. In the lower left and center, sparse clumps of dark, spiky vegetation grow along a faint, wavy line that suggests a stream or path. The ground around the women and vegetation is a slightly darker gray than the background. A small, dark inscription is visible in the lower right corner, near the base of the tree.

metadata.title: Untitled

alt_text: A full-length portrait of a woman in a black kimono with patterned panels and a striped obi, standing on a light background.
long_description: The image is a full-length portrait of a woman standing against a plain, light tan background, framed by a gold patterned border. The woman is positioned slightly to the left of center, facing left with her head turned to look towards the viewer. She has dark hair styled in a bun at the back of her head, and her face is pale with delicate features, including thin eyebrows, downcast eyes, a small nose, and red lips. She wears a long, dark black kimono with wide sleeves. A striped obi in shades of light blue, pink, and white with thin black lines is tied around her waist. Beneath the black kimono, a white garment with a red trim is visible along the opening and at the bottom hem. The lower half of the black kimono is decorated with several rectangular and irregular-shaped panels, some outlined in gold. These panels contain white calligraphic text or small, indistinct illustrations on a dark background. One panel on her right leg shows a white character that resembles "福". Her left hand is visible, holding the front opening of the kimono. Her feet are covered by white footwear with a gold-colored, pointed sole that extends beyond the foot. To the right of the figure, near the bottom, there is a vertical line of dark calligraphic text. The top and bottom edges of the artwork feature a gold border with a repeating floral or geometric pattern.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a mountainous landscape with a thatched hut nestled among trees and large rocks
long_description: The image is a fan-shaped painting, primarily in shades of brown, black, and gray, suggesting an ink wash style on aged paper. The composition is dominated by large, craggy rocks and mountains. On the left, a steep, textured slope rises, covered with sparse, dark green trees and brush. Towards the upper left, a small, thatched-roof hut is visible, nestled into the mountainside. A tiny figure appears to be near the hut. The central and right portions of the fan are filled with massive, dark gray and black rock formations, rendered with strong brushstrokes and varying tones to suggest depth and texture. Trees with dark foliage grow from crevices and along the bases of these rocks. In the upper right quadrant, vertical calligraphic text in black ink is visible, followed by a square red seal. The text reads: "美繪唐寅". The background on the right fades into lighter, hazy tones, suggesting distant mountains or mist. The overall impression is a rugged, natural landscape with a sense of isolation.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold-flecked paper

alt_text: A monochrome landscape painting depicts a wide river, distant mountains, trees, and figures near a boat on the bank.
long_description: This monochrome ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape dominated by a wide body of water. The overall palette is in shades of gray and brown, suggesting an aged paper or silk medium. In the upper portion, a hazy sky features faint, wispy horizontal cloud formations or mist. Below this, a range of distant, undulating mountains with soft, rounded peaks stretches across the horizon, separating the sky from a vast expanse of water. The water occupies the majority of the central and lower right sections of the painting, appearing calm with subtle ripples. On the left foreground, a rocky, elevated bank is covered with several tall, slender trees with drooping branches and dense foliage, characteristic of willow trees. Beneath these trees, a group of approximately seven small figures is gathered, some seated, some standing, appearing to interact. Further to the right, a long, rectangular boat with a covered cabin is docked at the water's edge, connected to the bank by a small gangplank. A single figure stands on the bank near the boat, facing towards it. More trees, similar in style to those on the left, are visible on the lower right bank. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present, accompanied by two red square seals. The text reads: "清陽赤心是天涯兩岸 風清蘆荻花誰走舟中 由司馬滿江明月隱是提 唐寅畫".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Eight album leaves mounted as a handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome ink painting on a fan depicting a mountainous landscape with trees and a bridge over water
long_description: This fan-shaped ink painting depicts a monochrome mountainous landscape on a light brown ground. The composition is dominated by rugged mountains and numerous trees, rendered in various shades of black and gray ink. On the far left, a steep mountain slope rises, covered with sparse, gnarled trees. Below this slope, in the lower left corner, black vertical characters are visible, followed by two red square seals. The characters read: "明皇御筆". Moving right, the landscape opens into a valley or gorge. A simple bridge, constructed with vertical supports, spans across this area, connecting two landmasses. Below the bridge, a body of water or a stream is suggested by lighter ink washes. The central area features more dense clusters of trees, some with bare branches and others with light foliage, growing on undulating terrain. These trees exhibit intricate branch patterns. In the background, softer, rounded mountain peaks are depicted with lighter ink washes, creating a sense of depth. On the right side of the painting, a large, craggy mountain face rises prominently, with trees clinging to its upper slopes and along its edges. The ink work varies from delicate lines defining tree branches and rock textures to broader, softer washes for distant mountains and atmospheric effects. The overall impression is a detailed and expansive natural scene.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   倣唐寅   溪山雪徑   扇|Winter Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold-flecked paper

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting depicts trees, rocky islands, water, a small pavilion, and a bridge
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting on light-colored paper depicts a monochromatic landscape scene. The composition is dominated by water, rocky islands, and various trees, rendered in shades of black and gray ink. On the far left, a cluster of tall, slender trees with dark, dense foliage rises from a rocky bank. Below these trees, several large, rounded rock formations emerge from a body of water that occupies the lower half of the painting. Moving towards the center, a small, open-sided pavilion with a dark, peaked roof stands on a rocky shore, its base partially submerged or at the water's edge. To the right of the pavilion, a dense grouping of trees, some with bare, gnarled branches and others with lighter, sparse foliage, grows on a prominent rocky island. Further right, a simple wooden bridge with two vertical posts on each side spans a narrow channel of water, connecting two rocky landmasses. The rightmost section of the painting features a steep, textured rocky cliff face. Across the top of the painting, several circular and rectangular red seals are stamped, containing illegible characters. Additional smaller red seals and vertical lines of illegible text are visible along the right edge of the artwork. The background beyond the water and landforms is a light, unpainted expanse.

metadata.title: 明  文徵明  東林避暑圖  卷  |Summer retreat in the eastern grove
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A tall ink wash painting depicts a dramatic mountainous landscape with a waterfall, dense trees, and a winding river
long_description: A tall, vertical ink wash painting depicts a mountainous landscape in shades of black, gray, and white. The upper section features towering, jagged mountains partially obscured by mist, with small, dark clusters of trees or structures dotting their peaks and slopes. On the upper right, vertical lines of calligraphy are visible, accompanied by several small, square red seals. Below the highest peaks, a prominent waterfall cascades down a steep, dark cliff face, appearing as a bright white stream against the darker rock. The middle ground is dominated by a dense forest of gnarled trees with intricate, twisting branches and textured trunks, creating a rich, dark canopy. Small clearings or paths wind through this dense foliage. Towards the bottom, the trees become larger and more distinct, with thick, textured trunks framing a winding river that flows through a valley. The riverbed is light-colored with scattered dark rocks. The overall composition emphasizes height and depth, with a monochromatic palette creating a sense of atmosphere and texture.

metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A fan-shaped landscape painting featuring mountains, trees, water, boats, and calligraphic text with red seals.
long_description: The image displays a fan-shaped painting on a light brown, speckled surface with faint vertical lines. The artwork depicts a panoramic landscape scene. In the bottom center, a cluster of dark green trees with dense foliage rises from a light green and brown landmass. To the right of these central trees, more sparse trees and several small structures or boats with masts are visible on a similar landmass that extends towards the right edge. A light blue-green body of water separates this foreground from the middle ground. The middle ground features several elongated, horizontal landforms or islands, some with small clusters of trees or buildings. Two small boats, each with a single mast, are visible on the water between these landforms. In the upper left and upper right sections, more distant, lighter green and brown mountains or hills are depicted, appearing to recede into the distance. The sky area is the same speckled light brown as the background. Two distinct blocks of black calligraphic text are present on the right side of the fan. The upper block is smaller and positioned towards the top right, while the lower block is larger and extends further down the right edge. Both blocks of text are accompanied by red square seals.

alt_text: A horizontal painting shows white magnolia flowers and buds on a dark, gnarled branch against a light background.
long_description: The horizontal painting presents a detailed depiction of a magnolia branch with flowers and buds against a plain, light beige background. A thick, gnarled branch, rendered in shades of dark brown and grey, originates from the lower left corner of the composition. It extends horizontally across the middle, tapering as it moves towards the right, with smaller twigs branching off. Along this branch, several white magnolia flowers are shown in various stages of development. On the left side, a cluster includes fully open blossoms with multiple overlapping white petals, subtly shaded with light grey to suggest depth, alongside several tightly closed buds. Further to the right, more open flowers and buds emerge from the branch. Small, light green leaves or nascent leaf clusters are scattered sparsely along the twigs, providing a touch of color contrast. The background is a uniform, untextured light tan, which serves to emphasize the delicate forms and pale colors of the magnolias. The brushwork suggests a traditional style, focusing on the organic shapes of the plant.

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting shows gnarled trees with pine needles and bare branches rising from dark rocks, with calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a landscape dominated by trees and rocks, rendered in a muted color palette on a light, textured background. The composition is arranged vertically, with the main elements concentrated in the lower two-thirds of the image.In the upper left corner, several columns of black calligraphy are visible, followed by two square red seals stacked vertically.The central focus is a large, gnarled tree with a thick, light-colored trunk that twists and rises from the bottom of the frame, extending upwards towards the top. Its branches are mostly bare, with a few clusters of light green-blue needles and small red dots. To the right and slightly behind this main tree, another tree with a darker, more densely needled canopy is visible. Its trunk is also gnarled and textured. A third, smaller tree or branch extends from the left, with delicate, drooping foliage.At the base of the trees, in the lower third of the painting, are dark, craggy rock formations. These rocks are rendered in shades of dark grey and purple-brown, with textured surfaces. Lighter, textured ground is depicted in front of the rocks. A single square red seal is located in the bottom right corner of the painting. The overall background is a light, warm beige or off-white, with a subtle, mottled texture.

alt_text: A woman peers over a tall screen at a child reaching up from below on a brown scroll
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting on a light brown background with a patterned border. A tall, dark, rectangular screen or partition stands vertically in the center. A woman is positioned behind the upper part of the screen, her head and upper torso visible as she looks down and to the left. She has dark hair styled in an elaborate bun with gold ornaments. Her skin is light. She wears a blue garment with a red collar or undergarment visible at her chest. The blue garment has a pattern of white and light green floral or cloud-like motifs. A child is positioned at the bottom of the screen, on the left side, looking up towards the woman. The child has light skin and a shaved head. They wear a red kimono with a white floral pattern and a blue sash or undergarment with a white pattern. The child's left leg is bent, and their right leg is extended, as if in motion or reaching. Their arms are raised, with the left hand appearing to reach towards the screen or the woman. The woman's blue garment extends around the right side of the screen, flowing downwards. This part of her garment has a dark blue background with a hexagonal pattern containing light green and white floral motifs. The background of the main image area is a plain, warm brown color. The top and bottom edges of the scroll have a narrow border with a repeating pattern of light-colored floral or leaf motifs on a lighter brown background. There is some faint, dark text or a signature on the lower right side of the brown background, near the child's feet.

alt_text: A woman in an elaborate, patterned kimono looks right, with two butterflies flying above her
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting featuring a standing woman on a plain, warm tan background, framed by a patterned border. The woman is positioned slightly to the left of center, facing towards the right side of the frame, with her head turned to look directly right. Her dark hair is styled upwards, adorned with a red band and gold decorative elements. Her face is pale with delicate features, including dark eyebrows and small red lips. She wears an elaborate, multi-layered kimono. The inner layer is dark blue with subtle gold patterns. The outer layer is a light cream color, richly decorated with large, circular floral motifs in shades of red, blue, green, and gold. Red ribbons and sashes flow from her waist and sleeves. Her long, wide sleeves extend past her hands, and she holds a dark fan in her left hand, partially visible. Two light-colored butterflies with dark markings are depicted in the upper portion of the tan background, one in the upper left and one in the upper right. The entire central image is surrounded by a light green border featuring a repeating pattern of gold circles and stylized cloud shapes. Small red calligraphic characters are visible in the lower right corner of the tan background.

metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A long, vertical scroll features a painting of a woman in a red and green kimono holding a white object
long_description: A long, vertical scroll is depicted, mounted against a light, textured background. The scroll features a central rectangular painting framed by a black border. Above and below this central image, the scroll is made of a light beige fabric with a repeating pattern of stylized flowers and geometric motifs. Two dark, narrow fabric straps hang from the very top of the scroll. The bottom of the scroll terminates in a light wooden roller. The painting within the central frame depicts a standing woman, positioned slightly to the left of the center. She faces towards the left, with her head tilted downwards, appearing to look at a long, curved white object she holds with both hands. Her skin is pale. She wears a layered kimono; the outer layer is predominantly red with white trim along the collar and sleeves. This red layer is adorned with patterns of light green and light blue shapes, possibly leaves or abstract designs, accented with darker lines. An inner layer, visible at the sleeves and hem, is a lighter green with similar patterns. Her dark hair is styled in an elaborate bun, and she wears a small, dark, possibly black, hat or hair ornament on top of her head. The background of the painting is a plain, light beige color. At the bottom right corner of the painted area, a small, red, stylized mark is visible.

alt_text: A tall woman in a black kimono with a rooster and bamboo stands beside a child in a patterned kimono
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts two figures, an adult woman and a child, against a plain, warm gold background. The taller figure, an adult woman, stands on the left, facing slightly right and looking down. She wears a long black kimono adorned with green bamboo stalks and a red and black rooster near the hem. A white undergarment is visible at her neck and sleeves. Her waist is cinched with a wide, patterned obi featuring blue, red, and gold floral or geometric designs. Her dark hair is styled in a tall, elaborate bun atop her head, with some strands framing her pale face. To her right and slightly in front, a shorter child stands, facing the woman and looking up. The child wears a grey kimono with a repeating pattern of blue, red, and gold motifs. White fabric is visible at the collar and sleeves. The child's dark hair is adorned with a cluster of white, possibly floral, decorations. Both hands hold a small, light-colored, rectangular object, possibly a tray or box. The child wears black sandals. The background is a uniform, unadorned gold color. A small red seal or signature is present in the lower left corner of the gold field. The central image is framed by a light green border with a subtle geometric pattern, and thin gold strips at the top and bottom.

alt_text: Ink drawing of an elderly man with a tall head, long white beard, and staff, with text above.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll featuring an ink drawing of an elderly man and handwritten text on a light beige background. The top section contains several columns of black handwritten text, rendered in a flowing script. Below this text, a central figure of an elderly man is depicted in black and gray ink washes. He has a very tall, elongated head and a long, flowing white beard that extends down to his lap. His face shows a gentle smile with small, dark eyes. He appears to be seated, wearing loose robes, with his right hand holding a gnarled staff that extends upwards. Behind his head is a large, semicircular, fan-like or shell-like structure with radiating lines, creating a halo effect. Below the figure, a smaller section of black handwritten text is visible. The entire composition is framed by narrow, dark patterned borders at the very top and bottom.

alt_text: A standing figure in a patterned robe looks up at a pale moon in a vertical scroll painting.
long_description: A tall, vertical painting depicts a standing figure, likely a woman, looking upwards towards a pale, circular moon against a muted yellowish-brown background. The figure occupies the lower-middle portion of the composition, with the moon positioned high in the upper third. The figure has pale skin and dark hair styled in an elaborate bun. She holds a thin, light-colored stick or pipe in her right hand, which is held near her chest. She wears a dark robe, possibly a kimono, with a wide, dark sash or obi patterned with greyish-green circles. The lower part of her robe and sleeves feature a design of green bamboo stalks and a brown, white, and red rooster. An inner layer of the robe, visible at the hem and collar, displays a pattern of red and white flowers. To the right of the figure, a dark, angular structure with horizontal lines and a dark border is visible, suggesting a building or screen. Below this structure, a vertical column of dark inscription and a small red seal are present. The overall background is a uniform yellowish-brown, with subtle variations in tone.

alt_text: A grayscale scroll with vertical text above a seated figure in patterned robes, looking upward.
long_description: The artwork is a tall, narrow grayscale scroll. The upper half is dominated by several columns of vertical script, written in dark characters against the lighter, textured background of the scroll. To the left of the main text, there is a smaller column of script and a dark, smudged circular mark, possibly a seal. The background of the scroll shows subtle variations in tone and some faint horizontal lines, suggesting age or texture. The lower half of the scroll features a seated figure, positioned towards the bottom center. The figure, likely a woman, is shown from the waist up, facing slightly to the right and looking upwards. Her hair is dark, voluminous, and styled dramatically upwards and outwards from her head. Her face is light-toned with delicate features, including a small mouth and elongated eyes. She wears an elaborate, dark-toned robe with a dense, intricate pattern of small, light-colored dots or checks, interspersed with larger, lighter floral or circular motifs. A lighter-toned sash or obi is visible around her waist, and her wide sleeves are also patterned. Her hands are partially visible, crossed in front of her. She appears to be seated on a surface that extends to the right, which also features a similar dark, patterned design. Near her right hand, a light-toned, fan-like object with a subtle pattern is visible on the patterned surface. The overall impression is of a detailed portrait against a plain background, with significant calligraphic elements above.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink painting of a person sitting on a rocky outcrop overlooking water, with mountains and a large pine tree
long_description: This horizontal ink painting depicts a serene landscape in shades of black and gray on a white background. In the center midground, a small figure, likely a person, sits on a flat, light-colored rocky outcrop. The figure is seen from behind, wearing a simple robe, and faces towards a wide expanse of calm water that stretches across the middle of the composition. A small, rectangular object, possibly a book or tablet, rests on the rock in front of the figure. To the left of the figure, a large, jagged mountain or rock formation rises prominently, its surfaces textured with varying shades of gray and dotted with small, dark clusters representing foliage. On the right side of the painting, a massive, gnarled tree trunk with extensive branches and dense, needle-like foliage dominates the scene. The tree's branches extend from the bottom right upwards and across the top right, partially overhanging the central figure. The tree is rooted on a similarly rocky and textured slope. Beyond the central body of water, several layers of distant mountains appear in the far background. These mountains are rendered with lighter ink washes, creating a sense of atmospheric perspective and depth. The overall composition frames the central figure between the prominent foreground elements, with the tranquil water and hazy mountains providing an expansive backdrop. A small, red, square seal is visible in the bottom right corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: 明   （倣）沈周     怡松圖     卷|Enjoying the Pines
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on gold-flecked paper

alt_text: Two figures in traditional attire in an interior, one standing adjusting hair, the other seated reading
long_description: This black and white vertical artwork depicts two figures in an interior setting. On the left, a standing figure is shown from the waist up, with their back partially exposed. They wear a dark, intricately patterned garment that drapes around their lower body and left arm, leaving their right shoulder and back bare. Their left hand is raised to their head, appearing to adjust their dark, styled hair. Their gaze is directed downwards. Behind this figure, a low, dark railing extends horizontally. On the lower right, a second figure is seated on the floor, facing left. This figure wears a lighter, subtly patterned garment and holds an open book in their hands, appearing to read. Their dark hair is also styled. To the left of the seated figure, on the floor, are a small, dark teapot and a single cup. In the background on the right, a tall screen with a grid-like pattern is visible. The upper portion of the artwork features a plain, light background, while the top and bottom edges are framed by a dark border with a repeating floral or geometric pattern.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A woman in a dark kimono walks under a tree, holding up her patterned skirt, on a scroll
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting featuring a single figure, a woman, positioned slightly to the right of the center, walking from left to right. Her head is tilted down and to her left, with long, dark, wavy hair flowing around her face and shoulders, partially covered by a dark, hood-like garment. She wears a dark green outer kimono with a lighter green, possibly patterned, inner layer visible at her right sleeve. Her left hand holds up the front of her kimono, revealing a vibrant underskirt. This underskirt features a red fabric with a white floral pattern and a blue fabric with white polka dots. Her feet, wearing light-colored sandals, are visible beneath the raised skirt. Behind and above the woman, a gnarled tree trunk with several branches extends from the lower right towards the upper left. Delicate green foliage and clusters of light-colored, hanging flowers, resembling wisteria, are sparsely distributed along the branches. The background is a plain, warm brown color. To the left of the woman's waist, there is a vertical column of dark, handwritten characters that read "月夜の七". The painting is framed by a light beige border with a subtle, repeating floral or vine pattern, and a narrower gold-colored border at the very top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Watercolor painting of pink blossoms on branches with green leaves, white flowers, and dark foliage.
long_description: A horizontal watercolor painting depicts a dense arrangement of flowering branches and foliage against a light, unpainted background. The central focus is a large branch extending from the upper left, curving downwards and across the middle of the composition towards the right. This main branch, along with several smaller ones, is rendered in varying shades of dark grey and brown. Clusters of pink blossoms, each with five petals, are abundant along these branches, painted with soft, translucent pink washes and some darker pink accents. Interspersed among the pink flowers are smaller clusters of delicate white or very pale yellow flowers, often accompanied by tiny green leaves. Muted, slightly bluish-green leaves are scattered along the branches. In the lower left quadrant, large, amorphous shapes of dark grey wash suggest rocks or dense, shadowy foliage, from which some branches and green blades emerge. To the right of these dark grey forms, and extending towards the lower right, are long, thin, upright green blades, resembling grass or reeds, painted with the same muted green. A small, square red seal with dark characters is visible in the upper left corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 明     仿陳淳     雜花圖     冊|Garden Flowers
metadata.medium: Album of sixteen paintings and one leaf of calligraphy; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll features black handwritten text and a watercolor illustration of yellow flowers in a tied bundle.
long_description: A tall, vertical scroll on a light tan background is framed by a slightly darker tan border. The top and bottom edges of the scroll's central panel feature a subtle, light-colored decorative pattern of swirling lines. The majority of the scroll is covered with black handwritten text, arranged in vertical columns. The text is in a flowing, calligraphic style, varying in density and line length across the surface. In the lower section of the scroll, a watercolor illustration depicts a bundle of plants. The bundle is tied with a light-colored string, resembling straw or twine, and rests on an irregular, dark gray base. Emerging from the bundle are several stems with clusters of small, bright yellow flowers and green leaves. Some reddish-brown elements are also visible within the foliage. A light gray, diagonal stick or pole leans against the bundle, extending upwards and to the left. More handwritten text surrounds the illustration, and a circular red seal is stamped in the bottom left corner of the illustrated section. The overall composition balances the extensive text with the singular, colorful botanical illustration at the bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A woman in a black kimono and hat stands by a body of water with stylized waves
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a woman in a black kimono standing slightly left of center, facing right but looking down. Her pale face is framed by dark hair styled up, topped with a small, dark, structured headpiece. She wears a black kimono adorned with gold floral patterns, cinched with a red obi. Layers of white, pink, and purple fabric are visible beneath the kimono, extending to her feet, where she wears white and black geta. Her left hand is partially visible, holding the front of her kimono. The background is a muted, light brown landscape featuring a body of water with stylized white waves on the left and a distant, indistinct horizon. Sparse, dark vegetation or reeds are visible in the foreground and mid-ground. On the right side of the painting, near the woman's feet, there is a vertical column of dark text. The central painting is bordered by decorative elements: a red band with a geometric pattern at the top and bottom, and wider side panels in a light brown or gold hue, featuring hexagonal and floral patterns, some with gold accents and checkered designs.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two women in traditional garments, one holding a lantern, gaze at a blossoming tree branch in a dark setting.
long_description: This vertical, grayscale artwork depicts two women in traditional attire standing outdoors at night. The woman on the left is positioned slightly forward, facing the viewer but with her head turned upwards and to the left. She holds a square-shaped lantern with a handle in her raised right hand, directing its light towards a blossoming tree branch that extends from the upper left corner of the frame, curving downwards. Her long, flowing garment has wide sleeves and appears to be a dark shade. Her hair is styled in an elaborate updo. The second woman stands slightly behind and to the right of the first, facing mostly forward with her head turned slightly left. She wears a similar long garment, which appears to have subtle patterns, and her hair is also styled up. The background is dark, indicating a nighttime scene. A vertical structure, possibly a screen or fence, is visible along the far left edge of the composition. Calligraphy is present in the upper right portion of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three women in traditional attire within a circular frame, in a black and white artwork
long_description: The artwork is a black and white depiction of three women arranged within a large circular frame. The background outside the circle is a mottled dark gray, while the area within the circle is a lighter, textured gray. The three women are positioned closely together, occupying the lower two-thirds of the circular space. On the far left, a woman with a light-colored head covering looks towards the right. Her left hand is raised to her chin. She wears a dark kimono with a lighter, patterned sash featuring a geometric star-like design. To her right and slightly above, another woman with long, dark hair flowing down her back holds an open fan with her right hand, looking downwards. Her kimono has a pattern of vertical stripes and possibly floral motifs. To the right of the central figure, a third woman is seated, facing slightly left and looking downwards. Her dark hair is styled in an elaborate updo, adorned with several thin, dark hairpins. She wears a kimono with a complex pattern of cloud-like shapes and floral elements.
