The overall impression is of a group of women in traditional dress, rendered with varying shades of gray, black, and white. There is vertical text in the upper left quadrant of the circular frame.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical painting of a gnarled tree with red flowers and light blue-green leaves, alongside lotus plants.
long_description: This vertical painting depicts a vibrant natural scene with a prominent tree and aquatic plants. On the left, a large, gnarled tree trunk, rendered in dark grey and black washes, rises from the bottom edge, twisting and turning as it ascends. Its branches, delicate and thin, extend upwards and towards the right, adorned with numerous clusters of small, light blue-green leaves. Interspersed among the foliage are many bright red flowers, some fully open with visible petals, others appearing as tight buds. Below the tree and extending across the lower right portion of the painting are several large, roundish lotus leaves, also depicted in a light blue-green hue. Among these leaves and taller, thin green grasses are several white lotus flowers, some in full bloom with visible petals, and others partially open or as buds. The background is a light, unadorned wash, providing a soft contrast to the detailed flora. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present, accompanied by several small red seal impressions.

metadata.title: 明  陳淳 暑園圖 軸|Summer Garden
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two women in traditional Japanese attire, one standing and one kneeling, on a golden scroll background
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring two women against a plain, warm golden-brown background. The scroll has a light blue border with a subtle pattern of clouds or waves, and a gold patterned border at the very top and bottom edges.The woman on the right stands, facing left, with her head slightly turned towards the viewer. She wears a dark brown kimono adorned with a pattern of light-colored flowers and leaves. A red lining is visible at the bottom hem and inside the sleeves. Her dark hair is styled in a tall bun, decorated with red and white ornaments. She holds a dark blue, partially open fan or umbrella in her left hand, mostly obscured by her sleeve.The woman on the left kneels or sits on the ground, facing right, looking up towards the standing woman. She wears a kimono with a distinct black and white checkered pattern. Her left shoulder and upper arm are exposed. In her right hand, she holds a light blue object, possibly a fan or a flower. Her dark hair is styled in a rounded bun.In the upper left quadrant of the golden background, there is a block of vertical text written in black ink, in a calligraphic style. Below this main text, a smaller vertical line of text and a red seal are visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A woman in a dark kimono holds two children, one in her arms, another at her leg, beside a tree
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a woman with two children against a plain, brownish-gold background. The woman, positioned slightly left of center, wears a dark kimono adorned with white, green, and red patterns. Her hair is styled upwards in a dark bun, secured with white hairpins. Her face is fair-skinned, and she looks downwards towards the children. She holds one child in her arms, who wears a red garment with white patterns. This child has fair skin and appears to be looking towards the viewer. A second child clings to the woman's left leg, wearing a brown and white striped garment with a dark sash. This child also has fair skin and looks upwards towards the woman's face. Both children have dark hair. To the right of the woman, a tree trunk with dark green foliage extends upwards from the lower-middle section of the painting. The foliage appears to be pine needles or bamboo leaves. The overall color palette is rich, with the dark garments contrasting against the lighter background. In the lower right corner, vertical text is visible, reading: 一陽斎豊国画.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A woman in a patterned kimono sits on a stringed instrument, adjusting yellow fabric or hair.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a woman seated on a long, dark stringed instrument against a plain, light brown background. The woman is positioned slightly right of center, facing left and looking down at her hands. She has light skin and dark hair styled in an elaborate bun, adorned with orange-red hairpins. She wears a dark green kimono patterned with blue floral motifs and gold geometric shapes. Over this, a red and white checkered garment with blue and white patterns on the sleeves is visible. Her hands are clasped, appearing to adjust a mass of wavy yellow material, possibly fabric or hair. Her feet, visible beneath her kimono, wear white socks with red trim. The dark brown stringed instrument, resembling a koto, extends diagonally from the lower left to the lower right, featuring multiple strings and a decorative dark border. A small red cord or tassel hangs from its left end. On the lower left of the light brown background, vertical black text reads "新川三郎画" followed by a red square seal. The main painting is framed by dark blue borders on the left and right, decorated with repeating gold wave patterns and stylized gold fish or dragons.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A fan painting shows a mountainous landscape with a waterfall, trees, a building, and a figure on a bridge.
long_description: This fan-shaped painting, rendered in ink wash on a light brown ground, depicts a detailed mountainous landscape. The composition is dominated by dark, textured mountains on the left, from which a thin waterfall descends into a body of water in the middle ground. A small, arched bridge spans this water, and a solitary figure, dressed in a long robe, stands on it, facing right. To the right of the bridge, a cluster of tall, slender trees, some resembling bamboo, surrounds a modest building with a sloped roof. Further right, more trees and subtle mountain forms recede into the distance. The upper right quadrant contains vertical lines of calligraphy in black ink, accompanied by a square red seal below the text. The artwork utilizes varying shades of black and gray ink to create depth and texture against the warm, speckled background.

metadata.title: 明   謝時臣 隱居圖  扇面|Landscape with Figure
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on gold paper

alt_text: Two figures sit on a mat beneath a vine, one holding a fan, the other a cup
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts two figures seated on a light orange mat against a plain light brown background. Above them, a vine with dark green and lighter green leaves extends horizontally and vertically, supported by thin, dark poles. The vine originates from the upper left and spreads across the upper third of the composition. In the lower half, a figure on the left is shown bare-chested with dark hair pulled back, wearing a white lower garment. They hold a dark red fan in their right hand, resting it on their lap, and look towards the figure on the right. The figure on the right is also bare-chested with dark hair pulled back, wearing a white lower garment and a patterned robe with blue and white floral or geometric designs draped over their shoulders. This figure holds a small blue cup in their left hand, looks upwards with an open mouth, and appears to be drinking. Between the two figures, on the mat, are two small brown vessels and a green bowl. Black calligraphic text is visible vertically on the lower left side, accompanied by a red seal. The painting is framed by a patterned border at the top and bottom, and woven, light brown, bamboo-like borders on the left and right sides.

metadata.title: 夕顔棚下納涼図|Enjoying the Evening Cool under a Gourd Trellis
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two large sumo wrestlers grapple in the center, flanked by two robed men, in a black and white line drawing.
long_description: This horizontal, multi-panel line drawing depicts a scene with four male figures on a light, speckled ground. In the center, two large, muscular sumo wrestlers are engaged in a grapple. Both wrestlers are shown from the waist up, with their legs extended outwards. They wear dark mawashi, or loincloths, with fringed edges. Their faces are turned towards each other, with neutral expressions. The wrestler on the left has his right arm around the other's back, while the wrestler on the right has his left arm similarly positioned. Their bodies are rendered with strong, curved lines emphasizing their bulk. To the far left, a man with a round face and topknot sits on the ground, facing right towards the wrestlers. He wears a light-colored robe with dark trim and a sash, and his hands are clasped in front of him. To the far right, a man stands, facing left towards the wrestlers. He wears a dark robe with wide, light-colored lapels and a sash, and his hands are also clasped. Vertical blocks of Japanese text are interspersed throughout the composition. Above the seated man on the left is "張分". Above the standing man on the right is "木村庄之助". Below the central wrestlers, from left to right, are "張分" and "鬼ヶ崎". Small circular seals and additional smaller text are also visible near the bottom of the image. The entire scene is rendered in black ink lines with minimal red accents, such as a thin red line on the right wrestler's mawashi.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Matted painting; ink on paper

alt_text: A monochrome landscape painting depicts towering mountains, a waterfall, pine trees, and two figures on a path
long_description: The vertical landscape painting, rendered in shades of gray, black, and muted beige, depicts a mountainous scene with figures. The upper half is dominated by towering, craggy mountains. On the far left, a slender, pointed peak rises, partially obscured by a lighter, misty area. To its right, a massive mountain fills the upper center and right, its slopes densely covered with dark, textured foliage rendered with small, stippled brushstrokes. A faint, lighter vertical streak on the left side of this central mountain suggests a waterfall. In the upper left corner, a column of vertical text is visible, written in a script. The first four lines read: "月明林下暫相逢 夜半鐘聲到客船 楓橋夜泊 張繼". Below these lines, additional smaller characters and two red seals are present. The middle ground features a large, gnarled pine tree with dark, textured branches and needles, extending from the right side towards the center. Its canopy reaches into the mid-section of the painting, partially obscuring the lower slopes of the large mountain. Below the central mountain, a misty valley or body of water is suggested, with faint outlines of distant peaks and a few bare trees on the left. The lower third of the painting presents a more detailed foreground. On a winding path or slope, two robed figures are depicted. The figure on the left, facing right, holds a staff. The figure on the right, facing left, appears to be conversing with the first. To the left of these figures, a third, smaller figure or object is partially visible near a stream or small body of water. The foreground ground is rocky and uneven, with sparse vegetation and smaller trees. A small, arched bridge or structure is visible further down the path to the left.

metadata.title: 明  謝時臣  谿山春曉圖  軸|Spring Morning in the Mountains
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A figure in white robes with a bow and quiver stands dynamically on a green hillside, framed by a gold border.
long_description: The vertical scroll painting features a single figure in dynamic motion against a light, muted background. The figure, appearing to be a person with fair skin and long dark hair, wears a green headpiece and predominantly white robes with subtle, intricate patterns. Red accents are visible at the waist and sleeves, along with blue details and a blue and white fan-like element near the lower waist. The figure's left arm is raised, while the right hand holds a long, dark bow. A quiver filled with arrows is visible behind the left shoulder, and a red-sheathed sword is tucked into the waist. The figure's legs are clad in red and white striped coverings or boots. The background depicts gentle green hills with scattered dark green pine trees, particularly in the lower half and along the right side. In the lower left corner, there is a small section of black text and a red square seal. The entire painting is bordered by a wide, patterned gold fabric.

metadata.title: 神功皇后図|The Legendary Empress Jingū
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two elaborately dressed figures, one standing with a polearm, one seated, on a vertical scroll
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts two elaborately dressed figures against a plain, light brown background. The top and bottom edges feature a decorative border with a repeating gold and dark gray floral or cloud pattern.On the left, a standing figure holds a tall polearm with a long, pointed silver blade. A red tassel hangs from a chain attached to the polearm just below the blade. This figure wears a red, turban-style hat, a light teal robe with dark trim, and a prominent white, fluffy collar. A large white beard and mustache obscure much of their face, revealing only a reddish complexion. Their attire includes patterned trousers and dark boots.To the right, a seated figure is depicted with a distinct red face and a long, dark beard. This figure wears an ornate green and yellow patterned robe, possibly with a floral motif, and a large, elaborate headpiece that extends behind their head. They appear to be seated on a simple, dark-colored chair. A small red seal and some faint dark text are visible near the bottom right corner of the seated figure.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A tall, narrow landscape painting depicts towering mountains, a misty valley, bare trees, and small buildings
long_description: This tall, narrow vertical painting depicts a mountainous landscape rendered in ink and light colors on a light brown ground. The top section features several columns of black calligraphic text, accompanied by multiple red square and circular seals. The rightmost column of text reads: "曾聞海嶽間國華有奇石 峰巒秀拔 氣象萬千 乙山居士為". The middle column reads: "寫此圖 筆墨精妙 氣韻生動 令人心曠神怡 丁丑秋日 吳湖帆題". The leftmost column reads: "此圖為乙山居士所作 筆墨蒼勁 氣勢雄偉 令人嘆為觀止 丁丑秋日 吳湖帆題". Below the text, the upper half of the painting is dominated by towering, craggy mountains that rise from a misty, undefined middle ground. The mountains are rendered with strong, dark outlines and textured strokes, suggesting steep cliffs and rocky formations. A large, prominent peak stands on the left, partially obscured by mist, while smaller peaks are visible in the distance to the right. The mist creates a sense of depth, obscuring the lower parts of the mountains and the horizon. The lower half of the painting reveals a valley or gorge, with a body of water or flat land visible in the distance between two sloping mountain ranges. Numerous bare trees with delicate branches, rendered in brown and light yellow hues, populate the slopes and foreground. In the lower left, a few small, gnarled trees with blue-green foliage stand out. Several small, traditional-style buildings are nestled among the trees and hills. One building, a pavilion with a tiled roof, is visible on the left side, where a small figure in light-colored robes appears to be seated or standing. Another structure, possibly a small house, is partially visible on the right. The foreground consists of rolling hills with textured strokes, and several red seals are scattered across the bottom of the painting.

metadata.title: 明    陸治   種菊圖    軸|Planting Chrysanthemums
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two roosters fighting on a light brown ground with sparse plants and thin branches
long_description: Two roosters are depicted in a confrontation on a light brown ground. The rooster on the left is positioned lower, leaning forward with its head close to the ground, facing right. Its plumage is a mix of dark brown, reddish-brown, and black, with some white feathers on its wings and tail. Its comb and wattle are red, and its legs are pale yellow with sharp claws. The rooster on the right stands more upright, also leaning forward, facing left, with its wings slightly spread and tail feathers fanned out. Its feathers are a similar palette of reddish-brown, dark brown, black, and white, with a prominent white patch on its tail. Its comb and wattle are also red, and its legs are pale yellow. Both roosters have their beaks open, appearing to crow or challenge each other. The ground beneath them is a uniform light brown, with a few sparse green plants and thin, dark brown branches visible in the upper right portion of the scene. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical column of dark characters and a red square seal.

metadata.title: 軍鶏図|Gamecocks
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A long-haired figure in tattered clothes stands on a box, holding a sword overhead, with trees below
long_description:
This vertical scroll painting features a central figure on a raised platform, framed by decorative borders. The main image area has a light beige background. A barefoot figure with long, dark, flowing hair stands on a light green rectangular surface. The figure wears light-colored, tattered clothing that appears to be blowing, revealing parts of their body. A piece of cloth covers the lower part of their face. Both hands grasp a long, thin, silver-colored sword or staff, held vertically above their head. The figure's body is angled, leaning forward.
The light green surface is the top of a brown, rectangular, box-like structure with horizontal slats on its visible sides. Below this platform, a landscape is depicted with several green trees and lighter, cloud-like shapes. Two vertical rectangular elements, possibly banners or steles, are visible in this lower section, each containing vertical lines of dark script on a light background.
The central image is bordered by a narrow gold band at the top and bottom, and wider, patterned borders on the left and right. These side borders are a teal color with a repeating pattern of light-colored floral or leaf motifs.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A red ink painting of a fierce, bearded figure in armor holding a large drum, on a scroll with patterned borders.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll featuring a single, dynamic figure rendered in red ink against a light, unadorned background. The figure, depicted in a three-quarter view, is a muscular, bearded individual with a fierce expression. Its face has wide eyes, a furrowed brow, and a prominent, dark beard and mustache. It wears an elaborate, multi-pointed headpiece and what appears to be layered armor or ceremonial clothing, also in shades of red. The clothing includes broad, angular panels around the waist and armored greaves on the legs. The figure holds a large, light-colored drum or similar round object in front of its body with both hands. Its left leg is bent, and the right leg is extended, suggesting a powerful, forward-moving stance. In the lower right corner of the main image area, there is a vertical line of handwritten text followed by a square red seal. The central image is framed by decorative borders: a wide, gold-colored border with an intricate floral pattern on the left and right sides, and a narrower green border with a repeating floral motif at the top and bottom, separating the gold from the central image.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting on a scroll depicts a warrior-like figure in fur, holding a long sword.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a single figure rendered in black and grey ink wash on a light brown paper. The figure, positioned slightly right of center, faces downwards and to the right, with a somber expression. They wear a voluminous, fur-lined cloak or collar over layered garments that appear to be armor or heavy robes, with dark, fitted boots. A long, slender sword or staff is held vertically in the figure's left hand, resting on the ground. A shorter sword is visible tucked into the waist on the right side. The figure's hair is dark and pulled back, with some strands visible. The background is a plain, light brown. In the lower right corner of the main painting area, there are several lines of vertical black text, followed by a square red seal. The central painting is framed by light green side borders and decorative patterned borders at the top and bottom, featuring repeating floral or geometric motifs in grey and black.

metadata.title: 葛飾北斎筆　黒鍾馗|Black Shōki, the Demon Queller
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A man with a large black fan-like object on a pole, walking barefoot in a scroll painting.
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a lone man walking towards the right against a light, unadorned background. The man is positioned slightly right of center, his body bent forward, and his head lowered. He has a bald head, a small dark beard, and is looking downwards. He wears a light blue or white shirt with dark horizontal stripes on the sleeves, a reddish-brown, fringed skirt-like garment, and dark blue leg wraps. His feet are bare. A green, woven bag is slung over his left hip. He holds a long, slender, dark brown pole that extends vertically upwards from his right hand, resting against his shoulder. At the top of the pole is a large, dark, fan-shaped object, rendered with black cross-hatching, appearing to be made of feathers or a similar material. The ground beneath him is a light grey-beige, with several irregular, darker grey shapes suggesting uneven terrain or water. In the lower right corner, there is vertical dark text that reads "丁丑" followed by "正亭", and below that, a square red seal with illegible characters. The central painted area is framed by an inner border of dark blue fabric with a repeating gold floral and geometric pattern, and an outer border of light gold fabric adorned with a swirling gold vine motif.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a tall, vertical mountainous landscape with dense trees, a stream, and extensive calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink wash painting, predominantly monochromatic with subtle reddish-brown accents. The composition is dominated by a towering, craggy mountain range that extends from the top to the middle of the scroll. The peaks are rendered with textured brushstrokes, suggesting rugged rock formations, and some upper sections appear lighter, possibly indicating mist or snow. Below the prominent mountains, a dense forest of trees covers the middle ground, their foliage depicted with varied ink washes, creating a sense of depth and texture. A narrow stream or waterfall descends from the upper mountains, winding its way through the forested slopes and continuing into the foreground. In the lower section, the stream flows over scattered rocks, flanked by more trees and rocky terrain. The painting features extensive vertical calligraphy on both the left and right sides. The text is written in black ink, with several red seal impressions interspersed among the characters, particularly in the upper sections. The calligraphy on the left is arranged in multiple columns, while the right side also contains several columns of text, framing the central landscape. The overall impression is one of a serene, majestic natural scene combined with scholarly annotations.

metadata.title: 明  陸治   枚乘獨坐圖    軸|Mei Cheng Sitting Alone
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A woman spins thread with a child nearby, three birds fly above, all within a decorative border.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a scene against a plain, light greenish-yellow background. In the lower half, a woman is seated on a low, light-colored stool, facing towards the left side of the frame. She wears a dark greenish-blue kimono with a dark sash and has her hair pulled back and styled upwards. Her head is slightly bowed as she focuses on her hands, which are engaged with a tall, light brown wooden device that holds a spool of white thread. To the left of the woman, a small child kneels on the ground, facing away from the viewer, dressed in a red garment adorned with a lighter red floral pattern. A small pile of dark, thin strands, possibly reeds or straw, lies on the ground between the woman and child. Above the figures, in the upper half of the painting, three dark birds are depicted in flight, with two closer together and one slightly higher and to the right. Red characters and a seal are visible in the lower right corner of the main painting area. The central image is framed by a wide, ornate border featuring a repeating pattern of stylized flowers and foliage in gold, green, blue, and white against a dark green background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting on a fan depicting a mountainous landscape with buildings, trees, and calligraphy.
long_description: This fan-shaped painting features an ink landscape on a light brown, speckled background. The right two-thirds of the composition are dominated by a mountainous scene, rendered in various shades of black ink. Steep, craggy mountains rise from the bottom edge, extending upwards and towards the right. Some peaks are depicted with lighter washes, suggesting distance, while closer rock formations show more defined lines and textures. Numerous trees with dense, dark foliage are scattered across the mountainsides and on rocky outcrops. Two multi-storied buildings with distinct rooflines are visible within the landscape. One is positioned on a prominent rock formation in the lower-center, while another is nestled further into the mountainside towards the right. The left third of the painting is largely open, featuring several vertical lines of black calligraphy in the upper-left quadrant. A small, square red seal is visible beneath the final line of text. The overall palette consists of black ink on a warm, light brown ground, with a single red accent.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   倣陸治   山水   扇|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on gold paper

alt_text: A fan painting shows a mountainous landscape with blue-green peaks, dark trees, a small building, and calligraphic text.
long_description: This fan-shaped painting features a detailed mountainous landscape rendered in a muted palette on a golden-brown background. The surface is marked with faint vertical lines, suggesting the folds of a fan. In the upper left quadrant, several vertical lines of black calligraphic text are visible, followed by a small, square red seal. Another, smaller red seal is located at the very bottom left edge. The landscape is dominated by a series of rugged mountains, primarily depicted in shades of blue-green and grey, with darker outlines and textured brushstrokes suggesting rock formations. These mountains rise from the lower edge of the fan, extending upwards and across the width of the composition. Dark green trees, some with slender trunks and others with fuller canopies, are scattered throughout the scene, growing on slopes and in valleys. In the central lower portion, nestled among the trees and at the base of a mountain, is a small, dark-roofed building, possibly a pavilion, elevated on stilts or a raised platform. Small clusters of white or light pink blossoms are visible on some trees and shrubs in the mid-ground, adding subtle touches of color. The right side of the painting continues the mountainous terrain, with steep cliffs and more dense tree growth. A small red seal is also visible at the bottom right edge.

metadata.title: 明   陸治   泉壑桃浪圖     扇面|Brocaded Sea of Peach Blossom Waves
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold paper

alt_text: A snowy scene with a man, woman, and child near a house and a snow-covered pine tree, with two dogs
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a winter scene with snow-covered elements and several figures. The upper portion of the image is dominated by a muted gray sky, transitioning to a lighter gray snow-covered ground in the lower half. A large, gnarled pine tree, heavily laden with white snow, stands prominently on the left side, its branches extending across the mid-ground. To the right of the tree is a wooden house structure, also with snow on its roof and ledges. In the center-right, a woman with a white head covering holds a small child on her back, both leaning forward and looking down at a low, dark table or surface inside the house opening. The woman wears a green outer garment over a blue one. To the left of the house, a man stands in the snow, facing right and gesturing with his hands. He wears a blue patterned tunic over brown trousers and wooden clogs. Behind him, to the far left, another figure is partially visible, obscured by snow. At the man's feet, two small dogs are in the snow: one white and one brown and white. To the far right, a large, white, snow-covered object, possibly an umbrella or a large hat, leans against an unseen support. The ground is covered in white snow, with subtle variations in texture. In the lower left, a vertical column of black characters is visible on a light background. The entire central image is framed by decorative gold borders with floral patterns on the sides, and a narrow strip with geometric patterns at the very top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A traditional painting depicts ducks in wavy water with geese flying above, framed by a decorative border.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal painting framed by a decorative border. The central image depicts a tranquil scene with water and birds. The background is a light, pale grey, suggesting an overcast sky or mist. The lower half of the painting is dominated by undulating waves, rendered with light blue-grey lines and washes, creating a sense of gentle movement across the surface. Patches of reddish-brown reeds or grasses emerge from the water in the mid-left and mid-right. In the mid-right, two ducks are positioned in the water. One duck is shown with its head submerged, its dark grey-brown tail feathers and lighter reddish-brown underside visible as it feeds. Beside it, a second duck stands upright, facing left, with a reddish-brown neck and head, and a body of grey-brown feathers. Its light orange webbed feet are visible. In the upper-left portion of the sky, a flock of five dark grey geese are depicted in flight, with wings outstretched, moving from left to right. In the upper right corner of the central painting, there is vertical black calligraphy and a red square seal. The central painting is bordered by a narrow, dark green band featuring a subtle patterned design. This green band is further enclosed by a wider, light brown outer border adorned with a repeating floral or geometric pattern in a slightly darker beige tone.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two figures, one with baskets and another with an umbrella and child, walk through falling snow.
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts a snowy landscape with two people walking from left to right. The upper half of the image shows a muted brownish-gold sky with faint horizontal lines, suggesting a distant, hazy landscape or water. Small white dots are scattered across the scene, representing falling snow. The lower half is covered in a layer of snow, also in brownish-gold tones, with subtle undulations. In the mid-ground on the left, a snow-covered wooden post stands vertically, with a horizontal rail extending to its right, also covered in snow. Above and to the right of the post, two dark-feathered birds with lighter undersides fly through the falling snow. The figure on the left is a person with a wide-brimmed straw hat and a shaggy, light-colored cloak or poncho. They carry a long pole across their shoulders, from which two dark, basket-like containers hang, appearing to hold snow-covered contents. They wear dark leggings. The figure on the right walks slightly ahead, holding a large, open pink umbrella over their head. A small child is carried on their back, wrapped in a dark blue garment with white circular patterns. This figure wears a dark blue garment with similar white circular patterns and dark blue leggings. They carry a red bag with white ties in their left hand and a thin, light-colored stick or pole in their right hand, held horizontally. A small, snow-covered mound is visible in the far right foreground.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three yellow, finger-like Buddha's hand fruits on a thorny branch against a muted grey background.
long_description: The artwork features three yellow, finger-like fruits on a thorny branch, set against a muted grey-green background. The fruits, resembling Buddha's hand citrons, are the central focus, clustered towards the left and center of the composition. Each fruit is a vibrant yellow, with subtle orange and brown tones in the deep crevices between its numerous elongated, undulating segments. These segments radiate outwards, varying in length and thickness, creating a gnarled and textured appearance. The surfaces show delicate shading, enhancing their three-dimensional quality. A slender, gnarled brown branch extends diagonally from the upper left to the lower right, supporting the cluster of fruits. Several sharp, dark thorns protrude from the branch, particularly visible beneath the lower two fruits. The background is a plain, uniform grey-green, providing a soft contrast that highlights the bright yellow of the fruits. In the lower right corner, a small, square-shaped red seal impression with indistinct characters is visible.

metadata.title: 仏手柑図|Buddha’s Hand Citron (Busshukan)
metadata.medium: Matted painting; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A bird with blue-green wings flies past tall, slender reeds on a vertical scroll
long_description: This vertical scroll painting features a bird in flight and tall, slender plants against a light, neutral background. The artwork is framed by a narrow, light-colored border on the sides, and decorative patterned borders at the top and bottom. On the left side of the composition, slightly above the center, a bird is depicted in mid-flight, angled downwards and to the right. Its wings are a dark blue-green, and its underside appears lighter, possibly a pale brown or off-white. Its beak points downwards. On the right side of the painting, a cluster of tall, thin, dark-lined plants or reeds extends vertically, some reaching towards the top edge. A few of these plants have small, feathery or seed-like tops. Below the bird and to its right, near the cluster of plants, are several small red and black characters, possibly a signature or seal, arranged vertically. Another faint, small, circular mark is visible near the bottom left.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink landscape painting on a fan with mountains, trees, water, a pavilion, and calligraphy
long_description: An ink landscape painting on a fan-shaped surface depicts a serene natural scene. The background features a range of mountains, rendered with varying shades of dark gray and black ink washes, suggesting depth and distance. In the midground, a wide body of water, possibly a lake or river, stretches across the composition. On the far side of the water, a distant shoreline is dotted with small clusters of trees and low hills, also painted with dark ink. In the foreground, to the right, a large, gnarled tree with sparse, dark foliage stands on a rocky bank. To the left of the center, a small, open-sided pavilion with a dark, peaked roof is situated on stilts at the water's edge. A small, dark figure is visible inside the pavilion. The lower left portion of the fan contains vertical calligraphic text in dark ink, followed by a square red seal impression.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   倣文徵明   書法   扇|Pavilion by Lake Shore
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on gold paper

alt_text: A large, muscular figure raises a club over a smaller, blue-skinned figure on a vertical scroll
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts two figures in a dynamic confrontation against a plain, light brown background. The scroll has decorative borders: narrow, light-colored strips with a repeating pattern at the top and bottom, and wider, dark green borders with a swirling cloud-like motif along the sides. The upper figure is large and muscular, with light-toned skin, a stern expression, and dark hair and beard. This figure wears dark, layered clothing adorned with red tassels and is shown in mid-action, raising a long, light-colored club or staff high above their head, poised to strike downwards. Their feet, clad in what appear to be sandals or boots, are visible at the bottom of their form. Below and slightly to the right, a smaller, blue-skinned figure is depicted in a crouched or fallen position, looking upwards towards the larger figure. This smaller figure has a fierce expression, orange-brown hair and beard, and claw-like hands and feet. They are dressed in a red garment with black and white accents, also featuring red tassels.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A black chicken with a red wattle and yellow legs pecks downwards on a light background
long_description: The image depicts a single, large black chicken positioned centrally on a light, aged paper-like background. The chicken's body is predominantly dark, rendered with broad, textured brushstrokes that suggest dense, ruffled feathers. Its head is turned to the left, with its beak pointing downwards, as if pecking. A small, reddish wattle or comb is visible beneath its eye, which is depicted as a small, round white area with a dark pupil. The chicken's two legs are visible, extending downwards from its body. They are a lighter, yellowish-brown color with distinct, dark scale-like markings. Each foot has three prominent forward-facing claws and one backward-facing claw, all depicted with sharp, dark tips. The overall impression is of an ink wash or woodblock print, with visible texture in the dark areas and a slightly mottled, light brown background. In the lower right corner, there is vertical text in black ink, followed by a red rectangular seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of one hundred and nine leaves; ink on paper, ink and color on paper

alt_text: A tall, vertical painting depicts a mountainous landscape with dense trees, buildings, a waterfall, and a river.
long_description: The vertical painting, rendered in ink and light colors on a light-toned ground, presents a layered mountainous landscape. In the upper third, large, craggy mountains dominate, their dark, textured surfaces detailed with ink brushstrokes. Some peaks are partially obscured by a pale, misty atmosphere. To the upper right, vertical lines of black text are visible, accompanied by several square red seals. Moving downwards, the mountains transition into densely forested slopes, depicted with varying shades of green, brown, and black foliage. Several small, traditional-style buildings, including pagoda-like structures and houses with tiled roofs, are nestled among the trees on different terraces. A prominent waterfall cascades down a rocky face on the right side of the mid-section, flowing into a winding river or stream that meanders through the lower half of the composition. The lower third of the painting features a wider expanse of the river, dotted with smooth, light-colored rocks. The banks are heavily wooded with large trees, some displaying reddish-brown foliage, suggesting autumn. More scattered rocks and smaller trees fill the foreground. Additional square red seals are present in the lower left and lower right corners of the artwork. The overall palette is muted, with grays, browns, and greens, accented by touches of reddish-brown and pale blue.

metadata.title: 明  文伯仁  溪山仙舘 圖    軸|Dwellings of the Immortals Amid Streams and Mountains
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Dynamic ink drawing of two figures, one riding a shaggy beast, with a floating head.
long_description: A black and white ink drawing depicts a dynamic scene with three figures and a large animal. In the center-right, a shaggy, wild boar-like animal with prominent tusks charges to the right. Its body is covered in dense, dark, flowing fur, indicating rapid motion. A figure rides on its back, facing forward, with hair or headwear also flowing backward. This rider holds a short, dark object. To the left of the boar, another figure appears to be running or flying alongside it, also moving to the right. This figure has long, dark, flowing hair, looks upwards, and holds a long, thin staff-like object that extends diagonally downwards. The figure wears striped garments. In the upper left corner, a disembodied head with a patterned headband floats, looking towards the action. The entire composition is rendered with energetic brushstrokes, emphasizing movement against a plain background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Matted painting; ink on paper (wash drawing?)

alt_text: An ink wash painting of a tall bamboo stalk with sparse leaves against a light, plain background.
long_description: The image is a vertical ink wash painting depicting a single bamboo stalk with leaves against a light, unadorned background. The bamboo stalk, rendered in varying shades of dark gray and black ink, extends from the bottom edge of the frame upwards, positioned slightly to the left of the vertical center. Its surface exhibits textured brushstrokes, with lighter areas suggesting highlights or less ink application, giving it a somewhat mottled appearance. Distinct dark horizontal bands mark the nodes of the bamboo stalk, appearing at regular intervals along its length. From these nodes, slender branches emerge, bearing sparse, elongated leaves. The leaves are depicted with swift, dark brushstrokes, some appearing as solid black shapes, others showing the feathery texture of the brush. The majority of the leaves extend towards the right side of the composition, creating a sense of outward movement, while a few are visible on the left. The background is a uniform light off-white, providing a stark contrast to the dark bamboo. A faint, irregular light gray smudge is visible in the upper right quadrant of the background. The overall composition emphasizes the verticality of the bamboo and the dynamic quality of its foliage, created through the expressive use of ink.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Unmounted painting; ink on paper

alt_text: A figure in dark robes with a white face leans over a boat in a snowy, icy landscape.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical painting depicting a single figure in a winter landscape. The central figure, positioned in the lower half, is shown in profile, facing right, with their body angled forward and down. They wear a dark, possibly black, hooded garment that covers their head and body, leaving only their pale, unadorned face visible. A band of red fabric is visible around their waist or lower torso, and hints of blue and red appear at their feet. The figure's arms are bent, and their hands are obscured by the dark sleeves. They appear to be leaning or pushing against a large, light-colored object, possibly a boat or a sled, which occupies the lower right foreground and extends diagonally upwards. The background depicts a vast, muted landscape with undulating lines suggesting snow-covered ground or ice. In the middle distance, a body of water or frozen expanse is visible, with faint, indistinct shapes along its far bank. The upper portion of the painting is a plain, light brown or beige color, suggesting an empty sky or a blank space. The overall color palette is dominated by earthy browns and yellows, contrasting with the dark figure and the pale snow.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A person in a dark kimono holds a snow-covered umbrella while walking through a winter landscape.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting depicting a lone figure in a snowy landscape. The central panel features a pale, muted yellow-brown background, suggesting a winter sky or hazy atmosphere. The ground below is a lighter, almost white tone, indicating snow. In the upper right, a large pine branch, heavily laden with white snow, extends diagonally downwards. In the distance, faint, lighter shapes suggest snow-covered hills or trees. A lone figure, likely a woman, walks from left to right across the lower half of the panel, her head turned slightly to look towards the left. She wears a dark gray or blue-gray kimono with a red lining visible at the hem and sleeves. A patterned sash in shades of blue and green is tied around her waist. Her head is covered by a dark hood or scarf, revealing a pale face. She holds a large, circular, light brown umbrella over her right shoulder, its surface covered with a thick layer of white snow. Her feet are clad in dark footwear, possibly geta, with white socks. In the lower right corner of the central panel, there is a red seal and some dark calligraphic text that reads "五畝". The central image is framed by a decorative border. The inner border is a light brown with a repeating geometric pattern and small, stylized oval motifs. The outer borders at the top and bottom are dark blue with intricate gold floral or cloud patterns.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A traditional painting depicts a landscape with buildings nestled among large, porous rocks and trees.
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a serene landscape rendered in a muted palette of light brown, grey, and soft blue-green. The composition is dominated by a series of large, irregularly shaped rocks characterized by numerous circular and oval perforations, giving them a sponge-like appearance. These rocks are distributed throughout the foreground and mid-ground, creating a textured, undulating terrain. Two traditional-style buildings with light brown, gabled roofs are nestled within this rocky landscape. The upper building, positioned towards the left, is partially obscured by rocks and foliage. The lower building, situated slightly right of the vertical center, features an open front. Inside, a small, light-skinned figure with dark hair is seated at a low table. To the left of this building, another small, light-skinned figure stands near a white bird, possibly a crane. A small, light brown wooden bridge with railings spans a narrow path or stream to the left of the lower building. Numerous trees with delicate, muted blue-green foliage are interspersed among the rocks. A particularly tall and prominent tree stands on the right side, its branches extending upwards towards the top of the frame. Smaller shrubs and sparse vegetation are visible in various areas. The background is a light, unadorned brown, suggesting sky or distant haze. Several red seals, some with visible characters, are present in the upper right, lower left, and lower right corners of the painted area.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　琴鶴圖　軸|Playing the zither for a crane
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a woman in a patterned kimono below a floral branch and calligraphy.
long_description: The vertical scroll painting, rendered in shades of gray, black, and white, features a woman, calligraphy, and a floral motif. At the top, a rectangular panel shows a branch with numerous light-colored, multi-petaled flowers against a slightly darker background. Above and to the left of this panel, a small amount of vertical text is visible. Below the floral panel, a large section of vertical calligraphy occupies the central portion of the scroll. The characters are dark against the lighter background. Below the calligraphy, a woman is depicted in a dynamic, leaning pose. She faces slightly to her left, with her body angled. She wears a kimono with a light-colored upper portion featuring a grid pattern, and a darker lower portion adorned with intricate floral and geometric patterns. Her right arm is extended, holding an open fan with a dark, patterned surface. Her left arm is bent, with her hand near her chest. Her hair is styled in a prominent, high bun. Her feet are visible, with one foot slightly lifted. The entire painted area is framed by a dark, decorative border on both sides, featuring repeating circular and floral patterns.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll features a man, calligraphic text, and a small painting of a flowering branch
long_description: A tall, narrow, vertical scroll, predominantly in shades of gray and black, with a decorative border. At the top, a small, square painting depicts a flowering branch. The branch extends diagonally from lower left to upper right, with several small, light-colored blossoms and dark leaves. To the left of this painting, there is a small block of vertical text. Below the painting, a large section of vertical calligraphic text fills the central part of the scroll. The text is arranged in multiple columns, written in black ink. In the lower portion of the scroll, a man is depicted in a crouching or reclining posture, leaning on a dark, low, three-legged stool or stand. He faces right, with his head turned slightly towards the viewer. He has a topknot hairstyle. He wears a robe with wide sleeves; the sleeves and a portion of his upper garment feature a distinct black and white checkerboard pattern. His lower garment appears lighter, possibly white or light gray, with a subtle pattern. His right arm is bent, resting on his knee, and his left arm is extended, resting on the stool. His expression is neutral, with his mouth slightly open. The scroll is framed by a dark border with a repeating, intricate floral or geometric pattern in lighter tones.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A scroll featuring a seated woman playing a stringed instrument, vertical calligraphy, and a small floral painting
long_description: The image depicts a vertical scroll with a light-toned background and dark, patterned borders. At the top of the scroll, a small rectangular inset painting features a branch with several light-colored, five-petaled flowers and dark leaves. Faint markings or text are visible in the upper right corner of this floral panel. Below the painting, the central portion of the scroll is filled with multiple columns of vertical calligraphy, written in dark ink. The characters are dense and extend downwards. At the bottom of the scroll, a woman is depicted seated on the floor, facing slightly towards the left. She is playing a stringed instrument, which has a small, round body and a long neck, held horizontally across her lap. Her hands are positioned on the instrument as if playing. The woman wears a patterned robe with wide sleeves. Her hair is styled upwards, and she has a dark, possibly decorative, headpiece. Her face is turned towards the instrument, and her mouth is slightly open. The background behind the woman is plain. The scroll's left and right edges are framed by decorative borders featuring a dark, swirling pattern.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal painting depicts multiple men sitting by a winding stream in a landscape with trees and hills
long_description: The horizontal painting depicts a landscape scene with numerous men gathered along a winding stream. The overall color palette is muted, featuring shades of grey, brown, and light green, with figures wearing robes in muted reds, blues, and yellows. On the far left, a dense grove of tall, slender bamboo stalks rises vertically. Below them, three men are seated on the ground near the stream's edge. One man in a light blue robe faces right, another in a light brown robe faces left, and a third in a green robe is partially obscured, facing away. A dark grey rock sits near the bamboo. Moving right, the stream flows from left to right, with a light brown bank. Four men are seated on the bank. Two men in light brown and green robes face each other, appearing to interact. Another man in a red robe sits facing right, and a fourth in a light blue robe faces left. A small, dark, bare tree with sparse branches is in the foreground. Further right, the stream continues to wind through the landscape. Two men in light yellow and light blue robes sit facing each other. Behind them, a man in a red robe sits facing right, and another in a light brown robe stands facing right. The landscape features rolling hills with sparse, dark vegetation. On the far right, large pine trees with gnarled, dark brown trunks and dark green needles dominate the upper portion. Underneath these trees, three more men are seated or standing. One man in a light green robe is perched on a tree branch. Another man in a light yellow robe sits on the ground, holding a round object. A third man in a light brown robe stands facing right. In the upper left corner, a red rectangular seal with illegible white characters is visible. In the lower right corner, a smaller red square seal with illegible white characters is present. The ground is depicted with light washes of grey and brown, suggesting earth and water.

metadata.title: 明  錢榖   蘭亭修禊圖  卷|Gathering at the Orchid Pavilion
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink landscape painting on a fan, showing mountains, dense trees, and a valley with calligraphic text.
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting, rendered primarily in black ink with subtle washes on a light brown or tan ground. The composition depicts a sprawling landscape. In the upper left quadrant, a section of vertical calligraphic text is visible, accompanied by a square red seal below it. To the right of the text, distant, undulating hills are outlined against a lighter sky. The middle ground is dominated by a series of rolling hills and rocky outcrops, densely populated with various trees. Some trees are tall and slender, resembling pines, while others are shorter and bushier, with rounded canopies. The ink work shows varying brushstrokes, creating texture for the rocks and foliage. Towards the right side of the fan, the landscape becomes more rugged, with larger rock formations and a denser cluster of trees. The foreground, particularly in the lower center, appears as a flatter, open area, possibly a valley or a body of water, with sparse, low-lying vegetation. The overall impression is a serene, expansive natural scene.

metadata.title: 明　陳祼　茂樹清泉圖　扇|Recluse washing his feet in a stream
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A person in an elaborate patterned robe with an ornate bird hair ornament holds a branch of white flowers.
long_description: A waist-up portrait depicts a person with a light complexion against a dark, plain background. The person's head is turned slightly to the right, and their gaze is directed forward. Their dark hair is styled in an elaborate updo, adorned with several white flowers and a prominent, dark, bird-like ornament at the top. The face is oval-shaped with delicate features, including small eyes and a subtle smile. The person wears a dark, long-sleeved robe or kimono, richly decorated with intricate lighter patterns, including floral, geometric, and cloud-like motifs. The left hand, positioned in the lower left quadrant, delicately holds a branch bearing several white, five-petaled flowers and dark leaves. Vertical text is visible on the lower left side of the image, near the hand. The overall impression is one of detailed artistry, with visible surface cracking on the face and other areas of the painting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Framed painting; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A woman in patterned robes sits beneath a flowering tree and a large moon on a scroll
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting, presented in black and white. The upper section features a large, light-colored oval shape, likely a moon, positioned in the upper left quadrant. Below and to its right, a tree branch extends from the right edge, adorned with numerous small, light-colored flowers. The background in this area is a uniform mid-tone gray. In the lower section, a woman is seated on the ground, facing slightly left with her head tilted downwards. She wears elaborate, patterned robes, which feature distinct dark, leaf-like shapes and lighter, possibly floral, patterns. Her hair is styled in an elaborate bun. Her posture appears relaxed, with one arm resting on her lap. The ground beneath her is a darker gray. In the lower right corner, a small, indistinct rectangular shape, possibly a signature or seal, is visible. The overall composition places the woman in the lower half, with the natural elements of the moon and flowering tree occupying the upper half.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium:
Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
Reverse side: ink and color on silk

alt_text: Vertical scroll painting depicting a mountainous landscape with water, dense trees, and small figures.
long_description: The painting is a vertical scroll, rendered in an ink and wash style with muted greens, browns, and grays. The composition is divided into distinct layers, moving from distant, towering peaks at the top to a detailed foreground with figures. At the top, a series of tall, pointed mountains rise into a light, misty sky, their forms softly outlined. Below these, the landscape transitions to more rounded hills and valleys, where a winding body of water, possibly a river or lake, begins to appear. Small, sparse trees dot the distant hillsides. Moving downwards, the mountains become more defined, covered with denser clusters of trees, primarily evergreens, rendered with fine brushstrokes. The water body widens and narrows, reflecting the light sky. Along its banks, small, indistinct structures or settlements can be faintly seen. The middle section features a prominent, steep mountain on the left, heavily forested with numerous trees. The water continues to flow, with more landmasses and tree-covered hills on the right. The brushwork for the trees becomes more detailed, showing individual branches and foliage. In the lower third, the foreground is dominated by a dense forest of tall, gnarled trees with visible brown trunks and green-grey foliage. The ground is uneven, with large, mossy rocks and patches of lighter earth. Several small human figures are depicted: two figures, one in a red robe and another in a white garment, are positioned near the center, seemingly engaged in an activity. Another smaller figure is visible further to the right. A narrow stream or path meanders through the rocky terrain in the lower left. Red seals and black calligraphic text are present in the upper right, upper left, and lower left corners of the painting.

metadata.title: 明    侯懋功    高山圖    軸	|High Mountains
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Three women in patterned robes are seated, one pouring from a teapot to another holding a cup, with a third playing an instrument
long_description: The image depicts three women seated on a plain ground, arranged in a horizontal composition. The background is a solid, light tone, with a decorative patterned border visible at the top and bottom edges of the frame. All three women wear elaborate, patterned robes and have their hair styled in dark, upswept buns. The woman on the left is seated with her legs to the right, looking towards the center. Her robe features a pattern of leaves and flowers. The central woman is also seated, facing slightly right, and is actively pouring from a dark, round teapot held in her left hand. Her right hand extends a small, dark cup towards the woman on the right. Her robe is adorned with a pattern of bamboo and other plants. The woman on the right is seated with her legs to the left, looking up at the central woman with an open mouth, her left hand raised. She holds a small, dark cup in her right hand, positioned to receive liquid from the teapot. Next to her, on the ground, is a long-necked stringed instrument, possibly a shamisen, with a checkered cloth draped over its body. Her robe features a pattern of small, scattered motifs. In the lower foreground, from left to right, are several objects: a small, dark, four-legged stand holding a shallow dish with what appears to be food or decorative items; a small, dark, pedestal-style stand with a single cup on top; and a rectangular, dark box with a lid, containing several long, thin objects.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A person in a flowing garment sits on layered cushions next to a lantern and tea set.
long_description:
This grayscale artwork depicts a person seated on a large, layered cushion in an indoor setting. The central figure, facing slightly left and looking downwards, wears a light-colored, flowing garment with wide sleeves. Their dark hair is pulled back. They are positioned on a large, multi-layered cushion or mat, which has a subtle pattern. Behind them is a large, dark cushion adorned with a prominent floral pattern.

To the left of the seated figure, a tall, hexagonal lantern on a slender stand illuminates the scene. Below the lantern, a small, low table holds what appears to be a tea set, including a teapot, cups, and a tray. To the right of the figure, a small cup or bowl rests on a low stand. The background features a screen or wall panel with a depiction of several bamboo stalks. Above the bamboo, a faint, circular shape is visible, suggesting a light source or celestial body. The entire composition is framed by a decorative border with a repeating geometric pattern.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A long, monochrome landscape painting depicting towering mountains, multiple waterfalls, dense trees, and small figures
long_description: The painting is a horizontal scroll, rendered in a muted palette of browns, greys, and dark, desaturated greens, giving it an aged, monochrome appearance. The composition is dominated by a vast, mountainous landscape that stretches across the entire frame. Towering, craggy peaks rise in the background, their forms defined by subtle ink washes and brushstrokes, with lighter, cloud-like areas often obscuring their upper reaches. Several waterfalls are prominent features, appearing as pale, vertical streaks of white against the darker rock faces as they cascade down the mountainsides. In the midground and foreground, numerous trees with dark, dense foliage and visible trunks are scattered across the rocky terrain, forming clusters and individual specimens. The trees vary in size, from small saplings to larger, more established trees with gnarled branches. Small human figures are integrated into the expansive landscape. On the far left, a few figures are visible near a small structure or a body of water at the base of a mountain. Towards the center-right, two figures stand near the base of a prominent waterfall, seemingly observing the scene. Further to the right, higher up on a mountain path, another lone figure is depicted, holding a long, slender object that resembles a flute or staff, appearing to play it. The landscape features undulating hills, rocky outcrops, and winding paths, all contributing to a sense of depth and natural grandeur.

metadata.title: 明  佚名  游仙圖  卷|Daoist Immortals in a Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A person in a patterned robe holds a staff, looking right, against a plain background
long_description: This grayscale, full-length depiction shows a person standing, angled slightly to the right, against a plain, light gray background. The figure occupies most of the vertical frame. The person's face is light-toned with distinct features, including narrow eyes, a small nose, and a small mouth. Dark hair is styled back, with a decorative element on top and some strands framing the face. The person wears a multi-layered robe. The outermost layer is light-toned, adorned with numerous dark floral patterns resembling cherry blossoms, and a prominent dark, circular emblem containing a leaf design on the upper left side. Inner layers of the garment are darker, featuring geometric and additional floral patterns visible on the sleeves and lower sections. The person's right arm is bent, holding a slender, dark, ridged stick-like object diagonally across the chest. The left arm is largely obscured by the wide sleeve of the robe. Bare feet are visible at the bottom of the image, positioned as if in motion. The overall composition is vertically oriented, with the figure centered.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Matted painting; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A full-length black and white painting of a standing figure in a patterned robe, looking down.
long_description: A full-length, black and white painting depicts a standing figure against a plain, light gray background. The figure, positioned centrally and facing slightly left, has a stylized face with downcast eyes and a small, closed mouth. Dark hair is pulled back into an elaborate bun adorned with a small, fan-like ornament. The figure wears a long, flowing robe with wide sleeves, decorated with a repeating pattern of large, light-colored flowers and smaller, dark, five-petaled flowers, both with dark stems and leaves. The pattern is prominent on the sleeves and the lower half of the garment. A dark sash is visible around the waist, and an inner dark layer of clothing peeks out at the neckline and hem. The hands are held together in front of the body, partially concealed by the wide sleeves. The bottom of the robe reveals what appears to be traditional platform footwear. The artwork is rendered with clear outlines and areas of flat tone.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Matted painting; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Full-body painting of a person in a dark, flowing robe holding a fan, facing right
long_description: A full-body, vertical painting, rendered in grayscale, depicts a slender person standing against a plain, light-toned background. The figure is oriented slightly to the right, with their head turned to face forward. They have pale skin, a small mouth, and narrow, elongated eyes with arched eyebrows. Their dark hair is styled in an elaborate, high bun adorned with a small, dark decorative element at the top and a larger, white, curved ornament on the side. The person wears a long, flowing, dark-colored robe with wide sleeves, cinched at the waist by a darker sash. Lighter-colored inner layers are visible at the hem and sleeve openings, creating contrast. The right hand, with long, delicate fingers, holds a small, open fan with visible markings. The left hand is partially obscured, tucked into the folds of the robe. The lower part of the robe flares out, revealing white footwear with a pointed toe.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Matted painting; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A black and white full-length depiction of a standing figure in a patterned robe, looking downwards
long_description: A full-length, black and white image shows a standing figure against a plain, light gray background. The figure is positioned centrally, facing forward with their head slightly tilted to the left and eyes cast downwards. They wear a long, flowing robe with wide sleeves, adorned with a pattern of light-colored, five-petaled flowers with dark centers and dark, three-lobed leaves. The pattern is distributed across the sleeves and the lower portion of the robe. A darker, wide sash or obi is tied around the waist. The figure's hands are held together in front of their waist, partially obscured by the sleeves. Their face is smooth and rounded, with narrow, downturned eyes and arched eyebrows. A small, closed mouth is visible. Dark hair is styled in an elaborate updo, with a small, fan-like ornament visible at the top of the head. The lower edge of the robe flares out, revealing layers of darker fabric underneath. The overall impression is one of a graceful, stylized representation.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Matted painting; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A six-panel screen painting depicts a landscape with gold sky, stylized waves, rocky islands, and trees.
long_description: The artwork is a six-panel screen painting depicting a landscape scene with water, land, and sky. The top and bottom sections of the screen are dominated by shimmering gold, representing either sky or mist, with irregular, cloud-like shapes extending into the middle ground. The central horizontal band of the painting is filled with stylized water, rendered in muted tones of gray, brown, and light blue, with numerous parallel, curving lines indicating waves. White highlights suggest foam or crests on the waves. On the far left panel, a small, green, rocky island emerges from the water, topped by a tree with vibrant red leaves. White lines at its base suggest small waves or foam. Moving right, the water continues across the next two panels, where faint, dark, elongated shapes, possibly logs or small boats, are visible amidst the waves. Small, dark, animal-like figures, possibly otters, are depicted in the water; one is near the left island, and two more are in the central water section. Further to the right, in the fourth and fifth panels, another green, rocky outcrop appears, featuring a small tree with green leaves and a dark, rounded rock. To its right, a larger, more complex rock formation rises, displaying a mix of green, brown, and reddish hues, and is also topped by a tree with red leaves. Another small, dark, animal-like figure is visible in the water near this formation. The rightmost panel continues the pattern of stylized waves and gold areas, with a small, irregular gold shape at the bottom right. The entire composition is framed by a dark brown border with a repeating gold pattern.

metadata.title: 波に舟図屏風|Boats upon Waves
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel artwork shows scattered fans floating on stylized white and brown waves against a gold background.
long_description: This horizontal, multi-panel artwork features a dynamic composition of stylized waves and scattered fans against a shimmering gold background. The artwork is divided into six vertical panels, each contributing to the continuous scene. The upper portion of the panels is a rich, textured gold, appearing as gold leaf, with some areas showing a lighter, speckled brown-gold. The lower half is dominated by large, stylized waves, rendered in shades of white and light brown with darker brown outlines, creating a continuous, undulating pattern across the entire width of the piece. Several large fans are depicted, appearing to float on or be carried by the waves. On the far left, a dark, open fan with radiating spokes is partially submerged in a wave. Adjacent to it, a larger, partially folded fan in light brown features a prominent teal-green section and subtle white floral patterns. In the central-right area, another cluster of fans includes a dark, open fan, similar to the one on the left, partially obscured by a light brown fan. Below these, a partially folded fan in light brown displays green leaf motifs. Further to the right, a single dark, open fan is visible, with a small, irregular white shape floating above it. The fans vary in size and orientation, suggesting movement. The overall color palette is dominated by gold, browns, white, and subtle accents of teal-green and dark brown.

metadata.title: 波に扇面流し図屏風|Fans upon Waves
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink, color, and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: A dark crescent moon over a gold screen with scattered green plants and white flowers
long_description: A six-panel screen features a gold background with a speckled texture. In the upper left corner, a large, dark, crescent-shaped object is positioned, extending across the first two panels. Scattered across the lower and middle sections of all six panels are various plants. On the left side, tall, thin green grasses rise from the bottom, interspersed with clusters of green leaves and small white flowers. Moving right, the density of the plants varies, with more clusters of green foliage appearing in the middle ground. White flowers are prominent in the lower sections, forming small groupings. Towards the far right, the plants become sparser, with a few individual dark green stems and leaves, and a couple of small, dark blue or purple flowers near the bottom right edge. The gold background dominates the upper and central areas, providing a luminous backdrop for the botanical elements.

metadata.title: 俵屋宗達工房　月に秋草図屏風|Moon and Autumn Grasses
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, silver, and gold flecks on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel screen with a gold background and two horizontal bands of colorful flowers
long_description: The artwork is a rectangular, multi-panel screen, oriented horizontally. It is divided into eighteen rectangular sections arranged in three rows and six columns. The majority of the screen, including the top and bottom rows and the spaces between the central horizontal bands, is covered in a shimmering gold leaf, showing subtle variations in texture and tone. Two distinct horizontal bands, each spanning the full width of the screen, interrupt the gold background. These bands are positioned in the second and fourth rows of panels. Within these bands, a variety of small, colorful flowers and green foliage are depicted against a muted, brownish-gold background. The flowers appear in clusters, with individual blooms in shades of white, red, pink, and light blue, interspersed with green leaves and stems. The upper floral band is slightly narrower than the lower one. The entire screen is framed by a dark border with a subtle, intricate pattern, visible along the top, bottom, and left and right edges.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink and color on gilded paper

alt_text: Tall, light-colored flowering plants with dark green leaves rise from a dark base against a gold background
long_description: This artwork depicts a dense arrangement of flowering plants set against a shimmering gold background. The composition is divided vertically into two panels, with a narrow dark border framing the entire piece and a patterned border along the top and bottom edges. The background is a rich, textured gold, showing signs of wear or intentional distressing, with visible square or rectangular sections. Numerous tall plants, resembling hollyhocks, dominate the scene. They feature prominent light grey or off-white flowers with multiple petals, some fully open and others still budding. The flowers are interspersed among large, dark green leaves that vary in size and shape, some appearing deeply lobed. The plants grow from a dark, rectangular base that occupies the bottom third of the artwork. This base is a deep, muted brown or black, with a textured, somewhat uneven surface. The plants extend upwards, almost reaching the top edge of the gold background, creating a sense of lushness and verticality. The overall impression is one of natural beauty rendered with a decorative and somewhat stylized approach.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Two-panel folding screen; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting with mountains, a wide body of water, trees, a bridge, a pavilion, and a boat
long_description: A horizontal ink wash landscape painting depicts a serene natural scene with mountains, water, and various vegetation. The upper third of the painting features a range of undulating mountains rendered in light grey ink, with darker clusters of trees on their slopes. Below the mountains, a wide expanse of water dominates the middle ground, appearing calm and light grey. In the upper center of the water, a small boat with a single sail is visible. Closer to the foreground, patches of tall, thin grasses or reeds emerge from the water, particularly on the right side and along the far bank. The foreground features a stone arch bridge spanning a narrow waterway, with a small, open-sided pavilion with a dark roof situated on the bridge. To the left of the bridge, a large tree with drooping branches, possibly a willow, stands prominently, with a small boat moored near its base. To the right of the bridge, a dense cluster of trees with varying foliage, some dark and some with reddish-brown leaves, rises from the land. Two small red seals are visible in the upper right corner of the artwork. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of grey and black ink, with subtle hints of reddish-brown in some foliage and the pavilion roof.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　仿趙孟頫　垂虹亭圖　卷|Pavilion of the Hovering Rainbow Bridge
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink painting on a vertical scroll depicts orchids, a large rock, and bamboo, with extensive calligraphy above
long_description: This vertical scroll features a large section of calligraphy at the top, followed by a smaller section of calligraphy and seals, and then an ink painting at the bottom. The background is a light, off-white paper, with some scattered dark speckles in the top calligraphy section. The top section contains numerous columns of black ink calligraphy, written in a flowing script, covering approximately one-third of the scroll's height. Below this, in the middle section, are two columns of larger black ink calligraphy. The right column reads: "學書學畫 江上漁樵 小舟一葉 紅塵不染 清風明月為伴 丁丑春日 寫於南窗 石濤". Below this are two red square seals, one reading "石濤" and the other "原濟". The left column reads: "此畫為石濤真跡無疑 丁丑春日 題於南窗耳". Below this are two more red square seals, also reading "石濤" and "原濟". The bottom portion of the scroll is an ink painting. Above the painting, to the left, is another block of black ink calligraphy that reads: "若非三春雨 何處蘭九畹 青山主人為寫此贈佳". Below this are three red seals, two square and one rectangular, reading "石濤", "原濟", and "清湘老人".
