The painting itself depicts a cluster of orchids, a large rock, and bamboo shoots rendered in black ink washes and lines on the light paper. A large, rounded rock, rendered in varying shades of gray ink, occupies the lower left. Its surface shows texture through lighter and darker washes. Growing from the ground in front of the rock is a cluster of orchids with long, slender leaves that arch gracefully outwards. Several delicate orchid flowers, each with four petals, are depicted on thin stems rising above the leaves. To the right of the orchids, a few thin bamboo shoots with small, pointed leaves emerge from the ground. The ground is indicated by light, horizontal ink washes and scattered small, dark dots. A few small, dark, clover-like plant forms are visible near the base of the rock and orchids. The overall impression is one of delicate natural forms rendered with expressive brushwork.

metadata.title: 明  傳馬守真  蘭石圖  軸|Orchid and Rock
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A horizontal ink and wash landscape painting depicting misty mountains, a lake, trees, a bridge, and small figures
long_description: This horizontal landscape painting depicts a vast, misty natural scene rendered in muted tones of gray, black, and light blue, with hints of green and reddish-brown. The composition is divided by a body of water that stretches across the middle ground from left to right. On the far left, towering, jagged mountains rise steeply, their peaks partially obscured by swirling mist that extends into the mid-ground. Below these mountains, on the near bank of the water, two small figures in robes stand near a gnarled, dark-branched tree. A small, simple wooden bridge with two arches crosses a narrow section of the water, leading towards the center. In the central portion of the painting, more mountains recede into the hazy distance, their forms softened by the pervasive mist. Several tall, slender trees with dark, sparse foliage stand on rocky outcrops along the water's edge. The water itself is calm, reflecting the muted sky. Towards the right, a dense cluster of trees, some with dark, full canopies and others appearing bare, grows on a sloping hillside. Nestled beneath these trees are two simple, rectangular buildings with light-colored walls and dark, sloped roofs. A steep, dark hillside rises behind these structures. In the bottom right corner, a small, square red seal with illegible characters is visible. The overall impression is one of a serene, atmospheric landscape.

metadata.title: 明  莫是龍 書畫  卷|Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A tall, vertical ink and wash landscape painting depicting towering mountains, dense forests, scattered houses, and a river.
long_description:
This tall, vertical ink and wash landscape painting depicts a mountainous scene with trees, houses, and water, rendered in a muted palette of grays, blacks, and subtle earthy tones. The upper portion of the scroll features a large expanse of light-toned sky, with two blocks of calligraphic text and red seals in the upper right and upper left corners. The upper right text reads "董其昌" followed by "林壑幽居圖" and a square red seal. The upper left contains a longer, multi-line inscription with several red seals.

Below the text, towering mountains dominate the composition, their peaks reaching high into the upper third. These mountains are depicted with light gray washes, accented by darker ink lines that define their craggy forms and textured surfaces. Dense clusters of trees, primarily dark-needled pines, grow on the mountain slopes and in the valleys, varying in size and density.

In the middle and lower sections of the painting, small, simple houses with light-colored roofs and darker walls are nestled among the trees and at the base of the mountains. These structures are scattered, appearing in groups in the lower-left and lower-middle areas. A body of water or river flows through the lower foreground, its banks lined with various sizes of rocks and boulders. The overall impression is a deep, expansive landscape with a sense of depth created by the layering of mountains and trees.

metadata.title: 明  莫是龍  倣黃公望山水圖  軸|Landscape in the style of Huang Gongwang
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A full-length black and white portrait of a person seated, wearing a dark robe with an ornate chest panel.
long_description: A full-length, black and white portrait depicts a seated person facing directly forward. The figure is centrally positioned against a plain, textured background that appears lighter than the subject's attire. The person has an oval-shaped face with dark hair pulled back from the forehead, and faint facial features are visible. They wear a dark, voluminous robe with wide sleeves that covers most of their body, extending to the lower edge of the frame. The robe features a prominent rectangular panel on the chest, which is lighter in tone and displays intricate imagery. This panel appears to show birds, possibly cranes, amidst clouds and landscape elements. The person's hands are not clearly visible, seemingly clasped or hidden within the folds of the sleeves around the waist area. Hints of a patterned fabric, possibly from a chair or throne, are visible on either side of the figure, behind the arms. The overall impression is one of formality and stillness, with the details of the chest panel providing a focal point against the otherwise dark garment.

metadata.title: 明  佚名 婦女肖像  圖   鏡面|Portrait of a Lady
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A full-length portrait of an older man in a tall black hat and dark robe, seated on an ornate base.
long_description: A full-length, vertical portrait depicts an older man seated, facing directly forward. He has a thin, light-skinned face with visible wrinkles around his eyes and mouth, and a faint mustache and beard. He wears a tall, rectangular black hat that extends upwards from his head. His attire consists of a voluminous, dark-colored robe, possibly black or very dark gray, which covers most of his body. A crisp white collar is visible around his neck, contrasting with the dark fabric of the robe. His hands are mostly concealed within the wide sleeves of the robe, which drape broadly to either side. A thin, light-colored cord or sash is tied around his waist. The man is seated on a low, ornate base or chair, with decorative elements, possibly in gold or a light hue, visible along its structure and beneath the hem of his robe. The background is a plain, light-colored surface with a subtle texture, providing a neutral backdrop for the figure.

metadata.title: 明  佚名  人物肖像  圖   軸|Portrait of a Gentleman
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A seated man in a dark hat and long robe, with a mustache and goatee, faces forward.
long_description: A full-length, frontal portrait depicts a man seated against a plain, medium-toned background. The man occupies the central vertical axis of the composition. He wears a dark, rectangular hat that sits high on his head. His face is oval-shaped with a light complexion, featuring narrow, dark eyes, a straight nose, and a dark mustache and goatee. His small ears are visible. He is dressed in a long, loose-fitting robe of a medium-dark tone. The robe has wide sleeves and a prominent, lighter-toned collar that forms a V-shape around his neck. A patterned fabric, possibly a lining, is visible along the inner edge of both sleeves, near his wrists. His hands are visible, resting on his lap, with fingers slightly splayed. The robe drapes broadly over his legs, obscuring them. He is seated on a low, dark, rectangular platform or stool, which is visible at the very bottom of the image. The overall impression is one of stillness and formality.

metadata.title: 明   佚名  人物肖像 圖  鏡面|Portrait of a Gentleman
metadata.medium: Framed painting; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A seated man in a red robe and black hat with a beard, against a muted background with faint mountains.
long_description: A full-length portrait depicts a man seated, facing directly forward. He wears a voluminous, long-sleeved red robe that covers most of his body, with a rectangular, gold-colored patch on his chest. A dark belt with several circular, possibly metallic, ornaments cinches his waist. His hands are visible, resting on his lap, with fingers slightly curled. On his head, he wears a tall, black hat with two flat, horizontal extensions protruding from the sides. He has a dark beard and mustache, and his eyes are dark, with a neutral expression. He is seated on a dark, ornate chair or throne, with visible armrests and a patterned footrest featuring swirling motifs. The background behind him is a muted brownish-gold, with faint, darker, undulating shapes that suggest distant mountains or clouds. The entire portrait is enclosed within a simple, dark border.

metadata.title: 明 佚名  人物肖像 圖   鏡面|Portrait of a Gentleman
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Full-length black and white portrait of a seated man with a long beard, wearing a hat and ceremonial robe
long_description: A full-length, black and white portrait depicts a man seated on an ornate chair, facing directly forward against a plain, light-colored background. He wears a dark, round hat with a small, light-colored knob on top. His face is round with a prominent, long white beard that extends down to his chest. His eyes are narrow, and his mouth is a thin line. He wears a long, dark, wide-sleeved robe that covers his entire body down to his feet. The robe has a wide, light-colored trim along the front opening, revealing a patterned fabric underneath. Two vertical light-colored stripes are visible on the lower part of each sleeve. Around his neck, he wears a long, double-stranded beaded necklace that hangs down to his waist. The beads are small and light-colored, with larger, darker, teardrop-shaped pendants spaced along the strands. He is seated on a wide, ornate chair with a patterned backrest and armrests, featuring what appears to be floral or scrollwork designs. His feet, clad in dark shoes with light-colored soles, rest on a low, dark, rectangular platform with carved details.

metadata.title: 清  佚名   滿清官員像     軸|Portrait of a Manchu Official
metadata.medium: Framed painting; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A black and white portrait of a man in a dark hat and light robe, seated on a low bench.
long_description: A black and white full-length portrait depicts a man seated on a low, dark bench against a plain, light-colored background. The man is positioned centrally, facing directly forward, with his body occupying the lower half of the composition. He wears a dark, flat-topped hat and a loose, light-colored robe with wide sleeves that drapes over his body and legs. His hands are visible, resting on his knees or lap. His face is oval-shaped, featuring dark eyes, a small mustache, and a short beard. The low bench he sits on is dark, with a subtle pattern visible on its surface. The central panel of the artwork is bordered on both vertical sides by strips of patterned fabric, darker in tone than the background, featuring intricate floral or swirling motifs. A narrow, patterned border also runs along the bottom edge of the central panel. The overall image has a soft, aged appearance due to its monochromatic nature and visible texture of the medium.

metadata.title: 清 佚名 肖像  軸|Portrait of a Scholar
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts dark, gnarled tree branches covered in numerous small, light blossoms against a muted background.
long_description: The vertical scroll painting features a dark, gnarled tree branch extending diagonally across a muted, dark brown background. The main branch originates from the upper left and extends downwards and to the right, with several smaller branches sprouting from it. These branches are covered in numerous tiny, light-colored blossoms or buds, which appear as small, delicate clusters. Some areas of the branches, particularly the thicker sections, show lighter, almost white highlights, suggesting a textured surface. The background is a uniform, dark sepia tone, providing a stark contrast to the lighter blossoms. In the upper left corner, there is a vertical column of dark, calligraphic text. The painting is framed by a light, off-white border on all sides.

metadata.title: 明  劉世儒  雪梅圖    軸|Plum in snow
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A panoramic ink wash painting depicts a vast mountainous landscape with jagged peaks, dense trees, and misty valleys.
long_description:
This horizontal ink wash painting presents a sweeping mountainous landscape, rendered primarily in shades of gray, black, and white, with subtle hints of blue and green. The background is a light, unpainted beige, suggesting an expansive sky or distant atmosphere. The composition is dominated by a series of towering, craggy mountains that stretch across the entire width of the image.

On the far left, a large, rounded mountain peak rises, its summit crowned with a cluster of dark, dense trees. Below it, a smaller, more angular rock formation features a distinct circular opening or cave-like void. Further down and to the left, faint, dark shapes suggest small structures or huts nestled among trees at the mountain's base. Moving towards the center, several dramatic, sharply pointed rock formations stand prominently, characterized by strong vertical brushstrokes and deep shadows that emphasize their rugged texture. Sparse trees cling to the sides of these central peaks. Between these formations, lighter blue washes create a sense of depth, hinting at distant, hazy mountains or atmospheric effects.

To the right, the landscape continues with broader, more substantial mountain faces that appear to recede into the distance, partially obscured by a soft, misty haze. The rightmost mountain is a large, imposing mass with a relatively flat top, also adorned with a dense line of trees. Below it, smaller, rounded hills and rocky outcrops are visible, dotted with scattered trees and brush. The lower portions of many mountains throughout the painting are softened by lighter washes, creating an illusion of mist or clouds that envelop the bases and valleys. The brushwork varies, from fine lines defining individual tree branches to broad, textured strokes that convey the rough surfaces of the rock faces.

metadata.title: 明/清   李在   董巨馬夏合風山水圖   卷|Landscape after Dong Yuan, Juran, Ma Yuan, and Xia Gui
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A bald man in a robe kneels, holding a flower, with calligraphy above and plants to his side.
long_description: A vertical scroll features a large section of black calligraphy at the top, occupying approximately two-thirds of the composition. The calligraphy consists of multiple columns of vertical characters, written in black ink on a light, uncolored background. Several red seals are interspersed within and below the calligraphic text. The bottom third of the scroll depicts a single figure, a man, kneeling on the ground. He is bald with a visible mustache and a short beard. He wears a loose, long-sleeved robe, rendered with broad, flowing brushstrokes. His head is bowed, and he looks intently at a small, light-colored flower or plant held delicately in his cupped hands. To the left of the kneeling figure, a cluster of plants grows from the ground. These include tall, slender stalks resembling bamboo and a bush with several small, round flowers. The ground is indicated by faint, horizontal ink lines. Two red seals are visible at the bottom left corner of the image.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　仿張風　摘菊圖　軸|Plucking Chrysanthemums
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink drawing of two men and a third figure in a natural setting with trees and bamboo.
long_description: A monochrome ink drawing depicts an outdoor scene with three figures and various natural elements. The artwork is rendered in shades of gray and black on a light background. On the left, a figure with long, dark hair is shown crouching or kneeling, looking up and to the right. This figure wears a simple robe. Several trees with sparse foliage are positioned around and behind this figure, their trunks and branches rendered with fine lines. In the center, a standing man with a long beard and a hat holds a staff in his right hand. He wears a long robe and looks towards the crouching figure on the left. Behind him, more trees are visible. To the right, a structure resembling a hut or a fence made of woven material, possibly bamboo or reeds, extends across the mid-ground. Tall, slender bamboo stalks grow behind this structure. A third, fainter figure is visible within the structure, looking out. In the lower right corner, a small, indistinct red mark is present. The ground is subtly indicated with light washes and sparse lines.

metadata.title: 明   王上宮   忠孝圖   卷|Paragons of Loyalty and Filial Piety
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Two robed figures in a landscape, one seated under a gnarled tree, the other standing nearby.
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts two robed figures within a stylized, sparse landscape. On the left, a large, gnarled tree with a thick, light brown trunk and dark green foliage dominates the scene. The trunk forms a hollow where a figure is seated. This figure has light skin, a bald head, and is enveloped in a long, flowing white robe, with a reddish-orange garment visible underneath. Their eyes appear closed or downcast, and their hands are not clearly visible. To the right of the tree, a second figure stands, also with light skin and a bald head, wearing a long, white robe. Their right arm is slightly bent with the hand raised, while the left arm hangs down. Their gaze is directed towards the seated figure. The ground is depicted as a series of light green, layered platforms with dark brown edges, suggesting a raised terrain. Small tufts of dark green grass and a few red and orange flowers with green leaves are scattered across these platforms. In the background, particularly on the right, are stylized, light green rock formations or hills, appearing as stacked, rounded shapes. A few small pink flowers with green leaves are visible near the top right. The sky is a plain, light cream color.

metadata.title: 明  吳彬  十六羅漢圖  卷|The Sixteen Luohans
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Vertical ink wash painting of a towering mountainous landscape with dense trees, water, and small buildings.
long_description: The image displays a vertical scroll painting executed in black ink on light-colored paper, presenting a detailed mountainous landscape. The composition is vertically oriented, with towering, craggy mountains dominating the scene from bottom to top. In the upper section, a large, rounded mountain peak is partially obscured by lighter ink washes, suggesting mist or clouds. To the right of this peak, several columns of vertical text in black ink are visible, accompanied by two small red square seals. Below this, more mountains with varied textures and smaller peaks are depicted, interspersed with numerous trees. The middle section features a dense forest of trees with dark, full canopies and visible trunks, growing on the slopes of the mountains. Among these trees, on a flatter area, several small, traditional-style buildings with sloped roofs are depicted. A body of water, possibly a river or lake, is visible in the mid-ground, flowing horizontally across the scene, with its far bank lined by trees and hills. The foreground is characterized by large, gnarled trees with prominent trunks and branches, rooted on rocky outcrops. The ink work varies from dark, bold strokes for tree trunks and rock contours to lighter, softer washes for distant elements and mist, creating depth and texture. Several more small red square seals are present along the right edge of the painting in the lower section.

metadata.title: 明  董其昌  溪山樾館圖  軸|Shaded Dwellings among Streams and Mountains
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a mountainous landscape with dense trees, small houses, and a bridge over water.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on light-toned paper depicts a detailed mountainous landscape. The upper half is dominated by towering, craggy mountains rendered with varied ink strokes, creating a textured, rugged appearance. Numerous dark, slender trees, resembling conifers, densely cover the mountain slopes. On the left side of the upper mountain, a few small, simple structures with peaked roofs are nestled into the terrain. A horizontal band of lighter tone separates the upper mountains from the lower landscape, suggesting a distant body of water or a misty valley. The lower half of the painting features a foreground with a variety of trees, including both dark, dense conifers and lighter, more sparse deciduous trees with visible branches. On the lower left, a small, simple bridge with multiple supports spans a narrow stream or path. The ground in the foreground is uneven and rocky. The artwork uses a range of ink tones, from light washes to dark, dense strokes, to create depth and detail. Vertical calligraphic text, reading "巖居高士圖" and "五華", is present in the upper right corner. Two red square seals are visible in the lower left and lower right corners.

metadata.title: 明  董其昌  山水圖  冊|Landscapes after old masters
metadata.medium: Album of eight leaves; ink on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts towering, craggy mountains, dense trees, and a distant body of water on a vertical scroll
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on light brown paper depicts a mountainous landscape. The upper half is dominated by a massive, craggy mountain peak, rendered with dark ink outlines and lighter washes to create texture and depth. To the left of this central peak, smaller, more distant mountains are visible through a misty haze. In the upper right, there is vertical calligraphy that reads "春山暖翠圖" followed by smaller text "庚午冬日寫於" and then "林". In the upper left, a longer vertical inscription, likely a poem or commentary, is present, followed by two red square seals. The central mountain descends into a complex mid-ground of smaller hills, valleys, and dense foliage. A body of water, possibly a river or lake, is visible in the middle left, with a faint shoreline. The lower half of the painting features a prominent cluster of trees with gnarled trunks and dense, textured canopies, rendered in varying shades of dark ink. Smaller trees and rocky outcrops are scattered throughout the lower landscape, leading towards the bottom edge. Two red square seals are also visible in the lower left corner. The overall composition creates a deep, layered landscape with a sense of atmospheric perspective, using predominantly shades of black and grey ink on the light brown ground.

metadata.title: 明    董其昌   春山暖翠圖    軸|Spring Mountains over Warm Greenery
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll with columns of black ink Chinese calligraphy and multiple red seal impressions.
long_description: The image displays a vertical scroll of light-colored paper, likely aged to an off-white or cream hue. The primary content is black ink Chinese calligraphy, arranged in vertical columns that are read from right to left. The longest column of text is on the far right, extending from near the top edge down to approximately two-thirds of the scroll's length. To its left, subsequent columns of text are progressively shorter, with the leftmost block of writing being the most concise. The calligraphy features distinct characters with varying stroke thicknesses, executed in what appears to be a semi-cursive or standard script. Below and to the left of the main body of text, several red seal impressions are visible. Two prominent square seals are stacked vertically, and other smaller, less defined red marks are scattered, particularly towards the bottom left quadrant of the scroll. The background paper is plain, without any discernible imagery or patterns.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of a cluster of tall trees and textured rocks with calligraphy on a vertical scroll
long_description: The vertical scroll features an ink painting depicting a landscape scene dominated by trees and rocks, rendered in shades of black and gray on a light, sepia-toned background. In the central and upper-central portion of the composition, a dense cluster of tall, slender trees rises, their trunks varying in thickness and their branches extending upwards with sparse, delicate foliage. Some trees appear to have bare branches or minimal leaves. The trees are rendered with fine lines and subtle ink washes, creating a sense of depth within the cluster. Below the trees, in the foreground, are textured, lumpy rock formations. These rocks are depicted with darker, more expressive brushstrokes, showing crevices and uneven surfaces, particularly in the lower left and lower center-right. The background is largely empty, a pale, unadorned space that recedes behind the trees. To the left of the main painting, a narrow vertical strip of lighter paper contains several columns of black calligraphic text. Additional columns of calligraphy are present in the upper right section of the main painting, accompanied by two square red seals. Another square red seal is visible in the lower right corner of the main painting, near the rock formations.

metadata.title: 明  董其昌  倣倪瓚山水圖  軸|Landscape with Trees in the Manner of Ni Zan (1301–1374)
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A panoramic ink wash landscape painting depicting towering mountains, dense trees, and small structures along a river.
long_description: This horizontal ink wash landscape painting depicts a vast, mountainous terrain rendered in shades of black and gray on a light background. The composition spans from left to right, featuring towering, craggy peaks and softer, rounded hills. On the far left, a large, gnarled tree with sparse foliage stands in the mid-ground, while steep rock formations rise behind it. A red square seal with illegible characters is visible in the bottom left corner. Moving towards the center, the landscape opens into a valley with a prominent, dark, textured cliff face. A waterfall or stream appears to cascade down the mountainside, leading to a series of small, traditional-style buildings nestled at the base of the peaks. Further right, dense clusters of trees, some resembling pine, dot the slopes and cling to ledges of the rugged mountains. A path or bridge is faintly visible on the far right, winding through the landscape. The upper central area contains a block of calligraphic text in black ink, accompanied by a smaller red seal. The sky is rendered with light washes, suggesting mist or clouds, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere throughout the expansive scene.

metadata.title: 明　趙左　谿山無盡圖　卷|Streams and Mountains without End
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a misty mountainous landscape with water, boats, trees, and scattered buildings.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting, rendered in shades of black and gray on a light brown paper, depicts a vast, misty mountainous landscape. The composition is structured vertically, with layers of landforms and clouds. In the uppermost section, two prominent, craggy mountains with textured surfaces rise through dense, swirling mist, their peaks dark against lighter, hazy areas. Fainter, more distant mountains are partially visible behind them, also enveloped in mist.Below these upper peaks, a wide body of water stretches across the middle ground. On the left bank, a cluster of small buildings with distinct roofs is nestled among dark trees, overlooking the water where several small boats or rafts are gathered. To the right of the water, a large, dark, rocky island or mountain peak emerges from the mist, topped with a few small trees. Adjacent to this central peak, on the right side of the scroll, vertical lines of black text are visible: "舟橋梅入新汀洲詩天" followed by "白雲卷燒園". Below the text, a rectangular red seal is present.The lower section of the painting features a dense forest of tall, slender trees, depicted in dark ink, interspersed with rocky outcrops. Among these trees and rocks, several more buildings with tiled roofs are visible, forming a small settlement. Another prominent, jagged mountain peak rises on the right in the lower third, partially obscured by the forest and mist. The entire scene is unified by the pervasive mist, which creates a sense of depth and atmospheric perspective, softening the transitions between elements.

metadata.title: 明  張瑞圖  山水圖  軸|Mountains Along Riverbanks
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on satin

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting depicting towering mountains, bare trees, a small building, and a lone figure
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting depicts a mountainous landscape rendered in shades of black and gray on a light, off-white background. The composition is dominated by towering, craggy mountains that extend across the entire width of the image.On the far left, a steep, dark mountain face rises, showing subtle variations in ink wash that suggest texture and depth. Moving right, a prominent, jagged mountain peak features a lighter, vertical streak, resembling a waterfall or a path, descending its side. At the base of this mountain, a small, dark, rocky outcrop is visible.In the central portion of the painting, a cluster of bare trees with intricate, dark branches stands on a rocky ledge. Behind these trees, a simple, rectangular building with a gabled roof is nestled into the mountainside, appearing small against the vast landscape. More mountains rise behind and around this central dwelling.Further to the right, another steep mountain face descends, with a lighter, winding path or stream visible along its contours. Near the upper part of this mountain, a small, dark figure, possibly a person, is depicted walking along a narrow path. Below this, the terrain becomes rocky and uneven, with dark boulders scattered amidst lighter areas that could represent water or a valley floor. The landscape continues to the far right with additional mountain forms and sparse, dark vegetation.In the lower left corner, there are two vertical columns of Chinese characters, followed by a square red seal impression. The first column of text reads: "霜露既降木葉盡脫人聲在在". The second, smaller column reads: "是明月八長谷不見明言".The painting conveys a sense of depth through overlapping mountain forms and varying ink tones, creating a serene and expansive natural scene.

metadata.title: 明  張瑞圖  後赤壁賦圖  卷|Illustration of Su Shi’s “Second Ode on Red Cliff”
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on satin

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts white and pink flowers with green leaves on a light background, framed by a blue patterned border.
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting featuring a botanical subject. A tall plant with multiple large, light-colored flowers and numerous leaves dominates the central portion of the scroll. The flowers are predominantly white with subtle hints of light pink in their centers, and they appear to have delicate, visible stamens. There are at least five prominent open blossoms, with several smaller buds visible among the foliage. The leaves are rendered in shades of grey-green, varying in tone, and are arranged along the stems and branches of the plant. The background of the painting is a plain, light beige or tan color, showing some signs of age and slight discoloration. The central painted area is bordered on the left and right by wide strips of dark blue fabric, which feature a repeating, subtle pattern of lighter blue circles or medallions. At the very top and bottom of the scroll, there are narrower horizontal strips of dark brown fabric with a gold, intricate pattern. In the lower right quadrant of the central painting, there is a vertical inscription in black characters, accompanied by a circular red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical hanging scroll features a painting of red and white flowers with green leaves on a light background.
long_description: A tall, vertical hanging scroll displays a painting of flowers. The scroll has solid brown sections at the top and bottom. The central painted area is framed by a patterned border, which has a light green background with a repeating geometric pattern of darker green squares. Inside this green border, directly framing the painting, is a narrow band of dark blue with a swirling, wave-like pattern in lighter blue or gold. The central painting is on a light, possibly aged, cream or beige background. It depicts a cluster of flowers and foliage, primarily in the lower right and center of the composition, extending upwards. Several large, full-bloomed flowers are visible; some are bright white with slightly ruffled edges, while others are a vibrant, solid red, also with ruffled edges. Dark green and brownish-green leaves and stems support the flowers. The leaves are broad and somewhat irregular in shape. The flowers are arranged in a loose cluster, with some white flowers at the bottom, red ones interspersed higher up, and more white flowers towards the top. One unopened bud is visible near the top right, on a slender stem. A faint, circular red seal or mark is visible in the lower right portion of the painted area, partially obscured by foliage. Some faint, light lines are visible in the upper left, possibly indicating a previous sketch or faint inscription.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical painting shows white and red poppies with green leaves against a warm gold background.
long_description: The vertical artwork features a vibrant arrangement of poppies and their foliage set against a warm, golden-brown background. The flowers are concentrated in the upper-middle and lower-left sections of the composition. Many poppies are depicted with large, delicate white petals, some of which have distinct red edges, while others are entirely white. Several prominent poppies are rendered in a rich, solid red hue. Scattered among the mature blooms are smaller, closed poppy buds, some with visible green sepals. The flowers emerge from a dense cluster of large, dark green leaves, which exhibit visible veining and vary in shade, appearing almost black in some areas. The background is a smooth, unadorned golden-brown, with a small, square red seal visible in the lower right quadrant. The central painted area is bordered by a dark blue fabric with subtle gold patterns, and at the very top and bottom, a lighter gold band with a repeating floral motif.

metadata.title: 芥子図|Poppies
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color and gold on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting features blue and white hydrangeas with green leaves on a light brown background.
long_description:
The artwork is a vertical scroll painting with a light brown, slightly textured background. It is framed by a patterned gold border on the left, right, top, and bottom edges. The central composition features a cluster of hydrangea plants with blue and white blossoms and dark green leaves, arranged diagonally from the lower left to the upper right.

The largest cluster of hydrangeas is positioned in the center, displaying a mix of vibrant blue and soft white flowers, each composed of multiple small petals. Below this, in the lower right, is a smaller cluster of predominantly blue hydrangeas. Above the central cluster, towards the upper left, another group of white and light blue hydrangeas emerges. The leaves are broad and varied in shape, rendered in shades of dark green, olive, and some with hints of blue-green, showing subtle vein details. The stems are dark and slender, intertwining among the foliage. A small, light-colored insect with delicate wings is visible near the upper right edge of the central hydrangea cluster. In the lower left corner, there is a vertical inscription in dark ink, followed by a circular red seal. The background remains largely unadorned, providing a soft contrast to the detailed floral arrangement.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting on two panels depicting dark morning glories and leaves on light beige background
long_description: The artwork is a two-panel ink wash painting on a light beige or tan background. The overall composition features morning glory vines with flowers and leaves, primarily in the upper and lower corners, leaving the central areas largely empty. On the left panel, a vine originates from the upper left corner, extending downwards and slightly towards the center. This vine features several gray-green leaves and two dark, almost black, morning glory flowers. One flower is positioned near the top left, and another is further down the vine, closer to the center of the panel. The leaves are depicted with varying shades of gray, suggesting depth and form. The right panel mirrors the left in style and subject. A vine descends from the upper right corner, adorned with gray-green leaves and three dark morning glory flowers. This vine then curves towards the lower right corner, where another cluster of leaves and three more dark morning glory flowers are visible. The flowers are circular with lighter centers, and the leaves show subtle vein details. In the mid-right section of this panel, there is a vertical column of dark ink text, followed by a circular red seal below it. The background of both panels is a uniform, unadorned light beige.

metadata.title: 俵屋宗理筆　朝顔図屏風|Morning Glories
metadata.medium: Two-panel folding screen; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Four-panel screen painting depicting various flowering plants, including white blossoms, blue-gray flowers, and bamboo.
long_description: The artwork is a four-panel folding screen, presented horizontally. The background of all panels is a muted, warm gold color, which appears somewhat aged. The painting depicts a variety of plants and flowers, rendered with a combination of ink wash, opaque white, and subtle colors. On the far left panel, a dark brown, gnarled tree trunk rises from the bottom, branching upwards. Numerous small, round white blossoms with faint yellow centers cluster along its branches. Below this tree, smaller reddish-pink flowers with green leaves are visible. The second panel from the left features a cluster of blue-gray, somewhat spherical flowers with dark green leaves in the lower-center. To their right, a group of smaller, reddish-pink flowers with distinct petals and green foliage is depicted. The third panel showcases large, bell-shaped white flowers with prominent stamens, arranged on a vine with dark green, heart-shaped leaves that trail downwards and to the right. The fourth and final panel on the far right features tall, slender bamboo stalks with delicate green leaves extending upwards from the bottom right corner. The bamboo is rendered in varying shades of dark gray and black ink. A small, red, rectangular seal or signature is visible near the base of the bamboo in the lower right quadrant of this panel. The overall composition creates a sense of depth and natural arrangement across the four panels.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Four-panel folding screen; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Horizontal painting of dark branches with hanging yellow flowers, orange fruits, and white and pink blossoms against a light background.
long_description: This horizontal painting features a composition of tree branches adorned with various blossoms and fruits, set against a plain, light beige background. Three main dark grey branches, rendered with fluid brushstrokes, extend across the canvas from left to right. On the far left, a thick branch curves upwards and right, from which numerous delicate, light yellow or pale brown strands hang downwards, each ending in a small, star-like cluster. Moving towards the center, another dark grey branch emerges from the bottom, curving upwards. From this branch, and slightly above it, hang several clusters of small, round, orange-red fruits. Interspersed with these fruits are more delicate hanging strands, some bearing small, light pink blossoms. The right side of the painting is dominated by a very thick, dark grey branch that extends from the bottom right, curving upwards and left. From this branch, and extending further left, are numerous dense clusters of white and light pink blossoms, resembling cherry or plum flowers. A few more small, round, orange-red fruits are also visible near the main branch on the right. The overall style suggests an ink and wash technique, with soft colors and a delicate rendering of the botanical elements.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Blue morning glories and green vines sprawl across a six-panel gold screen, filling the frame.
long_description: This artwork depicts a vibrant arrangement of blue morning glories and green vines sprawling across a multi-panel screen with a gold background. The screen is composed of six vertical panels, each separated by a thin, dark line, suggesting a folding screen. The background is a uniform, shimmering gold, likely gold leaf, which provides a luminous contrast to the flora. Numerous morning glory flowers, rendered in a deep, rich blue, are scattered across the entire surface. Each flower is trumpet-shaped, with a lighter, almost white, center that radiates outwards. They vary slightly in size and orientation, some fully open, others partially closed. Intertwined with the flowers are abundant green leaves, typically heart-shaped, and slender, winding vines. The vines originate from the lower left and extend upwards and across the panels, creating a dynamic, organic pattern. The foliage is concentrated in dense clusters, particularly in the central and right-hand sections, while sparser tendrils reach towards the edges of the panels. The overall composition fills the entire rectangular frame, creating a sense of lush growth.

metadata.title: 朝顔図屏風|Morning Glories
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: A standing deer with antlers, head turned back, looking down, next to bamboo on a light background
long_description: This vertical scroll painting features a single deer standing on a plain, light tan background. The deer is positioned slightly to the right of the center, facing towards the right, but its head is sharply turned back to the left, looking downwards. It has prominent, multi-pronged antlers that curve upwards and outwards. The deer's fur is depicted in shades of light brown and grey, with a lighter, almost white, underside on its chest and belly. Its eyes are round and dark, and its muzzle is pointed. Its four slender legs end in dark hooves. To the lower left of the deer, a cluster of dark green or black bamboo leaves and thin stalks emerges from the bottom edge of the painting. In the very bottom left corner, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text, accompanied by a square red seal below it. The overall composition is sparse, with the deer and bamboo as the only depicted elements against the unadorned background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two adults and two children under a large tree with a basket and rakes on the ground
long_description: The artwork depicts a scene with four figures under a large tree on a light-colored ground. The tree, positioned on the left side, has a thick, reddish-brown trunk that extends upwards beyond the frame, with dark green, rounded foliage visible at the top. At the base of the tree, on the left, two small, light-skinned figures are present. One child-like figure with dark hair is seated, looking towards the right. To its right, another small, round figure is partially visible. On the ground below the tree, a dark, woven basket with a handle is placed to the left of the small figures. Below the basket, a dark, rake-like tool with multiple prongs lies horizontally. In the center-right of the composition, two adult figures are seated on the ground, facing each other. The figure on the left appears older, with light skin and short, light hair. They wear a robe patterned with brown, blue, and black hues, and are shown extending their right hand, holding a small, reddish object, towards the other figure. The figure on the right has light skin and long, light hair, and is dressed in a robe patterned with light green, blue, and black. This figure is seated with legs folded, holding a light-colored bottle or flask in their left arm. Another dark, rake-like tool lies horizontally on the ground below the seated adults. To the far right, behind the right adult, a bundle of dark, spiky foliage or branches rests on the ground. A red, square seal with dark characters is visible in the bottom-left corner of the image. The background is a plain, light, off-white color, showing some subtle texture and discoloration.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink painting depicts a flowering plant with three open blossoms and buds on a light gray background.
long_description: The image is a vertical, monochromatic ink painting on a light gray ground. A flowering plant dominates the central space, extending diagonally from the lower right towards the upper left. The plant features a dark, thick stem that branches. Three prominent, open flowers are depicted along the stem, with two smaller buds near the top. The flowers have light, almost white, centers with darker, wavy outlines defining their petals. The petals appear layered and full. The leaves are broad and dark, with some showing subtle variations in tone. Below the lowest open flower, the stem continues downwards and branches, with more dark leaves. To the right of the main stem, in the mid-ground, several faint, thin plant stalks rise vertically. In the bottom left corner, a circular seal is visible, containing dark, stylized characters. The background is a uniform, light gray, providing a stark contrast to the darker plant elements.

metadata.title: 月に兎・牡丹・立葵図|Rabbits under the Moon, Peonies, and Hollyhocks
metadata.medium: Set of three matted paintings; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of snow-covered bamboo and rocks on a vertical scroll, rendered in black, white, and gray.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink wash painting presented on a light-colored scroll, depicting a winter landscape primarily featuring bamboo and snow-covered rock formations. The composition is arranged vertically, with the main elements concentrated in the lower two-thirds of the painting. Several bamboo stalks, rendered in varying shades of dark gray and black ink, rise from the lower left, extending upwards and slightly to the right. Their slender branches and pointed leaves are heavily laden with white snow, creating distinct white outlines and patches against the darker foliage. The snow also accumulates on the upper surfaces of the bamboo stalks. In the lower left quadrant, a prominent, irregularly shaped rock or mound is almost entirely covered in a thick layer of white snow, with dark ink lines defining its underlying structure and texture. Smaller, similarly snow-dusted forms are visible around its base. The background is a soft, diffused gray wash, suggesting a misty or snowy atmosphere, with lighter tones towards the top and around the snow-covered elements. In the upper right portion of the painting, several vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present. Below this text, a small, square red seal is visible. A larger, rectangular red seal is situated in the lower left, partially embedded within the snow-covered rock formation. The entire scene is depicted using a monochromatic palette of black ink, various gray washes, and the white of the paper.

metadata.title: 雪竹図|Bamboo and Rock in Snow
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicting a large mountain, a village with trees, and a small boat with a figure on water.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting features a landscape rendered primarily in black and gray tones on a light, uncolored background. The top section is dominated by a large, rounded mountain or cloud formation, depicted with varied gray ink washes that create a textured, almost mottled appearance. Below this, a lighter expanse suggests sky or mist, leading down to a cluster of dark, silhouetted shapes representing houses and trees situated on a low landmass. This landmass is positioned above a horizontal band of lighter gray wash, indicating water or a misty foreground. The lower portion of the painting shows a wide, open expanse of the light background, suggesting water. In the lower left, vertical calligraphic text in black ink is visible, accompanied by two small, square red seals. To the right of the text, a small, simple boat with a single figure paddling is depicted with minimal black ink strokes. The entire artwork is framed by light brown borders, with patterned sections at the very top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A tall, vertical scroll painting depicts a dense, towering mountainous landscape with waterfalls, trees, and small structures
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a dense, towering mountainous landscape rendered in muted greens, browns, and grays, against a light yellow-beige background. The composition is dominated by a large, central mountain that extends from the top to the bottom of the frame. The upper section features the craggy peak of the mountain, detailed with textured brushstrokes and dotted with small clusters of dark green trees. As the mountain descends, it forms a complex network of ridges and valleys, densely covered with various trees and shrubs in shades of green. Several thin, white waterfalls cascade down the slopes, particularly noticeable on the right side of the painting. Small, indistinct structures are nestled among the foliage and rocks throughout the middle ground. In the lower third, the trees become more prominent with fuller canopies. A distinct red-roofed building with light-colored walls is situated on the left, surrounded by rocks and trees. To its right, a small, light-colored bridge spans a stream, and a small figure in blue clothing is visible walking on a path nearby. Additional small structures and fences are scattered across the lower landscape. The bottom right corner contains vertical columns of black characters that read "雲樵寫丁卯年夏日於清暉閣" followed by a red seal impression below them.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a snow-covered mountainous landscape with scattered villages and winding rivers.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting rendered in a muted palette of beige, light brown, and dark grey-black ink, depicting a vast winter landscape. The upper portion features a wide, distant mountain range with snow-covered peaks, silhouetted against a lighter, hazy sky. Below this, a prominent, textured mountain or large hill dominates the upper-middle ground, its slopes dusted with snow and dotted with dark, fine brushstrokes suggesting sparse vegetation. To its right, on a lower, distant hill, several thin, vertical structures rise. The middle section of the painting reveals a winding body of water, possibly a river or lake, flowing through a valley. Along its banks and nestled among rolling, snow-covered hills, are several clusters of small, simple houses or buildings, rendered with dark outlines and minimal detail. The landscape continues downwards, with more scattered villages and snow-covered terrain. In the lower left, a distinct, small house stands elevated on stilts near the edge of a body of water. Throughout the scene, the ground is textured with fine, horizontal and diagonal lines, indicating fields or snow drifts. In the lower left corner, vertical black text reads "雪景" followed by a smaller signature and a red square seal. Another red square seal is visible in the upper right corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: An ink painting on a vertical scroll shows slender orchid leaves and delicate blossoms on a light background
long_description: A tall, narrow vertical scroll features an ink painting of orchids on a light tan-colored paper. The top and bottom edges of the scroll are bordered with a decorative gold pattern. The orchid plant originates from the lower-left corner, with several long, slender leaves rendered in varying shades of dark grey and black ink. Some leaves are broad and sweeping, curving upwards and to the right, while others are thin and grass-like. Delicate orchid blossoms, depicted with lighter ink washes and darker outlines, are scattered along the stems, appearing in various stages of opening. One very long, thin, dark line extends from the middle-right upwards towards the top-right, separate from the main plant. On the left side, near the upper-middle, are several lines of black ink calligraphy. Below the calligraphy are two small, square red seals. Another small, square red seal is visible near the bottom-left, nestled among the orchid leaves.

metadata.title: 墨蕙図 (Bokkei zu)|Orchids
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a landscape with mountains, colorful trees, and a body of water
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting depicting a vibrant mountainous landscape. The composition is contained within the curved upper and lower edges of the fan. On the left, several rounded, light gray mountains rise, their forms defined by dark ink outlines and subtle washes. Scattered across their peaks and slopes are small, delicate clusters of foliage in shades of green, red, and yellow. Towards the center and extending to the right, a prominent, gnarled tree with a thick, textured trunk and dark, angular branches emerges from a rocky outcrop. This tree is adorned with a mix of bright red, green, and blue leaves. Below the central tree and rocks, a soft wash of light blue or gray suggests a body of water or mist. Further to the right, additional rocky formations are visible, supporting smaller trees with blue and green foliage. The painting employs delicate brushstrokes and washes to create a detailed and colorful natural scene.

metadata.title: 池(徳山)玉瀾筆   秋山水図扇面|Autumnal Landscape with a Waterfall
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two birds perch on a gnarled tree with pink blossoms and green leaves, above textured rocks.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features two birds perched on a gnarled tree, set against a pale background and framed by a blue patterned border. The upper bird, with brownish plumage, sits on a high, slender branch, facing right and looking down. Below it, a second bird with a white body, blue-black wings, a long white tail, and a reddish open beak perches on a thicker branch, facing left and looking upwards. The central tree has a thick, twisted trunk and branches, rendered in shades of grey and brown. Clusters of small, light pink blossoms adorn several branches, while delicate, drooping green leaves hang from the upper branches. Large, rounded, grey-brown rocks with textured surfaces are visible at the base of the tree on the left. The background is a uniform, pale beige. On the left side, near the middle, a vertical column of dark text is accompanied by two square red seals. The artwork is bordered by a wide, dark blue fabric with a subtle pattern, separated from the painting by a narrower, light gold band with a repeating floral motif at the top and bottom.

metadata.title: 与謝蕪村筆　柳緑桃紅図|Birds in Willows and Blossoming Peach Tree
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A seated figure in a kimono with long dark hair, next to an incense burner, with calligraphy above
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll on light-colored paper, framed by decorative borders at the top and bottom. The top border features a repeating pattern of dark green or blue-green circular motifs on a lighter background. Below this, in the upper left quadrant, is a section of black ink calligraphy arranged in several vertical lines. The main text, from right to left, reads: "白ひあひるね / もしらすきの九 / 等雨のちく / そのうつる". To the left of this main text, a shorter vertical line of calligraphy is visible, followed by a small red rectangular seal and another smaller, square red seal. Below the calligraphy, occupying the lower half of the scroll, is a depiction of a seated figure. The figure is positioned slightly to the right of the vertical center, facing towards the left with their head gently bowed. They have long, straight dark hair that extends down their back. Their face is light-skinned with simple, delicate features. The figure wears a kimono with a light, possibly cream or pale yellow, background. The kimono is adorned with broad, horizontal brushstrokes of gray and scattered, stylized orange leaf-like shapes. A reddish-pink garment is visible at the neckline and across the chest. The figure's hands are not clearly visible, appearing to be tucked within the sleeves or against their body. To the left of the seated figure, a small, dark object, possibly an incense burner, rests on a small, red, four-legged stand. A thin, dark, wavy line of smoke rises vertically from the object. The bottom of the scroll features a decorative border identical to the one at the top.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting a misty mountainous landscape with houses, a bridge, trees, and a small figure.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a misty mountainous landscape in shades of black, white, and gray. The composition is dominated by towering, craggy mountains that frame a central valley, with large areas of white and light gray suggesting mist or clouds. In the upper section, dark, textured mountain peaks rise sharply, with several small, multi-roofed houses nestled into the slopes on both the left and right sides. Below these, the mist thickens, partially obscuring the middle ground. A multi-arched bridge spans a chasm, connecting two mountain sides, with more houses visible on the slopes above and around it. Further down, the mist begins to clear, revealing a dense forest of tall, slender trees with dark, leafy canopies that fill the lower-middle section of the painting. A winding path emerges from the trees in the bottom right, where a small, solitary figure, possibly a person, walks towards the left. Scattered rocks and sparse vegetation are visible along the path and at the base of the trees. On the far right side, a vertical column of black calligraphic text is present, accompanied by two red square seals near the bottom of the text.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A horizontal watercolor painting depicting a potted rock garden, a pine branch, and red flowers with large leaves
long_description: The image is a horizontal watercolor painting on a light, plain background, depicting a series of natural elements arranged from left to right. On the far left, a light blue-green pot with a patterned rim holds a miniature landscape. Within the pot, a tall, jagged, light gray rock formation rises, surrounded by smaller, light green plant-like forms with yellow-orange tips, resembling fungi or small plants. The ground within the pot is speckled with dark dots. To the right of the potted arrangement, a branch of a pine tree extends horizontally. It features numerous thin, dark green needles and a small, dark, pendulous object hanging from one of its smaller branches. Below the pine branch, two square red seals are stamped on the paper. Further to the right, a cluster of two prominent red flowers with dark centers and light green leaves is depicted. Beneath these flowers are several large, rounded, dark gray shapes, possibly representing rocks or large leaves, with subtle lighter gray washes suggesting form and texture. The overall composition is balanced, with elements spaced across the light background.

metadata.title: 岡田半江筆  花卉図巻|Letter Enclosing Flowers
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink wash scroll painting depicts a misty mountainous landscape with waterfalls, dense foliage, and small buildings.
long_description: This vertical scroll painting, rendered in ink wash, presents a towering mountainous landscape enveloped in mist. The upper portion features jagged, dark peaks, some with subtle hints of light green or yellow, rising into a pale, hazy sky. In the upper left, there is a vertical line of black calligraphy reading "雲山" (Cloud Mountain) and "雪舟" (Sesshu), followed by a red square seal. Below these, a prominent, slender peak with a lighter, almost glowing, green-yellow hue stands out against the lighter background. Mid-ground, a significant waterfall cascades down a steep, dark cliff face on the right, disappearing into a thick layer of mist that fills the valleys and lower slopes. On the left, nestled into a mountain ledge, a small, multi-roofed building with a light-colored facade is visible, surrounded by dark, textured foliage. Another smaller structure can be seen further right, higher up on a different mountain. The mountainsides are textured with varied brushstrokes, depicting rock formations and scattered trees. The lower section of the painting is largely obscured by dense, swirling mist, from which the dark silhouettes of trees and lower mountain forms emerge. Another, less distinct waterfall is visible further down on the right. The overall palette is dominated by shades of black, grey, and white, with the warm beige tone of the paper providing the base. The painting is framed by a decorative scroll mounting featuring patterns in gold and brown tones.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome ink painting depicts a small bird perched on a leafy branch with calligraphic text above
long_description: A vertical monochrome ink painting depicts a sparse natural scene against a light gray background. In the upper left quadrant, a column of dark, vertical calligraphic text is present. The text consists of several lines of characters, with the first four lines appearing to have four characters each, followed by a few smaller characters below. Below and slightly to the right of the text, a slender, gnarled branch extends diagonally upwards and to the right. A small, dark bird with lighter underparts is perched on a thinner offshoot of this branch, facing left and slightly downwards, with its tail pointing upwards. Its beak is pointed slightly down. Further down and to the right, the main branch thickens and is densely covered with numerous dark, oval-shaped leaves, forming a cluster. Several smaller, bare twigs protrude from this leafy section. At the bottom right, the base of the branch appears to emerge from a small, textured mound, possibly rocky or grassy, rendered with dark, expressive brushstrokes. The ground line slopes gently upwards from left to right. The artwork utilizes varying ink washes and brushwork, creating a sense of depth and texture within the limited palette of grays, ranging from almost white to deep black.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink painting depicts towering mountains covered in trees, a river, small houses, and calligraphy
long_description: The vertical artwork is an ink painting on a light beige paper, framed by a wider brown border. The upper third of the painting is dominated by black calligraphy in an East Asian script, arranged in several vertical columns, starting from the upper right. The characters are rendered with varying brushstrokes. Two red square seals are visible within the calligraphy on the right side, and another smaller red seal is near the bottom left of the text block. Below the calligraphy, a vast landscape unfolds. Towering, craggy mountains, rendered with varied ink washes and brushstrokes, fill the right and central portions of the middle ground. These mountains are densely covered with numerous small, dark trees, depicted with fine brushwork, creating a textured, forested appearance. Several small, simple structures, possibly houses, are nestled among the trees at the base of the mountains on the right, near the water's edge. To the left, a large waterfall cascades down a steep, lighter-toned cliff face, flowing into a body of water that occupies the lower section of the painting. This body of water extends across the foreground. A small, narrow boat with several indistinct figures is visible on the water in the lower right. Further to the left, smaller, more distant mountains rise faintly in the background, partially obscured by mist or lighter ink washes. The overall impression is a deep, layered landscape with a strong vertical emphasis.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A folding fan displays an ink painting of lotus plants and grass, with vertical calligraphic text and a red seal.
long_description: An open folding fan, fanned out in a wide arc, is presented against a plain gray background. The fan's paper surface is a light, off-white or cream color, segmented by the underlying light brown wooden ribs. The outer edge of the fan is reinforced with a dark, possibly black, border. The bottom of the fan features a series of light brown wooden ribs, visible from the central pivot point, fanning outwards to support the paper. The main subject of the fan is an ink painting, primarily in shades of gray and black, depicting a cluster of plants. On the left side of the painting, a dense patch of thin, upright grass-like stalks is rendered with fine, dark brushstrokes. To the right of the grass, several large, broad leaves, characteristic of lotus or water lilies, are painted in varying shades of gray, some appearing darker and more solid, others lighter and more translucent. Among these leaves, a cluster of smaller, darker forms suggests flowers or buds, with delicate dark lines indicating petals or stamens. In the upper left quadrant of the painted area, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text. Below and slightly to the left of this text, a small, circular red seal impression is visible. The painting occupies the central and left portions of the fan's paper surface, leaving the right side mostly blank, showing only the cream-colored paper and the underlying wooden ribs. The fan's overall shape is a wide, flattened semi-circle.

metadata.title: 高橋草坪筆　牡丹図|Peony
metadata.medium: Folding fan; ink on paper

alt_text: Two peacocks, one with a fanned tail, stand among large pink, white, and purple peonies on a light background
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts two peacocks amidst a vibrant array of flowering plants and rocky terrain, set against a plain, light beige background. The artwork is bordered by a gold-colored fabric with a dark, irregular pattern. In the upper left and central portion, a large peacock stands prominently on a textured, moss-covered rock. Its body is a deep olive green with subtle blue and green iridescent feathers on its head and neck. The peacock faces right, its head slightly tilted upwards. Its magnificent tail, fanned out to the left and extending downwards, is adorned with numerous circular "eyes" in shades of blue, green, and gold. Below and to the right, a second, smaller peacock is partially concealed by dense foliage and rocks. This peacock faces left, its head lowered, and its tail is not fanned. Its plumage mirrors the dark olive green and subtle iridescence of the larger bird. The peacocks are surrounded by lush flowering plants, primarily large, full peonies. A prominent light pink peony blooms above the upper peacock, while another large pink peony and a white peony are visible to its right. A purple peony is situated below the upper peacock, near the lower bird. Smaller clusters of red and pink flowers are interspersed among the green leaves and branches. The rocky formations are rendered in shades of green and brown, suggesting a natural, overgrown environment. In the upper right corner, a vertical inscription of dark characters is present, accompanied by a small red seal.

metadata.title: 牡丹に孔雀図|Peacocks and Peonies
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Calligraphic text above a person leading a horse laden with large fish on a vertical scroll.
long_description: A vertical scroll features black calligraphic text in the upper two-thirds and a watercolor painting in the lower third, all on a light beige background. The top section displays two primary vertical columns of large, flowing black characters, with smaller, more delicate characters interspersed. The brushstrokes vary in thickness and intensity, creating a dynamic visual rhythm. Below the text, a painting depicts a person leading a horse. The person, positioned on the left, faces right and wears a light-colored robe and a hat, holding a thin, dark staff that extends downwards. The horse, a light brown or tan color with darker mane and tail, walks towards the right. It carries a substantial load on its back, consisting of several large, greyish fish, secured with dark lines. The fish are depicted with visible scales and fins. A small, square red seal is visible in the bottom right corner of the painted section. The overall color palette is muted, with the black ink of the calligraphy and outlines contrasting with the soft washes of brown, grey, and light blue in the painting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical painting of a misty mountainous landscape with multi-tiered buildings, a boat on water, and bridges
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a vast, misty mountainous landscape in a traditional style. The upper half is dominated by towering mountains, some with rounded, green-covered peaks, others appearing as sharp, jagged rock formations. Thick, pale mist fills the valleys and surrounds the mountain bases, creating a sense of atmospheric depth. In the mid-left, a multi-tiered building with dark roofs and red accents is perched on a cliff, partially obscured by mist and dense green trees. On the mid-right, a larger, more elaborate multi-tiered building with dark roofs and intricate details sits on a prominent, wide cliff face. This building features multiple levels with open balconies and is surrounded by trees. A wide body of water, rendered in muted blue-green, flows horizontally across the middle ground, where a boat carrying several small figures is visible. The lower section of the painting features more green and brown mountains, dense foliage, and two arched bridges. Small figures are depicted walking on the bridges and along winding paths. The color palette primarily consists of various shades of green and brown for the landscape, with pale ochre for the mist and sky, and dark reds and blacks for architectural details. In the upper left corner, there is vertical script in black ink, accompanied by a red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts flowering branches with white and pink blossoms and green leaves, with calligraphy above.
long_description: A tall, narrow vertical scroll painting features flowering branches against a light tan background. The painting is framed by a dark gray border with a subtle patterned design of faint, darker gray motifs. At the top, a decorative band of light beige with a white floral pattern separates the main painting from the top edge. The central image depicts a network of gnarled, brown branches extending from the bottom right upwards and across the canvas. These branches are adorned with numerous clusters of blossoms. Some blossoms are a soft white, while others are a delicate pink. Small, light green leaves are interspersed among the flowers and along the branches. In the upper left quadrant, several columns of black calligraphic text are present. Below the calligraphy, a small red seal is visible. Another small red seal is located near the lower right edge of the painted area, amidst the branches. The branches are thicker at the bottom and become thinner as they ascend, creating a sense of upward movement. The overall impression is one of delicate natural beauty.

metadata.title: 椿椿山筆 紅白桃花図（付・画稿）|Red and White Peach Blossoms
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts intertwining branches with pink and white blossoms and green leaves on a light ground
long_description: A vertical scroll painting on a light cream-colored ground depicts a dense arrangement of flowering branches. The gnarled, dark brown branches originate from the lower right, extending upwards and across the central portion of the composition, creating an intricate network. Clusters of blossoms in varying shades of pink and white are distributed along the branches. The pink blossoms are more concentrated on the right side and lower left, appearing in fuller, denser groups. White blossoms are prominent in the central and upper-left areas, often appearing in smaller, more delicate clusters. Small, elongated green leaves are interspersed among the flowers and along the branches, providing contrast. In the upper section of the scroll, a column of vertical black calligraphic text is present on the left side, while a smaller section of black text with a red square seal impression is visible in the upper right corner.

metadata.title: 椿椿山筆 紅白桃花図（付・画稿）|Red and White Peach Blossoms, Preparatory Sketch
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a gnarled tree with light green leaves, pink flowers, and two small birds
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a gnarled tree with light green leaves and pink flowers on a pale yellow ground. A prominent, gnarled tree trunk, rendered in shades of dark brown and grey, rises from the lower left, curving slightly to the right before ascending towards the top center. Its branches extend outwards, primarily to the left and right, with numerous slender, light green leaves hanging delicately, suggesting a weeping willow or similar species. Near the top left, two small, light brown and grey birds are perched on a branch, nestled among the leaves. Several large, light pink flowers, resembling peonies, bloom on branches extending from the lower and middle sections of the main trunk, mostly on the left side. These flowers have multiple layers of petals and are accompanied by dark green leaves. In the upper right quadrant, vertical black calligraphic text is present, followed by two square red seals stacked vertically. The central painted area is framed by a light grey border on both the left and right sides, featuring a subtle, repeating pattern of stylized floral or cloud motifs.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a flowering branch with two small birds and subtle clouds on a light background, framed by decorative borders.
long_description:
The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a flowering branch with two small birds against a light, almost monochromatic background. The main subject, a branch, extends diagonally from the upper right towards the lower left, then curves back up slightly. It is adorned with clusters of light blue-purple and white flowers, resembling wisteria, and numerous green leaves. The flowers are delicate and appear to hang in cascades.

Two small, light-colored birds are perched on the branch. One bird is positioned higher up, facing towards the left, with its body slightly angled. The second bird is lower on the branch, facing towards the right. Both birds have subtle details in their feathers.

The background is a pale, creamy color, with faint, wavy forms that suggest clouds or mist, particularly in the upper and middle sections. These forms are rendered with soft, diffused edges.

In the lower left quadrant, there is a column of black calligraphic text, followed by a red square seal. Another smaller red square seal is visible in the upper right corner.

The central painted area is bordered by decorative fabric. The side borders are wide and feature a repeating pattern of stylized, interlocking cloud or scroll motifs in gold against a brown background. The top and bottom borders are narrower, gold, and have a subtle, textured pattern.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large bird with spread wings perches on a gnarled branch with red berries, while a smaller bird flies above.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical painting, likely a scroll, with a pale, muted background that transitions from a slightly darker tone at the bottom to a lighter, almost white tone at the top. The overall color palette is subtle, dominated by shades of grey, white, and pale beige. In the upper left quadrant, a small bird is depicted in mid-flight, its wings extended. This bird has a striped or mottled pattern of dark grey and light grey on its back and wings, with a lighter underside. Its beak is open, and its tail feathers are long and split. It flies horizontally, facing towards the right. Below and slightly to the right of the center, a larger bird is perched on a thick, gnarled branch. This bird is rendered with intricate detail, showing individual feathers in shades of white and various greys, creating a textured appearance. Its wings are partially spread and raised, suggesting movement, perhaps just landing or preparing to take flight. Its head is turned slightly to the left, and its body faces mostly right. The branch it rests on is dark brown and extends from the lower left, curving upwards and to the right. Small clusters of red berries and sparse green leaves are visible on this branch, particularly to the left of the bird. To the right of the perched bird, several tall, slender stalks of a plant, possibly bamboo or reeds, rise vertically. These stalks have long, narrow leaves that are depicted in light grey and white, almost blending into the pale background. The composition creates a sense of depth and movement, with the two birds positioned at different heights and in different states of action. In the lower left corner, a small, square red seal with two dark characters is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
