alt_text: Monochromatic ink painting on a fan depicting a mountainous landscape with trees, buildings, and distant water.
long_description: This is a monochromatic ink painting on a fan-shaped piece of light brown paper. The artwork depicts a vast mountainous landscape with various natural elements and human structures. On the left, a cluster of craggy mountains rises, covered with numerous trees, some appearing as tall pines with distinct trunks, others as dense foliage. A small, simple building with a peaked roof is nestled among these mountains. A small red square seal is visible at the bottom left edge. Moving towards the center, the landscape continues with more rugged rock formations and a variety of trees, including some with bare branches and others with full canopies. Another, slightly larger building with a prominent roof is situated in the middle ground, surrounded by vegetation. The background features softer, more distant mountains, rendered with lighter ink washes, suggesting a receding vista. The right side of the painting opens up to a wide body of water, possibly a lake or river, stretching towards the horizon where faint mountain ranges are visible. In the lower right corner, several sparse trees or bushes are depicted. Below these, there are three red square seals and black calligraphic text, written vertically. The entire composition is rendered with varying shades of black ink, creating depth and texture against the light brown paper, which shows faint vertical creases.

metadata.title: 明     鄒之麟     山水圖     扇面|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on gold paper

alt_text: A small dark bird perches on a branch with pink peonies and blue-green leaves on a vertical scroll.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a small bird and floral elements on a light cream background, framed by dark purple borders with a subtle gold pattern. In the upper half, a small, dark-colored bird with a long tail is perched on a thin, light brown branch. The bird faces left, its head slightly lowered towards the branch, which has several small, reddish buds. Below the bird and branch, in the mid-section of the painting, is a large, multi-petaled peony flower in shades of light pink. Surrounding the peony are several large, blue-green leaves, some with visible veins, extending downwards and to the left. In the upper left quadrant, vertical black text reads "甲寅和秋寫". Below this text are two stacked red square seals, the upper one reading "竹坡". A single red square seal is also visible in the lower right quadrant.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicting yellow and pink flowers, a gray rock, and an insect
long_description: The image displays a vertical scroll painting, featuring a central cream-colored panel bordered on both sides by a dark purple fabric with a subtle gold pattern. The top and bottom edges of the central panel also have a narrow band of gold patterned fabric. The painting itself depicts a natural scene with various flora and a single insect. In the upper right quadrant, black calligraphic text is vertically arranged, reading "生生居" followed by "令". Below this text, a small red square seal is present. Near the top center, a cluster of light yellow flowers with multiple petals emerges from a central stem, surrounded by several large, palmate leaves in a muted blue-green hue. To the left of the yellow flowers, a substantial, irregularly shaped rock formation in shades of gray and dark blue-gray dominates the mid-left side of the panel. Its surface shows texture with darker lines. Below the yellow flowers and to the right of the rock, a small, light brown insect with delicate wings is perched on a slender green stem. Further down, towards the bottom of the painting, a dense cluster of light pink flowers with numerous small petals and green centers is depicted. These flowers are accompanied by several broad, rounded leaves in the same muted blue-green as the upper leaves, along with thin green stems. A small red square seal is visible in the lower left corner of the painted area. The overall impression is one of delicate botanical illustration.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Chinese calligraphy on left, misty mountain landscape with village, trees, and boat on right.
long_description: This artwork is presented as a diptych, featuring two vertical panels. The left panel is dominated by vertical lines of black Chinese characters, filling most of the space. Three red seals are visible on this panel: a large rectangular one at the top right, a smaller square one near the bottom right of the text block, and a larger rectangular one at the bottom left corner. The right panel displays a serene landscape painting. In the upper half, a prominent, light green mountain with undulating, layered ridges rises, flanked by smaller, hazy mountains in the background to the left. Below the main mountain, a cluster of buildings with red roofs is nestled among trees, suggesting a village. The mid-ground features a misty, light green and brown landscape. In the foreground, to the right, a large, gnarled tree with white blossoms or leaves stands. To its left, a bare, twisted tree is visible. In the lower center, a small boat with two figures glides on a body of water. The ground is a mix of light brown and green, with some small, blue-green rock formations. Two red seals are in the lower left corner of the painting, and one large rectangular red seal is in the upper right corner.

metadata.title: 明/清 惲向 仿古山水圖 冊 紙本|Landscapes after old masters
metadata.medium: Album of ten leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A tall landscape painting shows a towering mountain, dense trees, a wide body of water, and a small boat with a figure
long_description: This vertical landscape painting features a towering mountain on the left, dominating the composition. The mountain is rendered in shades of brown and ochre, with textured rock faces and numerous dark green trees and foliage clinging to its slopes. A thin waterfall cascades down the left side of the mountain. At the base of the mountain, on the left, is a dense forest of various trees and undergrowth, also in dark green and brown tones, with visible rocks and ground cover. To the right of the mountain and forest is a wide expanse of water, depicted in lighter brown and ochre hues, suggesting a misty or hazy atmosphere. A small, flat-bottomed boat with a single figure is visible on the water, positioned towards the lower right. The figure, dressed in light clothing, appears to be seated or standing in the boat. On the far right, a small island or landmass with sparse, bare trees extends into the water. In the distance, across the water, faint outlines of two pointed mountains rise against the lighter background. The upper right corner contains vertical lines of dark script and several red seal impressions. The overall color palette is muted, primarily consisting of browns, ochres, and dark greens.

metadata.title: 明  藍瑛  春江漁隱圖  軸|Hermit-Fisherman on a Spring River
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink painting on a fan depicts a mountainous landscape with dense trees and traditional buildings.
long_description: This ink painting on a fan-shaped surface depicts a mountainous landscape in a monochromatic palette of black ink on light brown paper. The composition is dominated by rugged mountains and dense vegetation. On the left, a mountain range rises, with a valley or body of water at its base, sparsely dotted with trees. Moving towards the center, the landscape becomes heavily forested with numerous tall, slender trees, possibly pines, rendered with dark, vertical strokes. These trees extend up the slopes of the central mountains. On the right side, a cluster of traditional-style buildings with multi-tiered roofs is nestled into the hillside, surrounded by more trees. The buildings appear to be a complex of structures, possibly a village or temple, integrated into the natural environment. The mountains continue to the far right, forming a backdrop. In the upper left quadrant, black calligraphic text is present, accompanied by a square red seal below it. The brushwork varies from fine lines to broader washes, creating depth and texture throughout the scene.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   倣藍瑛   倣黃公望山水   扇|Landscape in the Style of Huang Gongwang
metadata.date: 17th century or later, spurious date of 1633
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold paper

alt_text: A traditional ink and wash painting shows tall trees on a slope, a seated figure, and distant mountains.
long_description: This vertical ink and wash painting features a central cluster of tall, slender trees with dark trunks, some bearing blue-green pine needles and others light brown or orange deciduous leaves. The trees stand on a gentle, light green slope that rises from the bottom edge. To the right, nestled among the trees, a small figure sits in a boat-like structure or on a low platform, facing left. Behind the trees and to the right, a rolling hill with textured dark ink brushstrokes extends across the midground. In the far left distance, faint, light blue-grey mountains are visible. The upper portion of the painting is a light beige, representing the sky. A vertical column of dark calligraphy is present in the upper right corner, beneath which is a square red seal.

metadata.title: 明　藍瑛　仿宋元山水圖　冊|Landscapes after Song and Yuan masters
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a black and white bird perched on a flowering branch, looking downwards.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on a light-colored paper depicts a bird on a flowering branch. The artwork is framed by a light green border, with a darker green patterned border at the top. In the upper left quadrant, a bird with a dark head, back, and long tail, and lighter underparts, is perched on a thick, gnarled branch. The bird's head is tilted downwards, its beak pointing towards the lower part of the composition. The branch originates from the upper right and curves downwards, extending towards the lower left. Numerous small, delicate, light-colored flowers with visible petals and centers are scattered along the main branch and its thinner offshoots. One slender branch extends vertically from the lower center towards the bird. In the lower left, there are several lines of black calligraphic text and a red square seal. The background is a plain, light, unadorned surface.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting of a mountainous landscape with a waterfall, dense trees, and two figures on a bridge
long_description: This is a vertical ink wash painting, primarily in shades of black and gray on a light, off-white background, framed by a brown border. The composition depicts a towering mountainous landscape with a waterfall, dense forests, and human figures. In the upper half, a large, dark, textured mountain dominates the center, rendered with numerous short, horizontal brushstrokes that create a ribbed appearance. To its left, a lighter, more ethereal mountain peak emerges from a misty background. To the right of the central mountain, another peak is partially visible. In the upper right corner, vertical black text is present, accompanied by two red square seals. The text reads: "夏日山泉", "似為房山年華", "竹園". A prominent waterfall cascades down the central mountain, originating from a small pool near the top. It flows in a series of drops and a wider stream, disappearing into the dense tree line below. The mountain slopes are heavily forested, depicted with varying shades of ink to suggest depth and foliage. Several tall, dark trees with distinct trunks and branches are visible in the mid-ground and lower right. In the lower left quadrant, two small figures are crossing a simple wooden bridge over a body of water. The leading figure wears a long robe and holds a staff, followed by a smaller figure. The water beneath the bridge is light, reflecting the sky. On the right side of the bridge, the land rises, covered with more trees and what appear to be small, simple structures or huts nestled within the foliage. The foreground features rocky terrain and additional trees, rendered with a mix of dark and lighter ink washes, creating a sense of depth and natural ruggedness.

metadata.title: 中林竹洞筆    夏日山泉図|Mountain Stream on a Summer Day
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a misty mountainous landscape with multiple waterfalls, dense trees, and a small figure
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a monochromatic mountainous landscape. The upper third features a tall, steep mountain peak shrouded in mist, from which a waterfall cascades down. Below this, another, wider waterfall plunges into a misty valley. The mountainsides are densely covered with various trees, rendered in dark ink, creating a textured appearance. In the mid-ground, a prominent, gnarled tree with sprawling branches and dense foliage grows from a rocky outcrop on the left. Below this, a small, robed figure walks along a path that winds through the lower part of the landscape, near a stream and scattered rocks. More trees and rocky formations are visible throughout the composition, with lighter ink washes suggesting distant mist and atmospheric depth. On the upper left, vertical lines of calligraphy are present, reading "甲子冬日寫於松風草堂 伯年", followed by two red square seals. The painting is framed by a light brown border with a subtle floral pattern.

metadata.title: 観瀑山水図|Landscape with Waterfall
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Four white birds perch on a snow-covered branch in a vertical ink wash painting with decorative borders.
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a winter scene rendered primarily in shades of gray, white, and black, framed by decorative fabric borders. The central panel features four white birds, resembling egrets or cranes, perched on a thick, snow-covered tree branch. The branch extends diagonally from the lower left towards the upper right, with its dark, gnarled form visible beneath the white snow. Three of the birds are clustered together on the left side of the branch, facing left with their heads slightly lowered, appearing to be resting. The fourth bird stands slightly taller and to the right of this group, facing right with its head held high, looking into the distance. Their bodies are depicted with soft white brushstrokes, contrasting with their slender dark legs and beaks. Above the birds, a bare tree trunk extends upwards, from which several thin, snow-laden branches curve gracefully downwards. The background is a light gray wash with subtle horizontal brushstrokes, suggesting a misty or snowy atmosphere. In the lower right quadrant of the central panel, there are three vertical lines of black text, which read "冲 浩 堂", followed by two red square seals. The main painting is bordered on the left and right by wide strips of fabric featuring a repeating pattern of light brown floral motifs and cloud-like shapes on a light gray background. Narrower, subtly patterned borders are present at the top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Two white egrets stand by a pond with pink peonies and weeping willow branches on a light background
long_description: This vertical painting depicts a natural scene featuring two white egrets, pink peonies, and weeping willow branches beside a pond. The artwork is presented on a light, neutral-toned background, resembling aged paper or silk. In the upper left, a slender tree trunk rises, from which numerous thin, dark green weeping willow branches cascade downwards, extending across the top and upper right of the composition. In the upper right corner, a vertical inscription of dark characters is visible, accompanied by a red square seal. Below the willow branches, on the left side, several large, rounded leaves in shades of grey-green are interspersed with two prominent pink peonies in full bloom. To the right of these flowers, two white egrets are the central focus. The egret on the right stands tall, facing left, with its long, curved neck and a slender beak pointing slightly upwards. Its plumage is rendered with delicate white and light grey strokes, and its thin legs are dark. The second egret is positioned slightly in front and to the left of the first, appearing to be resting or crouching, with its head also facing left and its beak pointing downwards. Its body is partially obscured by the first egret and surrounding foliage, but its white feathers are clearly visible. The lower portion of the painting illustrates a pond surface with scattered dark green lily pads or similar aquatic plants. Various grasses and reeds in shades of green and grey grow along the pond's edges, particularly in the lower left and center, partially obscuring the egrets' lower bodies and legs. The overall color palette is muted, dominated by whites, greens, greys, and soft pinks against the light beige background. The painting is bordered by decorative patterns at the top and bottom, and plain brown on the sides.

metadata.title: 山本梅逸筆 柳鷺図|Egrets, Peonies, and Willows
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a misty mountain landscape with waterfalls, traditional buildings, and trees.
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a vast, misty mountain landscape rendered primarily in ink wash with subtle color accents. The composition is tall and narrow, with elements arranged vertically from top to bottom. In the upper left, a vertical column of dark characters is visible, accompanied by two square red seals below them. The top portion of the painting features towering, jagged mountain peaks that rise from a hazy, light background, their forms softened by mist. Sparse, dark green trees, possibly pines, dot the rocky ledges and summits. As the eye moves downwards, the mountains become more defined, revealing steep cliffs and flat-topped plateaus. Several waterfalls cascade down the mountainsides, appearing as thin white streaks against the darker rock. Midway down the scroll, a complex of buildings with dark roofs and light walls is nestled into the landscape, connected by winding paths or bridges that curve around the mountain contours. More clusters of pine trees are visible on prominent rocky outcrops. The lower section of the painting continues the misty atmosphere, with the base of the mountains obscured by a soft, white haze. In the lower left, a small, open-sided pavilion with a thatched roof stands near a body of water. Surrounding this structure are trees with delicate white or light pink blossoms, suggesting flowering trees. The very bottom of the scroll shows gentler, rounded hills leading to the water's edge. The overall color palette is dominated by muted greens, browns, and grays, set against a light beige paper, with white used for mist and water, and small touches of red for the seals and pink for the blossoms.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a towering mountainous landscape with waterfalls, dense trees, and scattered traditional buildings
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a dramatic, layered mountainous landscape in shades of black and gray on a light-colored ground. In the upper left quadrant, several columns of dark calligraphic text are visible, accompanied by two small red seal impressions. The upper right features a towering, craggy mountain peak densely covered with trees, some appearing bare and others with full foliage. A small, multi-tiered pavilion is nestled near the summit. A thin waterfall cascades down the right side of this peak. Moving downwards, the landscape unfolds with more intricate details. A prominent, wider waterfall descends a sheer cliff face on the left side, creating a misty effect at its base. The central and right portions of the painting show a terraced mountainside, intricately detailed with various types of trees, including spiky pines and deciduous trees with bare branches. A winding path or series of steps can be seen ascending the slopes. Several traditional-style buildings with tiled roofs are scattered throughout the mid-ground, integrated into the natural contours of the land. The lower section of the painting features a dense foreground of rocks and trees, with a body of water or river visible at the very bottom, where a few more small structures or bridges are situated. The varying ink tones create a sense of depth and atmosphere throughout the expansive scene.

metadata.title: 明/清  王鐸  山水圖  軸|Mountain Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of several bats in flight against a light background, with a decorative border
long_description: The artwork is an ink wash painting on a light, cream-colored paper, framed by a dark blue border with gold patterns. The central image depicts several bats in various states of flight, rendered with different shades of gray ink. In the upper left quadrant, a group of bats is shown with outstretched, fan-like wings, created with lighter washes and darker, linear strokes defining the wing structure. Below this group, towards the lower center, a more distinct bat is visible, with a darker body and two pointed wings extending outwards. Other lighter, more abstract forms suggestive of bats or clouds are scattered across the central area, particularly towards the upper right. The background is a uniform, unadorned light tone. In the lower right corner, vertical text is present, written in black ink, reading "明録己卯年春" followed by "應舉", and then two square red seals stacked vertically. The decorative border features a repeating pattern of gold butterflies and swirling vine-like motifs against the dark blue background. The top and bottom borders are wider than the side borders, which are a plain light gray-green.

metadata.title: 円山応挙筆 白鷺図|White Herons
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A white rooster perches on a net above two chicks, with calligraphy at the top of a vertical scroll.
long_description: A tall, vertical scroll features a white rooster and two chicks against a light, neutral background, framed by decorative borders. The top section contains black calligraphy arranged in three vertical columns, with several red seals. The rightmost column reads "法を澄清雅房題", the middle column reads "出二幅月注切軽", and the leftmost column reads "七七演舎翁". Below the leftmost column, smaller text reads "小川全佐". A prominent red seal with the character "奥" is visible to the left of the calligraphy, along with several smaller rectangular red seals. Below the calligraphy, a large, white rooster dominates the upper-middle section, facing towards the right with its head slightly turned back. It has a red comb and wattle, and a small black eye. The rooster is perched on a net that extends diagonally across the middle of the scroll, forming a diamond pattern with thin, dark lines. Below the rooster and within the lower part of the net, two small, white chicks are depicted. One chick faces upwards, while the other faces towards the right. The net terminates at the bottom with a horizontal, rope-like structure. The artwork is bordered by a dark green fabric with gold, swirling floral and cloud-like patterns at the top and bottom, and along the sides.

metadata.title: 白鶏図|Rooster, Hen, and Chicks
metadata.artist: Nagasawa Rosetsu 長澤蘆雪|Minagawa Kien　皆川淇園
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A long horizontal landscape painting depicting mountains, water, trees, and a small building on the right
long_description: This is a long, horizontal landscape painting rendered in muted tones of ink wash and light color on aged paper. The composition unfolds from left to right, depicting a vast natural scene. On the far left, a wide expanse of water dominates the lower half, with faint, undulating landforms visible in the distance, suggesting a shoreline or islands. The upper left features soft, hazy mountains receding into the background, rendered with light grey and subtle green washes. Moving towards the center, the landscape becomes more defined. A prominent, rounded mountain range rises, its peaks and slopes detailed with darker ink outlines and washes, suggesting rocky textures and foliage. Several tall, slender trees with dark green foliage stand on the lower slopes of these mountains, their trunks visible as thin, dark lines. Below these mountains, the water continues, with smaller, rocky islets or land projections emerging. The right side of the painting presents a more detailed and populated scene. A small, traditional building with a thatched roof and light-colored walls is nestled among dense trees and rocks. The building has a simple, rectangular structure with visible vertical supports and a doorway. Two small, indistinct figures appear near the building. To the right of the building, a large, gnarled tree with abundant dark green foliage dominates the foreground, its roots and trunk blending with a cluster of rocks. Further right, a small, square red seal is visible near the bottom edge. The overall impression is one of serene natural beauty with a subtle human presence.

metadata.title: 明  佚名 朱德潤  怡樂堂圖 卷|Hall of Harmony and Joy
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical painting of red flowers growing from dark, porous rocks with two light green butterflies
long_description: The artwork is a vertical painting on a light, off-white background. In the upper left quadrant, a vertical column of black calligraphic text is present, followed by two square red seals. The text reads: "丁卯夏八月吳門文伯寫". Below these, a tall, dark, irregularly shaped rock with multiple holes and crevices dominates the lower central portion of the composition. The rock is rendered in varying shades of dark grey and black ink, with lighter grey areas suggesting texture and depth. Emerging from behind and around this central rock are several stalks of flowers. These flowers feature five pointed, reddish-orange petals and light green stems. Clusters of these flowers are visible on both the left and right sides of the large rock, extending upwards. To the right of the main rock, a smaller, dark rock formation is partially visible, accompanied by light green foliage. In the upper right area of the painting, two small, light green butterflies are depicted in flight, one positioned slightly higher than the other. The ground beneath the rocks and flowers is rendered with a light, almost translucent wash, with sparse, dark green brushstrokes indicating grass in the lower left corner. Three square red seals are placed in the lower left and lower right corners of the painting.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　仿趙文俶　萱石圖　軸|Rock, Tiger Lily and Orchid
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink painting depicts a gnarled tree branch with delicate blossoms extending downwards against a light background.
long_description: The vertical artwork features an ink painting on a light, cream-colored ground, framed by a narrow, light brown border. A prominent, gnarled tree branch, rendered in varying shades of dark grey and black ink, originates from the upper right corner. This thick branch curves downwards and slightly to the left, its textured surface suggested by broad, expressive brushstrokes. From this main branch, numerous thinner, more delicate branches extend further downwards and outwards, depicted with lighter grey ink. These slender branches are adorned with clusters of small, light-colored blossoms, appearing as tiny dots along their lengths. In the upper right, behind the main branch, a faint, broad wash of light grey ink suggests a larger, indistinct form or background element. The majority of the background remains a clear, unadorned cream color. In the lower left corner, a small, square red seal is visible, accompanied by a few faint, dark ink characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting featuring large black calligraphy above a resting tabby cat on a light background.
long_description: The image displays a vertical scroll painting on a light, cream-colored paper background, framed by a gold border with a subtle patterned texture. The upper two-thirds of the scroll are dominated by large, bold black ink calligraphy, arranged vertically. To the left and right of the main characters, smaller, more delicate script is visible, also in black ink, forming columns of text. Below the calligraphy, in the lower third of the scroll, a domestic cat is depicted resting. The cat is shown in profile, facing left, with its body curled. It has light fur with distinct brown and grey tabby stripes on its back, tail, and head. Its tail is curled around its body. A small red seal is visible near the cat's head, and some additional small script is present to the left of the cat.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Misty mountain landscape with a thatched-roof dwelling surrounded by autumn trees and rocky outcrops
long_description: A horizontal landscape painting depicts a serene, misty mountain scene. In the background, faint, layered gray mountains recede into a pale, hazy sky, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere. The midground features a cluster of trees with foliage in shades of yellow, orange, and green. Nestled among these trees is a building with a prominent, light brown thatched roof. The building has a light-colored facade with dark openings, possibly windows or doorways, visible on its right side. To the right of the building, a small, dark-roofed well structure stands. The foreground is framed on both the left and right by rocky, dark gray outcrops and more trees with similar autumn-colored leaves. The ground throughout the scene is rendered in a pale, muted wash, contributing to the overall misty effect. On the far right side of the painting, vertical dark ink characters are visible, appearing to be '山' and '水' stacked vertically, with a smaller character resembling '九' below them. A square red seal is positioned beneath these characters. The dominant colors are muted grays, pale greens, soft yellows, and oranges against a light, almost white background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of squirrels climbing bamboo stalks and resting on a gourd-like object
long_description: This is a vertical ink painting on a light, aged paper scroll, framed by a dark border with gold patterns. The artwork depicts several squirrels amidst bamboo stalks and a gourd-like object. On the right side, two thick bamboo stalks rise vertically, with numerous slender bamboo shoots and leaves extending from them and in the foreground. Three squirrels are visible on the rightmost bamboo stalk: one near the top, another slightly below it, and a third further down, all clinging to the stalk. Their fur is rendered with soft, light gray and black ink washes, and they have small, dark eyes. In the lower left portion of the painting, a large, rounded, gourd-like object rests on the ground. A fourth squirrel, with a prominent bushy tail, is perched on top of this object, facing towards the right. More slender bamboo shoots and leaves are depicted around the base of the gourd. The bamboo stalks are painted with varying shades of black ink, showing distinct segments and nodes, while the leaves are sharp, dark brushstrokes. The background is a plain, light yellowish-beige. In the upper left corner, vertical Japanese characters are written in black ink, followed by a red square seal. The text reads: 文化六年中七月 鈍生周田寫 玉川. The scroll's border is dark, possibly black, adorned with intricate gold leaf and vine patterns, with additional gold patterned strips at the very top and bottom edges.

metadata.title: 竹に栗鼠図|Squirrels on Bamboo and Rock
metadata.artist: Mochizuki Gyokusen 望月玉川|Yongtian 用田
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A long, curving branch with white flowers and dark leaves extends over water with small fish.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting in black and white tones depicts a long, curving branch of a flowering plant extending over a body of water. The branch originates from the upper right corner, gracefully curves downwards towards the left, then sweeps back to the right, terminating near the bottom of the composition. Along the branch are several large, round, light-toned flowers, appearing to be fully bloomed, interspersed with numerous small, dark, distinct leaves. The leaves are rendered with solid dark ink, contrasting with the lighter flowers. At the very bottom of the painting, a horizontal band represents water, within which several small, light-toned fish are visible, swimming horizontally. Near the bottom right, above the water, are small, dark, square-like markings, possibly a signature or seal. The central painted area has a light, uniform background, framed by a dark border with a repeating circular pattern.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a mountainous landscape with dense trees, a pavilion housing figures, and a wide body of water
long_description: This fan-shaped painting presents a detailed landscape scene on a light brown ground. The composition is divided, with a dense, mountainous, and forested area on the left transitioning to an open body of water on the right. On the far left, large, dark green trees, possibly pines, with visible gnarled trunks and dense foliage, extend from the bottom edge upwards and towards the center. Beneath these trees and interspersed among them are light brown and grey rocky formations. In the central area, a pavilion with a dark, peaked roof is situated on a raised, light brown platform. Inside the pavilion, several figures are visible. Two main figures, dressed in robes with reddish accents, are seated at a table, facing each other. Other smaller figures are present around the pavilion. To the left of the pavilion, a lone figure is seated on a rock, partially obscured by the large trees. Smaller green bushes and rocky outcrops surround the pavilion. The right side of the painting features a wide expanse of light blue water, possibly a lake or river, with subtle wave patterns indicated by thin lines. Along the far bank, distant, low-lying mountains or hills with light green and brown tones are visible. Closer to the foreground on the right, several small, rocky islands or landmasses emerge from the water. In the upper right quadrant, dark calligraphic text is present. In the lower right quadrant, several square red seals are stamped. The overall color palette is dominated by muted greens, browns, and light blues.

metadata.title: 明   陳洪綬   山水圖   扇|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold paper

alt_text: Two hanging scrolls display paintings of monkeys on beige and brown fabric, against a light grey wall.
long_description:
Two vertical hanging scrolls are displayed side-by-side against a light grey wall. Each scroll is composed of several sections of fabric. The top and bottom sections of both scrolls are a light beige fabric with a subtle, repeating floral pattern. The middle section of each scroll is a darker brown fabric with a more prominent gold floral pattern, framing a central rectangular panel of plain, light tan paper where the artwork is painted. White cylindrical rollers are visible at the very bottom of each scroll.

The left scroll's central panel features two monkeys. A larger, adult-like monkey is positioned on the left, facing right, with its body slightly hunched. A smaller, juvenile monkey is to its right, slightly behind, also facing right. Both monkeys have brown fur and pinkish faces. Small red text or a seal is visible in the upper right corner of this painting panel.

The right scroll's central panel features a single larger monkey in the upper portion, facing right, with brown fur and a pinkish face, depicted in a dynamic, possibly jumping or running pose. Below this monkey, towards the bottom of the panel, is a stylized black and white object with red and gold accents, resembling a curled-up animal or mythical creature with a prominent, curled tail. Small red text or a seal is also visible in the upper right corner of this painting panel.

Both scrolls are suspended from thin wires attached to silver hooks at their top edges.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Diptych of hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting on a hanging scroll depicts a tiger with green eyes looking forward and slightly down
long_description: A vertical hanging scroll features a painting of a tiger on a light, neutral-toned background. The tiger occupies the lower half of the painted area, positioned slightly to the right of the center. Its body is angled, with its head turned to face forward and slightly downward, its gaze directed towards the viewer. The tiger's fur is rendered in shades of orange and brown with distinct black stripes, and its underside and muzzle are lighter, almost white. Its eyes are a striking green. Its large paws are visible in the foreground. In the lower right corner of the painted section, there are black calligraphic characters and a small red square seal. The painted area is framed by a wider border of the same light, neutral-toned paper, with a horizontal band of gold-flecked paper above the tiger. The scroll is mounted with light-colored wooden rods at the top and bottom, and a dark hanger is visible at the very top.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical painting depicts a tiger with striking green eyes, its head and front paws visible against a plain background
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a tiger positioned centrally, facing slightly left and downwards. The tiger's head, shoulders, and one front paw are prominently displayed, filling much of the frame. Its fur is a light tan or beige color, marked with distinct dark brown to black stripes and spots. The tiger's eyes are a vivid green, contrasting with its dark pupils and the surrounding fur. Its nose is dark, and long, thin whiskers extend from its muzzle. The visible front paw, positioned in the lower right, shows dark claws. The background is a plain, unadorned light beige or tan color, providing a neutral setting for the animal. In the upper left corner, there is a column of vertical dark text, below which a small, square red seal is visible. The very top edge of the scroll features a decorative border with gold patterns on a dark background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a mountainous landscape with a hut, a large tree, and small figures on a path
long_description: The image displays a vertical ink wash painting on a light beige scroll, framed by a blue fabric border. The artwork depicts a serene, misty mountainous landscape rendered primarily in black and gray ink washes. In the upper right quadrant, a prominent, gnarled tree with a dense canopy of dark foliage grows from the side of a steep, dark mountain. The mountain's peak extends upwards and fades into lighter washes, suggesting distance or mist. Below the tree, a thin, light streak indicates a waterfall cascading down the rugged mountain face. Further down and to the left of the waterfall, a small, rustic hut with a thatched roof is nestled into the mountainside. The hut's walls are light, with dark lines defining its structure and openings. A winding path or slope leads up to the hut. Two small, dark figures are visible on this path, one appearing to carry a load on their back. The lower portion of the painting features lighter, softer ink washes, creating an impression of mist or clouds obscuring the lower parts of the mountains and the valley below. On the right side, slightly below the center, there is a vertical inscription of black calligraphy, followed by two distinct red square seals. The overall composition emphasizes height and a sense of quiet isolation.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A long, curving bridge spans a wide expanse, with a small figure below and a faint moon above.
long_description: A vertically oriented, black and white artwork depicts a minimalist landscape. The upper two-thirds of the image show a light gray, largely empty expanse, possibly sky or mist. Several faint, circular smudges are visible, along with a more distinct, dark crescent shape in the upper-middle section. The lower third of the image features a long, curving bridge that originates from the left edge and extends towards the right, gradually fading into the distance. The bridge is constructed with a dark, solid railing and numerous vertical support posts connected by horizontal beams, creating a rhythmic pattern. Below the bridge, a flat, textured expanse of lighter gray suggests water or ground. In the lower-left quadrant, a small, dark, vertical figure stands on this flat surface. To the right of the figure, several faint, dark, vertical marks are visible, resembling characters or text. The overall composition is dominated by the sweeping curve of the bridge against the vast, muted background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A robed figure sits facing left, with black calligraphy and red seals on a light-colored scroll.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal composition on a light, cream-colored background, framed by a narrow, golden-brown border with a repeating pattern of small, light-colored cloud-like shapes. On the right side, a single figure is depicted in profile, seated on the ground and facing towards the left. The figure is rendered with broad, fluid black ink brushstrokes, forming a voluminous robe that covers the body. The head appears bald or shaven, with a small, dark tuft of hair visible at the back. The figure's right arm is slightly raised, and the hands are positioned as if holding a small, dark, elongated object, possibly a brush or a small scroll. The figure's posture suggests a moment of focus or writing. To the left of the figure, several vertical columns of black calligraphy are arranged. The characters are varied in size and style, executed with expressive brushwork. Below the main body of calligraphy, towards the bottom left, are two distinct red square seals, stacked vertically. A smaller, rectangular red seal is positioned above and slightly to the right of the top square seal. The overall impression is a balanced composition of figure and text.

metadata.title: 羅漢図|An Arhat Reading a Sutra by Moonlight
metadata.artist: Jifei Ruyi (Japanese: Sokuhi Noitsu) 即非如一
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink painting depicts a thick bamboo stalk and leaves covered in snow against a light background
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink painting on a light, warm beige-colored ground, framed by decorative borders. The central subject is a large bamboo stalk, rendered in various shades of grey and black ink, extending diagonally from the lower left towards the upper right. The stalk is thick and segmented, with darker ink used for the nodes. Numerous bamboo leaves, also painted in shades of grey and black, branch out from the main stalk and smaller branches, creating dense clusters. Many of the leaves and parts of the main stalk are highlighted with white specks and streaks, suggesting a covering of snow or frost. Faint, irregular white shapes are scattered across the beige background, implying falling snow. In the lower left quadrant, there is a column of vertical black text, followed by two square-shaped red seals stacked vertically. The painting is bordered by an inner strip of light gold with a subtle pattern, and an outer wider strip of dark brown with a repeating, intricate pattern.

metadata.title: 大鵬正鯤筆　伯珣照浩賛　雪竹図|Bamboo in Snow
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of a long-tailed bird on a rock, with two smaller birds perched in a leafy tree above
long_description: The image is a vertical ink painting on light paper, framed by a brown border. The artwork depicts a natural scene with birds and a tree, rendered in shades of black and gray ink. In the lower left, a large, light-colored bird with a long, fanned tail stands on a dark, textured rock formation. The bird's body is detailed with fine, parallel lines, and its head is slightly darker, featuring a small, pointed beak. It faces towards the right. A prominent tree trunk, textured with vertical lines, rises along the left edge of the composition. Its branches extend across the upper portion of the painting, adorned with numerous dark, rounded leaves. Perched on a branch in the upper right quadrant are two smaller birds. One bird faces left, while the other, positioned slightly behind it, faces right. Both are rendered with dark outlines and lighter bodies. The background is a pale wash, with subtle, lighter gray areas suggesting atmospheric depth or distant landscape elements. In the middle right, a vertical inscription in dark ink is visible, consisting of several characters. The painting is bordered at the very top and bottom by decorative bands featuring stylized green foliage and small reddish-brown elements on a light background.

metadata.title: 西園方済筆　梧桐下錦鶏図|Pheasant beneath Paulownia Tree
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of a bird perched on a flowering plum branch with calligraphy and red seals
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on a light-colored ground depicts a bird perched on a flowering branch. The artwork is framed by a reddish-pink border with a subtle woven pattern. In the upper left, vertical lines of black calligraphy are visible, with a small red seal stamp below them. Another red seal stamp is located near the bottom right of the central image. The main subject, a bird, is positioned in the upper-middle section, facing towards the right with its head slightly turned. Its plumage is rendered in dark ink, with lighter tones on its belly and underparts. It is perched on a slender, upward-reaching branch. Below the bird, a thick, gnarled tree trunk, rendered with broad, dark ink strokes, anchors the composition in the lower-middle. From this trunk, several thinner branches extend upwards and outwards, some with small, sharp thorns. These branches are adorned with numerous delicate, five-petaled blossoms, depicted in light ink outlines with minimal shading, suggesting a white or pale color. The branches extend diagonally from the lower right towards the upper left, creating a dynamic visual line. The background is a plain, unadorned light tone.

metadata.title: 西園方済筆　梅に叭叭鳥図|Mynah Bird on Plum Branch
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a towering mountain landscape with a river, trees, and small structures
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting, primarily in black ink on light, aged paper, depicts a mountainous landscape. A towering, rugged mountain range dominates the left side, extending from the top edge down to the middle. Its peaks are rendered with dark, textured brushstrokes, suggesting craggy surfaces and deep crevices. To the right of the main mountain, a valley opens up, revealing a body of water that flows from the upper middle towards the bottom. The water surface is mostly blank, indicating calm. Along the banks of the water, smaller hills and landmasses are covered with various trees. Some trees have dense foliage, while others appear bare or sparsely branched, particularly in the upper right and middle sections. In the mid-ground, on the left bank of the water, two small figures are visible, possibly seated or resting on a rocky outcrop. Further down, a small, arched bridge spans a narrow section of the water, connecting two landmasses. Below the bridge, on the lower left, several small, simple structures with peaked roofs are nestled near the water's edge, resembling houses or boats. The upper right portion of the painting contains vertical lines of text in black ink, accompanied by two square red seals. The text reads: 大清乾隆二十二年九月 寫於京師 石濤筆意. The overall impression is a serene, expansive natural landscape.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll features an ink wash landscape painting of mountains, water, trees, and small buildings.
long_description: The image displays a vertical scroll, mounted on a dark blue-green fabric with a subtle, repeating pattern. The central artwork is a rectangular ink wash painting, primarily in black and white tones, depicting a mountainous landscape. At the top right of the painting, there is a block of vertical text written in black ink. The upper half of the painting is dominated by towering, craggy mountains with textured surfaces, suggesting rock formations. Scattered among the mountains are clusters of trees, rendered with fine lines and varying shades of ink. In the mid-ground, a body of water stretches across the width of the painting, reflecting the light. On the far bank of this water, nestled among trees, is a small, multi-tiered building with a distinct roofline. To the right of the water, a group of trees, some appearing bare with intricate branches, stands on a small rise. Below these trees, closer to the foreground, is a simple, single-story building with a gabled roof. The foreground consists of gently rolling hills and a winding path or road that leads towards the water. The entire scene is rendered with varying brushstrokes, creating depth and texture.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on satin

alt_text: A light-colored bird perches on snow-covered branches adorned with red and white flowers on a vertical scroll.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a bird and flowering branches covered in snow against a light tan background. In the upper right quadrant, a light-colored bird, predominantly white with a yellow head and neck, is perched on a snow-laden branch. Its head is tilted upwards and slightly to the left, with its beak slightly open. The branches, dark and gnarled, are heavily coated in white snow, creating thick, irregular patches. These branches extend diagonally across the composition, originating from the upper right and curving downwards, and also emerging from the lower right and reaching upwards. Scattered along the upper and middle sections of the snow-covered branches are numerous small white flowers, some with faint pink centers, resembling blossoms. Further down and more prominently displayed are larger, vibrant red flowers, possibly camellias or peonies, each with distinct green leaves. These red flowers also bear patches of white snow on their petals. The snow is depicted not only as thick coverings on the branches and flowers but also as small, sparkling white dots, particularly visible in the lower half of the painting, suggesting a glistening or falling effect. In the upper left portion of the scroll, there is a column of dark vertical text, followed by two square red seals. The central painted area is bordered on the left and right by a light gray, textured fabric, and at the very top and bottom by a decorative band of dark gold and brown with a repeating pattern.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochromatic ink painting depicting delicate plum blossoms on gnarled branches with calligraphic text and red seals.
long_description: A monochromatic ink painting on a light, textured paper depicts a composition of plum blossoms and branches. The background is a uniform light gray, providing a subtle contrast to the darker ink elements. Gnarled branches, rendered in varying shades of dark gray and black ink, extend across the canvas. A thick, prominent branch enters from the upper right, curving downwards and to the left, with thinner offshoots. Another cluster of branches emerges from the lower left, reaching upwards and towards the center. Delicate plum blossoms, depicted with five petals and dark centers, are scattered along these branches. The blossoms are rendered in a lighter ink wash or left unpainted, creating a white appearance against the paper. They appear in clusters, particularly on the left side and towards the bottom of the composition. In the upper left corner, vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present, followed by two square red seals stacked vertically below the text. The overall impression is one of sparse elegance, with the branches and blossoms occupying most of the visual space.

metadata.title: 明/清  項聖謨　山水花鳥圖　冊|Landscapes, Flowers and Birds
metadata.medium: Album of eight paintings; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts two colorful birds perched on a flowering branch against a light background.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a gnarled tree branch with white flowers and two birds against a light tan background. The scroll is framed by a teal border with a subtle patterned design. A large bird with a dark green and blue body, a long, flowing tail, and red legs is perched on an upper section of the branch, facing right and looking downwards. This bird has a prominent white crest on its head and a reddish face. Below it, on a lower, thicker part of the branch, a smaller bird with a light brown and pinkish body and a shorter tail is perched, facing left and looking upwards towards the larger bird. The branch itself is dark brown and appears gnarled and textured, extending diagonally from the upper left towards the lower right. White flowers with yellow centers and green leaves are scattered along the branch, with a cluster near the top left and another larger cluster in the lower right. On the left side of the painting, near the upper bird, there is a vertical column of black Japanese characters, with a red seal below it. Another red seal is visible in the lower right corner of the main painting area.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting features delicate white orchids with green leaves on a light background, framed by patterned borders.
long_description: The image presents a vertical scroll painting. The central rectangular panel is a light, warm beige color, serving as the background for the main subject. In the lower left quadrant, a cluster of white orchids with subtle pinkish-purple centers is depicted. The orchids grow from a group of long, slender, dark green leaves that extend upwards and diagonally across the lower half of the panel. Some leaves curve gently, while others are more upright. One particularly long leaf stretches diagonally from the lower left towards the upper right, almost reaching the top border of the central panel. Below the orchids and leaves, slightly to the right of the center, a vertical column of dark calligraphic characters is visible, followed by two stacked square red seals. The central beige panel is surrounded by decorative fabric borders. The top and bottom edges of the central panel are flanked by narrow bands of dark fabric adorned with a repeating gold foliage pattern. Beyond these narrow bands, and along the entire left and right sides of the central panel, are wider borders of a muted teal-green fabric. This wider border features a repeating pattern of stylized circular floral motifs in a slightly darker shade of teal-green.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A black ink painting of a flowering branch with calligraphic text and a red seal on a light brown fan
long_description: The artwork is a painting on a light brown, fan-shaped surface. The fan has visible vertical ribs, indicating its structure. A thick, gnarled branch, painted in varying shades of black ink, extends diagonally from the lower right towards the upper left. The branch is widest at the bottom right, showing textured bark with lighter gray washes, and gradually thins as it stretches across the fan. Numerous small, five-petaled flowers, rendered in black ink with some lighter gray centers, bloom along the main branch and its smaller offshoots. Some flowers are fully open, while others appear as buds. The flowers are distributed across the entire length of the visible branch. In the upper left quadrant, several vertical columns of black calligraphic text are visible. Below and slightly to the left of the text, a square red seal is stamped, partially overlapping the calligraphy. The background of the fan is a uniform light brown color.

metadata.title: 明/清   項聖謨   梅花   扇|Branch of Blossoming Plum
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on gold paper

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting depicting towering mountains shrouded in mist, with water, boats, and buildings below.
long_description: The image is a landscape painting executed in varying shades of black ink on a light, yellowish-brown ground, presented within a decorative border. A large, dark mountain range dominates the upper left and central portions of the composition, characterized by numerous peaks and textured surfaces created with dense, short brushstrokes. A horizontal band of lighter, misty areas extends across the middle of the painting, partially obscuring the base of the central mountains and creating a sense of atmospheric depth. To the far left, a tall, narrow peak rises from the mist, while in the background, several lighter, more subtly rendered mountain forms recede into the distance. Below the mist, in the lower left quadrant, a body of water features a small, open boat with a canopy, containing a single figure. On the near bank of this water, a few small, simple buildings are visible among sparse trees. On the right side of the painting, another expanse of water leads to a cluster of multi-tiered buildings, possibly pavilions or temples, nestled on a lower landmass. These structures are surrounded by trees and smaller, rocky formations. A steep, dark cliff face descends into the water on the far right. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of black text are present, accompanied by two small, square red seals. The characters read: 蝦蠏畫. The overall scene depicts a vast, serene natural environment with human elements integrated into the landscape.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical painting features white chrysanthemums with green leaves, alongside black calligraphy and red seals.
long_description: This vertical painting on a light, off-white background depicts a cluster of white chrysanthemums with green and bluish-grey leaves. The flowers are arranged in several stalks, extending from the lower left and center upwards. Many chrysanthemums are fully bloomed, appearing large and round with numerous delicate white petals. Other flowers are smaller, some still in bud form, with a few partially open. The stems are thin and light brown or green. A small, dark insect, possibly a dragonfly or bee, is visible near a large white chrysanthemum on the upper left side. In the upper right section, a column of black Chinese calligraphy reads: "甲午秋分後十日寫于松崖". Below this, two smaller lines read "惜墨齋" and "項谷雅". In the upper left section, another column of black Chinese calligraphy reads: "白露先零心後扣", followed by "法接形似玄乃見", "曲人古貌氣正", and "禮儀丁卯題". Numerous red seals, varying in shape from square to rectangular and circular, are stamped throughout the painting. They are primarily located along the top, left, and right edges, and interspersed among the calligraphy. Each seal contains black or white Chinese characters.

metadata.title: 明/清  項聖謨  白菊圖  軸|White Chrysanthemums
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on paper

alt_text: Textured paper with dark calligraphic writing, framed by gold and patterned blue fabric
long_description: The image presents a rectangular piece of light-colored, textured paper, centrally placed and oriented horizontally. The paper's surface is uneven and appears aged, with subtle variations in tone. Dark, fluid calligraphic writing, arranged in vertical columns, occupies the right two-thirds of the paper. The characters are rendered with varying line weights and sizes, some appearing bold and others more delicate. On the far left side of the paper, a few smaller, isolated dark marks or characters are visible. A thin, golden-brown border, approximately one-quarter inch wide, frames the paper on all four sides. This golden border is encompassed by a wider, dark blue fabric. The blue fabric is adorned with a repeating geometric pattern of interlocking squares or spirals, forming a grid. Scattered within the blue fabric are lighter blue or silver floral and cloud-like motifs, particularly noticeable along the left and bottom edges.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A standing woman adjusting her hair, a kneeling figure, and a seated man holding a portrait on a gold background
long_description: This two-panel artwork features three figures against a shimmering gold leaf background, framed by a narrow green patterned border and a reddish-brown outer frame. On the left panel, a tall woman stands, facing slightly right, with her hands raised to her head as if adjusting her dark hair or a headpiece. She wears a long, flowing robe in shades of reddish-brown, dark brown, and white, with a blue sash visible. To her right and slightly in front, a smaller figure, possibly a child, kneels on the ground, facing left. This figure wears a red garment and has dark hair. On the right panel, a man sits on a low, dark brown stool or cushion, facing left. He wears a dark brown robe and a dark cap, and has a visible beard and mustache. He holds up a small, rectangular portrait with both hands, gazing at the image of a woman's head and shoulders. A dark, round object rests on the ground near his feet. The gold background shows a grid pattern and some signs of age.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Two-panel folding screen; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: Black ink calligraphy and simple plant painting on a light brown vertical scroll.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical hanging scroll featuring black ink calligraphy and a simple ink painting on a light brown paper ground. The main paper is framed by a wider, dark brown fabric border with a subtle, repeating pattern. A narrow strip of white fabric with a delicate wave pattern is visible at the very top and bottom edges of the scroll, between the main paper and the dark brown border. The upper half of the scroll is dominated by flowing black ink calligraphy, arranged in several vertical lines. The script is fluid and expressive, with varying stroke thickness. The longest lines of text are positioned in the upper left and central-left areas of the paper. In the lower right quadrant of the scroll, a minimalist ink painting depicts several clusters of tall, slender plants, possibly grasses or reeds. These plants are rendered with simple, vertical brushstrokes of black ink, some with slight variations in tone suggesting depth or texture. The largest cluster of plants is on the far right, with two smaller clusters to its left, appearing to recede into the background. The plants emerge from a faint horizontal line at the bottom, suggesting ground.

metadata.title: 蜀山人(大田南畝)筆 筍図|Bamboo Shoots
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: An ink drawing on a vertical scroll depicts a stylized, shaggy-maned creature resembling a lion or dog
long_description: The image is a tall, vertical scroll featuring a central light-colored panel framed by dark, patterned borders. The central panel, which appears to be aged paper, displays an ink drawing of a stylized, mythical creature, possibly a lion or dog, rendered in black ink. The creature is positioned in the lower half of the central panel, facing slightly towards the right. It has a large, rounded head with prominent eyes, a short snout, and a wide, open mouth showing teeth. Its body is robust and rounded, with thick, flowing lines suggesting a shaggy mane that frames its head and extends down its back. Its four legs are short and sturdy, ending in clawed paws, with the front right paw slightly lifted. The creature's tail is also depicted with long, flowing lines, mirroring the style of its mane. The ink wash technique creates varying shades of black and grey, giving depth to the creature's fur and form. In the lower right corner of the central panel, there is a small, vertical inscription of characters in black ink. The dark borders of the scroll are adorned with a repeating pattern of stylized floral or cloud motifs in a lighter, possibly gold or bronze, hue.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll features handwritten text above a standing figure in a patterned robe, looking left.
long_description: A tall, vertical, monochromatic scroll depicts a standing figure beneath columns of handwritten text. The upper two-thirds of the scroll are filled with multiple vertical lines of dark, calligraphic script, varying in length and density. Below the text, in the lower third, a full-length figure stands, oriented slightly to the left with their head tilted upwards. The figure has a light complexion and dark hair styled into an elaborate, high bun. They wear a long, dark robe adorned with light, swirling, cloud-like patterns across its surface. The robe features wide, long sleeves and a sash wrapped around the waist, with ends draped downwards. The garment extends to the floor, creating a flowing silhouette. The background is a plain, light gray. In the bottom left corner, below the figure, are small, dark rectangular seals with faint markings.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three figures under a large overhanging rock or thatched roof, with a bell, in a vertical ink wash painting.
long_description:
A vertical ink wash painting depicts a scene with three figures beneath a large, dark, overhanging structure. The upper half of the composition is dominated by this structure, which appears as a massive, textured form, possibly a mountain, cave ceiling, or a heavily thatched roof, rendered in varying shades of dark gray and black. Lighter gray and faint blue tones suggest mist or sky above and behind this structure. From the underside of the overhanging mass, near the center, hangs a bell-like object suspended by two thin lines.

The lower half of the painting features three human figures. On the far left, a figure with a light-colored garment is seated or kneeling, looking towards the right. In the center, another figure, dressed in a dark garment, stoops forward, holding a long pole that extends into a net or basket-like implement. To the right of this central figure, a third individual, wearing a striped garment, is also stooping, seemingly engaged in an activity close to the ground. The ground or water beneath the figures is indicated by horizontal brushstrokes in light gray and black. Subtle reddish-brown hues are visible on the net-like implement and within some of the ground details. In the lower left corner, there is vertical script in black ink, followed by a red, circular seal.

metadata.title: 永樂保全筆  「陶造」|Making Ceramics
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A scroll painting shows two men and a woman working with pottery and other objects in a room
long_description: The vertical scroll painting features a scene with three figures and various objects, rendered in ink and light washes of color on a pale background. The top portion of the image is largely empty, with faint outlines of what appear to be shelves or distant structures, and two thin vertical poles extending upwards.In the middle section, a man with a bald head and a dark blue robe kneels on a raised, light-colored platform. He is actively engaged with a round, light-colored object, possibly pottery, using small tools in his hands. Behind him, a woman in a reddish-brown top and dark hair sits, observing the man. To the man's left, on the platform, are several irregular, light-colored forms. To the right of the man, a dark rectangular panel displays vertical calligraphic text, which reads: "陶淵明" followed by smaller characters below.Below the raised platform, in the lower section of the painting, another man kneels on the floor. He wears a blue and gray striped garment and is working with a large, light-colored, sack-like object. To his immediate left, a smaller, flat, light-colored object rests on the floor. Further to the right, a simple, light-colored wooden table stands, holding three dome-shaped objects. In the lower right corner, more vertical calligraphic text is visible, reading: "九月廿五日" and "保合齋", with a red seal impression directly beneath it. The overall color palette is muted, dominated by grays, blues, and pale browns.

metadata.title: 永樂保全筆  「陶造」|Making Ceramics
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicting figures working with pots and baskets in a hilly landscape.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting features a muted palette of greys, blues, and faint ochre on light-colored paper. The upper third of the artwork shows a hazy, mountainous or hilly landscape rendered with soft, broad washes of light grey and blue. Two large, upright, rectangular forms, resembling ancient stone markers or structures, stand prominently in the upper middle, partially obscured by the mist-like washes. Smaller, indistinct shapes are scattered around them. A diagonal band of darker grey wash creates a sloping path or riverbank, descending from the upper left towards the lower right. To the left of this band, a figure walks rightward, carrying a basket with both hands at waist level. This figure wears a dark blue garment with some yellow accents. The lower half of the painting features several figures engaged in activity near various large, round vessels. In the lower center, a figure kneels, leaning over a large, light brown tub, appearing to be washing or processing something. This figure wears a striped garment of light blue and grey. To their right, another large, grey pot is visible. Further to the left and slightly behind, another figure is seated or kneeling. Several other smaller, round vessels are scattered across the ground. The ground itself is rendered with light grey washes and some darker accents, suggesting rocks or uneven terrain. In the lower right corner, there are faint vertical inscriptions in dark ink, followed by a small red seal.

metadata.title: 永樂保全筆  「陶造」|Making Ceramics
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink and wash painting depicting people engaged in various tasks around a building with a large thatched roof
long_description: This vertical ink and wash painting depicts a scene of people engaged in various activities around a building with a prominent thatched roof. The upper portion of the scroll shows the large, steeply pitched roof of a building, rendered in shades of gray and black, with a misty, undefined background above. Below the roofline, the building's structure is suggested, with a red, round object, possibly a Daruma doll, and another spherical object visible inside or near an opening. Several figures are distributed throughout the mid and lower sections of the composition. One figure kneels on the ground, appearing to sift or process material. To their right, another person is seated, leaning over a large container with a long tool. Further right, a figure sits under a large, open umbrella, observing the scene. In the lower foreground, a robust figure is depicted in motion, swinging a large, mallet-like tool downwards, possibly breaking or pounding something on the ground. Other smaller containers, tools, and indistinct forms are scattered around the figures. The artwork is primarily rendered in muted tones of gray, black, and light blue, with sparse accents of red. A red seal and some black characters are visible in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: 永樂保全筆  「陶造」|Making Ceramics
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts several figures interacting with large vessels in a muted, hazy setting.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting, rendered primarily in muted tones of gray, light blue, and pale green, depicts multiple figures interacting with large vessels. The artwork is framed by a light blue border. The composition is divided into two main sections. In the upper half, two figures are seated on a raised platform or ground, facing each other. They appear to be engaged with smaller, indistinct objects or vessels between them. The background behind them is a light, hazy wash, suggesting a distant landscape or open space with faint outlines of structures. A prominent vertical line on the left side of the painting separates the foreground from the background. In the lower half, three figures are arranged around a large, light-colored, ovoid vase that rests on a round, pedestal-like table. To the left of the vase, a figure kneels or sits, looking towards the vase. To the right and slightly in front of the vase, another figure is seated on the ground, pulling a rope that extends from the base of the table or vase. This figure wears a patterned garment. Further to the right, a third figure sits, observing the scene. Several smaller, indistinct vessels or objects are scattered on the ground around the figures in the lower section. The figures' garments show subtle hints of pale green and gray. In the lower right corner, there are two characters, "催全", above a red square seal.

metadata.title: 永樂保全筆  「陶造」|Making Ceramics
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting shows people cooking and eating around a building with smoke rising, and a person carrying items.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting, framed by a light blue border. The scene depicts multiple figures engaged in various activities around a structure, rendered in a muted palette of grays, browns, and light blues, with subtle accents of red and green.In the upper section, a large, swirling plume of light gray smoke rises against a pale, unadorned background, originating from a dark, angular roofline below. Beneath the smoke and roof, an elevated platform or balcony is visible on the left. On this platform, several figures are seated or standing, some partially obscured, appearing to be in conversation or observing the scene.Below the platform, at ground level, more figures are depicted. To the left, a bare-chested person with light-colored skin kneels or bends over a light-colored object. To their right, another figure, possibly wearing a dark hat, is actively engaged with a dark pot or cooking vessel, surrounded by dark, smudged areas that suggest heat or fire. A large, dark, umbrella-like structure stands to the right of this activity, providing shade, with stacks of dark, rectangular objects piled near its base.In the foreground, a person walks from left to right, carrying a flat, rectangular object on their shoulder. This individual wears a light green top, dark blue pants, and light-colored sandals. The ground beneath them is uneven, with a dark, elongated shadow or mound. In the lower right corner, a small, vertical inscription of characters, "住會", is visible, accompanied by a red, circular seal.

metadata.title: 永樂保全筆  「陶造」|Making Ceramics
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical landscape painting depicts towering light brown mountains, a waterfall, and small buildings nestled among trees.
long_description: A vertical landscape painting features a dominant central mountain range rendered in light brown and tan hues, with subtle reddish-brown and darker brown striations suggesting texture and depth. The background is a muted, dark brown or greyish-brown, creating a hazy atmosphere. In the upper left, a column of black text is visible, accompanied by a red square seal. Another red square seal is in the upper right corner, and a third in the bottom right. A thin, white waterfall cascades down the left side of the largest central mountain. Below the waterfall, on a terraced slope, are several small, traditional-style buildings with dark roofs and light-colored walls, one with a reddish roof. Clusters of dark green trees are scattered around these structures and along the lower mountain slopes. To the right of the central mountain, smaller, jagged peaks rise. A body of water or river is visible at the bottom, reflecting the earthy tones of the landscape. The overall palette is subdued and earthy.

metadata.title: 明/清　楊昇(僞款)　關山小雪圖　冊頁|Light Snow on the Mountain Pass
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll with extensive black calligraphy, a white flower, and reddish-brown and green leaves on a light brown background.
long_description: A tall, narrow, vertically oriented scroll is framed by dark brown outer borders. At the top and bottom, a dark blue-black inner border features a repeating pattern of gold swirling lines and small, stylized gold flower shapes. The central field is a light, warm brown paper, predominantly covered with black calligraphic text. The text is arranged in numerous vertical columns of varying lengths, occupying most of the left and central portions of the scroll from near the top to near the bottom. The script is fluid and appears to be in an older style. Approximately halfway down the right side, a single white flower with several green leaves is painted. The flower has multiple petals, appearing full and slightly ruffled. Towards the bottom right, a cluster of five-lobed leaves is depicted. Some leaves are a reddish-brown color, while others are green. They are arranged as if falling or growing on faint, thin lines that suggest branches or vines. A small, dark, bird-like shape is visible near the bottom-most leaves. Several small, red, square or oval seals are visible among the calligraphy, particularly in the upper and middle sections.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a mountainous landscape with a lake, trees, and scattered buildings.
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting, rendered in shades of gray and black on a light, aged paper, depicts a vast mountainous landscape with water and human structures. In the upper half, a range of mountains stretches across the entire width.
