The mountains on the far left are lighter and more ethereal, suggesting distance or mist, while those towards the right are darker and more sharply defined, showing textured slopes and peaks. On the right side, a prominent mountain is densely covered with small, dark trees and dotted with rocks. Near its summit, a small cluster of buildings with sloped roofs is nestled amongst the trees. Numerous small, dark marks suggest paths or additional vegetation climbing the slopes. The lower half of the painting is dominated by a calm body of water, likely a lake or wide river, which reflects the muted tones of the sky or distant land. On the far left bank of this water, a small, simple building with a sloped roof is situated amidst a cluster of trees, including several with drooping branches resembling willows. A small boat, with a faint figure inside, floats on the water near this left bank. The water's edge on the right side features a rocky shoreline with sparse vegetation. Faint, illegible calligraphic marks are visible on the water in the lower-center portion of the painting.

metadata.title: 明　卞文瑜　谿山秋靄圖　卷|Streams and Mountains in Autumn Mist
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A standing figure with a crown and halo, holding a staff, flanked by stylized trees.
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a standing figure centered on a light brown background. The figure has a round face with closed eyes and long, dark hair. A multi-tiered, pointed crown sits on their head, and a green circular halo surrounds the head. The figure wears long, light-colored robes with wide, dark-colored sleeves adorned with orange, flame-like or leaf-like patterns. Orange pants are visible beneath the robes. The figure holds a dark, slender staff vertically in their right hand. Two stylized green tree-like shapes are positioned on either side of the figure's lower body. In the upper left corner, a solid orange circle is visible, while in the upper right, an outline of an orange circle appears. The top and bottom edges of the main painted area are bordered by a thin red line above a wider dark grey band. The overall palette includes light brown, dark grey, red, orange, green, and black.

metadata.title: 雨宝童子図大津絵|Ōtsu-e of Uhō Dōji
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and woodblock print on paper

alt_text: A horizontal ink wash painting shows a misty landscape with dark, rounded mountains and faint structures.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal ink wash painting on a light brown, aged paper or silk background. The composition depicts a misty, mountainous landscape rendered primarily in shades of dark grey and black ink. On the far left, a large, dark, rounded mountain form rises from the bottom edge, its peak extending towards the upper left. To its right and slightly behind it, another similar but smaller dark form is partially visible, enveloped in lighter washes of ink that suggest mist. The ink application varies in density, creating a sense of depth and texture for these landforms. The central portion of the painting features a wide expanse of light brown, almost empty space, indicating a valley or body of water obscured by a thick mist. Slightly to the left of the center, a small, dark, elongated shape, resembling a boat, rests on what appears to be water or low-lying ground. To its right, a few faint, vertical brushstrokes suggest reeds or tall grass emerging from the mist. On the right side of the painting, another cluster of dark, rounded forms, similar to the left, emerges from the mist. These forms appear slightly smaller and more fragmented than those on the left. On the upper right of this cluster, several small, distinct, dark shapes are visible, resembling small structures or dense clumps of trees. These forms are also partially enveloped by the pervasive mist, which lightens the background. In the upper right corner, a vertical column of black calligraphic text is present.

metadata.title: 狩野探幽筆　『画苑』|Famous Themes for Painting Study Known as “The Garden of Painting” (Gaen)
metadata.medium: One of a pair of handscrolls; ink on paper

alt_text: An ink painting on a light brown scroll depicts a flowering branch under a faint moon with calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal scroll featuring an ink painting on a light brown, aged paper or silk background. A thick, dark, gnarled branch extends from the lower left corner, curving upwards and to the right across the middle of the composition. Thinner twigs branch off from the main limb, adorned with numerous small, light-colored, circular blossoms or buds. In the upper-middle right, a large, faint, light-colored circular shape, possibly a moon, is visible behind the branches. On the far left, a large, dark, abstract ink blotch is partially visible, cropped by the edge of the scroll. To its right, a vertical column of dark calligraphy reads "月下親体". Further to the right and below the main branch, another vertical section of smaller dark text is present, accompanied by a small, rectangular red seal. On the far right edge, a narrow vertical strip of the scroll shows a column of very small, dark characters. The overall impression is one of delicate natural forms rendered with bold ink strokes against a muted background.

metadata.title: 狩野探幽筆　『画苑』|Famous Themes for Painting Study Known as “The Garden of Painting” (Gaen)
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting squirrels climbing bamboo stalks and resting on a gourd-like object.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting, rendered in shades of black, gray, and off-white, depicts several squirrels among bamboo. On the right side, two tall bamboo stalks extend vertically, with varying tones of gray suggesting their cylindrical form. Several small, fluffy squirrels are shown climbing the rightmost bamboo stalk, positioned one above the other, with their tails curving upwards. Below them, smaller bamboo shoots with dark, pointed leaves emerge from the lower right. In the lower-left quadrant, a larger squirrel with a prominent bushy tail is perched on a rounded, gourd-like object. This squirrel faces left, its head slightly lowered. Another smaller squirrel is visible near the base of the gourd-like object. The background is a light, misty wash, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere. The bamboo leaves are depicted with sharp, dark strokes, contrasting with the softer, textured rendering of the squirrels' fur. In the lower right corner, vertical lines of calligraphy are visible, accompanied by a small red seal.

metadata.title: 竹に栗鼠図|Squirrels on Bamboo and Rock
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A horizontal drawing depicts several figures, primarily women and a child, engaged in various domestic activities.
long_description: This horizontal drawing features a series of figures, predominantly women, arranged across a light, unadorned background. The artwork is characterized by delicate line work with sparse applications of color, primarily muted greens, reds, and black. Starting from the left, a woman is seated in an ornate, high-backed chair, facing right. A small, dark-colored animal, possibly a cat or dog, rests on the floor near her feet. To her right, another woman stands, holding a small bowl over a larger, shallow basin. Next, a third woman stands, facing away from the viewer, holding a round, fan-like object with a patterned surface. Further to the right, a woman is depicted bending forward, as if bowing or attending to something low. Beside her, another woman stands, holding a small child. The child is seen from the front, while the woman holding the child faces slightly left. Moving right, a woman is seated on a low stool, with her back to the viewer, showcasing an elaborate hairstyle and a garment with a floral pattern in green and black. Finally, on the far right, two figures are seated at a low, rectangular table, possibly engaged in a board game, with one figure seen from the back and the other from the front. A third figure stands behind them, observing the activity at the table. The figures are dressed in flowing robes, with some details like sashes and hair ornaments highlighted with color.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A small, muscular figure with a headband grapples with a giant dark fish amidst swirling waves.
long_description: The image is a vertical composition featuring a large, dark fish and a smaller, muscular human figure against a background of stylized waves. The fish, positioned on the left, is predominantly dark brown or black with distinct, overlapping scales. Its large, round eye, located near the top left, has a light blue iris and a black pupil. Its fins are also dark and prominent. To the right of the fish, and slightly in front of it, is a human figure with light brown skin. This figure has dark, shaggy hair and wears a white headband. Its body is muscular and bare-chested, with a simple dark loincloth. The figure's face is turned towards the viewer, with a wide-eyed, intense expression. Its hands are open, fingers splayed, and it appears to be holding onto the side of the large fish. The background consists of swirling, stylized waves rendered in shades of grey, white, and light blue, suggesting a turbulent water environment. The overall color palette is muted, focusing on earthy tones and cool greys.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; hand-colored woodblock print

alt_text: A distressed, pale face with black hair, yellow horns, fangs, and red-rimmed yellow eyes, set within a dark circular frame
long_description: A pale, distressed face with black hair and small yellow horns is centered within a dark, textured circular frame. The face has a light, cracked complexion with prominent lines on the forehead and cheeks, suggesting a pained or sorrowful expression. Its large, round eyes feature bright yellow irises and pupils, surrounded by red eyelids, and gaze slightly downward. A prominent nose sits above an open mouth, which reveals a bright red interior, white fangs, and a visible red tongue. Thin, dark lines represent strands of hair falling from the top of the head down the sides of the face. Two small, curved yellow horns protrude from the top of the head, just above the hairline. Dark, curved, worm-like shapes emerge from behind the face on either side, extending onto the dark circular background. The circular frame itself is a mottled gray-brown with a rough texture, and it is set against a plain, light brown background.

metadata.title: 能面図・般若|Noh Mask of a Demoness (Hannya)
metadata.medium: Matted painting; color on papier mache in relief, against a paper background

alt_text: A relief sculpture of an old man's face with white hair, a long mustache, and a beard, set in a dark circle.
long_description: The image displays a relief sculpture of an old man's face, centered within a dark, circular background. The circular element is set against a lighter, warm brown, rectangular background. The man's face is rendered in a light beige or off-white color, with prominent wrinkles carved into his forehead, around his eyes, and on his cheeks. He has narrow, dark eyes with small, dark pupils. His eyebrows are subtly indicated by carved lines above his eyes. White hair frames his face, receding slightly at the temples, and a long, white mustache extends downwards, curling slightly at the ends. A long, pointed white beard extends from his chin, also curling at the end. His lips are a dark red, slightly parted to reveal a dark interior. His ears are visible on either side of his head, with a small, dark, circular earring visible in his left ear. From behind each ear, several thin, dark, curly strands extend outwards and downwards onto the dark circular background. The circular background has a rough, granular texture, appearing in shades of dark gray and brown. The outer background is a uniform light brown or tan color.

metadata.title: 能面図・朝倉尉|Noh Mask of an Old Man (Asakurajō)
metadata.medium: Matted painting; color on papier-mâché in relief, against a paper background

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a misty mountain landscape with a river, trees, and small buildings
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting rendered in ink and light colors on a light-toned surface. The composition depicts a vast, layered mountain landscape. In the foreground, a wide, light-colored river or stream flows from the center towards the lower left and right edges. Along its banks, scattered trees with dark foliage and bare branches are visible. Small, simple structures, possibly huts or houses, are nestled among the trees on both sides of the water, particularly in the central-left area. Behind the foreground elements, a series of mountains rise, varying in height and detail. The mountains in the mid-ground are rendered with darker ink washes, showing textured rock faces and dense clusters of trees. Some trees appear to be evergreen, while others have sparse, dark branches. Further back, the mountains become progressively lighter and hazier, suggesting distance and mist, with faint blue-gray tones. The highest peaks are in the upper central and right portions of the fan. In the upper left section of the fan, several vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present. Below this text, two square red seals are stamped. Two additional square red seals are visible near the lower left and lower right edges of the fan, partially obscured by the curve of the fan's edge.

metadata.title: 清   王時敏  倣黃子久筆意山水	扇頁|Landscape after Huang Gongwang
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on white paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting a mountainous landscape with dense forests, scattered houses, and calligraphic text
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting, rendered in shades of black and gray on a light, off-white background, depicts a vast mountainous landscape. A large, prominent mountain peak dominates the upper center, characterized by textured strokes suggesting rugged rock formations and dense, dark foliage. To the left and right of this central peak, lighter, more distant mountains recede into the background. On the right side of the central mountain, a cluster of three small, simple houses with dark roofs is nestled on a terraced slope, appearing to be part of a small village. Below the main peak, the landscape descends into a valley densely covered with trees, depicted with varying densities of ink to create depth and texture. Some trees have distinct trunks and branches, while others form dark, textured masses. The lower third of the painting features a more open foreground with a winding path or stream indicated by lighter areas. More trees, including a prominent bare-branched tree in the lower center, are scattered across the foreground, alongside rocks and smaller shrubs. In the upper right corner, vertical black calligraphic text is present, followed by two red square seals. The text reads: "閩水空山道 寄門老樹邨 楊子人". Another smaller red seal is visible in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: 清 王鑑 仿古山水圖 冊 紙本|Landscapes in the styles of old masters
metadata.medium: Album of ten paintings; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink painting of a landscape with tall trees, hills, a house, boats, and a swirling pattern of birds in the sky.
long_description: The image is a vertical ink painting on a light tan ground, depicting a monochromatic landscape scene. The composition is divided into distinct sections from top to bottom. The upper third of the scroll features a large expanse of empty space. In the upper right quadrant, a dense, swirling pattern of small, dark bird-like dots forms a circular shape. To the left of this pattern, along the upper left edge, is a vertical column of dark, brush-written calligraphy. Below this text are two square red seals, one positioned directly above the other. The middle section of the painting is dominated by a cluster of tall, slender trees on the right, rising from a hilly terrain. Some trees have dense, dark foliage, while others are rendered with lighter, more delicate branches and sparse leaves, with some hanging elements. To the left of these trees, in the mid-distance, two small boats with single figures are depicted on a calm body of water. Faint, distant hills or landmasses are visible beyond the boats. The lower third of the scroll shows a more detailed landscape. A small, simple house with a dark roof and light walls is nestled on a gentle slope among hills on the right side, partially obscured by the trees. The hills are rendered with varied ink washes and textured brushstrokes, creating a sense of depth and form. A body of water occupies the foreground, extending across the bottom of the scene. In the lower left quadrant, two more red seals are present: a square one above a rectangular one. The entire scene is rendered with a limited palette of black ink on the light background, creating a serene and atmospheric effect.

metadata.title: 清   李漁   泛舟圖   軸|Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on satin

alt_text: A vertical ink painting depicting a gnarled pine tree atop a tall, jagged mountain peak.
long_description: This vertical ink painting on a light-colored ground depicts a dramatic mountainous landscape. In the upper right quadrant, several columns of black calligraphic text are visible, accompanied by two small red seals. The central and dominant feature is a towering, craggy mountain or rock formation, rendered with varying shades of black ink washes and sharp, textured brushstrokes that define its steep, angular faces. From the very top of this peak, a large, gnarled tree with a thick, twisted trunk extends its branches downwards and to the left. Its foliage, depicted with fine brushstrokes, resembles pine needles. Below the main peak, additional rock formations are visible, continuing the rugged terrain. Some smaller, dark clusters of foliage appear at the base and within the crevices of these lower rocks. The overall composition emphasizes height and the intricate details of the natural forms.

metadata.title: 清  倣弘仁  黃山蟠龍松圖  軸|Dragon Pine on Mount Huang
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and pale color on paper

alt_text: Monochrome ink painting of mountains, a body of water, trees, and a small figure in a boat
long_description: A vertical monochrome ink painting depicts a serene landscape with mountains, water, and trees. The upper third features a prominent, pointed mountain on the left, rendered with light washes and darker ink defining its ridges and sparse vegetation. Smaller, rounded peaks appear to its right. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of calligraphy are visible, accompanied by a square red seal. Below the mountains, a wide, calm body of water extends horizontally across the middle ground. The foreground features a gently sloping bank with sparse, dark ink brushstrokes suggesting grass and terrain. Several trees with dark trunks and branches stand on this near bank. To the left, a tall, slender tree with drooping branches resembles a willow, while to the right, several trees with more angular branches and denser foliage rise. A small, robed figure sits in a simple boat on the water, facing away from the viewer, positioned near the center-bottom of the painting. The entire scene is rendered with varied ink washes and brushstrokes, creating depth and texture from light grey to deep black. The visible calligraphy reads: "砂步漫漫谷松门, 挂杖悠悠挂子真, 似此溪园, 杜" followed by a red seal.

metadata.title: 清  傳查士標  泛棹圖  軸|Old Man Boating on a River
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A traditional landscape painting featuring a large mountain, water, trees, and distant buildings under a pale sky.
long_description: This landscape painting features a serene scene dominated by a large, light-colored mountain on the right and center, rendered with soft washes of pale gray and subtle brown tones. Its undulating slopes are dotted with clusters of dark green-black foliage, particularly along its ridges and peaks. A smaller, more distant mountain, depicted in faint blue-gray, rises in the upper right background. To the left of the main mountain, a calm body of water stretches across the mid-ground, reflecting the muted light. Beyond the water, on the far left, a group of traditional buildings with red roofs and light-colored walls is partially visible behind a low, light-colored wall. Several tall, slender trees with sparse, dark branches stand near these structures. On the slopes of the main mountain, various groups of dark green-black trees are depicted, some as dense clumps and others as individual, upright forms. The sky above is a very light, almost white, expanse with faint hints of pale blue and brown. The painting is framed by a light-colored border. Several red seals with illegible characters are present: two rectangular seals in the lower left, one square seal in the upper left, two smaller square seals in the lower right, and one small square seal in the upper right.

metadata.title: 清  樊圻  為玉翁作山水圖  冊|Landscapes Painted for Yuweng
metadata.medium: Album of eight leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A tall, vertical ink wash painting depicts a snowy mountain landscape with bare trees, pine trees, and small buildings.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting on light cream-colored paper depicts a vast, snow-covered mountain landscape. The scene is rendered primarily in shades of black and gray ink, with areas of white representing snow and mist. At the top, towering, snow-capped mountains rise into a misty sky, their peaks softly defined. To the right of the upper mountains, vertical lines of black calligraphy are visible, accompanied by several small red square seals. Below these peaks, nestled among snow-dusted hills, are several small, traditional-style buildings with dark roofs, surrounded by clusters of dark, spiky pine trees. The middle section of the painting features a dense array of bare, deciduous trees with intricate, dark branches, standing tall against the snowy slopes. Rocky outcrops and rounded hills, also covered in snow, are interspersed with patches of darker foliage or exposed rock. The ink work shows varied brushstrokes, creating texture for the rocks and the fine lines of the tree branches. Towards the bottom, a wider expanse of water or a frozen river is visible, with a few small, dark brushstrokes suggesting reeds or sparse vegetation along its edge. More bare trees, larger and more prominent, frame the lower part of the scene, their trunks and branches rendered with strong, dark ink. The very bottom of the painting features several more red square seals, scattered across the lower margin.

metadata.title: 清   龔賢   冬景山水圖   軸|Wintry mountains
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A tall ink painting depicts towering mountains, dense trees, and several thatched-roof houses in a valley
long_description: The artwork is a tall, vertical ink wash painting, primarily in shades of black and gray, depicting a mountainous landscape with human dwellings. The upper third is dominated by a towering, craggy mountain peak, rendered with textured brushstrokes suggesting rock and dense foliage. Lighter, misty areas suggest clouds or distance around the peak. In the upper right corner, a block of vertical black text is visible, accompanied by two red square seals below it. The text reads: "人煙佳處是山頭 月落烏啼霜滿天 江楓漁火對愁眠 姑蘇城外寒山寺 夜半鐘聲到客船 清涼 靜觀". Below the main peak, the mountains slope downwards, becoming densely forested. Nestled among these trees, slightly left of center, are three structures with distinct, rounded, thatched roofs. The largest structure is centrally placed, with two smaller ones to its left and slightly below. These appear to be houses or pavilions, with light-colored walls visible beneath the dark roofs. A narrow waterfall or stream cascades down the mountain face to the left of the houses. The surrounding trees are depicted with varying textures, some as dense clusters of foliage, others as individual trunks. The lower half of the painting features more trees, notably two prominent, tall, dark-trunked trees in the lower center, extending upwards from the bottom edge. These trees have textured bark and dense foliage. To the right of these trees, a winding path or stream descends, following the contours of the land. The foreground is filled with more rocky terrain and dense vegetation, rendered with dark, rich ink washes. Two small red square seals are visible in the lower right corner, near the bottom edge.

metadata.title: 清  倣龔賢  雲山隱居圖  軸|Dwelling among mountains and clouds
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A monochrome ink wash landscape painting depicting mountains, gnarled trees, a valley, and small structures
long_description: A horizontal ink wash painting, rendered in shades of grey and black, depicts a vast mountainous landscape. On the far left, a steep, craggy mountain face rises, textured with dark ink strokes and dotted with small clusters of trees. Moving towards the center, a valley opens up, revealing a prominent group of gnarled pine trees with dense, dark foliage, rooted on a rocky ridge. Below these trees, two small, indistinct figures are seated or standing. To their left, a few bare-branched trees are visible. The valley floor extends into the midground, rendered with lighter ink washes, suggesting a distant forest or plain. On the right side, a series of rolling hills and mountains recede into the distance, also dotted with trees. At the bottom right, a small, simple house with a peaked roof and open front is nestled near the edge of what appears to be a body of water or a riverbank. The background features a range of hazy, lighter-toned mountains, creating a sense of deep space. The overall composition uses varying ink densities to create depth, texture, and atmospheric perspective.

metadata.title: 清   柳堉   山水圖  卷|Traveling Amid Streams and Mountains
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink painting depicting three birds, two large and one small, on a light background with faint brushstrokes
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting features three birds rendered in varying shades of black and gray against a light, unadorned background. The composition is arranged from left to right, with two prominent dark birds in the foreground and a third, partially visible bird on the right.On the far left, a large, dark bird stands, its head tilted sharply upwards with an open beak, suggesting a call. Its body is a solid mass of dark ink, with lighter gray details on its wing. Perched on its back is a smaller bird, lighter in color with distinct black and white striped or spotted patterns on its back and head. This smaller bird also looks upwards. A faint, horizontal line of light ink extends from beneath the large bird towards the left edge.In the center of the painting, another large, dark bird is depicted in a walking posture, facing towards the right but with its head turned back over its shoulder towards the left. Its body is similarly rendered with broad, dark ink strokes, and it has thin, dark legs. Behind and below this central bird are soft, cloudy masses of gray ink wash, providing a sense of depth.Towards the right side, a gnarled, dark branch extends diagonally upwards from the lower right corner. Perched on a thinner part of this branch, higher up, is the third bird. Only its head and upper body are clearly visible, rendered with lighter ink and distinct patterns, similar to the small bird on the left. Its head is turned towards the left. Above and around this bird, more subtle, light gray ink washes suggest a hazy atmosphere or distant foliage. The overall impression is one of movement and interaction among the birds within a minimalist landscape.

metadata.title: 清  八大山人（朱耷） 蓮塘戲禽圖 卷|Birds in a lotus pond
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on satin

alt_text: Vertical paper with black handwritten text in columns and several red seals on a light background.
long_description: A light-colored, rectangular sheet of paper is oriented vertically, featuring black handwritten text and several red seals. The text, written in a calligraphic style, is arranged in vertical columns that read from right to left, occupying the upper two-thirds of the paper, primarily on the right side. The characters vary in size and stroke thickness. Four red seals are visible: a square seal partially overlaps the top right of the first column of text; a smaller, rectangular seal is positioned in the middle left, below a signature-like flourish; another square seal is located near the bottom left corner; and a larger, somewhat faded square seal is in the upper left corner. The paper has a slightly aged, off-white or light beige tone, providing a neutral background for the black ink and red marks.

metadata.title: 清   朱耷 （八大山人）	行書節錄王羲之蘭亭序  軸|After Wang Xizhi's "Preface to the Orchid Pavilion Gathering Collection"
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A monochrome ink drawing shows a mountainous landscape with small houses, trees, and rocks.
long_description: This monochrome ink drawing depicts a rugged mountainous landscape rendered in varying shades of black ink on a light, uncolored background. The composition is dominated by large, textured mountains and hills that rise from the bottom to the top and extend across the right and central portions of the image. These landforms are characterized by swirling and vertical brushstrokes, creating a sense of depth and rocky texture. On the lower left slope, several small, simple structures with peaked roofs are nestled, appearing as small houses or huts. Scattered across the mountain slopes, particularly on the right and center, are several trees with gnarled trunks and sparse, rounded foliage, some rendered with darker, denser ink. The foreground and base of the mountains feature rocky terrain, with various sizes of rounded and angular rocks defined by darker ink. A lighter, flatter area at the very bottom suggests a plain or water. Calligraphic text in dark ink runs vertically along the upper right edge, accompanied by two stacked square red seals below it. A smaller, single red seal is also visible near the bottom right.

metadata.title: 清  朱耷 (八大山人)  山水圖  冊|Landscape album
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A fan-shaped painting features a large pink flower and a smaller pink bloom with green leaves and branches.
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting, wider at the top and narrowing towards the bottom, with a light, off-white background. Faint vertical lines are visible, suggesting the structure of a fan. The central focus is a cluster of flowering plants with green leaves and brown branches. On the right, a large, full pink flower dominates, featuring multiple layers of petals and a small yellow center. To its left, a smaller, simpler pink bloom with fewer petals is depicted on a slender stem, rising above a cluster of green leaves. Several dark green leaves are scattered around the base of both flowers, with some lighter green accents. Brown branches extend from the lower center, with small pink buds visible on some of the thinner twigs. In the upper right quadrant, vertical black calligraphic text is present, followed by a small, square red seal stamp at the bottom right of the text. The overall composition fills the lower two-thirds of the fan shape.

metadata.title: 清   王武   牡丹圖   扇面|Peony
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Traditional landscape painting with towering mountains, a winding river, and scattered buildings among trees
long_description: This vertical landscape painting, rendered in a traditional style, depicts a panoramic view of mountains, water, and trees under a light sky. The upper right is dominated by a tall, pointed mountain peak, textured with vertical green brushstrokes suggesting foliage and rock formations. To its left, a series of lower, rounded hills extend, partially veiled by a pale, misty wash. Numerous small, dark green trees densely cover the mountain slopes and hillsides. Below the mountainous terrain, a wide body of water, possibly a river or lake, meanders through the mid-ground, reflecting the muted light. Its banks are lined with clusters of trees, some with dark, bare branches and others with sparse, light green foliage. Several small, simple buildings with light walls and dark roofs are nestled discreetly among the trees and along the water's edge, particularly on the right bank. The land areas are depicted in soft washes of light brown, ochre, and pale green. In the foreground, on the left, a group of tall, slender trees with dark trunks and delicate branches stands prominently. A weeping willow-like tree with drooping branches extends over a small inlet on the lower right. Rocks and patches of light green grass are scattered across the immediate foreground. The overall color palette is subdued, featuring various greens, browns, ochres, and grays. In the upper left, two columns of black calligraphic text are present, accompanied by two red square seals. The text reads: "山翁余知緒年六十悠悠六十餘年矣余復之以破硯寫步丙申嘉平月十有二日王華" and "甲午仲夏擬趙千里筆法島山王華寫". A single red square seal is also visible in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: 倣趙伯駒山水圖	軸|Landscape in the Style of Zhao Boju (Fang Zhao Boju shanshui)
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A tall, narrow ink wash painting depicts a mountainous landscape with trees, water, and calligraphy.
long_description: The image is a vertical, monochrome ink wash painting on light-toned paper, depicting a mountainous landscape. A tall, pointed mountain peak dominates the upper left, rendered with lighter washes and darker, textured strokes suggesting rock formations. Below this peak, a series of rolling hills and smaller mountains extend across the mid-ground, gradually descending towards the bottom. These hills are textured with varying shades of gray and black ink, indicating foliage and rocky outcrops. Scattered throughout the landscape are numerous trees, rendered with dark ink. In the upper-mid section, small clusters of trees appear on the slopes of the hills. Further down, in the lower-mid and foreground, more prominent groups of trees with distinct trunks and dense foliage are visible, particularly on the right side. A winding path or stream appears to flow through the lower left portion of the painting, bordered by sparse vegetation. Two red square seals are visible in the lower left corner, and another red seal is near the calligraphic text in the upper right. The calligraphic text, written vertically in black ink, is located in the upper right quadrant of the painting and reads: "清風明月本無價 遠山近水皆有情 庚午五月上浣 倣倪高士筆意 吳山識".

metadata.title: 清　王翬　溪山雨霽圖　軸|Clearing after Rain over Streams and Mountains
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Monochromatic landscape painting featuring towering mountains, dense trees, a cascading waterfall, and a small building.
long_description: The image is a horizontal, monochromatic landscape painting rendered in ink washes and fine lines on a light, aged ground. The composition is dominated by rugged mountains that fill most of the frame, creating a sense of depth and scale. On the left, the mountains are densely covered with trees, depicted with dark, textured brushstrokes suggesting thick foliage. These mountains rise steeply, their peaks extending towards the top edge of the painting. Towards the center, a deep valley or gorge opens up, revealing a prominent, multi-tiered waterfall cascading down the mountain face. The water is rendered with lighter strokes, contrasting with the darker rock and foliage. Below the waterfall, nestled near the water's edge, is a small, simple building, possibly a house or pavilion, with a distinct roof and walls. A winding path or road appears to lead towards or past this structure. To the right, the mountains continue, appearing craggier and less densely forested than those on the left. Lighter ink washes are used here, suggesting distance or atmospheric effects like mist or clouds. The overall texture of the mountains is achieved through varied brushwork, indicating rock formations and crevices. Across the bottom of the painting, a body of water, likely a river or stream, flows horizontally, with some flat land or banks visible along its edges. The entire scene evokes a vast and rugged natural environment.

metadata.title: 清   王翬   太行山色圖   卷|The Colors of Mount Taihang
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a misty mountainous landscape with pine trees and waterfalls
long_description: A tall, vertical ink wash painting portrays a vast, misty mountainous landscape. The upper portion of the scroll features large, rounded mountain peaks that recede into a hazy, light-toned background, suggesting distance and atmospheric perspective. Below these, the mountains become more defined, with craggy rock formations and steep slopes. Several waterfalls are visible, cascading down the rocky terrain, particularly in the middle and lower sections of the painting. Patches of mist and clouds are interspersed throughout the scene, obscuring parts of the mountains and creating a sense of depth. Numerous pine trees, characterized by their gnarled trunks and clusters of blue-green needles, are scattered across the mountainsides, especially prominent in the lower half of the composition. A few small, simple structures, possibly huts or shelters, are nestled among the rocks. The overall color palette is monochromatic, dominated by shades of gray and light brown, with the blue-green of the pine needles providing a subtle color accent. In the upper right corner, there is a vertical column of calligraphic text and two red square seals.

metadata.title: 清  （傳）王翬  雪景山水圖  軸|Snowscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting a vast landscape with mountains, a river, trees, and small structures, with calligraphic text
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting, rendered primarily in shades of black and gray with subtle brown and reddish accents, depicts an expansive mountainous landscape. In the upper left quadrant, a large block of calligraphic text, written in vertical columns of black characters, is present. Below and to the right of this text are several red seal impressions. Dominating the right half of the composition are towering, rounded mountains, rendered with textured brushstrokes that suggest rocky formations and sparse vegetation. Some trees with bare branches or light foliage are visible on their slopes. A wide body of water, depicted as a lighter, unpainted area, flows horizontally across the middle ground, separating the right mountains from the elements on the left and in the foreground. On the left, a series of smaller, rolling hills and mountains recede into the distance. In the mid-ground, a cluster of trees with varying foliage, some appearing bare and others with light brown or green leaves, stands on a rocky outcrop. A small, simple building with a peaked roof is nestled among these trees and rocks. The immediate foreground features a rocky shoreline with a faint path leading up towards the trees and building on the left. Additional red seal impressions are visible in the lower left and lower right corners of the painting. The composition utilizes a high vantage point, looking down into a valley or river scene, with a strong diagonal flow from the upper right mountains to the lower left foreground. The brushwork varies from delicate lines for tree branches to broader, textured strokes for the mountainous terrain.

metadata.title: 清　王翬　玉峰看月圖　軸|Landscape: Eve of Mid-autumn
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink and wash landscape on a fan, featuring towering mountains, buildings, water, and calligraphic text
long_description: This fan-shaped ink and wash painting depicts a detailed mountain landscape. The composition is dominated by towering, craggy mountains rendered in various shades of grey and black ink, with subtle hints of light blue wash on some peaks and distant ranges. In the upper left quadrant, vertical lines of black calligraphic text are visible, accompanied by two square red seals. Below these, another red seal is placed near the bottom left edge. In the central mid-ground, a cluster of traditional-style buildings with dark roofs and light walls is nestled among trees, situated in a valley or on a plateau. A waterfall cascades down the rocks near these structures, flowing into a body of water that winds through the lower parts of the landscape. More trees with dark, dense foliage are scattered across the mountain slopes. On the far right, additional mountain formations and smaller, less distinct structures are visible. Two more red seals are placed at the bottom right and bottom center edges of the fan. The overall impression is a serene yet rugged natural environment, rendered with delicate brushwork and atmospheric washes.

metadata.title: 清    王翬    雨後晴巒圖    扇頁|Mountains after Rain
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A panoramic landscape painting depicts towering mountains, numerous buildings, waterfalls, and many small figures traversing paths.
long_description: This panoramic landscape painting features a vast, detailed mountain range rendered in muted greens, grays, and browns, with touches of blue and red. Jagged peaks rise throughout the composition, covered densely with various trees, including numerous pine trees with distinctive flat tops. Many multi-tiered buildings, resembling temples or pagodas, are nestled into the mountainsides, some with red roofs and blue details. Numerous small figures, dressed in blue, red, and white, are depicted traversing winding paths and bridges that crisscross the mountainous terrain. Several waterfalls cascade down the slopes, creating white streaks against the darker rock. In the foreground, groups of figures gather on a large bridge and along paths. As the mountains recede into the background, they become lighter and more indistinct, enveloped in a soft, pale mist, particularly on the right side. A wide, flat expanse, possibly a body of water or valley, is visible in the far distance on the left.

metadata.title: 清　王翬等　康熙南巡圖　（卷三: 濟南至泰山）　卷|The Kangxi Emperor's Southern Inspection Tour, Scroll Three: Ji'nan to Mount Tai
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting depicts a wide lake with towering mountains, sparse trees, small boats, and birds.
long_description: This horizontal ink wash landscape painting is rendered in shades of black, white, and grey, depicting a vast natural scene. The upper portion of the image features a light grey sky with several groups of small, dark bird-like shapes flying in formation. Below the sky, a range of distant, undulating mountains stretches across the horizon, rendered in lighter grey tones. The central and largest part of the composition is occupied by a wide, calm body of water, appearing light grey. Scattered across the water are numerous small, dark marks arranged in rows, resembling fishing nets or markers. Two small, dark boats, each with a single figure, are visible on the water; one is near the left bank, and another is closer to the towering right mountain. On the left side of the painting, a gentle, sloping bank rises from the water, dotted with sparse trees and a few small, simple buildings with dark roofs. Further left, more dense foliage is visible. The right side of the image is dominated by a massive, rugged mountain range with steep, textured cliffs that extend from the foreground almost to the distant horizon. Darker ink is used to define the craggy surfaces and crevices of these mountains. A winding path, marked by small steps, ascends one of the mountain slopes on the far right, leading up through a cluster of tall, slender trees. In the immediate foreground, particularly on the lower left and center, several bare, gnarled trees with delicate, intricate branches are depicted, adding depth to the scene.

metadata.title: 清  王翬  倣巨然燕文貴山水圖  卷|Landscape in the Style of Juran and Yan Wengui
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A monochrome ink landscape painting depicting mountains, a river, trees, a bridge, and small figures
long_description: The image is a horizontal, monochrome ink painting on a light, off-white background, depicting an expansive landscape. The artwork is rendered primarily in shades of gray and black ink, with varying washes creating depth and texture.In the foreground on the left, several large, ancient-looking trees with thick trunks and dense, textured foliage rise prominently. Their branches extend across the lower left quadrant. Below these trees, a small, low-lying bridge with visible railings crosses a narrow body of water or a path. A tiny, indistinct figure is visible near the base of one of the large trees, appearing to be seated or standing.Towards the center, a wide body of water, possibly a river or lake, stretches horizontally across the middle ground, its surface largely unadorned. On the opposite bank, the land rises into gently sloping hills or mountains, depicted with lighter ink washes that suggest distance and atmospheric perspective. These hills are marked with a grid-like pattern of terraced fields or cultivated plots, some showing small, regularly spaced dots that could represent plants. Above these distant hills, several groups of small, dark bird-like shapes are visible in the sky, suggesting birds in flight.On the right side of the water, another cluster of trees, some with long, drooping branches, grows on a rocky, undulating hillside that descends towards the water's edge. Further to the right, the landscape continues with more subtle hills and a lighter, more ethereal quality, fading into the background. In the upper right corner, a vertical column of dark text, likely calligraphy, is present on a light brown strip, accompanied by several small, square red seals.

metadata.title: 清　吳歷　墨井草堂消夏圖　卷|Whiling Away the Summer at the Ink-Well Thatched Hut
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of a tree with gray leaves and small yellow flowers, alongside vertical black calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal rectangular image featuring a tree and calligraphy on a light, textured background. The left half of the image is dominated by vertical columns of black ink calligraphy. From right to left, the main columns read: "枝上霜氣清林底煙苔", "尊客葉漏金風空增細", "花落何須犯斗樓玲瓏", "閑鶴雲上紫薇秋空插", and "明月". Below these, two smaller columns read: "吟文待詔本壽平" and "丙寅". Below the calligraphy, two red square seals are visible, one above the other. The right half of the image depicts a tree with a light gray trunk and branches. The trunk is on the far left of this section, extending upwards from the bottom edge. A prominent branch extends horizontally to the right, then curves downwards. Clusters of oval-shaped leaves, rendered in a medium gray wash, are attached to the branches. Among the leaves, numerous tiny, bright yellow dots are scattered, suggesting small flowers or berries. Another cluster of leaves and yellow dots appears in the upper right corner, seemingly part of the same tree or a nearby branch. The background is a uniform light beige or off-white, with a subtle, fine texture visible throughout. A single red square seal is located in the bottom right corner of the image.

metadata.title: 清　仿惲壽平　桂花圖　冊頁|Cassia Tree
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A traditional painting features orange and purple chrysanthemums alongside black ink calligraphy.
long_description: A rectangular artwork depicts a floral arrangement and calligraphy on a light, textured background. The right two-thirds of the composition are filled with a vertical cluster of chrysanthemums. At the top right, a large, fully open chrysanthemum displays numerous petals in shades of light orange and yellow. Below it, a slightly smaller, fully open chrysanthemum features petals in light purple and lavender hues. Further down, a smaller, partially open purple chrysanthemum bud and a very small, tightly closed bud are visible. Dark green stems connect the flowers, accompanied by several broad, lobed leaves in varying shades of green, some with darker veins. The left third of the artwork contains vertical columns of black ink calligraphy. The text reads: 獨坐對秋色 石吟霜二華 業折未應者 一露零亂 不因風 菊譜為尚多 紫次之 月令猶稱黃 壽平 丹青姚魏力. Several red seals are present. Two rectangular seals are stacked vertically in the upper right corner, adjacent to the flowers. In the lower left corner, below the calligraphy, two more rectangular seals are stacked vertically, with a smaller square seal positioned directly above this stack. The background is a uniform light cream or off-white, with a subtle, faint patterned border visible along the top and bottom edges of the artwork.

metadata.title: 清   惲壽平 菊花圖  冊頁|Chrysanthemums
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a misty mountainous landscape with a large waterfall, dense trees, and small houses
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting depicts a vast, misty mountain landscape rendered primarily in shades of black, gray, and white, with subtle hints of light brown. The composition is dominated by a towering, craggy mountain peak on the left, its dark, textured surfaces suggesting rugged terrain. A prominent waterfall cascades down the center of this mountain, appearing as a vertical white streak against the darker rock. To the left of the main peak, softer, more distant mountains recede into the background, depicted with lighter ink washes that convey a sense of depth and atmospheric mist. The right side of the painting features a sloping hillside densely covered with trees, their feathery foliage rendered in dark ink, with some light brown visible on their trunks. These trees are concentrated in the mid-ground, partially enveloped by the pervasive mist that fills the valleys and obscures the upper reaches of the mountains. In the lower-center to lower-right foreground, a small cluster of simple buildings with light roofs and dark outlines is nestled at the base of the mountains, near what appears to be a faint path or terraced area. The upper and central portions of the painting are largely unpainted, creating an expansive sky and a strong impression of mist and clouds. In the upper left corner, vertical dark ink calligraphy is present, followed by two square red seals. The calligraphy reads: "茲黃鶴山樵夏" and "昌居真本".

metadata.title: 清　惲壽平　倣宋元山水圖　冊|Landscapes in the manner of Song and Yuan masters
metadata.medium: Album of ten paintings; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A fan painting depicts various flowering plants and foliage with calligraphy and red seals.
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting on a light, off-white background. The composition features a variety of flowering plants and foliage, rendered in watercolor-like washes. In the upper left, a cluster of tall, slender plants with light yellow-orange, feathery blossoms or seed heads rises, accompanied by several broad, pale green leaves. To the right of these, a series of larger, darker green leaves with visible vein patterns extends horizontally across the middle of the fan. Further to the right, in the lower right quadrant, a dense grouping of plants with delicate light pink flowers is depicted. These flowers have five petals and darker pink centers, and are surrounded by numerous small, dark green leaves and thin, light green stems. Scattered throughout the composition are thin, arching blades of light green grass. Black calligraphy is present in the upper left, arranged in vertical lines. Several red square seals are visible: two in the upper center, one directly below the calligraphy, one in the lower left corner, one in the lower right corner, and one positioned just above the pink flowers.

metadata.title: 清　惲壽平　花卉圖　摺扇|Carnations and amaranthus
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; color on paper

alt_text: A vertical painting shows a lush cluster of white, pink, and purple peonies with green leaves on a brown ground
long_description: The vertical painting presents a vibrant botanical scene dominated by a large cluster of peonies and their foliage, set against a warm, muted brown background. The flowers are rendered in various shades, including soft white, delicate light pink, and a deeper lavender-purple, each bloom featuring numerous layered petals that give them a full, rounded appearance. These peonies are distributed across the central and lower two-thirds of the composition, interspersed with a rich array of dark green leaves. Some leaves are clearly defined, while others form denser, shadowy masses that contribute to the lushness of the plant life. Thin, dark branches and stems weave through the foliage, particularly noticeable in the upper right and central sections. In the lower part of the painting, a few slender, dark green, blade-like leaves emerge from the bottom edge, suggesting ground cover. Throughout the lower and central areas, numerous small, dark, dot-like elements, possibly berries or tiny leaves, are depicted, creating intricate textures among the larger plant forms. In the upper left corner, several vertical lines of dark script are visible, accompanied by a small red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal painting depicts a gnarled branch with white blossoms, pink and red camellias, and large white and pink peonies on a tan background.
long_description: The horizontal painting features a variety of flowering plants against a plain, light brown background. On the left, a thick, gnarled branch with dark brown bark extends from the lower left, curving upwards and then downwards towards the center. This branch is adorned with numerous clusters of small white blossoms, each with a yellow center. Below and to the left of this branch, a plant with large, dark green leaves bears several pink flowers, some fully open with visible yellow stamens, and one in bud form. Further to the right and slightly below the white blossoms, a cluster of deep red flowers with yellow centers emerges from a leafy stem. Towards the right side of the composition, a cluster of large, creamy white flowers with multiple petals and green leaves dominates the upper right. Below these, a large, full pink peony with many delicate petals is prominent. Smaller red flowers, similar to those on the left, are also visible among green foliage in the lower right quadrant. The various plants and branches are arranged to fill the majority of the canvas, creating a dense floral arrangement across the light brown ground. The colors are soft and natural, with subtle variations in the green leaves and flower petals.

metadata.title: 清   （傳）惲壽平   百花圖   卷|One Hundred Flowers
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A watercolor painting depicts a large white peony and a smaller red peony with green leaves on a light background
long_description: The artwork is a watercolor painting featuring two peony flowers and their foliage against a plain, light background. A large, fully bloomed white peony dominates the center-right of the composition, its numerous petals layered densely to form a full, rounded shape. The center of this white flower contains a cluster of small, dark stamen. To the lower left, a smaller, partially opened red peony appears, its petals a vibrant reddish-orange hue. Both flowers are connected by thin, light green stems that extend upwards from the bottom edge of the painting. Surrounding the peonies are several broad, ovate leaves, rendered in varying shades of green, from a muted blue-green to a lighter, more yellowish-green. These leaves are clustered around the base of the white peony and extend leftwards towards the red peony. The background is a uniform, light beige or off-white, with subtle variations in tone that suggest a textured paper surface. In the upper left corner, a vertical column of dark characters is visible, with a square red seal positioned directly below the text. The overall impression is one of delicate botanical illustration.

metadata.title: 清   惲冰   花卉圖   册页|Flower Study
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A watercolor painting depicting white flowering plants and light pink roses on a pale background.
long_description: The artwork is a watercolor painting featuring two distinct flowering plants against a light, aged background. On the left, a cluster of delicate white flowers with slender petals and small yellow centers grows upwards. These flowers are arranged on thin, light green stems with elongated, pale green leaves. To the right, a branch of light pink roses extends horizontally. Each rose has multiple layers of soft pink petals. The rose branch features several clusters of dark green, serrated leaves and visible thorns along its stems. The background is a uniform pale beige, showing subtle signs of age with faint discoloration and minor textural variations. In the upper right corner, a vertical column of dark characters is present, with two red square seals positioned directly below the text. The overall composition places the two plant arrangements in the lower half of the square-format image, with ample empty space above them.

metadata.title: 清  惲冰   花卉圖   册页|Flower Study
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Monochrome ink drawing of five figures in a mountainous landscape with trees, clouds, and flowering plants.
long_description: This monochrome ink drawing depicts a mountainous landscape populated by five figures, rendered in varying shades of gray and black on a light background. The composition is broadly divided, with the figures primarily situated in the upper half amidst rocky terrain and sparse vegetation. On the far left, a single bald figure, draped in robes, is positioned on a rocky outcrop, looking towards the right. Below this figure, the landscape descends into a lighter, hazy area that suggests mist or water. In the lower center, another bald, robed figure is seated or kneeling on a hillside, with hands clasped, looking upwards. To the upper right, a group of three figures is depicted. The most prominent of these is a bearded figure, facing left and extending an arm with a pointing gesture. Adjacent to this figure is another bald figure, looking towards the bearded one. A third, partially obscured figure is visible behind them. All figures are drawn with delicate lines, giving them a somewhat ethereal quality. The landscape features undulating hills and mountains, textured with numerous short, parallel strokes and darker washes that define contours and shadows. Sparse trees with bare branches and small clusters of flowers are scattered throughout the scene, particularly in the foreground and along the hillsides. Swirling, undefined areas of lighter wash in the upper background suggest clouds or atmospheric effects. The overall impression is one of a serene, contemplative scene.

metadata.title: 清  石濤 (朱若極)  十六羅漢圖  卷|The Sixteen Luohans
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Monochrome ink landscape with a lone figure on a path, rocky hills, a gnarled tree, and extensive calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a monochrome ink painting on a light-colored ground, divided vertically into a landscape scene on the left and a large block of calligraphy on the right. The landscape depicts a rugged, hilly terrain rendered in varying shades of gray and black ink. In the foreground on the left, a gnarled, leafless tree with twisted branches rises from a rocky outcrop. Its trunk is thick and textured, and its branches extend upwards and outwards. Behind the tree, the ground slopes upwards, forming undulating hills with visible brushstrokes suggesting texture. A narrow path winds through the middle ground, leading towards the upper right. A small, solitary figure, depicted in simple outline, walks along this path, facing away from the viewer. The background consists of lighter, more ethereal washes of ink, suggesting distance and a hazy sky. On the right side of the composition, a substantial column of black ink calligraphy runs vertically from top to bottom, with smaller lines of text at the bottom. Several square and rectangular red seals are stamped throughout the artwork, including on the left side, near the top right of the landscape, and below the main calligraphy block.

metadata.title: 清　石濤　(朱若極)　山水人物圖　冊頁|Landscape with solitary figure
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink painting shows multiple bamboo stalks with dense leaves and calligraphic text on a light background.
long_description: This vertical ink painting features a composition dominated by bamboo rendered in various shades of black and gray ink on a light, off-white background. Multiple bamboo stalks emerge from the bottom of the frame, extending upwards. Some stalks are depicted with darker, more defined lines, while others appear lighter and more ethereal, suggesting depth and layering. The bamboo foliage is dense, with numerous pointed, elongated leaves clustered along the branches. These leaves are painted with varying brushstrokes, creating a sense of movement and texture. On the left side of the painting, approximately in the middle section, a block of vertical calligraphic text is present, rendered in black ink. Below this text, several small, square red seals are visible. At the base of the bamboo, near the bottom right, are several shorter bamboo shoots or clumps of grass, along with dark, rounded shapes that resemble rocks or clumps of earth. The ground area also shows some lighter, more delicate brushstrokes. The overall impression is a monochromatic depiction of a bamboo grove.

metadata.title: 清   石濤 (朱若極)   風雨竹圖   軸|Bamboo in wind and rain
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A person in a small boat on water with distant mountains and reeds, depicted in an ink wash style.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting on light-colored paper depicts a serene landscape scene. In the upper portion, three dark, rounded mountains with misty, lighter bases are visible, suggesting distance. Two small, square red seals with illegible characters are positioned in the upper right corner. Slightly above the horizontal center, a small, dark gray boat with lighter interior details floats on the water. A single figure, dressed in light-colored robes with dark hair tied up, is seated in the boat, leaning forward and appearing to tend to lines or nets extending from the vessel. Subtle, light gray lines around the boat suggest movement on the water. The lower half of the image is dominated by the light-colored water. In the lower right quadrant, a cluster of thin, light gray reeds extends diagonally upwards and to the left. A faint, oval red seal with illegible characters is located in the lower left quadrant. The overall color palette is muted, primarily consisting of shades of gray and black against the light tone of the paper, with small red accents from the seals.

metadata.title: 清 石濤 (朱若極) 歸棹 冊 紙本|Returning Home
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a detailed landscape with mountains, trees, houses, and figures, rendered in ink on tan paper.
long_description: This fan-shaped artwork on tan paper presents a dense, expansive landscape primarily rendered in black ink with subtle blue-grey washes. Numerous mountains and hills dominate the scene, depicted with strong, dark outlines and lighter washes that define their forms; some peaks are pointed, others rounded. Dark, dense clusters of trees, including pines and other deciduous types, cover the slopes and valleys, varying in size and shape. A body of water, possibly a lake or river, is visible in the middle ground and background, appearing as a lighter, unpainted area. Several small, simple buildings with dark roofs and light walls are scattered throughout the landscape, nestled among the trees and hills. Small human figures are visible in the foreground and middle ground, one appearing to walk with a staff, another near a building. The upper right and upper left sections of the fan contain vertical lines of black calligraphic text. Red square seals are visible in the upper left and lower right corners, and another in the lower left.

metadata.title: 清  石濤  (朱若極)  山水圖  扇頁|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold-flecked paper

alt_text: An ink and wash painting shows a multi-story building on a cliff overlooking water, with distant hills and calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink and wash painting on a light-colored ground, depicting a landscape scene. In the upper right quadrant, a block of dark, vertical calligraphy is present, accompanied by a red seal impression. Below this, faint, undulating lines suggest distant hills, topped with small clusters of blue-green trees. The left side of the painting features a multi-story building with a dark, tiered roof, situated on a steep, reddish-brown cliff face. The building's walls are a light reddish-brown. Several small, indistinct figures in light clothing are visible on a terrace or wall near the building, looking towards the right. The cliff is adorned with various trees and foliage in shades of dark green, light green, and blue-green, some appearing as dense clusters and others as thin, vertical lines. The central and right portions of the lower half of the painting are largely open, suggesting a body of water or a vast expanse, marked by faint horizontal lines. In the lower left corner, a red square seal impression is visible, partially obscured by the cliff. A small flock of dark, bird-like shapes flies in a diagonal line across the middle right of the open space. The overall color palette is muted, featuring blues, greens, reddish-browns, and dark grays against the light background.

metadata.title: 清  石濤  (朱若極)  野色圖  冊|Wilderness Colors
metadata.medium: Album of twelve paintings; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink and wash landscape painting depicts towering mountains, lush trees, and a small bridge over a ravine.
long_description: This horizontal ink and wash painting features a mountainous landscape rendered primarily in shades of grey, black, and muted greens, with accents of reddish-brown. The composition is dominated by a series of large, textured mountains that fill most of the frame. On the left, a steep mountain face rises, covered in varied brushstrokes suggesting dense foliage and rock formations. Small clusters of reddish-brown leaves are visible on its upper slopes. Towards the center, a deep ravine or valley separates two large mountain masses, with a small, arched bridge spanning this gap. The mountains on the right are also steep and textured, with numerous trees scattered across their slopes and peaks. These trees have dark, dense foliage, some with reddish-brown accents, and light-colored trunks. The foreground features smaller, rounded hills and rock formations, also covered in sparse vegetation. The background is a lighter, hazy grey, suggesting sky or distant mist. In the upper right corner, there is vertical black text, followed by smaller black text and several red seal impressions. The main vertical text reads: "遊張公洞之圖". Below that, smaller text reads: "清湘石濤". Below the smaller text, there are two red square seals, one above the other. Further down on the right edge, there are two more red seals, one small square and one larger rectangular.

metadata.title: 清  石濤(朱若極)  遊張公洞圖  卷|Outing to Zhang Gong's Grotto
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink and color painting shows a misty mountainous landscape with dense trees, an arched bridge, and small dwellings.
long_description: The vertical painting depicts a dense, misty mountainous landscape rendered primarily in ink washes with touches of color. The upper portion features soft, rounded mountains partially obscured by a light, hazy mist, with several columns of black calligraphic text and red seals occupying the upper right and left sections of the sky. Below the mountains, the terrain slopes downwards, covered in a variety of trees, some with dark, needle-like foliage, others with bare branches, and many displaying reddish-brown or orange leaves, suggesting autumn. A winding path is visible, leading down through the hills. In the mid-ground, a prominent arched bridge, light in color, spans a body of water or a ravine. Near the bridge, a small figure appears to be walking on a path. Densely packed trees, including tall, dark evergreens and deciduous trees with reddish leaves, fill the middle and lower sections of the composition. Several small, traditional-style buildings with dark roofs are nestled among the trees, particularly on the right side of the bridge and in the lower left. The foreground is characterized by rocky outcroppings and thick foliage, continuing the dense, natural environment.

metadata.title: 清 石濤 (朱若極) 秋林人醉圖 軸 紙本|Drunk in Autumn Woods
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two boats on water near a cliff with a white house, distant mountains, and an inscription with red seals.
long_description: The image is a horizontal watercolor painting depicting a waterside landscape. The left two-thirds of the composition are dominated by a body of water, rendered in light gray and blue washes with horizontal lines indicating ripples. Two small boats with orange sails are positioned in the lower left, moving rightward. Each boat contains a single figure. Above the boats, in the upper left corner, is a block of vertical black text, accompanied by two red square seals and one red circular seal. The text reads: "泳詩震澤如大能使 朝似鏡無塵". The right third of the image features a prominent, dark gray and brown cliff face that extends from the bottom edge upwards, curving slightly to the right. On a flat, light brown plateau atop this cliff, a small, white, rectangular house with a dark blue-gray striped roof is situated. A thin, dark pole stands behind the house. To the right of the house, a dark green tree with a visible trunk and branches grows on the cliff edge. Further to the right and behind the house, a larger, dark gray mountain rises, its surface textured with vertical brushstrokes. Another small red seal is visible in the lower right corner. The overall palette is muted, with grays, blues, and browns, accented by the orange sails and red seals.

metadata.title: 清   石濤(朱若極)   尋僊山水圖   冊|Landscapes
metadata.medium: Album of eight leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A monochrome landscape painting shows a textured hill, a bare forest, and two small houses in a valley.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal landscape painting rendered in a monochrome palette of grays, blacks, and light washes, characteristic of ink wash. The composition is divided into distinct planes. In the left foreground, a large, rounded hill or mountain slope rises, depicted with varied brushstrokes creating texture and depth in dark gray and black tones, with lighter gray highlights. Small, dark, irregular shapes suggest sparse foliage along its base and contours. Moving towards the center and right, a dense forest of numerous bare, vertical trees with thin branches covers a sloping hillside, rendered in lighter gray washes. Below this forest, in the midground, two small, simple houses with dark, gabled roofs and light-colored walls are nestled among dark, rocky formations and a few taller, bare trees. The ground around the houses and rocks is a light, flat wash. In the background, faint, hazy mountain peaks emerge from a light, almost white sky, blending into the upper portion of the painting. On the far left, vertical lines of dark text are visible, accompanied by two red square seals at the bottom. On the far right, near the top and bottom, are three more red square seals.

metadata.title: 清  石濤(朱若極)  四季山水圖  冊|Landscapes of the Four Seasons
metadata.medium: Album of eight leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of towering mountains, dense trees, a small building, and a person by a stream
long_description: The vertical ink wash painting depicts a dramatic mountainous landscape rendered in shades of black and gray. The upper two-thirds of the composition are dominated by towering, craggy mountains with steep slopes, heavily textured with dark, jagged brushstrokes suggesting rock formations and dense foliage. Pine trees with distinctive needle clusters are scattered across the peaks and slopes, particularly prominent on the mountain ridges. In the upper left, vertical lines of calligraphic text are visible, accompanied by a red seal. Midway down the painting, nestled among the trees on a gentler slope, is a small, open-sided building with a dark, gabled roof and light-colored pillars, appearing like a pavilion or hut. A winding path or stream seems to lead down from this area. The lower third of the painting features a more open foreground with a body of water, indicated by horizontal wavy lines. On the left side of this water, a lone figure is seated, facing right, dressed in light-colored robes with long hair. More dense pine trees and other foliage fill the lower right and left corners, creating a sense of depth and enclosure. Several red seals are visible in the lower left corner. The overall style uses varied ink tones, from light washes to dark, concentrated strokes, to create depth and texture.

metadata.title: 清  石濤(朱若極)  黃山三十六峰意圖  軸|Thirty-six Peaks of Mount Huang Recollected
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a mountainous landscape with dense trees and a small thatched hut.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting, rendered in black, white, and various shades of gray, depicts a serene mountainous landscape. The upper portion features calligraphic text in the upper right and upper left, accompanied by small red seals. Towering, craggy mountains dominate the background and midground, their peaks and slopes rendered with textured ink washes that suggest rocky formations and dense, dark foliage. Numerous trees, including distinct pine trees with needle-like branches, are scattered across the mountain sides and fill the valleys, creating a sense of depth and lushness. In the lower right, a small, simple hut with a steeply pitched, conical thatched roof is nestled among the trees. Its light-colored walls contrast with the darker surrounding vegetation, and a small, dark opening is visible on its front. The foreground, particularly in the lower left and center, shows sparse, brush-like vegetation and denser bushes. Additional red seals are visible in the lower left and lower right corners of the composition.

metadata.title: 清   石濤  (朱若極)   廬山草堂圖   軸|Hermitage in Mount Lu
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Misty ink wash landscape painting featuring towering mountains, a winding river, and small buildings nestled among trees.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink wash painting on a light, off-white ground, depicting a serene, misty mountain landscape. The upper portion of the painting features several columns of black calligraphic text, accompanied by multiple red seals. The landscape unfolds from top to bottom. In the upper half, large, dark, textured mountains rise, their peaks and slopes partially obscured by soft, pale mist that creates a sense of depth and atmosphere. The mountains are rendered with varying shades of black and gray ink, showing brushwork that suggests rock formations and foliage. Below these larger peaks, the midground reveals smaller, rounded hills and a winding body of water, possibly a river or lake, that flows from the center towards the lower right. Scattered throughout the landscape are clusters of trees, primarily pines, depicted with dark green and black ink, often perched on mountain ledges or lining the water's edge. In the lower right quadrant, a small village or collection of buildings is nestled among the trees and hills beside the water. These structures have distinct reddish-brown tiled roofs and dark walls, contrasting with the muted tones of the landscape. More red seals are visible in the lower left and lower right corners of the painted area. The overall impression is one of a vast, tranquil natural scene enveloped in fog.

metadata.title: 清  石濤(朱若極)  重陽山水圖  軸|Landscape Painted on the Double Ninth Festival
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Monochromatic ink painting of a vast mountainous landscape with trees, a river, and a covered bridge
long_description: The image is a vertical, monochromatic ink painting on light-colored paper, depicting a vast and complex mountainous landscape. The composition is dominated by towering, craggy mountains that rise from the bottom to the top of the frame. In the upper left quadrant, a block of vertical calligraphy in black ink is present, accompanied by two small red seals. The mountains in the upper half are rendered with varied ink washes and textured brushstrokes, suggesting rocky surfaces and sparse vegetation. Wisps of lighter ink suggest mist or clouds around the peaks. As the eye moves down, the mountains become more rounded and densely forested with numerous trees, depicted with darker, more concentrated ink. Winding paths or staircases are visible on several slopes, leading to small, traditional-style buildings nestled among the trees and hills. In the lower half of the painting, a river or stream flows from the middle ground towards the bottom right, widening as it progresses. It is spanned by a covered bridge with a distinct roof structure, located in the lower right quadrant. The foreground features lower, undulating hills covered with trees and foliage. Several prominent, tall trees with slender trunks stand in the lower left and center, contrasting with the smaller, denser foliage elsewhere. Two red seals are visible in the lower left corner, beneath the main body of the landscape. The entire scene is rendered with a range of ink tones, from light washes to deep, dark strokes, creating depth and texture.

metadata.title: 清  王原祁  倣吳鎮山水圖  軸|Landscape after Wu Zhen
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A traditional landscape painting depicts mountains, trees, and water with small buildings and calligraphic text.
long_description: This horizontal landscape painting features a panoramic view of mountains, trees, and water rendered in a traditional style. The color palette primarily consists of various shades of green, brown, and gray for the landforms, with touches of light blue for distant peaks and a cream-colored background. On the far left, a cluster of large, textured mountains rises, covered in dense green foliage and dotted with individual trees. A small, white building with a red roof is nestled among the trees on a lower slope.
