Moving towards the center, the landscape opens into a wide valley or body of water, depicted in lighter, muted tones, with scattered trees along its edges. Further to the right, more mountains emerge, some with distinct blue-tinted peaks, and clusters of dark green trees. In the lower right corner, a few small, simple structures with brown roofs are visible near the water's edge. The upper right quadrant of the painting contains several columns of black calligraphic text and two red seal impressions, positioned against the light background.

metadata.title: 清  王原祁  江國垂綸圖  卷|Fishing in River Country at Blossom Time
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Traditional landscape painting depicting mountains, trees, houses, a river, and a boat with figures
long_description: A wide, horizontal landscape painting depicts a mountainous river scene in a traditional style, rendered with ink and light washes of color. In the background, distant, soft blue-grey mountains rise under a pale, uncolored sky. The midground is dominated by a series of rolling hills and craggy mountains, outlined in dark ink and filled with washes of green, brown, and light grey. Numerous trees, including tall, slender bamboo-like foliage and broader, darker trees, are scattered across the slopes and cluster around structures. Several traditional houses with dark, tiled roofs and light-colored walls are nestled among the trees. A prominent cluster of these buildings is visible in the center-left, surrounded by dense greenery. Another group of houses appears on the right side, with some trees nearby showing reddish-orange leaves. A small, low bridge with a simple railing spans a narrow section of water in the mid-center. The foreground features a body of water, likely a river, flowing from the left towards the right. Its banks are lined with large, rounded rocks, detailed with dark ink lines and light washes. In the lower-center, a small, flat-bottomed boat with two figures glides on the water. One figure stands at the stern, holding a long pole, while the other is seated in the boat. A red, square-shaped seal with dark characters is visible on the right side of the painting, positioned above the houses.

metadata.title: 清    王原祁    輞川圖    卷|Wangchuan Villa
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A fan painting shows a mountainous landscape with trees, a building, a bridge, and calligraphy.
long_description: The image displays a fan-shaped painting on a light, warm beige surface, marked by faint radial lines. On the upper left, several vertical columns of black calligraphic text are visible, accompanied by two square red seals. The central and right portions of the fan are dominated by a detailed landscape. A rugged mountain range, rendered in various shades of gray and black ink washes, stretches across the middle ground. The mountains feature craggy peaks and textured slopes. Numerous trees, depicted with dark, dense foliage and slender trunks, are interspersed throughout the mountainous terrain, some appearing as tall, individual specimens and others as clusters. In the mid-right, a light-colored building with a dark, tiled roof is nestled among the trees and mountains. A small, arched bridge with visible railings extends from the lower right foreground, leading towards the building and spanning a lighter area that suggests water or a valley. Additional rocky formations and trees are present in the lower right, where a small red square seal is also visible. The painting employs traditional ink and wash techniques, creating a serene and detailed natural scene.

metadata.title: 清   倣王原祁  倪雲林筆意山水  扇面|Landscape in the Style of Ni Zan
metadata.date: 18th century or later, spurious date of 1715
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on paper

alt_text: A monochromatic landscape painting featuring mountains, bare trees, a pavilion, a waterfall, and flying birds.
long_description: This vertical monochromatic painting depicts a detailed landscape rendered in various shades of brown. The upper portion of the artwork features a vast expanse of sky, with numerous small birds flying in scattered groups across the left and central areas. A large, steep mountain peak dominates the upper right, its contours defined by darker brown lines. Below this, in the mid-ground, several large, gnarled trees with bare, intricate branches stand prominently, their trunks and limbs forming a central visual anchor. To the left of these trees, a small, multi-tiered pavilion with a curved roof is visible, situated on what appears to be a bridge or elevated structure over water. Below the trees and pavilion, a waterfall cascades down a series of rocky formations, flowing into a stream or river that winds through the lower part of the scene. The foreground is characterized by large, angular rocks, rendered with strong outlines and shading, creating a sense of depth and texture. The entire composition is unified by the consistent use of brown tones, ranging from light sepia to deep umber, which define the forms and create a sense of atmosphere.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A panoramic painting depicts a vast mountainous landscape with numerous traditional buildings and trees under a muted sky.
long_description: The painting is a wide, horizontal composition depicting an expansive mountainous landscape. The color palette is primarily muted, featuring various shades of brown, beige, and light green for the mountains and ground, contrasted with darker greens for trees and vibrant accents of blue, red, and turquoise on the buildings. Starting from the left, the landscape begins with rolling hills and mountains, sparsely covered with dark green trees. A small, multi-tiered building with a red roof and blue details is nestled among the trees in the mid-ground. Further right, a winding path or river meanders through a valley, leading to a cluster of buildings with green roofs and red walls. The central section of the painting is dominated by towering, rugged mountains rendered with textured brushstrokes, suggesting rocky formations. Numerous elaborate structures are integrated into this terrain. One prominent building features a tall, conical green roof with multiple tiers, surrounded by other buildings with similar green roofs and blue or red architectural elements. These structures are often situated on elevated platforms or nestled within valleys, connected by paths or bridges. Towards the right, the mountainous landscape continues, with peaks and valleys receding into the distance. More buildings, consistent in style with those in the center, are visible on slopes and in clearings, characterized by their green roofs and colorful details. Dark green trees are interspersed throughout the entire scene, providing contrast against the lighter mountain surfaces. The far right of the painting shows mountains fading into a lighter, atmospheric background, suggesting depth and distance. In the upper left corner, there is a vertical inscription of characters.

metadata.title: 清   袁江   九成宮圖   屏|The Palace of Nine Perfections
metadata.medium: Set of twelve hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting depicting towering mountains, a wide body of water, and scattered human activity
long_description: An ink wash landscape painting in shades of brown and black, depicting a vast mountainous and watery scene with human elements. The overall tone is muted and monochromatic. In the upper left corner, a block of vertical text, appearing as a column of characters, is followed by two red square seals. A large, craggy mountain range dominates the upper and central right portions of the painting, extending from the top edge down towards the middle. The mountains are rendered with textured brushstrokes, suggesting dense foliage and rocky outcrops. Smaller, softer mountains are visible in the distance on the left. A wide body of water stretches across the middle ground from left to right. Several small boats with sails are visible on the water in the mid-left. A small bridge crosses a narrow part of the water in the lower left. The foreground features various human structures and figures. On the lower right, several buildings with tiled roofs are nestled among trees. A path winds through this area, with small figures walking. Further left, another cluster of buildings, including a multi-story structure, is situated on a lower slope of the mountain. Trees are abundant throughout the foreground and mid-ground. In the mid-right, a group of tall, slender trees stands near a small pavilion. In the mid-left, a multi-tiered pagoda-like structure is visible on a mountain slope overlooking the water. The background on the far left shows distant, hazy landforms. The sky is a light, uniform tone. The entire painting is rendered in varying shades of sepia, brown, and black ink on a light brown or beige paper. The visible text reads: "嘉靖戊戌秋七月望日 吳門文徵明寫" followed by two red seals.

metadata.title: 清  譚嵩  倣郭熙山水圖  軸|Landscape in the Style of Guo Xi
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two long-tailed birds perch on a gnarled flowering branch next to a dark, textured rock formation
long_description: A vertical artwork in grayscale depicts two birds on a flowering branch, set against a light gray background. The artwork is framed by decorative borders: a narrow, patterned dark border at the top and bottom, and wider, lighter patterned borders along the left and right sides. In the center-left, two birds with long, flowing tails and patterned feathers perch on a thick, gnarled branch. The bird on the left faces right, its body slightly obscured by the branch, while the bird on the right faces left, its long tail extending downwards. The branch is covered with numerous small, light-colored flowers, some in clusters, and dark leaves. The branch extends from the lower left towards the upper right, then curves downwards. To the right, a tall, dark, textured rock formation rises vertically, its surface appearing rugged and uneven. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of text are visible. The overall impression is a detailed natural scene with a focus on the birds and flora.

metadata.title: 清  傳沈銓   高堂雙壽圖  軸|Flowering Crabapple and Pair of Birds
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of large, rounded leaves and slender stalks with black calligraphic text.
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting features large, dark leaves and slender stalks against a light, unpainted background, with prominent calligraphy in the upper left. The artwork is rendered in shades of black and gray ink, creating a monochromatic scene. In the upper left quadrant, several columns of black calligraphic characters are arranged vertically, accompanied by two red square seals positioned below the main text block. A third red square seal is visible in the lower right corner. The lower left of the composition is dominated by a large, rounded leaf, depicted with darker ink in its center and lighter tones towards its edges, suggesting a folded or cupped form. To its right, several slender, dark stalks with small, pointed leaves emerge from the bottom edge, extending diagonally upwards. In the upper right, an even larger, rounded leaf is prominently featured, with a thick, dark stem or vein running vertically through its center. This leaf also shows varying shades of gray, indicating depth and form. Behind this large leaf, more slender stalks and small leaves are visible, some extending upwards and others curving downwards. The overall impression is one of natural forms rendered with expressive brushwork.

metadata.title: 清   邊壽民  墨荷蘆葉圖   冊頁|Lotus Leaves and Water Reeds
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on paper

alt_text: Calligraphy above a painting of a large, light-colored rock and a gnarled tree with pink blossoms.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular composition divided into two main sections: an upper section dominated by calligraphic text and a lower section featuring a landscape painting. The top half of the image is filled with vertical columns of black calligraphic text, written from right to left. The characters are rendered in a fluid, brushstroke style. Several red square and rectangular seals are visible, primarily in the lower left portion of the text section. The background of this section is a light, off-white or cream color. The bottom half depicts a landscape scene. A large, light beige or pale yellow rock formation rises prominently on the left, with a rounded, organic shape and subtle shading. To the right of the rock, a substantial, gnarled tree trunk with dark brown and gray tones extends horizontally across the middle ground. Its delicate, intricate branches spread outwards, covered in numerous small, light pink blossoms, creating a soft, cloud-like effect. Some dark green foliage is interspersed among the branches. The ground beneath the tree and rock is depicted with patches of dark green or black stippled foliage, transitioning into a lighter, muted green or gray wash in the foreground. The background behind the tree and rock is a pale, hazy blue-gray wash, suggesting a distant sky or mist. The overall color palette is subdued, with the vibrant pink of the blossoms providing a focal point.

metadata.title: 清  傳高鳳翰  書畫合璧  冊|Landscapes and Calligraphy
metadata.medium: Album of six paintings; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of chrysanthemums growing beside a tall, craggy rock, with extensive calligraphy above.
long_description: A vertical ink painting depicts a tall, craggy rock on the right side, with a cluster of flowering plants to its left and behind it. The rock, rendered in varying shades of grey and black ink, has a generally light body with darker outlines and textured strokes suggesting its irregular, weathered surface. It tapers slightly towards the bottom and has a more defined, darker top edge. To the left of the rock, and extending upwards and outwards, are numerous chrysanthemums with many petals, depicted in various shades of grey and black ink. Their leaves are also rendered in dark ink, creating a dense foliage. Below the rock and plants, sparse blades of grass are visible. The upper right and upper central portions of the painting are filled with extensive black calligraphic text, arranged in vertical columns. Several red seals are present: one small square seal near the top right, a larger rectangular seal below the main body of text on the right, and another small square seal on the left side, roughly centered vertically.

metadata.title: 清　高鳳翰　菊石圖　軸|Chrysanthemums by a rock
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two white peonies with green leaves beside a tall dark rock formation in an ink wash painting.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on a light brown, aged paper background depicts a tall rock formation and two peony plants. On the right side, a large, dark, craggy rock extends from the top edge almost to the bottom. It is rendered in varying shades of dark grey and black, with textured surfaces suggesting crevices and protrusions. Small, irregular dark shapes dot its upper and middle sections. At its base, on the right, is a smaller, dark, rounded rock. On the left side, two large, white, multi-petaled peony flowers with green leaves emerge from the bottom. The upper peony is slightly larger and positioned higher than the lower one. Both flowers feature numerous delicate, overlapping petals, creating a full, rounded appearance. Their stems and broad, lobed leaves are rendered in shades of grey-green, with darker veins visible on some leaves. Two small, dark, irregular rock shapes are on the ground plane in the bottom left. In the upper left corner, a vertical column of black calligraphic text is present, accompanied by two red square seals below it. A smaller, narrower vertical column of black calligraphic text is near the top right edge, with one red square seal below it.

metadata.title: 清   華喦 白芍藥圖   軸|White Peony and Rocks
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of bamboo stalks and branches with pink blossoms and calligraphic text.
long_description: An ink painting on a light beige background depicts bamboo stalks and flowering branches. Several bamboo stalks, rendered in a light blue-green wash with darker nodes, rise from the lower left, curving upwards and to the right across the central area of the composition. Numerous elongated, pointed blue-green leaves cluster along the bamboo stalks, some overlapping. Intertwined with and extending above the bamboo are delicate brown branches bearing clusters of small, light pink blossoms and some buds. These flowering branches originate from the upper left and upper right, weaving through the bamboo foliage. In the upper left quadrant, vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present. A square red seal is positioned directly below the calligraphy. Another square red seal is visible in the lower right corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 清   汪士慎   山水花卉圖   冊|Landscapes and Flowers
metadata.medium: Album of eight paintings; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of bamboo branches with dense leaves and extensive calligraphy on a light, off-white background
long_description: The image is a vertical ink painting on a light, off-white paper. The upper two-thirds of the painting are dominated by dense, vertical lines of black calligraphy, written in a cursive style. The calligraphy begins in the upper right corner and extends downwards and to the left, covering a significant portion of the upper and middle sections of the paper. The characters vary in size and ink intensity, with some appearing darker and more solid, while others are lighter and more translucent. Below and to the left of the calligraphy, a cluster of bamboo branches with numerous leaves extends diagonally upwards from the lower left corner towards the center right. The bamboo is rendered in varying shades of black ink, from deep, opaque black for the main stems and some leaves, to lighter, more translucent washes for other leaves, creating a sense of depth and movement. The branches are depicted with a naturalistic curve, and the leaves are long and slender, overlapping in places to form dense clusters. Two small red square seals are visible in the lower left corner, beneath the bamboo. Another small red seal is visible within the calligraphy in the upper left quadrant.

metadata.title: 清　李鱓　墨竹圖　軸|Ink bamboo
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Two small birds perch on a sparse tree branch, with calligraphic text and red seals on a light background.
long_description: This vertical painting features two small birds perched on a sparse tree branch against a light, plain background. The overall color palette is muted, primarily consisting of grays, browns, and light beige. A slender tree trunk, rendered in dark brown and black, extends upwards along the left side of the composition. Several bare branches, also dark, extend horizontally and diagonally to the right. Some of these branches bear small, light brown or beige leaves or seed pods, clustered in groups. The upper bird is positioned on a thin, upward-reaching branch in the upper-middle section of the painting. It faces towards the right, displaying a light underside and darker back and wings, with a long tail. The lower bird is situated on a thicker branch in the lower-middle section, facing left and looking upwards towards the top bird. It also has a light underside, darker markings, and a long tail. In the upper right quadrant, vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present. Several square red seals are visible: one in the upper left corner, three clustered near the calligraphic text, and two more at the bottom edge of the painting, one on the left and one on the right.

metadata.title: 清　李鱓　 燕柳圖　軸|Swallows
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of a flowering tree branch with extensive calligraphic text on a light background
long_description: The image is a vertical ink painting on a light, aged paper, depicting a flowering tree branch that extends from the lower right to the upper left. The branches are rendered in varying shades of black ink, from dark, thick strokes for the main trunk and larger branches to lighter, thinner lines for the smaller twigs. Numerous small, delicate flowers are scattered along the branches, depicted with light, almost white ink or unpainted paper, suggesting their pale color. The blossoms are clustered in groups, giving a sense of fullness to the branches. In the upper right quadrant, a large block of vertical calligraphic text is present, written in black ink. Below this, a smaller block of vertical calligraphic text appears, also in black ink. Several red seals, square and circular, are visible within and below the text blocks, as well as in the lower left corner of the painting. The background is a uniform, light beige color, providing a stark contrast to the dark ink of the branches and text.

metadata.title: 清　金農　墨梅圖　軸|Blossoming plum
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Black ink painting depicting clusters of orchids or grasses with accompanying calligraphy on a light background.
long_description: The horizontal ink painting features several clusters of dark ink orchids or grasses on a light, unadorned background. In the upper left, a dense cluster of upright, slender leaves rises from the bottom edge, with a few delicate stems extending outwards, each bearing small, dark, bud-like forms. To the right of this, a central, less dense cluster of similar plants appears to sway, with multiple thin stems arching and crossing, also adorned with small, dark buds. Further to the right, another upright cluster of leaves emerges from the bottom, similar to the one on the left but slightly less dense. The brushstrokes vary in intensity, creating a sense of depth and movement within the foliage. In the lower left quadrant, several columns of black ink calligraphy are present, arranged vertically. Below and to the left of the calligraphy, multiple red square seals are stamped, some overlapping.

metadata.title: 清   鄭燮   蘭竹圖   卷|Orchids and bamboo
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of a flowering branch with pink blossoms, bamboo, and a dark rocky formation on a light background.
long_description: A vertical ink painting features a flowering branch, bamboo, and a rocky formation on a light, unpainted background. A dark, gnarled branch extends from the upper right and center, curving downwards and leftwards. It is adorned with numerous small, delicate blossoms, each marked with a tiny pink or reddish dot in its center. Several stalks of bamboo, rendered in varying shades of grey ink, rise vertically on the right side, some appearing behind the flowering branch. Their leaves are depicted with quick, angular brushstrokes. A prominent, dark, and textured rock formation occupies the lower right and extends towards the center. It is rendered with heavy black ink and lighter grey washes, suggesting depth and ruggedness. Some smaller, darker clusters of dots or foliage are visible on the rock's surface. On the left side of the painting, a column of vertical text in black ink is present, with two red square seals positioned below it.

metadata.title: 清　李方膺　梅竹石圖　軸|Bamboo, plum, and rock
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A standing man in a dark green robe and hat, holding a bow, with a quiver of arrows and a sword
long_description: This vertical artwork depicts a standing man against a plain, light tan background. The man is positioned centrally, facing slightly towards the viewer's right, with his gaze directed forward. He wears a dark green, long-sleeved robe with a high collar, cinched at the waist by a dark blue belt adorned with gold-colored, rectangular buckles. On his head is a dark, round hat featuring a small red finial on top and a long, flat, green plume extending horizontally backward from the left side, which has a circular blue and gold motif. The man has a light complexion, a mustache, and a small goatee. In his right hand, he holds a light-colored, strung bow with decorative gold and red accents. Behind his right shoulder, a quiver filled with arrows is visible, featuring red and white fletching. A sword, with a green scabbard and a gold-colored hilt, hangs from his left hip, partially concealed by his robe. He wears dark, possibly black, boots. The light tan background has subtle patterned borders along the left and right edges, and a wider, patterned border at the bottom. At the top of the artwork, a rectangular section of aged, slightly darker tan paper displays multiple columns of vertical script in black ink, with some sections appearing in a different script or style.

metadata.title: 清 佚名 乾隆頭等侍衛占音保像 軸|Portrait of the Imperial Bodyguard Zhanyinbao
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal scroll features a detailed drawing of deer antlers surrounded by red seals and black text
long_description: The image displays a horizontal scroll, predominantly light beige in color, with a central drawing of a pair of deer antlers. The antlers are depicted in shades of gray and brown, showing a detailed, branching structure. They are positioned horizontally across the middle of the scroll, with the base of the antlers, where they would attach to a skull, facing downwards and slightly towards the center. The branches extend upwards and outwards, creating a wide, U-shaped form. To the left of the antlers, there are three red square seals stacked vertically. The top seal is larger, while the two below it are smaller. Each seal contains intricate, stylized characters. To the right of the antlers, a column of black vertical text is present, followed by several more red seals. These seals include a circular one at the top, a rectangular one below it, and two smaller square seals further down. The rightmost section of the scroll features a vertical panel of light gray paper with a subtle, repeating floral or geometric pattern. On this patterned section, a large, prominent red square seal with complex characters is stamped. Further to the right, the scroll continues with plain beige paper, bordered by a thin, light gray line. The entire scroll is framed by a narrow brown border at the top and bottom, with black circular fasteners visible along these edges.

metadata.title: 清 弘曆(乾隆皇帝) 鹿角雙幅 卷|Two Paintings of Deer Antlers
metadata.medium: Two handscrolls; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A wide river scene with multiple boats, a winding river, and a hilly, tree-lined landscape
long_description: This horizontal painting depicts a wide river scene with boats and a detailed landscape. The river, rendered in light brown with numerous small, wavy lines indicating water movement, dominates the lower and central left portions of the image. On the left, two large, multi-sailed boats, resembling junks, are positioned prominently on the river, moving towards the right. These boats feature light green, segmented sails and visible deck structures with small figures. Further to the right on the river, a third, smaller boat with a single mast and a cabin structure is also moving right, with several figures on its deck. The right bank of the river is characterized by a series of rolling hills, colored in various shades of green and light brown. These hills are densely populated with numerous green trees, some with visible root systems. Nestled within the hills are several small, light-colored houses with dark roofs. Winding, light brown paths traverse the hilly terrain. In the mid-ground, several calm, light-colored water bodies or ponds are visible among the hills. The background recedes into a lighter, hazy landscape of distant hills and water, rendered in muted tones of green and gray under a light sky. The overall color palette is soft and earthy, dominated by greens, browns, and light tans.

metadata.title: 清   徐揚等  乾隆南巡圖, 第四卷﹕黃淮交流|The Qianlong Emperor's Southern Inspection Tour, Scroll Four: The Confluence of the Huai and Yellow Rivers (Qianlong nanxun, juan si: Huang Huai jiaoliu)
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk, lacquer box

alt_text: A portrait of a man with a beard and mustache, wearing a hat and an orange robe, against a plain background.
long_description: A vertical portrait depicts a man from the chest up, centered against a plain, light brown fabric background. The artwork is framed by a yellow border with a repeating pattern, visible on the left, right, and bottom edges. The man has a round face with a light skin tone, dark, narrow eyes, a small nose, and full lips. He has a dark, thin mustache and a full goatee that extends into a long, dark beard. He wears a hat with a blue-green band around his head and a yellow top, with a flap of the blue-green fabric extending down the left side of his head. His attire consists of a loose-fitting, long-sleeved robe in a muted orange or reddish-brown color. A lighter-colored collar or inner garment is visible at his neck. His shoulders are slightly turned, and his head faces directly forward. Four vertical characters in black are positioned at the top center of the fabric background. A column of smaller vertical characters in black runs down the left side of the background.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　傳姚文瀚　歷代帝王真像　冊|Portraits of Emperors of Successive Dynasties
metadata.medium: Album of twenty leaves; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochromatic ink painting on a fan depicting a vast mountainous landscape with trees, water, and small buildings
long_description: This monochromatic ink wash painting on a fan depicts a sprawling mountainous landscape. The composition is dominated by a large, central mountain range rendered in varying shades of black and gray ink. The peaks are craggy and textured, with some appearing to recede into a misty background. On the left side, lower hills are covered with a dense array of trees, including both tall, slender pines and broader deciduous trees with bare branches. Small, simple structures with pitched roofs are nestled among the trees and on the mountain slopes. Towards the right, the mountains gradually diminish in height, giving way to a body of water, possibly a river or lake, that stretches into the distance. A small, arched bridge spans this water. The far bank of the water is lined with more trees, depicted with lighter, softer brushstrokes, suggesting distance. In the lower right foreground, a solitary building with a pitched roof is visible. The painting utilizes a range of ink tones, from deep blacks for foreground elements and mountain contours to lighter grays for distant features and atmospheric effects. Two red square seals and a vertical column of characters are present in the lower right, and one red square seal is in the lower left.

metadata.title: 清　王宸　清溪柳橋圖　摺扇|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Traditional building with figures in a misty, tree-covered landscape, rendered in ink wash.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a traditional building situated within a misty, mountainous landscape. The central building features a dark, multi-tiered tiled roof and light-colored walls, with an open front revealing a warm, light brown interior. Inside, small, indistinct figures are visible. A set of steps ascends towards the building from the lower left. Above the building, several bare tree branches extend into a hazy, light grey background. To the right, a steep incline is densely covered with numerous tall, slender trees, predominantly bare, though some exhibit sparse, dark foliage. A wooden structure, possibly a walkway or bridge, is partially visible among these trees on the right. In the lower left quadrant, a cluster of dark green pine trees stands prominently. Below the central building, more dark tiled roofs and misty forms suggest additional structures or terrain. The artwork is rendered primarily in shades of black, grey, and white, with subtle ochre tones highlighting the interior of the central building. The lower left corner contains vertical lines of black text and a red square seal, and another red square seal is present in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: 清　羅聘　篠園飲酒圖　軸|Drinking in the Bamboo Garden on the Lantern Festival
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A gold folding fan features painted white and pink flowers, green leaves, and red botanical accents on its pleated surface.
long_description: The image displays an open folding fan, fanned into a wide semi-circular shape against a plain, light gray background. The fan's primary surface is a lustrous gold, exhibiting a pleated texture that creates a pattern of vertical stripes with varying light reflections. Adorning this gold ground is a detailed botanical painting. Clusters of large, multi-petaled flowers are visible, some rendered in soft white and others in delicate pink hues. These blossoms are interspersed with numerous green leaves of diverse forms, from broad, rounded shapes to more slender, pointed ones, all depicted with subtle tonal variations. Thin, dark lines representing branches or stems weave through the foliage. Additionally, smaller, bright red, star-shaped or abstract floral elements are scattered among the green and floral motifs. The lower section of the fan reveals its structural components: a series of thin, dark brown wooden ribs that fan out from a central pivot point. The two thicker, dark brown guard sticks on the outer edges are embellished with small, irregularly shaped, iridescent white inlays, likely mother-of-pearl. A small, round, light-colored bead or pin secures the pivot at the bottom center of the fan.

metadata.title: 清  佚名  夏花圖  扇|Summer Flowers
metadata.medium: Folding fan; ink and color on gold paper with bamboo frame inlaid with mother-of-pearl, ivory and jade

alt_text: A light brown fan painting features black calligraphy on the left and black bamboo branches on the right.
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting on light brown paper. The surface is divided into two main visual areas. On the left, several vertical columns of black ink calligraphy are arranged, filling approximately two-thirds of the fan's width. The characters are rendered with varying stroke thicknesses and a fluid, expressive style. Interspersed among the calligraphy, particularly in the upper central and lower left portions, are multiple small, square red seals. On the right side, a cluster of black ink bamboo branches and leaves extends from the right edge towards the center. The bamboo stalks are slender, and the leaves are depicted with dark, sweeping brushstrokes, some overlapping. A single red square seal is visible in the lower right corner, beneath the bamboo foliage. The paper shows subtle vertical lines, possibly from its manufacturing process.

metadata.title: 明　朱鷺　墨竹詩畫　摺扇|Bamboo and poem
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on gold-flecked paper

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting depicts mountains, pine trees, a small pavilion, a figure, and birds in flight.
long_description:
The ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape rendered in shades of black, gray, and white on a light-colored ground. The composition is divided diagonally, with a prominent cluster of tall pine trees on a rocky outcrop in the lower-left to mid-left. The trees have dark, textured trunks and sparse, needle-like foliage. To the left of the trees, a figure in a long robe with a conical hat walks along a path, facing right. Further left, a steep, light-gray mountain slope rises.

In the upper-left quadrant, several lines of vertical text in black ink are visible, accompanied by multiple red square seals. The text reads: "寒山萬里曾 少少道邊 松雲花一徑 斜陽在樂間 天外幕半窗 儂前石福走 他似忽先 權德輿見牧" Below this, there are two more red seals.

In the mid-right, a small, open-sided pavilion with a peaked roof sits on a rocky promontory. Beyond the pavilion, a body of water or mist extends towards a range of distant, softly rendered mountains that stretch across the upper-right background. A line of small, dark birds flies in a diagonal formation across the sky above the water, moving from left to right. The overall impression is one of depth and tranquility.

metadata.title: 清  潘思牧  山水  冊頁八開|Landscapes
metadata.medium: Album of eight leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink drawing of a hunched figure wearing a large woven hat, holding a staff, with calligraphy above.
long_description: The image is a vertical ink painting on light-colored paper, featuring a single figure and calligraphy. In the upper right quadrant, a column of large, bold black calligraphic characters descends vertically, ending with two small red square seals. Below the calligraphy, occupying the lower half of the scroll, is a simply rendered figure in black ink. The figure is depicted in a hunched or seated position, facing slightly to the left, with a large, round, woven hat covering the head and upper back. The hat has a distinct grid pattern. The figure's face, visible beneath the hat, shows a prominent nose and a dark, possibly bearded, chin. Long, flowing robes are indicated with broad, sweeping brushstrokes, obscuring the body. The figure's hands are clasped together near the waist, holding a long, thin staff that extends diagonally downwards to the lower right corner of the composition, where it ends in a small, dark foot-like shape. To the left of the figure's lower body, a small, rounded, dark object rests on the ground. A small red square seal is also visible in the lower left corner. The background is a plain, light, unadorned surface.

metadata.title: 清  蘇仁山  李凝陽像  軸|The Immortal Li Tieguai
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting with misty mountains, bare trees, a winding path, and calligraphic text
long_description: A horizontal ink wash painting depicts a serene, misty landscape primarily in shades of gray and black, with subtle hints of pale blue-green in the distant mountains. The upper left quadrant features a vertical column of black calligraphic text, followed by a red square seal at its base. The background is dominated by several layers of softly rendered, rounded mountains that recede into a hazy distance, created with light ink washes and the aforementioned pale blue-green tones. In the midground, a cluster of bare, gnarled trees with drooping, intricate branches occupies the left and central areas. These trees are rendered with darker, more defined ink strokes, suggesting texture in their trunks and branches. To the right of these trees, a low, winding path or bridge, also rendered in dark ink, crosses a flat, marshy area indicated by numerous short, vertical ink strokes. Further to the right and slightly uphill, more clusters of smaller, similarly bare trees are visible. The foreground consists of open, light-toned ground, providing a sense of depth to the scene. The visible text reads: 西湖山行石玉紫峯年不九里四疊中高祀南奔出第二橋造御亭捐

metadata.title: 清   戴熙   山水圖  冊|Landscapes
metadata.medium: Album of eight paintings; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a pink flower, green leaves, and a spiky plant in a pot with text
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting on a light tan, speckled background. On the left, a large pink flower with numerous petals is depicted, partially open. It is surrounded by several green leaves of varying sizes and brown stems, with a few smaller, reddish-brown buds visible. To the right of the pink flower, a dense, dark green, spiky plant sits within a dark gray, irregularly shaped pot or rock formation. The spiky plant has a rounded form with numerous sharp, needle-like projections. In the upper right portion of the fan, vertical black calligraphic text is present. Below this text and slightly to its left, a small red square seal is visible. Another red square seal is located in the lower right corner of the painting. The overall color palette includes shades of pink, various greens, browns, dark gray, black, and red.

metadata.title: 清  任熊   牡丹  扇面|Peony
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold-flecked paper

alt_text: Ink painting on a fan-shaped paper depicting a flowering branch with calligraphic text and red seals
long_description: The artwork is painted on a light beige, fan-shaped paper. A gnarled branch, rendered in dark ink washes, extends from the lower left quadrant, curving upwards and then downwards towards the lower right. Along the branch, clusters of flowers are depicted using lighter gray ink, with darker ink for their centers and some smaller buds. The flowers are concentrated in the upper left and central portions of the branch. In the upper right quadrant, several vertical lines of black calligraphic text are visible. Above this text, a rectangular red seal is stamped. Another smaller, square red seal is located in the lower right corner of the fan, beneath the end of the flowering branch.

metadata.title: 清  吳熙載  杏花  扇面|Apricot
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: Ink painting on a fan depicting a small bird perched on a leafy branch with black calligraphy and red seals
long_description: The artwork is an ink painting on a light-toned, fan-shaped piece of paper. The composition features a prominent branch extending diagonally from the upper right towards the lower left, with a smaller branch extending further left. Numerous leaves, rendered in various shades of gray and black ink with hints of reddish-brown, hang from these branches. The leaves are elongated and appear to be in clusters. A small, dark-feathered bird with a short beak is perched on the main branch in the upper left quadrant, facing right. Its body is mostly dark gray, with lighter tones on its belly. Above and to the left of the bird, black ink calligraphy is arranged in vertical lines. Below the calligraphy, a square red seal is visible. Another smaller, square red seal is located in the lower right corner of the fan. The background is a uniform, light beige color, providing a stark contrast to the darker ink work. The overall impression is one of delicate brushwork and a natural scene.

metadata.title: 清  吳熙載  蟬柳  扇面|Cicada
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicting a river winding through mountains with trees and a small boat
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a serene landscape rendered in ink and light colors on an off-white ground. The upper portion features a large, rounded mountain peak, primarily in light green and grey washes with dark ink outlines and accents. To its right, smaller, more distant mountains appear in soft blue-grey hues. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of black calligraphic text are visible, reading "竹雨溪山九日圖" followed by smaller characters and a red square seal mark. As the eye moves down, the landscape transitions to a river winding through hills. The left bank is steep, covered with trees, some with dense, dark green foliage, and others with bare, reddish-brown branches. The right bank slopes gently, also dotted with trees. The river, rendered in light grey washes, flows from the upper right, widening as it descends towards the bottom of the composition. In the lower half of the painting, a narrow boat with three small figures is positioned in the middle of the river, slightly to the right of center. The figures are simply depicted, wearing light-colored garments, with one appearing to be poling the boat. Several dark, rounded rocks are scattered in the river in the lower left foreground. The water shows subtle ink lines suggesting gentle currents. A red square seal mark is also present in the lower left corner.

metadata.title: 清  吳熙載  山水  軸|Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink and color painting on a fan showing a large light flower, pink blossoms, and dark leaves on a branch with calligraphy
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting on a light, textured background. The composition features botanical elements arranged across the fan's surface. On the far left, a large, light-colored flower, possibly a peony or chrysanthemum, is depicted with delicate, dark outlines and subtle shading. To its right and slightly above, a cluster of large, dark grey-green leaves with visible veins dominates the central area. These leaves appear to be attached to a branch that extends horizontally from the upper left towards the right. Along this branch, several clusters of smaller, light pink blossoms with darker centers are visible. These blossoms are scattered across the middle and right portions of the fan. The branch itself is rendered in dark tones, showing some texture. In the upper right section, multiple vertical lines of black calligraphy are present, angled slightly downwards towards the right edge. Below the calligraphy, a small, square red seal is visible. Another, larger red seal is located at the bottom left corner of the fan. The overall color palette is muted, with soft pinks, dark greens, and black ink against the light background.

metadata.title: 清  趙之謙  芍藥 桃花  扇面|Peach Blossoms and Peony
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold-flecked paper

alt_text: A standing man in a light blue robe with a bald head, mustache, and goatee, beneath vertical calligraphy
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll featuring a full-length portrait of a man positioned in the lower half, beneath a large block of vertical calligraphy. The background is a plain, light-colored surface. The man stands facing forward, with his head slightly turned to his right. He has a bald head, a dark mustache, and a dark goatee. He wears a long, light blue robe with wide sleeves that extend to his ankles. The robe features a dark collar and dark cuffs. His right hand is slightly raised, holding a string of white beads. His left hand is mostly obscured, tucked into his left sleeve. He wears dark, pointed shoes. Above the man, in the upper left portion of the scroll, is a substantial block of vertical text written in black calligraphic script. Below this main text, to its right, is a smaller vertical inscription accompanied by two red square seals. In the lower right corner of the scroll, another vertical inscription and two red square seals are visible.

metadata.title: 清  王緣  趙之謙肖像  軸|Portrait of Zhao Zhiqian
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a mountainous landscape with bare trees, a small building, and calligraphy.
long_description: This fan-shaped painting features a monochromatic landscape with accents of reddish-brown. The composition is dominated by towering, rugged mountains rendered in shades of gray and black ink, with visible vertical brushstrokes suggesting texture and form. On the far left, a multi-tiered structure, possibly a bridge or building, is nestled against the base of a large mountain, its dark vertical supports visible. Throughout the mid-ground, numerous deciduous trees with dark, intricate branches and small, reddish-brown leaves or buds are scattered among the rocks and lower mountain slopes. The mountains recede into the background on the right, becoming lighter in tone. In the upper right quadrant, several columns of black calligraphic text are present, accompanied by two small, square red seals. Another small, square red seal is visible in the lower right corner of the painted area.

metadata.title: 清  胡遠  山水  扇面|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: A fan painting shows a mountainous landscape with bare trees, a small hut, and a boat on water, with calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a fan painting, presented in a semi-circular format, depicting a mountainous landscape, likely in winter or early spring. The color palette is muted, dominated by shades of brown, gray, and black, with touches of reddish-brown and light blue-gray, all on a light, speckled background. The upper and central portions of the painting are filled with towering, rounded mountains and hills, rendered in varying shades of gray and brown. Darker ink washes define crevices and shadows, and visible brushstrokes create texture on the rocky surfaces. In the mid-ground, numerous bare trees with intricate, skeletal branches in reddish-brown and dark brown hues are scattered across the hillsides. Some areas show denser clusters of darker, more solid tree forms. Towards the center-right, nestled among the trees and at the base of a hill, is a small, two-story building with a dark, gabled roof and light-colored walls. To its right, a body of water, depicted in light blue-gray, extends across the lower right quadrant. A small, flat-bottomed boat with two dark, indistinct figures glides on this water. Further mountains recede into the distance on the far right. In the upper right quadrant, vertical lines of black calligraphy are present, accompanied by a small, square red seal positioned below the text. Another, larger rectangular red seal is visible in the bottom left corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 清  胡遠  山水  扇面|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold-flecked paper

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a large white flower with dark leaves and a smaller pink flower on a gold background.
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting with a shimmering gold background, featuring visible vertical lines that suggest the pleats of a folded fan. The main subject is a large, light-colored flower, likely white or pale yellow, positioned in the right-center. This flower has multiple layers of petals, with a darker, possibly reddish, center. Surrounding the large flower are several broad leaves, painted in dark gray or black ink with visible brushstrokes, some appearing to overlap. Extending from the upper left of the main flower, a slender stem curves upwards and to the left, bearing a smaller, reddish-pink flower or bud. This stem also has a few narrow, elongated reddish leaves. In the upper right quadrant of the fan, there is a column of dark, vertical script, followed by a shorter column of similar script. Below this text, two square red seals are visible. A single square red seal is also present in the lower left corner of the fan.

metadata.title: 清  胡遠  芍藥  扇面|Herbaceous Peony
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold paper

alt_text: A circular painting depicts a frog leaping towards red and blue flowers with green leaves and Chinese calligraphy
long_description: This circular painting features a frog and various flowering plants on a light, plain background. A greenish-brown frog with prominent yellow eyes is positioned in the lower-center, its limbs outstretched as if in motion. A thin red string is tied around its right hind leg. To the left, a dark branch extends horizontally, bearing several vibrant red flowers with multiple petals and dark centers, along with smaller yellow buds and green leaves. In the upper right, a cluster of blue and purple flowers with long, slender green leaves emerges from a light-colored, textured form, possibly a rock or root. The blue flowers are larger and more open, while the purple ones are smaller and more tightly clustered. In the upper left quadrant, vertical black calligraphy is present, reading '忘苑華八八字 憶老八子祥張', accompanied by two red square seals. The background of the circular composition is a uniform, light beige color.

metadata.title: 清  張熊  蟾蜍  團扇|Flower and Toad
metadata.medium: Circular fan-shaped album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A traditional landscape painting depicting mountains, swirling clouds, various trees, and traditional buildings by water
long_description: This horizontal landscape painting features a serene natural scene rendered in a muted palette of greens, blues, and browns on a light, almost beige, background. In the upper left corner, several lines of black Chinese characters are visible, reading "暮雲春樹圖" followed by "丁丑春日寫於滬上之百生". Below these characters are two red square seals. The upper half of the painting is dominated by a series of large, textured mountains with rounded and pointed peaks, depicted in shades of green and blue-grey. Swirling white clouds or mist are nestled between these mountain ranges, creating a sense of depth. Further in the distance, fainter, lighter blue mountains recede towards the horizon. In the mid-ground, a wide expanse of water or flat land stretches towards the right, bordered by lower, undulating hills and sparse trees. The foreground, on the left, features a cluster of trees with varying foliage, some appearing bare-branched while others have denser leaves. To the right of these trees, a group of traditional-style buildings with dark, gabled roofs and light-colored walls are nestled near the water's edge. Several weeping willow trees with long, drooping branches are prominent around the buildings and along the bank. Rocky outcrops and textured ground define the immediate foreground. The overall composition creates a layered perspective, moving from detailed foreground elements to expansive background vistas.

metadata.title: 清  張熊  山水  冊頁|Landscape
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A bird, a gourd, and a tool with a string on a speckled, fan-shaped surface with calligraphy and red seals
long_description: This artwork is presented on a fan-shaped surface with a light, speckled background. The composition features a bird, a gourd, and a tool connected by a string. On the right side, a bird faces left, depicted with a black head, a white ring around its eye, and a small white patch below its beak. Its body is light gray, transitioning to black and white on its wings, and a dark brown tail. Its orange-yellow feet are visible, appearing to grasp the string. A reddish-brown string extends from the bird's neck or chest area, looping downwards and then stretching horizontally towards the left. In the center of the image, a light brown, double-lobed gourd lies horizontally. Further to the left, a black, pointed tool is depicted. This tool has a large, open black loop at its left end, and its shaft is wrapped with reddish-brown string near the loop. The string from the bird is tied to this wrapped section of the tool. In the upper left quadrant, vertical lines of black calligraphy are present, accompanied by a small red square seal directly below the text. Two additional red square seals are visible: one in the bottom right corner and another in the bottom left corner.

metadata.title: 清  居巢  鳥圖  扇面|Bird
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold-flecked  paper

alt_text: A man with a long beard and staff sits under a bare tree on a fan-shaped painting with calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting, wider than it is tall, with a light, off-white background. The surface is vertically ribbed, suggesting the structure of a fan. On the right side, a man is depicted sitting, facing left. He has a long, dark beard and wears a light-colored robe with darker gray accents, possibly a belt or sash. A dark, pointed hat sits on his head. He holds a long, dark staff in his right hand, which extends diagonally upwards. His left hand appears to be holding a small, dark object. To the left of the man, a large, bare tree trunk rises vertically, with numerous thin, leafless branches extending outwards, primarily to the left and upwards. The tree is painted in shades of gray and light brown washes. Behind the man and the tree, faint, thin red lines crisscross the background, appearing to be part of the fan's structure or a subtle design element. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of dark calligraphy are present, accompanied by two square red seals. Another smaller red seal is visible in the lower right corner. The overall color palette is muted, dominated by light grays, browns, and off-white.

metadata.title: 清  任薰  高士臨風  扇面|Scholar in the Wind
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: A small, light brown bird with a long tail looks down at pink blossoms on a branch.
long_description: This is a fan-shaped painting featuring a bird and a flowering branch on a light background. The artwork is wider than it is tall, with a curved top edge and a straight bottom edge, though the very bottom center is cut off. On the left side, a small, light brown bird with a long, slender tail is depicted. Its head is tilted downwards, and its beak appears to be near a cluster of pink blossoms. The bird's body is a mottled light brown, with darker brown feathers on its wings and a lighter, almost beige, long tail. To the right of the bird, a branch extends horizontally across the middle of the painting. This branch is adorned with numerous light pink flowers, some fully open with visible stamens, and others in bud form. The flowers have delicate petals and are interspersed with green and bluish-green leaves. The branch itself is thin and dark, with smaller twigs extending from it. More leaves and a few blossoms are visible below the main branch, near the bottom left. The background is a pale, off-white or very light beige color, with faint vertical lines suggesting the folds of a fan. In the upper left corner, there are several columns of black calligraphic text, and below them, two small red square seals are visible.

metadata.title: 清  任薰   海棠小鳥  扇面|Bird on a Rock by a Flowering Branch
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a person on a bridge looking at bare trees on a rocky bank.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on light brown paper depicts a monochromatic landscape scene. In the upper left, several vertical lines of black script are visible, followed by a square red seal. A small figure, seen from behind, stands on a wooden bridge in the mid-left. The figure wears a light-colored robe and has dark hair tied up. The bridge, constructed from planks and supported by vertical posts, curves gently upwards, spanning a gap over what appears to be a rocky ravine or flowing water, indicated by dark, swirling brushstrokes. To the left of the bridge, faint, undulating hills recede into the distance. The right side of the painting is dominated by a dense cluster of tall, bare trees with numerous thin, upward-reaching branches. These trees are rendered with varying shades of black ink, creating a sense of depth and texture, and they rise from a rugged, rocky bank. Two square red seals are placed in the bottom right corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: 清  任頤  軸|Man on a Bridge
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on bark paper

alt_text: A person rides a water buffalo through tall grasses and water, with rocks in the foreground
long_description: This fan-shaped ink wash painting depicts a pastoral scene with a person riding a water buffalo. The artwork is rendered in shades of black, grey, and pale blue-green on a light, off-white background. In the central right portion of the image, a dark-colored water buffalo is partially submerged in water, facing towards the right. A small figure, possibly a child, is seated on the buffalo's back, wearing light-colored clothing and holding a thin line or stick that extends forward. Ripples are visible in the water around the buffalo, suggesting movement. To the left and behind the buffalo, dense clumps of tall, pale blue-green grasses rise from the water, extending across the mid-ground. In the bottom left foreground, several dark grey and black rocks are visible, some partially submerged, with smaller dark shapes scattered nearby. More sparse, pale blue-green grasses appear in the upper right background. Black calligraphic text is present at the top center of the fan, accompanied by two small red square seals. A single red square seal is also visible in the bottom left corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 清  任頤  童子水牛  扇面|Herdboy and Buffalo
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: Two fluffy brown birds perch on a thorny rose branch with pink roses and green leaves, beside a bamboo stalk.
long_description: A vertical painting depicts two small, round-bodied birds perched on a thorny branch amidst a rose bush and a bamboo stalk, set against a plain, light tan background. In the upper center, two birds with light brown, fluffy feathers and dark, beady eyes are positioned. The bird on the left faces forward, while the bird on the right faces left, looking towards the first bird. Both have short beaks and long tails. Below and around the birds, a rose bush with light pink, multi-petaled roses in various stages of bloom and green leaves extends across the lower half and right side of the painting. The rose branches are brown and covered in small, sharp thorns. Some of the green leaves show small holes, suggesting insect damage. To the left of the birds, a tall, segmented bamboo stalk rises vertically, with a few green leaves emerging from its nodes. In the upper right corner, a column of black calligraphic text is visible, with a square red seal directly below it. Another square red seal is located in the lower left corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 清  任頤  冊頁|Two Birds Perched on a Flowering Rose Bush
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two white cats play among chrysanthemums and bamboo, with butterflies flying above them.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a scene with two cats, chrysanthemums, bamboo, and butterflies on a light, uncolored background. In the upper left, a large cluster of chrysanthemums features light green-white petals and dark gray-green leaves, with stems extending downwards. Several light brown butterflies with darker markings are scattered across the upper and middle sections of the painting, appearing to fly around the chrysanthemums. In the upper right, vertical lines of black calligraphy are present, reading from top to bottom: "華蝶戲貓圖", "庚辰秋月", and "香山居士". Below the calligraphy are two small red square seals and one rectangular red seal. The lower half of the painting features two white cats. The cat on the left faces right, with its body outlined in light brown and some light brown spots. Its right paw is raised, and its left paw is on the ground. The cat on the right is positioned slightly behind and to the right of the first cat, facing left, with its head turned towards the left cat. Both cats have yellow eyes with black pupils and appear fluffy, with their bodies outlined in light brown and some light brown spots. Behind the cats, a light brown and gray fence-like structure or bamboo stalks are visible. In the lower right, several stalks of bamboo with dark green-blue leaves grow upwards. A small red square seal is located in the bottom left corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: 清  虛谷  蝶貓圖  軸|Cat and Butterfly
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink and wash painting depicts a serene landscape with traditional buildings, colorful trees, and a boat on water.
long_description: A horizontal ink and wash painting depicts a tranquil landscape scene. The composition is divided horizontally by a body of water, likely a river or lake, running across the middle ground. In the upper half, on the far bank, a cluster of traditional-style buildings with dark, sloping roofs and reddish-brown walls is visible. These structures are nestled among numerous trees, rendered with dark, calligraphic strokes for trunks and branches, and soft washes of muted blue-green and reddish-orange for foliage. The water itself is suggested by horizontal strokes of dark grey and black ink. In the lower half of the painting, closer to the viewer, a dense array of trees and brush occupies the foreground. These trees exhibit similar characteristics to those in the background, with dark branches and foliage in washes of blue-green and reddish-orange. Towards the center-right of the foreground, a boat with a distinctive, tall, slatted sail structure is depicted. The boat itself is dark, while its sail is a lighter tan or light brown, marked with several horizontal dark lines. In the upper left corner, there is a section of dark calligraphy and two red square seals. Another red square seal is present on the right edge of the painting, near the middle height.

metadata.title: 清 虛谷  秋帆圖  冊頁|Sailing in Autumn
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A dark, furry animal rests on a branch with pink leaves on a fan painting
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting on a light, possibly off-white, background. The central subject is a large, dark, furry animal, rendered with dense, short, black and gray brushstrokes, creating a textured, somewhat spherical form. Two lighter, oval-shaped areas are visible on its head, suggesting eyes or highlights. The animal appears to be resting or sleeping, positioned in the upper center of the fan. It is perched on a network of dark, angular branches that extend horizontally across the lower half of the painting. These branches are painted with varying thickness and appear to be bare in some sections. Scattered among the branches are several broad, light pink or reddish-pink shapes, resembling leaves or petals, rendered with soft, translucent washes. Some of these shapes are clustered, while others are more isolated. In the lower left quadrant, there is dark, vertical calligraphic text, followed by two square red seals. Another square red seal is visible in the lower right corner. The fan's underlying radial lines are faintly visible through the painted surface.

metadata.title: 清  虛谷  松鼠  扇面|Squirrel on an Autumn Branch
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: Ink painting of a black and white cat-like animal on a rock, with calligraphy above
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll featuring an animal perched on a rock, with extensive calligraphy above. The animal, resembling a cat or lemur, is positioned in the lower half, facing right with its head turned upwards and slightly to the left. Its fur is predominantly white, with distinct black markings on its head, ears, and a thick band across its lower back and tail. Its eyes are yellow. The animal's front paws are visible, gripping the textured surface of the rock. The rock, rendered in shades of grey and black ink washes with some darker lines, occupies the lower right portion of the image, providing a stable base for the animal. Above the animal, the upper half of the scroll is filled with dense, vertical lines of black ink calligraphy, covering approximately two-thirds of the upper section. The background is a plain, light beige paper, and the entire composition is framed by a decorative border with a subtle pattern.

metadata.title: 清  王禮  狸奴圖  軸|Cat
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a small red-robed figure seated among towering gray mountains and a waterfall
long_description:
This tall, narrow ink wash painting features a dramatic mountainous landscape rendered primarily in shades of black, gray, and white, with accents of red and green. Towering, jagged mountains dominate the composition, their peaks and slopes textured with dark brushstrokes and highlighted with areas of white, suggesting snow or mist. A deep, narrow chasm or valley runs vertically through the center, opening up slightly towards the bottom.

In the lower middle section, on the right side of the valley, a small figure is seated on a rocky outcrop. The figure wears a vibrant red robe and faces towards the left. Below the figure, a waterfall cascades down, depicted with white and light gray brushstrokes, flowing into a body of water that extends across the lower portion of the painting. Along the banks of this water, and near the waterfall, are patches of green, textured foliage or moss. On the left side of the painting, a vertical inscription in black characters is visible, with a small red seal below it.

metadata.title: 清  任預  石室參禪圖  軸|Meditation in a Cave
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting on a fan depicting mountains, trees, a river, and buildings with calligraphy
long_description: An ink wash landscape painting on a fan-shaped surface depicts a mountainous scene with a river and trees. The painting is rendered primarily in black ink on a light, off-white background, with faint vertical lines of the fan's structure visible beneath the artwork. Large, textured mountains dominate the central and upper portions of the composition, rendered with varied brushstrokes that suggest rocky formations and contours. A cluster of dark trees covers the slopes of the mountains, particularly dense on a plateau towards the upper left where small, light-colored buildings are nestled. A river flows horizontally across the lower-middle section of the painting, winding through the landscape. More trees are visible along the riverbanks and in the lower left foreground. In the upper left corner, there is a block of vertical calligraphy in black ink, accompanied by two square red seals placed below and to the left of the text. A smaller, single red square seal is also present in the lower left corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 清  吳大澂  山水  扇面|Fragrant Mountains
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on alum paper

alt_text: Ink and light color painting on a fan depicting multiple figures in a dense, rocky, and tree-filled mountainous landscape.
long_description: This fan-shaped painting, rendered in ink and light colors on a pale background, depicts a lively scene within a rugged mountainous landscape. The composition is dense, with jagged rocks and gnarled trees dominating the central and right portions of the fan. The trees, possibly pines, feature dark, textured trunks and branches with lighter foliage. Several figures are integrated into the landscape. On the far right, a prominent figure in light reddish-brown robes appears to be seated or leaning, surrounded by other less distinct figures. To their left, another group of figures is visible amidst the rocks and trees, some appearing to stand or walk. The brushwork is fluid, creating a sense of movement and depth through varying shades of gray and black ink wash, with subtle hints of color on the figures. The upper left section of the fan contains black ink calligraphy arranged in vertical lines, followed by a small red seal. Another, larger red seal is present in the lower right corner of the painted area. The overall impression is of a gathering or journey taking place within a wild, natural setting.

metadata.title: 清   沙馥   桃李芳園圖   摺扇|The Peach and Plum Garden
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: A fan-shaped painting features white blossoms on dark branches against a light background, with calligraphy.
long_description: The image presents a fan-shaped painting, wider at the top and curving inward towards the bottom. The background is a light, muted blue-gray, with subtle vertical lines suggesting the structure of a fan. Across the central and right areas, a dense network of dark, gnarled branches is depicted, covered in numerous small, white blossoms. The flowers are rendered with delicate white petals, some appearing as tight clusters, others as individual blooms, creating a rich, textured pattern that fills much of the fan's surface. In the upper left quadrant, several columns of dark, vertical calligraphy are visible. Below this text, in the lower left corner, is a small, square red seal. A second, larger red seal is positioned in the lower right corner of the fan.

metadata.title: 清  金?  梅花  扇面|Plum
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: A woman in a long gown stands by a flowering tree and rocks on a fan painting.
long_description: This fan-shaped painting features a serene garden scene rendered in ink and light washes on a pale surface. The composition is divided by vertical lines, characteristic of a folding fan. In the left-center, a slender woman stands facing slightly right, her head turned towards the viewer. She wears a long, flowing gown in light tones, possibly white or pale grey, with a darker trim around her neckline and waist. Her dark hair is styled in a simple bun. Her right hand is gently raised near her chest. To her right, a gnarled tree trunk with delicate branches extends upwards and across the mid-ground, adorned with small clusters of pink blossoms. Below the tree and around the woman's feet are various grey-toned, irregularly shaped rocks and patches of light blue-green foliage. In the far left background, faint, linear outlines suggest architectural elements, possibly a railing or a bridge. The right side of the fan is largely open, featuring vertical columns of black calligraphic text in the upper right quadrant, accompanied by two small red square seals. A single red square seal is also visible in the bottom left corner of the painted scene.

metadata.title: 清   錢慧安   仕女圖   摺扇|Woman in a garden
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on alum paper

alt_text: A vertical ink painting depicts a towering mountain landscape with trees, rocks, and calligraphic text at the top
long_description: This tall, narrow, vertical scroll features a monochromatic ink wash landscape painting below a section of calligraphic text. The upper third of the scroll is a light, off-white paper surface, dominated by several columns of black calligraphic text written vertically from right to left. Below the main body of text, a smaller block of text is visible, also in black calligraphy. Several red square seals are stamped near the text. The lower two-thirds of the scroll present a detailed mountain landscape. A towering, central mountain peak dominates the upper part of the painted section, its steep slopes rendered with varying shades of gray ink wash to create depth and texture. Numerous small, dark ink dots and strokes suggest dense foliage and trees clinging to the mountain's ridges and crevices. To the left of the central peak, smaller, jagged rock formations and hills recede into the background. In the middle ground, to the right of the main mountain, a cluster of tall, slender trees with dark trunks and sparse, dark foliage stands prominently. Further down and to the left, the landscape opens into a more undulating terrain with scattered rocks, smaller trees, and bushes. A winding, lighter-toned area suggests a path or stream bed moving through the lower part of the scene. Additional red square seals are visible in the lower left and lower right corners of the painted section. The entire landscape is rendered in a palette of black and gray ink on the light paper, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere.

metadata.title: 明 沈周 夜雨泊舟圖 軸|Anchorage on a Rainy Night
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Black and white mural fragment depicting a figure's head and shoulders with an ornate halo.
long_description: The image is a black and white fragment of a mural, showing the head and upper shoulders of a figure, likely a deity, centered within the frame. The figure's face is rendered with delicate lines, featuring downcast, elongated eyes, a slender nose, and full lips. A small dot is visible on the forehead. The hair is dark and styled, with elaborate curls and decorative elements forming a crown-like headpiece above the forehead. Long, dark strands of hair fall over the shoulders. A large, circular halo, outlined with a thick dark band and an inner decorative border, frames the head. The halo itself is lighter in tone, showing some texture and cracks. The figure wears a necklace with circular elements visible around the neck. The background is a lighter tone, with visible cracks and deterioration across the entire surface of the mural fragment. The overall impression is one of serene composure.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Water-based pigment on mud plaster

alt_text: Three stylized faces with elaborate headwear and halo-like shapes on a damaged wall painting fragment.
long_description:
The image displays a rectangular fragment of a wall painting, mounted on a light brown board. The painting is on a rough, textured, light brown surface, likely plaster or mud, with significant areas of the painted layer missing. Three stylized faces are depicted horizontally across the lower half of the fragment.

Above the faces, a horizontal band runs across the top. This band consists of a wide, light-colored stripe at the very top, followed by a narrower blue stripe, and then a darker, possibly blue or black, patterned stripe adorned with small, light-colored star-like or floral motifs.

The three faces are positioned below this band. From left to right, the first face is light-skinned with delicate features, including elongated eyes and a small mouth. It wears an elaborate headpiece or hairstyle with blue and white beaded patterns. Behind its head, a blue and light green arc-like shape is visible. The second face, in the center, is also light-skinned and faces forward, with similar delicate features and a patterned headpiece. A blue and light green arc-like shape is also behind this head. The third face, on the right, is darker in tone and partially obscured, looking slightly to the left. It also features a patterned headpiece and a blue and light green arc-like element behind it. The painted details are outlined in reddish-brown lines. The rough texture of the underlying material is visible through the damaged painted surface.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: Painting fragment depicting two haloed figures, one above the other, with the upper figure holding a staff-like object
long_description: The image is a vertical fragment of a painting, set against a plain, light brown background. The artwork depicts two figures, positioned one above the other, rendered with red outlines and muted colors. The upper figure, larger and more prominent, is shown from the chest up, facing slightly to the right with its head tilted. It has a round face with wide-open eyes, a small nose, and an open mouth. A red dot is visible on its forehead. It wears a multi-layered headdress with a central ornament. A large, light gray halo with a blue inner ring encircles its head. The figure's right arm is raised, holding a long, slender, light-colored staff-like object that extends downwards towards the lower part of the fragment. The skin tone is light, with red accents on the neck and shoulders. Below and to the left of the upper figure, the head and upper shoulders of a second, smaller figure are visible.
