This figure faces slightly to the right with a calm expression and downcast eyes. It has a simple, rounded head with a red dot on its forehead and red lines defining its features. A halo, similar in style to the upper figure's but smaller, is behind its head, featuring a blue inner ring. The background around the figures is a mottled gray and blue, suggesting a sky or abstract space. The entire fragment shows signs of age, with cracks and areas where the paint has faded or chipped away.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: Three painted faces with elaborate blue and white headwear on a damaged, earthy-toned fresco fragment
long_description: A rectangular fresco fragment, heavily damaged, displays parts of three painted human faces against an earthy, light brown background. The fragment is oriented horizontally. On the far left, a face with light skin, red lips, and dark eyes looks forward, slightly tilted right. It wears an elaborate blue and white headdress, possibly a bun or topknot, with some green details around it. In the center, another face with similar features also looks forward, slightly tilted left. This figure has a more ornate headdress or crown with blue, white, and red dot patterns. Much of the area below this central face is missing. On the far right, a face in profile looks left. It has light skin, a dark eye, and a defined eyebrow, wearing a blue cap or headdress adorned with a white floral or star-like ornament on top, outlined in green. Significant portions of the painted surface are missing across the fragment, revealing the rough, underlying material, and several cracks are visible throughout the piece. The overall color palette includes earthy browns, blues, whites, greens, and reds for facial features and adornments.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: Three painted figures, two facing forward and one in profile, on a damaged light brown surface
long_description: The image is a fragment of a painting on a light brown, textured surface, depicting three figures arranged horizontally. The surface is heavily damaged, with large areas of the painting missing or eroded, revealing the underlying material. The overall composition suggests busts or upper torsos of the figures.On the far left, a figure with a dark brown beard and mustache is partially visible, facing forward. Only the head and upper chest are discernible. The skin is light, and the figure wears a white garment with red outlines and some blue details. The eyes are open, and the mouth is slightly open, showing teeth. Much of the left side of this figure is missing due to damage.In the center, a more complete figure faces forward, slightly turned to the right. This figure has light skin, dark hair pulled back, and wears a blue headpiece with a yellow border. Large, elongated eyes are open, and the mouth is closed. Red lines define the facial features and neck. The figure wears a red-orange collar or necklace and a garment with blue and red-orange details. Gold-colored earrings are visible. The upper torso is visible, with some blue paint below.On the right, a third figure is depicted in profile, facing left towards the central figure. This figure has dark brown hair and light skin. The eye is open, and the mouth is closed. The figure wears a green garment with red outlines and has a visible hand, possibly holding something or gesturing, though the object is unclear due to damage. The background behind this figure is a dark blue.The color palette includes light brown for the background, with figures painted in light skin tones, dark brown, red-orange, blue, green, and yellow. The painting style uses clear outlines.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a robed, fox-headed figure holding a staff, standing amidst tall grasses
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a robed figure with an animal head, holding a staff, positioned slightly left of center. The figure's head has a pointed snout, small eyes, and appears to be that of a fox or similar animal, rendered with light brown and grey brushstrokes. A light grey hood covers the head and drapes over the shoulders, blending into a darker grey and black robe that covers the body. The robe has soft folds, suggesting loose fabric. The figure holds a thin, dark staff vertically in its left hand, extending downwards to the lower left. To the right of the figure, several tall, slender stalks of grass or reeds rise from the bottom, some with feathery tops. These are painted with varying shades of grey and black ink, with a few faint reddish-brown accents. The background is a light, almost white, wash, with subtle horizontal lines visible across the surface, suggesting the texture of paper. The overall impression is monochromatic with delicate brushwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and silver on paper

alt_text: A torn, aged piece of light brown fabric with faint, dark line drawings of figures and animals.
long_description: The image displays a large, irregularly shaped piece of light brown fabric, appearing aged and damaged. Its edges are extensively torn and frayed, particularly along the top, bottom, and right sides, revealing a white background underneath. Several holes are present within the fabric, including a prominent, irregular white opening near the top left. Faint, dark line drawings are visible across the surface. On the left side, a rectangular outline encloses a circular or oval shape with internal lines, possibly depicting a face or a stylized flower. Below this rectangle, a few faint horizontal and vertical lines are discernible. Towards the center, more abstract, swirling lines and indistinct outlines suggest draped figures or a cluster of forms. Further to the right, faint lines appear to depict a quadruped, possibly a horse, with a discernible head and body shape. The drawings are rendered in a faded dark brown or black, contrasting subtly with the muted, earthy brown of the fabric.

metadata.title: 遼  宴飲圖（殘片）|Banquet Scene
metadata.medium: Fragment from a wall hanging; ink on silk

alt_text: Faint ink drawing on aged fabric showing five robed figures, a table, and a ceremonial vessel
long_description: A horizontal, rectangular piece of aged, light brown fabric displays a faint ink drawing of five figures. The fabric is discolored with darker brown stains, particularly along the bottom and right edges, and has a ragged, uneven top edge. The five figures are arranged in a row across the center of the fabric, appearing to be seated or standing. Each figure wears a robe and a distinct hat. Their faces are lightly sketched, showing minimal detail. In front of the central figures, there is a low, rectangular object, possibly a table, with several small, round items on its surface. To the right of the central group, a large, dark-outlined, bell-shaped vessel with two prominent handles rests on a base. Faint, swirling motifs are visible above and between some of the figures. The drawing is executed with thin, dark lines, which are somewhat faded and indistinct in areas.

metadata.title: 遼  宴飲圖（殘片）|Banquet Scene
metadata.medium: Fragment from a wall hanging; ink on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting shows a robed figure with a staff amidst mountains, trees, and calligraphy.
long_description: The vertical ink wash painting features a mountainous landscape rendered in shades of black and gray ink on a light beige paper. The upper section of the scroll contains several columns of black ink calligraphy, positioned to the right of a prominent mountain peak. Below the calligraphy, a rugged mountain slope descends, covered with numerous pine trees and other foliage depicted with varying ink washes.In the middle ground, slightly to the left of the central axis, a lone figure stands on a winding path or ledge. The figure wears long, flowing robes and holds a staff in their right hand, appearing to gaze towards the lower right. Their form is rendered with delicate lines and light washes.The lower half of the painting continues the mountainous terrain, with more rocky formations, smaller trees, and textured slopes. The ink work varies from dark, dense strokes defining rocks and tree trunks to lighter, softer washes for distant elements and atmospheric effects. Several red seals are visible at the bottom of the painting, one on the lower left and two on the lower right.

metadata.title: 明　杜堇　陶淵明賞菊圖　軸|Tao Yuanming enjoying chrysanthemums
metadata.medium: Hanging scrolls; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a mountainous landscape with dense trees, a river, and a small boat.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting, rendered in shades of black and gray on a light, off-white ground, depicts a towering mountainous landscape with a river. The composition is arranged vertically, moving from dense peaks at the top to a wider river scene at the bottom. In the upper right corner, four vertical lines of script are visible, followed by two small, square red seals. The script reads: "山深春雨足 溪漲晚來急 漁舟何處去 煙波渺無極". Below this, the upper third of the painting features steep, rugged mountains covered with dense, dark foliage, rendered with varied brushstrokes. Areas of lighter wash suggest mist or clouds obscuring parts of the peaks. The middle section continues the descent, with more mountains and trees, becoming less dense and revealing more of the underlying rock formations. Small, simple structures, possibly huts or houses, are nestled among the trees on the slopes. A river begins to wind its way through the landscape, with rocky banks and small waterfalls. The lower third of the painting opens up to a broader expanse of water. On the left bank, a large, gnarled tree with long, hanging branches extends over the water. A small, narrow boat with a single figure is visible on the water, positioned towards the left, near the tree. The right bank features more rocky outcrops and sparse vegetation. Another small, square red seal is located in the bottom right corner. The overall impression is one of a vast, natural landscape.

metadata.title: 明   史忠   雪景山水圖   軸|Winter landscape with fisherman
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A seated figure with a golden halo, wearing elaborate robes and a crown, within a decorative scroll
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a central, seated figure against a dark background, framed by decorative borders. The figure, positioned slightly off-center to the right, has light-toned skin and dark hair, with a large, circular golden halo behind its head. It wears an elaborate crown and richly decorated robes in shades of red, gold, white, and dark green, adorned with intricate patterns and jewelry, including necklaces and armbands. One leg is bent with the foot resting on a lower surface, while the other foot hangs down. The background is a muted, dark brown or gold, with faint, indistinct forms or patterns visible beneath the figure. The central image is bordered by a narrow, dark blue-green band featuring gold scrollwork, which is then surrounded by a wider, gold-colored outer border with a repeating pattern of stylized floral or leaf motifs.

metadata.title: 작자미상 수월관음도   고려|作者未詳 水月觀音圖   高麗|Water-Moon Avalokiteshvara
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting features black ink bamboo on a tan ground, with calligraphic text at the top.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll, primarily featuring an ink painting of bamboo on a light brown ground. At the top, a horizontal band of deep blue-green contains large, gold-colored calligraphic characters. Below this, a lighter green horizontal band displays multiple columns of smaller, black calligraphic text. The main body of the scroll is a light tan or beige color, serving as the background for the bamboo. Several bamboo stalks, rendered in varying shades of black ink, rise from the lower right and extend upwards and across the central portion of the painting. Some stalks and leaves are depicted with dark, solid ink, while others are lighter and more translucent, creating a sense of depth. The bamboo branches extend both to the left and right, with clusters of pointed leaves. Towards the bottom right, dark, amorphous shapes suggest rocks or ground from which the bamboo emerges. A small red seal is visible below the calligraphic text on the lighter green band.

metadata.title: 탄은 이정	 대나무   조선|灘隱 李霆	墨竹圖	朝鮮|Bamboo in the Wind
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk with gold on colophon

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a dense cluster of bamboo stalks and leaves against a light background
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting features a dense cluster of bamboo rendered in varying shades of black and gray ink on a light, tan-colored background. On the left, several thick bamboo stalks rise vertically, some appearing lighter and more in the background, while others are darker and more prominent. These stalks show distinct nodes and segments. Interspersed among the stalks are numerous thin, delicate branches and smaller leaves, also in lighter ink washes. In the center and extending to the right, a large, prominent branch arches downwards, covered with numerous broad, dark ink leaves. These leaves are painted with strong, sweeping brushstrokes, creating a sense of movement. Further to the right, more bamboo leaves and thinner branches are visible, some overlapping and creating depth. The background is largely empty, providing a stark contrast to the detailed bamboo. In the upper right corner, a vertical column of dark calligraphic text is present, reading from top to bottom: "宋蘇東坡墨竹真蹟神品". Below and to the left of this text, several red square seals are stamped onto the painting, with additional seals appearing in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　蘇軾(僞款)　墨竹圖　卷|Bamboo
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A person riding a large turtle, holding a fishing rod, with a distant city in the clouds above
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a person riding a large turtle, with a distant city in the upper background. The background is a light, muted yellow-beige. In the upper third of the painting, faint, misty mountains rise above a city. The city features multiple tiered structures, possibly pagodas or temples, and a bridge, all rendered in soft greens and grays, appearing partially obscured by clouds or mist. In the middle section, a person is seated on the back of a large, dark green and brown turtle. The person wears a blue robe with brown accents and light-colored, flowing lower garments. They have dark hair styled in a topknot and a mustache. A long, thin fishing rod extends from their hands towards the upper left. Behind the person's head, a dark, swirling mass, possibly hair or a cloud, extends upwards and to the left. The turtle is depicted with a textured shell, its head and four legs visible as it moves through faint blue-green washes that suggest water or clouds. In the lower left quadrant, below the main figures, there is vertical black script followed by a red square seal. The artwork is framed by a muted gray-green border with a subtle pattern, and narrow gold patterned fabric strips at the very top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A traditional painting shows numerous women in colorful robes on a multi-level building and in a garden beside a pond.
long_description: The painting features a scene with numerous women, a multi-level building, a pond, and a garden, all set against a gold-flecked background. The composition is divided, with a large, blue pond on the upper left, its surface marked with wavy lines. Below the pond and extending to the lower left is a sandy-colored ground area. In this area, several women are depicted, some kneeling or walking, dressed in long, patterned robes of white, green, and red. A small garden with white and red flowers and green foliage is visible in the lower left. To the right and center, a multi-tiered wooden building dominates, featuring open platforms, staircases, and sections with green railings and black lattice screens. The building's structure is light brown with green accents. Many women are positioned throughout the building, sitting or kneeling on the various levels. Their long black hair is visible, and they wear elaborate, flowing robes in shades of gold, green, red, blue, and white, often adorned with intricate patterns. Some women appear to be interacting, while others are engaged in individual activities, such as holding a red flower or a fan. A small, dark green bush is situated at the base of the building on the lower right. The entire scene is framed by a textured, gold-flecked border, particularly prominent at the top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of twelve paintings; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A gray and black cat with a patterned collar crouches, intently watching a small spider on a light floor next to a screen
long_description: The artwork depicts a cat intently focused on a spider on a light-colored floor. The cat, positioned in the upper right and center, is mostly gray with a dark gray head and ears, and white markings on its face, including around its eyes and muzzle. Its body is a lighter gray, rendered with fine brushstrokes suggesting fur texture. The cat wears a decorative collar or bib around its neck, featuring a vibrant pattern of orange, blue, and green shapes. Its eyes are light-colored, and its whiskers are visible, extending outwards. The cat is in a low, crouching posture, with its front paws visible and its head lowered, looking directly at the spider. In the lower left corner of the image, a small, brown spider with eight legs is depicted on the light, plain floor. The spider is significantly smaller than the cat, appearing as a tiny detail in comparison. To the left of the cat and extending from the top to the bottom of the image is a vertical structure, possibly a screen or door frame. This structure has a dark, thick vertical border on the right, a thin white vertical line next to it, and a wider, light beige panel to its left. The background behind the cat and the floor is a uniform, light gray-beige color, providing a simple setting for the interaction between the cat and the spider. There is some visible text in the lower right corner, consisting of black characters and a red seal.

metadata.title: 猫に蜘蛛図|Cat Watching a Spider
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two cats in a muted landscape with a bird and various plants and flowers.
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts two cats and a bird in a muted, earthy landscape with various plants. The background is a light, warm brown with subtle undulations suggesting ground. On the left, a white cat with a dark brown patch on its left cheek lies on its stomach, looking upwards and slightly to the right. Its eyes are yellow. It is partially obscured by a cluster of green foliage with several bright red, open flowers and some smaller purple flowers. Above and to the far left, a section of a tree trunk with green leaves extends into the frame. In the center, more green leaves and sparse grasses emerge from the ground. On the right side of the painting, a second white cat stands on all fours, facing left. This cat has several brown and black patches on its back and a bushy, striped tail that curves upwards. It holds a small, brown and white bird gently in its mouth. Its yellow eyes are focused on the bird. Behind this cat, more green foliage, including some bamboo-like leaves, rises from the ground. The overall composition places the cats as central figures amidst the natural elements.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　明宣宗(僞款)　唐苑嬉春圖　卷|Spring Play in a Tang Garden
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink drawing of children running from a snake, while another figure chases it with a long stick.
long_description: An ink wash drawing on a light, uncolored background depicts a dynamic scene with multiple figures and a snake. On the far left, a single small figure, possibly a child, runs to the left with arms outstretched and head turned back, its dark hair appearing spiky. To its right, a dense cluster of approximately eight to ten similar small figures runs to the right, their bodies overlapping, some looking forward, others glancing back. All figures are rendered with dark ink lines, showing movement and expression. A thin, dark snake slithers horizontally across the central empty space, positioned between the two groups of figures. On the far right, a larger figure, possibly an adult, runs to the right with a long, thin stick raised high above its head. This figure has long, dark, flowing hair and wears a robe with some light green and dark gray ink washes. Behind and around this figure are sparse, vertical ink strokes suggesting tall grass or reeds. In the bottom right corner, there is a vertical column of black text and a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; wash drawing

alt_text: A multi-panel screen painting depicting two birds, a flowering tree, rocks, and plants on a light brown background
long_description: This is a multi-panel screen painting featuring a natural landscape on a light brown, textured background. The screen is composed of six vertical panels. On the far left, the panels are largely empty, showing only faint, wispy vertical lines of light brown. Moving right, a cluster of white flowers with long, dark green leaves emerges from the bottom edge of the second panel. In the center, two birds are depicted. One bird, with a dark head, white chest, and dark wings with white markings, is perched on a small, rounded brown rock formation, looking downwards. Below this rock are small green plants and a few white flowers. Above and to the right of the perched bird, a second bird with similar markings is shown in mid-air or perched on a thin branch, facing right. To the right of the birds, a large, gnarled tree trunk with several branches extends upwards and to the left. These branches are adorned with numerous small, delicate white flowers. The tree is rooted amidst a complex arrangement of large, angular brown and gray rocks. Green foliage grows around the base of the tree and within the crevices of the rocks. The far right panels continue the rock formations and show a lighter brown, slightly undulating background suggesting distant terrain. The overall color palette is muted, dominated by browns, grays, and greens, with accents of white from the flowers and the birds' plumage.

metadata.title: 狩野山卜筆四季花鳥図屏風|Birds and Flowers of the Four Seasons
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: Two vertical scroll paintings depict misty, mountainous landscapes in muted tones of brown, gray, and black.
long_description: Two vertical scroll paintings are presented side-by-side against a dark background. Each scroll features a central rectangular painting framed by a light, unpatterned border, which is then surrounded by a wider border of light green fabric with a subtle, repeating pattern. The top and bottom sections of the scrolls are also made of this patterned light green fabric, with wooden rollers visible at the very bottom. The paintings themselves are ink wash landscapes, predominantly in shades of dark brown, gray, and black, with lighter, faded areas suggesting mist or distance. The left scroll depicts a towering, craggy mountain range on the left, with peaks fading into a hazy background. Below, a body of water or river is visible, with faint indications of land or structures along its banks. The right scroll presents a similar scene, with a large, irregular mountain mass dominating the upper right, also partially obscured by mist. The lower section of this painting shows a flatter landscape with water and indistinct details. Both paintings convey a sense of depth and atmosphere through the use of varying ink washes, creating a monochromatic, ethereal quality.

metadata.title: 해질녘 산사의 종소리 조선|煙寺暮鍾圖 朝鮮|Evening bell from mist-shrouded temple (left); Autumn moon over Lake Dongting (right)
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink on silk

alt_text: Monochrome artwork showing an armored warrior, a bell-shaped object with text, and smaller figures in a turbulent, wavy environment.
long_description: A monochrome artwork, likely an ink drawing or print, is centered within a decorative blue border with gold patterns, which is then framed by a speckled gold outer border. The central image depicts a dynamic scene with two prominent elements. On the right, a large, muscular figure in elaborate patterned armor, including a helmet with a feather-like plume, is shown in a crouched or lunging pose. This figure has a fierce expression with a beard and open mouth, and appears to be emerging from or interacting with stylized waves that rise around its lower body. On the left, a large, bell-shaped or dome-shaped object, covered in rows of small, dense text, rests on a rocky or wavy base. Below this object, several smaller figures are depicted, some appearing to be prostrate or in supplication, also surrounded by waves. One of these smaller figures is a seated deity with a halo. Stylized waves fill the background behind all the figures. Vertical lines of text are visible in the upper right and left portions of the central image area. The blue border features a repeating pattern of stylized golden birds and cloud-like scrolls.

metadata.title: 『画本葛飾振』|Picture Book in the Katsushika Style (Ehon Katsushika-buri)
metadata.medium: Folding album of twenty-eight block-ready drawings (hanshita-e) for book illustrations; ink on paper with woodblock-printed borders and titles

alt_text: A horizontal scroll painting depicting a walled garden with traditional buildings, various trees, and distant hazy hills
long_description: This horizontal scroll painting features a landscape rendered in muted tones of gray, green, and light brown, with subtle red accents. The composition is divided horizontally by a long, light gray wall that traverses the middle ground. In the upper left corner, several columns of black ink calligraphy are visible, accompanied by two red square seals. Below and to the right of the calligraphy, a tall, winding gray wall with a textured top edge extends from the left, partially obscured by a large, dark green pine tree with a gnarled trunk and a lighter green weeping willow tree. Behind this wall, hazy gray forms suggest distant mountains or clouds, interspersed with patches of dark green foliage. Above the central horizontal wall, a cluster of traditional-style buildings with dark, tiled roofs are nestled among dense green trees. Two slender poles, each topped with a small red flag, rise behind these structures. Below the central wall, a verdant garden space unfolds, populated by various trees with both dark and lighter green leaves. Towards the far right, a prominent open-sided building with a dark roof, light brown wooden supports, and red vertical elements stands within this garden. A low, light-colored fence delineates a section of the garden in front of this building. The sky across the upper portion of the painting is a uniform, hazy light gray, suggesting an overcast atmosphere.

metadata.title: 清　楊天壁　敬芝軒第貳圖　卷|Second View of the Studio for Respecting the Fungus of Longevity
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A panoramic painting of a bustling town with many people, buildings, and a large arched bridge
long_description: The painting is a wide, horizontal composition depicting a bustling urban landscape rendered in a muted palette of browns, grays, and dull greens, accented by reds and blacks. The scene is densely populated with numerous figures, buildings, and trees, suggesting a lively town or city. Starting from the left, several dark-roofed buildings with red walls are visible, interspersed among trees with sparse foliage. Groups of small figures are scattered across the ground, some walking along paths, others gathered in small clusters. Further right, a prominent, large arched bridge dominates the central area, spanning what appears to be a waterway, though the water itself is not distinctly rendered. Many people are depicted ascending and descending the bridge, while others are in small boats beneath its arch. On both sides of the bridge, more buildings with dark, tiled roofs and red-painted sections are visible, some appearing to be multi-story structures. The areas around these buildings and the bridge are teeming with crowds of people, engaged in various activities such as walking, conversing, and carrying items. Trees with bare branches or sparse leaves are distributed throughout the landscape, adding to the natural elements within the urban setting. The overall impression is one of a vibrant, densely inhabited area with continuous activity across the entire frame.

metadata.title: 清 佚名 清明上河圖|Going Upriver on the Qingming Festival
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash landscape scroll with misty mountains, traditional buildings, water, and a small boat
long_description: A vertical hanging scroll features a grayscale ink wash landscape painting. The scroll's top and bottom borders are made of a patterned fabric with repeating floral or cloud motifs, while a textured, possibly brocade, fabric forms the middle border around the painting itself. The painting depicts a vast, misty landscape. In the foreground and mid-ground on the right, a complex of traditional buildings with multiple tiered roofs is nestled into a hillside, appearing to extend down towards the water. Jagged, rocky mountains rise behind these structures, partially obscured by a pervasive mist that fills the middle ground. On the left side, a wide body of water stretches across the scene, with a small sailboat visible near the left edge. Distant, low-lying hills are faintly visible across the water. Closer to the water's edge on the right, more smaller buildings, including a pagoda-like structure, are visible, and several small figures appear to be gathered on the land near the water. In the upper left corner of the painting, a block of vertical text is inscribed.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　傳仇英　唐宫圖　軸|A Tang Palace
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A detailed painting shows numerous figures in a lush garden, with a central group under a canopy and others scattered around
long_description: The horizontal painting depicts a large gathering of figures in an outdoor garden setting. The ground is primarily green, with various trees, shrubs, and rock formations scattered throughout. On the far left, a large blue-green rock or water feature is visible. In the upper center, a large, light-colored canopy with a blue patterned border shelters a central group of approximately ten figures. Most of these figures are seated around a low, light-colored table, some holding small objects or gesturing. Others stand around the perimeter of the canopy, observing or interacting. Their clothing features various colors including blues, pinks, whites, and browns. To the left of the canopy, a group of four figures, dressed in long robes of pink, white, and light blue, walk towards the right, some holding fans or other small items. Below them, in the lower left-center, is a prominent, multi-tiered rock formation adorned with flowering plants in shades of pink and white. In the lower center, a group of four figures in long robes stands, facing towards the right. On the far right, outside the canopy, two figures are visible. One stands holding a tray with small red objects, while another kneels on the ground next to a low table with items on it. A third figure is seated on the ground further right. The overall scene is filled with numerous figures engaged in various activities within a lush, detailed landscape.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   蘇蕙璇璣圖  卷|Lady Su Hui and Her Verse Puzzle
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures in traditional attire, one standing and one seated, in an outdoor setting
long_description: A monochromatic artwork depicts two figures in an outdoor or courtyard setting. The image is rendered in black, white, and various shades of gray, with a textured, aged appearance. On the left, a standing figure faces right, wearing a light-toned, long-sleeved robe with a dark, V-shaped collar. Her hands are clasped in front of her, and her hair is styled in a dark, elaborate coiffure on top of her head. The lower part of her robe features distinct vertical pleats. To her left, a large, dark, ornate vase stands on the ground, and below it, a lighter, barrel-shaped object with two oval cutouts is visible. On the right, a second figure is seated on a low, dark bench or platform, facing left. This figure wears a dark-toned, long-sleeved robe with a lighter, possibly patterned, collar or trim. Her hair is also styled in a dark, elaborate coiffure. She appears to be holding a rectangular object, possibly a book or tablet, in her hands. The lower part of her robe also shows vertical pleats. In the background, behind and between the figures, faint outlines of a tree or foliage are visible, particularly above the standing figure. A low wall or structure with irregular dark markings, possibly indicating stones, extends across the middle ground.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Unmounted hanging scroll; ink and color on paper (?)

alt_text: A black and white image shows a person riding a horse, depicted in mid-stride.
long_description: The black and white image features a single figure on horseback, positioned slightly below the vertical center and extending across the horizontal center. The background is a uniform dark gray, providing a stark contrast to the lighter tones of the horse and rider. The horse, depicted in a dark gray with lighter highlights on its legs and face, is shown in mid-stride, with its front legs lifted and its back legs extended. A bridle and reins are visible, with the reins held by the rider. A saddle is on the horse's back. The rider, facing right, wears light-toned clothing, including a tunic or jacket and trousers. A headpiece or hat with a decorative element is on the rider's head. The figure's posture suggests movement, leaning slightly forward. In the upper left corner, a square-shaped block of illegible characters or a seal is visible, rendered in dark marks against a lighter background, with additional faint vertical marks to its right. The overall composition emphasizes the dynamic movement of the horse and rider.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A grayscale ink wash painting shows a spotted horse grazing near a robed figure under weeping trees and cliffs.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape in varying shades of gray. The upper half of the composition is dominated by towering, rugged cliffs or mountains on the left, rendered with textured brushstrokes that suggest rock formations and crevices. From the cliffs and a large, gnarled tree on the right, numerous long, drooping branches with dense, small leaves or blossoms hang downwards, creating a weeping effect that extends across much of the upper and middle ground. A faint body of water or stream is visible at the base of the cliffs on the far left. In the middle ground, a spotted horse with a light-colored body and dark, irregular spots grazes on the grassy terrain, its head lowered towards the ground. Its mane and tail are dark. To the right of the horse and slightly behind it, a robed figure stands near the base of the large, gnarled tree. The figure wears a light-colored, long robe and dark shoes, and appears to be holding a small, round object, possibly a fan, in their hands. The lower portion of the painting features undulating grassy ground with a few scattered, darker rocks. The entire scene is rendered in a monochromatic palette, utilizing a range of grays from light washes to darker, more defined lines for outlines and details.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A standing, robed figure with a beard and long hair looks down, holding an object under a dark branch.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a standing figure against a light brown, aged background. The central figure, an older-looking person with long, dark, wispy hair and a beard, is oriented slightly to the right, with their head tilted downwards. They wear loose, dark grey and black robes that drape around their body, with lighter skin tones visible on their face and chest. Their hands are positioned near their chest, holding a light-colored, rectangular object, possibly a scroll or book. The figure's feet, appearing reddish-brown, are visible at the bottom, suggesting simple footwear. Above the figure, in the upper left quadrant, a dark, gnarled branch with abstract, dark foliage extends downwards and to the right. On the far right side, a dark, vertical, abstract shape is visible, possibly another branch or rock formation. In the upper left corner, dark vertical text is present, followed by a red square seal. Another red square seal is located on the left side, roughly at the figure's mid-torso level.

metadata.title: 明   佚名  倣吳偉   漢鍾離像   軸|The Immortal, Zhong li
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A monochrome landscape painting featuring towering, textured mountains, dense pine trees, and scattered traditional buildings
long_description: The artwork is a monochrome landscape painting rendered in shades of brown, sepia, and dark grey, depicting a vast mountainous scene. The upper two-thirds of the composition are dominated by a series of imposing, rugged mountains with undulating peaks and steep, vertically striated slopes, suggesting deep valleys and cliffs. Some mountain surfaces show subtle textures resembling foliage or rock formations. In the upper right, a small, multi-tiered building with a dark roof is nestled on a mountain ledge. On the left side, at the base of a large mountain, a cluster of traditional-style buildings with dark, gabled roofs is visible, connected by what appears to be a bridge or pathway. The foreground and midground feature numerous tall, dark evergreen trees, likely pines, with distinct clusters of needles, rooted on rocky, uneven terrain. A winding, lighter-toned area, possibly a river or path, meanders through the lower part of the scene, separating the foreground trees from the larger mountain masses. The sky above the mountains is a lighter, muted brown, creating a sense of atmospheric depth.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   舊傳顧愷之   會稽山圖   卷|The Hills of Kuaiji
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochromatic landscape painting with mountains, tall trees, a river, a multi-tiered building, and figures with horses
long_description: The wide, horizontal landscape painting is rendered in a monochromatic palette of dark browns, greys, and lighter sepia tones, creating a hazy, atmospheric scene. In the left foreground, dark, craggy rocks rise, from which several tall, slender trees, resembling pines, extend upwards with their branches. Behind these, rounded, hazy mountains recede into the distance. Towards the center, a winding river or stream with light, textured strokes, suggesting flowing water or rapids, cuts through the midground. It flows between dark, undulating hills and rocky formations. Sparse, bare-branched trees are scattered across these hillsides. On the right side, a prominent multi-tiered building, resembling a pagoda with multiple roofs, is nestled on a mountain slope, its dark silhouette standing out. Below this building, near the river, a group of small figures and several horses are visible, appearing to traverse a path or bridge. The background on the right also features layered, hazy mountains, contributing to the sense of depth and vastness. The overall composition uses varying tonal values to define forms and create a sense of distance.

metadata.title: 明/清  佚名   舊傳郭煕   關山行旅圖    卷|Traveling amid Mountains
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome landscape painting with mountains, water, trees, a hut, and a bridge
long_description: This monochrome landscape painting, rendered in shades of dark gray and black ink on a light brown ground, depicts a vast natural scene. In the background, multiple layers of mountains rise, their peaks and slopes detailed with varying densities of trees, suggesting forests. The mountains recede into the distance, creating a sense of depth. The middle ground is dominated by an expansive body of water, possibly a lake or wide river, dotted with several small, tree-covered islands. In the foreground, a cluster of tall, leafy trees stands prominently on the left, with their branches extending upwards. To the right of these trees, a small, thatched-roof hut with a fenced enclosure is nestled on a gentle slope near the water's edge. Further to the left, a small, arched bridge spans a narrow stream or inlet. The brushwork varies from fine lines for tree details to broader washes for mountain forms. On the far right edge of the painting, a vertical column of characters is visible, accompanied by a small red seal.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   舊傳董源   山水圖   卷|Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Two robed figures with a pole stand near two elaborate birds on a plain background
long_description: The monochrome artwork depicts two human figures on the right and two large birds on the left, set against a light, textured background. On the right, a tall, bearded man with a wide-brimmed, pointed hat wears long, flowing robes. He holds a dark, vertical pole-like object that extends upwards, culminating in a flame-shaped top. His gaze is directed towards the left. Behind him, a smaller figure, also wearing a hat, stands partially obscured, appearing to hold onto the larger man or the pole. Both figures are rendered with dark outlines and shading, creating depth in their clothing. On the lower left, two elegant, bird-like creatures stand on long, slender legs. Each bird has a long, curved neck, a small head adorned with a crest, and an elaborate, fanned tail composed of numerous delicate feathers. The birds are positioned facing towards the right, with one slightly behind the other. Their bodies and tails are detailed with dark lines and shading, contrasting with the lighter background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of bamboo stalks and leaves on a light brown background with vertical calligraphy on the right
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal rectangular painting featuring bamboo rendered in dark ink on a light brown, aged paper-like background. The composition is dominated by several bamboo stalks and numerous leaves, primarily occupying the left and central portions of the image. From the lower left, thicker bamboo stalks rise upwards, branching out into thinner stems. The leaves are depicted in various shades of dark gray and black ink, with some appearing almost solid black and others lighter, suggesting different ink washes. The leaves are clustered in groups, fanning out from the branches, and many are angled, overlapping, and appear to be in motion. Some leaves are long and slender, while others are broader. The bamboo branches extend horizontally across the middle of the painting, with some reaching towards the upper right. The background is a uniform, light brown color, providing a stark contrast to the dark ink of the bamboo. On the far right side of the painting, a column of vertical calligraphy is present, written in dark ink. The characters are arranged neatly in a single column, extending from the top to near the bottom edge of the painting. The overall impression is one of natural movement and calligraphic elegance.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Figures and horses rest under trees in a muted landscape with rocks and foliage
long_description: The painting depicts a landscape scene with multiple figures and horses under trees, rendered in a muted palette of browns, greens, and subtle reds. The composition is horizontal, with the ground occupying most of the lower half and extending upwards. On the far left, a partial red structure, possibly a gate or building element, is visible. Below it, a large, dark, irregularly shaped rock formation with textured surfaces dominates the lower left quadrant, surrounded by green bushes. In the upper left-center, a figure dressed in light-colored robes stands next to a saddled, dark-colored horse, both positioned beneath a tall tree with green foliage. The horse faces right. Towards the lower center and extending to the right, a cluster of several trees with varying trunk widths and green canopies provides shade for a group of figures and horses. At least three horses are visible here: one light-colored horse with a red saddle cloth, another darker horse, and a third partially obscured. Several figures are interspersed among the horses and trees. One figure, possibly mounted, wears a prominent red garment. Other figures are standing, dressed in lighter robes. The ground beneath the trees is covered with sparse green patches. The overall impression is one of a resting or traveling party in a natural setting.

metadata.title: 舊傳錢選   錦堂圖   卷|Brocade Hall
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two birds with blue crests and long tails perch on a gnarled branch with white and pink blossoms against a light brown background.
long_description: The horizontal painting depicts two birds perched on a gnarled, dark brown branch that extends from the right side of the frame towards the center. The background is a plain, light brown, suggesting an empty sky. The bird on the left is larger, facing right, with a prominent blue crest on its head, a red beak, and a white patch under its chin. Its body is primarily olive green, transitioning to blue on its wings and a long, flowing blue tail. Its feet are red, gripping the branch. Behind and slightly to the right of the first bird, a second, smaller bird faces left. It also has a blue crest and a reddish beak, with a lighter, pale brown body and blue wing feathers. Delicate branches with numerous white and pale pink blossoms extend across the upper half of the painting, particularly dense on the left side and above the birds. Some blossoms are fully open, while others appear as buds. The main branch supporting the birds is thick and textured, with smaller offshoots bearing a few more blossoms and buds. The overall composition is balanced, with the birds and the main branch anchoring the right and center, and the flowering branches filling the left and upper areas.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   舊傳易元吉   八禽圖   卷|Birds on Branches
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal painting shows various white and dark birds in a serene landscape with trees, green hills, and water
long_description: The painting is a horizontal landscape rendered in a muted palette of browns, greens, and reddish-pink. The background is a warm, light brown, suggesting an expansive sky or distant atmosphere. On the far left, a large tree with a thick, dark brown trunk and branches extends upwards and towards the center. Its branches are adorned with small, reddish-pink blossoms or leaves, and several dark-colored birds perch among them. Below this tree, a series of undulating green hills and banks slope downwards, defining the terrain. Further to the right, a smaller, bare tree with dark, gnarled branches stands on a green bank, with two small, light blue birds perched on its branches. A calm body of water, depicted in a slightly darker brown-green hue, stretches across the lower half of the painting, separating the foreground banks from the mid-ground. Along the green banks bordering the water, several large white birds, resembling cranes or egrets, are positioned. Some stand upright, one appears to be preening with its head tucked, and another is bending its neck towards the water. In the upper right portion of the painting, several smaller white birds are shown in various stages of flight, with their wings spread. Additional small, dark birds are visible near the water's edge and on the branches of the trees. The overall composition creates a serene natural scene with a sense of depth and movement.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   舊傳刁光   叢簧集羽   卷|River Scene with Birds and Bamboo
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and mineral color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting on a fan, featuring mountains, trees, and a river.
long_description: The artwork is an ink wash landscape painting presented on a fan-shaped surface. The composition features a panoramic view of mountains, hills, and a river, rendered primarily in shades of black and grey ink on a light, possibly cream-colored ground. In the background, several prominent mountains rise, their peaks depicted with dark, textured ink strokes that suggest ruggedness. Lighter washes of ink create a sense of atmospheric depth and mist around their bases and between the peaks. The midground is dominated by rolling hills covered with dense clusters of trees. The trees on the right side are particularly dark and full, with individual leaves or branches suggested by varied brushwork. A lighter, more open area of trees and vegetation extends towards the left. A horizontal band of lighter ink across the middle suggests a misty valley or distant water. In the foreground, a river or stream flows from the center towards the lower left edge of the fan. Its banks are dotted with small rocks and patches of land. In the lower left corner, near the river, there are a few indistinct shapes rendered in a faint yellowish-brown hue. In the upper left quadrant, several columns of vertical text are inscribed in black calligraphic script. Below and slightly to the left of the text, a small red square seal is visible. The radial lines of the fan structure are visible throughout the entire painted surface.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   倣惲壽平   倣米家山水圖   扇|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on paper

alt_text: Black and white fan painting depicting a mountainous landscape with trees, a boat on water, and calligraphic text.
long_description: The image is a black and white fan painting, wider at the top and curving inward to a narrow base. The artwork depicts a serene landscape scene rendered in ink washes and fine lines. On the left, a rugged mountain range rises, its peaks and slopes detailed with textured brushstrokes. In the mid-ground, a cluster of trees, some with sparse branches and others with denser foliage, grows on a rocky embankment that slopes down towards a body of water. A small, simple structure, possibly a hut, is visible among the trees on the left. A calm expanse of water stretches across the middle of the fan, reflecting the distant, softer mountains in the background. A small, narrow boat with a single figure is positioned on the water, moving towards the right. On the far right side of the fan, a large block of vertical calligraphic text is inscribed in black ink, occupying about one-third of the fan's surface. Below the text, a small, square, dark seal is visible. The entire scene is rendered in varying shades of gray, from deep blacks in the text and foreground details to lighter washes for the distant mountains and sky.

metadata.title: 明   宋旭   書法   扇|Landscape
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on gold paper

alt_text: Ink wash landscape on a fan depicting a boatman near a willow tree and distant mountains.
long_description: A fan-shaped ink wash painting on light brown paper depicts a serene landscape. On the left, a large, bare willow tree with drooping branches stands prominently, flanked by smaller trees and dark, jagged rock formations at the water's edge. A body of water, likely a river or lake, extends across the middle ground. A small, flat-bottomed boat with a single figure seated in the middle is positioned near the left bank, facing towards the right. The immediate foreground bank is lined with tall, thin grasses or reeds rendered with delicate brushstrokes. In the distance, on the far bank, are dark, undulating hills or mountains. The upper right quadrant of the fan contains several columns of vertical calligraphic text written in black ink, followed by a square red seal impression. The entire scene is rendered in varying shades of black and grey ink on the light brown paper.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   倣沈周   山水   扇|Landscape
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on gold paper

alt_text: A blue-green bird perches on a branch with dark green leaves and reddish-purple fruits in a circular painting.
long_description: The image is a circular painting on a light brown ground. A small bird with blue-green plumage, a black head, and a prominent white eye ring is positioned in the upper left quadrant. The bird faces right and slightly downward, appearing to look at the fruits below. It is perched on a slender branch that extends diagonally from the upper left towards the lower right. The branch is adorned with several dark green, elongated leaves. Clustered along the branch are multiple fruits. Some fruits are a deep reddish-purple, round, and covered in small, raised bumps. Others are lighter, a pale green or off-white, and also have a bumpy texture. Three prominent reddish-purple fruits are visible in the lower right and upper right of the branch. In the upper right portion of the circular painting, vertical black text reads "陳紫茄子圖香囊". To the right of the circular painting, on a rectangular strip of the same light brown color, additional vertical black text reads "宋徽宗". The overall composition places the bird and fruits centrally within the circular frame.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts a dark bamboo stalk with leaves on a circular brown background, with red seals and text
long_description: The artwork features a circular painting set against a light beige, rectangular background. The circular painting, rendered in a dark brown hue, occupies the majority of the frame. On the left side of this circular area, a thick, dark black bamboo stalk rises vertically, its upper section tapering slightly. Several thin branches with pointed, dark black leaves extend from the stalk, reaching towards the upper and central parts of the circle. Additional dark black leaves are visible near the base of the stalk. Three red square seals are present within the circular painting: one larger seal in the upper right quadrant, and two smaller seals positioned below it, closer to the right edge. To the right of the circular painting, a narrow, light brown rectangular strip with a slightly uneven top edge contains a vertical column of dark characters. This strip partially overlaps the circular painting in the upper right corner.

metadata.title: 清  佚名   舊傳蘇軾   墨竹圖   扇|Bamboo
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: A black bird with a prominent crest perches on a branch with green leaves and light-colored fruit.
long_description: The artwork is a painting on a fan-shaped surface, featuring a bird and plant elements against a plain background. A black bird with a distinctive crest on its head is positioned in the upper left quadrant, facing right. Its plumage is dark, with fine scale-like texture visible on its body. It has a small white eye with a dark pupil and a light-colored, pointed beak. There are subtle white markings on its wing and a pattern of white and dark stripes on its tail feathers. The bird perches on a dark branch that extends horizontally across the lower half of the composition. Several green leaves, varying in shade from a muted sage green to a slightly darker emerald, sprout from the branch. To the right of the bird, a cluster of round, light tan or pale yellow fruits with dark centers hangs from the branch. The background is a uniform, warm golden-brown color. In the upper right corner, a vertical rectangular strip with dark, calligraphic characters is visible. The characters read: 南宋善楊鳩鳴生.

metadata.title: 南宋？佚名    舊傳吳炳   枇杷八哥圖   團扇頁|Minah Bird on a Loquat Branch
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; Ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink painting of a multi-story pavilion on a rocky cliff overlooking water, with distant mountains and trees.
long_description: The artwork is a monochrome ink painting on a light brown ground, presented in a rounded, fan-like shape. The central focus is a large, multi-story pavilion situated on a prominent rocky outcrop in the right-center. The pavilion features multiple curved, tiled roofs, open balconies, and intricate architectural details. Small figures are visible within the pavilion and on its balconies, some seated at tables. To the immediate right of the pavilion, a tall, gnarled pine tree with dense foliage rises, its branches extending over the building. The rocky hill beneath the pavilion is rendered with textured brushstrokes, showing various smaller trees and dense foliage. To the left of the main structure, a stone arch bridge spans a body of water, connecting the rocky foreground to a smaller, tree-covered landmass in the mid-ground. On this distant landmass, another smaller, simpler pavilion is partially visible amidst the trees. The water surface is calm, reflecting the light. In the background, hazy, ink-washed mountains rise, their peaks sparsely dotted with trees, creating a sense of depth and distance. The sky above is a uniform, light tone, blending into the distant mountains. The entire scene is depicted using varying shades of dark ink, creating a rich tonal range against the light brown paper.

metadata.title: 明?   佚名   舊傳李嵩   溪山樓閣圖   扇|Pavilion on a pond
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome landscape painting with a large gnarled pine tree, buildings, water, and figures under faint mountains
long_description: A monochrome landscape painting, rendered in shades of brown and grey, depicts a serene scene with architectural elements, natural features, and figures. A prominent, gnarled pine tree with sparse needles extends diagonally from the lower right corner towards the upper left, its branches reaching over a complex of buildings. In the middle ground, a body of water, possibly a pond or lake, is visible, with a small boat containing a single figure. A bridge crosses a narrow section of this water. Several buildings with dark, tiled roofs are scattered across the lower and middle sections of the painting, surrounded by dense, dark foliage and rocks. On a path or roof in the middle right, two figures are visible, one standing and one walking away. Faint, undulating mountains rise in the background, blending into the lighter, unadorned sky. In the upper right corner, a vertical strip of lighter brown paper or silk contains dark vertical text, which reads "元張可觀". The overall impression is one of depth and tranquility, with a focus on the interplay between human structures and the natural world.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   舊傳 元張可觀   月映松臺圖   冊頁|Moonlit terrace
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A small bird with a red chest perches on a branch with green leaves and reddish-purple fruits
long_description: The artwork is a painting on a light brown, fan-shaped surface, depicting a bird on a branch with fruit and leaves. The bird is positioned slightly above the center, facing right. It has a dark gray head, a bright red chest, and a white belly. Its back and tail are dark gray. The bird is perched on a slender, dark branch that extends from the upper right towards the lower left. Numerous dark green leaves of various sizes grow from the branches, some overlapping. Several round, reddish-purple fruits with textured surfaces hang from the branches, primarily in the lower left and upper right. There are also smaller, spiky, greenish-yellow fruits visible in the upper right and lower left. Vertical lines of dark script are present on the left side of the fan shape, starting from the upper left curve and extending downwards. Another, shorter vertical strip of dark script is visible on a light brown rectangular piece attached to the upper right edge of the fan. At the bottom center, a red seal impression is visible, accompanied by some dark, calligraphic marks. The background of the fan is a uniform, light brown color.

metadata.title: 明  佚名（舊傳宋徽宗） 荔枝圖  冊頁|Bird on a Lychee Branch
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A classical landscape painting with many robed figures, mountains, dense trees, and traditional buildings.
long_description: An oval-shaped painting depicts a classical landscape scene with numerous figures, mountains, and structures. The upper half is dominated by large, rugged mountains, rendered in shades of brown and blue-green, with dark green foliage on their slopes. On the far right, a multi-tiered pagoda-like building with multiple roofs is visible on a distant peak. The middle ground and foreground are densely populated with dark green trees, some forming clusters, others appearing as individual, gnarled forms. Throughout the lower half of the landscape, many small figures are seated on the light brown ground. These figures, dressed in light-colored robes, are arranged in various small groups, appearing to converse or interact. On the right side of the mid-ground, a prominent building with a dark roof and light-colored walls stands amidst the trees, with figures visible inside and around it. The ground features subtle, wavy lines in darker brown, suggesting paths or natural contours. The overall color palette is muted, consisting mainly of browns, tans, dark greens, and subtle blue-greens. In the upper right corner, a vertical rectangular cartouche contains several lines of dark, vertical script that reads: '非本寺龍藏副寺修禊品'.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　舊傳李公麟　蘭亭修禊圖　團扇|Gathering at the Orchid Pavilion
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two butterflies, a grasshopper, and blue flowers with tall grasses on a light brown panel.
long_description: The artwork is a painting on a light brown, rounded square panel, depicting insects and plants. In the upper left, a large white butterfly with black spots on its wings flies with its wings spread. To its right, a tall, slender stalk with a textured, elongated seed head extends upwards and curves slightly to the right. Below this stalk, several long, green leaves emerge from the bottom of the panel, curving upwards. In the upper right, a smaller, light-colored butterfly with patterned wings hovers. In the lower left, a dense cluster of light blue and white daisy-like flowers with yellow centers is depicted, surrounded by dark green leaves. Another smaller cluster of similar flowers appears in the lower right. A greenish-brown grasshopper with visible legs and antennae rests on a plant stem in the lower right, positioned above the second flower cluster. Two red square seals with illegible characters are visible: one on the far left edge, vertically oriented, and another on the bottom right edge, horizontally oriented. A numerical inscription "13.100.III" is at the very bottom right corner. The overall background of the panel is a plain, light brown.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A blue and white bird perches on a leafy branch with clusters of red lychee fruits
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting on a plain, light brown background. A small bird with a blue back, white belly, and a dark head with a prominent white eye ring is perched on a leafy branch in the upper left quadrant. Its beak is pointed downwards towards the branch. The branch extends from the left side of the composition, with several clusters of dark green, elongated leaves. Hanging from the branches are multiple red, textured, round lychee fruits, primarily concentrated in the lower right and central areas. The fruits have a bumpy, reddish-pink skin. In the upper right, a vertical column of dark calligraphic characters is visible. Two red square seals are present: one in the lower left corner and another in the lower right corner, both containing dark characters. A smaller, more abstract red seal is also visible below the branch in the lower left, resembling a stylized figure or character.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts a striped gourd hanging from a vine with two large leaves on a light brown background
long_description: A painting features a single gourd suspended from a vine, flanked by two large leaves, set against a light brown background. The gourd, positioned slightly left of center, is rounded and vertically ribbed, with alternating dark green-blue and light yellow-brown stripes. A dark green-blue vine emerges from the top of the gourd, curving upwards and to the right, with a delicate tendril spiraling off to the upper left. Two prominent, dark green-blue leaves are attached to the vine; one is situated above and to the left of the gourd, while the other is to its right. Both leaves display visible vein patterns. The background is a uniform light brown, showing signs of age with subtle texture and lighter, faded patches. In the lower left corner, two small, stacked red square seals are visible, containing illegible characters. Another pair of similar red square seals appears in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: 明    佚名    南瓜    扇面|Squash
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting of dark branches, leaves, and two light-colored, round fruits or flowers on a dark background
long_description: An oval-shaped painting depicts a botanical scene against a muted dark brown background. Dark, gnarled branches extend across the upper and middle sections of the composition. In the upper left, a small, dark, bird-like shape perches on a bare branch. Clusters of dark green and brown leaves, some showing visible veins, are distributed along the branches, particularly on the left and center. Two prominent, light-colored, round objects dominate the lower right and center. The larger object, in the foreground, is pale yellow-brown with a faint circular outline in its center. A smaller, similarly colored round object is positioned behind and slightly to the left of the larger one. The overall color palette is earthy and subdued, with the dark elements contrasting with the lighter fruits or flowers. A small, rectangular red seal with indistinct characters is visible in the upper right quadrant of the painting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A circular painting depicts a snowy winter landscape with mountains, water, and small buildings.
long_description: A circular painting, rendered in muted, dark brown and grey tones, depicts a serene winter landscape. The composition is divided by a large body of water stretching horizontally across the middle ground. On the left, a tall, dark, rocky cliff rises from the bottom edge, extending upwards. A dark, dense tree with visible branches grows from the upper part of this cliff, and a small, light-colored structure is nestled into the rock face below it. The water surface is calm, reflecting the somber sky. In the distance, a low, undulating line of land, possibly snow-covered hills or mountains, stretches across the horizon. The right foreground features a snow-covered shoreline with several small, simple buildings, likely huts, characterized by dark roofs and lighter, snow-dusted walls. Bare, dark trees and sparse vegetation are scattered around these structures. A small, arched bridge, possibly wooden, spans a narrow channel in the lower right, with a tiny, dark figure visible on or near it. The ground throughout the foreground and around the buildings is covered in snow, indicated by lighter, textured areas. A small red seal or inscription is visible in the upper right corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 明?   佚名   舊傳燕文貴   雪橋送別   扇|Bridge in Snow
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A muted landscape painting featuring mountains, dense trees, water, small structures, and red seals.
long_description: The painting depicts a landscape scene rendered in muted brown and dark green tones, presented on a square-ish canvas with rounded corners. On the left side, a large, dark mountain or cliff face rises, densely covered with dark, textured trees that extend from the lower edge upwards and towards the center. Nestled among the trees and at the base of this mountain, small, simple structures with visible roofs are partially obscured by the foliage. A body of water, appearing as a lighter, flat area, flows from the center-left towards the right, separating the foreground from the distant elements. The right side of the painting is more open, featuring a hazy, lighter background with faint outlines of distant mountains or hills. In the foreground on the right, smaller, dark, rocky formations are visible, interspersed with sparse, dark vegetation. The sky above is a uniform muted brown. Several red seals are stamped on the painting: a rectangular one in the upper left, a larger square one in the upper right, and a small square one in the lower left corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A fan-shaped painting depicts a landscape with towering mountains, a body of water, and a small building.
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting depicting a mountainous landscape rendered in muted tones of brown, gray, and dark green. The composition is dominated by a series of tall, rugged mountains that rise from the bottom and extend towards the top and sides of the frame. On the left side, a body of water, possibly a river or lake, stretches horizontally, receding into the distance. The mountainsides are covered with numerous trees, rendered with dark, dotted foliage, some appearing as clusters and others as individual, taller forms. A few trees, particularly in the lower central and right areas, show hints of reddish-brown foliage. Towards the upper right, nestled on a mountain ledge, is a small, two-tiered building with a dark, pointed roof. A tall, thin flag or banner extends upwards from behind this building. Further mountains are visible in the background, appearing lighter and more indistinct. The overall color palette is earthy, with the main canvas being a light brown, and the mountains and trees rendered with darker grays and greens, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere. In the lower left corner, several red rectangular seals are visible, stacked vertically.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A circular painting depicts a multi-story building complex with curved roofs, surrounded by trees, rocks, and a steep cliff.
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting depicting a detailed landscape with architectural structures. The dominant feature on the left side is a large, multi-story building complex with multiple tiered, curved roofs. The buildings are rendered in muted tones of brown, grey, and dark green, with subtle red accents on the roof edges. Balconies and walkways connect different sections of the complex, and small figures can be discerned on these elevated platforms. In the foreground, below and to the right of the buildings, are gnarled trees with dark green foliage and large, blue-grey rocks. To the right, a steep, textured cliff face rises from the bottom edge, extending upwards towards the top right quadrant. This cliff is depicted with vertical striations and varying shades of green and brown, suggesting rugged terrain. Further into the background, on the upper right, faint, tall, and narrow rock formations or distant mountains emerge from a misty, light brown atmosphere. The upper left and central areas of the circular composition are largely open, filled with this same muted, light brown tone, suggesting an expansive sky or atmospheric haze. A rectangular red seal with illegible characters is visible in the upper left quadrant of the painting.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   仙山樓閣圖   團扇頁|Palace
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts a flowering branch with white blossoms and green bamboo leaves on a light brown background.
long_description: The image is a square-format painting on a light brown, untextured background. A flowering branch extends diagonally from the upper right towards the lower left, dominating the upper and central portions of the composition. The branch is dark brown, gnarled, and appears to be bare of leaves, but is adorned with numerous white blossoms and smaller, reddish-pink buds. The blossoms are open, featuring five delicate white petals and a small yellow or light green center. Some flowers are fully open, while others are still partially closed, revealing their reddish-pink undersides. The branch itself is thickest on the right, tapering as it extends leftward, with several smaller offshoots. Below and to the right of the main branch, a cluster of slender, dark green bamboo leaves emerges from the lower right corner, extending upwards and to the left. These leaves are long and pointed, with visible veins, and are painted with varying shades of green, suggesting depth. The overall impression is of a sparse, natural arrangement against a plain, warm-toned backdrop.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   梅竹圖   冊頁|Flowering Plum and Bamboo
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two birds perch on a flowering branch with pink and white blossoms on a light brown background
long_description: A circular painting features a flowering branch with two birds against a plain, light brown background. The branch, dark and gnarled, originates from the upper left quadrant and curves downwards, extending towards the lower right. It is adorned with numerous clusters of blossoms and green leaves. The flowers are primarily light pink and white, with some darker pink buds scattered along the branches. Many of the blossoms are fully open, revealing delicate petals and lighter centers. Two small birds are perched on the branch. The bird on the left has a brownish body and is facing left, with its tail feathers fanned slightly. The bird on the right, positioned slightly lower and to the right of the first, also has a brownish body with hints of blue-grey on its wings and head, and is facing right with its beak slightly open. The birds are nestled among the leaves and flowers, appearing to interact with the blossoms. The overall composition fills the upper and central portions of the circular frame, leaving the lower right area of the background mostly clear.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   山禽海棠   扇|Flowers with Birds
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A green and red parrot perches on a flowering branch against a plain brown background
long_description: The artwork is presented on a light brown, rounded square panel. A parrot, facing right, is perched on a flowering branch that extends across the lower half of the panel. The parrot has a black cap on its head, a reddish-pink face and chest, and a green body with lighter green scales visible on its back and wings. Its beak is light-colored. The branch, dark brown with some lighter highlights, extends from the lower left, curving upwards and to the right, with smaller offshoots. Numerous white and light purple flowers with yellow centers bloom along the branch, some fully open and others as tight buds. More sparse flowering branches are visible in the upper right and upper left corners. A small, red, square seal with illegible characters is located in the lower right quadrant of the panel, beneath the branch. The background is a uniform, unadorned light brown.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A bird with a dark head, red beak, and olive-green back perches on a branch with large, damaged leaves
long_description: The image is a painting on a light brown background, depicting a bird perched on a branch amidst leaves. The bird, positioned in the upper center, faces left with its head slightly lowered. It has a dark, almost black head, a prominent reddish-orange beak, and a red ring around its eye. Its back and wings are a muted olive-green, contrasting with its white belly. Its reddish feet grasp a thin, gnarled branch that extends horizontally across the mid-section of the painting. Below the bird and extending across the lower half of the image are several large leaves. The most prominent leaf, directly beneath the bird, is broad and palmate, rendered in muted green with significant brown discoloration and numerous irregular holes, suggesting decay or insect damage. Its central veins are clearly visible. To the right and slightly above this large leaf, another branch extends with smaller, more intact leaves that are mostly brown and olive green, some bearing small dark, round objects that resemble berries. Another large, less damaged green leaf is visible in the lower right corner. The overall color palette is earthy, dominated by greens, browns, and the light tan background.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   秋葉山禽   冊頁|Bird on Branch
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A light brown bird with a lighter belly perches on a branch with reddish-brown leaves and dark berries
long_description: The artwork depicts a bird perched on a branch against a plain, light brown background. The bird is positioned slightly to the left of the center, facing right. Its back and head are a muted light brown or grey, with a lighter, almost white, belly. Subtle, faint stripes are visible on its chest and neck. Its tail feathers and the tips of its wings are a darker shade of brown or grey. The bird's eye is dark, and its beak is pointed. The branch extends diagonally from the lower left corner towards the right, with several smaller twigs branching off. It is dark brown. Attached to the branch are numerous leaves, predominantly in shades of reddish-brown, yellowish-brown, and some muted green. Many of the leaves show signs of age or damage, with small holes and irregular edges. On the far right side of the branch, a cluster of small, dark, round berries is visible. The overall composition places the bird and branch in the lower half of the frame, leaving the upper right portion of the background empty. The background itself is a uniform, light tan or beige color, showing a slight texture.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk
