alt_text: Two small birds perch on thorny branches with green bamboo leaves and red berries on a light brown ground
long_description: The artwork features two small birds perched on thorny branches, surrounded by green bamboo leaves and small red berries, all set against a plain, light brown background. The composition is arranged diagonally, with the main cluster of foliage and birds occupying the right and lower-middle sections of the image. In the lower left, a small bird with a reddish-brown head, a light grey chest, and darker grey-brown wings and tail is perched on a thin, dark, thorny branch. Its body is oriented horizontally, facing right, with its head tilted slightly downwards, appearing to peck at the branch. Its eye is a small dark dot. Above and to the right, a second bird is partially visible, mostly obscured by a dense cluster of green bamboo leaves and thorny branches. This bird appears to be facing downwards, with its reddish-brown head and part of its back visible, suggesting similar plumage to the first bird. Numerous thin, dark, thorny branches extend across the right half of the image, some bearing small, round, bright red berries. Clusters of elongated, pointed green bamboo leaves are interspersed among the branches, particularly around the upper bird. Some lighter, yellowish-brown leaves or dried flowers are also visible among the green foliage. The background is a uniform, unadorned light brown, providing a stark contrast to the detailed natural elements.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   竹禽圖   冊頁|Bamboo Branch with Berries and Birds
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting shows a large red camellia flower, green leaves, and buds on a thorny branch against a tan background.
long_description: The artwork features a botanical painting on a light tan, rounded rectangular background. A single branch of a camellia plant extends diagonally across the composition, originating from the lower left and reaching towards the upper right. The focal point is a large, fully bloomed red camellia flower situated in the upper central portion of the image. This flower displays numerous layered petals, creating a full, rounded form. Below and to the left of the large flower, the branch is adorned with several dark green leaves. These leaves are oval with pointed tips and show subtle variations in shading, suggesting depth. Further along the branch, towards the lower left, a smaller, partially opened red camellia bud is visible, encased by green sepals and surrounded by additional green leaves. Another smaller, tightly closed bud appears further to the right on the branch. The branch itself is brown, with a slightly textured appearance, and small, sharp thorns are visible along its length, particularly towards the lower right. In the bottom left corner of the tan background, a small, square red seal with dark characters is present. The painting depicts the plant with a clear, detailed style against a plain, unadorned background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Insects fly among green leafy branches with yellow and pink flowers on a light brown background
long_description: This artwork depicts a vibrant natural scene on a light brown, rounded background. A dense cluster of green leafy branches dominates the right and lower portions of the composition, extending towards the left. The foliage features numerous small, dark green leaves. Among these leaves, various flowers bloom: many small, light yellow or off-white daisy-like blossoms are concentrated in the upper right and center, while several larger, fringed pink flowers are scattered, with one prominent bloom in the lower left-center and another in the mid-right. Several insects are distributed throughout the scene. In the upper left, two dark, beetle-like insects appear to be in flight. A slender, light-colored insect, possibly a dragonfly or damselfly, is positioned in the upper right, near the top of the leafy branches. In the lower left-center, a yellow and black striped insect, resembling a wasp or bee, rests on one of the pink fringed flowers. A small red insect is visible on a leaf in the lower right. A red seal, containing illegible characters, is present in the lower left corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   蜂舞花叢   册頁|Flowers and Bees
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A small bird perches on a branch with dark green leaves and bright red berries on a light brown background
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting featuring a bird on a fruiting branch against a plain background. The background is a uniform light brown or tan color, filling most of the circular frame. A single branch extends diagonally from the lower left quadrant towards the upper right. This branch is adorned with numerous dark green leaves, some appearing slightly lighter on their undersides, and clusters of bright red berries. The leaves are ovate with serrated edges. The berries are small, round to heart-shaped, and appear in groups of two or three along the branch. A small bird is perched on the central part of the branch, facing towards the right. The bird has a light brown body with a darker, grayish-brown head and a distinct white patch on its throat or chest. Its tail feathers are a muted brown, and its wings show subtle variations in brown and gray tones. The bird's beak is dark and pointed. It is partially obscured by the surrounding leaves and berries, positioned among them as if feeding or resting. The composition places the natural elements centrally, with ample open space around them.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A brown bird with spread wings perches on a branch with green leaves and light green fruits
long_description: The artwork features a bird perched on a fruiting branch against a plain, light brown background. The overall shape of the painting is a rounded square. A slender, dark brown branch extends horizontally across the middle of the frame, with smaller twigs branching off. Numerous green leaves, varying in shade from dark to lighter green, are attached to the branches. Many of these leaves show signs of insect damage, with small, irregular holes scattered across their surfaces. Several round, light green fruits with a subtle reddish-pink blush are visible among the leaves, hanging from the branches. On the right side of the composition, a small bird is perched on one of the branches. The bird has a light brown back and wings, with a lighter, almost white, underside. Its head is dark brown with a lighter patch around its eye and a small, pointed beak. Its wings are slightly spread, suggesting it has just landed or is about to take flight. The bird faces towards the right, its gaze directed slightly downward. The background is a uniform, light tan or beige color, providing a stark contrast to the detailed natural elements in the foreground.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts three light-colored, textured fruits on a thorny branch with dark green leaves against a plain background
long_description: The artwork features a branch laden with three fruits and numerous leaves, set against a plain, light brown background. The branch originates from the lower left and extends diagonally towards the upper right, displaying several smaller, thorny twigs. The fruits are roughly pear-shaped or round, characterized by a light yellow-brown hue and a textured, slightly bumpy surface. The largest fruit is prominently positioned in the upper right quadrant, with a small dark insect visible on its surface. Another fruit is situated below and slightly to the left of the largest one, partially obscured by surrounding leaves. A third, smaller fruit is visible in the lower left, also partially hidden by foliage. The leaves are predominantly dark green, with some exhibiting lighter green or brown edges, suggesting varying stages of growth or decay. They are clustered around the fruits and along the length of the branch. The background is a uniform, unadorned light brown, providing a stark contrast to the detailed botanical elements. The overall composition is balanced, with the plant elements occupying the central and right portions of the square frame.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   秋梨圖   冊頁|Branch of Tree with Fruit
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A crested bird perches on a branch with white flowers and green leaves on a circular brown background
long_description: A circular painting features a bird perched on a flowering branch against a plain light brown background. The bird, positioned slightly right of center, faces left with its head turned slightly forward. It has a prominent crest on its head, a dark pointed beak, and dark markings around its eyes. Its chest and belly are light, transitioning to darker, possibly blue-grey, feathers on its back and wings. Hints of red are visible on its tail feathers. The branch, dark brown and gnarled, extends from the lower left, curving upwards and to the right, supporting several clusters of green leaves. Among the leaves are multiple white flowers with distinct yellow centers, resembling camellias, some fully open and others appearing as buds. A large, rectangular red seal with two columns of characters is visible at the top center of the circular composition. A smaller, square red seal with characters is located in the lower left quadrant.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts people playing a board game on a balcony above a garden with a large tree and lotus flowers
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts a multi-level scene with a building and a garden, rendered in earthy tones of brown and green with accents of brighter colors. On the right side of the upper half, a wooden balcony or elevated platform is visible. Six individuals are gathered on this platform. Two low, rectangular tables are positioned in the center of the group, and the individuals appear to be engaged in a board game, with small pieces visible on the table surfaces. Their attire includes robes in shades of green, blue, and light brown. One person on the far left of the balcony holds a white fan. The balcony features a dark brown railing with intricate, geometric patterns. Below the balcony, a garden scene unfolds. A large, ancient-looking tree with a thick, gnarled brown trunk and abundant green, weeping foliage occupies the left side, extending from the bottom edge of the painting upwards, partially obscuring the balcony. Three figures are present in the garden area. Near the base of the tree, a person in a brown robe stands, holding a long, thin object, and looks down at a small child in a light-colored garment who is crawling or sitting on the ground. To the right of the tree, a set of dark brown stairs with patterned railings ascends towards the balcony. A person in a green robe stands on the lower steps, facing right. Further right, another person in a light brown robe stands on the ground, also facing right. In the lower right corner, a cluster of green foliage with several light pink lotus flowers is depicted. The ground throughout the garden is a uniform light brown.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   舊傳周昉   閑庭仕女圖   卷|Women and children in a garden
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal landscape painting depicting mountains, trees with red foliage, a body of water, and small structures
long_description: A horizontal landscape painting features a muted, earthy color palette dominated by browns, dark greens, and reddish-browns. The left side is anchored by a large, dark brown mountain or cliff face, densely covered in dark green and reddish-brown foliage. At its base, a body of water extends towards the center. A small, light brown wooden bridge crosses a narrow gap in the lower left, connecting to a smaller landmass. Further right along the water's edge, a small, simple structure with a thatched roof and light brown walls is nestled among the trees and rocks. The central and right portions of the painting are filled with an undulating mountain range, also dark brown and covered in a variety of trees. Many trees display distinct reddish-brown leaves, suggesting autumn, while others are dark green. The mountains are rendered with numerous small, dark strokes, creating a rugged texture. The upper portion of the painting is a lighter, uniform brown, suggesting a sky or distant haze, with faint, darker outlines of distant peaks. The far right edge shows a white patterned border, indicating the edge of the scroll or mounting.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   舊傳范寬   煙嵐秋曉圖   卷|Autumn Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Four figures and a brown horse on a plain background, with one figure seated at a low table.
long_description: The horizontal painting depicts four human figures and a brown horse against a plain, light brown background. The surface shows signs of age with visible cracks and discoloration. On the left side, a brown horse stands facing right. Below its head, a man with a dark beard kneels on the ground, holding a dark line or rope. To the right of the horse, another man with a dark beard stands, wearing a light-colored tunic with red and blue accents and dark boots. He appears to be holding the horse's bridle. Further to the right, a man with a dark beard sits on a low, rectangular wooden table, facing left. He wears a long, light-colored robe. Behind the table, a woman stands, also facing left, holding a green fan with a red handle. She wears a long, light-colored dress with red accents at the chest. A red square seal with dark characters is visible in the upper right corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   舊傳趙孟頫   相馬圖   卷|Judging a Horse
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal landscape painting depicting mountains, trees, a winding path, and traditional buildings.
long_description: The image is a horizontal landscape painting rendered in muted tones of brown, grey, and dark green on a light, aged background. The composition unfolds from left to right, depicting a vast natural scene with subtle signs of human presence. On the far left, a winding path or river, indicated by lighter brushstrokes, meanders through a relatively flat expanse. This area is populated by numerous trees with dark, dense canopies and slender trunks, scattered across the foreground and mid-ground. As the eye moves right, the landscape transitions into a series of undulating hills and towering mountains. These mountains are depicted with textured, layered brushwork, creating a sense of ruggedness and depth, primarily in shades of grey and brown. In the central-right portion of the painting, nestled within a valley formed by the mountains and surrounded by more dark green trees, is a complex of traditional buildings. These structures feature distinct reddish-brown roofs and lighter-colored walls, suggesting a temple or a large dwelling. The mountains continue to recede into the background on the far right, maintaining the overall sense of an expansive, serene natural environment. The painting's palette and style evoke a classical landscape aesthetic.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　郭忠恕　僞款　輞川圖　卷|Wangchuan Villa
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Four horses on a plain tan background, some with red bags hanging from their bridles.
long_description: The image depicts four horses against a plain, light brown background. On the far left, a partial view of a dark brown horse is visible, facing right. Next to it, a larger, light-colored horse, possibly white or pale tan, stands facing right with its mouth slightly open. This horse has a dark mane and tail. Both the partial brown horse and the light-colored horse wear light blue or green bridles, from which a conical, bright red bag hangs below their chins. To the right of these two, another light brown horse stands, facing right with its head lowered as if grazing or drinking. Behind it, partially obscured, is a fourth horse of a similar light brown color, also with its head lowered. Both of these rightmost horses also wear light blue or green bridles, and each has a bright red, conical bag hanging from its bridle. The horses are rendered with subtle shading, giving them a three-dimensional quality against the flat background.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   八駿圖   卷|Eight Horses
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A white and a dark dove rest beneath a flowering branch on a muted brown ground
long_description: The image is a horizontal painting on a muted, yellowish-brown ground. In the lower left, two doves are depicted. The dove on the left is white, standing with its head turned slightly to the right. Its feathers are rendered with fine, scale-like details, and it has pinkish-red feet and a small red eye. To its right, a dark-feathered dove crouches low to the ground, facing left towards the white dove. This dark dove also has a small red eye. Above and to the left of the doves, a branch with light-colored flowers and green leaves extends horizontally across the upper left portion of the painting. The flowers are mostly white or very pale yellow, with some showing a darker center. The ground beneath the doves and extending to the right features sparse, delicate green and brown vegetation, suggesting grass and small plants. The overall impression is one of quiet natural observation. A vertical column of dark characters is visible on the far right edge of the painting.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   舊傳艾宣    鵪鶉   卷|Quail
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A black and white ink painting depicts a vast snowy mountain landscape with trees, buildings, and a lake
long_description: The image is a vertical, black and white ink painting depicting a vast, snow-covered mountain landscape. The upper portion features a dark, textured sky above a wide body of water, possibly a lake or river, with distant, undulating hills or mountains on the far bank. The middle ground is dominated by towering, craggy mountains, heavily textured with ink washes and lines, their peaks and upper slopes covered in white snow. Bare, dark trees with intricate branches are scattered across the mountainsides and valleys, contrasting sharply with the white snow. Several multi-story buildings with curved, tiered roofs are nestled among the mountains, some appearing on ledges overlooking the water. A small boat with a sail is visible on the water to the right. In the lower portion, more snow-covered rocks and trees frame a winding path that ascends from the bottom left, where small figures can be seen walking. The overall impression is one of a serene, wintry scene rendered with detailed brushwork and varying shades of ink.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts a central seated figure in red, flanked by other figures and two small children below, amidst clouds
long_description: This vertical painting features multiple figures against a muted brown background with lighter, swirling cloud-like patterns. At the top center, a large figure sits with legs crossed, wearing a long, flowing red robe with a white undergarment. This figure has dark hair pulled back, with a small dark ornament on the forehead, and hands clasped in front. To the left and slightly below, a standing figure with a shaved head wears a long, multi-layered robe in shades of brown, red, and blue, holding a long, thin object in their right hand. To the right of the central figure and slightly lower, another figure sits, adorned in an elaborate, patterned robe with a headdress. This figure's hands are positioned near a tall, leafy plant with several red flowers in a pot, which is centrally located in the lower half of the composition. Below the plant, two smaller, child-like figures stand facing each other. The figure on the left wears a green garment with flowing blue ribbons, while the figure on the right wears a blue garment with similar ribbons. The overall color palette is dominated by earthy browns, muted reds, and subtle greens and blues. The figures are arranged in a roughly triangular composition, with the largest figure at the apex.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   禮佛圖   軸|Shakyamuni with luohan, heavenly king, and boys
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A grayscale portrait of a bearded man in a hat, with calligraphic text above and patterned borders.
long_description: This grayscale image depicts a vertical scroll-like artwork. At the very top, a horizontal decorative border features a repeating pattern of stylized floral or cloud-like motifs against a darker background. Below this border, the upper half of the main field is filled with multiple columns of calligraphic text, rendered in dark characters on a lighter gray background. The text is arranged vertically, reading from right to left. Below the text, a half-length portrait of a man is depicted. He faces slightly towards the right, with a dark, multi-tiered hat covering his head. He has a prominent beard and mustache, and his facial features are rendered with subtle shading. He wears a robe, indicated by broad strokes, and appears to be holding or resting his hands on an object that extends diagonally across his chest. The lower portion of the artwork concludes with another horizontal decorative border, identical in pattern and tone to the one at the top.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A bearded man in a hat and robe stands among tall, dark trees in a muted, vertical painting
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a lone figure standing amidst a dense forest, rendered in muted tones of brown, grey, and dark green. The central figure, an older man with a visible beard, wears a dark, wide-brimmed hat and a long, flowing robe, holding a staff in his right hand. He faces forward, positioned in the lower-middle section of the composition. Tall, dark trees, some with bare, gnarled branches and others with sparse, needle-like foliage, frame the man on both sides and extend upwards, creating a sense of depth. The trees in the foreground are darker and more defined, while those in the background appear lighter and more indistinct, blending into a hazy, atmospheric setting. Faint suggestions of distant mountains or hills are visible in the upper background. The ground in the foreground is uneven, with a few dark, angular rock formations. In the upper central portion of the painting, a faint red seal or inscription is visible. The entire painted area is bordered by a decorative fabric with patterns in light green, blue, and orange hues.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink painting shows a mountainous landscape with dense, gnarled trees and a winding path
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink painting, primarily in shades of gray and brown, on a light, aged paper-like surface. The composition is divided into three main sections from top to bottom. The upper third features faint, distant mountains with soft, undulating peaks, rendered with light washes of ink, suggesting a hazy atmosphere. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of dark script are visible, accompanied by several square and rectangular red seals. The middle section is dominated by a dense cluster of trees. These trees have numerous gnarled, intertwining branches, some appearing bare or sparsely covered with small, dark marks suggesting foliage. The branches extend across the width of the painting, creating a thick, textured canopy. The trunks of these trees are less distinct, blending into the overall mass of branches. The lower third of the painting shows more substantial tree trunks on either side, framing a central area. A winding path or stream, indicated by lighter tones and subtle outlines, meanders through the foreground. The ground is depicted with textured strokes, suggesting rocky or uneven terrain, with darker lines defining contours and shadows. The overall impression is a deep, forested landscape with a sense of depth created by the layering of elements.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   倣文徵明   深林調茗   軸|Scholar Seated in Grove
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Three robed figures stand on aged paper below a column of vertical Chinese text and red seals
long_description: This vertical artwork is rendered on light brown, aged paper. In the upper left quadrant, a block of vertical text in dark ink, composed of multiple columns of Chinese characters, is visible. Below and to the left of this text block are two small, square red seals. The lower half of the artwork features three figures, likely men, drawn with thin, dark lines, arranged in a horizontal line across the bottom third of the image. The figure on the far left has a beard and wears a long, flowing robe with wide sleeves. He appears to be holding or supporting a long, light-colored scroll or piece of fabric that extends towards the center figure. The middle figure also has a beard and wears a similar long robe. He is positioned slightly behind the left figure and also seems to be interacting with the scroll, holding it with both hands. The figure on the right is slightly shorter and wears a dark, tall hat and a long robe. He has a beard and is looking towards the other two figures and the scroll. His hands are positioned as if he is about to receive or examine the scroll. The background is plain and unadorned, matching the color of the paper. Another small red seal is visible in the bottom right corner. The drawing style is simple, focusing on outlines and drapery folds, with minimal shading.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   舊傳方從義   三學士圖   軸|The Three Scholars
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A painting of a seated, bearded man in red robes with a green halo, on a patterned cushion.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a seated, bearded man against a plain, light brown background. The man is positioned in the lower center of the composition. He has dark skin, a full dark beard and mustache, and short dark hair. A circular, light green halo surrounds his head. He wears a red robe draped over his left shoulder, leaving his right shoulder and chest bare. A light green sash is visible around his waist. His hands are not clearly visible, but his posture suggests he is seated cross-legged. He sits on a large, green, leaf-shaped cushion, which is covered by a red cloth with a subtle patterned design. Below this cushion, to the right, is a smaller, similarly shaped green cushion, on which a pair of light brown sandals rests. The background is a uniform light brown. The central image is bordered by a decorative frame featuring a repeating pattern of dark blue and red motifs. On the right side of the painting, vertically aligned, are three Chinese characters in dark ink: "大阿羅漢像". On the left side, a longer vertical inscription in dark ink is present, followed by two square red seals stacked vertically.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal painting depicts horses and riders in a green landscape, with a large section of text on the right.
long_description: This horizontal artwork is divided into two main sections: a painted landscape on the left and a section of calligraphic text on the right. The painted portion depicts a hilly, green landscape with areas of brown ground. In the upper left, two dark horses appear to be running across a lighter brown patch. Below them, towards the lower left, a reddish-brown horse with a lighter belly stands facing right, while another lighter-colored horse stands to its right, facing left. On a prominent green hill in the middle-right, a large, dark-leafed tree with some reddish foliage stands, accompanied by several other dark trees. Below this tree, a figure dressed in a red garment rides a dark horse, facing right. To the right of this rider, another lighter-colored horse stands. The entire painted scene has a muted, earthy color palette. The right section of the artwork features multiple columns of black calligraphic text, arranged vertically on a light, aged paper background. Several red seals or stamps are visible within and around the text.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A wide, horizontal landscape painting featuring towering, textured mountains, dense trees, and small structures.
long_description: This wide, horizontal landscape painting is rendered in muted tones of brown, beige, and dark gray, giving it an aged appearance. The composition is dominated by a continuous range of large, undulating mountains that extend across the entire width of the image. The mountains are depicted with a distinctive texture, characterized by numerous parallel, wavy lines that create a sense of ruggedness and depth. In the left portion, a massive, rounded mountain peak rises prominently, its surface heavily textured. Below it, smaller peaks and valleys are visible, with a few small, dark structures nestled into the terrain. A body of water or a river appears at the bottom left. Moving towards the center, the mountains continue, forming a complex network of ridges and valleys. Small, dark green trees are sparsely scattered among the lower slopes and in the valleys. The right half of the painting features a less dense mountainous area, with more open space in the upper right. A cluster of tall, slender trees with dark foliage stands prominently on the far right, their trunks visible. More small structures are visible among these trees and at the base of the mountains. The sky above the mountains is a uniform, dark gray-brown, blending with the mountain tops. In the upper right corner, there is a faint red seal and some illegible text.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; Ink and color on silk

alt_text: A standing figure in elaborate robes holds a tall vase, looking gently downward.
long_description: A full-length painting depicts a standing figure with light skin, positioned slightly to the left of center against a plain, warm brown background. The figure's head is tilted slightly, and their gaze is directed gently downward. Dark hair is styled in an elaborate bun at the top of the head, adorned with small green elements. Around the neck, a gold-colored necklace is visible over a red inner garment. The figure wears a dark brown outer robe with lighter brown trim, and light blue sleeves. A tall, light yellow vase with a dark blue-green top and a red ribbon wrapped around it is held in the crook of the figure's left arm and supported by the right hand. The lower body is covered by a long, flowing white skirt or robe, from which multiple thin red and blue ribbons hang. A wide, dark green sash with blue vertical stripes extends down the front of the figure. A light pink slipper or shoe is visible at the bottom edge of the white garment.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   持瓶仕女   軸|Girl Bringing Jar of Wine
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of a tall, vertical landscape with towering mountains, dense trees, and two traditional buildings.
long_description: This vertical ink painting on light brown paper depicts a vast, mountainous landscape. The upper left corner features several columns of dark, vertical calligraphy. The top half of the composition is dominated by towering, rugged mountains, rendered with dark, textured brushstrokes that suggest rocky surfaces and dense foliage. Some peaks appear to be partially obscured by mist or clouds. Below these highest peaks, a series of smaller, rounded mountains are visible, also covered in trees. A narrow waterfall or stream descends from one of these mountains on the left side, flowing into the middle ground. The middle section of the painting is filled with numerous trees, primarily tall, slender pines with dark, feathery needles, forming a dense forest that extends into the foreground. In the lower section, a cluster of large, gnarled trees with thick trunks and extensive canopies stands prominently. To the left and right of these trees are two traditional-style buildings with dark, sloped roofs and open fronts, nestled among the foliage and rocky ground. The ground is uneven and textured with ink washes and strokes. Small red seals are visible in the upper right and lower left corners of the artwork.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   倣王紱   秋窗讀書圖   軸|Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Vertical lines of black calligraphy on a light brown, aged paper scroll with faint red seals
long_description: The image displays a vertical scroll of aged, light brown paper with black ink calligraphy. The paper has a mottled, uneven texture, suggesting age and wear, with darker brown areas and lighter, almost beige tones. The calligraphy is arranged in several vertical columns, primarily from right to left, with characters of varying sizes and brushstroke thickness. The ink is a deep, matte black. The main body of text consists of three full columns on the right, followed by two shorter columns to the left, and a final, very short column further left. The characters are written in a fluid, expressive style. Towards the bottom left, there are faint red seal impressions, partially obscured and faded, appearing as irregular reddish-brown smudges. The overall impression is one of traditional script on an antique surface.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A black and white ink painting depicts a mountainous landscape with trees, buildings, water, and figures
long_description: This vertical black and white ink wash painting portrays a vast, serene mountainous landscape. In the upper section, towering, rugged mountains dominate the background, their peaks partially obscured by a soft, misty haze. Several thin waterfalls cascade down the steep rock faces. The mid-ground opens into a valley where a winding river or stream flows, its banks lined with numerous dark, dense trees, primarily appearing as pines with their characteristic needle-like foliage. Scattered throughout this forested valley are several small, traditional-style buildings with dark roofs, nestled discreetly among the trees on both sides of the water. In the lower section of the painting, more prominent trees frame the scene, with their dark trunks and full canopies. A small, arched bridge crosses a narrow section of the water on the lower left. On the lower right, a larger, open-fronted building reveals two small, seated figures within, engaged in an activity. The foreground features rocky terrain and smaller trees, leading the eye towards the central valley. Small, vertical calligraphy is visible in the upper right corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: An ink painting of a mountainous landscape with a river, traditional buildings, and bamboo trees
long_description: This monochrome ink painting depicts a vast landscape scene, rendered in shades of black, grey, and the natural light beige of the paper. The composition is horizontally oriented, with a decorative border featuring green and light blue geometric patterns along the top edge. In the background, faint, misty mountains with jagged peaks rise, their forms softened by atmospheric perspective. The middle ground is dominated by a river that flows from the left, curving towards the right. On the left bank, a large, dark rock formation is covered with bamboo. Adjacent to this, a complex of traditional buildings with tiled roofs is nestled by the river. A small, low bridge with railings crosses the river in front of these structures, leading to a smaller, open-sided pavilion with a thatched roof on the opposite bank. To the right of the buildings, a prominent, gnarled tree with sparse foliage stands tall, surrounded by dense groves of bamboo. Further to the right, two small figures, appearing to be people, walk along a winding path that meanders through rocky terrain and more bamboo. The river continues to flow towards the right, showing ripples and darker areas indicating movement. In the upper left quadrant, several columns of black calligraphic text are visible: "竹話仙館", "信鮮尤九仙令", "李時高九仙利", "畫竹寫竹寫竹", "紅茶: 堂六仙", "雨山學佛寺如", "為以戊午月雨", "秀閣西山仙度", "李時此", "海東王華". Below the text, two red square seals are present. The overall impression is one of a serene, natural environment with human presence.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Monochromatic landscape painting depicting distant mountains, a body of water, dense trees, and a building with two figures.
long_description: A vertical monochromatic landscape painting, rendered in various shades of black and grey ink on a light brown or tan background. The upper half of the painting features a vast expanse of water or mist, with a range of distant mountains rising from it. The mountains are depicted with soft, rounded peaks and valleys, some with more defined ridges, all rendered with subtle ink washes. The sky above is a lighter, hazy tone. In the upper left corner, a block of vertical text in black ink is visible, followed by a red seal. The text reads: "急雨初收山色淨 晚風微動水光涼 幽人獨坐茅亭下 一任閒雲過石梁 丁丑秋日寫此 為子昭先生清玩 王翬". The lower half of the painting is dominated by a dense cluster of trees with gnarled trunks and rich foliage, rendered with darker ink washes and fine brushstrokes, suggesting pines and other deciduous trees. To the left of the trees, rocky terrain is depicted with textured ink strokes. To the right, a traditional building with a tiled roof, open sides, and a raised platform is nestled among the trees. Two small figures are visible inside the building, one seated and one standing. A simple bridge or walkway extends from the building to the right, crossing over a narrow stretch of water to a small landmass. A second red seal is partially visible in the lower left corner.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   倣王翬   倣李公麟草堂圖   軸|Landscape in the Style of Li Gonglin
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A traditional ink painting depicts a mountainous landscape with a pagoda, waterfall, and small figures on a path.
long_description: This square-format painting, rendered in ink and wash, presents a serene mountainous landscape with a muted color palette of grays, light blues, and greens, accented by touches of red. The composition is dominated by rolling mountains that fill most of the frame. In the upper left, a large, light-colored mountain slopes upwards, its textured surface suggesting rocky terrain with sparse vegetation. A winding path ascends this mountain, and two small, dark figures are visible on it, one higher than the other. Perched atop a prominent peak in the upper center-left is a multi-tiered pagoda with a distinctive curved roof. Red foliage and other trees surround the pagoda, adding color to the scene. To the right of the central peak, a steep, dark-green forested mountain rises, creating a deep valley. A waterfall cascades down this valley, flowing into a body of water or river at the bottom of the painting. The foreground features more textured landforms and sparse vegetation. The upper portion of the painting is a light gray, suggesting a cloudy sky or mist. In the upper left corner, vertical black ink calligraphy is present, reading: "溪山積雪", "桂玉生香書畫", "壬午冬日", and "王石谷". Below this text are two square red seals with indistinct characters.

metadata.title: 清   曹澗   倣名家山水   冊|Landscapes in the Styles of Various Artists
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A long, multi-panel painting depicts a vast mountainous landscape filled with numerous small figures, trees, and traditional buildings
long_description: This horizontal painting, composed of twelve vertical panels, presents a panoramic landscape rendered in a muted palette of light brown, various greens, and subtle blues. The expansive scene is dominated by rolling mountains and hills, densely covered with trees, which extend across the entire width of the artwork. Numerous small human figures, depicted in groups and individually, populate the landscape, engaged in diverse activities. Starting from the left, the foreground features a large gathering of figures at the base of a mountain, with more figures scattered along paths and open areas. The mountains rise steeply, their surfaces textured with brushstrokes suggesting rock and foliage. As the eye moves right, the landscape unfolds to reveal several architectural structures. In the central panels, a prominent multi-story building with a dark, tiled roof and light-colored walls stands on an elevated platform, surrounded by groups of people. Nearby, a bridge spans a gap, connecting different parts of the terrain. Further to the right, another building with a distinctive red-orange base and a dark roof is partially visible, nestled among the hills. Throughout the composition, clusters of trees, often resembling pines, punctuate the hillsides. The background consistently features distant, lighter-toned mountains, creating a sense of depth. The sky is a uniform, light beige, devoid of clouds or other features. The overall impression is one of a bustling, yet serene, natural environment.

metadata.title: 清 緙絲山水人物圖|Mythical landscape with immortals
metadata.medium: Silk tapestry (kesi) with sections of hand-painted ink and color

alt_text: A painting of a bearded man on a platform with attendants, and another man standing to the left.
long_description: This horizontal painting features several figures on a light brown background. In the center, a large, bearded man with a topknot sits on a dark brown, raised platform. He wears a long, light-colored robe, with his legs extended and hands clasped. To his right, on the platform, rests a green cylindrical pillow adorned with a red circular design. The platform's surface has a subtle patterned texture, appearing in shades of blue or gray. To the left of the platform, a standing man is depicted in dark green robes with red cuffs and a dark belt. He has a beard and wears a dark cap, holding a long, thin object, possibly a staff or sword, vertically in his left hand, with his hands clasped in front. To the right of the platform, two smaller figures are visible. One figure, dressed in a red robe, sits on the floor with their back mostly to the viewer, facing the platform. Behind and slightly to the right of this seated figure, another figure stands, wearing a light blue-green robe and holding a small, light-colored object. In the upper right corner, faint dark script and a square red seal impression are visible.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   倣宋徽宗   明皇訓儲圖摹本   卷|Copy of Tang Ming Huang Instructing the Prince
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An old man and an attendant with a crane beneath a large pine tree, surrounded by mountains
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a mountainous landscape with figures under a large pine tree, rendered in muted tones of brown, ochre, and dark green. In the upper left, tall, craggy mountains rise, with faint, misty peaks visible in the distance. A thin, light streak on the left mountain face suggests a waterfall. The upper right portion of the painting is dominated by a hazy, light brown sky. A prominent, gnarled pine tree with dark green needles originates from the upper left, its thick, twisted trunk curving downwards and to the right, then branching out across the mid-ground. Its branches are laden with dark foliage and some hanging, moss-like elements. Beneath the pine tree, in the lower center, an old man with a bald head and a long beard sits on a rock, facing right. He wears a light-colored robe and holds a small, indistinct object. To his right, a younger attendant stands, also in a light robe, holding a staff or similar object. Next to the attendant, a white crane with dark wing tips stands on one leg, looking towards the old man. The immediate foreground features dark, jagged rocks and patches of green foliage, while the ground around the figures is a lighter, sandy brown. The composition places the figures and the prominent pine tree in the lower half, framed by the towering mountains on the left and an expansive sky on the right.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   松鶴圖    軸|Scholar and Attendant in Mountain Retreat
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome ink landscape painting featuring mountains, water, bare trees, a small house, and calligraphy
long_description: This vertical monochrome ink painting on light, aged paper depicts a serene landscape. The upper third of the scroll is dominated by columns of black ink calligraphy, with a small red seal positioned below the text on the right. Below the calligraphy, the landscape unfolds, beginning with distant, softly outlined mountains that recede into the background. A wide expanse of water or mist separates these mountains from the mid-ground. On the right side of the mid-ground, a cluster of tall, slender trees with mostly bare branches extends downwards, their trunks rendered with fine ink lines. Some sparse foliage is visible on a few branches. In the lower left quadrant, a simple, single-story house with a peaked roof is nestled among gently rolling hills or large rocks. A winding path or stream flows in front of the house and continues towards the lower right. The foreground features textured ground and various rock formations. Two red seals are visible in the lower right corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   倣倪瓚   樂圃林居圖   軸|Landscape after Ni Zan (1306–1374)
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Six robed men in a black and white landscape, two playing music, others conversing among trees and rocks
long_description: This vertical, black and white painting depicts six men in a natural, rocky landscape with trees and foliage. The artwork is rendered in varying shades of gray, suggesting an ink wash style.In the upper right quadrant, two men are seated or kneeling on a rocky outcrop. The man on the left has a long beard and is playing a stringed instrument with a round body and a long, curved neck. He wears a loose, light-colored robe. To his right, another man with a shorter beard and a cap sits, looking towards the musician. He also wears a light-colored robe. Behind them, dark, textured trees and rocks rise.In the lower half of the painting, four men are gathered. On the far left, a man in a simple, dark tunic holds a shallow bowl in his hands, looking towards the center. Next to him, a man in a long, flowing robe with wide sleeves points upwards with a thin brush-like object in his right hand, his head tilted back. To their right, two more men stand. One, with a cap and a beard, holds a fan in his right hand and looks towards the man with the brush. The fourth man, facing away slightly, wears a similar robe and looks towards the group. Large, broad-leafed plants are visible on the far left, and more trees and rocky textures fill the background throughout the scene.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A wide landscape painting depicting towering mountains, a dense forest, and people traveling with horses and carts.
long_description: The painting is a wide, horizontal landscape rendered in a muted palette of browns, dark greens, and grays. The upper half is dominated by towering, craggy mountains with textured, cloud-like forms, extending across the entire width. The mountains on the left are darker and more distinct, while those on the right fade into a lighter, hazy background, suggesting depth. Below the mountains, a dense forest of tall, slender trees with dark, mostly bare branches fills the middle ground. A few trees on the far left exhibit green foliage, possibly indicating pines. The ground between the trees is a lighter green. In the distant background, faint, undulating hills are visible beneath a lighter, atmospheric sky. The lower third of the painting depicts a scene of human activity. On the far left, a small, open-sided building with a dark roof shelters several figures dressed in light-colored robes. Below them, a group of people are on foot or riding horses. Two horses pull a large, covered cart with spoked wheels. Further to the right, more figures are seen with horses and carts, including one cart pulled by two horses and another by a single horse. A wooden fence or railing stretches horizontally across the mid-ground, separating the foreground activity from the distant landscape. On the right side of the foreground, dark, rocky formations rise, with a path or bridge extending over them, where additional figures on horseback are visible. The scene portrays a journey or procession through a rugged, forested terrain.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Monochrome landscape painting depicting misty mountains, trees, and traditional buildings with curved roofs.
long_description: This horizontal, monochrome landscape painting is rendered in shades of dark brown and gray, creating a muted and atmospheric scene. The composition is dominated by rolling mountains and hills that recede into a pervasive mist or cloud layer, which obscures parts of the landscape and creates a sense of depth. In the foreground and midground on the left, several large, gnarled trees with intricate, bare branches stand on a sloping hillside. Smaller trees and dense foliage are visible behind them, blending into the misty background. The mountains rise from the left and extend across the upper half of the painting, their surfaces textured with numerous small, dark brushstrokes that suggest dense foliage or rocky terrain. On the right side, nestled within the mountainous terrain and partially enveloped by the mist, are several traditional multi-tiered buildings. A prominent, taller pagoda-like structure with multiple eaves stands near the center-right, surrounded by other buildings with distinctive curved roofs. These structures appear to form a complex, integrated into the natural environment. The overall impression is one of a serene and ancient landscape, characterized by its tranquil mood and soft transitions between landforms and mist.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   舊傳燕文貴   溪山行旅圖   卷|Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A faded painting depicts a dark horse led by two men, with a third man crouching nearby on a muted brown background.
long_description: The artwork is a faded, monochromatic painting on a dark, aged background, likely paper or silk, with an overall muted brown or sepia tone. The composition features a horse and three human figures arranged horizontally across the scene. On the left, a dark-colored horse stands facing right. Its head and neck are clearly visible, rendered in a darker shade of brown or black, with a bridle around its head. A human figure, appearing to be a man, stands to the left of the horse, holding the bridle with both hands. This figure wears a light-colored robe and a head covering. Behind the horse's head, another human figure, also a man, is partially visible, wearing a similar light-colored garment and head covering. The horse's body extends towards the right, with a dark, saddle-like shape on its back. The hindquarters of the horse are much fainter and blend into the background. To the right of the horse, a third human figure, a man, is depicted in a crouching or kneeling posture, facing left towards the horse. He wears a dark robe with visible folds and a head covering. His gaze is directed downwards. In the upper right corner, there is a vertical column of text, written in a reddish-brown ink. The text is partially faded but legible.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   舊傳陸青   洗馬圖   冊頁|Washing a Horse
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: A large figure in blue carries a floral arrangement under a lotus leaf, accompanied by a smaller figure with a hoe
long_description: The artwork depicts two figures amidst a dense arrangement of plants and flowers on a plain, light brown background. In the upper center, a large, light green lotus leaf unfurls, with delicate vines and small red flowers hanging below it. The prominent figure on the left stands facing slightly right, looking forward. This figure wears a long, flowing blue robe with lighter-colored undergarments visible at the waist and legs. Their dark hair is styled upwards. They carry a substantial structure on their shoulders, supported by two dark poles. This structure is heavily laden with a variety of plants, flowers, and what appear to be fruits, arranged in baskets and bundles. The flora includes green leaves, pink and white blossoms, and red berries. To the right of the larger figure, a smaller figure stands facing left, looking towards the first figure. This individual wears a light, off-white robe and has dark hair pulled back. They hold a long, slender pole with a light-colored, spade-like or hoe-like tool at its end, resting on the ground. The space behind and between the two figures is filled with an abundance of green foliage, various blossoms in shades of pink, red, and yellow, and winding vines, creating a lush, natural setting that extends upwards towards the lotus leaf. The overall color palette is muted, with the blue robe and green foliage providing the most distinct hues against the earthy background.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   賣花郎   冊頁|Flower Vendor
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal ink painting shows a landscape with dense bamboo groves, textured rocks, and a winding path.
long_description: The painting is a horizontal composition rendered in ink on a light brown or tan ground, depicting a landscape primarily composed of bamboo and rocks. On the far left, a gentle, undulating slope rises slightly, with a few small clusters of bamboo scattered across it. In the upper left corner, vertical lines of text are visible, accompanied by two red square seals below them. Moving towards the center, the ground flattens into a path or clearing that appears to recede into the distance. Above this central area, a faint, circular lighter patch is visible against the darker background. The right side of the painting is dominated by a dense grove of tall bamboo stalks with numerous leaves, rendered in varying shades of dark ink. Interspersed within this dense bamboo are several large, vertically oriented rocks with textured surfaces, depicted in lighter ink tones with darker outlines and internal markings. Smaller bamboo plants and sparse vegetation are visible at the base of these rocks and along the path. Another red square seal is present in the lower right corner. The overall palette is monochromatic, relying on ink washes and lines to create depth and form against the warm, neutral background.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   舊傳管道昇   竹石圖   冊頁|Bamboo
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: A monochrome landscape painting depicting towering mountains, a body of water, trees, and small structures
long_description: The artwork is a landscape painting rendered in dark gray and black ink washes on a light brown, possibly silk, ground. The composition is divided horizontally, with a prominent mountain range dominating the left half and extending towards the top. These mountains are depicted with textured strokes, suggesting rocky formations and sparse, dark vegetation. Smaller, rounded hills recede into the distance on the right side, creating a sense of depth.In the lower left foreground, at the base of the mountains, a cluster of dark-foliaged trees and some bare-branched trees surround a few small, simple buildings with sloped roofs. These structures are nestled on a rocky shoreline next to a wide body of water that fills the lower half and extends to the right edge of the painting. Large, dark rocks are scattered along the water's edge in the foreground. The water is depicted with horizontal strokes, suggesting movement.Further out on the water, towards the right, two small boats, each with a single figure, are visible. The background features more distant, hazy mountains that fade into the light brown of the upper right. In the upper right corner, vertical text is written in dark ink, which reads: "戊辰四月廿八日寫 拔凡高士". Below this text, a red square seal is present. Another red square seal is visible in the lower left corner, and two more red square seals are stacked in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A white rabbit crouches on grass, surrounded by bamboo, a plant with red berries, and a textured rock.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal composition on a light, warm brown background. On the left side, a white rabbit is depicted in a crouching position, facing towards the right. Its head is lowered, and it appears to be nibbling on a patch of green grass. The rabbit has long ears, a short tail, and a prominent red eye. Its fur is primarily white with subtle gray or light brown shading, particularly on its back and hindquarters. To the right of the rabbit, a cluster of bamboo stalks rises vertically, extending from the bottom to the top of the frame. The bamboo stalks are a muted green-gray, and their slender, pointed leaves are a darker shade of green-gray, fanning out from the stalks. Below and to the right of the bamboo, a smaller plant with reddish-brown, oval-shaped leaves and small, bright red berries is visible. This plant grows near a textured, gray rock formation that occupies the far right edge of the composition. The rock has irregular shapes and some darker lines suggesting crevices or water flow. In the upper left corner of the artwork, several vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present, reading "嘉慶四年五月九日錢塘管世銘北窗寫". Below this text, two red square seals are visible. The overall scene suggests a natural outdoor setting, with the rabbit as the focal point amidst the vegetation and rock.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome landscape painting depicts towering mountains, a lake, trees, and small structures under a vast sky
long_description: This monochrome painting, rendered in dark ink on a light brown ground, depicts a vast mountainous landscape. The composition is dominated by rugged, towering peaks that rise from the lower center and extend across the left and central portions of the image. The mountains are textured with fine lines suggesting rock formations and sparse vegetation, particularly along their ridges and slopes. In the upper center-right, a small, gabled building with a fence is perched atop a prominent peak, surrounded by dark, brush-like trees. Further to the right, on a distant ridge, a cluster of smaller buildings is visible. A winding path or series of steps can be seen ascending the slopes of the central mountains from the lower left. At the base of the mountains, in the lower center, lies a calm body of water, possibly a lake or pond, with a small waterfall flowing into it from the right. Several trees, some appearing bare and others with dark foliage, are scattered around the water's edge and on the lower slopes. A small, low bridge or walkway spans a narrow section of water in the lower left-center. Calligraphy and seals are present in the upper and lower corners. In the upper left, a vertical column of characters reads "壬申甲申七月四日寫於寓齋" followed by a red square seal. In the upper right, two vertical columns of characters read "岩居橋寫意". Two red square seals are in the lower left, and one red square seal is in the lower right.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   舊傳曹知白   岩居積雪圖   冊頁|Landscape
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A person rides a water buffalo in a river, while a deer stands on the bank near a large tree and distant hills
long_description:
The artwork depicts a pastoral scene with a river flowing through the center, rendered in shades of brown and tan, with visible wavy lines indicating water movement. In the foreground, a dark brown water buffalo is partially submerged in the river, facing right. A person, appearing young, sits astride the buffalo, holding a long, thin pole that extends upwards and to the right. The person wears light-colored clothing and has dark hair. To the right of the buffalo, on the sandy bank, a light brown, deer-like animal stands facing the buffalo.

On the left side of the image, a large tree with dark green, weeping foliage and a thick, gnarled brown trunk with exposed roots dominates the bank. The ground beneath the tree is green, sloping down to the river. In the background, across the river, gentle green hills rise against a lighter brown sky. The overall color palette is muted, featuring earthy browns, greens, and tans. In the bottom left corner, there are small, illegible red marks or seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A traditional landscape painting depicting mountains, dense trees, a winding river, and small dwellings
long_description: This horizontal landscape painting is rendered on a light brown, aged ground. The composition is dominated by a range of mountains covered in trees, extending across the width of the painting and receding into the background. The mountains are depicted with textured strokes in shades of brown, green, and dark grey. Many peaks and slopes are densely covered with dark green pine trees, rendered with fine, vertical brushstrokes. Lighter green foliage is visible on some lower slopes and among the trees in the foreground. A winding river or stream flows from the lower left, moving towards the center and then disappearing behind large, rounded rocks on the right side of the painting. Along the riverbanks in the lower left and center, various deciduous trees with lighter green leaves and some bare branches are interspersed with more pine trees. Several small, simple structures, possibly houses or huts, are nestled among the trees and rocks near the river in the lower-center and right. These structures feature dark roofs and light-colored walls. A small bridge or pathway appears to cross the river in the lower-center. The upper portion of the painting, representing the sky, is a plain, light brown, matching the overall ground color. In the upper right corner, vertical dark ink text is present, accompanied by two red square seals. The text reads: "百尺為 宗善寫作生 堂者". A smaller, fainter red square seal is also visible in the upper left corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A person fishes from a boat on a river, flanked by large trees and distant green mountains under a plain sky.
long_description: This oval-shaped artwork depicts a river landscape on a light brown background. In the lower right, a green and brown rocky bank extends into the water, supporting several large trees. One tree on the left has a gnarled brown trunk and branches with long, drooping green leaves. To its right, two other trees with similar brown trunks feature denser, blue-green foliage. A small, light brown boat with a curved canopy floats on the river near the right bank. A person, dressed in a red garment and dark hat, sits in the boat, holding a fishing rod that extends into the brown water. The river occupies the lower and central parts of the image, with faint lines indicating water movement. Across the river, in the background, are rolling hills or mountains rendered in shades of green and blue. The upper portion of the oval is a plain light brown, representing the sky. A small red square seal or stamp is visible in the upper left corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A bearded man in a robe sits on a large leaf-like object floating on stylized waves
long_description: This monochrome ink painting on light brown paper depicts a bearded man seated on a large, elongated, leaf-like object, floating on stylized waves. The man, positioned in the center-left, faces towards the right. He has a full beard and mustache, and his hair is tied up on top of his head. He wears a loose-fitting robe with a sash tied around his waist. The leaf-like object he sits upon is wide at the front, where his legs are, and tapers towards the back, curving upwards to form a tall, pointed shape behind him. The lower half of the composition is filled with dark, undulating lines representing waves, with smaller, swirling patterns around the base of the floating object. The upper half of the painting is mostly empty, showing the light brown paper, with some faint, lighter ink washes suggesting clouds or mist in the background. Vertical text is inscribed in dark ink on the upper right side of the curved, leaf-like object. The visible characters include '趙江龍' and '于東坡'.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名  舊傳趙芾   乘蓮渡江   冊頁|Sage Floating on Lotus Leaf
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: Bearded man in patterned robe holding two staffs within an ornate circular frame
long_description: A painting depicts a standing figure centered within a circular frame, set against a plain, light brown background. The figure, a man, faces forward with a long, dark beard and a mustache. He wears a light-colored, patterned robe with red and blue-gray accents, and a golden head covering. His bare feet are visible below the robe. In his right hand, he holds a long, slender staff topped with a red, spear-like finial and a red tassel. In his left hand, he holds another long staff with an ornate, multi-pronged top. The circular frame surrounding the figure features an inner band with a repeating dark brown geometric key pattern on a gold background. The outer band of the frame is composed of repeating red-brown, scalloped, or cloud-like motifs, also outlined in gold. The background within the circular frame is a textured, brownish-gold, while the area outside the circle is a slightly darker, uniform brownish-gray. A small red seal-like mark is visible in the bottom right corner outside the circle. The text "13.220.100A" is centered at the bottom edge of the image.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Set of twelve album leaves; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical landscape painting shows dark, misty mountains, swirling clouds, and a small building among trees.
long_description: The vertical painting features a muted landscape dominated by dark brown and deep green tones, with lighter grey-green elements. A large, textured mountain peak rises prominently in the upper third of the composition, rendered in shades of dark green and grey-green, suggesting rocky formations and sparse vegetation. Below this central peak, several rounded, lighter grey-green forms resembling swirling clouds or mist drift across the mid-ground, partially obscuring the darker landscape beneath. To the right, the background remains a relatively open expanse of dark brown. In the lower left quadrant, a more detailed scene emerges, with smaller, undulating hills and dense clusters of dark green trees. Nestled within these trees and rocky outcrops is a multi-tiered structure, possibly a temple or pagoda, with visible architectural details. The overall impression is one of a hazy, atmospheric mountain vista, with a sense of depth created by the layering of forms and the subtle variations in color.

metadata.title: 明   佚名   秋林讀易圖   軸|Mountain Scenery
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll featuring a dark, muted landscape painting between two sections of vertical calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a tall, vertical scroll composed of three distinct sections. The top section features a large block of dark, vertical calligraphy written on a light, aged paper background. The characters are densely packed, and a red square seal is visible near the bottom left of this text block. Below this, the central section is a landscape painting rendered in muted, dark tones of brown, green, and gray. The painting depicts a mountainous and forested scene. In the foreground, dense, dark foliage occupies the lower left and right corners, framing a lighter central area that suggests water or a path. In the midground, more trees and a small, rectangular structure with a peaked roof are visible on the right side. Further back, towering, dark, jagged mountain peaks rise prominently, partially obscured by mist or atmospheric perspective, creating a sense of depth. The overall impression of the painting is somber and atmospheric. Below the painting, the bottom section contains a shorter block of dark, vertical calligraphy on a similar light, aged paper. A larger red square seal is visible to the left of this text block, and another smaller red seal is at the very bottom left. The entire scroll is framed by a narrow, light-colored border with a subtle, repeating pattern.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名（舊傳趙伯駒） 蘭亭圖   軸|Orchid Pavilion or Lanting
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a vast, misty landscape with mountains, a winding river, trees, and scattered small buildings
long_description: The vertical ink wash painting, rendered in shades of grey and brown on aged paper, depicts an expansive, misty landscape. The composition is divided into distinct layers, moving from top to bottom. At the top, a range of dark, rugged mountains dominates the upper left, their peaks shrouded in lighter mist. To their right, smaller, more distant mountains recede into the background. In the upper right corner, a red square seal is visible, along with vertical black text above it. Below the mountains, a wide, winding river or body of water flows through the middle ground, its surface appearing calm. The banks of the river are lined with numerous trees, depicted with dark, dense foliage, some forming clusters and others standing individually. Scattered among the trees and along the water's edge are small, simple structures, suggesting human habitation. Further down, in the mid-section, more clusters of trees and buildings are visible, including what appears to be a small village with houses and platforms extending over the water. A small boat with a triangular sail is depicted on the water, moving towards the right. In the lower left, a small, multi-tiered pagoda-like structure emerges from the mist. On the lower right, a large, gnarled tree with dark foliage grows from a rocky outcrop, its roots clinging to the terrain. The water continues to the bottom of the frame, meeting a rocky shoreline. A small red square seal is visible in the lower right corner. The top and bottom edges of the scroll feature a decorative border with a repeating pattern of circles and stylized waves in blue and white.

metadata.title: 明/清  佚名  舊傳方從義  風雨圖  軸|Wind and Water: Landscape in the Style of Mi Fu
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A painting depicts several women in traditional attire, some inside a building, others near a large tree
long_description: The vertical painting depicts a multi-figure scene set within and around a traditional building, dominated by a large tree on the right. The color palette is primarily warm browns, golds, and muted greens, with accents of red.In the upper left quadrant, a section of a building is visible, featuring a dark brown wall with a lighter grid-patterned screen or window. A small red lantern hangs from the top left. To the right, a large, gnarled tree trunk with dark, dense foliage and small, dark berry-like clusters extends from the top edge, curving downwards along the right side of the composition.Within the building, in the upper central area, three women are depicted. The leftmost woman stands, facing right, wearing a light-colored robe with red trim. Next to her, a woman is seated or kneeling, looking down at a low, dark brown table. She wears a light robe with red and gold details. To her right, another woman is seated on a raised platform, facing left, engaged with an object on the table. Her garment is predominantly red and gold.Below this group, in the lower central area, a fourth woman is seated or kneeling, facing right, looking down at an object held in her hands. She wears a light-colored robe with red and gold accents. The background behind her shows a continuation of the grid pattern.In the lower left, a fifth woman stands on a set of steps, facing right. She holds a tray or shallow bowl and wears a light-colored robe with a long, flowing red sash. At the very bottom left, a small figure, possibly a child, in a red garment is partially visible, appearing to interact with the ground. The lower right corner is filled with dense, dark green foliage from the tree or bushes. The overall composition suggests a narrative scene unfolding across these interconnected spaces.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochromatic ink landscape painting featuring a tall rock formation, slender trees, a small hut, and distant mountains.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical, monochromatic ink painting on a light-colored ground, depicting a serene landscape. The top quarter of the image is a blank, light-toned area. Below this, the scene unfolds with a muted palette of grays and blacks. On the far left, a towering, jagged rock formation or mountain cliff dominates the left side, extending from the upper-middle to the lower-left. It is rendered with varying shades of dark ink, creating a sense of depth and texture. Near the base of this formation, on the left edge, two square red seals are visible, stacked vertically. To the right of the central void, a cluster of tall, slender trees rises from the lower-middle ground. These trees have dark trunks and sparse, dark foliage, rendered with delicate brushstrokes. Perched atop one of the tallest trees, near the upper-right quadrant, is a small, dark, bird-like shape. At the bottom-right, nestled among the trees, is a small, simple structure, possibly a hut or pavilion, with a dark, sloped roof and open sides. Below and to the right of this structure, near the bottom-right corner, another square red seal is present. The middle ground of the painting is largely open and hazy, suggesting a vast expanse of water or mist, separating the prominent foreground elements from the faint, distant landforms or mountains visible along the horizon line in the upper-middle background. The overall impression is one of depth and tranquility, achieved through subtle ink washes and precise line work.

metadata.title: 清 佚名 舊傳陸治 秋林圖 軸|An Autumnal Grove
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A person in traditional attire adjusts their hair before a mirror on a table with various objects.
long_description: A vertical artwork depicts a person standing to the right of a dark wooden table, engaged in adjusting their hair. The background is a plain, warm brown, suggesting an indoor setting. The person is shown from the waist up, facing towards the left, with their head tilted slightly downwards and both hands raised to their hair. Their skin appears light-toned. They are dressed in a long, flowing garment primarily in shades of brown and gold, with accents of blue-green. The attire features wide sleeves and a sash around the waist, from which blue-green ribbons or sashes drape over their shoulders and down the front of the dress. To the left, a dark wooden table is angled, with its top surface receding into the background. On the table, a dark, rectangular mirror with a stand is positioned towards the back. In front of the mirror, on the table's surface, are several objects: a reddish-brown jar, a small white vase, and a stack of what appear to be books with a green cover. A small, indistinct object is also visible near the books. The overall color palette is muted, dominated by earthy browns and golds, with subtle highlights of blue-green and red.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical painting of a spotted deer walking in a muted landscape with trees and distant hills
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a landscape rendered in muted browns, grays, and dark greens. In the lower-left quadrant, a light brown deer with white spots walks from left to right, its head slightly lowered. To its left, a large, dark brown tree trunk rises, with dark green foliage visible at its top left, extending out of view. In the lower foreground, dark gray and brown rocks are interspersed with sparse, dark green brush. To the right of the spotted deer, a bare, gnarled tree with dark, thin branches stands. Further back and to the left of the bare tree, a less distinct, brown animal, possibly another deer, stands facing left. The background features rolling hills or mountains in varying shades of muted brown and gray, receding into a hazy, lighter brown sky that occupies the upper portion of the painting.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   舊傳郎世寧   游鹿圖   軸|Fawn at Play
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll

alt_text: Numerous figures gather in a garden with traditional buildings and large trees under a muted sky.
long_description: The painting depicts a lively outdoor scene with numerous figures, traditional architecture, and lush trees, rendered in a palette of muted browns, greens, and light blues. The composition is horizontally oriented. On the far left, two traditional buildings with dark tiled roofs are visible. The foreground building is a pavilion with an open front, where several figures are seated or standing. One figure sits at a table inside the pavilion, while others are gathered around its entrance. Behind this pavilion, another building with closed wooden panels is partially visible. The central and right portions of the painting are dominated by groups of people and large, gnarled trees with dark green foliage. In the center, a prominent figure, possibly a woman, is seated on a low, light-colored platform or chair, surrounded by several adults and children. Many figures wear long robes in various colors, including light blue, white, brown, and hints of red. Some individuals carry staffs or other objects. Children are interspersed among the adults. Towards the right, more figures are seen walking or standing amidst the dense tree trunks and foliage. The ground in the foreground is open and relatively flat, with some small, dark rock formations and sparse vegetation. The landscape gently slopes downwards towards the bottom right corner, revealing more rocky terrain. A vertical column of text is visible along the far right edge of the painting, partially cut off. The visible characters include "王根鳴養正圖十則", "神心", and further down, "清古間珍妙". A red seal impression is also visible near the bottom right corner of the painted area.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   舊傳王振鵬   養正圖   卷|Family Training
metadata.medium: Ten panels mounted as a handscroll; ink and color on silk
