alt_text: A horizontal ink wash landscape painting depicts dark, jagged mountains towering over houses nestled among trees and a misty foreground
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting features a landscape rendered in shades of black and grey on a light, tan-colored background. The upper half of the composition is dominated by a series of dark, jagged mountains. On the left, a large mountain range rises, its peaks textured with varied brushstrokes, gradually fading into lighter, mistier forms towards the center. To the far right, a prominent, dark, conical mountain stands tall. In the midground, below the mountains, a cluster of small houses with peaked roofs is nestled among dense, dark trees, primarily on the left and center-left. More scattered trees and a few additional houses are visible further to the right. The foreground is a flat, lighter area, possibly depicting water or a misty plain, with some darker, horizontal brushstrokes suggesting land or vegetation along the bottom edge. Two red seals are visible in the upper right corner, and one smaller red seal is in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: 清   佚名   倣董其昌   倣米氏雲山圖   卷|Cloudy Mountain in the Style of Mi Fu (1052–1107)
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A monochrome ink painting shows several robed figures, some bearded, floating on clouds with banners and staffs.
long_description: This monochrome ink painting on a light-colored scroll depicts a procession of seven robed figures floating on clouds. The background is a plain, light gray, with faint, wispy cloud formations rendered in lighter tones, suggesting an ethereal setting. All figures are rendered in varying shades of gray and black ink, with fine lines defining their features and drapery. On the far left, a single robed figure, seen from the back, faces right. This figure wears a tall, dark cap and holds a small, ornate object on a tray. To the right of this figure, a group of three figures floats together. The leftmost of these three is a slender figure, possibly female, holding a tall staff with a decorative banner attached. Next to them is a prominent, bearded man with a tall, pointed hat and flowing robes, looking forward. To his right, another figure, partially obscured, is visible behind him. Further to the right, a cluster of three more figures appears. The central figure in this group is a bearded man with a broad hat, holding a gnarled staff or branch. To his left, a shorter, bearded man in armor-like attire clasps his hands in front of him. To the right of the central bearded man, another bearded figure with a simpler hat stands, also holding a staff. On the far right edge of the scroll, a vertical column of Chinese characters is visible, along with several red square seals at the bottom right. The visible text reads "李思訓眼法海山仙圖" and "吳鎮居士題".

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   舊傳李公麟   法海靈山圖   冊|Procession of Arhats
metadata.medium: Album of ten leaves; ink on silk

alt_text: A smiling, bald, bearded man sits under a tree with a monkey in a natural setting
long_description: The image is a painting on a light brown background, depicting a smiling, bald, bearded man seated in a natural setting. The man is positioned in the lower left quadrant, facing towards the right with a joyful expression. He wears a purple robe draped over his left shoulder, leaving his right shoulder and chest bare, and blue pants. His left hand rests on his lap, holding a white scroll-like object. He sits on a patch of green foliage, which appears to be a cushion or part of the landscape. Above him, a tree with dark green leaves and hanging vines extends across the top of the frame. A small, light brown monkey hangs from a vine in the upper right. The ground around the man and extending to the right is a light brown, with several dark, rounded rocks scattered across it, suggesting a shallow stream or rocky terrain. On the far left, vertical lines of black text with a red seal are visible. The text reads: "半托迦尊者" and "定远".

metadata.title: 明  宋旭   羅漢圖   冊|Ten Paintings of Luohans
metadata.medium: Album of ten leaves; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two large, dark-feathered birds, one flying above and one on the ground below, on a vertical scroll
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll featuring two large birds against a muted, brownish background. The scroll is framed by a dark green border with a repeating pattern of light green and gold floral or geometric motifs. Thin gold bands separate the central painting from the patterned border at the top and bottom. The central painting depicts two birds, likely geese or swans, rendered in dark grays and browns with lighter outlines for feathers. The top bird is positioned in the upper third of the scroll, shown in flight with its wings fully extended. Its body is angled downwards and to the right, with its head pointing towards the lower right. The feathers on its wings are detailed with fine lines, creating a sense of texture. The lower two-thirds of the scroll features the second bird, positioned near the bottom edge. This bird appears to be on a surface, possibly water or ground, with its body angled slightly to the right. Its long neck is extended upwards and to the left, and its head is tilted slightly upwards. Its feathers are also detailed, showing a similar dark coloration with lighter highlights. The background behind both birds is a plain, aged brown, with subtle variations in tone and visible vertical creases or texture in the material. There are no other discernible elements in the background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: A small, light-colored bird with an open beak stands on a rocky bank beside water, facing left.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular image with a muted, earthy color palette, dominated by shades of brown and tan. A small bird is positioned in the lower right quadrant, standing on a low bank next to a body of water that occupies the lower left and central portions. The upper half of the image is a plain, unadorned background of a light brown-tan color. The bird is small, with a predominantly white or very light gray underside and head, contrasting with darker brown or gray markings on its back and wings. Its long tail extends to the right. Its head is tilted slightly upward, and its beak is open, suggesting it is calling or singing. Its eye is a small, dark dot. It stands on a dark, irregular shape that appears to be a rock or clump of earth. The water, depicted with horizontal brushstrokes, is a darker brown-tan than the background, with subtle ripples indicated by thin, dark lines. The bank is a darker, uneven strip of land separating the water from the upper background. Sparse, dark, thin lines suggest reeds or grasses growing along the bank, particularly in the middle right. Small, light-colored dots are scattered on the bank, possibly pebbles or shells.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Albun leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A faded ink wash painting depicts multiple robed figures and mythical creatures interacting in a landscape with a large tree.
long_description: The horizontal ink wash painting, rendered in shades of brown and grey, depicts a complex scene with numerous figures, some human-like and others monstrous, set within a landscape. The overall impression is faded, with details appearing as subtle outlines and washes. On the far left, several robed figures are visible. One is seated, while others stand nearby, all with distinct facial features, including prominent ears and smiling expressions. Moving right, more figures appear, some standing and others in crouching positions. One figure in the lower middle seems to be interacting with a bundle of plant-like material. Above the central figures, a dynamic group of mythical creatures or demons is depicted amidst swirling, cloud-like forms. These creatures have fierce expressions, sharp claws, and some appear to have wings. One creature is shown riding a beast. To the far right, a large, gnarled tree with dense, dark foliage dominates the upper right quadrant. Beneath this tree, several figures are seated or crouching on rocky ground. One figure has a distinctive long, pointed nose or snout, while another is shown interacting with a small, striped, tiger-like animal. The lower right corner features faint outlines of rocky terrain and landscape elements. The composition is filled with activity, with figures distributed across the entire width of the painting.

metadata.title: 明 /清  佚名   李公麟 偽款   龍王請齋圖   卷|Buddhist luohans crossing the sea to the palace of the dragon king
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Three mythical bird-like creatures and a dragon carry figures through a cloudy sky.
long_description: A monochromatic, horizontal artwork depicts various mythical beings and figures against a cloudy background. The overall tone is light brown with details rendered in darker gray lines and washes, giving the piece an aged appearance. On the far left, a large, phoenix-like bird with a long, flowing tail and elaborate feathered wings flies towards the left. A robed figure with an elaborate headpiece is seated on its back. Above and around this creature are swirling cloud forms. In the center, another large, phoenix-like bird with outstretched wings and a long, multi-feathered tail flies diagonally downward and to the right. A less distinct figure appears to be on its back. To the right, a long, scaled dragon with a horned head, prominent eyes, and a flowing mane flies horizontally. A robed figure stands on the dragon's back. Below and to the far right, a large, crane-like bird with a long neck and legs is depicted, seemingly flying or standing on a cloud. The entire background is filled with numerous, indistinct cloud formations, rendered in light gray tones, creating a celestial environment for the mythical creatures.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Faded linear drawing of a procession of multiple figures, some holding objects, under clouds
long_description: A faded, monochromatic linear drawing depicts a horizontal procession of at least eight figures on a light brown or tan background. The figures, mostly standing and facing right, occupy the middle and lower portions of the image. They are rendered with thin, dark lines, suggesting an underdrawing or preliminary sketch, with minimal shading. All figures wear long, flowing robes with visible drapery folds. Many have elaborate headdresses. From left to right, the first figure holds a long, thin object. The second figure holds a long, flowing banner or piece of fabric that extends upwards. Further right, a figure holds a large, circular object, possibly a fan or mirror, on a pole. The figures' faces are simply drawn, showing eyes, noses, and mouths. The two figures on the far right appear to be male, with one having a beard and a tall, ornate headdress. Above the figures, several swirling, cloud-like forms are drawn. Below the figures, a horizontal structure resembling a railing or platform is visible, extending across the lower part of the composition.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome ink drawing depicts a gathering of men in traditional robes, some seated at a table, others standing.
long_description: This horizontal, monochrome ink drawing depicts a gathering of numerous men in traditional attire, rendered in shades of black and gray on a light, uncolored background. The composition is divided into two main groups of figures, separated by a more open central space. On the left, a cluster of approximately seven men is arranged around a low, rectangular table. Two men are seated on the floor, one to the left and one to the right of the table, both facing inward. The man on the left has his left leg bent and right leg extended, while the man on the right has both legs bent. Several other men stand behind and around the table, leaning in and looking down at its surface. Some figures have long beards. Objects resembling scrolls or papers are laid out on the table, and one seated man holds a brush, suggesting writing or study. A partially visible figure stands at the far left edge. The central section features a few standing figures, some holding long, thin objects that resemble staffs. The background in this area is a lighter gray wash, with small, dark, irregular marks scattered across the upper portion. To the right, a second group of about five men stands closely together, appearing to be in conversation. They are also dressed in long robes and various types of hats, and several have prominent beards. Their faces show distinct expressions. The background on the far right is darker and more textured, with vertical brushstrokes suggesting a rocky or mountainous landscape. A small, red, square seal impression is visible in the upper right corner. The drawing employs fluid lines for the figures and softer washes for the background elements.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; black and white on paper

alt_text: Monochrome ink landscape painting depicting mountains, hills, trees, a waterfall, water, and small structures.
long_description: This monochrome ink painting presents a wide, horizontal landscape rendered with varying shades of gray and black. In the background, several soft, rounded mountains rise, their forms fading into the distance. The mid-ground is dominated by rolling hills covered with numerous trees, some with dense foliage and others appearing bare, their branches reaching upwards. A prominent waterfall descends from a densely forested hill in the central background, feeding into a winding river or body of water that flows across the lower half of the composition. On the left side, several small, simple structures with sloped roofs are nestled among the trees on a gentle slope. In the center, a cluster of tall, slender trees stands near the water's edge, their reflections subtly visible. On the right, a steeper hill features two larger structures with distinct sloped roofs, positioned above the water. Scattered throughout the landscape are smaller clusters of trees and brush, indicated by darker ink washes. The foreground shows the calm surface of the water with a few small, dark landmasses or rocky outcrops. Vertical text is visible along the far right edge of the painting, consisting of multiple columns of characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; color on paper

alt_text: Monochromatic ink painting depicting tall trees by a river with distant mountains, topped by bold calligraphy.
long_description:
The artwork is a vertical, monochromatic ink painting, primarily in shades of black and gray, with some red seals. The top section features large, bold Chinese characters rendered in dark ink, arranged horizontally. Below these, more Chinese characters are visible, accompanied by two square red seals. Along the upper right edge of the painting, a vertical column of smaller Chinese characters is present.

The main landscape scene occupies the lower two-thirds of the composition. In the background, light gray tones suggest a sky, which transitions into darker, undulating mountain forms that stretch across the mid-distance. The central focus of the landscape is a group of five tall, slender trees with light-toned trunks and dark, horizontally extending branches. Their foliage is depicted with textured, dark ink strokes, giving some branches a windswept appearance. These trees stand on the banks of a wide body of water, possibly a river or lake, which flows horizontally across the mid-ground. The water is rendered with lighter gray washes and darker, swirling strokes that indicate movement and ripples. The foreground is dominated by dark, rounded rocks and textured landforms, with water flowing around and between them, creating intricate patterns. In the lower left of the landscape section, a block of smaller, vertically arranged Chinese characters is visible, with a square red seal below them. Another small square red seal is located in the lower right corner of the landscape.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on paper

alt_text: Black calligraphy on aged, light brown paper with red seals and small dark holes along the edges
long_description: The image displays a horizontally oriented rectangular piece of aged, light brown paper covered with black calligraphy and red seals. The paper exhibits a warm, light brown hue with visible signs of age, including creases, wrinkles, and areas of darker brown discoloration, particularly along vertical lines. Subtle, lighter patterns are visible in some sections of the paper. Large, bold black calligraphic characters are arranged in vertical columns, read from right to left. From right to left, the visible characters are: '右', '性', '少'; then '陸', '題', '王'; then '寧', '山'; then '水', '圖'; and partially visible on the far left, '十', '日', '畫'. Several red seals are stamped on the paper. A prominent red seal is in the upper right quadrant, partially overlapping the calligraphy. A smaller, fainter red seal is below it, near the bottom of the rightmost column of text. A very faint red mark is in the upper middle section. Along the top and bottom edges of the brown paper, several small, dark circular holes are evenly spaced.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A long, horizontal painting depicts a procession with a horse and a seated group of figures with text.
long_description: A long, horizontal painting depicts a narrative scene against a warm, light brown background. The composition is divided into two main sections: a procession on the left and a seated group on the right. On the left, a figure in white robes rides a white horse, facing towards the right. The horse is depicted with a red bridle and a simple saddle. Walking directly in front of the horse, another figure in light-colored robes holds a long, thin pole topped with a green and pink banner-like object that billows slightly. A third figure, partially visible on the far left edge, wears a red garment. In the middle section, to the right of the procession, a standing figure in light robes holds a small, reddish bowl or dish in their hands. Above this figure, several vertical lines of black calligraphic text are visible. On the right side of the painting, a group of three figures is arranged around a dark brown, rectangular table with short legs. The central figure, seated or kneeling behind the table, wears a dark green robe with red trim and a dark hat, and appears to be looking down at objects on the table. To the left of this central figure, another figure in light green robes and a dark hat stands or sits, looking towards the central figure. To the right, a third figure in white robes stands, also facing the central figure. The table holds several small, dark, indistinct objects. More vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present above this group on the right side of the painting. The figures are rendered with simple lines and muted colors.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large, light-colored bird with detailed feathers stands on a dark background within a patterned border.
long_description: The image is a vertical, rectangular artwork, presented in black and white. A large, light-toned bird dominates the central portion, facing towards the left with its beak slightly open. The bird's body is covered in meticulously rendered, overlapping scales or feathers, creating a textured appearance. Its head is relatively small compared to its robust body, and its eye is a dark dot. The beak is pointed and slightly curved. Its wings are folded against its body, showing distinct feather patterns. The bird's legs and feet are visible at the bottom, appearing to grip an unseen perch or stand on a surface. The background behind the bird is a uniform, dark tone, providing a strong contrast to the lighter bird. The central panel is flanked on both the left and right sides by a narrow, patterned border, which features repeating geometric or floral motifs. The top and bottom edges also show a continuation of this patterned border. The overall impression is a detailed study of a bird against a simple, dark backdrop.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; on silk

alt_text: Five horseback riders, some with bows, one with a falcon, hunt across a muted, open landscape with sparse trees.
long_description: A wide, horizontal painting depicts a hunting scene with multiple figures on horseback in a muted, earthy landscape. On the far left, two riders on light-colored horses gallop towards the right. The foremost rider, dressed in a light-colored garment with blue accents, is drawing a bow, aiming forward. The second rider, slightly behind and above, also appears to be holding a bow. In the middle ground, a single rider on a brown horse gallops right. This rider wears a light blue tunic and holds a dark bird of prey, possibly a falcon, on their outstretched left arm. The bird's wings are spread. Towards the right, two more riders on horses move right. One rider is dressed in a prominent red garment, while the other wears lighter clothing. They are positioned near a dense, dark brown and green area that suggests trees or rocky terrain. Above and to the right of these riders, a faint, lighter shape, possibly an animal, is visible among the darker background elements. The ground is a flat, open expanse of muted brown and ochre. The background features sparse, dark trees and subtle, undulating hills rendered in similar earthy tones, creating a sense of depth. The overall color palette is subdued, with occasional brighter accents from the riders' clothing.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painted fan features large chrysanthemums, smaller white flowers, and a rock formation with vertical text.
long_description: A fan-shaped artwork features a painting of chrysanthemums and a rock formation on a light brown background. Three large, spiky chrysanthemums dominate the composition. One is positioned on the far left, another in the upper center, and a third in the lower center-right. These large flowers have numerous thin petals, appearing in shades of light brown and yellow with darker outlines. Behind and between these larger blooms, a dark, irregular mass resembling a rock or gnarled tree trunk rises vertically, extending from the bottom edge towards the top center. Its surface shows variations in dark gray and brown tones. To the right of the central rock, several clusters of smaller white flowers with green leaves are depicted. These smaller blooms have fewer, broader petals. Thin green stems and leaves are visible throughout the composition, accompanying both the large and small flowers, with some grass-like elements appearing towards the bottom right. On the far left side of the fan, a block of vertical script is present, written in dark ink. Below this text, a small, square red seal is visible. Faint radial lines, indicative of the fan's structure, are visible across the entire painted surface. The edges of the fan are irregular and show signs of wear.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as an album leaf; gold paper

alt_text: Faded line drawing depicting a procession of eleven figures, including men and women in traditional robes
long_description: This horizontal artwork is a faded, monochromatic line drawing on a light brown or tan surface, depicting a procession of eleven figures. The drawing is rendered in dark, thin lines, but the overall image is dim and appears aged. The figures are arranged in a single line across the middle ground, with their feet at the bottom edge of the composition. From left to right, the first figure is a woman with an elaborate, high bun hairstyle, wearing a long, flowing robe. Next to her, a smaller figure, possibly an attendant or child, holds a small, indistinct object. A taller woman follows, also with an elaborate hairstyle and long robes. She is followed by a bearded man wearing a hat and a long, draped garment. Another woman with a high bun hairstyle is positioned behind him. The central part of the procession features a prominent bearded man in a hat, followed by a smaller, indistinct figure. Another bearded man in a hat stands to the right of the center, looking towards the right. Behind him, a woman with an elaborate hairstyle is visible. The procession concludes with two more bearded men, both wearing hats and long robes, facing towards the right. All figures wear long, draped robes with wide sleeves, and their faces are rendered with simple, calm expressions. The background above the figures is mostly blank, with faint, swirling lines in the upper left and center, possibly indicating clouds or decorative motifs. The area below the figures shows very faint, abstract lines and shapes, suggesting a ground or a decorative base, but these details are largely obscured.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A man seated on a red platform, with two women standing behind him, and text above
long_description:
A painting depicts three figures against a plain, dark brown background, framed by a patterned border. At the top, a light-colored border with a repeating geometric pattern in a lighter shade contains four vertical characters in black ink at the center. To the far left of these characters, within the border, is a red square seal.

In the main section, slightly left of center, a man is seated on a low, rectangular platform. The platform is dark red with black outlines and features four arched openings on its visible side, revealing a dark interior. The man faces slightly right, with a dark, pointed beard and mustache. He wears a long, light-colored robe with dark trim on the sleeves and collar, and a dark sash. His hair is styled in a tall, dark topknot. His hands are positioned in front of him, holding a light-colored object, possibly a scroll or tablet.

Behind the seated man, to his right, stand two women. Both women face slightly right. The woman closer to the man is positioned slightly in front of the second woman. Both wear long, light-colored robes and have dark, elaborate updos. The woman closer to the man has a slightly darker robe than the one behind her. The background behind the figures is a uniform dark brown. The overall color palette is muted, with browns, light grays, and dark accents.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A landscape painting depicting towering mountains shrouded in mist, with a small building at the base.
long_description: A square-format landscape painting, predominantly in muted brown, gray, and pale sepia tones, is framed by a decorative border of blue and white geometric and floral patterns. The central image depicts a vast mountainous scene shrouded in atmospheric mist. On the right side, a cluster of tall, jagged peaks rises sharply, their craggy surfaces rendered with dark outlines and lighter brown washes, partially disappearing into the pale mist that fills the mid-ground. To the left, a large, rounded mountain mass extends across the middle of the composition, also partially obscured by the pervasive mist. Below this left mountain, in the lower-left corner, a small, light-colored building with a dark, gabled roof is nestled at the base of the terrain. A winding, dark line, possibly a river or path, is visible near the building, extending into the misty valley. The upper portion of the painting is a pale, hazy sky, blending seamlessly with the mist below, creating a sense of depth and vastness.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A robed figure with a staff faces two horned animals in a dark, horizontal artwork.
long_description: This horizontal, monochromatic artwork depicts a robed figure on the left facing two horned animals on the right, set against a dark, indistinct background. The figure, positioned on the far left, is seated or kneeling, wearing loose, flowing robes and a head covering that resembles a pointed hat or hood. They hold a long, thin staff or stick that extends towards the animals. The background behind the figure suggests a natural setting with dark, organic shapes that could be rocks or tree branches. To the right of the figure, a large, dark horned animal is prominent. It has long, curved horns and its head is turned towards the figure, with its eyes appearing to glow or be highlighted. Its body is largely silhouetted and indistinct. Further to the right, a second, smaller horned animal is partially visible, facing right and bending its head downwards. It also has horns, though they are shorter and less defined than those of the first animal. The overall composition is dark and atmospheric. In the bottom right corner, the text "THE METROPOLITAN MUSEUM OF ART 1923" is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; on silk

alt_text: A painting features a large pink peony bloom with smaller buds and green leaves on a brown background
long_description: The artwork presents a detailed painting of a peony plant against a warm, medium-brown background shaped like a rounded rectangle. A large, fully open peony bloom dominates the left side of the composition, rendered in soft shades of light pink and white, with numerous delicate petals creating a full, textured appearance. To the right and slightly above this main bloom, a smaller, partially open peony bud is visible, also in light pink. Another smaller bud appears near the bottom left. A network of green stems and leaves extends from the flowers, with the leaves varying in shade from a muted sage green to a slightly darker, richer green. The stems are a subtle greenish-brown. The plant is centrally arranged, filling the majority of the brown panel. On the right side of the brown background, a vertical strip of lighter brown paper contains vertical black text that reads "廣師文紅葉". Below this text, and also near the bottom left corner of the brown panel, are two distinct red square seals. The entire brown panel is surrounded by an irregular, lighter-colored border, suggesting a mounting or frame.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three men, two seated and one standing, on a plain brown background with a red seal in the upper right
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts three male figures against a plain, light brown background. On the far left, a bald man with a light-colored beard and mustache is seated in a tall, ornate chair with dark, possibly carved, wooden elements. He wears light-colored robes and faces towards the right, with his hands resting on the chair's arms. His dark shoes are visible beneath the chair. In the center, a man with a dark mustache and a dark cap is seated on a low, dark stool. He wears light-colored robes and faces left, towards the bald man. His hands are clasped in front of him. On the far right, a younger-looking man stands, facing left. He wears dark clothing over lighter trousers and holds a dark, cylindrical object in his left hand. His right hand is raised to the side of his head. In the upper right corner of the painting, a square red seal with dark, illegible characters is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Multiple dragon-like creatures emerge from dark, swirling clouds in a vertical, monochromatic artwork
long_description: A vertical, monochromatic artwork depicts several dragon-like creatures amidst dark, swirling clouds. The composition is dominated by varying shades of gray and black, creating a sense of depth and movement. In the upper right, a long, serpentine body of a creature with scales is partially visible, extending downwards into the clouds. Towards the center-left, a prominent, detailed head of a dragon-like creature with large eyes, a snout, and whiskers emerges from a dense cloud formation. Below this head, a clawed limb is visible. Further to the right and slightly below, another, smaller head of a similar creature is partially obscured by clouds, with tendrils extending from its face. Throughout the image, dark, amorphous cloud masses are interspersed with lighter, more ethereal wisps, suggesting a turbulent sky. The top and bottom edges of the artwork feature a narrow decorative border with repeating circular motifs. Faint vertical text is visible along the right edge of the artwork, near the top.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll, framed; ink on silk

alt_text: A robed, bearded figure sits on a rocky outcrop by water, beneath a gnarled tree, with distant mountains.
long_description: This vertical grayscale artwork depicts a serene landscape with a central human figure. In the lower center, a robed figure with a beard is seated or kneeling on a rocky outcrop, facing towards the right. The figure's hands are positioned near their lap, and their head is slightly tilted. To the left, a large, ancient-looking tree with a thick, gnarled trunk and extensive branches dominates the left side of the composition, its foliage extending upwards and towards the center. The ground beneath the tree is rocky and uneven. In the middle ground, a body of water stretches horizontally across the scene, with a dark, elongated shape, possibly a bird in flight or a distant boat, visible above its surface. On the right side of the water, several smaller rocky islands or landforms emerge. In the background, layered mountains rise, their peaks softly defined against the lighter sky. The overall impression is one of depth and tranquility, rendered in varying shades of gray, from dark, textured foreground elements to lighter, hazy background mountains.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting several figures interacting with objects and foliage in a landscape.
long_description: A horizontal ink wash painting in shades of black and gray depicts multiple figures within a sparse landscape. On the far left, a figure sits facing right, with a round object on the ground in front of them. Behind this figure, a gourd-shaped vase and a stand with a scroll are visible amidst some foliage. To the right, a standing figure, also facing right, holds a thin stick or brush pointed upwards towards a fan-shaped object suspended from a branch. Further right, another figure is seated on the ground, facing left, with a small, flat object or tray in front. To their immediate right, a standing figure faces left, holding a flute-like instrument to their mouth. On the far right, a figure is depicted on all fours, facing left, near some small plants. The background throughout the composition consists of abstract ink washes suggesting rolling hills, clouds, and distant foliage, with areas of lighter wash contrasting with darker, more defined lines for the figures and closer elements. The figures are rendered with simple outlines and minimal shading.

metadata.title: 壺天樂聚|Merry Gatherings in the Magic Jar
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Faded, segmented map-like image showing a landscape with blue-green mountains, a winding river, and scattered circular shapes
long_description: The artwork is a large, rectangular, faded landscape depicted on a light brown or tan background, divided vertically into several panels. The overall composition presents an aerial view of a vast, undulating terrain. On the left side, numerous stylized blue-green mountain ranges or hills are densely clustered, with a winding, light brown river flowing through them, most clearly visible in the upper-left and central-left sections. The central and lower portions of the image are dotted with many small, circular, light brown shapes, some with faint outlines, scattered across the tan ground. Towards the right, the landscape transitions into larger, more prominent mountain ranges rendered in blue-green and dark gray-green hues, characterized by wavy, textured patterns. A significant reddish-brown area, possibly a large landmass or body of water, stretches across the middle-right section, partially overlapping with the mountainous terrain. The entire surface exhibits a muted color palette and shows signs of age, including creases and discoloration.

metadata.title: 清  佚名  中國地圖  屏風|Map of China
metadata.medium: Eight hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A central crowned figure with a blue halo, flanked by two smaller figures with red halos, on aged paper
long_description: The vertical painting on aged, light brown paper depicts three figures arranged centrally. The tallest figure stands in the middle, positioned on a dark green and red lotus base. This central figure has light skin, dark hair, and wears a crown. A large, light blue circular halo is behind its head. Its hands are raised to chest height, palms facing forward with fingers together. The figure is dressed in a red skirt, a green lower garment, and long, flowing sashes in shades of red, green, purple, and blue that drape around its arms and body. Its chest is bare, revealing the navel. Flanking the central figure are two smaller, shorter figures, one on the left and one on the right, both standing directly on the paper. Each of these side figures has light skin, a bare chest, and dark hair, with a red circular halo behind its head. Their hands are clasped together in front of their chests. They wear red lower garments and colorful sashes in red, green, and blue that flow around their arms and bodies. Both side figures have a slight frown on their faces. Black text is visible below the central figure's lotus base and extends to the left and right, between the central and side figures. The text reads, from right to left: "大周天 奉仕郎 合家男女 離身壽命延 造大辟支佛 供養於沙州 寺回此微善 成愛福永除". The paper itself shows signs of age, with creases, folds, and some areas of discoloration or minor tears, particularly along the edges and in the upper right corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink and color on paper

alt_text: Four figures, including a seated Buddha and three standing figures, on a light brown background
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal composition on a light brown, aged surface, depicting four figures arranged from left to right. The leftmost figure is seated centrally on an elaborate, multi-tiered lotus throne. This figure wears a red robe draped over one shoulder, revealing a lighter undergarment, and has dark hair. A large, multi-layered halo in shades of red and brown encircles the figure's head and upper body. The throne is decorated with green, red, and brown lotus petals and stands on a base with three visible legs. Above this figure, a decorative canopy-like element with scalloped edges in green and red is visible. To the right of the seated figure, a smaller standing figure is depicted. This figure wears a red garment with green accents and has hands clasped in front of the chest. A red halo surrounds its head. Further to the right, a third figure stands, facing slightly left. This figure wears a long red robe over a darker garment and holds a pink lotus flower in its left hand. A multi-layered halo in shades of blue and red encircles its head. The rightmost figure also stands, facing slightly left. This figure wears a light-colored upper garment with red and blue accents, and a darker lower garment. It holds a long, thin staff in its right hand, which is raised. A multi-layered halo in shades of blue and red surrounds its head. The figures are rendered with outlines and areas of flat color, primarily in muted reds, greens, blues, and browns.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A grayscale vertical scroll depicts a standing figure in traditional attire, holding a rectangular object, with vertical text above
long_description: A grayscale vertical scroll features a standing figure and text on a dark gray background, framed by decorative borders. The top border is a narrow band with a dark floral pattern on a light background. Below this, the upper portion of the scroll contains five vertical columns of text, written in dark characters on the dark gray surface. From right to left, the columns read: "道底十才帶", "点日少沙门", "設相高化犯", "吃道大愿寺", and "妙莊嚴". Below the text, a figure stands, facing slightly to the left, with her head bowed and eyes appearing closed or cast downwards. Her dark hair is styled in a bun on top of her head. She wears a dark, wide-sleeved robe over a lighter undergarment, with dark sashes hanging from her waist. Both hands are clasped together at chest level, holding a narrow, rectangular object vertically. The background behind the figure is a plain, dark gray. The main dark gray panel is flanked on both sides by a lighter gray border with a subtle, repeating pattern. A similar dark patterned border is visible at the very bottom of the scroll.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: A dog runs ahead of five men riding horses across a light brown background
long_description: The image is a horizontal painting on a light brown, aged background. On the far left, a small, dark gray dog with a slender body and a curled tail runs to the left. Its legs are in motion, suggesting movement. To the right of the dog, a group of five men on horseback moves from left to right across the frame. The first rider, on a dark horse, wears a long red robe and a dark hat. His horse has an ornate, patterned saddle blanket in shades of blue and green. Behind him, a man in a light-colored robe rides a lighter horse. He holds a dark, circular object on a pole. Next, a man in a blue robe rides a dark horse. He appears to be holding reins. Behind him, another man in a light-colored robe rides a light horse. This horse has a saddle blanket with a black and white patterned border. The last rider, partially obscured, also wears a light-colored robe and rides a light horse with a red saddle blanket. All horses are depicted with their legs in various stages of motion, indicating movement. The background is plain and unadorned, suggesting an open, empty space. The figures are arranged in a diagonal line, with the dog furthest left and the horses extending to the right.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Painting; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A landscape painting featuring numerous green and blue mountains, white clouds, and small structures on a brown background.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal landscape painting on a muted brown ground, depicting a vast mountainous and watery scene. The left side of the composition is dominated by a dense cluster of tall, jagged mountains rendered in shades of green and blue-green, with lighter, possibly gold or white, highlights suggesting mist or clouds. Nestled within these mountains are several small, multi-tiered structures resembling pagodas and buildings, along with sparse, dark green trees. Moving towards the right, the mountains become more scattered and appear as islands or distant peaks, also in green and blue-green with similar light highlights. Stylized, wavy cloud formations in white or light gold are interspersed throughout the sky, particularly above and between the mountain ranges. The lower portion of the painting features flatter landmasses with small clusters of dark trees. The overall background is a uniform, muted brown, suggesting sky or distant haze. In the upper central and right areas, several lines of vertical black text are visible, accompanied by multiple red seal impressions of varying sizes.

metadata.title: 明/清   佚名   海天旭日圖   卷|Sea and Sky at Sunrise
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal scroll painting depicts several figures under trees in a sparse landscape with vertical text on the right
long_description: A horizontal scroll painting, rendered in muted sepia and dark brown ink on a light tan background, depicts a landscape scene with figures and a section of text. The left two-thirds of the scroll show a sparse outdoor setting. Several trees with dark, textured trunks and dotted foliage are distributed across the scene. On the far left, a figure stands partially obscured by a tree. Towards the center-left, two figures are seated on the ground, one facing left and the other facing right. Further right, another figure stands near a tree, facing right. On the far right of the landscape section, two more figures are seated, one facing left and the other facing right, appearing to interact. The ground is mostly flat with subtle texture. The background is light and open, with faint, indistinct shapes. The right third of the scroll features a vertical column of dark characters, likely calligraphy, on a lighter, unpainted section. Below this main column, smaller characters and a red seal impression are visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Four horses and three men in a muted landscape, with one horse drinking from the ground.
long_description: A horizontal painting on a light brown ground depicts a scene with four horses and three men in a muted landscape. On the left, a light-colored horse stands facing right, with a man in a blue tunic and dark cap seated on its back. Another man in a light garment and dark cap stands beside the horse, holding its bridle. In the central area, a darker horse bends its head down towards the ground, appearing to drink or graze. To the right, a bearded man in a light tunic and dark cap stands, looking left. Further right, a man in a light garment and cap is seated on a dark horse, which faces left. The horses are depicted with bridles. In the lower right foreground, a cluster of green leafy plants is visible. The background is a plain, light brown, with faint blue and green forms in the upper right suggesting distant foliage. The overall color palette is muted, featuring browns, beiges, and subtle greens and blues. Figures and horses are rendered with outlines and soft shading.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A woman reclines under a light blue canopy bed, attended by two figures in an outdoor setting.
long_description: The artwork presents a scene with figures and structures against a muted, textured background, primarily in shades of brown, beige, and gray, with accents of red and light blue. In the middle-right, a large, rectangular bed is prominent, covered by a light blue, translucent canopy with a patterned border and dark support posts. A figure, dressed in red garments, reclines on the bed within the canopy, with their head visible on a pillow. To the immediate right of the bed, a small, dark wooden table holds a white vase containing white flowers, a white bottle, and a red cloth. To the left of the bed, two figures stand on a flat, earthy ground. The figure on the left wears a light-colored garment with a red sash and appears to be gesturing. The second figure, positioned slightly behind and to the right of the first, holds a large, light-colored, round fan with a dark handle and wears a light-colored garment. In the lower right foreground, a small cluster of white flowers with green foliage grows from the ground. The upper left background reveals faint, dark, bare tree branches and a dark, fence-like railing structure. The overall impression is an outdoor setting with a domestic scene.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A seated, crowned figure with elaborate robes and jewelry, against a dark background with a halo.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical, dark-toned painting depicting a single seated figure. The figure occupies the central portion of the composition, facing slightly towards the viewer's right. Behind the figure's head is a circular, light-colored halo or nimbus, which is incomplete at the top. The figure wears an elaborate, multi-tiered crown with intricate details. Long, flowing hair or headwear extends from beneath the crown. The face is indistinct due to the dark tones and age of the painting. The figure is adorned with numerous pieces of jewelry, including large, circular earrings, multiple necklaces with various pendants (one crescent-shaped), and armbands. The robes are highly detailed with patterns and folds, rendered in a lighter color, possibly gold or faded yellow, against the dark background. The figure's hands are not clearly visible, but the posture suggests a relaxed or meditative pose. To the right of the figure, at waist level, a small, light-colored bowl or vessel rests on a low stand. The background is a uniform dark brown or black, with subtle variations in tone. The overall impression is one of solemnity and grandeur, despite the faded appearance of the details.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A wide, monochromatic landscape painting depicting misty mountains, trees, a waterfall, and a river with distant structures.
long_description: This horizontal landscape painting is rendered in a monochromatic palette of browns, greys, and black ink washes, creating a misty and expansive scene. In the far left, a tall, dark mountain rises, from which a thin waterfall cascades down its left face into a body of water below. A low, arched bridge spans this water, connecting two rocky banks. Numerous trees, some with dark, dense foliage and others appearing gnarled and sparse, are scattered across the foreground and mid-ground slopes. A small, square red seal mark is visible in the bottom left corner. Moving towards the center, the landscape opens into a wide river or lake, with several small, dark rocks or islands dotting its surface. More mountains and hills, varying in height and definition, recede into the background, their forms softened by atmospheric haze. Clusters of trees, some with distinct branches, grow on the rocky terrain. On the right side, the distant landscape becomes increasingly faint and ethereal. A cluster of small, simple buildings, possibly a village, is nestled on a gentle slope in the upper right, surrounded by a scattering of trees. The wide body of water continues towards the right, and a faint, diagonal line extends from the right edge into the water, suggesting a fishing net or a boat's mast. The overall composition employs atmospheric perspective, with foreground elements rendered with more detail and darker tones, while background elements are lighter and less distinct, conveying depth and distance.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three rabbits, two white and one brown, on a muted brown background with sparse green grass
long_description: A vertical painting depicts three rabbits on a muted brown ground, framed by a narrow decorative border and a wider plain border. The central image features three rabbits positioned in the lower-middle section. The rabbit at the top right is white, standing on its hind legs with its front paws slightly raised, looking upwards and to the right. It has distinct red eyes. Below and to its left, another white rabbit is crouched low to the ground, facing left with its head slightly turned towards the center. This rabbit also has red eyes and a small dark tail. To the left of the crouching white rabbit, a brown rabbit is also crouched, facing right with its head turned towards the center. Its fur is a rich, mottled brown, and it has dark eyes. In the bottom left corner of the central image, a few sparse blades of green grass are depicted. The background is a uniform, muted brown, suggesting an open, earthy space. The central painted area is bordered by a narrow band featuring a repeating geometric pattern in shades of green and gold. Outside this, a wider, plain light brown border frames the entire artwork. In the upper right corner, a vertical strip of light brown paper with dark, vertical characters is affixed to the outer border. A small red square seal is visible in the bottom left corner of the central image.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A landscape painting featuring green mountains, numerous trees, small figures, and buildings under a muted sky.
long_description: The painting depicts a vast, muted landscape dominated by green mountains and numerous trees under a light brown sky. In the foreground on the left, a large, jagged green mountain rises prominently, its slopes textured with darker green lines and dotted with dark green trees. A winding path, light brown in color, emerges from behind this mountain and leads towards the center. Two small figures, one in a white robe and another in a red robe, walk along this path. Further into the midground, more green mountains of varying sizes recede into the distance, their peaks outlined against the lighter sky. Valleys between these mountains are filled with clusters of dark green trees, some appearing dense and rounded, others more slender and pine-like. In the lower right quadrant, a group of simple buildings with white walls and light brown roofs is nestled among trees at the base of a mountain. Another small group of figures is visible near a cluster of trees in the central midground. The background features a hazy expanse of lighter brown, suggesting a distant body of water or flat land, with faint outlines of even more distant mountains. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of green, brown, and tan, with small accents of white and red.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　劉松年　偽款　山水人物圖|Garden estate
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two ducks swim in water with faint vegetation above, rendered in a monochromatic style on an aged scroll.
long_description: A vertical, monochromatic painting primarily in shades of brown and grey depicts two ducks in water with subtle background elements. At the very top, a solid, darker brown horizontal band spans the width of the image. Below this, the main scene unfolds on a lighter brown background. In the upper left, faint, wispy lines suggest plant stems or reeds extending downwards. Below these, indistinct, darker, cloud-like shapes are visible, possibly indicating foliage or distant land. Two ducks are the central figures in the lower half of the composition, both facing towards the right. The upper duck is positioned slightly behind and above the lower one, with its head slightly lowered. Its body is detailed with fine lines that delineate its feathers. The lower duck is in the foreground, appearing larger and closer, with its head submerged or very close to the water's surface, as if feeding. Its body also features detailed feather patterns. The water is suggested by subtle horizontal lines and variations in shading, creating a sense of depth and movement around the ducks.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A man with a blue hat and exaggerated facial features, including a large mustache, points at his face
long_description: The image depicts a single figure, a man, positioned slightly right of center against a plain, light beige background. The man is shown from the waist up, facing left in profile, with his head tilted slightly upward. He wears a tall, conical blue hat with a textured, possibly fringed, top. His face is light-skinned with exaggerated features: a large, black, curled mustache extends from his upper lip, and a smaller black goatee from his chin. His eyes are wide open, with black pupils and white sclera, and a black line extends from the outer corner of each eye. A white, mask-like shape covers the bridge of his nose and forehead, with a small black dot above his nose. His mouth is open, revealing a dark interior. His right hand, with a pointed index finger, is raised towards his face, near his mouth. He wears a loose-fitting, long-sleeved blue robe adorned with a pattern of white, stylized floral or cloud motifs. Underneath the blue robe, a white garment is visible at the sleeves and collar. A red garment with a similar white floral pattern is visible around his waist and legs, extending downwards. His left arm is bent, and his hand is not visible. A long, thin, light brown pole extends diagonally from the lower left towards the right, passing behind his body. The pole is supported by a small, dark brown, two-legged stand on the left. Another similar stand is visible behind his right side, supporting another unseen pole or object. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of black text are visible. The largest characters read "百单山" and "雇路". Below these, smaller characters read "穿戴臉兒俱照此樣".

metadata.title: 無款 清末 京劇一百人物像 冊 絹本|One hundred portraits of Peking opera characters
metadata.medium: Album of fifty leaves; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A piebald horse stands in a muted landscape with distant mountains and a gnarled tree
long_description: The image is a vertical painting depicting a piebald horse in a muted, earthy landscape. The horse, positioned slightly left of center, faces left with its head turned slightly towards the viewer. Its coat is primarily dark brown or black with large patches of white on its mane, tail, and legs. The mane is long and flowing, predominantly white with some dark strands, and the tail is also long and white. White patches are visible on its face, chest, belly, and lower legs, creating a distinct pattern. The horse stands with its weight distributed evenly on all four legs. The background is rendered in soft, muted tones of brown and gray. In the upper left, faint, dark mountain peaks are visible against a lighter sky. To the right of the horse, a gnarled, dark tree with sparse branches extends from the upper right corner downwards, its form partially obscured by a hazy, cloud-like area. The ground beneath the horse is a flat, light brown, with subtle variations in tone suggesting uneven terrain or sparse vegetation. A red square seal with illegible characters is visible in the bottom right corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: Eight figures on a patterned mat beneath a rocky landscape with flowering plants, against a gold background
long_description: The horizontal painting features a muted, brownish-gold background with a decorative gold border at the top and bottom edges. In the upper left, a cluster of light-colored rocks is visible, adorned with green foliage and small pink flowers. To the right of the rocks, the background is a plain brownish-gold, with faint suggestions of distant landscape elements. In the lower half of the composition, eight figures are arranged on a large, rectangular mat with a light-colored border and a dark, intricate pattern. The figures are mostly seated or reclining, dressed in robes of varying colors including white, light blue, red, and muted purples. Their hair is styled in dark, elaborate buns. Several figures hold objects: one on the far left holds a small white object, another in the center holds a red object, and a figure on the right holds a large, dark, fan-like object with a curved top. The figures are positioned in a somewhat informal gathering, facing each other or looking outwards. The overall color palette is dominated by warm browns and golds, accented by the brighter hues of the figures' attire and the sparse floral elements.

metadata.title: 明  佚名   蘇蕙璇璣圖  卷|Lady Su Hui and Her Verse Puzzle
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal painting depicts numerous crowned figures, some with halos, standing and seated amidst clouds and dragons.
long_description: A horizontal painting features a large assembly of figures, primarily human-like, against a light tan background. The scene is framed by a decorative border at the top and bottom, which includes white and red dragons intertwined with stylized red and blue floral motifs. In the upper section, a band of red, blue, and white clouds stretches across the width of the image. Below these clouds, a central group of nine figures stands within a large, light-colored cloud formation that rises from the bottom. These figures wear elaborate robes in shades of red, blue, and white, with some having dark hair and beards. They all wear crowns or distinct headpieces. To the left of this central group, two figures stand side-by-side. The leftmost figure wears light-colored robes and a crown. The figure next to them wears a red robe, a crown, and has a red halo behind their head. Further left, two more figures stand, also in elaborate robes and crowns. One of these figures appears to be riding a small, dark, animal-like creature. To the right of the central group, a single figure is seated on an elaborate throne-like structure, also enveloped in a large, light-colored cloud. This figure wears a crown and richly decorated robes. Below the seated figure, a dark, dragon-like creature is visible. The figures generally have light skin tones and serene expressions. The overall color palette includes muted reds, blues, greens, and whites against the tan ground, with some gold accents.

metadata.title: 明  佚名   奉神圖   卷|Canonization scroll of Li Zhong
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A faded horizontal painting depicts an ancient landscape with tiered buildings, trees, hills, and a red sun.
long_description: The painting is a horizontal landscape, primarily in muted brown and green tones, with some red accents, giving it an aged and faded appearance. In the upper right quadrant, a prominent circular shape, reddish-orange in color, is visible against the brownish sky, suggesting a sun or moon. Below and to the left of this, a series of architectural structures, possibly buildings or terraces, are depicted. These structures feature reddish-brown walls and some green or teal-colored roofs or details. They appear to be arranged on different levels, connected by what might be pathways or staircases, also in reddish tones, extending diagonally across the middle ground. Throughout the landscape, scattered green elements suggest trees or foliage, particularly on the hills in the background and around the structures. The background features undulating hills or mountains, rendered in muted greens and browns, blending into the sky. In the far left, more architectural forms are visible, continuing the theme of tiered structures. The painting has a textured appearance, possibly from the canvas or paper it is on, and shows some signs of cracking or wear. A small, square red seal is present in the bottom right corner of the painted area.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A fragmented painting depicts a stylized, colorful bird with an elaborate tail on a light background.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical, fragmented painting on a light, aged paper background. The central and dominant element is a large, stylized bird, possibly a phoenix, rendered in vibrant colors. The bird's body is oriented vertically, facing towards the upper right, with its head tilted upwards and beak open. Its plumage is highly detailed, featuring a mix of dark gray, red, white, and light blue-green. The bird's chest and upper body are predominantly white with red and blue-green accents, while its back and wings are covered in dark gray, scale-like patterns with small red and blue-green details. The long, flowing tail feathers extend downwards and curve slightly to the left, displaying a blend of light gray, blue-green, and red ribbons or strands. The edges of the painted bird are irregular and appear torn, indicating the fragmented nature of the piece. In the upper left corner, above the bird's head, there is a small, rectangular red mark with faint, illegible text or patterns. To its right, in the upper right corner, a circular red mark is visible. The background paper is a uniform light beige or off-white, showing some signs of age and slight discoloration.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink and color on paper, framed

alt_text: A horizontal painting depicts a procession of many small figures in colorful robes, some holding flags and an umbrella
long_description: This horizontal painting features a procession of numerous stylized figures against a plain, muted brown background. The figures are arranged in a loose horizontal band across the lower half of the composition, with some overlapping. On the far left, a taller figure, wearing a dark hat and a red and white striped robe, holds a red flag aloft on a pole. To their right, a group of smaller figures, likely children, are depicted in various poses. Their clothing includes robes in shades of green, blue, red, and brown, often with white accents on collars, cuffs, and hems. Many figures wear distinct hats or have elaborate hairstyles. Some hold poles, ribbons, or small, round objects that resemble drums or cymbals. In the center, the figures are more densely clustered, creating a sense of movement and activity. Towards the right side of the painting, a large, tiered umbrella-like object, predominantly red with white frills, is held by one of the figures. More small figures are gathered around this umbrella. The figures have simple, round faces and minimal facial details. The colors appear somewhat faded, contributing to the aged appearance of the artwork. The overall impression is of a lively, celebratory gathering.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A black and white painting of a mountainous landscape filled with various birds, mythical beasts, and feline creatures, with text at the top
long_description: A large, vertical black and white painting depicts a dynamic mountainous landscape teeming with various creatures. The top quarter of the image is occupied by a block of vertical text, arranged in columns, rendered in a calligraphic style. Below this, the landscape unfolds with rocky peaks, sparse trees, and numerous animals. In the upper section, two dark birds fly above a craggy outcrop on the left, where a large, dark, bird-like creature with a prominent, fanned tail stands. To the right, a crane stands on a rock, while below it, a large bird with a long, flowing, fanned tail is perched. Further right, another dark, fanned-tail bird is partially visible. The mid-section features a large, horned, dragon-like creature with a flowing mane and tail, descending a slope on the left. Below it, a smaller, horse-like creature with a rider is depicted. The landscape here is denser with dark, textured trees and rugged rock formations. On the right, another winged creature with a long, flowing tail is seen amidst the foliage. The lower section continues the rocky, forested terrain. Numerous feline-like creatures, some resembling tigers or lions, are scattered across the slopes in various active poses. Some have elaborate, curly manes and tails. One creature on the far left has a deer-like body with a feline head. Another on the lower right has a long, slender body and tail. The ground is uneven and rocky, with sparse vegetation. The entire artwork is rendered in shades of black, white, and gray, utilizing strong brushstrokes to define forms and textures.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts a large procession of figures in elaborate costumes with banners and a central seated figure.
long_description: A rectangular painting in a brown frame shows a vibrant outdoor scene with a large gathering of figures. The background features a light green sky transitioning to darker green trees and foliage, with a few small birds flying in the upper left. The ground is a light brown. In the upper mid-ground, several rectangular banners with intricate designs and circular motifs, some containing text, are suspended from poles. Below these, a row of figures, mostly men, are dressed in colorful, patterned robes and hats, holding poles with banners or other objects. A large, white, fan-like structure is visible in the center background. The foreground is densely populated with numerous figures, both men and women, in highly detailed, brightly colored robes featuring patterns in red, gold, blue, green, and white. Many wear elaborate headwear. Some male figures have prominent beards and painted faces. In the lower center, a prominent figure, possibly a woman, is seated on a wheeled platform or cart, wearing a blue and white patterned robe. This central figure is surrounded by other standing figures, some holding long poles or lanterns. The figures are arranged in multiple rows, creating a sense of depth within the crowded scene.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Framed painting; color on glass

alt_text: Two small birds stand on rocky ground beneath dark bamboo branches on a light brown background
long_description: The painting features two small birds and bamboo branches against a light brown background. In the upper left and extending towards the center, several dark, slender bamboo branches with long, narrow leaves are depicted. Some small white dots are scattered on the bamboo leaves and branches. Below the bamboo, two small, light-colored birds with darker wings and tails are positioned on uneven, rocky ground. The bird on the left stands upright, facing right, with its head slightly raised and beak open. Its body is mostly light brown and white, with darker grey-brown markings on its wings and tail. The bird on the right is positioned lower and faces left, with its head tilted downwards towards the ground. Its plumage is similar to the first bird, with light brown and white tones and darker markings. The rocky ground beneath the birds is rendered in shades of grey and brown, with angular forms. A small, square red seal is visible in the lower left corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A person on a horse travels through a mountainous landscape with a large, multi-tiered building on a hillside
long_description: This horizontal painting depicts a mountainous landscape with a large building and a figure on horseback, rendered in muted earthy tones. On the left, a prominent multi-tiered building with green-tiled roofs and red-brown walls is set into a steep, rocky hillside. It features several levels, each with a distinct, curved roofline. Below and around this main structure, smaller green-roofed buildings and trees with red and green foliage are visible. The hillside itself is a blend of brown and green, with dark rock formations. A small, faint red seal or inscription is present in the lower left corner. To the right, a person dressed in a red garment rides a light-colored horse, moving from the right side of the frame towards the left along a winding path. The path is surrounded by scattered trees and shrubs, some displaying vibrant red leaves, others green. In the background, several peaks rise, rendered in lighter, softer shades of brown and green, suggesting distance and atmospheric perspective. The sky above is a muted, warm brown-yellow, blending seamlessly with the distant mountains. The overall color palette is dominated by ochres, browns, and greens, accented by the reds of the building and foliage.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A dark beetle with long antennae rests on a light brown rock, surrounded by green leaves and red berries.
long_description: The artwork depicts a natural scene with a large insect and plants against a plain, light brown background. A prominent dark-bodied insect, possibly a longhorn beetle, is positioned on a light brown, textured rock in the upper right quadrant. The insect has a dark, possibly black or very dark brown, body with lighter, irregular spots or markings, and two long, curved antennae extending forward. Its six legs are visible, gripping the rock's surface. The rock itself is a warm, light brown color with subtle variations in tone, suggesting depth and texture. To the left and below the rock, a vine-like plant with several green leaves and clusters of small, bright red, berry-like objects spreads across the lower half of the image. The red objects are depicted with numerous small dots, giving them a textured appearance. Delicate tendrils from the plant curl upwards and to the left. Below the plants, a patch of faint green stippling suggests ground cover. In the upper right corner of the rock, two red characters, "温良", are visible. Below the main artwork, in the lower right corner of the mounting, a handwritten signature in black script reads "Wen-Liang".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A light-colored bird flies towards a nest filled with chicks among green bamboo branches on a brown background
long_description: The artwork depicts a natural scene with a bird, a nest, and bamboo branches against a plain background. A light-colored bird, possibly a sparrow or finch, is shown in flight in the upper right portion of the image. Its wings are spread upwards, and its tail extends diagonally downwards to the right. Its body is a soft beige or light grey, with subtle darker markings on its wings. The bird's beak is open, suggesting it is either calling or about to feed. To the left of the flying bird, nestled among green bamboo leaves, is a round, woven nest. The nest is a light brown color, appearing to be constructed from twigs and grasses. Inside the nest, several small, light-colored chicks are visible. Their heads are raised, and their beaks are wide open, indicating they are young and awaiting food. The left side and bottom of the composition are dominated by green bamboo stalks and leaves. The bamboo stalks are a muted green, and the elongated, pointed leaves are a darker shade of green, with some individual leaf veins visible. The bamboo branches extend from the lower left upwards and across, partially framing the nest. A small, square red seal with indistinct characters is located in the bottom left corner, partially covered by a bamboo stalk. The background of the entire scene is a uniform, warm light brown, providing a simple backdrop for the detailed natural elements.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A landscape painting featuring mountains, dense trees, traditional tiered buildings, a river, a bridge, and a person
long_description: This horizontal landscape painting features a muted color palette dominated by browns, grays, and dark greens. The left side is densely forested with dark, slender trees, among which several traditional buildings are nestled. Two prominent structures are stacked vertically, each featuring multiple tiered roofs in shades of red-brown and dark gray. Below them, another building with a single roof is partially visible. Further left, a smaller, simpler building with a triangular roof is visible. Behind these structures, a large, dark mountain rises, its peak extending towards the top edge of the painting. Moving towards the right, the landscape opens up to a river or body of water that flows horizontally across the middle ground. The water appears dark and reflective, with lighter patches suggesting shallows or reflections. A small, arched bridge spans the water on the right side, connecting a rocky bank to the foreground. On the bridge, a small, dark figure, possibly a person, is depicted walking towards the right. The foreground on the right consists of rocky terrain and sparse vegetation. In the far background, lighter, more distant mountains are visible, fading into the muted sky. In the bottom left corner, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text and a red seal impression.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome ink wash painting of a mountainous landscape with temples, dense trees, and small structures.
long_description: The image is a monochrome ink wash painting on light brown paper, depicting a vast, detailed mountainous landscape. The artwork is rendered primarily with dark ink lines and washes, creating a sense of depth and texture against the lighter paper. In the background, a series of towering, rugged mountains dominates the upper half of the composition. Their peaks are outlined with dark, jagged ink strokes, and their slopes are rendered with lighter washes, suggesting a misty or atmospheric quality. Small, dark clusters of foliage or trees are visible on some of the mountain ridges. In the mid-ground, several traditional-style buildings are nestled within the valleys and on the lower slopes. To the left, a large temple complex with multiple tiered roofs is visible, partially obscured by trees. To the right, a tall, multi-storied structure, possibly a pagoda or watchtower, stands on a higher ridge, surrounded by dense, dark green foliage. The foreground features rolling hills and numerous clusters of pine-like trees, depicted with fine, dark brushstrokes that create a textured appearance. A prominent, irregular, light-colored shape, possibly a large rock or a waterfall, is visible in the lower-left foreground, contrasting with the darker surrounding trees and ground. Small, simple structures, resembling houses or huts, are scattered along the lower right, near the base of the mountains, indicating human habitation. A small, rectangular red seal with illegible characters is present in the lower-left corner of the painting. The sky above the mountains is a uniform light brown, matching the paper's color.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A traditional landscape painting depicts towering mountains, dense trees, and several buildings with figures by a winding stream.
long_description: A traditional landscape painting, rendered in a muted palette of browns, greens, and grays, depicts a mountainous scene with human habitation. In the upper half, tall, jagged mountains rise, their forms softened by a hazy atmosphere, with some peaks appearing darker and more defined than others. In the midground, a cluster of buildings with dark, sloped roofs and light-colored walls is nestled on a hillside. The most prominent building, located on the left, is a two-story structure with a figure in a red garment visible on its upper balcony. Below it, a longer, single-story building extends horizontally, connected by a bridge over a winding stream or path that flows from the bottom center towards the right. Another small figure is visible on this bridge. Various trees, including dark evergreens and lighter trees with hints of reddish-brown foliage, are scattered across the landscape, with a dense stand of tall, slender trees, possibly bamboo, to the left of the buildings. The overall impression is one of depth and tranquility. In the lower left corner, there are vertical lines of dark text and a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk
