alt_text: Two women in traditional attire stand in a garden with flowering trees and rolling hills
long_description: The painting depicts two women in a landscape setting, rendered in a muted color palette dominated by earthy tones. The background is a light brown, suggesting a sky or distant ground. Two gnarled trees with dark brown trunks and branches frame the scene, one on the left and one on the right, both featuring small white blossoms. Rolling hills with patches of green foliage are visible in the mid-ground. On the left, a woman stands facing towards the right. She wears a long, flowing white skirt and a red top with wide sleeves. Her dark hair is styled in an elaborate bun. She holds a light brown, rectangular object, possibly a book or box, in both hands at chest level. Her gaze is directed towards the right. On the right side of the painting, another woman stands, facing towards the left. She wears a long, flowing white skirt and a light green top with wide sleeves. Her dark hair is also styled in an elaborate bun. She holds a small, light-colored fan with a floral design in her right hand, which rests near her waist. Her left arm is bent, and her hand is near her chest. A small, light brown fence is visible behind her to the right. The ground beneath the figures is textured with subtle brushstrokes, and patches of green and dark green foliage are scattered across the lower portion of the scene.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting depicting layered mountains, bare trees, and small buildings by a body of water
long_description: An ink wash landscape painting on a light brown ground depicts a vast mountainous scene with scattered trees and small structures. The composition is dominated by numerous mountains that recede into the background, rendered with varying shades of gray and black ink. In the distance, mountains appear hazy and layered, while closer peaks show more defined contours and textured brushstrokes. Throughout the midground and foreground, numerous bare trees with intricate, dark branches are scattered across the slopes and valleys, suggesting a winter or late autumn setting. To the left, a body of water, possibly a river or lake, extends from the left edge towards the center of the painting. Along its banks and nestled among the trees are several small, simple buildings with dark roofs. A faint path or road appears to wind through the lower part of the landscape. The overall color palette consists of dark gray and black ink on the warm, light brown tone of the paper or silk. On the far right side of the artwork, a vertical inscription reads "谷雲畫" followed by a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Miniature from album of eleven paintings; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome landscape painting featuring large rocks, bare branches, and various plants like bamboo, orchids, and chrysanthemums.
long_description: This monochrome ink painting depicts a natural landscape with rocks and various plants. The composition is horizontal, with a light-toned ground in the foreground and a hazy, textured background that suggests distant hills or an expansive sky. On the far left, a large, dark, irregularly shaped rock stands prominently, with thin, bare branches extending upwards and to the right from behind it. To the left of this rock, several slender, pointed leaves, resembling bamboo, are visible. Below and to the right of the large rock, smaller, organic shapes, possibly fungi or stylized rock formations, are depicted alongside broad-leafed plants. In the central foreground, a cluster of long, arching leaves, characteristic of orchids, emerges from the ground, with a few small, light-toned blossoms. The ground gently undulates across the mid-section, featuring small tufts of grass in various places. Towards the right side of the painting, a smaller, dark rock is surrounded by a cluster of plants bearing several daisy-like flowers with distinct petals and dark centers. The overall palette consists of various shades of gray, from very light tones for the ground and sky to deep, dark tones for the rocks and some plant elements, creating depth and contrast. Two small, square seals with illegible characters are visible in the bottom left corner, stacked vertically, and another faint, small seal is in the bottom right corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures and a saddled horse on a plain background, with faint birds flying overhead
long_description: The painting depicts two figures and a saddled horse on a plain, light brown background. In the upper left corner, two faint, light-colored bird outlines appear to be in flight. On the far left, a smaller figure in a light green robe faces right, holding a thin, dark object to their mouth with both hands. To their right, a taller figure in a long, flowing red robe also faces right. This figure's right hand is raised to their head, while a white bird, possibly a falcon, perches on their left arm. A dark scabbard containing a sword and a cylindrical container hang from their waist. On the right side of the composition, a black horse faces left. Its head is lowered, and its front legs are bent, suggesting it is grazing or resting. The horse wears a saddle with a green seat and red trim, placed over a white saddle blanket adorned with a light pattern. Red tassels hang from the saddle near the horse's tail. The background is a uniform, unadorned light brown color.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A yellow bird with an open beak perches on a thorny branch with red berries, with two insects flying above
long_description: A vertical watercolor painting on a light, off-white background depicts a small yellow bird and branches with red berries and green leaves, along with two flying insects. In the center, a plump, light yellow bird with a lighter belly perches on a thorny branch. Its head is turned slightly to the right, and its beak is open, revealing a small dark interior. Its eye is a small dark dot. The branch it sits on extends from the left side of the composition, curving upwards and then downwards, with several smaller thorny offshoots. This branch is adorned with numerous clusters of bright red, oval-shaped berries and dark green leaves. Another branch segment with similar leaves and berries extends from the lower right corner, curving upwards. In the upper right quadrant, two dark, winged insects with segmented bodies are depicted in flight, one slightly above the other. In the lower left corner, there is a small red seal impression, consisting of two stacked, rectangular shapes with stylized characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of seven leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A traditional painting depicts a mountainous landscape with a waterfall, buildings, and groups of people walking along paths.
long_description: The painting is a vertical composition depicting a detailed mountainous landscape with human figures and structures. The upper portion features a light blue-grey sky. In the upper left, two red square seals are visible, along with black calligraphic text arranged vertically. The text reads: "極醉翁亭", "戊午二月上浣". Rolling green mountains with dark green tree lines cover most of the background and midground, receding into the distance with lighter hues. On the right side, a multi-tiered building with a dark, curved roof is nestled into a mountain slope, with a thin white waterfall cascading down from near it. Several large, gnarled trees with dark green foliage are prominent in the midground, particularly on the right and center. In the foreground, a winding path with a low, light-colored wall on its right edge leads through the landscape. Groups of people, dressed in robes of various colors like beige, light red, and blue, are walking along this path. Some individual figures are also visible on higher mountain paths. A body of water or a river is visible in the lower left, with a single figure near its edge. Pine trees with dark green needles are prominent in the lower center and left. The overall color palette is muted greens, blues, and browns, with areas of light grey and beige.

metadata.title: 清   陸漢 山水八開  冊|Eight landscapes
metadata.medium: Album of eight leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A long, horizontal painting shows two parallel lines of numerous small figures in a procession, carrying banners and objects
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal painting on a light brown background, depicting a long procession of numerous small, stylized figures. The figures are arranged in two main parallel lines, both moving from left to right across the frame. The upper line of figures is slightly longer and more densely packed than the lower line. Each figure is depicted with simple forms, wearing a hat and a robe, primarily in shades of brown, blue, and red. Many figures carry tall poles, some topped with small flags or decorative elements. Others carry larger, rectangular banners of various colors, including blue, red, green, black, and white, often with simple designs or characters. In the upper line, towards the left, some figures carry large, ornate, multi-tiered objects. Further right in the upper line, a central group of figures surrounds a red, box-like structure, possibly a palanquin. The banners in the upper line feature various designs, including what appear to be stylized birds or creatures on white backgrounds, and some with black or blue fields. The lower line of figures also carries numerous poles and banners. Towards the left of the lower line, a red, box-like structure with blue accents is carried by several figures. The banners in the lower line are predominantly red and black, often with striped or geometric patterns. The overall impression is of a large, organized parade or ceremonial march.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal painting of white roses and green leaves on a thorny branch, with bees flying, against a light brown background.
long_description: A horizontal painting features a branch of a flowering plant extending across a light brown background. The branch originates from the upper left, curving downwards and to the right, becoming thinner towards the bottom right corner. It is adorned with several large, open white or very pale yellow flowers, along with smaller buds. The flowers have multiple layers of petals, appearing full and soft. Dark green leaves, some in clusters of three or five, are distributed along the thorny stems. The leaves vary in size, with larger ones near the open flowers and smaller ones further along the branch. Several small, dark-bodied insects, possibly bees or wasps, with translucent wings, are depicted in flight around the flowers and leaves. There are two insects near the upper left flowers, and two more further to the right, one above and one below the main branch. The background is a uniform, untextured light brown. In the bottom right corner, a small, square red seal is visible.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　趙昌(僞款)　蜂王圖　卷|Yellow Roses and Bees, Pink Roses and Wasps
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal painting depicts roosters, a long-tailed bird, and flowering trees amidst rocky formations and foliage.
long_description: A horizontal painting presents a natural landscape scene with birds and various plants. On the far left, a large tree with numerous small, reddish-pink flowers on its branches stands over a muted green-brown ground. Below this tree, two chickens are visible: a rooster with a red comb and colorful plumage, and a smaller brown hen, both appearing to peck at the ground. In the central area, a prominent, dark, jagged rock formation rises, with a tall plant resembling a banana tree, featuring large green leaves, emerging from behind it. Another rooster, similar in coloring to the first, stands near the base of these central rocks. Scattered around the rocks are various flowering plants with pink and white blossoms. To the right, a long-tailed bird, possibly a pheasant, with distinctive long white tail feathers, perches on a lighter-colored rocky mound. A smaller, darker bird is partially visible behind it. More flowering plants and green foliage are distributed across the ground and smaller hills in the right portion of the painting. The background throughout is a uniform, light brown-green, suggesting a distant landscape or sky.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting depicting two pheasants on a rocky bank beside a stream with bamboo and grasses
long_description: This ink painting, rendered in shades of black and gray, presents a natural landscape scene. In the lower right, two pheasants stand on a light-colored rocky bank, facing towards the left. Both birds have long, patterned tails and detailed feathers on their bodies, rendered with varying ink washes. The pheasant on the left is slightly more prominent, with its head turned to the left. Behind and to the left of the pheasants, a large, dark, textured rock formation rises, showing jagged edges and deep crevices. Further to the left, a body of water or stream flows horizontally across the middle ground, with faint ripples and a few blades of grass emerging from its banks in the lower left. In the upper left and upper right, clusters of bamboo branches with slender leaves are depicted, adding to the natural setting. The background is a lighter wash, suggesting mist or distance. Along the far right edge of the painting, several square and rectangular red seals are visible, stacked vertically.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　仿沈周　蘆雁花卉圖　卷|Marsh Scene with Birds
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Numerous small birds perch on and fly around dark, sparse trees against a muted, textured background
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal composition featuring numerous small birds among sparse trees against a muted background. In the lower half of the image, dark, gnarled branches with sparse, dark foliage extend across the scene. Many small birds are perched on these branches, often clustered together. These birds typically have dark upper bodies and wings, contrasting with lighter, possibly white, undersides or markings. Above and around the trees, other birds are depicted in various stages of flight, scattered across the upper and middle sections of the composition. These flying birds also exhibit dark and light plumage. The background is a light, muted gray or silver, with a textured appearance that suggests age or a specific artistic technique. Faint horizontal bands are visible across the middle ground, creating a subtle layering effect. The overall palette is largely monochrome, relying on shades of dark gray, black, and light gray.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A monochrome ink painting shows figures amidst swirling clouds, a central dotted object, and sparse vegetation.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal monochrome ink painting on a light-toned ground, depicting a scene with multiple figures, clouds, and sparse vegetation. The overall impression is one of movement and ethereal forms. On the far left, a figure with dark hair pulled back is seated or reclining on a cloud-like form. This figure wears a light-colored robe and appears to be looking towards a long, rectangular object, possibly a scroll or book, positioned in front of them. Below this figure, dark, swirling ink washes suggest clouds or mist, with hints of dark, spiky vegetation emerging from the lower edge. In the central area, a prominent, elongated, vertical object with a rounded top is depicted. It has a series of small, dark, circular dots running down its length. This object is surrounded by lighter ink washes, suggesting clouds. Above and to the right of this central object, a small, round-faced figure with dark hair is visible, seemingly emerging from the clouds. Further to the right, a cluster of several small, round-faced figures with dark hair are depicted amidst more swirling clouds and dark, spiky vegetation. These figures appear to be interacting or looking towards the center. The vegetation on the right side is more pronounced, with dark, hanging tendrils and spiky forms. The entire composition is rendered with varying shades of gray and black ink, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere.

metadata.title: 壺天聚樂圖|Merry Gatherings in the Magic Jar
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A monochrome ink landscape painting depicts a wide river with boats, distant pagodas, and mountains under a muted sky.
long_description: A horizontal ink painting on a light brown ground, rendered primarily in shades of dark grey and black. The composition features a wide body of water in the foreground and middle ground, with landforms and structures in the distance. On the far left, a small, dark boat is visible on the water, with a faint, dark landmass beyond it. Further to the right, another small, dark boat is positioned on the water. Above the water, on a distant landmass, two multi-tiered structures, resembling pagodas, rise prominently. These buildings are surrounded by dark, clustered forms that suggest trees or dense foliage. The landscape continues towards the right with undulating, dark grey mountain ranges or hills that recede into the background, becoming lighter and less defined. The far right of the painting shows a large, indistinct landmass or mountain, rendered in soft, dark grey tones. A reddish-brown area is visible along the right edge, possibly a discoloration of the material. The sky above is a uniform light brown, matching the paper or silk ground.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　仿方從義　巢雲圖　卷|Miniature Landscape
metadata.medium: Two handscrolls; ink on paper

alt_text: A horizontal ink wash painting depicts a misty landscape with undulating mountains, clusters of trees, and small structures.
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting presents a serene landscape dominated by a range of undulating mountains. The upper two-thirds of the artwork is a light, unpainted or very lightly washed area, suggesting sky or distant haze. Below this, a band of mist or fog stretches across the mid-ground, partially obscuring the lower slopes of the mountains. The mountains themselves vary in definition; some peaks are rendered with darker, more distinct ink strokes, while others appear lighter and softer, fading into the atmospheric haze. On the far left, in the foreground, a cluster of dark green trees stands, with a few small, light-colored structures, possibly houses, nestled among them or nearby. Further to the right in the foreground, more scattered trees with similar dark foliage are visible, extending across the lower portion of the painting. The ground beneath the trees and structures is a light, muted brown or beige wash. The overall color palette is restricted to shades of blue-gray, dark green, and light brown against the pale background of the paper, creating a sense of depth and tranquility. On the far right edge, three small, rectangular red seals are vertically stacked.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　仿方從義　巢雲圖　卷|Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large, long-necked animal with a patterned body stands beside two smaller human figures, one holding a rope.
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a large, long-necked animal dominating the left and center of a plain, brownish-yellow background. The animal, resembling a giraffe, has a long, slender neck that curves slightly forward, a robust body, and four thick legs. Its entire body is covered in a faint, dark hexagonal pattern. Its head is small, with dark features that suggest eyes and possibly small horns or ears. A red, tear-drop shaped object hangs from its mouth area, connected by thin dark lines. A single thin, dark rope extends from the animal's head down to the lower right. Two human figures, significantly smaller than the animal, stand in the lower right quadrant. Both figures wear long, reddish-brown robes and dark head coverings. The figure on the left holds the rope that extends from the animal's head. The figure on the right stands slightly behind and to the right of the first, with their arms bent. The ground beneath the figures and the animal's feet is a slightly lighter shade of brownish-yellow. The overall color palette is muted, with dark outlines defining the forms against the warm, earthy background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink and color on silk

alt_text: A central deity-like figure with flames and a halo, standing over two kneeling figures, on aged paper with text
long_description: A vertical artwork on aged, light brown paper depicts a central, large, standing figure with two smaller figures below. The central figure has light-toned skin, a bare torso, and wears a dark, elaborate headdress with a gold-colored crown. A blue circular halo surrounds the head, from which red and blue flame-like shapes emanate upwards and outwards. The figure's face is broad with small eyes and a small mouth. The right hand is raised with the palm facing forward, fingers extended upwards. The left hand holds a dark, irregular object. The lower body is clad in a red and dark blue skirt-like garment with flowing sashes in blue, red, and dark green. The figure stands with legs apart, feet positioned over two smaller, kneeling figures. These two smaller figures are dressed in dark, simple garments and wear small, dark hats. They are positioned symmetrically, facing inwards towards the center, with their heads bowed low. Each small figure has a blue and red ribbon-like element near their head. On the left side of the artwork, a vertical column of dark characters is visible. The text reads: 永昌元年甲寅弟子石三郎造, followed by 僧義 below it.

metadata.title: 唐(?)　佚名　佛畫八幅　散頁|Eight Buddhist Paintings
metadata.medium: Eight leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A dark, gnarled branch with pale blossoms and dark buds extends diagonally across a circular brown painting
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting set against a muted, dark brown or ochre background. A single, gnarled branch extends diagonally from the upper left quadrant towards the lower right, dominating the composition. The branch is dark brown, almost black, with a textured appearance. Along the branch are several pale, light-colored blossoms, some fully open with visible petals, others appearing as clusters. These blossoms are a light cream or off-white color. Interspersed among the blossoms are numerous small, dark, round buds, appearing almost black. The branch has smaller offshoots, also bearing blossoms and buds. In the upper right quadrant, a rectangular red seal with illegible characters is visible. Another smaller, square red seal is present in the lower left quadrant, also with illegible characters.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　(傳)馬麟　雪梅圖　團扇|Snow Plum
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: A dark bird with a crest perches on a thin branch against a brown background, with faint inscriptions
long_description: The painting features a dark bird perched on a thin branch against a muted brown background. The bird, positioned slightly left of center, faces left with its head turned slightly upwards. It has a rounded body, dark plumage, and a distinctive, slightly raised crest on its head. Its beak is pointed, and its eye is a small dark dot. Its feet grip the slender, dark branch. The branch extends from the lower left quadrant, curving gently upwards and then downwards, disappearing off the right edge of the frame. Several thin, dark lines, resembling leaves or additional delicate branches, emerge from the right side of the composition, some extending towards the bird. In the upper left corner, a vertical column of dark characters is visible, with a small, rectangular red seal directly below it. Another smaller vertical inscription appears in the lower right corner. The background is a uniform, medium-dark brown, showing some subtle variations in tone. The central painted area is framed by a lighter, off-white border with a faint, repeating pattern.

metadata.title: 清　郭汝龍　指畫寒禽圖　冊頁|Mynah on Reed
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A multi-tiered building with red roofs and trees on a rocky outcrop, with a bridge and figures in a hazy landscape.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical landscape painting with a muted, earthy color palette. A large, multi-tiered building with prominent red-tiled roofs and white walls dominates the left side of the composition. The building features multiple levels, each with a distinct roofline and visible windows or openings. It is situated on a rocky, light blue-grey outcrop, with a cluster of dark green, slender trees growing around its base and extending upwards along its sides. To the immediate left of the building, a steep, light brown mountain face rises, blending into the background. The right side and upper background of the painting are rendered in a uniform, hazy brown, suggesting a vast expanse of water or mist. In the upper right quadrant, a long, arched bridge extends horizontally across this hazy expanse. Several small, light-colored figures are visible walking across the bridge, appearing to be in procession. The overall impression is one of an ancient or traditional scene, with architectural grandeur set within a natural, somewhat desolate landscape. The colors are predominantly browns, muted reds, and dark greens, with touches of light blue-grey for the rocks.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A small bird perches on a gnarled, leafless tree branch against a muted, misty background
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting depicting a winter landscape. A gnarled, dark brown tree with numerous bare branches dominates the right and center of the composition, extending upwards and to the left. Its thick, twisted trunk emerges from dark, rocky formations at the bottom. A small bird, with a white belly and dark back and head, is perched on a branch near the center-left, facing right. The branches are thin and delicate, covered with tiny, dark buds. The background is a uniform, muted brownish-gray, suggesting a misty or cloudy atmosphere, with faint, lighter horizontal lines in the mid-ground that could indicate distant water or land. Darker, angular rock formations are visible at the lower left, partially obscured by the tree's base. Two red square seals are visible: one in the lower left corner and another in the lower right.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and white pigment on silk

alt_text: Circular painting of a hazy landscape with jagged mountains, water, trees, and boats with figures
long_description: A circular painting depicts a serene, hazy landscape in muted tones of brown, gray, and dark green. The left side of the composition features a cluster of tall, jagged mountains or cliffs, rendered in dark grays and blues, rising from the water's edge. At the base of these mountains and extending along the lower left shore are various trees, including some with gnarled branches and others with softer foliage. A small, dark structure with a peaked roof is nestled among the trees near the water on the far left. The central and lower right portions of the painting are dominated by a calm body of water, its surface reflecting the soft, diffused light. On the right side of the water, three boats are visible, each carrying several small, dark figures. The boats are simple in form, with one appearing to have a mast. In the distant background, a range of hazy, undulating mountains stretches across the horizon, with a more prominent, blocky structure visible on one of the peaks. The sky above is a light, muted brown, blending seamlessly with the distant landscape. A rectangular red seal with vertical dark characters is present in the upper right quadrant of the painting.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　仿趙伯駒　春江行舟圖　團扇|Seascape
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two fluffy cats sit among pink and red flowers with butterflies on a brown background
long_description: This oval-shaped artwork depicts a scene with two cats, flowers, and butterflies on a light brown ground. In the lower left quadrant, a large, fluffy cat with predominantly light-colored fur and distinct brown patches on its head and back sits facing forward. Its tail is dark and bushy. To the right and slightly below this cat, a smaller, lighter-colored cat with some reddish-brown markings on its head and back lies on the ground, also facing forward. Above the cats and extending across the right side of the composition is a large plant with numerous green, lobed leaves. Clusters of flowers in shades of pink, red, and white bloom from the plant. Several butterflies with light-colored, patterned wings are depicted in the upper half of the painting, appearing to fly around the flowering plant. The ground beneath the cats and the base of the plant is a darker brown, with small, dark green, stylized plant forms scattered across it. In the upper left corner, a rectangular red seal with intricate, stylized characters is visible against the light brown background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A circular painting depicts many children playing in a courtyard and inside a building.
long_description: This circular painting depicts a lively scene with numerous children engaged in various activities within and around a traditional building. The overall color palette is muted, featuring browns, tans, and greens with occasional accents of red. The upper portion of the painting shows the interior of a building with a dark, sloped roof supported by several dark brown wooden pillars. On the left side, inside the building, a child in a green garment reclines on a raised platform, resting their head on an arm. Nearby, another child in a light-colored garment sits at a low table, looking towards the right. A third child, wearing a light green top and red pants, stands by a pillar, pointing an arm towards the center of the scene. A dark, hat-like object hangs in the upper left corner. Towards the center and right, within the building, several children are gathered around low tables. One child in a light green top is seated, looking down at an object on a table, while another child in a light garment sits opposite. Further right, another child is seated at a table. The background wall on the right features a small, rectangular opening and shelves with indistinct items. The lower portion of the painting depicts an outdoor grassy area with scattered green and reddish plants. Several children are playing on the ground. One child, dressed in a red top and light pants, is kneeling or crawling. Another child in a light garment is seated on the ground. Small, dark wooden stools or objects are visible on the grass. On the far right, a child in a light-colored garment stands, facing towards the left.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures in a boat on a body of water with misty mountains in the background
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting on a light brown or tan ground, depicting a serene landscape with human activity. The primary colors are muted, consisting of various shades of brown, gray, and black ink washes. In the lower portion of the circle, a dark, narrow boat is positioned, angled slightly from the lower left towards the center. Two figures, rendered with simple black lines, occupy the boat. The figure in the front is seated, holding a long, thin pole or spear pointed forward. The figure in the back stands, holding a similar long pole, possibly used for propulsion or steering. Subtle ripples are indicated in the water around the boat.The body of water extends across the lower third of the painting, gradually transitioning into a misty, undefined middle ground. Above this, a series of mountains rise in the background, depicted with soft, washed-out gray and black ink. The mountain forms are indistinct, blending into the light brown ground, conveying a sense of distance and atmospheric haze. The upper portion of the circle is largely empty, suggesting a vast sky or further mist.Several inscriptions and seals are visible on the painting. On the upper right, a vertical rectangular brown label with black text reads: "宋夏圭捕魚圖". On the lower left, two red square seals are stacked vertically, each containing illegible characters. On the lower right, a larger red rectangular seal is present, also with illegible characters.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　仿夏珪　捕魚圖　團扇|River Landscape with Boatmen
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: Two figures walk a path towards a building amidst towering mountains and dense foliage in a muted landscape
long_description: A circular fan painting depicts a mountainous landscape in muted tones of brown, gray, and dark green. In the lower left, two figures walk on a winding path that ascends towards the right. The leading figure, taller and dressed in light robes, holds a long staff. A smaller figure follows closely behind. To their right, a dense cluster of dark green foliage covers the lower slope. Further right, a multi-sectioned building with a dark, tiled roof is nestled among trees, its structure visible through the foliage. The building features several windows or openings along its facade. Dominating the central and right portions of the painting are two towering, steep rock formations or mountains, their peaks adorned with sparse, dark green vegetation. A faint, light-colored streak, possibly a waterfall, descends the face of the rightmost mountain. In the distant background on the left, a range of hazy, lighter-toned mountains recedes into the horizon. A subtle, pale circular shape is visible in the upper center sky. The painting is set against a light, plain background. A rectangular label with vertical characters is affixed to the upper right outside the fan painting, and several red seal marks are visible within the artwork itself on the right side.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Faded ink painting of a building with people in a landscape featuring mountains and trees.
long_description: This horizontal, monochromatic ink painting depicts a detailed landscape scene rendered in muted brown and black tones, suggesting age and the medium. On the far left, a building with a prominent peaked roof is visible. Inside the building, two small figures are seated. Below and to the left of the building, a figure is depicted in a seated or crouching position, holding a long fishing rod extending into what appears to be water. Another figure stands near the building's entrance. Moving towards the center, several other small figures are scattered across an open ground area, some appearing to be walking or engaged in activities. The background on the right side features a series of undulating mountains or hills, rendered with soft, indistinct lines. Throughout the scene, various trees and clusters of foliage are depicted, particularly around the building and in the foreground, adding texture to the landscape. The overall composition is rich with small details, despite the faded appearance of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochromatic landscape painting depicting mountains, a body of water, and scattered trees under a hazy sky
long_description: This horizontal, monochromatic landscape painting is rendered in shades of muted brown and dark gray, creating a hazy, atmospheric scene. The composition is layered, suggesting deep spatial recession. In the background, a range of distant, softly defined mountains stretches across the upper portion of the canvas, appearing lighter and almost blending into the sky. Below these, a wide, flat expanse, likely a body of water or a valley, occupies the middle ground, its surface subtly textured. On the far side of this expanse, another series of mountains rises, slightly darker and more distinct than those in the background, with small clusters of trees visible along their bases. The foreground is dominated by two large, dark, and more sharply defined mountains. One prominent peak occupies the lower left, while another, slightly smaller, is positioned in the lower right. Both foreground mountains exhibit visible brushstrokes, suggesting rocky textures. Scattered across the undulating terrain in the lower half of the painting, several groups of small, dark trees with visible trunks and sparse foliage add detail to the scene. The overall impression is one of a serene and expansive natural environment, rendered with a limited color palette that emphasizes form and atmosphere.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　米芾(僞款)　雲山圖　卷|Mountain Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A faded brown artwork shows a seated figure at a small table, with a long table and box to the left
long_description: This faded, rectangular artwork, rendered in muted brown and beige tones with dark outlines, depicts an interior scene. The overall composition is framed by an octagonal border, visible as faint lines at the top and sides. On the left side, a long, low table or bench with ornate legs extends horizontally, with a rectangular box resting on its surface. To the right, a figure, appearing to be a man with a beard, is seated on a chair at a smaller, lower table. The figure is depicted wearing robes. Further to the right, a less distinct, possibly standing figure or object is present. The background is largely indistinct due to fading, but faint suggestions of mountains or a landscape are visible in the upper right area. Faint, illegible vertical text is visible along the far right edge of the image.

metadata.title: 宋/明?　佚名　仿王齊翰　挑耳圖　卷|Library Scene
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A group of robed figures, including a child and a dog, gathered near a fence and a large tree
long_description: The monochrome ink drawing depicts a horizontal scene with multiple figures on the left and a landscape on the right. On the far left, a bearded man in a long robe kneels, holding a staff. Another robed man stands beside him, looking towards a central group. This central group consists of several robed figures, mostly men, with varying expressions and gestures. One bald man points his finger towards the left, engaging with the kneeling figure. Another man with a beard and a cap stands behind him, looking on. Further to the right within this group, a smaller figure, possibly a child, stands near a woman or another adult figure. A small dog is visible on the ground near the feet of the central figures. Behind the figures, a simple fence made of vertical stakes and horizontal ties stretches across the middle ground. Beyond the fence, a dense area of tall, thin plants or reeds extends towards the right. On the far right, a large, gnarled tree with bare branches dominates the upper portion of the scene. Its trunk is thick and twisted, with visible knots or hollows. In the lower right corner, several red seal impressions are visible, stacked vertically. The background is largely unadorned, suggesting an open sky or distant, indistinct landscape. The entire scene is rendered with fine lines and subtle ink washes, creating a sense of depth and texture.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　人物故事圖　卷|Family Visit
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A horizontal painting depicts a landscape with various birds, including cranes and a pheasant, among trees and foliage
long_description: This horizontal painting depicts a natural landscape on a light brown background. On the far left, a tall tree with green leaves stands behind a large, light brown rock. Perched on this rock is a colorful pheasant, facing right, with a blue body, red head, and long, patterned tail feathers in shades of brown and green. Smaller green plants grow around the base of the rock and tree. Moving towards the center, two large trees with slender trunks and drooping green foliage dominate the midground. Several small, dark-colored birds are perched within the branches of these trees, and a few more are depicted in flight between them. Below the central trees, two large white cranes with black wingtips and red crowns stand on a fallen, gnarled log. One crane faces left with its head slightly raised, while the other faces right. To the right of the cranes, a smaller white bird is partially visible near the base of the log. The ground throughout the central area is covered with various clumps of green grasses and small bushes. The rightmost section of the painting is more open, with fewer large elements. Scattered across the light brown ground are several large, round green lotus leaves, some with visible stems. A few small, dark birds are also visible in this area, one near the lotus leaves and another flying higher up. The overall impression is a serene, natural setting populated by various birds and lush vegetation.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　林椿(僞款)　百鳥圖　卷|The Hundred Birds
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochromatic landscape painting with towering mountains, dense trees, a waterfall, and a small figure
long_description: A tall, vertical scroll painting depicts a monochromatic landscape in dark brown, gray, and sepia tones. The upper third features towering, craggy mountains with sharp peaks and deep valleys, rendered with dark, textured brushstrokes that recede into a lighter, hazy background. Below the mountains, a dense forest of tall, slender trees with dark trunks and foliage dominates the middle ground, extending towards the foreground. Some trees have lighter, possibly autumnal, leaves, creating a subtle contrast. On the right side, a narrow waterfall cascades down the mountainside, disappearing into the dense tree line. A small, dark figure is visible near the base of the waterfall, partially obscured by the trees. In the lower right, a winding path or stream emerges from the forest, flowing towards the lower left corner. The lower left portion of the painting contains vertical lines of dark script, followed by two red square seals.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　董源(僞款)　高樹叠嶂圖　軸|Mountain Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A vertical painting depicts towering grey mountains, reddish trees, and buildings amidst swirling clouds.
long_description: This vertical painting depicts a mountainous landscape with a muted color palette of grey-blue, reddish-orange, and light brown. The composition is divided into several layers by swirling white clouds. In the upper section, towering, rugged mountains with grey-blue and brown tones dominate the background. The highest peak is on the right, with a smaller, rounded peak on the left. Several red seals and faint black text are visible in the upper corners and along the right edge. A red, circular-like seal is centered at the very top. Midway down the painting, a band of white, wispy clouds horizontally traverses the scene, separating the upper mountains from the lower landscape. Below these clouds, on the right, a cluster of trees with vibrant reddish-orange foliage grows on a rocky cliff face. Further down and to the right, a building with a dark roof and red walls is partially visible, nestled into the mountain. On the left side, another building with a dark roof and red walls sits on flatter ground near a body of water or open field. Scattered reddish-orange trees and some bare, dark-branched trees are visible in the foreground and mid-ground. The lower portion of the painting continues with rocky formations and patches of green-grey, leading to a flat, light brown area at the bottom. Visible text includes: "唐楊升白雲紅樹圖嘉慶戊申" vertically along the right edge, and "楊" vertically in the upper left.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　楊昇(僞款)　白雲紅樹圖　軸|Misty Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A fragment of an ancient painting shows a serene human head with downcast eyes, set in a rough plaster block.
long_description: The image displays a rectangular, light brown block with a central, irregularly shaped fragment of an ancient painting. The painted fragment, roughly oval, depicts a human head in profile, facing slightly to the right. The head has a light reddish-brown skin tone, with a smooth, rounded forehead and chin. The eyes are rendered with delicate white lines indicating closed or downcast eyelids. A prominent white line defines the bridge of the nose, extending upwards towards the brow. The mouth is a small, faint red line. The right ear is partially visible. Above and to the left of the head, remnants of a headdress or hair are visible, featuring dark lines and small accents of red and blue. A faint, light gray circular shape is present above the head on the right side. The background of the painted fragment is a light gray-tan. The edges of the painted fragment are rough and uneven, showing areas where the original plaster has broken away, revealing a darker, textured material beneath. The surrounding rectangular block is a uniform, lighter brown with a slightly granular texture.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: A circular painting shows a branch with green leaves and reddish-orange flowers on a brown ground
long_description: The artwork presents a circular painting centered on a rectangular, patterned background. The circular painting features a single branch with green leaves and clusters of reddish-orange flowers, set against a solid, muted brown ground. The branch originates from the lower right quadrant, extending upwards and curving towards the left. It bears several clusters of small, star-shaped flowers, predominantly in shades of reddish-orange with subtle lighter pinkish-yellow accents. The leaves are a muted green, varying in size and shape, with some appearing broad and rounded, while others are more slender. They are arranged along the branch, often overlapping. A faint red square seal is visible in the lower left quadrant of the circular painting. In the lower right, near the edge, a faint vertical inscription in dark ink is present. The rectangular background surrounding the circular painting is a light beige or cream color, adorned with a repeating, intricate pattern of swirling, abstract motifs.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A smiling figure with a large sack on their back in a sparse landscape with a bottle and bare trees
long_description: This circular painting depicts a figure in a sparse landscape, rendered on a light brown ground. The central figure, positioned slightly to the left, appears to be a person with a round, smiling face and a beard. They are shown with a large, reddish-brown sack on their back, held by a strap over their shoulder. The figure wears light-colored robes, with dark blue accents on what appear to be boots or leggings. Their posture suggests movement or a relaxed lean. The background features subtle, undulating lines indicating hills or mounds, rendered in a lighter brown wash. Scattered throughout the scene are several small, dark, bare tree branches, appearing in the foreground and middle ground, adding to the sparse environment. To the right of the central figure, a tall, slender, light-colored bottle or vase stands vertically on the ground. Adjacent to it, further right, is a dark, irregular shape, possibly a rock or a bundle, with a faint red element near its top. The overall color scheme is muted, primarily consisting of various shades of brown, gray, and light washes of red and blue. In the upper right corner, outside the circular artwork but on the surrounding paper, a vertical rectangular label contains dark, vertical characters that read: 宋都澄醉酒翁.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures, one playing a stringed instrument, sit on a large cushion surrounded by decorative vessels
long_description: This artwork depicts two figures seated on a large, light-colored cushion against a plain, light brown background. The figure on the left is smaller, with light skin and hair styled in two prominent buns. They wear a red robe with black trim over light-colored pants and dark boots. Their left hand is raised near the instrument, while their right hand rests on their lap. They are looking towards the other figure with a gentle expression. The figure on the right is larger, with darker skin and a dark, pointed hat adorned with red and green accents. They wear a light green robe with red trim over light-colored pants and dark boots. This figure holds and plays a stringed instrument with an octagonal body, which is decorated with a light brown, intricate pattern. Their face is turned towards the smaller figure, displaying a slight smile. Both figures are seated closely together, facing each other slightly, on an irregularly shaped, light gray cushion that features several darker gray circular patterns. To the lower left of the cushion, a small, dark brown, three-legged vessel with a lid is visible, alongside a smaller, light brown pitcher. To the upper right of the cushion, another three-legged vessel with a lid, light gray in color, rests on the background. The overall composition is centered, with the figures as the focal point.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A woman and a bearded man stand together, with a large vase of flowers and a small table nearby
long_description: The artwork depicts two figures and several objects on a plain, light brown background. On the left, a woman stands facing right, her left arm around the shoulder of the man beside her. She wears a red and green top with long sleeves and a pleated light green skirt. Her hair is styled in an elaborate bun adorned with green and red ornaments. Her face is light-skinned with small, delicate features. To her left and slightly behind her is a small, round, dark brown table with a red and green rim. In the center, a bearded man stands to the right of the woman, facing left. He has dark skin, a long dark beard, and a mustache. He wears a light-colored long robe, a green vest with red trim, and red sandals. A sword with a red hilt and a black tassel hangs from his waist. His right hand is placed on the woman's waist. On the right side of the image, a large, light-colored vase with intricate patterns stands on the floor. It contains several flowering plants with green stems and leaves, and flowers in shades of light purple, red, and white. At the top center of the image, a red square seal with illegible characters is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome ink wash landscape painting depicting bare trees, a hut, and boats on misty water amidst rolling hills.
long_description: A monochrome ink wash painting on a light brown-beige ground depicts an expansive, atmospheric landscape. The upper half of the image is largely open, suggesting a vast sky or dense mist, with faint, horizontal, smudged lines indicating distant clouds or landforms. In the lower left quadrant, a cluster of tall, slender trees with numerous bare branches rises prominently, their dark trunks and intricate branch patterns contrasting with the lighter background. Below these trees, darker, dense foliage and rocky forms are rendered with heavier ink. To the right of the trees, a small, simple hut with a peaked roof is visible, nestled among the terrain. Further to the right and receding into the midground, several small boats, some with arched, thatched coverings, are depicted on what appears to be a body of water or a misty plain. The landscape features gently sloping hills or mountains, rendered with light, soft ink washes, which recede into the distance, creating a sense of depth. The overall palette consists of varying shades of gray and black ink against the warm, light background. A small, red, square seal or mark is visible in the lower left corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: A monochrome painting of birds, blossoming trees, and a waterfall flowing into a turbulent river with rocks.
long_description: This monochrome painting, rendered in shades of brownish-gray, depicts a dynamic natural landscape. In the upper left, a small dark bird flies against a muted background. The central midground features a prominent, gnarled tree with numerous bare branches adorned with small, light-colored blossoms, possibly plum. A small dark bird perches on one of these branches. To the right of this tree, a rocky cliff face rises, partially obscured by bamboo-like foliage. A narrow waterfall cascades down the cliff, disappearing behind the central tree and into the water below. Another small dark bird is visible perched on a branch near the upper right cliff. The lower half of the painting is dominated by a wide, turbulent river, rendered with swirling white-capped waves and distinct ripples. Dark, irregular rock formations emerge from the flowing water in the foreground. On the far right edge, a vertical rectangular cartouche contains dark vertical text that reads: "宝惟慈姫湯瀑布".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A woman in red tends to a dark-skinned, reclining man holding a shell, on a patterned mat with a vase and teapot.
long_description:
The image depicts two figures on a patterned mat against a plain, light brown background. In the center, a dark-skinned man reclines on his left side, supported by a fair-skinned woman kneeling behind him. The man has a dark beard and mustache, and his dark hair is styled in two buns on top of his head. He wears a loose, light-colored robe that exposes his chest and right arm. His right hand holds a white, conch-like shell, while his left hand rests on a colorful, pleated fan. His bare legs are bent, with his right foot resting on the mat and his left leg extended.
The woman, with fair skin and dark hair styled in a bun, wears a red top with long sleeves and a light-colored undershirt. Her right arm is draped over the man's shoulder, and her left hand is visible near his waist.
To the right of the figures, a large, light green vase with decorative patterns sits on a red stand. It holds two long, green peacock feathers and several pieces of red coral. Next to the vase, a small, white teapot with a lid and handle rests on the mat. Further to the left, near the man's feet, a small, green pedestal bowl contains several pieces of reddish-brown food.
The mat beneath the figures and objects is light green with a repeating geometric pattern and a scalloped purple border. At the top center of the image, a square red seal contains several dark, stylized characters. The overall color palette is muted, featuring browns, reds, greens, and whites.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochromatic circular painting depicting a textured mountain or rock formation with swirling mist or water at its base.
long_description: A monochromatic circular painting, rendered in shades of brown and sepia, depicts a dynamic landscape. A large, dark, textured mass, resembling a mountain or rock formation, dominates the lower right and central portions of the composition. It extends diagonally upwards towards the upper left, its surface showing subtle variations in tone and texture. At the base of this formation, particularly in the lower right, are intricate, swirling patterns that suggest water, mist, or clouds. These patterns are lighter in tone and become more defined as they descend, creating a sense of movement. The upper left quadrant of the circle is lighter and less detailed, appearing as an expanse of sky or distant atmosphere. A faint, lighter circular shape is visible near the top center, partially obscured by the surrounding tones. The circular painting is set against a plain, light-colored background. A small, square red seal with indistinct characters is visible on this background, positioned near the right edge of the circular artwork.

metadata.title: 南宋   佚名   月下波浪圖   團扇|Waves in the moonlight
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as al album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: A lighter-skinned figure rides on the back of a darker-skinned figure, beside a fishbowl with goldfish.
long_description: A painting depicts two figures, one carrying the other, in a room with a fishbowl and a stand, all against a plain, light tan background. In the center, a darker-skinned figure, facing left, carries a lighter-skinned figure on their back. The carrying figure wears a patterned hat with red and green accents, a green and white tunic, white pants, and red and green striped leg coverings with sandals. A curved weapon with a red handle and a tassel is strapped to their back. The figure being carried wears a red top and white pants, with their arms around the neck of the carrying figure. Their hair is styled in a topknot. To the left, a large, clear, round fishbowl sits on a dark, ornate, four-legged stand. Inside the bowl, several red and white fish swim. To the right, a smaller, ornate, light-colored pedestal or stand with a fluted top is visible. A red square seal with illegible characters is present in the bottom right corner of the image.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A rat gazes at dark, textured fruits hanging from a branch on a muted gold background
long_description: A painting depicts a rat positioned in the lower left quadrant, looking towards a cluster of dark, textured fruits hanging from a branch in the lower right. The rat has dark, possibly grey-brown fur, a long, thin tail extending behind it, and small, pointed ears. Its body is slightly hunched as it appears to approach the fruit. The fruits are roundish, dark brown or black, and covered in small, raised bumps, resembling lychees or similar textured fruit. They hang in a cluster of three from a thin, gnarled branch that extends from the upper center of the composition. A few reddish-brown leaves are visible on the branch above the fruit. The background is a muted, warm gold or light brown, showing a slightly textured surface. On the far right, a vertical strip of lighter, cream-colored paper contains several lines of black vertical text and a small, circular red seal near the bottom of the strip. The overall impression is one of subtle colors and a focused natural scene.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A circular painting of a winter landscape with bare trees, houses, and distant mountains over water
long_description: A circular painting depicts a subdued winter landscape, rendered primarily in shades of brown, gray, and dark lines, set against a lighter, off-white background. The upper portion of the circle features a dark, undulating band suggesting distant mountains or hills, with a lighter, hazy area above it. In the middle ground on the left, several small, simple structures with thatched roofs are nestled among a cluster of bare, gnarled trees with intricate branches. The ground around the houses and trees is depicted with subtle variations in tone. The foreground is dominated by a body of water, possibly a river or lake, which extends across the lower half of the composition. Along the near bank of the water, scattered rocks of various sizes are visible, along with some low-lying, dark green bushes. Towards the right side of the water, a small, elongated shape suggests a boat or a figure in the distance. The overall impression is one of a quiet, desolate winter scene.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A circular painting of a muted landscape with trees, rocks, a winding river, and four birds perched or near water.
long_description: A circular painting depicts a muted landscape rendered in shades of brown and gray. In the upper right, a gnarled tree branch with clusters of leaves extends downwards and left. Two small birds, with lighter undersides and darker backs, are perched on this branch, facing left. Below the tree, a prominent rocky formation with irregular contours rises from the lower right. Delicate, sparse foliage, resembling bamboo, grows around and behind these rocks. A third bird, similar in appearance to the ones above, is perched on the top of this rocky formation, facing left. A winding river or stream flows from the distant background, through the middle ground, and into the lower left foreground. Its banks are gently sloped, with minimal vegetation. A fourth bird is positioned on the left bank of the river, near the water's edge, facing right. The background consists of a flat, expansive plain or body of water, meeting a low horizon line. The upper portion of the circle is a uniform, unadorned expanse, suggesting sky or distant mist. The entire scene is rendered with subtle variations in shade, creating depth and texture.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A muted landscape painting in an oval format, depicting figures, mountains, and bamboo trees.
long_description: An oval-shaped painting rendered in muted tones of brown, grey, and black, with subtle hints of color. The upper left portion of the image features three small, lightly rendered figures, appearing to walk on a misty, elevated plane. In the upper right, a cluster of dark bamboo trees grows on a sloping hillside, with faint, dark lines suggesting structures or fences among them. The mid-ground is dominated by a large, open expanse of muted brown, conveying a sense of mist or distance. The lower left section shows dark, jagged mountains or rocky hills rising from the bottom edge, with lighter, misty forms behind them. In the lower right, a larger figure, dressed in a reddish-brown robe, sits on the ground, facing left. A smaller figure, in lighter clothing, stands to their right, facing the seated figure. To the right of these figures, a small, dark structure or fence is visible. Sparse, dark green vegetation dots the ground in the foreground.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome landscape painting featuring steep mountains, a small hut, trees, and a body of water with distant mountains.
long_description: This monochrome landscape painting, rendered in muted brown and sepia tones, depicts a serene natural scene. On the left, a large, steep mountain or cliff face dominates the upper and mid-left portions, showing subtle textural variations that suggest rock formations. At the base of these mountains, in the mid-ground, a small, open-sided hut or pavilion with a peaked roof is nestled among sparse, dark trees with visible branches and rocky terrain. The right half of the image is occupied by a wide expanse of calm water, possibly a lake or river, which extends into the distance. Beyond the water, a large, rounded mountain range rises, its forms softened and less defined, indicating atmospheric haze and distance. The foreground features rocky ground and some sparse vegetation, leading towards the hut and the water's edge. The entire composition is framed by a decorative border with repeating patterns, enhancing the artwork's presentation.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and white pigment on silk

alt_text: A bearded man rides a horned animal, holding a gnarled branch, against a dark background
long_description: The image is a vertical painting featuring a man riding a horned animal against a dark, plain background. The central figures are rendered in muted tones of dark brown, gray, and beige, with the background a uniform, mottled dark brown. The man, positioned slightly above the center, faces forward and slightly to the right. He has a round face with a dark beard and mustache, and his hair appears pulled back. He wears dark, flowing robes, with lighter fabric visible around his waist and legs. His left arm is raised, holding a light-colored, gnarled branch that extends upwards and to the left. His right arm is bent, resting on the animal's back. The animal, resembling a goat or ram, is depicted in motion, moving towards the right side of the frame. It has two prominent, curved horns extending backward from its head. Its body is primarily dark brown and gray, with subtle lighter highlights on its back and legs, suggesting muscle definition or fur texture. Its four legs are shown in various stages of movement, with the front legs lifted and the back legs extended. The figures occupy the lower half of the painting, with a large expanse of the dark, unadorned background above them.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A circular ink painting depicts five birds on a dark rocky outcrop with hanging foliage and a light background
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting rendered in shades of brown, dark grey, and black, set against a light, patterned background. The central focus is a group of five birds perched on a dark, craggy rock formation that occupies the lower half of the circle. The birds, possibly waterfowl, are depicted with detailed feathers in varying shades of dark grey and brown. Two birds are positioned prominently on the left side of the rock, facing right. Another two are in the center, one standing and one slightly lower, appearing to peck at the rock or water. A fifth bird is on the far right, also facing left. The rocky outcrop is rendered with strong, dark brushstrokes, showing textured surfaces and crevices. Around the base of the rock, a lighter, flat area suggests water. In the upper left quadrant, a dark, vertical mass, possibly a cliff face or a distant structure, rises. From the top edge of this mass and extending towards the center, dark, leafy foliage hangs downwards. The upper right portion of the painting is a lighter, uniform brown, creating an open space above the birds and rock.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A dark ink wash painting depicts a large crab with prominent claws among slender reeds on a brown background
long_description: The artwork is an ink wash painting on a light brown ground, featuring a large crab and several long, slender reeds rendered in dark brown and black tones. The crab is positioned in the lower-left quadrant, facing towards the right. Its body is broadly rounded, with a textured shell indicated by lighter areas and darker outlines. Multiple legs extend from its body, and two prominent claws are visible at the front, one appearing larger and more defined than the other, which is partially obscured. The crab's eyes are small dark dots on stalks. Behind and above the crab, a cluster of reeds emerges from the upper-right portion of the frame, curving downwards and to the left. These reeds are depicted with long, thin strokes, some showing small, feathery seed heads or blossoms. The background is a uniform light brown, showing subtle variations in tone and texture, suggesting the material of the artwork. The overall impression is monochromatic, with the dark elements standing out against the lighter ground.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Four figures, possibly children, play a game on a circular brown ground, one blindfolded.
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting on a dark brown ground, set against a lighter, patterned background. Four figures, appearing to be children, are depicted in various poses, engaged in an activity. In the upper left, a figure stands facing right, wearing a light brown robe and red shoes, with hair tied up. To their right, another figure stands, also facing right, wearing a similar robe and blue shoes, with a red band covering their eyes like a blindfold. In the lower center, a third figure crouches or kneels, facing left, wearing a light brown robe and red shoes. Their hands are near the ground. On the far right, a fourth figure stands facing left, wearing a light brown robe and red shoes, with their hands raised towards their face, possibly covering their eyes or laughing. The figures are arranged in a dynamic composition, suggesting movement and interaction. In the upper right quadrant, dark calligraphic text is visible, with a small red seal below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A seated figure with a halo, flanked by two smaller figures, above two guardian figures and animals
long_description: The artwork is a vertical painting on a faded, brownish ground, showing significant wear and tear with areas of paint loss. At the top, a small, indistinct figure or decorative element is visible, positioned above a large, ornate canopy-like structure with flowing ribbons in muted reds and greens. Below this, a central figure is depicted seated in a meditative posture. This figure has a light-colored face, dark hair styled in a high bun, and a prominent, light-colored halo encircling its head. It wears a red upper garment over a darker, flowing robe, with long sleeves. Its hands are held together in front of its chest. Below the central figure, two larger, more robust figures are positioned. The figure on the left has a dark, bearded face with an intense expression and wears elaborate, multi-layered robes with hints of red and dark blue. To its right, a less distinct but similarly styled figure is visible, accompanied by a light-colored, lion-like animal. Both lower figures are surrounded by swirling cloud-like motifs and decorative elements in muted tones. The overall composition is vertical, with the central figure dominating the middle section, flanked by the smaller elements above and the guardian figures below.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll, fragment; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Five robed figures rest and converse in a monochrome landscape with trees and mountains
long_description: The painting is rendered in monochrome ink wash with sepia tones, depicting a landscape with figures. In the foreground, five robed figures are positioned on a relatively flat, open ground. On the far right, two figures are seated facing each other, appearing to be in conversation; one of them has a visible beard. To their left, three figures are resting or lying down. One figure is clearly asleep, with their head resting on their arm. Another figure is partially obscured but also appears to be in a reclining position. The third resting figure is positioned between the two conversing figures and the sleeping figure. Behind the figures, several large, dark tree trunks rise vertically, suggesting a dense grove. The ground around the trees is textured with small, dark dots. In the background, on the right side, a range of mountains or hills is rendered with lighter ink washes and subtle linear details, receding into the distance. On the far left, a rocky outcrop or cliff face is visible, also depicted with darker ink washes and textured lines. The overall composition creates a sense of depth, moving from the detailed figures in the foreground to the more atmospheric landscape elements in the background.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　傳王齊翰　商山四皓圖　卷|Scholars and Monkeys under Trees
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Three serpentine dragons with flowing tendrils emerge from dark, swirling clouds on a muted brown background.
long_description: The horizontal rectangular artwork features a muted, earthy color palette dominated by shades of brown and dark gray. The background is a light, warm brown, upon which darker, mottled areas form swirling cloud or smoke formations. Three serpentine creatures, resembling dragons, are depicted amidst these dark clouds. The first dragon is positioned on the far left, its head facing left, with prominent eyes and long, flowing whiskers or tendrils. Its scaled body and limbs are partially visible, emerging from the dark clouds. The second dragon is located in the upper middle section, its elongated body stretching horizontally across the canvas. Its head is less distinct, blending more into the surrounding clouds, but its scaled form and limbs are discernible. The third dragon is on the far right, its head facing right, also featuring prominent eyes and flowing tendrils. Its body extends towards the left, partially obscured by the dark cloud masses. All three creatures are rendered in a slightly lighter shade of brown or gold, creating a subtle contrast against the darker clouds and a more noticeable contrast against the lighter background. The irregular and swirling cloud formations create a dynamic and ethereal environment for the dragons.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　陳容(僞款)　九龍行雨圖　卷|Nine Dragons
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A robed, bearded figure sits under a large tree, gazing at a cloud-like vision of small figures
long_description: This monochrome ink drawing depicts a landscape scene with a central figure and a visionary element. On the left, a large, gnarled tree with multiple thick trunks and dense, leafy foliage dominates the foreground. A robed, bearded figure sits beneath the tree, facing towards the right, with their left arm extended and holding a long, thin object, possibly a staff or brush. The ground beneath the tree and figure is textured with small, dark stippling, suggesting grass. Behind the main figure and tree, a smaller, less detailed tree is visible. Extending from the figure's eye level towards the right is a long, undulating, cloud-like band. Within this band, numerous small, indistinct figures are depicted. These figures are arranged in various groups and individual poses, some appearing to walk in procession, others standing or interacting. The background behind this visionary band features gentle, rolling hills. Along the far right edge of the artwork, a vertical column of several rectangular and square seals or stamps is visible. Some of these seals are rendered in red ink, while others are in black ink, all containing stylized calligraphic characters. A larger, rectangular seal is also present in the lower left corner of the composition.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Several goats, some standing and some resting, are depicted among sparse bamboo on a light brown background
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting depicts a group of goats and bamboo on a light brown, aged background. The composition is spread across the lower half of the image, with the upper portion remaining largely blank. On the far left, three goats are clustered together. Two stand upright, facing towards the right, with their heads slightly raised and horns visible. A third, smaller goat is positioned slightly below and to the right of them, also facing right. Their bodies are rendered with light, pale washes, while their horns, hooves, and facial features are outlined with darker, fine ink lines. Moving towards the center, two goats are depicted resting on the ground, facing right. They are partially obscured by clumps of dark green bamboo shoots and leaves that rise from the bottom edge of the frame. Below these two, a smaller, recumbent goat is visible. Further to the right, another goat stands, facing left, with its head turned slightly towards the viewer. Its body is partially hidden by more dense bamboo foliage. Next to it, a final goat lies on the ground, facing right. The bamboo is rendered with energetic, dark ink strokes, creating a contrast with the lighter tones of the goats. The ground is subtly indicated by light washes and the placement of the bamboo.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting depicting mountains, gnarled pine trees, and two figures on horseback in the foreground
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting on a light brown, aged surface depicts a mountainous landscape with prominent pine trees and small figures. The upper half of the painting features a range of mountains rendered in light, hazy ink washes, suggesting distance and atmospheric perspective. A faint, multi-tiered structure, possibly a building or temple, is visible among the distant mountains in the upper-middle. The midground and foreground are dominated by several large pine trees with dark, gnarled trunks and dense clusters of needles. Their branches extend horizontally, some reaching towards the right side of the composition. Rocks and smaller vegetation are visible at the bases of these trees. In the lower right quadrant, two small figures on horseback travel along a path. The leading figure is slightly larger than the one following. The entire scene is rendered in varying shades of black and gray ink on the warm, light brown background. The far right edge of the artwork features a vertical strip of light gold-colored material with faint, intricate decorative patterns. Below this patterned strip, two small red seals are visible, one above the other.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　李遠(僞款)　仿夏珪江山清遠圖　卷|Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Portrait of a man with a beard and a dark hat, alongside calligraphic text on a scroll
long_description: The image displays a horizontal scroll, divided into several vertical sections. The left two-thirds of the scroll are filled with columns of vertical calligraphic text in black ink, written on a light brown, aged paper. The text varies in density and style, with some characters appearing larger or more fluid than others. Several small, square red seals are visible within the text, indicating annotations or ownership marks. To the right of the text, a lighter, textured vertical strip separates the calligraphic section from a painted portrait. The rightmost section features a portrait of a man, depicted from the chest up, against a plain light brown background. The man has light skin, a long, dark, pointed beard, and a mustache. He wears a dark, rounded hat that covers his ears and a dark, high-collared robe with a reddish-brown garment visible underneath. His eyes are dark, and he looks slightly to the right, with a neutral expression. Another narrow, lighter vertical strip is visible to the far right of the portrait, suggesting the edge of the scroll.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　摹王旦、王素、王禹偁小像圖　卷|Three Bust Portraits of Tang and Song Officials
metadata.medium: Handscroll; (1) ink and color on paper; (2,3) ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two light-colored butterflies hover above a horizontal arrangement of various fruits, flowers, and leaves on a brown background
long_description:
The artwork features a horizontal arrangement of botanical elements and two butterflies on a plain, muted brown background. The background is uniform in color and appears slightly textured.
