In the upper left quadrant, two light-colored butterflies with patterned wings are depicted, positioned slightly above and to the left of the main botanical cluster. They face towards the right.

The botanical arrangement occupies the lower half of the image, extending from the left edge almost to the right. It consists of a variety of leaves, flowers, and fruits. On the far left, there are large, dark green leaves and some reddish-pink flowers, along with small, round, light brown fruits. Moving towards the center, several yellow flowers with visible stamens are interspersed among green stems and more leaves. Some elongated, light green pods or leaves are also visible in this section.

Further to the right, a vine with dark green, serrated leaves and clusters of small, dark purple berries extends upwards. To the right of this vine, a single, light-colored, peach-like fruit with a reddish blush is depicted, complete with a small green stem and leaves. The overall color palette of the botanical elements is muted, featuring shades of green, yellow, reddish-pink, purple, and light brown, contrasting gently with the darker brown background.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　傳錢選　花果草蟲圖　卷|Flowers and Insects
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Portrait of a bearded man in a dark hat and red collar, holding a tablet, with vertical text on the right
long_description: The artwork is divided vertically into two main sections. The left section features a portrait of a man, depicted from the chest up, against a plain, light brown background. The man wears a dark, possibly black, hat with two long, thin, dark ribbons extending downwards behind his ears. He has a full, dark beard and mustache. His face shows light skin with reddish cheeks and lips, and his eyes are narrow and dark. He wears a dark, possibly gray or brown, outer garment with a bright red collar visible around his neck. In front of him, he holds a tall, narrow, light-colored rectangular object vertically, its top reaching above his shoulder. The man's gaze is directed slightly to the left. The right section of the artwork has a lighter, off-white background and is filled with multiple columns of vertical black text. Several small, square or rectangular red seals are stamped intermittently within the columns of text.

metadata.title: 明   佚名（仿）吳育   新安汪氏譜牒   卷|Portrait of a Member and Record of the Wang Family
metadata.medium: Handscroll; calligraphy, ink on paper; portrait, ink and color on paper

alt_text: A man in a robe leads a dark horse with a red bridle, surrounded by calligraphic text and red seals
long_description: A horizontal artwork on a light brown background features a man leading a horse, accompanied by extensive calligraphic text and red seals. On the right, a man with light skin, a dark beard, and dark hair stands facing left. He wears a long, light red robe with dark fur trim around the collar, cuffs, and hem, and dark boots. His left hand is raised, while his right hand holds a thin red rope. The rope extends to the left, connecting to the bridle of a large horse. The horse, positioned on the left side of the composition, is predominantly dark gray or black, with lighter gray and white markings on its face, lower legs, and belly. It wears a red bridle with a circular red decorative element on its cheek. The horse is depicted in motion, with its front left leg lifted. Numerous columns of black calligraphic text are present across the top and right portions of the background. Several red square and circular seals are stamped throughout the light brown surface, particularly in the area surrounding the man and in the upper right corner.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　舊傳韓幹　圉人呈馬圖　卷|Horse and groom
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A light gray dragon with green accents flies amidst colorful clouds, reaching for a blue flaming pearl.
long_description: The horizontal image features a large, light gray dragon with green accents against a plain orange background. The dragon occupies the central space, extending from the left-center towards the right. Its body is long and serpentine, covered in small, overlapping scales that are rendered in shades of light gray and white, creating a textured appearance. The dragon has four limbs, each ending in three-clawed feet, which are also light gray with green tips. Its head, facing towards the upper left, is detailed with two small horns, a snout, and whiskers. A mane of green hair flows from its neck. Its tail, visible on the right, is long and ends in a green, leaf-like tuft. Above and to the left of the dragon's head, a circular object, often referred to as a flaming pearl, is depicted. It is primarily blue with a lighter blue center and small white dots, surrounded by wavy red lines suggesting flames or energy. Scattered across the orange background are numerous stylized clouds of varying sizes. These clouds are rendered in soft, muted colors including light green, pink, purple, and light blue, often with outlines or internal details in darker shades of the same colors. They are depicted with swirling, organic shapes, some appearing as single puffs and others as elongated, undulating forms. More clouds are concentrated around the dragon, particularly in the upper right and lower left corners, and along the top and bottom edges of the image. The overall composition suggests movement and a celestial setting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large white elephant with several human figures, some holding staffs, on a light brown background
long_description: A horizontal painting on a light brown background depicts a large, pale-colored elephant facing right, occupying the central and left portions of the composition. The elephant has visible tusks, a trunk, and small eyes, with a red, rectangular cloth draped over its back. To the left of the elephant, a bearded figure in light blue and white robes is partially visible. Next to him, a bald figure in a long red robe holds a tall staff with a golden, trident-like finial, looking towards the right. To the right of the elephant's head, two figures appear to guide it; one has a dark beard and holds a long red pole touching the elephant's head. Further right, a taller figure with a white beard and hair, dressed in light green and white robes, holds a long dark staff. This figure stands near a small, dark brown pot and a round, woven basket or bowl on the ground. The far right edge of the painting features a vertical column of dark calligraphic text, below which are several red seal impressions. The overall color palette is muted, dominated by light browns, whites, and pale greens, with accents of red.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　錢選(僞款)　洗象圖　卷|Washing the Sacred Elephant
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two horses, one light-colored and one dark-colored, stand facing forward in an ink painting with text and seals
long_description: The artwork depicts two horses rendered in ink on a light brown, aged ground. The horses stand side-by-side, facing forward, with their bodies slightly angled. The horse on the left is a lighter, pale tan color, positioned slightly behind and to the left of the other horse. Its head is turned slightly towards the viewer, and its mane is dark and flows down its neck. The horse on the right is a darker, grayish-blue hue, more prominently featured in the foreground. Its head is also turned slightly towards the viewer, and it possesses a long, elaborate mane and tail, both depicted with intricate, swirling patterns. Both horses have large, dark eyes with visible white sclera. The background is a plain, unadorned light brown. In the upper left corner, there are two vertical lines of black text. In the upper right corner, there are several red square and circular seals of varying sizes, along with a few more lines of black text.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　傳史道碩　八駿圖　卷|Eight Horses
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A hen, rooster, and five chicks forage among sparse plants on a brown ground.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal painting depicting a family of chickens and chicks in a sparse landscape against a warm brown background. On the left, a white hen with light gray wing details is shown with her head lowered, appearing to peck at the ground. Three small, light yellow chicks are clustered near her, also looking downwards. To the left of the hen, a few dark green plants with small purple flowers are visible, along with some dry, twig-like vegetation. In the center-right, a reddish-brown rooster stands tall, facing right with its head tilted upwards and beak open, as if crowing. Its comb and wattles are a lighter red, and its long, dark tail feathers curve upwards and to the left. Various dark green and brown plants, including some tall grasses, are scattered around the rooster and behind the chicks. Further to the right, two more light yellow chicks stand upright, facing left. The ground is a uniform light brown, with subtle variations in tone. The overall impression is of a natural scene with domestic fowl.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A light-colored goat walks left on a sparse landscape with trees and two birds flying above
long_description: A horizontal painting features a sparse landscape rendered in muted tones on a light brown background. In the lower left, a light-colored, four-legged animal, resembling a goat or sheep, is depicted in motion. Its body is almost white, with subtle shading, and it faces towards the right, appearing to step forward with its head slightly lowered. Above and to the left of the animal, a large tree branch with dark, sparse foliage extends downwards and across the upper left corner. Across the lower half of the image, several thin, gnarled branches and patches of dark, brush-like vegetation suggest uneven ground. In the upper middle section of the painting, two small, dark birds are shown in flight, one slightly ahead of the other. The background is a uniform, light brown, creating an open, unarticulated space.

metadata.title: 清 佚名 群羊圖卷絹本設色|Landscape with goats
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Nine dark and white birds perch on snow-dusted, flowering tree branches against a muted background.
long_description: The vertical artwork depicts a winter scene with nine birds perched on gnarled, flowering tree branches against a muted, brownish-gray background. The branches, dark in color, are covered with numerous small white dots and patches, suggesting snow or frost. They extend diagonally across the composition, with a thick cluster of branches in the lower-left and a more sparse arrangement towards the top and right. The birds, predominantly dark-feathered, feature distinct white markings on their heads, chests, and sometimes their wings. They are arranged in various poses: two birds are in the upper left, one looking left and the other looking down into the branch. A cluster of six birds occupies the central-left area, huddled together on a thick branch. One bird on the far right sits alone, looking upwards. Small, light-colored, five-petaled flowers are scattered along the branches, some appearing as delicate blossoms, while larger, more open flowers with visible stamens are present on the lower branches. The background is a uniform, textured brownish-gray, providing a stark contrast to the detailed foreground elements.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three figures and three animals, including two riders on an ox and a donkey, in a procession across a light brown background
long_description: The image is a horizontal painting on a light brown, aged background, depicting three figures and three animals in a procession, moving from left to right. On the far left, a young figure with light skin and dark hair is partially visible behind a large ox. This figure wears a light-colored, draped garment, exposing the right shoulder and arm, and holds a light-colored object in their raised right hand and a thin stick vertically in their left. In front of this figure, a large, dark brown ox with prominent horns and a detailed, stylized head faces right, its body robust and legs in motion. Riding on the ox's back is a second figure, also facing right, with light skin and dark hair covered by a dark, tall hat. This rider wears a long, pale green robe with wide sleeves, and a lighter-colored sash is visible. Their right hand holds a thin stick extending towards the ox's head. To the right of the ox and its rider, a smaller, dark brown donkey walks towards the right, featuring short ears and a slender body. Walking behind the donkey is the third figure, a man with light skin, a dark beard, and a dark, tall hat. He wears a long, loose-fitting, pale orange or light brown robe. He holds a long, thin stick vertically in his right hand. Over his left shoulder, a pole extends horizontally, from which two objects hang: a dark, rounded flask on the right and a lighter-colored, bucket-like container on the left. The figures and animals are rendered with outlines and washes of color, appearing somewhat faded against the plain background.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　趙孟頫(僞款)　西成歸樂圖　卷|Happy Return from the West
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of bamboo stalks and leaves against a light brown background
long_description: A horizontal ink painting depicts several bamboo stalks and numerous leaves against a uniform light brown background. The artwork is rendered in varying shades of dark gray and black ink, creating a monochromatic scene. Multiple bamboo stalks, varying in thickness, traverse the composition diagonally. A prominent, thicker stalk originates from the lower left, extending upwards and to the right, disappearing off the top edge of the frame. Another thick stalk enters from the lower right, also moving diagonally upwards and to the left. These main stalks exhibit visible nodes, indicating segments. Thinner branches extend from these primary stalks, curving and intertwining across the mid-ground. Clusters of elongated, pointed bamboo leaves are densely arranged along the branches. The leaves are depicted with a range of ink tones, from solid black to lighter gray, suggesting depth and texture. They are concentrated in the central and upper right portions of the image, with sparser groupings in the lower left. The overall arrangement of stalks and leaves fills the majority of the frame, with the light brown background visible as open space between the botanical elements, particularly in the upper left and lower right corners. The brushwork appears fluid and expressive.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　吳鎮(僞款)　 枯木竹石圖　卷|Bamboos
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A painting depicting a group of figures gathered under a large building with a red roof, surrounded by trees
long_description: This horizontal painting features a muted color palette dominated by browns, greens, and reds, with some lighter accents. The scene is set outdoors, with architectural elements and trees. On the left side, several tall, slender trees with dark trunks and green foliage stand in front of buildings with red-tiled roofs and light-colored walls. The ground in the foreground is a dark, textured brown. Towards the right, a prominent building with a large, red-tiled roof extends across the upper portion of the canvas. Beneath this structure, a group of approximately eight figures is gathered. Most appear to be women, dressed in long, light-colored robes with some red accents. Some figures are standing, while others are kneeling or seated on the ground. One figure on the far left of this group seems to be interacting with an object on the ground. Further to the left and slightly in front of the main group, another lone figure is visible near a white, L-shaped structure. The overall impression is of an aged artwork with a detailed depiction of a social gathering within a structured environment.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　傳蕭照　中興瑞應第七圖　卷|Pavilion with Figures
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Faded drawing of two figures under gnarled trees on a light brown ground
long_description: The image is a faded, horizontal drawing on a light brown, aged ground. The artwork depicts two figures positioned towards the right side, beneath a canopy of trees. The figure on the left appears to be seated, facing right, with an elaborate hairstyle featuring dark, possibly black, coiled elements on top of the head. This figure wears flowing robes, with faint traces of red and blue pigment visible in the drapery. The right figure stands slightly behind and to the right of the first, facing forward or slightly left. This figure also wears long, flowing garments and has a simpler, possibly pulled-back hairstyle. Both figures are rendered with delicate, dark lines, and their faces are softly outlined. To the left of the figures, a large, gnarled tree trunk with multiple branches extends upwards and across the upper left quadrant of the image. Its branches are depicted with dark, thin lines, and some faint, dark foliage is visible in the upper left and upper center. More sparse foliage is suggested along the top edge of the image, extending towards the right. The ground beneath the figures and trees is indicated by faint, horizontal and diagonal lines suggesting grass or uneven terrain. The overall impression is of an ancient, somewhat monochromatic scene, with the details of the figures and landscape rendered primarily through line work and minimal, faded color.

metadata.title: 元？　佚名　仿李公麟　屈原九歌圖　卷|The Nine Songs: Illustrations to the poems of Qu Yuan (343–277 B.C.)
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two robed figures with distinct hats and calligraphic text on an aged scroll
long_description:
The image displays a section of an aged, light brown scroll or painting, featuring two robed figures and multiple columns of black calligraphic text. The background is a warm, muted brown with visible texture and slight discoloration, suggesting age. On the far left, several vertical columns of black calligraphic text are visible, written in a flowing, somewhat cursive style. To the right of this text, two figures are depicted, facing slightly towards the viewer.

The figure on the left wears a dark, possibly black, cap that covers the top of his head and extends down behind his ears. He has a light-skinned face with dark eyes and a short, dark beard. His attire consists of a red robe, cinched at the waist with a white and gold belt-like sash. Above this figure, a vertical column of black text reads: "唐京兆尹 冒中素公像".

The figure on the right appears older, with a light-skinned face, a short, dark beard, and a mustache. He wears a distinctive black hat with two flat, horizontal extensions protruding from the sides. His red robe is secured with a green and gold belt-like sash. He holds a light-colored, staff-like object vertically in his right hand, resting it against his shoulder. Above this figure, two vertical columns of black text read: "西漢直指使者 冒勝之公小景 傳事具漢書不疑". The figures and text are rendered with clear outlines and muted colors against the brown background.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　冒氏先人小像二幅　卷|Two Ancestors of the Mao Family
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A dark, grayscale landscape painting with a gnarled tree trunk, distant mountains, and a multi-tiered pagoda
long_description: This grayscale landscape painting depicts a dark, textured scene with a prominent gnarled tree in the foreground. The tree's thick, twisted trunk, broken at the top, dominates the lower center, with sparse, delicate branches extending outwards. Light-toned vegetation grows in small patches on the tree and across the uneven, rocky ground. In the midground, more trees with fine, bare-looking branches recede into the distance, suggesting a dense, dark forest. The background features large, undulating mountains or hills, with a multi-tiered pagoda-like structure visible on the far right, nestled among the distant terrain. The sky above is a deep, dark tone, subtly textured with scattered light speckles, suggesting a night sky or a heavily overcast atmosphere. The overall palette is composed of dark grays, blacks, and subtle lighter tones for highlights and vegetation.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A standing figure with a halo, crown, and flowing garments, on a lotus, with a dragon and canopy
long_description: A vertical artwork on light brown, creased paper depicts a central standing figure. Above the figure, a green and red canopy with decorative elements hangs. The central figure stands facing forward, with light skin, a red halo behind its head, and a crown. It has a bare chest adorned with a necklace, and a green and blue skirt-like garment. Blue and red sashes or ribbons flow around its body. Its right arm is bent, holding a small object, and its left arm is bent, with the hand near its chest. The figure stands on a purple and green lotus pedestal. A blue and red dragon coils around the figure's lower legs and the base of the pedestal. Vertical text is visible on the left side of the paper, reading: "咸亨元年比丘法慧 敬畫供養". The dominant colors are light brown (paper), green, blue, red, purple, and yellow. The paper shows signs of age, including creases, tears, and discoloration.

metadata.title: 唐　法慧等　菩薩像二幅|Two Buddhist Paintings
metadata.medium: Single leaf and single accordian-fold manuscript; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A landscape painting depicts a boat on water near a tree-covered bank, with distant mountains.
long_description: This landscape painting, rendered in muted tones of brown, gray, and black, depicts a serene waterscape with natural elements. A steep, dark bank or cliff occupies the left side of the composition, extending from the top edge to the bottom. From this bank, a gnarled tree with a thick, twisted trunk and numerous delicate branches extends horizontally over the water. The tree's sparse foliage is depicted with fine, dark brushstrokes. The central and lower portions of the image are dominated by a wide expanse of water, rendered in lighter, hazy tones. A small, dark boat with a single figure is positioned slightly to the right of the center on the water. The figure appears to be operating the boat with a long pole or oar, and a small, dark bundle rests within the vessel. In the far distance, on the right side, a cluster of tall, jagged mountains rises from the water, depicted in darker, misty gray tones, suggesting atmospheric perspective. A smaller, dark landmass is visible closer to the foreground on the right, near the water's edge. Two red seals are visible: one in the lower left corner on the bank, and another square seal in the lower right corner, partially off the image frame.

metadata.title: 明   佚名  煙雨橫舟圖   冊頁|Rainy Landscape
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures by a waterfall under pine trees in a circular landscape painting
long_description: A circular ink wash painting on a muted brown ground depicts a mountainous landscape with two figures. The upper portion of the circle is largely empty, a light brown expanse. From the upper right, a large, gnarled pine tree branch extends horizontally towards the center, its dark needles rendered with fine brushstrokes. Below and to the right, a steep, dark mountain or cliff face is covered with dense foliage, including more pine-like trees and broad-leafed trees resembling maples. A waterfall cascades down this right side, its frothy water depicted with light, swirling lines. At the lower left, two small figures are seated on rocky terrain near the base of the waterfall. One figure, dressed in light robes, faces right and appears to be gesturing towards the waterfall or the other figure. The second figure, also in light robes, is seated facing left, looking away. The foreground features dark, jagged rocks and turbulent water at the base of the waterfall. A small red seal mark is visible on the far right edge of the circular composition.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome painting shows a person fishing from a small boat near a tree-lined bank, with birds flying
long_description: The artwork is a fan-shaped painting, rendered in a limited palette of dark brown and black tones, set against a lighter, off-white rectangular background. The central scene depicts a tranquil waterscape. In the lower left quadrant, a dark, rocky bank emerges from the water, covered with sparse, dark foliage and tall grasses. A large, gnarled tree with delicate, drooping branches extends from the upper left, its dark silhouette contrasting with the slightly lighter background of the water.A small, narrow boat, outlined in dark lines, floats on the water slightly right of the bank. Inside the boat, a lone figure, also depicted with dark lines, sits facing right, holding a fishing rod that extends into the water. The figure wears a simple garment and a hat. The water surface is mostly calm, with subtle variations in tone. In the upper right portion of the painting, three small, dark, bird-like shapes are visible, flying in formation. The overall impression is one of quiet solitude. To the far right, outside the fan-shaped painting on the lighter background, a vertical column of dark text is present, accompanied by a small red rectangular seal below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: An ancient painting depicts a standing horse, a kneeling camel, and a person in elaborate attire
long_description: The artwork is a painting on a rectangular, muted brownish-gold surface. Three main figures are depicted: a horse, a camel, and a person. The horse stands on the left side of the composition, facing right. It is dark brown with a decorated saddle and bridle, featuring red and white accents. The camel is positioned in the lower center, kneeling or resting on the ground, facing towards the left. It is a lighter brown color, adorned with green and red decorative elements on its head and back. Between the horse and the camel, slightly to the right of the center, stands a person. This individual wears elaborate clothing, including a patterned tunic or robe with vertical stripes and circular motifs, and a red outer garment. A weapon, possibly a sword or bow, is strapped to their back, with red quivers visible. The person's face is visible, looking towards the left. The overall color palette is subdued, dominated by browns, muted reds, and greens, contributing to an aged appearance. In the upper right corner, a vertical strip of paper is affixed, containing black calligraphic text and a red square seal. The text reads: "馬圖 李龍眠筆".

metadata.title: 元？　佚名　仿李公麟　人馬駱駝圖　冊頁|Mongol with Horse and Camel
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two small birds with pink chests perch on a thin vine with green leaves against a muted background, with red seals
long_description: The artwork is a square painting depicting two small birds amidst green foliage on a muted, brownish-tan background. The surface has a visible texture, possibly of silk or aged paper.Two small, plump birds are the central focus, positioned slightly above the horizontal midline and towards the center of the composition. They face each other, with their heads angled downwards. The bird on the left is slightly higher than the one on the right. Both birds have light blue-grey heads, dark eyes, and prominent pinkish-red chests that fade into lighter undersides. Their wings are a darker blue-grey, and their short tails are dark. They appear to be perched on a thin, dark, vine-like stem that extends between them and branches out.Several green, ivy-like leaves are scattered around the birds. Two larger, three-lobed leaves are visible in the upper left corner, connected by a faint stem. Smaller leaves are near the birds and in the lower right corner. The leaves are a muted, desaturated green.The background is a uniform, textured brownish-tan. In the upper right corner, a red, stylized seal or stamp is visible, resembling a floral or calligraphic design. In the lower left corner, a rectangular red seal contains several vertical lines of indistinct characters or text.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A robed figure walks through a mountainous landscape with a large gnarled tree and water
long_description: The circular artwork, rendered in a monochromatic ink wash style, depicts a solitary figure traversing a mountainous landscape. The dominant color palette consists of shades of brown, dark grey, and black. On the left side, a large, gnarled tree with dense, dark foliage extends from a steep, rocky cliff face, its branches reaching towards the center. Below the tree, a small, robed figure, facing right, walks along a winding path or ridge, holding a slender staff. The figure's robe is light-colored, contrasting slightly with the darker ground. To the right of the figure, the landscape unfolds into rolling hills and lower rock formations, depicted with lighter ink washes. In the lower right quadrant, a body of water or mist is suggested by a series of wavy lines and textured patterns. The upper right portion of the circle is largely open, with a lighter wash, suggesting sky or distant space. The overall composition emphasizes the vastness of the natural environment compared to the human presence.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: An old man with a long beard uses a long pole with a string to interact with a small insect
long_description: A horizontal artwork depicts an elderly man with a long, white beard and mustache, positioned in the right half of the frame. He wears a dark, loose-fitting robe with wide sleeves and a dark, soft cap. The man is bent forward, looking downwards, and holds a long, segmented pole, resembling bamboo, horizontally across his body. A thin, light-colored line, appearing to be a string, hangs from the end of the pole, curving downwards towards the lower left. At the end of this string, on the lower left side of the composition, is a small, dark-bodied insect with reddish-brown markings on its back and multiple legs. The background is a uniform, light brown or tan color, appearing textured. In the upper right corner, there is a vertical column of faint, dark script, followed by a small, reddish, square-shaped mark below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large, light-colored flower with green leaves on a brown background, with vertical text.
long_description: The image presents a large, light-colored flower with prominent green leaves set against a warm brown background. The central flower, rendered in an off-white or pale cream hue, occupies a significant portion of the canvas. Its numerous petals are defined by visible dark outlines, creating a layered and full appearance with internal details suggesting texture and form. Surrounding the flower are several large, broad leaves, painted in varying shades of muted green. These leaves are positioned behind and beneath the flower, creating a sense of depth and framing the central bloom. One large leaf is visible to the left, another behind the top of the flower, and several stems or narrower leaves extend upwards from the bottom. The background is a solid, earthy brown, providing a stark contrast to the lighter flower and green foliage. In the upper right corner, a vertical rectangular strip of lighter brown paper contains vertical black text that reads "宋黃荃荷花". Above this text strip, a small, square red seal is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A figure in a straw hat and cloak with a fishing net under a large tree in a muted landscape
long_description: A muted, rounded painting depicts a figure in a landscape dominated by a large tree on the left. The figure, positioned in the lower-left quadrant, wears a wide-brimmed straw hat and a textured, light-brown straw cloak. They appear to be seated or crouched near the base of a gnarled, dark-brown tree trunk with numerous bare, intricate branches extending upwards and across the upper-left. Below the tree and around the figure, dark-green leafy plants, possibly bamboo, and small clusters of dark, berry-like shapes are visible on the rocky, uneven ground. A large, dark-brown fishing net with visible mesh is draped over a pole or branch, extending diagonally from behind the figure towards the upper-middle right. The background on the right side of the painting features faint, undulating hills or landmasses rendered in lighter brown and gray tones. A small, dark bird or bat flies in the upper-right sky. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of brown, gray, and dark green, giving the scene a subdued appearance. A small red seal mark is present on the far right edge.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A central bearded figure in a dark hat and robe is flanked by two smaller figures in tall hats
long_description: A vertical painting on a faded brown background depicts three standing figures. The central figure, positioned slightly to the right of the vertical center, is the largest. He has a dark complexion, a full black beard, and a mustache. He wears a distinctive black hat with a flat, rectangular top and two extensions on the sides. His outer garment is a dark, possibly black or dark brown, robe with a large white circular motif on his left shoulder. Underneath, he wears lighter-colored garments, possibly light gray or off-white, with a dark belt or sash. A red and black strap or ribbon hangs from his right side. His hands are mostly obscured by his wide sleeves. To the central figure's left, standing slightly behind him, is a smaller figure. This figure wears a tall, dark, conical hat and a reddish-brown robe. His face is lighter in complexion, with a small dark mustache. His hands are clasped or held within his sleeves. To the central figure's right, also slightly behind him and smaller, is another figure. This figure wears a similar tall, dark, conical hat and a reddish-brown robe. Like the left figure, he has a lighter complexion and a small dark mustache. His hands are also mostly obscured. The background is a plain, muted brown, showing signs of age with visible cracks and areas where the paint has flaked away, particularly around the figures' lower bodies and the central figure's robe.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures, one taller and one shorter, stand facing away on a dark, textured background
long_description: The artwork depicts two figures, one taller and one shorter, standing against a dark, textured background. The overall shape of the piece is a rounded rectangle. The background is a deep, muted brown with visible vertical striations, suggesting a wood-like surface. The taller figure is positioned slightly to the left of the center, seen from the back or a slight angle. She wears a long, light-colored outer garment, possibly off-white or pale beige, over a red undergarment or sleeve that is visible on her left arm and shoulder. Her hair is dark and styled into a bun at the back of her head. Her left arm is bent, and she appears to be holding an indistinct object near her waist. To the right and slightly in front of the taller figure is a shorter figure, also seen from the back. This figure wears a light green or olive-colored garment, with a soft pink sash or undergarment visible around her waist. Her dark hair is styled similarly to the taller figure's. She holds a small, round, light-colored object, possibly a fan, with a dark stick-like handle extending from it, near her right side. The figures are rendered with soft lines and muted colors, blending into the dark background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two small brown birds perch among thin green stalks and seed clusters on a circular brown background
long_description: The artwork is a circular painting on a muted brown background, depicting two small birds among plant stalks. The overall color palette is subdued, featuring shades of brown, dark green, and hints of reddish-brown on the birds. In the lower left quadrant, a small, plump bird with a reddish-brown head and chest, and darker brown wings and tail, perches on several thin, dark green plant stalks. Its body is oriented horizontally, facing towards the right, with its beak slightly open. Below and to the left of this bird, a small cluster of light brown, textured seeds or flowers is visible. In the upper right quadrant, a second bird, similar in size and coloration, is depicted. This bird is oriented diagonally, facing downwards and to the left, with its head lowered towards a prominent, elongated cluster of light brown, textured seeds or flowers. Its wings are dark brown, and its underside appears lighter. It also perches on thin, dark green plant stalks that curve upwards and across the circular frame. Several other thin, dark green plant stalks are scattered across the brown background, curving gently. The background itself is a uniform, light brown or tan color, with some faint horizontal lines or creases visible, suggesting the texture of the material. A small, rectangular red seal mark is visible in the lower left portion of the circle, near the first bird. Another very faint, smaller red mark is in the upper right.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　李安忠(僞款)　 高粱雙雀圖　團扇|Sparrows and Millet
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome ink painting depicts two birds perched on flowering branches against a plain background with red seals.
long_description: The image is a monochrome ink painting on a light brown, aged paper, depicting two birds perched on flowering branches. The overall tone is muted, with shades of grey and black ink against the warm brown background. On the left side, a bird is depicted facing downwards and slightly to the right, its head angled towards a branch. Its body is mostly grey with darker markings on its wings and tail feathers, and a lighter underside. A distinct dark patch is visible around its eye, and its beak is pointed. Its long tail extends upwards and to the left. It grips a thin branch with its claws. Towards the center-right, a second bird is perched upright, facing left with its head slightly turned and its beak open, as if singing or calling. This bird also has a grey body with darker wings and tail, and a lighter chest. A dark band runs from its eye towards the back of its head. It is larger than the left bird and sits on a thicker branch that extends horizontally across the middle of the composition. The branches are sparsely leaved, with small, delicate blossoms appearing in clusters. The leaves are simple, oval shapes, and the flowers have five petals, depicted with light ink washes. The branches weave through the central area of the painting, providing perches for both birds. The background is plain and unadorned, allowing the birds and branches to stand out. There are several red seals stamped on the paper. Two square seals are in the upper left corner, one above the other. The top seal is rectangular with rounded corners, containing illegible characters. The bottom seal is square, also with illegible characters. In the upper right corner, there is a single square red seal, and in the lower right corner, two more square red seals are stacked vertically. The characters within these seals are also not clearly discernible.

metadata.title: 宋？　佚名　傳宋徽宗　白頭海棠圖　卷|Chinese Bulbuls on Flowering Cherry-Apple
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A painting shows several figures, including men and women, dynamically riding horses across a plain background.
long_description: This horizontal painting depicts a dynamic scene of multiple figures riding horses against a plain, light brown background. The artwork has a muted color palette, primarily featuring shades of brown, ochre, cream, and subtle accents of red and green. On the far left, a brown horse gallops to the right, adorned with a round, light green saddle pad and red straps. Two figures are on this horse: a woman with dark hair pulled up, wearing a light blue and cream robe, is seated towards the front, looking right. Behind her, a man in a cream-colored tunic stands upright on the horse's back, leaning forward with his arms extended. To the right of this pair, a gap in the composition suggests distance. Further right, two more horses gallop. The front horse is brown with white markings and red accents, carrying a man who is leaning far forward, almost parallel to the horse's back, wearing a cream tunic and a red sash. He has a dark beard and a cap. Behind him, partially obscured, another horse is ridden by a woman in a red and cream outfit, who is seated and appears to be looking back or gesturing. All figures and horses are rendered with a sense of rapid motion, their forms elongated and flowing.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　趙雍(僞款)　馬術圖　卷|Horsemanship demonstration
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A man and woman embrace, with a potted plant, a jar, and two dogs on a light brown background.
long_description: The artwork depicts two figures, a man and a woman, in the center of a light brown, aged background. The man is on the left, facing right, with his right arm around the woman's shoulders. He wears a dark, flat-topped hat and a long, pale purple robe with a lighter collar. His left hand is held near his waist. The woman is on the right, leaning slightly into the man, with her head tilted down. She wears a green robe with red and black trim on the sleeves and collar, and a long, patterned skirt in shades of red and green. Her hair is styled in a tall, pointed bun. Her right arm is around the man's back, and her left hand extends forward, holding a small, white, string-like object. To the upper right, a small, gnarled tree with green leaves and red berries is planted in a light brown pot. The pot rests on a light blue-green pedestal with a wide base. To the mid-left, a faint outline of a light-colored barrel or jar is visible. In the lower left corner, two small, dog-like animals are lightly sketched in brown lines; one stands facing right, and the other crouches behind it, facing left.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　傳勾龍爽　番酋四歡八樂圖　冊頁|Tartar Officer with Blonde Lady
metadata.medium: Eight album leaves; color on silk

alt_text: Two robed figures flank a walking tiger, all rendered in gold on a dark background with red seals
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal composition featuring three main figures rendered in gold against a dark, almost black, background. The figures are arranged from left to right across the panel. On the far left, a standing human figure is depicted in profile, facing slightly right. The figure wears long, flowing robes with intricate patterns along the hems and sleeves. Their head is slightly bowed, and their expression appears contemplative or somber. The figure's hands are mostly obscured by the wide sleeves. In the center, a tiger is shown in a walking or stalking pose, facing left. Its body is elongated, and its tail curves upwards and then slightly downwards. The tiger's mouth is open, revealing teeth, and its eyes are visible. Its fur is rendered with numerous short, parallel lines, giving it a textured appearance. Its front paws are extended forward, and its back paws are positioned as if in mid-stride. On the far right, a second human figure is depicted, seated or kneeling, facing left. This figure holds a long, slender staff vertically with both hands, resting their chin on the top of the staff. They wear similarly flowing robes with patterned borders. Their head is also bowed, and their expression is obscured by their posture. In the upper right corner, two square red seals with illegible dark characters are visible. A third, smaller red seal is in the lower right corner. The golden lines of the figures contrast sharply with the dark background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; gold on black paper

alt_text: A wide, horizontal painting depicts numerous horses in various poses across a muted brown landscape with sparse vegetation.
long_description: This wide, horizontal painting features a large number of horses scattered across a muted, earthy landscape. The color palette is dominated by shades of brown, tan, and dark grey, giving the artwork an aged or subdued appearance. Approximately thirty to forty horses are visible, rendered with dark, fluid brushstrokes that define their forms against the lighter background. The horses are depicted in a variety of poses: many are grazing with their heads lowered, some are standing still, others appear to be walking, and a few are shown in more dynamic stances, such as rearing or rolling on the ground. Their sizes vary, suggesting depth and distance within the composition, with larger figures in the foreground and smaller ones receding into the background. In the upper left portion of the painting, faint outlines of trees or sparse vegetation are visible, hinting at a natural environment. The ground beneath the horses shows subtle variations in tone, suggesting an uneven terrain or sparse growth. The overall impression is of a vast, open field populated by a herd of horses.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A bald figure on a spotted deer looks down at a kneeling person holding a blue object
long_description:
The vertical painting depicts two human figures and a spotted animal against a dark, muted background. A large, bald figure with light skin occupies the upper left and central portion of the image. This figure wears flowing robes primarily in shades of green and blue, with gold trim and patterns. A large, circular, golden halo surrounds the figure's head. Large, dark, circular earrings hang from the figure's elongated earlobes. The figure is seated on a four-legged animal that resembles a deer, with a brown body covered in irregular white spots. The figure's gaze is directed downwards and to the right.

Below and to the right of the main figure, a smaller human figure kneels on the ground, facing upwards towards the seated figure. This kneeling figure wears a loose red robe with a light-colored sash around the waist and has light skin and dark hair or a head covering. The kneeling figure holds a dark blue, rectangular object in both hands, presenting it towards the seated figure. The background is a dark, earthy brown with faint, indistinct shapes that suggest trees or rocky terrain, particularly in the upper half of the painting. The overall color palette is subdued, with the red and green robes providing the most vibrant hues.

metadata.title: 羅漢図|Rakan
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, gold, and cut gold on silk

alt_text: A tall, slender crane stands on one leg, looking skyward, against a muted, misty landscape
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting, predominantly in shades of brown and dark gray/black ink. The central figure is a large, slender crane, positioned slightly to the right of the vertical center. The crane stands on its right leg, which is dark and detailed with scales or texture. Its left leg is bent, with the foot tucked under its body. The body of the crane is rendered in lighter ink washes, giving it a soft, feathery appearance. The tail feathers and wing tips are depicted with darker, more defined brushstrokes, creating a contrast. Its long, graceful neck curves upwards and to the left, culminating in a small head with a long, pointed beak that extends further upwards. The eye area is a small dark dot. The background is a wash of muted brown, suggesting a misty or atmospheric environment. In the lower left and center, faint, undulating lines and darker washes suggest a rocky or hilly landscape, possibly with water. Small, scattered dark dots in the lower left might indicate pebbles or distant foliage. The overall impression is one of quiet solitude and verticality. The top and bottom edges of the scroll have a lighter brown border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Faded landscape painting depicting towering mountains, a multi-tiered pagoda, and small structures amidst sparse trees
long_description: A vertically oriented, faded landscape painting, primarily in shades of brown and dark gray, depicts a vast mountainous scene. A large, central mountain range dominates the composition, rising from the bottom to near the top of the frame. The mountains feature undulating, layered forms, with darker lines suggesting contours and crevices. In the upper left quadrant, a multi-tiered pagoda with a pointed roof is visible on a lower peak, partially obscured by the larger mountain. Below the pagoda, on the left side, are several small, simple structures with sloped roofs, nestled among sparse, bare trees. More bare trees are scattered across the lower and middle ground, particularly on the slopes of the mountains. To the right of the central mountain, the landscape recedes into a hazy, flatter area, possibly depicting water or a valley, with faint horizontal lines suggesting distant landforms. The sky area in the upper right is a uniform, dark brown, showing signs of age and wear with cracks and discoloration. The overall impression is one of depth and scale, with human elements dwarfed by the natural environment.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; painted silk

alt_text: Monochrome ink painting of a large leafy plant with a slender insect on thin stalks above it
long_description: The artwork is a monochrome ink painting on a light, warm-toned background, depicting a large leafy plant and an insect. The central and lower-left portion of the composition is dominated by a substantial plant, possibly a type of cabbage or leafy vegetable. Its broad, textured leaves fan out from a central base, rendered with varying shades of dark gray and lighter gray ink, creating depth and form. The leaves on the left side are darker and more defined, while those extending to the right are lighter and more subtly depicted. Above and to the right of the main plant, a long, slender insect is visible. It has a small body and very long, thin legs, and appears to be resting on or clinging to a few faint, delicate stalks or blades of grass that extend upwards from the plant below. The insect is rendered with fine, dark lines. In the upper left corner, several columns of vertical text are written in dark ink. On the far right edge, a narrow, vertical strip contains more dark text. Near the bottom right corner, above two prominent red square seals, there is a smaller section of faint, vertical text. The overall impression is one of delicate observation of nature, executed with a limited color palette.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; black and grey wash on paper

alt_text: An embroidered landscape depicting a bustling river scene with numerous people, boats, bridges, and buildings, set against mountains.
long_description: This is a rectangular embroidered artwork depicting a vibrant, detailed landscape scene centered around a wide river or lake. The background features rolling mountains with varied green and brown hues under a light blue sky. The middle ground is dominated by the expansive body of water, which is filled with numerous boats of different sizes and designs. Many boats are long and narrow, propelled by multiple oars, some with ornate structures or canopies. Other boats are smaller, carrying fewer passengers. Several bridges span the water, connecting landmasses. One prominent arched bridge in the upper right has many figures walking across it. Another, flatter bridge is visible in the lower left. The land areas on either side of the water and on small islands are densely populated with trees, buildings, and a multitude of human figures. The trees are rendered in various shades of green and blue-green, with some appearing as large, leafy canopies and others as slender pines. Buildings include multi-tiered pagodas with red roofs and smaller, simpler structures. People are depicted in various activities: walking, conversing, riding in boats, and standing on bridges or riverbanks. Their clothing features a palette of reds, blues, greens, and browns. The water is light blue with white wavy lines indicating movement. The overall impression is one of a bustling, lively environment with continuous activity across the land and water.

metadata.title: 清    緙絲龍舟競渡圖|Dragon-boat festival performance
metadata.medium: Silk and metal thread tapestry (kesi)

alt_text: Ancient scroll with gold text on patterned orange and red backgrounds, divided into two sections
long_description: This horizontal scroll is divided into two distinct sections, each featuring columns of gold text on a patterned background. The left section has a warm, muted orange background adorned with a subtle, repeating pattern of swirling, cloud-like motifs. The text, rendered in a shimmering gold, is arranged in vertical columns, reading from right to left. The characters are finely detailed and consistent in size. The right section of the scroll presents a rich, deep red background, also embellished with a similar, yet slightly denser, repeating pattern of gold cloud-like or abstract shapes. The gold text on this red background is equally intricate and arranged in vertical columns, mirroring the style of the left section. The contrast between the bright gold characters and the darker red and orange backgrounds is prominent, making the text stand out. The overall impression is one of an ancient, ornate document.

metadata.title: 清  佚名  楷書英連成父母  誥命  卷|Scroll of Commission
metadata.medium: Handscroll; silk

alt_text: A fan painting depicts two older men observing a child playing in a landscape with calligraphic text
long_description: A fan-shaped painting features three figures in a sparse landscape, rendered with light washes of color on a pale, vertically ribbed surface. On the left, a small child kneels, dressed in a reddish-orange tunic and dark pants. The child faces right, holding a thin stick that extends towards a small white object on the ground amidst green foliage. To the right of the child stand two older men, both with beards and wearing traditional robes and hats. The man closer to the child wears a dark, possibly black, hat with a small cross-like ornament on top, and a long, light-colored robe with grey accents. His beard is dark. The man to his left, slightly behind him, has a longer white beard, a dark hat, and a blue-grey tunic over a lighter robe. Both men appear to be looking towards the child. In the upper right, faint, dark brushstrokes suggest distant trees or bushes. The ground beneath the figures is a light green. In the upper left corner, several vertical lines of black calligraphic text are visible, accompanied by a small red square seal at the bottom of the text block. The overall palette is muted, with soft greens, blues, reds, and greys against the cream-colored fan surface.

metadata.title: 清   孫榮  觀鵝圖  扇頁|Two Scholars and Boy with Goose
metadata.medium: Fan mounted as an album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures, one whispering to the other, stand in a garden with a tree and a blue railing.
long_description: The artwork features two figures in a garden setting, rendered with a soft color palette. The figure on the left, positioned slightly forward, wears a long, light yellow robe with a high collar and dark trim, and dark trousers. Their dark hair is styled in a topknot. They hold a small, dark basket containing purple and pink flowers in their right hand, which is at their waist. Their left hand rests on a dark vertical pole. A second figure stands directly behind and slightly to the right of the first, wearing a long, dark grey robe with a red cap or hood. This figure leans in, with their face close to the ear of the first figure, as if whispering. Both figures have light skin tones and dark hair.To the left of the figures, a blue railing with geometric patterns extends horizontally. Behind the railing and the figures, a light brown ground surface leads towards a building on the right. A large tree with light green leaves and a textured brown trunk is visible behind the blue railing on the left. In the background, small green plants and purple flowers are scattered across the ground. On the far right, a light-colored building with an open doorway reveals an interior with a patterned railing in shades of orange and brown. The scene is set outdoors under a plain, light background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting of various flowering plants including purple wisteria, red rhododendrons, and white narcissus on a brown background
long_description: The image is a horizontal painting depicting a variety of flowering plants against a plain, light brown background. The flowers are arranged in clusters across the canvas, with no distinct horizon or ground line. On the far left, a branch with several clusters of red flowers and green leaves extends upwards. Below and slightly to the right of these, a smaller cluster of light pink and white flowers with green leaves is visible. Above the center, a large, drooping cluster of light purple wisteria flowers hangs from a thin branch with small green leaves. Below the wisteria, a group of plants includes several pink, heart-shaped bleeding heart flowers and a few yellow-orange chrysanthemum-like flowers with green stems and leaves. To the right of the wisteria, a cluster of white narcissus flowers with yellow centers and long green leaves stands upright. Further to the right and slightly below, a group of deep red flowers with green leaves is depicted, some appearing to be tied together at their stems. Another cluster of light pink flowers with green leaves is situated below the narcissus and to the left of the red flowers. The overall impression is a collection of diverse botanical specimens presented without a specific setting.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　王淵(僞款)　百花圖　卷|The Hundred Flowers
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting depicting mountains, water, numerous trees, and small buildings in shades of gray.
long_description: This horizontal ink wash landscape painting is rendered in shades of gray and black on a light, off-white background. The composition features a sprawling natural scene dominated by mountains, water, and a variety of trees, with a few small structures. In the upper left, a large, steep mountain descends towards a body of water. To its right, a wide expanse of water separates it from a series of rounded hills, many of which are densely covered with dark, needle-like trees. Further right, in the upper-middle and upper-right, more substantial, undulating mountains rise, also adorned with clusters of trees. Some trees appear as dense, dark masses, while others are depicted with bare, skeletal branches, particularly in the mid-ground. The lower left quadrant shows a small cluster of two buildings with peaked roofs, situated on a low bank beside the water. These structures are surrounded by a mix of trees: some with full, dark canopies and others with thin, bare branches. The foreground and mid-ground are characterized by additional low hills and islands, many featuring groups of trees with distinct, dark foliage or sparse, leafless forms. Bodies of water, rendered with lighter washes, weave through the landscape, creating a sense of depth and separation between the landmasses. The brushwork ranges from soft, graded washes for the mountains to precise, darker strokes for the trees and architectural details.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A bird with a long tail perched on a flowering branch, painted on an open fan
long_description: The image displays an open, hand-held fan, fanned out to reveal a painted scene. The fan's paper surface is light-toned, with visible vertical pleats. A dark-toned bird with a long, slender tail is depicted in the center, perched on a gnarled branch that extends horizontally across the upper half of the fan. The bird's head is tilted downwards, and its body is oriented towards the left. Large, light-toned flowers with dark leaves bloom from the branch, appearing on both the left and right sides of the bird. The flowers have multiple petals and prominent centers. Smaller, lighter foliage is visible in the lower left and right corners of the painted scene, beneath the main branch. The fan's structure includes numerous dark, thin ribs radiating from a central pivot point at the bottom. Two thicker, dark guard sticks frame the outer edges of the fan. The right guard stick has vertical lines of text, appearing as a series of dark characters against its dark surface. The overall impression is a detailed natural scene on a functional object.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Folding fan; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two figures, one in a red cloak and elaborate headdress, holding flowers, the other in a fur hat
long_description: A full-length painting on a vertical scroll depicts two standing figures against a plain, light brown background with patterned borders. The figure on the left is positioned slightly forward, facing right with their head tilted down. They wear a long, flowing red cloak with fur trim over a dark garment adorned with vertical rows of large white polka dots. A greenish-blue skirt is visible beneath the cloak. On their head is an elaborate, crown-like headdress decorated with pearls or beads. In their right hand, they delicately hold a small branch with white blossoms. The second figure stands behind and to the right of the first, facing left with their gaze directed forward. This figure wears a brown fur hat and a light-colored, patterned garment with a dark vest. A long, thin object, possibly a fan, is held behind their back. The scroll has a light gold patterned border on the left and right sides, and a dark blue patterned border at the very top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; paint on paper

alt_text: Three bovines, two adults and one calf, on a light brown ground with a diagonal slope.
long_description:
The artwork is a monochrome ink painting on a light brown, aged surface. The composition features three bovines on a subtly sloped ground, rendered with dark grey ink washes and outlines. The background is largely unadorned, a uniform light brown color, with a faint, lighter diagonal ridge or slope extending from the lower center towards the upper right.

In the upper right quadrant, a large bovine is depicted, facing towards the left and slightly downwards. Its body is rendered with soft grey washes, and its form is defined by darker ink outlines. It has visible horns curving upwards and backwards from its head. The animal appears to be in motion, possibly descending the slope.

In the lower left quadrant, another large bovine stands, facing towards the right. This animal is also rendered in dark grey ink with outlines, and it has horns similar to the one in the upper right. Directly behind this larger bovine, a much smaller calf is positioned, facing the same direction. The calf is also depicted in dark grey ink, appearing to follow the adult. The ground beneath the animals is a lighter shade of brown, suggesting a subtle elevation change or a path. The overall impression is one of quiet movement within a sparse landscape.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts multiple horses and a person in a grassy landscape with trees and hills
long_description: This horizontal painting depicts a pastoral scene with multiple horses and a person in a natural landscape. In the upper left corner, two circular red seals with dark, illegible characters are visible, along with a smaller rectangular red seal below them. The background features a gentle, grassy hill dotted with several tall trees that have light gray trunks and dark green, bushy foliage. A few small, brown rocky formations are visible among the trees on the right side. In the midground, a group of seven horses of varying colors occupies the grassy slope. There are horses in shades of brown, white, black, and reddish-brown. Some horses appear to be grazing with their heads down, while others stand with their heads up, looking towards each other or into the distance. On the far right, standing beneath the trees, is a person dressed in light brown robes and a dark, rounded hat. The person holds a long, light-colored staff in their right hand and appears to be observing the horses. The foreground consists of a light green grassy area, with a small, dark brown rocky outcrop in the bottom right corner. The overall color palette is soft and earthy, dominated by greens, browns, and grays.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Monochrome ink painting of a waterscape with figures in boats, willow trees, and a distant bridge.
long_description: A tall, vertical monochrome ink painting depicts a serene waterscape on a light brown ground. The composition is divided into three main horizontal sections. The top section shows a hazy, distant landscape with faint, wispy trees or reeds on a landmass. A small, simple wooden bridge or pier extends from this land into the water. Below this, the middle section is dominated by a wide expanse of calm water. Three small, round boats are spaced across this water, each containing a single seated figure. The figures are rendered with minimal detail, appearing to be engaged in an activity like fishing. The bottom section features a prominent foreground landmass that slopes gently upwards from the water's edge. Several large trees with long, drooping branches, characteristic of willows, grow on this land. The entire scene is rendered with varying shades of dark grey and black ink, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere against the light, unpainted background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album with ten leaves (eight paintings and two title leaves); ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical painting of white and pink peonies with green leaves on a light brown background, with red seals and text.
long_description: A vertical painting on a light brown, textured background depicts two clusters of large, multi-petaled flowers with green foliage. In the upper right quadrant, a cluster of three white flowers with subtle yellow centers is visible. Each flower features numerous ruffled petals, creating a full, rounded form. Below and to the left, a second cluster consists of two larger flowers and one smaller bud. These flowers are predominantly white with distinct light pink edges and centers, also characterized by many ruffled petals. Green stems and broad, lobed leaves with visible veins connect and support the flower clusters, curving upwards from the lower left. The leaves are rendered in various shades of green. In the upper center, a circular red seal with intricate characters is present. On the right side, vertical lines of black text are followed by two square red seals. In the lower left, outside the main painted area, two additional square red seals are stacked vertically.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A group of six figures in traditional robes and hats, including a tall bearded man, walking across a plain background.
long_description: The image depicts six figures, primarily men, in traditional attire, arranged in a procession-like manner against a plain, light brown background. The figures are rendered with outlines and subtle washes of color, giving the impression of an aged painting. In the center, a tall, slender man with a long, dark beard and a tall, rectangular hat walks towards the right. He wears a long, light-colored robe with dark trim. To his left, a shorter, older man with a very long, white beard and a large, round, ribbed hat, resembling an open umbrella, walks in the same direction, holding a staff. He wears a patterned blue and white garment under his robe. Behind the central figure, slightly to the right, are two more men. One, with a short beard and a round hat, looks towards the central figure. Next to him, a man with a mustache and a flat-topped hat holds a tray with a dark, lumpy object on it. In the lower right foreground, a stout, shorter man kneels or crouches, facing left, with a dark beard and a pointed hat. He holds a short staff or object. To his right, a figure holds a tall pole with a large, shield-shaped object attached, which has a faint, intricate pattern visible on its surface. The overall color palette is muted, dominated by light browns, creams, and subtle blues. Vertical text is visible along the far right edge of the image.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A dark painting depicts a seated deity with a halo, on a lotus, flanked by two smaller figures.
long_description: A vertical artwork features a central, seated deity rendered in light grey against a dark grey background, with gold accents. The deity occupies the upper half of the composition, facing forward with a serene expression. A small golden dot marks the forehead, and another is on the crown of the head. The hair is depicted with tight curls. The deity wears simple, draped robes, and the hands are raised in front of the chest, palms facing each other, with golden details on the fingers. A large, circular halo surrounds the head, and a larger, oval-shaped aura with flame-like edges frames the entire upper body. The deity is seated on a multi-layered lotus throne, with some petals highlighted in gold. In the upper corners of the dark background, faint, light grey floral motifs are visible. Below the lotus throne, an elaborate, rectangular altar-like structure extends across the lower half of the artwork. This altar is dark grey, adorned with numerous small golden dots and intricate patterns, including square compartments with swirling designs. At the center of the altar's base, a small, golden, crown-like object is prominently displayed. Two smaller, seated figures, also in light grey with gold accents and halos, flank the altar on either side, each resting on a small lotus base and facing inward.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts scholars in a pavilion and outdoors, surrounded by mountains and a winding river
long_description: This monochrome ink wash painting, rendered in shades of grey and black on a light, aged background, presents a landscape with multiple figures. The composition is broadly divided into an outdoor scene on the left and an architectural scene on the right. On the left, a winding river flows from the upper left, descending through a valley flanked by hills and mountains. Sparse, bamboo-like trees are visible on the slopes. In the lower left foreground, three figures are seated on a rocky outcrop. One figure, seen from behind, wears a dark cap and light robes. The central figure, facing right, has a long beard and wears light robes and a cap, leaning back. The rightmost figure, facing left, also has a beard, wears light robes and a cap, and holds a staff. Small, dark objects are on the ground near them. On the right side of the painting, a large, open-sided pavilion or building stands on stilts, extending from the middle ground to the right edge. It features a tiled roof and a railing with decorative panels. Inside the pavilion, five figures are gathered. One figure on the far left, seen from behind, appears to be serving or preparing something. The other four figures are seated or leaning, engaged in conversation or contemplation, wearing traditional robes and caps, some with beards. A pot or vessel is visible on a low platform within the pavilion. Trees with sparse foliage are in the foreground, below and to the left of the pavilion, and more bamboo-like trees are on the hills behind the structure.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink wash on silk brocade

alt_text: Two deer stand on a rocky mountain slope with a pine tree, next to a panel of vertical text
long_description: The artwork is presented as two vertical panels, each with a light, neutral-colored background. The left panel features several columns of vertical text written in black ink, with a few red seals stamped at the bottom. The text reads: "木石廬山雨鹿岸玉几口外心晴分如今洞口晴多少料得人間印版文差是題". The right panel displays an ink drawing of a mountainous landscape with two deer. The deer are depicted with antlers and spotted coats, rendered in black and gray ink. One deer stands in the foreground, facing left, while the other stands further back and higher on the slope, facing right. Both deer are positioned on a rocky, uneven terrain with sparse vegetation indicated by short, vertical strokes. A pine tree with dark, clustered needles and a gnarled branch extends from the upper right, overhanging the mountain slope. The drawing uses varying shades of black and gray to create depth and texture for the rocks and foliage.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of twelve paintings; ink wash on paper

alt_text: A faded painting depicts numerous birds, including cranes and smaller species, amidst sparse foliage and branches
long_description: The image is a rectangular, horizontally oriented painting with a muted, earthy color palette, dominated by shades of brown, beige, and dark green, suggesting age and wear. The composition is densely populated with various species of birds, both large and small, scattered across the frame. In the lower left, a large bird with a long, curved neck and a dark head, possibly a crane, stands among several smaller, dark-feathered birds. To its right, another large bird, lighter in color with a long neck, is partially visible. Above these, and extending across the middle and upper sections, are numerous smaller birds perched on branches or nestled within sparse, dark foliage. Some birds are light-colored, appearing white or pale grey, while others are dark brown or black. In the upper right, two distinct birds are visible: one white and one dark brown, both with rounded bodies and short beaks, possibly doves or pigeons. The background is a mottled brown, with hints of darker green and brown suggesting trees or rocky terrain. The overall impression is one of a crowded natural scene, with the birds interacting or resting within their environment. A small patch of red is visible on the far left, possibly part of another bird or a flower. The details are somewhat softened by the apparent age of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal landscape painting featuring layered mountains, dense trees, and small structures in muted colors
long_description: The image is a horizontal landscape painting, rendered in a muted palette of greens, blues, and browns against a warm, reddish-brown background. The composition is dominated by a series of undulating mountains that stretch across the entire width of the painting. These mountains are depicted with soft, rounded peaks and valleys, with lighter green and blue washes highlighting their contours and darker brown lines defining their forms. In the foreground and midground, various trees are scattered throughout the landscape. Some are tall, slender pines with dark, feathery needles, while others are broader, deciduous-looking trees with more rounded canopies. These trees appear in clusters and individually, often nestled in the valleys or clinging to the sides of the mountains. Small, dark-roofed buildings, possibly temples or houses, are visible at several points, integrated into the mountainous terrain. One structure is visible on a lower slope on the far left, another higher up on a central peak, and a few more are subtly placed among the trees and hills towards the right. The overall impression is one of a vast, serene natural environment with subtle human presence.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a misty mountainous landscape with trees, waterfalls, and traditional structures.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting, rendered in shades of black and gray on a light brown paper, portrays a vast, layered mountainous landscape shrouded in mist. The composition is dense with natural elements and scattered human-made structures, creating a sense of depth and scale. In the upper section, towering, rounded mountains with dark, textured peaks emerge from thick, swirling mist that obscures their bases and valleys. As the eye moves downward, more layers of mountains and hills appear, heavily dotted with dark, dense trees. Several waterfalls cascade down the rocky slopes, particularly visible in the upper-middle and middle sections. Nestled among the trees on various ledges and clearings are small, traditional-style buildings with sloped roofs, including a multi-tiered pagoda-like structure in the upper-middle right. The mist continues to weave through the landscape, creating soft transitions between the foreground and background elements. In the lower third of the painting, the landscape opens slightly to reveal a body of water flowing horizontally across the lower right. A long, arched bridge with multiple supports spans this water, connecting two landmasses. On the far left, a prominent, gnarled tree with dark foliage stands on a rocky outcrop, with another building visible on a lower hill. The foreground features scattered rocks and sparse vegetation. Vertical calligraphic text is visible on the right side of the painting.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　高克恭(僞款)　山水圖　軸|Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Two scenes depict figures in traditional attire, one with a man fallen, the other with figures indoors and outdoors.
long_description: This two-page illustration features two distinct scenes, each with figures and architectural elements, rendered with black ink outlines and light color washes. The left scene shows an outdoor area next to a white building with a dark tiled roof and a window with dark vertical bars. In the foreground, a man with a dark cap and a white beard lies on his back, wearing a striped robe, holding a stick, with two basket-like objects scattered near him. Standing near the building's entrance are two older men with long white beards and robes, one with arms raised and the other holding a staff, flanked by two smaller figures. Sparse vegetation is visible in the far left background. Text in the upper left reads "龍壽" and "月老牽線". The right scene depicts an open-sided building on the left with a dark tiled roof, where a figure in light clothing lies on an elevated bed with a blue pillow.
