In the foreground, two figures are in an outdoor area: one standing man with a long beard, an ornate patterned robe, and a dark cap with ornaments, and another man kneeling, also in a patterned robe, holding a green object on his head. A large tree with sparse foliage extends across the upper right, and a low wall separates the foreground from the background. Text in the upper right reads "太陰大" and "仙翁畫".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of fifty-one leaves of paintings and calligraphy; ink, wash and color on paper

alt_text: Three men in dark hats and traditional robes, with beards, are depicted in a horizontal portrait.
long_description: This horizontal painting features three men, depicted from the chest up, against a plain, light brown background. The overall color palette is muted, with tones of beige, brown, and subtle blue. Each man wears a dark, tall, flat-topped hat and long-sleeved robes, with their hands clasped together at chest level, mostly obscured by the wide sleeves. The man on the far left has a light-colored, pointed beard and mustache. His robe is a light beige, with a darker brown collar visible. He looks slightly to the right, with a calm expression. The central man has a fuller, darker beard and mustache that extends down his chest. His robe is also a light beige, similar to the first man's, with a darker brown collar. He looks directly forward or slightly to the right. The man on the far right has a shorter, dark beard and mustache. His outer robe is a lighter, off-white color, with a prominent dark brown or black collar and a blue undergarment visible at the neck. His hands are clasped, and he looks slightly to the right. The figures are arranged in a row, occupying most of the horizontal space of the aged, textured background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A crouching figure in a blue-gray robe gestures with an extended finger against a muted background.
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a single figure crouching or sitting in profile, facing right, against a muted brownish-gray background. The figure occupies the lower two-thirds of the canvas, with indistinct darker shapes at the top. The person wears a loose, long-sleeved robe in a faded blue-gray color, with an off-white inner garment visible at the neck and sleeves. The face, hands, and feet are rendered in a light, almost white tone. Dark, textured hair frames the face, which features a prominent nose and a slightly open mouth, suggesting speech or a strong expression. The right hand is raised, with the index finger extended forward as if pointing or emphasizing a point. The left hand rests gently on the left knee or thigh. The feet, also light-colored, are visible at the bottom, possibly wearing light footwear. The overall palette is subdued, dominated by browns, grays, and muted blues.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Framed painting; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three robed figures, two women and one man, sit facing forward, flanked by vertical blue text panels
long_description:
Three figures, two women and one man, are depicted seated against a plain, light tan background. The figures are arranged from left to right: a woman, another woman, and a man. Each figure is shown from the waist up, facing directly forward.

All three figures wear long, red robes with intricate gold and blue patterns, possibly depicting birds and clouds. The woman on the left has a pale complexion and wears a tall, elaborate headdress adorned with silver, blue, and red elements, with long white beaded strands hanging down on either side of her face. Her robe has a green collar.

The woman in the center also has a pale complexion and wears a similar, elaborate headdress with silver, blue, and red details, and white beaded strands. Her robe has a blue collar. Both women have small, delicate features.

The man on the right has a pale complexion, a thin mustache, and a small goatee. He wears a black, tall hat with two flat, ear-like extensions on the sides. His red robe features a large white crane with red accents on the chest, and a blue and white belt is visible at his waist.

Flanking the central woman are two tall, narrow, vertical blue panels with red and green borders at the top and bottom. Each panel contains vertical lines of white text. The panel to the left of the central woman reads: "九世祖妣張氏三十六娘之像 妣生於嘉靖二十六年丁未歲九月二十六日亥時人". The panel to the right of the central woman (and to the left of the man) reads: "八世祖考張十四郎君之像 祖生於嘉靖二十四年戊申歲七月二十六日亥時人". The background is a uniform, light, untextured tan color.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two panels: black calligraphy on left, monochrome landscape painting with mountains, trees, water, and a boat on right
long_description: The artwork is presented as two vertical panels, side-by-side, with a thin brown border. The left panel is filled with black calligraphic text arranged in vertical columns, starting from the top right and moving left. The characters are written with varying brushstrokes, some thick and bold, others thinner. The transcribed text reads: "萬壁樹聲萬 千歲秋色高 不公画 梅村実律業". At the bottom left of this panel, two red square seals are stamped, one above the other, with illegible characters within them. The right panel features a monochrome landscape painting, primarily in shades of black, gray, and light brown, with hints of light blue and green. The upper half of this panel is filled with a large, textured mountain range, depicted with dark, vertical brushstrokes suggesting foliage or rock formations. The mountains descend towards the lower right. In the mid-ground, at the base of the mountains on the left, are several dark trees with visible trunks and dense foliage. To their right, a small, light-colored building with a dark roof is nestled among the trees, near a body of water. The lower portion of the panel depicts a calm body of water, rendered in light blue-gray, with patches of green grass along its banks. On the right side of the water, a small, dark boat with a figure is visible. In the far right margin of the painting, a vertical line of smaller black calligraphic characters is present, transcribed as "石谷子", followed by a single red square seal at the bottom right corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Eight album leaves from a miniature album; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Faded painting of several figures, including two men, in an architectural setting with floral elements.
long_description: The artwork is a rectangular painting with a faded, brownish-gold background, enclosed by a dark wooden frame and an inner decorative gold band. The scene depicts multiple figures within an architectural setting. In the upper left, a light-colored, flowing object, possibly a banner or cloud, is faintly visible against the muted background. Below it, on the left side of the composition, a figure with a round face and light-colored robes appears to be seated or standing, holding a red object. To their right, another prominent figure with a long, dark beard and light robes is depicted, looking towards the left. Several smaller figures, some in colorful garments like blue and green, are positioned around these two main figures, some appearing to interact or move. In the lower half of the painting, architectural elements resembling railings or platforms extend across the width. In the lower right, a cluster of light-colored flowers, possibly peonies, is visible near the base of these structures. The overall color palette is muted due to the artwork's age, dominated by browns, golds, and faint hints of red, blue, and green in the figures' attire.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash landscape depicting mountains, prominent pine trees, and a small figure on a path
long_description: The horizontal ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape dominated by mountains and trees, rendered in shades of black, gray, and a hint of light blue on an off-white background. In the lower left, a small, light-colored figure walks along a path, holding a staff. This figure is positioned near a cluster of trees with dark, gnarled trunks and varied foliage, some appearing deciduous and others like pines. A large, dark pine tree with a dramatically twisted trunk and dense, dark needles stands prominently in the left-center foreground, its branches extending upwards and to the right. Behind the foreground elements, the landscape recedes into rolling hills and a body of water or valley, indicated by lighter ink washes and horizontal brushstrokes. The right side of the composition is dominated by large, rounded mountains, their forms defined by dark outlines and varying shades of gray wash. On the slopes of these mountains, smaller clusters of pine trees are visible. The uppermost mountain on the right features a distinctive, flat-topped rock formation. The overall impression is one of depth and natural grandeur, achieved through the skillful use of ink and brushwork.

metadata.title: 清　張賜寧　設色山水　卷|Landscape
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Full-length portrait of a man in an elaborate dark robe with a white crane emblem and a feathered hat
long_description: A full-length portrait depicts a man standing centrally against a plain, light beige background. The man has light skin, a dark mustache, and a dark goatee. He wears a brown fur hat with a red brim, topped by a red finial with a gold element and a long blue-green feather extending from the back. His main garment is a dark blue or purple long robe with wide sleeves, reaching to his ankles. The robe features a wide, multicolored, scalloped collar with intricate patterns in blue, green, and white. On the chest of the robe is a square rank badge, or "buzi," depicting a white crane standing amidst colorful clouds and waves, framed by a multicolored border. A long necklace of red beads with a single green pendant hangs around his neck, extending down the front of the robe. The cuffs of his sleeves are patterned in blue, white, and green. Beneath the robe, a bright blue skirt-like garment with horizontal white stripes is visible. He wears black shoes with light-colored soles. Vertical Chinese characters are written in dark ink on the upper right side of the background, reading "此是頭品文官仙鶴補服". Smaller red Chinese characters are present on the lower left, reading "同治四年".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Set of seventeen paintings tied together; watercolor on paper

alt_text: Four disheveled figures, some with tools, stand in a row on a plain, light-colored background.
long_description:
The image displays four full-body figures, appearing to be men, standing in a horizontal row against a plain, light-colored background. Each figure has dark, unkempt hair and facial hair, and is depicted with thin outlines and minimal color. Their garments are simple and appear tattered or made of natural materials, predominantly in shades of light blue, green, and brown.

From left to right:
1. The first figure is bare-chested, holding a dark bowl to his mouth with both hands. He wears a skirt-like garment made of green and blue fronds or strips, and a woven basket is strapped to his back.
2. The second figure wears a light blue, tattered robe over a bare chest. He carries a bundle of arrows on his back and a quiver or pouch at his hip. He holds a long, thin staff in his right hand, leaning on it.
3. The third figure, with a prominent beard, wears a light-colored, open robe, revealing his chest. He holds a long, thin staff in his left hand, pointing it downwards. A dark object, possibly a club or another staff, is tucked into his belt. A red square seal is visible near his feet.
4. The fourth figure wears a light blue, tattered robe and carries a large, dark, woven basket or bundle on his back. He stands with his right arm slightly raised, palm open, as if gesturing. His left hand holds a long, thin staff. Another red seal is visible on the far right edge of the image.

The background is a uniform, light beige or tan color, with some faint discoloration consistent with aged paper.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two birds stand on rocks by a pond, surrounded by various plants and flowers in a horizontal artwork
long_description: This horizontal rectangular artwork features a natural scene with two birds, water, rocks, and various plants, all set against a light, faded cream background. A light blue border frames the entire composition. In the foreground, a strip of green ground is dotted with small white flowers. To the left, a body of water, rendered in light blue-green with subtle ripples, extends from the bottom edge. Several brown and dark gray rocks line the water's edge. Two birds, resembling ducks or geese, are positioned centrally on a cluster of rocks. The bird on the left is slightly smaller, facing right with its head turned towards the viewer. It has a dark gray body, distinct blue patches on its wings, and a reddish-pink neck and face with a black eye. The bird on the right stands more upright, facing left, and is slightly larger. It shares similar dark gray plumage, blue wing patches, and a reddish-pink neck and face with a black eye, its webbed feet visible on a green, mossy rock. The rocks beneath the birds are varied in color, including shades of brown, green, and blue. Tall, slender green plants with feathery purple tops rise from both the left and right sides of the composition, extending upwards into the cream background. Near the water's edge on the left, a smaller plant with white flowers and green leaves is visible. Behind the right bird, a cluster of vibrant orange-red flowers with green foliage adds a splash of color. The upper background remains largely a plain, light cream, with a few faint, stylized green lines.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; color on pith paper

alt_text: Eleven vibrantly colored butterflies and one elongated insect are depicted on a light, off-white background.
long_description: This artwork features eleven distinct butterflies and one elongated insect, all rendered with vibrant colors on a light, off-white background. The insects are arranged in a scattered composition across the paper. In the upper left, a large butterfly with reddish-orange wings displays blue and white striped patterns and two blue spots on each lower wing. To its right, a butterfly with partially folded wings showcases intricate green, yellow, and black patterns. Further right, a large butterfly with dark brown wings exhibits prominent blue, green, and orange markings, including two blue-ringed black spots on each upper wing. Below the top-left butterfly, a medium-sized yellow-orange butterfly has subtle circular patterns on its wings. To its right, a smaller, dark brown butterfly with green and orange accents is shown with its wings slightly open. Below this, a small, elongated insect with a mottled green and brown body and a reddish-brown tail-like segment is positioned horizontally. In the bottom-left, a green butterfly with pink and yellow markings has long, thin antennae. Next to it, a smaller butterfly with green, pink, and brown patterns has its wings folded upwards. To the right of the elongated insect, a small butterfly with yellow and brown wings is depicted with its wings folded. Near the bottom right, a butterfly with orange and blue wings features green markings. Below it, a dark brown butterfly with green and orange accents has its wings partially folded. Finally, in the bottom right, a butterfly with blue, yellow, and red patterns on its wings is shown with its wings open.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; color on pith paper

alt_text: Eight robed figures with elaborate headwear stand amidst swirling clouds in a monochromatic artwork.
long_description: A vertical, monochromatic artwork depicts eight robed figures standing amidst swirling clouds. The figures are arranged in three rows, with the top row featuring one figure, the middle row three figures, and the bottom row four figures. All figures wear long, dark robes with wide sleeves and lighter undershirts or sashes. Each figure has an elaborate, tall, and patterned headpiece. Several figures have facial hair, including a prominent beard on the central figure in the bottom row and a dark beard on the rightmost figure in the middle row. Their hands are mostly clasped in front of them, with some appearing to hold long, thin, vertical objects. The background and foreground are filled with numerous stylized, scroll-like clouds, creating a sense of ethereal movement around the figures. The figures face generally forward, with calm expressions.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: Seven robed figures with elaborate hats stand on swirling clouds in a vertical, black and white composition
long_description: A vertical, black and white painting depicts seven male-presenting figures arranged in a hierarchical composition, surrounded by stylized swirling clouds. The figures are positioned in three rows: three at the top, two in the middle, and two at the bottom. The central figure in the top row is slightly elevated above the two flanking him. All figures wear long, dark robes with lighter undershirts and sashes, and tall, striped hats with flat tops and ear flaps. Each figure has a mustache and a small beard, and holds a long, narrow, light-colored object, possibly a tablet or scepter, vertically in their hands. The robes show visible folds and some decorative elements around the necklines and sashes. The hats feature distinct horizontal stripes. The swirling clouds are lighter in tone than the figures' dark robes, creating contrast and suggesting the figures are floating or ascending. The clouds fill the background and form a base beneath the figures' feet.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: A robed figure with a crown sits on a throne, surrounded by clouds and a striped archway
long_description: A black and white image depicts a regal figure seated centrally on an elaborate throne, surrounded by swirling clouds and a striped archway. The figure faces directly forward, wearing a tall, dark, rectangular crown with a small, light-colored ornament at the front. The face is light-toned with a thin mustache and a small beard. The figure's hands are clasped together in front of the chest, palms facing each other, with a light-colored garment visible beneath. Elaborate, dark-colored robes with lighter patterns drape widely over the throne, showing multiple layers and folds. The throne is a large, multi-tiered structure with intricate decorative patterns on its backrest and base. A light-colored halo surrounds the figure's head. Above, a large, striped arch extends across the top of the image, with dark and light stripes radiating outwards. Swirling clouds fill the space around the figure, both to the sides and below the throne. Vertical lines of small, dark characters are visible on either side of the figure.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting of a mountainous landscape with a river, trees, a small house, and calligraphy.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a serene mountainous landscape rendered in shades of black and gray on a light, uncolored paper background. In the upper right quadrant, several vertical lines of dark text are visible, accompanied by two square red seals positioned below the text. The upper half of the composition is dominated by a series of imposing mountains with varied textures, some appearing rugged and bare, while others are covered with dense, dark brushstrokes suggesting forests. A body of water, possibly a river or lake, winds through the middle ground, reflecting the light sky. On the far bank, smaller hills and tree-covered slopes recede into the distance. On the near bank, a cluster of tall, slender trees with pointed tops stands prominently, their foliage rendered with fine, dark lines. Towards the lower right, a small, simple house with a thatched roof is nestled on a gentle, grassy slope beside the water. The house features visible structural posts and a dark, open interior. Surrounding the house are several trees with gnarled trunks and full, rounded canopies. In the lower left, two small, dark, rounded shapes rest in the water near the bank. The immediate foreground on the right features a large, textured mound of earth or rock, leading down to the water's edge.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A painting of a waterside town with buildings, trees, and boats docked along a stone embankment.
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts a tranquil waterside scene under a light blue sky. In the foreground, a calm body of water, rendered in shades of dark blue and green, occupies the lower half of the composition. Along the left bank, a stone embankment runs horizontally, where four boats with rounded, straw-colored covers are moored. Their reflections are visible in the water. On the embankment, a cluster of dark-roofed buildings with distinct, curved eaves is visible. To the far left, a larger, darker, rectangular building with a red-orange arched doorway stands. Several small, dark figures are scattered along the embankment. Behind the buildings and extending along the embankment to the right, numerous trees with dense, green foliage and dark trunks are depicted. The water narrows as it recedes into the distance, flanked by more trees on the right bank. In the far distance, two small, light-colored, rounded forms are visible on the horizon under a light blue sky with subtle cloud-like areas.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; ink and color on pith paper

alt_text: A man in a red coat offers an object to a woman at a window, with other figures and a birdcage nearby.
long_description: The image depicts an indoor scene with several figures and objects, rendered in a muted color palette dominated by browns and ochres. In the foreground, slightly to the left of center, a man stands facing a window. He wears a long, bright red coat with white cuffs and a white ruffled collar, white breeches, black shoes, and a black hat with a white plume. He holds a small, light-colored object in his right hand, extending it towards the window. Through the open window, a woman with light skin and dark hair is visible, looking towards the man. Her upper body is seen, and she wears a light-colored garment. Below her, the head of a child with light hair is partially visible, looking out from the window. The window itself has a dark frame and a blue awning above it. To the right, on a raised platform or bench with a decorative red railing, two men are seated. The man on the right wears a loose, light orange robe and has a beard. He is seated with one leg bent. To his left, a smaller figure, possibly a child, is seated, wearing a blue garment and facing away from the viewer. Above them, hanging from a beam, is a small, white birdcage containing a red bird. In the lower right corner of the foreground, a large, light brown, footed bowl or planter sits on the floor. Below the window and extending across the bottom of the image, there are dark, rocky forms with clusters of small, light-colored, possibly floral, elements. The floor is a plain brown, with two dark lines indicating a change in surface or a rug. The background wall is a uniform light brown.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Gold surface with calligraphic text and subtle cloud-like patterns
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal rectangular image featuring a gold background with calligraphic text. The entire surface is a rich, textured gold, appearing slightly mottled in places. Scattered across the gold background are numerous faint, lighter gold patterns, resembling stylized clouds or floral motifs. These patterns are subtle and blend into the background, creating a sense of depth. On the right side of the image, there is a prominent block of dark brown or black calligraphic text arranged in three vertical columns. The rightmost column reads: "茶膳唐等侍衛金井等高街". The middle column reads: "道光拾伍年拾月初拾日". The leftmost column reads: "無尚膳正加參領德祥領之進". On the left side of the image, there is another, less distinct area of text. This text is also dark brown or black calligraphy, arranged in multiple short vertical lines. It is contained within a faint, rectangular border that is slightly darker than the surrounding gold. The characters in this left section are more faded and less clearly defined than those on the right.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk and paper

alt_text: Ink and color landscape painting depicting mountains, pine trees, and rocky terrain with calligraphic inscriptions
long_description: The painting is a horizontal landscape, primarily in shades of gray, black, and muted greens, with touches of light blue and reddish-brown. The composition is dominated by a series of overlapping mountains and large rock formations that fill most of the frame. In the foreground and midground, numerous trees are depicted. Several prominent pine trees with gnarled, dark brown trunks and dense, dark green needle clusters are scattered across the rocky slopes. Their branches extend horizontally, creating a sense of depth. Smaller, bare deciduous trees with reddish-brown leaves are visible on the left side, alongside slender, upright trees with sparse green foliage. The mountains in the background are rendered with lighter washes of gray and faint blue, suggesting distance and atmospheric haze. The rocky terrain in the foreground and midground is detailed with darker ink strokes, indicating texture and shadow, and dotted with small, dark green shrubs. Calligraphic inscriptions in black ink are present in the upper right and upper left corners, accompanied by red seal marks. The inscription in the upper right reads "沈周" (Shen Zhou) vertically, with a square red seal below it. Additional red seals are visible in the lower left and lower right corners, and one in the upper left. The overall impression is a dense, layered natural environment.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink and wash landscape painting depicts mountains, a wide body of water, a boat with figures, and a small pavilion on a rocky shore
long_description:
The image is a horizontal ink and wash landscape painting on a light, off-white background. The composition is divided into a wide body of water in the foreground and midground, with a mountainous background and a rocky shore on the right.

In the background, a series of rolling mountains extends across the width of the painting. They are rendered in varying shades of gray and black ink, with lighter, hazy blue washes suggesting distance in the upper left. Small clusters of dark trees dot the mountain peaks and slopes.

The midground is dominated by a broad expanse of light-colored water, which occupies the lower half and center of the painting. Darker, low-lying landmasses or islands are visible in the middle distance, rendered with dark ink washes.

On the right side of the foreground, a rugged, dark gray and black rocky shoreline rises from the water. Several trees grow on and around these rocks. One prominent tree on the upper right has bare, dark branches, suggesting winter. Below it, another tree has vibrant red foliage, contrasting with the muted tones. Further left, a tree with dark green or blue-green needle-like leaves is visible. Perched on a higher part of the rocky outcrop, a small, open-sided pavilion with a light brown, pyramidal roof is visible.

In the lower left foreground, a small, narrow boat with a pointed bow and stern floats on the water. A figure sits in the boat, facing right, wearing light-colored clothing. Another smaller figure appears to be seated on a low, dark landmass or a very small boat near the rocky shore, to the right of the main boat. A red square seal is visible in the lower left corner of the painting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A tall, craggy mountain landscape with pine trees and a small figure on a ledge, rendered in ink wash
long_description: The vertical artwork depicts a towering, craggy mountain landscape rendered in shades of grey and black ink on a light beige ground. A massive, multi-layered rock formation dominates the central and upper portions of the composition, featuring sharp angles and textured surfaces. Dark, feathery pine trees cling to various ledges and slopes of this central peak and smaller surrounding mountains. The background is a lighter, hazy wash, suggesting distance or mist. On a prominent ledge on the lower right side of the central mountain, a small human figure stands, facing right. The figure wears a reddish-brown robe and appears to hold a long staff. Below this figure, a faint suggestion of water or a waterfall is visible. The lower left foreground shows a sloping hillside with sparse vegetation. A small red seal is visible in the bottom left corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a dense, mountainous landscape with numerous buildings, waterfalls, and trees in muted tones.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting, rendered in muted tones of brown, black, and subtle greens, presents a complex and layered mountainous landscape. The composition is dense, with elements stacked vertically. In the upper section, towering, dark mountains dominate, their forms suggesting rugged terrain and deep valleys. Faint suggestions of mist or clouds appear to cling to the peaks. Several multi-story buildings with distinct, tiered roofs are nestled into the mountain slopes, appearing as if carved into the natural environment. A narrow waterfall cascades down from the upper left, disappearing into the mid-ground. The middle portion of the painting continues the mountainous terrain, with more prominent waterfalls flowing vertically through the scene, creating a sense of dynamic movement. Numerous buildings, some resembling multi-tiered pagodas or temples, are integrated into the rugged landscape, often situated on ledges or beside the flowing water. Trees with dark, dense foliage are scattered throughout, clinging to slopes and emerging from valleys. The lower third of the painting features a wider, calmer body of water, possibly a river or large stream, flowing horizontally across the bottom. More buildings, including what appear to be houses or smaller structures, are visible on the banks and nestled among clusters of trees. The foreground shows rocky ground and dense vegetation. Small red seals are visible in the lower left and lower right corners of the painted area.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome ink landscape painting featuring towering mountains, dense trees, a small building, and calligraphy.
long_description: This monochrome ink wash painting depicts a serene mountainous landscape rendered in shades of gray and black on a light, uncolored background. The composition is dominated by towering, rugged mountains that rise from the midground to the top edge of the painting, their forms softened by what appears to be mist or atmospheric perspective. On the right side, a vertical lighter streak suggests a waterfall cascading down a mountain face. In the midground, rolling hills are visible, with a small, simple building nestled among them on the left side, its roof and walls subtly defined. Numerous trees are scattered throughout the scene. In the foreground and midground, several prominent trees with dark, dense foliage and visible trunks stand on the slopes, particularly on the right and center. Smaller, more sparsely depicted trees and vegetation line the hillsides. The upper left portion of the painting features vertical lines of black calligraphy, accompanied by several red square seals. Additional red seals are present in the lower left and lower right corners of the artwork, outside the main painted area. The overall impression is one of depth and tranquility, achieved through varying ink tones and brushwork.

metadata.title: 清   龔賢   自題山水十六開   冊|Landscapes with Poems
metadata.medium: Three leaves from an album (1980.516.2a–c and 1981.4.1a–o) of eighteen leaves

alt_text: A monochrome drawing of an old man with a beard sitting on a large cloud, holding an object.
long_description: This monochrome drawing depicts an old man seated on a large, swirling cloud formation. The artwork is rendered in light pencil or ink lines on a pale, uncolored background. The man, positioned slightly above the center of the image, faces towards the right. He has a visible beard and appears to be smiling or laughing, with his eyes narrowed. He wears loose, flowing robes that drape around his body. His left hand, raised near his chest, holds a small, indistinct object, possibly a flower or a fruit. His right hand rests on his right knee. The cloud formation occupies the lower half of the composition, extending upwards to support the man. It is depicted with multiple layers of undulating, soft lines, suggesting volume and movement. The background above and around the figure is left blank, emphasizing the central subject and the cloud.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Leaf from an album; ink on paper

alt_text: Two robed, bearded men, one tending a basket with a bird, the other observing with a scroll
long_description: The monochrome artwork depicts two figures on a plain, light-toned background. On the left, a man is shown from behind, bent forward at the waist, looking down into a large, round, woven basket. He wears loose-fitting robes and has a visible beard and hair. Inside the basket, a bird with a long neck and head, possibly a goose, is visible, looking upwards. The basket has a grid-like pattern on its side. To the right, a taller man stands, facing left, his gaze directed towards the first man and the basket. He has a long, flowing beard and a small topknot on his head. He is dressed in long, layered robes with wide sleeves and holds a rolled scroll horizontally in his hands. The figures are positioned in the lower half of the frame, leaving a substantial amount of empty space above them.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Leaf from an album; ink on paper

alt_text: A monochrome drawing of an old, bearded man kneeling beside a smoking vessel and a bowl.
long_description: The monochrome drawing on a light, uniform background depicts an old, bearded man kneeling next to a smoking vessel and a bowl. The man is positioned on the right side of the composition, facing left towards the vessel. He has a bald head, a long, flowing white beard, and a wrinkled face with small, dark eyes. He wears loose, draped robes and appears to be holding a small, fan-like object with a textured handle near the base of the vessel. To the left of the man, a round-bottomed vessel with a narrow neck sits atop an ornate stand. The stand features a decorative ring on its front and three pointed, claw-like feet. From the opening of the vessel, a thin stream of smoke or steam rises, curving gently upwards and to the left, forming a heart-like shape before dissipating into faint wisps. In the lower left corner, a shallow, round bowl contains a single, slender spoon or stick. The entire image is rendered with light gray lines, creating a soft, sketched appearance.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Leaf from an album; ink on paper

alt_text: Detailed monochrome drawing of tiered buildings with curved roofs, trees, and ornate ships on water with people.
long_description: A monochrome drawing depicts a complex scene featuring multiple tiered buildings and ships on a body of water. On the left, a cluster of multi-story structures rises, characterized by their elaborate, curved roofs and multiple balconies. These buildings are intricately detailed with fine lines, showing windows, railings, and support beams. Some structures appear to be built into a rocky or mountainous landscape, with gnarled trees and branches growing alongside and over them. Small figures of people are visible on the balconies and within the buildings, suggesting activity. To the right, on a body of water indicated by horizontal lines, two large, multi-masted ships are depicted. These ships feature tall, segmented sails and ornate superstructures on their decks, resembling smaller versions of the land-based buildings. People are also visible on the decks of the ships. The overall composition is dense with architectural and natural details, rendered in a consistent grayscale tone with fine line work throughout the entire image.

metadata.title: 明　(舊傳)王振鵬　大明宮圖　卷|The Daming Palace
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Monochrome ink painting of mountains, trees, and water with calligraphic text and red seals on a scroll
long_description: Monochrome ink painting on a vertical scroll, primarily in shades of black and gray on a light beige ground. The composition is divided into two main landscape sections, separated by a wide, lighter-toned horizontal band suggesting water or mist. The upper section features a prominent range of mountains with textured, jagged peaks dominating the right and center. To the left of these mountains, a body of water extends towards a distant, low-lying landmass on the horizon. Clusters of trees, some with dense foliage and others appearing bare, are scattered across the midground between the mountains and the water. The upper left area of the scroll contains several columns of vertical calligraphic text in black ink, accompanied by multiple square and rectangular red seals. The lower section of the painting presents a closer view of a landscape. Large, gnarled trees with both sparse and dense foliage emerge from rocky terrain on the left and right sides. Two small, simple houses with peaked roofs are nestled within this environment; one is visible on the far left, partially obscured by trees, and another is positioned towards the right. The ground is uneven, depicted with varied brushstrokes indicating rocky outcrops and undulating surfaces. Additional red seals are present in the lower left and lower right corners, some overlapping the painted elements. The overall scene depicts a natural landscape with human structures integrated into the environment.

metadata.title: 明    董其昌    秋山圖  軸|Autumn Mountains
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a white bird standing among tall, dark-leafed plants with calligraphic text
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a large white bird standing among tall, dark-leafed plants on a light, aged paper background. The bird, positioned in the lower half of the composition, faces right with its long neck slightly curved. It has a long, pointed beak and dark, layered feathers on its wings. A small reddish-brown marking is visible on the top of its head. The bird stands on one leg, with the other leg bent and tucked. Behind and above the bird, several broad, dark leaves with visible veins are rendered with varying shades of black ink. To the far left, a tall, dark, cylindrical plant stalk extends upwards, almost reaching the top edge of the painting. The bottom edge of the artwork features sparse, dark, grass-like strokes. In the upper right quadrant, several vertical lines of dark calligraphic text are present, accompanied by two small red square seals. Additional vertical lines of text and a red square seal are located in the upper left corner, with another red seal near the lower left. The overall palette consists of black ink on a light, cream-colored ground, accented by the red seals and the bird's head marking.

metadata.title: 明   倪元璐   蕉鶴圖   軸|Crane Beneath a Banana Tree
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting depicting towering mountains, a body of water, and sparse trees with a small building
long_description: A horizontal, monochromatic ink wash landscape painting features a vast mountainous terrain with a body of water. In the lower left, a small, two-tiered pavilion with a dark, pointed roof sits on a rocky outcrop, its structure detailed with fine lines. To the right of the pavilion, a calm body of water stretches across the middle ground, reflecting the light. Beyond the water, a series of tall, pointed mountains rise in the background, their peaks fading into the distance. One prominent mountain in the far left background has a distinct, almost triangular peak, with faint outlines of trees on its upper slopes. The central foreground is dominated by a large, imposing mountain with steep, textured sides, its peak reaching high. Clusters of small trees and brush are depicted on its slopes and ledges, with a few taller, more distinct trees on a lower ridge. The landscape continues to the right with more rugged, blocky mountains and rock formations. These mountains appear less pointed and more eroded, with flat tops and vertical striations, also adorned with sparse trees. In the far right, a smaller, rounded hill or plateau is topped with a cluster of bare-branched trees. The entire scene is rendered with varying shades of grey and black ink, creating depth and texture.

metadata.title: 清   傳弘仁   寺橋山色圖   卷|River Scene in Winter
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A painting of long, slender leaves with an orange-brown lily-like flower and small white blossoms, with black calligraphy.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal rectangular painting on a light, aged paper or silk background, framed by a narrow, light brown border. The composition features a cluster of plants with long, slender leaves and two distinct types of flowers, arranged across the lower and central portions of the image. The leaves are painted in varying shades of blue-green and dark gray, with some appearing lighter and others darker, suggesting depth. They are long and narrow, curving gently upwards and outwards from a central point near the bottom left. On the right side, emerging from the cluster of leaves, is a single flower with four prominent petals, colored in a soft orange-brown hue. Its stem is thin and extends upwards. To the left of this flower, a smaller plant stem branches upwards, bearing several small, five-petaled white flowers. These white flowers are clustered, with some appearing fully open and others as buds. Below the white flowers, nestled among the leaves, is a small, rounded object with a textured, brownish-gray surface, possibly a bulb or a seed pod. The upper left portion of the painting is dominated by several vertical lines of black calligraphy, written in a flowing script. Below the calligraphy, in the bottom left corner, are two red seal impressions: a smaller square one above a larger rectangular one. Another smaller, square red seal impression is visible in the upper right corner, partially obscured by the calligraphy.

metadata.title: 清　佚名　仿李鱓　花果圖　冊|Plants and Vegetables
metadata.medium: Album of eight double leaves; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Several figures harvest tea leaves from bushes and carry baskets in a field.
long_description: This watercolor painting depicts a scene of tea harvesting and transport, featuring five figures in a field against a plain, light background. The scene is framed by a thin black line and a wider light blue border at the top and bottom. On the far left, a woman with dark hair pulled back, wearing a blue tunic over an orange skirt, stands facing right, gently picking leaves from a small green tea bush. To her right, another woman with dark hair, dressed in a dark blue-purple tunic over dark pants, also picks leaves from a similar green bush. Further right, a third woman with dark hair, wearing a light blue tunic over dark pants, holds a woven, light brown sifting tray, from which small green leaves are falling into a large, round, woven basket on the ground. A small child in a pink tunic and dark pants kneels beside this basket, reaching inside. On the far right, a man with a bald head and a dark ponytail, wearing a tan tunic and blue pants, walks towards the right. He carries a long, reddish-brown pole across his shoulders, from which two large, round, woven baskets hang, one on each side. These baskets appear to contain green leaves. The ground beneath the figures is depicted with shades of brown and green, suggesting earth and sparse grass. The background is a uniform, light cream color.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; color on pith paper

alt_text: A monochromatic ink painting depicts ten robed figures gathered around a low table in a natural landscape.
long_description: The image is a horizontal scroll painting rendered in ink on aged paper, primarily in shades of light brown and gray. The composition features a gathering of ten robed figures in an outdoor setting, divided into three main groups.In the center, seven figures are arranged around a low, rectangular table. Four figures are seated or kneeling at the table, two on the left, one at the far end, and one on the right, all wearing long robes and head coverings. On the table, several small objects are visible, including a censer, a candle, and other indistinct items. Behind the table, three more figures stand or lean, observing the scene at the table. Above the heads of these central figures, five vertical inscriptions are visible, each appearing to be the character "是".To the far left of the central group, a single, smaller figure stands facing right with arms crossed, observing the main gathering. To the far right of the central group, another figure stands facing left, holding a small cup or bowl in both hands.The background on the left side of the scroll features large, broad leaves of a plant, possibly a banana tree, lightly sketched. The right side of the background depicts a rocky outcrop or mountain face with sparse trees and bamboo shoots at its base. The figures are rendered with expressive ink lines and subtle shading, creating a sense of depth and form. The top and bottom edges of the artwork are framed by a decorative white and light gray patterned fabric border.

metadata.title: 明　佚名　李公麟 偽款　白蓮社圖　卷|White Lotus Society
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A tall, vertical ink painting depicts a vast mountainous landscape with a river, dense forests, and small dwellings.
long_description: A tall, vertical ink painting depicts a vast mountainous landscape rendered in shades of gray and black on a light, aged background. The upper third is dominated by towering, jagged mountains. On the left, a massive peak features a sheer, textured cliff face, with a misty waterfall descending from its heights. To the right, smaller, rounded mountains are densely covered in dark, pine-like trees. A faint, circular lighter area is visible in the upper left sky, and vertical lines of calligraphy with two red seals appear in the upper right. The middle section shows a winding river flowing from the upper left towards the lower right, its banks steep and rocky. Numerous trees, rendered with textured brushstrokes, cover the hillsides. Several small, simple structures with peaked roofs are nestled among the trees, particularly on the right side of the river. The misty waterfall from the upper left blends into the river below. In the lower third, the river widens and curves, continuing its path towards the lower right. More trees, including some with long, drooping branches, line the banks. The foreground consists of rocky terrain and a few more indistinct structures. The detailed brushwork creates a strong sense of depth and atmosphere throughout the expansive scene.

metadata.title: 清   惲壽平    山水   軸|Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Seated figure with an elaborate crown and robes, surrounded by a halo and decorative patterns
long_description: A monochromatic image depicts a seated figure centrally within a rectangular frame, surrounded by intricate patterns. The figure is positioned frontally, seated cross-legged on a lotus-like pedestal. The head is adorned with an elaborate, multi-tiered crown. The face has a serene expression, with elongated earlobes. The body is draped in flowing robes, revealing a necklace and armbands. The right hand is raised to shoulder height with the palm facing outward in a gesture, while the left hand rests in the lap, holding a small, bowl-shaped object. Behind the figure, a large circular halo encompasses both the head and body, filled with swirling, cloud-like or flame-like motifs. The background outside the halo is densely patterned with repeating floral or cloud designs. The central image is bordered by a narrow inner frame, followed by a wider decorative border featuring repeating stylized patterns. An outermost border with similar patterns completes the composition. The entire artwork is rendered in shades of gray, black, and white, emphasizing the detailed linework.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll

alt_text: Ink painting of three bamboo stalks with slender leaves and vertical calligraphic text on a light background.
long_description: The image is a vertical ink painting on a light, off-white background. Three bamboo stalks are depicted, rising from the lower portion of the frame. The tallest and most prominent stalk is positioned slightly to the left of the center, extending upwards to about two-thirds of the image height. This stalk features distinct dark nodes and several branches with clusters of slender, pointed leaves, rendered in various shades of dark grey and black ink. To the right of this central stalk, a thinner, shorter stalk emerges, also displaying nodes and a few small leaves or buds. A third, even thinner stalk is visible further to the right, with sparse foliage. The leaves are depicted with fluid, calligraphic brushstrokes, some appearing darker and more defined, while others are lighter and more translucent. On the left side of the painting, a column of vertical calligraphic text is present, written in dark ink. The text consists of multiple characters arranged in a single column, starting from the upper left and extending downwards. Below the main column of text, there are two small, square red seals. Another small red seal is located near the bottom right corner of the painting. The background is a uniform light tone, providing an open space around the bamboo.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ancient scroll with calligraphic text over faint landscape and floral motifs.
long_description: This horizontal artwork features a light beige to pale brown background, giving the impression of aged paper or silk. The surface is subtly mottled with variations in tone and texture, and scattered with very fine, shimmering flecks, possibly gold. Dark, calligraphic text is arranged in several vertical columns across the piece, primarily in the central and right portions. On the far right, a column contains the character '月'. To its left, another column of text includes characters resembling 'とろお'. Further left, more distinct characters such as '寒', '峰', and '谷' appear in separate vertical lines. On the far left, below faint background imagery, a smaller column of text includes the character '浦'. The background features very faint, lighter-toned imagery. In the upper left, abstract, cloud-like or mountainous forms are visible. Below these, on the left side, are indistinct, light-colored shapes that suggest large, drooping leaves or floral clusters, possibly wisteria, with some darker, thin lines defining their contours. Towards the center and right, the background imagery becomes even more diffuse, appearing as subtle washes of pale color that hint at distant landscapes or foliage, blending into the aged surface.

metadata.title: 本阿弥光悦書　木版下絵和歌巻断簡|Twelve Poems from the New Collection of Poems Ancient and Modern
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and gold on silk

alt_text: Three figures and a horse in a gold and green landscape with calligraphic text
long_description: The artwork is a rectangular painting set within a larger frame, depicting a stylized landscape with three figures and a horse. The central painted area features a shimmering gold background, suggesting an abstract sky or space, interspersed with undulating, rounded forms in shades of green and dark blue or brown, representing hills or terrain. In the upper left, a figure walks uphill, facing right. This figure wears a dark garment and a dark cap, and carries a large, rectangular, strapped pack on their back. In the lower left, a brown horse stands, facing right, with its head slightly lowered. It has a red and green saddle or blanket on its back. Standing beside the horse, slightly behind it, is another figure wearing a white garment and a dark, tall hat, holding the horse's reins. In the center right, a third figure stands, facing left, appearing to look towards the horse and its attendant. This figure wears an elaborate, dark blue or black patterned robe with wide sleeves and a tall, dark, cylindrical hat. Black calligraphic text is visible in the upper right portion of the gold background, consisting of several vertical lines of characters. The figures and landscape elements are outlined in dark lines, and colors are applied in flat areas.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Poem card (shikishi) mounted as a hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A two-panel screen features ink paintings of a bird on a branch and a seated figure under a tree, on a gold background.
long_description:
A two-panel screen is presented, framed by a dark border with a repeating gold floral pattern. The background of the screen is covered in gold leaf, which appears textured and shows a faint grid-like pattern. Each panel contains a large, light-colored, fan-shaped insert with an ink painting.

The left panel's insert depicts a bird perched on a branch with several large, dark leaves. The bird faces right, its body detailed with dark ink strokes. A faint vertical line of text is visible on the far left side of this insert. The branch extends diagonally upwards from the lower left.

The right panel's insert shows a seated figure, facing left, leaning on a long staff. The figure is positioned under a tree with a gnarled trunk and sparse, dark leaves. Another tree trunk is visible behind the figure. A small, faint square seal is located at the bottom right of this insert. Both ink paintings are rendered in shades of dark gray and black against the light, tan-colored fan shapes.

metadata.title: 曽我二直庵筆　高士・柏鷹図|Daoist Sage and Hawk
metadata.medium: Pair of fan-shaped paintings mounted on two-panel folding screen; ink on paper

alt_text: A panoramic ink wash landscape on a multi-panel screen, featuring misty mountains, a waterfall, buildings, and a boat on water.
long_description: This multi-panel artwork depicts an expansive ink wash landscape in muted tones, primarily grays and light browns, across six vertical panels. On the far left panels, a wide body of water stretches into the distance, with a small, dark boat visible near the center-left. Further left, a solitary dark figure stands on a small, indistinct landmass. The water meets a rugged, misty coastline that recedes into the background. Moving towards the center, towering mountains emerge from a dense layer of mist that fills the valleys. On a distant peak in the upper central area, a multi-tiered pagoda structure with a pointed roof is faintly visible. Below, nestled at the base of a mountain, is a building with a traditional curved roof. The rightmost panels feature a dramatic waterfall cascading down a steep, rocky slope. Clusters of tall, slender trees, resembling pines, grow on the upper right slopes and near the waterfall. Another building with a traditional roof is situated near the base of the waterfall, surrounded by more rugged terrain and misty atmospheric effects. The entire scene conveys a sense of depth and vastness through the use of varying ink washes.

metadata.title: 四季山水図屏風|Landscapes of the Four Seasons
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A robed figure with a wide hat plays a flute while standing on clouds, against a large circular halo and a wavy form
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a central figure rendered in light grays and black outlines on a pale background. The figure, positioned slightly left of center, is depicted from the waist up, standing on a formation of swirling clouds. They wear a wide-brimmed, conical hat and long, flowing robes with wide sleeves, all outlined in dark lines. The figure's hands are raised, holding a long, thin flute horizontally to their mouth. Behind the figure's upper body is a large, light-colored circular shape, resembling a halo or moon. Above this circle, a lighter, wavy, flame-like or cloud-like form extends upwards towards the top of the painting. The lower portion of the figure's robes and the clouds beneath them are rendered with soft, indistinct edges. On the upper right side of the pale background, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text, below which is a small, circular red seal. The painting is framed by a light tan border with a darker, patterned inner border featuring subtle gold-colored motifs.

metadata.title: 狩野探幽筆　笛吹地蔵図|Jizō Bosatsu Playing a Flute
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A person in a house overlooking a misty landscape with mountains, trees, and two deer.
long_description:
A horizontal painting depicts a serene, misty landscape with a muted color palette of warm beige, soft blues, greens, and browns. The upper half and left side of the image are dominated by a hazy, light beige mist. Through this mist, several rounded mountains with soft, undulating peaks are visible in the upper left and center, rendered with washes of muted blue, green, and reddish-brown. A faint, light blue body of water or river curves gently in the mid-left.

In the lower right, a traditional-style building with a gabled, muted brown roof is depicted. The structure is light beige with blue-green accents on its eaves and supports. Inside, a person with dark hair, wearing a long, flowing white robe, sits on a light blue mat, facing towards the left. To the right of the building, a large, gnarled pine tree with dark green needles and a reddish-brown trunk stands, its branches extending over the roof. Below the pine tree, a smaller tree with reddish-orange leaves is visible.

To the left of the building, in the midground, two light brown, deer-like animals with small antlers stand amidst sparse, dark brown and green vegetation. They face towards the left. Numerous small, dark, irregular shapes, possibly birds or fallen leaves, are scattered around them and extend towards the left. The ground in this area is a mix of light beige and soft blue-green washes, suggesting gentle hills or a riverbank.

metadata.title: 石山師香筆  源氏物語八景    絵巻|Eight Views from The Tale of Genji
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A multi-panel screen painting showing a landscape with gold clouds, green mountains, water, bridges, buildings, and small figures
long_description: This six-panel screen painting depicts a sprawling landscape scene dominated by large, undulating gold clouds that separate and frame various elements. The background features dark green mountains and dark blue-black water, with smaller, lighter green hills emerging from the gold clouds in the midground and foreground. In the lower left, a group of small figures stands near a cluster of green pine trees beside the water. Further right, a collection of traditional Japanese-style buildings with gray roofs and light-colored walls is nestled among the gold clouds and sparse trees. One building has a red interior visible. The midground is traversed by two long, light-colored bridges spanning the dark water. The bridge on the left is arched, while the one on the right is flatter. Small boats with figures are visible on the water near the bridges. On the land between the bridges, a group of figures, some in red and white garments, are gathered. More figures are seen walking on paths or near buildings throughout the scene. Towards the upper right, another complex of buildings is visible, with one structure featuring an open interior revealing a white and gray patterned screen. A figure in red walks nearby. The upper left and center show more green mountains and dark water, with a small, dark circular object, possibly the moon, visible in the sky above the mountains in the upper center. The overall impression is a dynamic, layered landscape with human activity integrated into the natural environment.

metadata.title: 平家物語図屏風  「小督」 「大原御幸」|"Kogō" and "The Imperial Procession to Ōhara", from The Tale of the Heike (Heike monogatari)
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, gold and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: Nine ink drawings of seated multi-limbed and multi-headed figures on a scroll, arranged in a grid
long_description: The image displays a vertical scroll with a central rectangular section of light-colored paper, bordered by a wider band of patterned, light brown fabric. The fabric has a repeating floral or geometric motif in a slightly darker shade. Two narrow, light brown fabric straps extend upwards from the top edge of the central paper section. The central paper section features nine individual ink drawings of seated figures, arranged in three rows and three columns. Most figures are enclosed within circular or leaf-shaped outlines. The drawings are rendered in fine black lines. In the top row, from left to right: a figure with multiple arms holding various objects, seated on a lotus base within a circle; a figure with two arms, hands in a gesture, seated on a lotus base within a circle, with faint text to the right; a figure with two heads and multiple arms, seated on a lotus base. In the middle row, from left to right: a figure with a flame-like halo and an object resembling a snake or dragon, seated on a lotus base within a leaf-shaped outline; a central figure with multiple arms holding various objects, seated on a lotus base within a large circle; a figure with a flame-like halo and an object resembling a staff, seated on a lotus base within a leaf-shaped outline. In the bottom row, from left to right: a figure with multiple arms and a multi-headed halo, seated on a lotus base; a figure with two arms holding an object, seated on a lotus base within a circle, with faint text below; a figure with two arms, hands in a gesture, seated on a lotus base. All figures are depicted with elaborate headwear and robes.

metadata.title: 愛染曼荼羅図像 (Aizen mandara zuzō)|Iconographical Drawing of the Mandala of the Wisdom King Aizen
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A seated figure with a halo on a lotus, holding a staff, with text and a smaller staff on a lotus below
long_description: The image is a vertical, hand-painted illustration on a light brown paper background. A central figure is depicted seated in a meditative posture, facing forward. The figure has light skin, a serene expression, and wears elaborate robes in shades of yellow, green, and red, adorned with jewelry. A large, ornate crown sits on the figure's head. Behind the figure's head is a circular halo in green and red, and behind the entire upper body is a larger, light blue oval halo. The figure's right hand holds a long, thin staff with a spear-like tip, which extends upwards. The figure is seated on a large, multi-layered lotus blossom with white petals outlined in black and green accents. Above the figure, to the upper left, are vertical lines of black text: "不畏金剛". To the upper right, also in vertical lines of black text, are the characters: "大精進并". Below the main lotus blossom, a smaller, stylized staff stands upright. This staff has a spear-like tip and a red ribbon tied around its shaft. It is rooted in a small, green, circular base, which rests on another multi-layered lotus blossom, similar in style to the upper one but smaller and with light blue accents. To the left of this lower staff, in vertical black text, are the characters: "種子". To the right of the lower staff, in vertical black text, are the characters: "三昧耶形". The overall palette includes muted tones of yellow, green, red, and blue against the light brown paper.

metadata.title: 大精進菩薩図像　（「金胎仏画帖」より）|Daishōjin Bosatsu, from “Album of Buddhist Deities from the Diamond World and Womb World Mandalas”
metadata.medium: Fragment of an album, mounted as a hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A central seated figure surrounded by a chaotic array of demons, dragons, and human figures, with text below
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal scroll or panel, divided into an upper pictorial section and a lower text section. The upper section depicts a central figure seated in a meditative pose, surrounded by a chaotic array of figures. The central figure, positioned slightly above the horizontal midline, wears a red robe and sits cross-legged on a blue and green lotus-like platform, emanating a golden aura. To the left of the central figure, two standing human-like figures, dressed in elaborate robes of red, blue, and white, are depicted amidst swirling grey and white clouds. Surrounding them and extending further left are numerous grotesque and demonic figures. These figures have varied appearances, including red skin, fangs, horns, and animalistic features, and many wield weapons such as swords and spears. Some figures are depicted as dragons or monstrous beasts, all intertwined with red and orange flames or energy. To the right of the central figure, a similar chaotic scene unfolds. More demonic and monstrous figures, some with red skin and exaggerated features, are shown amidst clouds and flames. A large, dark-skinned figure with a beard and a red robe stands holding a sword, while further right, another figure in a shaggy, brown garment is visible. Dragons and other fantastical creatures with red and orange accents are also present, contributing to the dynamic and aggressive atmosphere surrounding the serene central figure. The lower half of the scroll is filled with multiple columns of vertical text in black ink, written in an East Asian script. The characters are densely packed and exhibit a calligraphic style, varying slightly in size and stroke thickness. Due to the script and resolution, exact transcription of the text is not feasible.

metadata.title: 『過去現在絵因果経』　断簡　（松永本）|Scene from The Illustrated Sutra of Past and Present Karma (Kako genzai e-inga-kyō; Matsunaga Version)
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical painting of a central seated figure surrounded by many smaller figures on a dark background with a decorative border
long_description: The artwork is a tall, rectangular painting, framed by a decorative border. The border features a gold floral pattern on a dark blue ground along the vertical sides, and a gold geometric pattern on a lighter ground along the horizontal top and bottom edges. The painting itself depicts a complex scene with numerous figures against a dark, earthy background that suggests a mountainous or rocky landscape. At the top center, a prominent figure sits cross-legged on a red lotus-like base, wearing a light-colored upper garment and a red lower garment, with a faint halo behind its head. To its left and right, slightly below, are two other seated figures, one on a red cloud-like form and the other on a white, animal-like creature. These figures also have light skin and robes. Surrounding these central figures are several smaller, less distinct figures, some in red or green robes, often enveloped in faint, light-colored wisps. The middle section of the painting is densely populated with many smaller figures, appearing to be monks or ascetics. They are depicted with varying skin tones, some with bald heads, and wearing simple robes in shades of brown, green, and red. They are arranged in clusters, sitting on ledges or within crevices of the dark, rugged landscape. Various objects such as bowls, staffs, and small offerings are visible among them. The figures are depicted in different postures, some in contemplation, others seemingly interacting. Towards the bottom of the painting, the figures become somewhat larger and more clearly defined. On the lower left, a figure in a red robe and a dark, possibly black, hat sits on the ground, holding an object. To its right, another figure in an orange-brown robe sits cross-legged. The overall composition creates a sense of a large gathering of individuals within a natural, layered environment. The colors within the painting are generally muted, with accents of red, white, and gold providing contrast against the dark background.

metadata.title: 釈迦三尊十六羅漢像|Shaka (Shakyamuni), the Historical Buddha, with Two Attendant Bodhisattvas and Sixteen Arhats
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A red-skinned man with a long beard and a child, both holding objects, depicted on a vertical scroll
long_description: The image is a vertical painting on a scroll, featuring two figures against a muted, brownish-gold background. The larger figure, a man, is seated towards the upper center, facing left in profile. He has reddish-brown skin, a long, dark, pointed beard, and long dark hair that falls behind his back. His face shows a prominent nose and a slight smile. He wears a loose robe with wide sleeves, patterned with alternating vertical stripes of dark gray and a lighter, mottled cream or pale green. The dark gray stripes have a subtle pattern of lighter dots. His right hand, covered by a white cloth, holds a dark, ornate, bottle-shaped object with a pointed top. His left hand is mostly obscured by his clothing. His bare feet, also reddish-brown, are visible at the bottom of his robe, resting on a dark, rocky ground. To the right and slightly below the man sits a smaller figure, a child, also with reddish-brown skin. The child faces forward, looking slightly to the left. They have a bald head, large round earrings, and wear a striped skirt with horizontal bands of blue, green, red, and white. The child holds a dark green, textured, melon-like fruit in both hands, presenting it in a small, dark bowl. The background behind the figures is a plain, warm brown, with a faint vertical pattern of thin lines on the left side, suggesting a screen or wall. A small, vertical inscription in dark characters is visible on the upper right side of the background. The scroll is framed by a patterned border of reddish-brown with small, light-colored floral motifs.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A fierce, multi-armed deity with flames, a monk, and a seated figure in a mountainous landscape with trees and water
long_description: The horizontal painting depicts a mountainous landscape with several figures, framed by a gold border with a brown floral pattern. On the far left, a large, multi-armed figure with a fierce expression and red hair stands on a cloud-like form. This figure, dressed in green and white garments, holds a spear in its right hand and a bow in its left, with red flames emanating from its back. Below this figure is a large green pine tree. The background features a body of water with small, tree-covered islands. The right side of the painting shows a series of green and brown mountains and hills. On a prominent rock formation in the mid-right, a figure with long white hair and a golden robe is seated. Below and slightly to the left of this seated figure, a bald man in an orange robe sits on the ground, holding a long, thin staff. In the lower left foreground, a smaller figure in a red garment walks towards the center. Several trees with green foliage are scattered throughout the landscape. Vertical black inscriptions on white rectangular panels are visible near the fierce deity on the left, near the small figure in red in the lower left, and near the seated monk on the right. The characters on these panels are not clearly legible. The overall color palette includes greens, browns, and light blues for the landscape, contrasted with vibrant reds, oranges, and gold for the figures.

metadata.title: 神於寺縁起絵巻断簡|Scene from The Illustrated Legends of Jin’ōji Temple
metadata.medium: Fragment of a handscroll mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a sprawling temple complex in a landscape with mountains and five seated figures.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a detailed landscape with a large temple complex. At the top, against a dark, muted sky, five small, light-colored seated figures are arranged horizontally, with a pale, circular moon positioned below the central figure. Beneath these figures, dark, rounded mountains rise. The middle section of the painting is dominated by an extensive complex of buildings with reddish-brown roofs, surrounded by fields and scattered trees. A prominent path, light in color, originates from the complex and extends downwards through the landscape. The lower portion of the painting continues the landscape, showing more fields, numerous bare trees, some with white accents suggesting snow or blossoms, and small structures, including two torii-like gates. The overall color palette is muted, featuring shades of brown, green, and reddish-brown for the buildings. The painting is framed by a golden border with an intricate, repeating pattern.

metadata.title: 春日宮曼荼羅 (Kasuga miya mandara)|Mandala of Kasuga Shrine
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A deer-like creature stands on clouds below a golden circle containing six seated figures on a dark background.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a large deer-like creature standing on clouds at the bottom, beneath a golden circle containing six seated figures at the top. The background is a dark, muted green or brown. The golden circle, positioned in the upper half of the composition, contains six small, finely detailed figures drawn in black lines. Each figure is seated in a meditative pose, wearing robes, and has a halo around its head. Three figures are in the upper row, and three are in the lower row, with the central figure in the lower row appearing slightly larger. Green foliage emerges from behind the golden circle, extending downwards slightly. The large deer-like creature, rendered in shades of brown with lighter markings, faces left with its head turned slightly upwards. It has prominent antlers and a long, curved tail that resembles a serpent or dragon, ending in a swirl. The creature is adorned with a saddle-like covering in red and blue, and various decorative elements, including small golden or brass-colored ornaments, are attached to its body with red straps. It stands on a formation of light brown, swirling clouds that fill the bottom portion of the painting.

metadata.title: 春日鹿曼荼羅 (Kasuga shika mandara)|Deer Mandala of Kasuga Shrine
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: Three robed figures sit near a building with stairs and trees, alongside a column of text.
long_description: This horizontal ink drawing on aged paper depicts a scene with three figures, architectural elements, and trees, accompanied by a column of text. The artwork is rendered primarily in black ink on a light, sepia-toned background. On the far left, a vertical column of dense Japanese text is written in black characters, occupying approximately one-fifth of the image's width. To the right of the text, the main scene unfolds. Three male figures are seated on the ground, dressed in dark, flowing robes and wearing tall, dark, pointed hats. Two figures are positioned in the lower-left and center-left of the scene, facing towards the right. The third figure is in the lower-right, facing towards the left. Their robes are depicted with solid black areas, contrasting with lighter lines that suggest folds and details. In the upper-left and central portions of the scene, a building structure is visible. It features a multi-tiered roof with decorative edges, a set of stairs with railings leading upwards, and a wall composed of vertical wooden slats. A small, rectangular table with a few indistinct objects rests near the base of the stairs. Two tall, dark, cylindrical posts stand vertically near the building. In the background, particularly towards the right, several trees with intricate, bare branches are drawn. The ground is mostly unadorned, with faint, curved lines suggesting contours or pathways. A light, cloud-like form is faintly visible in the upper-right corner.

metadata.title: 太宰府安楽寺  北野天神縁起絵巻  断簡  (Dazaifu Anrakuji, Kitano Tenjin engi emaki dankan)|Courtiers Visit Sugawara no Michizane’s Mortuary Temple, from Illustrated Legends of the Kitano Tenjin Shrine
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A standing robed figure holding a green object gestures towards a smaller kneeling figure in a framed interior.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts two figures within a framed interior scene, surrounded by dark borders and a decorative top. The central, dominant figure stands tall, facing slightly right, dressed in long white robes with dark trim. This figure has light skin and dark hair, holding a small green spherical object in their left hand while extending their right hand forward. To the right and lower, a smaller figure kneels on a red garment, wearing a green robe. This kneeling figure looks up towards the standing figure. The background behind the figures, within the framed area, is a dark brown. On the left side of this background, a stylized white tree or bush with small white dots is visible, and below it, three small white bird-like shapes. The central scene is enclosed by a light-colored frame featuring a wavy or zigzag pattern. Above and below this central scene are plain, dark rectangular areas. The entire painted area is mounted on a wider reddish-brown scroll border, with a decorative dark pattern at the very top.

metadata.title: 清滝権現像|Seiryū Gongen
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A group of figures with a carriage in a sparse, light-colored landscape, framed by decorative borders
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts a central scene framed by ornate borders. The central image features a light-colored, almost white, ground that extends across the entire width, suggesting a snowy or barren landscape. On the far left, a dark, rectangular carriage or palanquin is visible, surrounded by several figures. These figures are mostly seated or kneeling, wearing dark, pointed hats and light-colored garments. Moving towards the center, a larger group of figures is gathered.
