Some are standing, others are kneeling or sitting, dressed in various garments, some with dark hats. One figure in the central group appears to be holding a long, curved object, possibly a bow or staff. To the right of the figures, the landscape is sparse, featuring several small trees and bushes. Some trees have bare branches, while others display clusters of bright red foliage. A faint area of light green is visible in the upper center background, suggesting distant vegetation. The central scene is bordered at the top and bottom by decorative bands. The top border consists of a light beige or tan section with repeating gold butterfly motifs, followed by a dark green band with intricate gold floral patterns. The bottom border mirrors this design, with a dark green band and gold floral patterns, then a light beige section with gold butterflies, and finally a teal-colored band with gold floral patterns at the very bottom.

metadata.title: 住吉物語絵巻　詞書断簡|The Tale of Sumiyoshi
metadata.medium:
a) Painting section from a handscroll mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and color on paper
b) Calligraphy from handscroll section mounted as a hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Two armored warriors on horseback clash with swords in a dynamic battle scene, rendered in a traditional style
long_description: This painting depicts a fierce battle between two armored warriors on horseback. The composition is dense and dynamic, focusing on the central conflict. On the left, a warrior in elaborate armor, featuring gold, white, and black patterns with red accents, is mounted on a light-colored horse. This warrior wears a helmet and wields a sword, which is raised in a striking motion. Opposite, on the right, another warrior is similarly clad in intricate armor, predominantly red, black, and gold, with a distinct helmet. This warrior also holds a sword, engaged in a parry or counter-strike. A quiver of arrows is visible on the right warrior's back. The brown head and neck of this warrior's horse are visible in the lower right, adorned with red bridle elements. The two warriors are positioned very close, their swords crossing or about to cross, conveying intense combat. The background features areas of muted red and gray in the upper portion, suggesting a turbulent sky or banners, while a strip of green along the bottom edge indicates ground or foliage. The overall palette includes rich reds, golds, blacks, whites, and browns, with touches of blue and green, set against a lighter, somewhat faded background.

metadata.title: 六波羅合戦　平治物語絵巻　断簡|Battle at Rokuhara, from The Tale of the Heiji Rebellion
metadata.medium: Fragment of a handscroll mounted as a hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A small bird perches on a dark rock next to bare tree branches, with calligraphic text above on a scroll
long_description: This vertical scroll features a central painted area framed by decorative borders. The main painting is rendered in dark gray or black ink on a light brown, parchment-like background. At the top right, several columns of vertical calligraphic text are visible. The rightmost column reads "枯木三枝枝", followed by "鶴領小鶯此皆", then "石中之尺壁", and "何時攀心用". A shorter, leftmost column begins with "不". Below the text, two slender, bare branches extend upwards from the lower left, reaching about two-thirds of the way up the composition. These branches have small, short twigs. In the lower center, a small bird with a long tail perches on a dark, rounded rock formation. The bird faces towards the right, with its head slightly turned. The rock has a textured appearance, suggesting an uneven surface. The central painted area is bordered by a narrow band of dark blue with a subtle, repeating pattern, which is then surrounded by a wider, golden-brown border with a woven or textured pattern. The overall impression is of a minimalist ink painting.

metadata.title: 伝太虚元寿筆　岩に鶺鴒図|Wagtail on a Rock
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of tall grasses and bamboo growing around a large rock, with calligraphy and a red seal above
long_description: A vertical ink painting on a light brown-grey ground, framed by a patterned border. The artwork is rendered in various shades of black and grey ink. In the upper left quadrant, there is a block of vertical calligraphy. From right to left, the first line reads "楚江一千里一曲", the second line reads "不盡間不盡國", and the third line reads "二月". To the left of this main block, there is a smaller, less distinct vertical inscription. Below these inscriptions, a square red seal is visible. The lower two-thirds of the painting depict a natural scene. A large, dark grey rock with textured washes dominates the lower left-center. To its immediate left, a cluster of thin, upright bamboo-like stalks with pointed leaves emerges from behind the rock. To the right of the large rock, a dense group of tall, slender grasses or orchid-like plants with long, arching leaves extends upwards and to the right. Some of these plants feature small, delicate blossoms or seed pods along their stems. Several smaller, dark grey rocks are positioned at the base of the main rock and to its right. The ground beneath the plants and rocks is depicted with light grey washes, creating a subtle base for the composition. The background is a plain, light brown-grey, providing a neutral setting for the monochromatic ink elements.

metadata.title: 鉄舟徳済筆   蘭竹石図|Orchids, Bamboo, Briars, and Rocks
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A figure with very long black hair and layered white robes sits on a light background with calligraphy and decorative borders.
long_description: The artwork features a central figure on a light beige background, framed by decorative borders. The figure, seen from the back and slightly to the left, has very long, straight black hair that extends from the head down the back and spreads across the ground. The person wears voluminous, layered white garments, with visible red trim on the sleeves and a hint of green fabric beneath the white layers. The body's posture suggests a seated or reclining position, with the clothing and hair forming soft folds around the figure. To the right of the figure, several columns of vertical text are written in black ink, with some smaller red characters interspersed. The main background is a plain, light beige. The top and bottom edges of the central image area are bordered by a horizontal band of teal blue, adorned with repeating gold patterns. The left and right sides of the entire composition are framed by a wider, light gold fabric with a subtle floral or leaf pattern.

metadata.title: 小大君 「藤房本　三十六歌仙絵巻」　断簡|The Poet Koōgimi, from the “Fujifusa Version” of Thirty-six Poetic Immortals (Fujifusa-bon Sanjūrokkasen emaki)l
metadata.medium: Handscroll fragment mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A large central seated figure surrounded by numerous smaller figures in a multi-bordered, green and dark blue painting
long_description: This vertical rectangular painting features a highly structured composition centered around a large, light-skinned figure. The central figure is depicted seated in a meditative pose on a multi-layered lotus throne, with a prominent halo behind its head and shoulders. It wears flowing robes in shades of red, green, and gold. Flanking this central figure are two smaller, standing figures, each with a halo, dressed in similar ornate attire. This central trio is set against a dark blue background adorned with a repeating pattern of light-colored dots. Surrounding this central blue panel is a wide border filled with numerous smaller standing figures, arranged in multiple rows and columns against a vibrant green background. These figures are depicted in various poses, wearing colorful robes with gold accents. Beyond this green border, a narrower, reddish-brown band contains even smaller figures, some appearing to be in procession or engaged in dynamic actions. The outermost edges of the painting are a dark, muted green-brown, with faint, swirling, lighter forms visible in the upper corners, resembling clouds or stylized creatures. The entire artwork is characterized by its intricate detail and a palette dominated by greens, blues, reds, and gold.

metadata.title: 般若菩薩曼荼羅図|Mandala of the Bodhisattva Hannya (Prajnaparamita)
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, gold, and gold foil on silk

alt_text: Three birds, likely geese, stand and forage in a sparse natural setting on a vertical scroll painting
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features three birds, likely geese, rendered in dark ink wash on a light, aged background. The central painted area is framed by decorative fabric borders. Two birds are positioned in the lower-left quadrant, standing upright with their long necks extended upwards, their beaks slightly open. Their bodies are depicted with textured dark ink, suggesting feathers, and they have visible webbed feet. To the right and slightly lower, a third bird is shown facing right, its head down as if foraging or resting. Its body is also rendered with dark ink, showing feather details. Above and to the left of the birds, several thin, dark lines extend upwards, suggesting sparse reeds or tall grasses. The ground beneath the birds is depicted with subtle ink washes, creating a slightly uneven surface with a few darker, amorphous shapes that could represent rocks or clumps of earth. The background of the central painting is a uniform light tan or beige. The decorative borders on the left and right sides feature a repeating pattern of stylized floral or cloud motifs in muted gold-brown and grey-blue tones. The top and bottom borders are lighter, with smaller, scattered gold patterns.

metadata.title: 蘆雁図|Geese and Reeds
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A small figure rides a dark water buffalo under a gnarled tree branch, with vertical calligraphy.
long_description: This vertical scroll painting features a muted brownish-tan background with decorative green and gold patterned borders at the top and bottom. In the upper right quadrant, several vertical lines of black calligraphic text are visible. Extending from the mid-left edge, a dark, gnarled tree branch with sparse, dark leaves curves downwards and towards the center of the composition. In the lower left, a small, dark, rocky mound with some sparse, dark vegetation rises slightly. The main subject, a dark-colored water buffalo with prominent, curved horns, walks across the lower part of the scene, facing towards the left. A small, light-skinned figure, likely a child, sits on the buffalo's back, facing forward and holding a thin, dark stick in their right hand, pointing it towards the buffalo's head. The ground beneath the buffalo is a lighter shade of the background, with scattered dark specks suggesting uneven terrain. The overall color palette is subdued, dominated by browns, tans, and dark grays or blacks.

metadata.title: 元　佚名　牧牛圖　軸|Ox and Herdsman
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting of a person on a donkey, with distant mountains and trees above
long_description: This vertical artwork features an ink wash painting on a light brown, aged paper, framed by decorative borders. The upper third of the central image depicts a distant mountain range rendered with broad, sweeping strokes of dark ink, suggesting a misty or cloud-shrouded peak. A cluster of dark, vertical lines represents a few trees atop the mountain. Faint, dark calligraphy is visible in the upper left portion of this mountain scene. The lower two-thirds of the central image are dominated by a figure riding a donkey. The figure wears a wide-brimmed hat and flowing garments, depicted with dark ink outlines and lighter washes. The donkey is shown in profile, facing right, with its legs bent as if in motion. Its form is also rendered with dark ink. The ground beneath the donkey is indicated by subtle, horizontal ink strokes. To the left of the rider, a faint square seal or mark is visible. The overall composition is sparse, with significant empty space around the subjects. The central painting is bordered by a narrow, light gold strip adorned with a subtle floral pattern. This is enclosed by a wider, teal-colored border featuring a repeating geometric pattern of interconnected shapes. The outermost edges of the image are black.

metadata.title: 朴堂祖淳筆　蘇軾騎驢図|Su Shi Riding a Donkey
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and gold on paper

alt_text: A fan painting depicts a dragon amidst a misty mountain landscape, mounted on a scroll
long_description: A fan-shaped painting is centered on a light beige background, which is framed by decorative borders. The side borders are a textured gold with a subtle pattern, while the top and bottom borders are dark blue with a repeating gold cloud motif. The fan painting itself is a wide semicircle, with its curved edge at the bottom. The surface of the fan is a faded golden-brown, showing faint vertical lines that suggest the pleats of a folded fan. The artwork within the fan depicts a landscape scene rendered in dark grays, blacks, and browns, with some lighter areas suggesting mist or sky. In the upper left, dark, jagged forms represent mountains or peaks. Emerging from a swirling, misty area in the center is a long, serpentine creature, likely a dragon, with a dark body, a lighter underside, and small, clawed limbs. Its head is positioned towards the left, and its body curves gracefully across the middle of the fan, disappearing into the mist towards the right. The lower portion of the fan shows dark, indistinct landforms or rocks, with subtle reddish-brown accents in the lower right quadrant. The overall impression is an ink wash painting style, with soft transitions between tones.

metadata.title: 牧童図扇面|Herd Boy with Ox
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and gold on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a hanging vine with dark leaves and a light-colored gourd on a light brown background
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a hanging vine with leaves and a gourd rendered in ink wash on a light brown paper background. The central painting is framed by a narrow gold and green patterned border, which is then surrounded by a wider blue fabric border with a repeating geometric pattern. The vine originates from the top left of the central painting, with a dense cluster of dark gray leaves and thin, dark tendrils. Below this, a prominent, elongated, light-colored object, resembling a gourd, hangs from a tendril in the upper-middle section of the composition. This object has darker outlines and subtle internal markings, suggesting a ribbed texture. Further down, the vine continues with more sparse, dark gray leaves and long, delicate tendrils that extend downwards and slightly to the sides. The ink tones range from very dark black for the tendrils to lighter gray washes for the leaves and the gourd's details. The background of the painting is a uniform, light brown or tan. In the bottom right corner of the central painting, there is a square red seal with several illegible characters.

metadata.title: 墨林愚庵筆  葡萄蝉図|Cicada on a Grapevine
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Two birds fly above red and white flowering plants with distant mountains in a vertical composition
long_description:
The painting is vertically oriented with a light, muted tan background. In the upper half, two birds are depicted in flight. The upper bird is slightly larger and positioned higher, with its head facing right and wings spread. Its plumage is a mix of light brown, tan, and darker brown on the wings. A second, slightly smaller bird is positioned below and to the left of the first, also in flight with wings spread, facing left. Its coloring is similar. Below the birds, in the mid-ground, are several pointed mountain peaks rendered in a soft, light blue-green hue, receding into the distance.
The lower half of the painting is dominated by a dense cluster of flowering plants. A tall stalk of what appears to be hollyhocks rises from the bottom right, featuring numerous roundish green leaves and both red and white blossoms. The red flowers are open and bell-shaped, while the white ones are more clustered. To the left of the hollyhocks, long, slender green leaves extend upwards, interspersed with a few peach or light orange-colored lily-like flowers with prominent stamens. At the very bottom left, a dark, textured patch of ground is visible, suggesting a slight incline. The overall composition places the birds in the open sky above the flora and distant landscape.

metadata.title: 式部輝忠筆　夏秋花鳥図|Birds and Flowers of Summer and Autumn
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A bicolored animal looks up at a bird perched on a drooping branch, with red flowers on the right
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a bicolored animal and a bird amidst flora on a light brown background, framed by a gold patterned border. In the lower center, a medium-sized animal, possibly a weasel or ferret, sits on its haunches, facing left with its head turned upwards. Its fur is dark brown or black on its back, legs, and long bushy tail, contrasting with a white chest, neck, and face. Its eyes are light-colored. In the upper left, a small bird with dark and light plumage is perched on a thin, drooping branch that extends downwards from the top edge. On the right side, a tree trunk rises vertically, with several branches extending horizontally. These branches bear numerous green leaves and several red, multi-petaled flowers, some fully open and some still in bud form. At the bottom of the painting, sparse tufts of green grass are visible on the light brown ground.

metadata.title: 右都御史筆　麝香猫図|Musk Cat
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting on multiple panels depicts misty mountains, pine trees, water, and distant buildings with small figures.
long_description: This six-panel ink wash painting depicts a vast, misty landscape rendered in shades of black and gray on a light, aged paper ground. The composition flows continuously across the panels, creating a panoramic view. On the far left, faint, undulating mountain ranges emerge from a dense mist that fills the middle ground, suggesting great distance. Below these, a calm body of water or low-lying fog stretches across the lower left, with small, dark clusters of trees dotting its edges or small islands. Moving towards the center, more defined, craggy mountains rise prominently. A large, ancient-looking pine tree with dark, sprawling branches grows from a rocky formation in the lower-center foreground, its roots gripping the dark rocks. Smaller, slender trees are scattered around the base of these central mountains and along the water's edge. The right side of the painting features a dramatic mountainous terrain. Tall, pointed peaks dominate the upper right, with several small, dark architectural structures, resembling temples or pavilions, nestled on their slopes and summits. One structure is perched high on a prominent peak, while another is situated lower, connected by a winding path. Small, dark figures, appearing to be travelers, are depicted on this path in the lower right, ascending towards the buildings. A faint waterfall or stream descends from the mountains on the far right. The background mountains on the right are lighter, indicating atmospheric perspective. In the upper right corner, a vertical column of faint, dark characters is visible.

metadata.title: 伝天章周文筆 　山水図屏風|Mountain Landscape
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two scrolls depict a misty landscape with mountains, buildings, trees, and small figures on light-toned paper
long_description:
Two vertical scrolls, side-by-side, display a monochromatic landscape painting in ink wash on light, warm-toned paper. Each scroll has a dark blue border with gold patterns at the top and bottom, and a light brown border with subtle gold patterns on the sides.

The left scroll features towering, jagged mountains in the upper half, rendered with light ink washes that suggest mist. A multi-tiered building with a dark roof is nestled among dark evergreen trees in the mid-ground, to the left of center. Below this, a steep cliff face drops to a lower area. In the foreground, a gnarled, leafless tree with drooping branches stands on the right, next to a smaller, leafy tree. Several tiny figures are visible: some ascending mountain paths, one riding an animal (possibly an ox) in the lower right, and others near the cliff base.

The right scroll also depicts mountains in the background, less prominent and more shrouded in mist. A large, dark, vertical cliff face dominates the right side, extending from top to bottom. In the mid-ground, a multi-tiered building with a dark roof sits on a bridge-like structure spanning over water or a valley. A faint circular shape, possibly a moon, is visible in the sky above this building. Small figures are seen on paths along the base of the cliff and near the water's edge. The overall palette uses shades of gray and black ink, creating a sense of depth and atmospheric perspective.

metadata.title: 鑑貞筆　瀟湘八景中の二景図|Two Views from the Eight Views of the Xiao and Xiang Rivers
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash landscape painting featuring a misty mountain, a gnarled tree, and a small bridge.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a minimalist landscape on a light brown-tan background. The upper half of the composition is largely open, with a faint, pointed mountain peak emerging from a soft, misty background in the upper right quadrant. Below the mountain, a prominent, dark, gnarled tree or cluster of trees dominates the left-center, rendered with expressive, dark ink strokes that contrast with the lighter, diffused washes suggesting mist or clouds around its base. To the right of the main tree, lighter ink washes hint at distant hills or structures. In the lower third of the painting, a small, simple bridge with two posts spans a light, misty area, possibly water or a valley. A faint, small structure, perhaps a hut, is visible to the right of the bridge. A square red seal is present in the bottom right corner. The top and bottom edges of the artwork are framed by decorative bands featuring a repeating geometric pattern of interconnected circles or quatrefoils in dark brown, gold, and muted red.

metadata.title: 牧松周省筆   破墨山水図|Splashed-Ink Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a landscape with buildings on a steep cliff, mountains, water, and small figures
long_description: This ink wash painting, rendered in shades of black and gray on a light brown ground, depicts a vast landscape framed by a gold border. A prominent, steep, dark gray cliff rises from the lower center, dominating the composition. Perched on its summit and various ledges are several multi-tiered buildings with dark, angular roofs, surrounded by sparse pine trees. A winding path with small figures traverses the base of this central cliff. To the left and behind the main cliff, smaller, jagged peaks emerge from a misty haze, while faint, undulating mountain ranges recede into the distant background on the right. The lower half of the painting is occupied by a calm body of water. Several small boats are visible on the water; one in the lower center contains multiple figures, some appearing to be rowing or engaged in an activity. Another boat is further to the right. On the right bank of the water, a cluster of dark, leafy trees stands next to a small building with a dark roof. Additional small figures are scattered along the water's edge and on paths. On the far left side of the painting, vertically oriented characters are visible, reading "龍舟競渡" followed by smaller, less distinct characters below. The brushwork varies from bold, dark strokes for the cliffs and trees to lighter, softer washes for the distant mountains and mist.

metadata.title: 雪村周継筆　山水図|Landscape with Rocky Precipice
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A group of figures under tall bamboo trees, some playing music, others dancing and gesturing.
long_description: This vertical artwork depicts a gathering of figures beneath tall bamboo trees, rendered in muted tones of brown, beige, and black ink on a light brown ground. The composition is dominated by two large bamboo trees on the left and center, their slender trunks and delicate leaves extending upwards. Below these trees, a group of approximately ten figures is arranged. On the far left, several figures are seated or standing, including one playing a stringed instrument and another holding a fan. Small figures, possibly children, are visible behind them. In the center and right, other figures are engaged in more dynamic activities. One figure in the center right points with an outstretched arm, while another below them is captured in a lively, dancing pose with one leg raised. Further to the right, another figure is seated or kneeling, also gesturing. In the background on the right, a low, horizontal fence made of vertical slats is visible, with faint outlines of structures or buildings beyond it. The ground is a simple, unadorned beige, with subtle darker ink washes at the bottom suggesting terrain.

metadata.title: 雪村周継筆　竹林七聖図|Seven Sages of the Bamboo Grove
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A landscape painting featuring a large pine tree, mountains, a seated figure, and two approaching figures
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll-like painting rendered primarily in shades of black, gray, and brown ink on a light brown paper or silk ground. The composition features a mountainous landscape with three human figures. In the upper half, a large, gnarled pine tree with dense, dark needles extends from the upper right, its branches reaching towards the center and left. Behind the tree, on the right, are steep, rocky cliffs depicted with dark ink washes and sharp, textured lines. To the left of the tree, lighter, more distant mountains or hills recede into a misty background, created with softer washes.In the middle ground, beneath the large pine tree and slightly to the right of the center, a figure is seated on a low, rectangular platform. This figure, appearing as a man with a beard, wears light-colored robes and faces towards the left. The platform is supported by two short, sturdy legs. The ground around this seated figure is relatively flat and open, with sparse vegetation indicated by small dots and light washes. To the left of the seated figure, two other figures are depicted on a slightly elevated patch of ground. The leading figure wears light robes and appears to be looking towards the seated figure. The figure behind wears darker, possibly reddish-brown clothing and carries a long staff over their shoulder. In the foreground, at the bottom, are more rocky outcrops and small patches of vegetation, rendered with darker ink, contributing to the sense of depth. The painting utilizes varying ink washes to create atmospheric perspective, with distant elements appearing lighter and less defined.

metadata.title: 狩野元信周辺　伯牙鍾子期図|Bo Ya Plays the Qin as Zhong Ziqi Listens
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two pheasants on rocks by water under a flowering tree, depicted in a vertical scroll painting
long_description: A vertical painting depicts two pheasants on rocks beside a body of water, beneath a flowering tree. The background is a light, neutral tone. A tree branch extends from the upper left, curving across the top half of the painting. It has dark brown bark and numerous green leaves, some with lighter undersides. Clusters of small, white or pale pink flowers bloom along the branches. Some small, reddish-brown fruits or buds are also visible. Below the tree, two pheasants are perched on dark gray and brown rocks. The pheasant on the left is mostly light brown with darker speckles and a long, reddish-brown tail. The pheasant on the right has a prominent red chest and neck, with a speckled brown and blue-gray back, and a long, reddish-brown tail. Both birds face right, looking towards the water. To the right of the pheasants and rocks, a body of water is depicted with light blue and white wavy lines, suggesting movement or ripples. Further to the right, another small, dark rock formation emerges from the water, topped with a few green leaves. The rocks and water extend to the bottom edge of the central painted area. A few sparse blades of green grass are visible near the water's edge. The central painting is framed by a gold-colored border with a subtle, repeating patterned motif.

metadata.title: 狩野松栄筆   四季花鳥図|Pheasants among Trees: Flowers of the Four Seasons
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A bald figure in a robe rides a donkey, holding a staff, with calligraphy in the upper section
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on a light, off-white ground depicts a figure riding a donkey, with calligraphy in the upper section. In the lower half of the composition, a bald figure, dressed in a light-colored robe, sits astride a donkey. The figure holds a long, thin staff in their right hand, angled upwards and to the left. From a branch carried on the figure's back, two small, round gourds hang. The donkey, rendered in varying shades of gray and black ink, faces right with its head slightly lowered, wearing a simple bridle. Its legs are depicted in motion, suggesting it is walking. Above the figure and donkey, in the upper left quadrant, is a block of black ink calligraphy in an East Asian script, arranged in vertical columns. Below and to the left of this main block of text is a smaller red seal, followed by more black ink calligraphy in a similar script. The background is largely unadorned, with very faint, subtle gray washes in the upper-middle area, suggesting a distant, hazy landscape or clouds. The painting is bordered by a narrow, light green strip with a subtle patterned design, followed by a wider, textured gold-brown outer frame.

metadata.title: 狩野内膳筆  沢庵宗彭賛  政黄牛・郁山主図|Zheng Huangniu and Yushanzhu
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink on paper

alt_text: A wide, monochrome landscape painting on a multi-panel screen, showing mountains, water, villages, and temples.
long_description: The image is a wide, horizontal monochrome ink wash landscape painting on a multi-panel screen, rendered in shades of dark grey and black ink on a light brown background. The composition spans from left to right, depicting a vast natural scene with elements of human habitation. On the far left, a wide expanse of water extends towards a distant, low mountain range. A small flock of birds flies in the upper left sky. Closer to the foreground, a village with several two-story houses is situated along the water's edge, with a few small boats, some with figures, visible on the water. In the central portion, a tall, rugged mountain rises prominently, its peaks and slopes densely covered with trees. More houses and smaller structures are nestled at the base of this mountain and along the water. The right side of the painting is dominated by a large, sloping mountain range that recedes into the background. Several multi-tiered, temple-like buildings with distinctive roofs are visible on the lower and middle slopes, surrounded by trees. Small, indistinct figures can be seen on the highest, most distant peaks of these mountains. The overall scene conveys a serene and expansive natural environment with scattered human presence.

metadata.title: 雲谷等顔筆   四季山水図屏風|Landscape of the Four Seasons
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, and gold dust on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel screen depicts a landscape with dark, stylized trees, a diagonal bridge, and a dark orb against a gold background
long_description: The artwork is a multi-panel screen, primarily featuring a landscape rendered in gold and dark tones. The background is a shimmering gold, textured with small, irregular dots that create a sense of depth and light. Dark, undulating shapes, resembling clouds or mist, are present across the upper portion of the screen, extending downwards in places. On the left, a slender, dark tree with weeping branches rises from the bottom edge, its silhouette stark against the gold. A diagonal bridge with two parallel railings extends from the lower left towards the upper right, crossing the middle panels. It is rendered in dark tones with lighter lines for the railings. In the upper right, a dark, reddish-brown orb, possibly a moon, is partially visible behind a dark cloud-like form. On the far right, a large, gnarled tree with a thick trunk and sweeping branches dominates the panel, also depicted in dark tones against the gold. Dark, rounded forms at the bottom suggest ground or water features, completing the stylized landscape.

metadata.title: 柳橋水車図屏風|Willows and Bridge
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, copper, gold, and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel screen painting depicting a narrative scene with boats, figures, buildings, and trees, partially obscured by gold clouds.
long_description: The multi-panel screen painting features a complex narrative scene rendered in a traditional style, with large areas of shimmering gold clouds obscuring parts of the composition. The background is predominantly dark, almost black, with areas of deep green for hills and dark green foliage for trees. On the far left, a large, ornate boat with a red-roofed pavilion is visible, carrying several figures dressed in colorful robes. Below this, another boat, also adorned, carries more figures, some appearing to play instruments. These boats are situated on a dark body of water, flanked by a prominent green hill on the left. Moving towards the center, the scene opens up to reveal a landscape with dark trees and a group of figures in elaborate, winged costumes, possibly performing a dance or ritual, on a dark ground. Above them, a building with an open interior shows several figures seated. On the right side of the screen, multiple architectural structures are depicted. These buildings have open rooms, allowing views of figures seated or reclining within. The structures are rendered with a sense of depth, showing interior spaces and connecting pathways. Throughout the entire composition, large, irregularly shaped gold clouds float, creating a sense of depth and selectively revealing different parts of the narrative. The overall color palette includes gold, dark green, black, and various muted colors for the figures' attire and building details.

metadata.title: 源氏物語図屏風 (胡蝶)|“Butterflies”
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink, color, gold, and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: A traditional painting depicts several figures in a palace interior with golden clouds and outdoor scenes
long_description: The image is a traditional painting featuring a palace interior partially obscured by golden clouds, with outdoor scenes visible on the right and bottom. The upper left and right corners, and the bottom edge, are dominated by textured golden clouds that appear to float over the scene. In the center, a male figure sits upright on a green floor, facing slightly left. He wears an elaborate white robe with circular patterns and a black cap. To his left, a female figure reclines on a red patterned mat, her long black hair flowing, wearing a white robe with red and black patterns. Below the central male figure, three more female figures are seated or reclining on the green floor. The leftmost woman sits with her back to the viewer, wearing a patterned robe. Next to her, a woman in an orange robe also sits with her back to the viewer, facing a low, dark box containing patterned fabrics. To her right, another woman sits facing right, wearing a light green robe, with long black hair. Further right, a fourth female figure reclines on a red patterned surface. The interior space is defined by green floors and light-colored architectural elements, including screens and railings. Beyond the interior, on the upper right, a dark blue body of water with white birds is visible, partially covered by golden clouds. On the lower right, green pine trees and bamboo shoots are depicted against a golden background, framed by architectural structures. The perspective is elevated, looking down into the scene.

metadata.title: 源氏物語画帖「玉鬘」|“A Lovely Garland” (Tamakazura), from The Tale of Genji
metadata.artist: Tosa Mitsuyoshi 土佐光吉|Konoe Sakihisa 近衛前久
metadata.medium: Album leaves mounted as a pair of hanging scrolls; ink, gold, silver, and color on paper

alt_text: A horizontally oriented paper with black calligraphy and faint brown shapes, mounted on a striped fabric with a decorative border.
long_description: The artwork features a rectangular piece of light beige paper, horizontally oriented, centered within a larger mounting. On the paper, black ink calligraphy is arranged in vertical columns. The most prominent calligraphy is on the right and center, written in a bold, fluid style. Fainter, irregular light brown shapes, resembling large leaves or clouds, are visible behind the calligraphy, primarily on the right and extending towards the center. On the far left of the paper, a diagonal light brown line runs from the top left towards the bottom center, with smaller, more delicate calligraphy written to its right. The central paper is framed by a decorative border approximately one inch wide, featuring gold, light green, and brown patterns of vines or small flowers. This border is set against an outer mounting of vertically striped fabric, with alternating wider light brown and narrower dark brown stripes.

metadata.title: 本阿弥光悦書・俵屋宗達下絵　小倉百人一首和歌巻断簡|Two Poems from One Hundred Poems by One Hundred Poets
metadata.medium: Section of handscroll mounted as a hanging scrolll; ink, silver, and gold on paper

alt_text: A long, horizontal painting depicts a bustling outdoor scene with buildings, a large tree, and many figures.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal painting, divided into six vertical panels by gold borders, depicting an expansive outdoor scene with numerous figures, buildings, and trees. The color palette is predominantly muted, featuring shades of brown, gray, and beige, with subtle accents of red, blue, and black. Starting from the left, a building with a dark, sloped roof and light-colored walls is visible. Several figures, some wearing large, round hats or holding umbrellas, are gathered near its entrance. A long, light-colored wall extends horizontally across the middle ground, separating the foreground activities from the background structures. In the central panels, a prominent, gnarled tree with a thick trunk and sparse, dark foliage stands in the foreground. Behind the wall, more buildings with similar dark roofs and light walls are visible. A large group of figures, dressed in various garments with hints of red and blue, are scattered across the scene, appearing to be engaged in different activities. Some figures are seated, while others stand or move. Towards the right, the landscape opens up. A large, weeping tree with delicate branches hangs over a body of water or a misty, distant landscape. In the foreground of this section, several figures are depicted, some carrying large, round hats or umbrellas, and one appears to be sweeping with a long broom-like object. Sparse, dark vegetation dots the ground in the foreground. The sky above is a light, hazy gray.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two vertical scroll paintings depicting fish in water, with maple leaves on the left and flowers on a rock on the right
long_description: Two vertical scroll paintings are displayed side-by-side against a dark background. Each scroll features a light beige top and bottom section, with a patterned brown border framing a central painted area. The painted areas are also a light beige color. The left scroll depicts a branch with several red and orange maple leaves extending from the upper left corner. Below, three fish with dark backs and lighter undersides swim in light blue-green water, indicated by wavy lines. Small, dark calligraphic text and two red seals are visible in the lower left of the painted section. The right scroll shows a brown rock formation in the mid-right, from which a plant with light pink and white flowers and green leaves grows. Below the rock, three fish, similar in appearance to those on the left, swim in light blue-green water. Small, dark calligraphic text and two red seals are visible in the lower right of this painted section. Both scrolls have light-colored wooden rollers at the bottom and metal hangers at the top.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink, gold, and color on silk

alt_text: Two vertical scroll paintings show women in traditional attire, one standing by flowers, one seated at a rock table
long_description: Two vertical scroll paintings are displayed side-by-side against a dark background. Each scroll features a light brown-tan central panel bordered by a light olive-green fabric, topped with a wider beige section from which two gold-colored, tassel-like elements hang. The bottom of each scroll has a light beige section with a visible roller.The left scroll depicts a standing woman, positioned slightly right of center, looking downwards. She wears a long, flowing robe primarily in shades of teal and dark green, with white sleeves and a white undergarment visible at the bottom. Her dark hair is styled upwards. To her right, at the bottom, is a bush with several light pink, open flowers and green leaves. Small red text is visible in the bottom right corner.The right scroll shows a seated woman, positioned slightly left of center, with her right arm resting on a dark, irregularly shaped rock formation that serves as a table. She wears a long, flowing robe in shades of yellow, green, and blue, with white sleeves and a white undergarment. Her dark hair is styled upwards. On the rock table in front of her are several small items, including a brush, an inkstone, a small dish, and a white fan. To her right, on the ground, is a potted plant with tall, slender green leaves. Small red text is visible in the bottom right corner.

metadata.title: 源琦筆　燕姞・楊貴妃図|Yanji with Orchids and Yang Guifei with Peonies
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting of figures carrying bundles through hills and trees.
long_description: A wide, multi-panel ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape with rolling hills, trees, and several figures. The color palette is dominated by shades of gray and black ink, with subtle washes of light brown and green on the hills and foliage, against a pale, unpainted background that suggests sky or mist. From left to right, the scene unfolds with gentle, undulating hills covered in textured, dark green foliage, receding into the distance. In the central panels, two figures walk uphill from left to right. They wear simple, light-colored garments and carry large, dark, rectangular bundles on their backs. The ground beneath them is light, dotted with patches of darker foliage. To the right, a cluster of tall, slender trees with reddish-brown trunks and dark green, dense foliage stands prominently. Another figure, also appearing to carry a bundle, is visible among these trees, partially obscured by the landscape. More hills recede into the background on the right. In the upper right corner, a small, vertical red seal with black characters is visible.

metadata.title: 松村呉春筆    山樵漁夫図屏風|Woodcutters and Fishermen
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical painting depicts a gnarled tree covered in countless white blossoms against a dark, muted background.
long_description: The vertical painting features a large, gnarled tree densely covered in white blossoms, set against a dark, muted gray-brown background. The tree's thick, dark branches originate from the lower left and right, extending upwards and across the entire composition, intertwining to fill the space. The branches exhibit a textured appearance, with subtle variations in tone that suggest their aged and rugged form. Thousands of small, white blossoms, each with a tiny yellow center, are clustered along the branches, creating a striking contrast with the dark wood and background. The blossoms are so numerous that they form a continuous, cloud-like mass. In the upper right quadrant, a faint, lighter circular shape is visible through the branches and blossoms. On the right side of the painting, approximately midway down, there are several vertical lines of dark text, beneath which a square red seal is prominently placed. The painting is framed by a blue border with a subtle, repeating pattern.

metadata.title: 伊藤若冲筆　月下白梅図|White Plum Blossoms and Moon
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink painting on a vertical scroll depicts two white cranes, one resting with its head tucked, the other looking down.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features two large white cranes against a muted, light beige background. The scroll has dark, patterned fabric borders at the top and bottom. The two cranes are positioned in the lower half of the composition, standing on a subtly defined, light-colored ground line that curves gently. The crane on the left is larger and stands with its head tucked into its back, appearing to rest or sleep. Its body is a rounded mass of white, with dark black feathers visible on its folded wing. Its long, slender legs are dark and textured. The crane on the right stands slightly behind and to the right of the first, with its head lowered and beak pointing towards the ground. Its body is also predominantly white with black feathers on its wing, and its legs are similar to the first crane's. In the upper right quadrant, there is vertical text written in dark ink, followed by a red square seal below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a fantastical mountainous landscape with a bridge, waterfalls, and flying creatures
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink wash painting, predominantly in shades of gray, black, and sepia, with a light beige background. It depicts a dramatic, fantastical mountainous landscape. At the top, a delicate arched bridge spans a vast chasm, connecting two towering, jagged peaks. Small, indistinct figures appear to be on or near the bridge. Below the bridge, on the right side, a large, craggy mountain face descends steeply, covered in swirling clouds and dense, textured forms that resemble foliage or rock formations. Several mythical, winged creatures, resembling lions or dogs, are depicted in various poses, some flying through the air, others perched on ledges. On the left side, sheer cliff faces drop into a misty abyss, with multiple waterfalls cascading down. Clouds and mist fill the mid-ground, obscuring parts of the lower landscape. Towards the bottom, more turbulent water and cloud formations are visible, with additional flying creatures. The overall composition emphasizes height and depth, with a dynamic interplay of solid rock, flowing water, and ethereal mist. Calligraphy and red seals are visible in the upper right portion of the painting.

metadata.title: 曽我蕭白筆　峨山南宗賛　天台山石橋図|Lions at the Stone Bridge of Mount Tiantai
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Two vertical hanging scrolls, one depicting various flowers and grasses, the other a flowering branch
long_description: Two vertical hanging scrolls are presented against a dark, plain background. Each scroll features a light beige border with a subtle, repeating pattern of small, light-colored shapes. The central panel of each scroll is a light brown or tan color, resembling aged paper or silk. The scroll on the left displays a vertical arrangement of various plants and flowers. In the upper section, dark green leaves are visible alongside clusters of red and white flowers, possibly chrysanthemums. Below these, more dark green foliage appears. The lower section of this panel features tall, thin green grasses, small white flowers, and a few blue flowers. The scroll on the right showcases a dark, gnarled branch extending diagonally from the lower left towards the upper right. This branch is adorned with numerous small white flowers, each with a dark center, and a few small green leaves. Both central panels have a small, dark, rectangular element near their top, which is not legible.

metadata.title: 尾形光琳筆　梅花・秋草図|Flowers of Spring and Autumn
metadata.medium: Pair of panels; ink and color on cryptomeria wood

alt_text: A bald, smiling, corpulent figure sits with two dark, dog-like creatures on his lap, rendered in ink wash
long_description: The artwork depicts a bald, smiling, corpulent figure seated in the center of a light-colored paper ground. The figure's head is round with a wide smile revealing teeth, and his eyes are small. His body is rendered with light gray ink wash, showing a large, rounded belly and simple, flowing robes. Two small, dark, solid black shapes, resembling dog-like creatures, are positioned on the figure's chest or lap, one on each side. They appear to be looking upwards towards the figure's face. The figure's right arm is bent, with a hand possibly resting near one of the creatures, though details are minimal. On the far left side of the paper, vertical calligraphic text in black ink is present, followed by a small, square red seal below it. The central painting is framed by decorative borders. The top and bottom borders are a light brown color with repeating gold floral patterns. The left and right borders are a teal-green color with a repeating grid-like pattern. The overall impression is an ink wash painting on paper.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Flowering tree branch with white blossoms and reddish leaves against a gold and silver background.
long_description: The artwork is a multi-panel screen divided horizontally into two main sections. The upper two-thirds of the screen feature a shimmering gold background, while the lower one-third displays a textured silver-grey background. A tree trunk, rendered in shades of brown and green with hints of gold, emerges from the right side of the screen, extending downwards and slightly left. From this trunk, a prominent branch stretches horizontally across the upper portion of the screen, reaching towards the left edge. This branch is adorned with numerous clusters of white blossoms, each with a subtle yellow center, interspersed with small, reddish-brown leaves. The blossoms are concentrated along the branch, creating a delicate pattern against the gold. In the upper right corner, there is a small area of black calligraphic text above a circular red seal. The overall composition is balanced, with the organic forms of the tree and blossoms contrasting with the geometric division of the background.

metadata.title: 酒井抱一筆　桜図屏風|Blossoming Cherry Trees
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts purple and pink irises with green leaves and a light green butterfly.
long_description: This vertical scroll painting features a cluster of irises and a butterfly on a light beige background, framed by patterned borders. At the top, a light green butterfly with white markings flies towards the upper right. Below it, a dense cluster of irises with long, slender green leaves fills the lower two-thirds of the central panel. Three prominent iris blooms are visible: two dark purple flowers near the top of the cluster, and a lighter pinkish-purple flower with white and brown speckles below them. Another lighter iris bloom is partially visible at the bottom right of the cluster. The leaves are various shades of green, some with lighter highlights, and extend upwards, surrounding the flowers. In the lower left, amidst the leaves, is a small red square seal and some black calligraphic text. The central painting is bordered by a wider, golden-brown fabric with repeating dark blue floral or vine patterns. Narrower, lighter patterned strips with geometric designs are visible at the very top and bottom of the central painting area, just inside the main border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a forest with tall, dark tree trunks and lighter foliage amidst a misty atmosphere.
long_description: This two-panel ink wash painting depicts a dense forest scene rendered in shades of gray and black ink on a light, warm-toned ground. The left panel is dominated by several tall, thick tree trunks that extend vertically from the bottom edge, some reaching beyond the top. These trunks are rendered with varying intensity of dark gray and black ink, showing texture and depth. Smaller trees with lighter, more delicate foliage are interspersed among the larger trunks, particularly in the mid-ground. In the lower left corner of the left panel, there is a vertical inscription of brushstrokes followed by a square red seal. The right panel features a more open composition, with a large expanse of light, unpainted space suggesting mist or distance. A few branches with sparse foliage extend into this open area from the upper left and lower left of the right panel. The background on both panels gradually fades into a lighter tone, creating an atmospheric effect. The overall impression is one of a serene and somewhat mysterious forest.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Two-panel folding screen; ink on paper

alt_text: Three figures, one on horseback, wade through a blue river with a distant mountain range under a light sky
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts a landscape scene with three figures in a wide blue river. The background features a soft, light brown-tan band, suggesting a distant mountain range or hazy sky. Below this, the river stretches across the midground, interspersed with irregular green and brown landmasses or islands. In the foreground, the bright blue water shows white concentric ripples around the figures and is dotted with small yellow flowers on green stems. In the center, a person with light skin and a tall black hat sits atop a light-colored horse. This person wears a green robe with a patterned design. The horse is adorned with red and purple saddle blankets and harnesses. To the left of the horse, a person with light skin, wearing a white robe and a black hat, stands in the water, holding a long, white, staff-like object with a red tie near the top. To the right of the horse, another person with light skin, dressed in a red robe, also stands in the water, holding a shorter, dark staff.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Six handscrolls; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A panoramic painting on a gold background depicts a bustling town with numerous buildings, people, and green hills.
long_description: The image is a wide, horizontal painting, likely a folding screen, featuring an expansive, detailed landscape of a bustling town or city set against a dominant gold background. Swirling gold clouds or mist separate areas of green hills and mountains that rise in the upper sections of the composition. A dark, winding river or canal flows horizontally through the middle ground, crossed by several arched and flat bridges. Numerous buildings of various sizes and styles are scattered across the scene. Many structures have white walls and dark or red-tiled roofs. Prominent buildings include multi-story pagodas with tiered roofs, large temple-like complexes featuring red pillars and green roofs, and smaller residential or commercial buildings lining the streets. Some buildings are elevated on platforms, accessible by stairs. Thousands of small figures populate the scene, engaged in various activities. They walk along streets, cross bridges, gather in courtyards, and appear to be involved in commerce or daily life. Some figures are in groups, while others travel individually. Carts and other forms of transport are also visible on the thoroughfares. The elevated perspective provides a comprehensive view of the entire area, with the gold background creating a sense of depth and atmosphere, contrasting with the green landmasses and dark water bodies.

metadata.title: 洛中洛外図屏風|Scenes in and around the Capital
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, gold, and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: A panoramic painting of a landscape with buildings, mountains, and numerous figures amidst golden clouds.
long_description: A wide, multi-panel painting depicts a sprawling landscape with dark green mountains and numerous buildings. Large, irregular shapes of shimmering gold, resembling clouds or mist, are interspersed throughout the scene, particularly in the sky and between different landscape elements. In the upper left, a cluster of red-roofed buildings with white walls is partially visible, nestled among trees and golden clouds. Below this, in the mid-ground on the left, a larger complex of buildings with dark roofs and light walls is situated. Numerous small figures, rendered in light colors, are depicted on paths and open areas around these structures, suggesting activity. Moving towards the center and right, more buildings and groups of figures are scattered across the undulating landscape, which is characterized by dark green foliage and lighter ground areas. In the lower right, a prominent building with a light roof and walls stands on a raised area, surrounded by a dense gathering of small figures. A dark, winding river or body of water is visible in the foreground, with a light-colored arched bridge spanning it on the far right. The overall composition presents a bird's-eye view of a vast, populated area, where natural elements like mountains and water intertwine with human structures and activity. The gold elements create a striking contrast with the darker greens and browns of the landscape.

metadata.title: 厳島吉野花見図屏風|Cherry Blossom Viewing at Itsukushima and Yoshino
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel screen depicts numerous figures in a golden landscape with green hills and flowering trees
long_description: The artwork is a six-panel screen featuring a landscape with numerous figures against a shimmering gold background. Green hills rise from the left and right, framing a central golden ground. On the far left, a large green hill occupies the upper portion, with white cloud-like shapes at its base. Several figures, dressed in robes of muted colors like white, blue, and brown, walk and sit on the golden ground below. Some appear to be children playing. Moving towards the center, two large trees with white or light pink blossoms dominate the upper half of the panels. Beneath these trees and on the golden ground, more figures are depicted. Some are seated, while others are on swings hanging from the branches of the trees. Their clothing includes shades of red, blue, and white. Further to the right, another large tree with hanging foliage, possibly wisteria, is visible. Below it, groups of figures are seated on the green ground and golden areas. A prominent green hill slopes upwards from the bottom right, topped by a large, dark green pine tree. Near the pine tree, more figures are gathered, some appearing to interact or observe. The overall scene suggests a leisurely outdoor gathering or festival. The gold background creates a luminous effect throughout the composition.

metadata.title: 花見・紅葉狩図屏風|Cherry-Blossom and Maple-Leaf Viewing
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, and gold on gilded paper

alt_text: A multi-panel screen shows numerous figures in traditional attire on and around a long wooden bridge over water.
long_description: The artwork is a multi-panel screen, primarily featuring a long, light-colored wooden bridge spanning across a dark blue body of water. The background is largely gold leaf, with large, undulating gold cloud-like shapes that define the ground and parts of the sky. Dark blue areas represent both the water beneath the bridge and the sky above it. Numerous figures, dressed in traditional garments of various colors including white, red, brown, and patterned fabrics, are depicted on and around the bridge. On the far left, two figures sit on the gold ground. Above them, a figure in white stands on the bridge, facing left, while another figure in gold and brown stands further right on the bridge, facing towards a group. The central panels show several groups of figures interacting on the bridge, some leaning on the railings. Below the bridge, in the dark blue water, several gold fan shapes appear to be floating. On the far right, a group of figures sits on the bridge near a patch of green foliage, with another figure standing nearby. The bridge itself has a light wooden color with dark red railings and supports. The overall composition is dynamic, with figures distributed across the length of the bridge and surrounding landscape.

metadata.title: 扇流図屏風|Women on a Bridge Tossing Fans into a River
metadata.medium: Six-panel folding screen; ink, color, gold, and gold leaf on paper

alt_text: A full-length painting of a woman in an ornate patterned kimono, standing on a light brown scroll.
long_description: The image is a vertical painting on a scroll, depicting a single standing figure against a plain light brown background. The figure, a woman, is positioned centrally, facing slightly to the viewer's left with her head bowed and looking downwards. Her skin is pale, and her facial features are delicately rendered. Her black hair is styled upwards into a bun with a white ornament, and long strands fall over her shoulders. She wears an elaborate, floor-length kimono with wide sleeves. The main body of the kimono is a light blue-grey color, patterned with small white floral motifs. This base fabric is adorned with numerous irregularly shaped patches in various colors and patterns, including sections of red with white cross-hatching, gold with subtle textures, dark blue with geometric designs, and white with small black patterns. A wide, golden-yellow obi cinches her waist. The collar of her kimono is dark, possibly black or deep brown, with a patterned border. The sleeves are wide and extend outwards, and the hem of the kimono flares out at the bottom, resting on the ground. The central painting is framed by decorative borders. The top and bottom sections of the scroll feature a green fabric with a subtle gold patterned design. The vertical side borders are a darker brown fabric, embellished with scattered, lighter brown and green leaf shapes, as well as circular and square geometric patterns.

metadata.title: 寛文美人図|Beauty of the Kanbun Era
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A standing woman in a white, red, and black kimono with bamboo patterns, looking right.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical print depicting a standing woman, positioned slightly to the left of the center. She faces forward but turns her head to look towards the viewer's right. Her long, dark hair is pulled back and styled, with some strands falling over her shoulders. Her skin appears light. She wears an elaborate kimono, primarily white, with large sections of red and dark green or black fabric. The sleeves and lower portion of the kimono are adorned with a repeating pattern of green bamboo leaves and stalks against a reddish-brown background. A wide, lighter-colored sash or obi is visible around her waist. The figure is set against a plain, light tan background. In the upper right corner, a rectangular patch contains several lines of dark, handwritten text. Additional vertical lines of text are present along the right edge of the tan background. The central image is bordered by a teal-blue band featuring a subtle, lighter-colored floral or wave motif, which is then enclosed by a thin black frame.

metadata.title: 懐月堂安度筆　立姿遊女図|Standing Courtesan
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll, mounted as panel; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A woman in a blue and brown kimono sits on a tan ground, reading a long white scroll.
long_description: The artwork depicts a single woman seated on a plain, light tan ground, framed by decorative borders. The woman is positioned slightly to the right of the center, facing left and looking down at a long white scroll she holds. Her skin is pale, and her dark hair is pulled back into an elaborate bun at the top of her head, with a few strands falling over her shoulders. She wears a multi-layered kimono. The outermost layer is primarily light blue with large white camellia-like flowers and dark green leaves. Beneath this, a brown layer with similar white flowers and green leaves is visible, along with a red layer patterned with smaller gold flowers. Her sleeves are wide, and the fabric of her kimono spreads out around her on the ground. The white scroll is held with both hands, curving upwards from her lap towards her face. Her eyes are downcast, focused on the scroll. To the right of the woman, a small column of dark, vertical script is visible. The main tan panel is bordered at the top and bottom by a narrow band of dark blue with a grid-like pattern, which is then bordered by a wider, golden-brown band with a repeating floral and leaf motif. The left side also has this golden-brown floral border.

metadata.title: 懐月堂度辰筆　文を書く遊女図|Courtesan Writing a Letter
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Three vertical scroll paintings, each depicting a figure in traditional garments and a distinct pose
long_description:
The image displays three vertical scroll paintings, each mounted with a dark brown fabric border at the top and bottom, and a lighter tan border framing the central painted area. Gold-colored metal fittings are visible at the top and bottom of each scroll. The background of each painting is a plain, light brown or tan color.

The leftmost scroll features a standing figure facing right, with their head turned slightly towards the viewer. They wear a light-colored, patterned robe with wide sleeves, possibly holding a sword or long object behind their back, with a hilt visible near their left shoulder. The robe has subtle floral or cloud-like patterns in lighter tones.

The central scroll depicts a figure in a dynamic pose, leaning forward and to the left. This figure wears a similar light-colored, patterned robe with wide sleeves. They have a tall, dark, pointed hat or mask on their head, and appear to be holding small, light-colored objects, possibly birds or flowers, in their outstretched hands.

The rightmost scroll shows a figure kneeling on both knees, facing slightly left. This figure wears a dark, simple hat and a long, reddish-brown robe over patterned trousers or an undergarment. Their hands are held out in front of them, appearing to hold or present a small, reddish-brown object. Each scroll has faint, vertical lines of text in the lower left or right corner.

metadata.title: 鳥山石燕筆　「翁」図|The Auspicious Noh Dance "Okina"
metadata.medium: Triptych of hanging scrolls; ink, color, and gold on paper

alt_text: A full-length painting of a woman in a black kimono with a patterned sash, on a hanging scroll.
long_description: The image is a vertical painting on a hanging scroll, depicting a single woman standing against a plain background. The woman is shown in full length, positioned slightly to the right of the center, facing towards the left and looking downwards. Her skin is pale, and her dark hair is styled elaborately, pulled up and secured with several dark pins or combs. She wears a long, dark kimono, primarily black, with subtle patterns visible on the lower half of the garment, appearing as dark blue or grey floral motifs. A white undergarment is visible at her neck and sleeves. Her left arm is bent, holding a white sash or outer garment that is draped over her arm and extends down her side. This white fabric is adorned with small, light blue and green floral or leaf patterns. The sleeves of her black kimono have a red lining visible at the cuffs. Her feet are visible at the bottom, wearing white tabi socks and dark sandals with light-colored soles. The background behind the woman is a solid, light golden-brown color, with no other elements. The painting is framed by a decorative border typical of a hanging scroll. The inner border features thin stripes of dark blue, light blue, and red, interspersed with small white dots. The outer border is wider, with a pattern of brown and gold stripes, and a more intricate gold pattern at the very top and bottom sections. There are red characters and a red seal visible on the right side of the golden-brown background, near the woman's lower right arm.

metadata.title: 勝川春章筆　立姿美人図|Woman in a Black Kimono
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: Three figures in traditional attire, two adults and one child, stand below vertical text and a faint ink drawing
long_description: This vertical scroll features a central light tan panel framed by a decorative border. The upper half of the central panel contains vertical script in black ink, accompanied by several small red seals. To the right of the text, a faint, abstract ink drawing depicts a large, rounded, draped form or rock. The lower half of the central panel shows three figures, likely women, standing. The leftmost figure wears a light-colored kimono with colorful trim and has a dark garment draped over her left arm. Her hair is styled in a dark bun, and she wears a dark, flat-topped hat. The middle figure wears a pinkish kimono with intricate patterns and carries a large, golden, textured, basket-like object in front of her. Her hair is styled in a dark bun, and she wears a dark hat with two prominent, upward-curving loops. The rightmost figure, smaller in stature and possibly a child, stands slightly behind and to the right of the middle figure. She wears a light-colored kimono with a red obi and red trim, and her hair is styled in a dark bun. The border framing the central panel has a blue background with white wavy lines and faint, stylized plant motifs, possibly lotus leaves, in a lighter tone.

metadata.title: 柳下美人図|Courtesan and her Attendants under a Willow Tree
metadata.artist: Unchō 雲潮|Kyokutei Bakin 曲亭馬琴|Santō Kyōden 山東京伝
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: Three vertical scroll paintings: a figure, moonlit landscape, and snowy landscape with visible text
long_description:
Three vertical scroll paintings are displayed side-by-side against a dark background. Each scroll features a central painted panel framed by decorative borders. The top section of each scroll's mounting is a light blue-grey fabric with a subtle pattern, followed by a wider section of gold-brown fabric with a repeating leaf or vine pattern. Gold-colored vertical strips hang from the top of each scroll, and red-brown wooden rollers are visible at the bottom. The central painted panels are a light tan color.

The left scroll's panel depicts a landscape under a pale yellow full moon in the upper center. Below the moon, a hazy body of water stretches across the middle ground. In the lower left, a cluster of green-topped trees stands on a small landmass. Faint landforms are visible in the distance. Vertical lines of dark text are present in the upper left.

The center scroll's panel features a seated figure in the lower half, facing right. The figure wears a dark blue or black robe with a red garment visible underneath and a white head covering. The figure is positioned next to a light-colored, gnarled tree trunk or rock formation on the right. Faint, light-colored branches extend from the upper right. Vertical lines of dark text are in the upper left.

The right scroll's panel shows a snowy landscape in the lower half. The ground is predominantly white, indicating snow, with several small, snow-covered trees or bushes scattered across it. A fence line or path extends from the lower left towards the center. Faint, light-colored branches extend from the upper right. Vertical lines of dark text are in the upper left.

metadata.title: 蜀山人（大田 南畝）賛　雪・月・花図　|Snow, Moon, and Cherry Blossoms (Yoshiwara in Three Seasons)
metadata.medium: Triptych of  hanging scrolls; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of bamboo stalks and leaves above a large, textured rock on a hanging scroll
long_description: The image is a vertical hanging scroll featuring an ink painting on light-colored paper. The central composition depicts bamboo and a large rock. In the upper half, numerous bamboo branches extend across the canvas, adorned with clusters of leaves rendered in varying shades of black ink, from deep, solid black to lighter, translucent washes. Some leaves appear to overlap, creating a sense of depth. Two prominent bamboo stalks rise along the left side of the painting, extending from the bottom edge upwards, with visible nodes along their length. A small, square red seal is positioned in the upper left quadrant, followed by vertical lines of black calligraphic text. Below the bamboo, a large, irregularly shaped rock dominates the lower portion of the painting. It is depicted with bold, dark ink washes and textured strokes, giving it a rugged appearance. Around the base and sides of the rock, shorter, spiky plant forms are rendered with lighter ink. Another small, square red seal is visible near the bottom right edge of the rock. The painting is bordered by a narrow, light beige strip with a subtle pattern, followed by a wider teal-green border featuring a repeating pattern of small, stylized shapes.

metadata.title: 祇園南海筆 「竹窗雨日」図|Window onto Bamboo on a Rainy Day
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts towering mountains, a winding river, and small buildings nestled among trees.
long_description: The vertical scroll painting, rendered primarily in shades of gray and black ink on a light, off-white ground, depicts a vast mountainous landscape with a river and scattered human dwellings. The composition is arranged vertically, with towering peaks dominating the upper two-thirds of the scene. These mountains are depicted with broad ink washes, creating a sense of depth and mist, while darker, more defined brushstrokes outline their craggy forms and suggest rocky textures. The peaks appear light, possibly covered in snow or shrouded in fog, contrasting with the darker ink used for their crevices and shadowed areas. In the upper left quadrant, a vertical column of black text is visible, accompanied by a small, square red seal below it. As the landscape descends, a river flows from the upper right towards the lower left, winding through the mountainous terrain. Along its banks and on rocky outcrops, clusters of tall, slender trees, possibly pines, are depicted with dark trunks and light, sparse foliage. Several small, simple buildings with light-colored walls and dark roofs are nestled among these trees and rocks. A prominent group of buildings is situated on a rocky promontory in the mid-left, surrounded by a stand of trees. Another building is visible further to the right, closer to the river's edge. The lower portion of the painting shows the river widening slightly, with more defined rocky banks. The entire painted area is bordered by a decorative gold fabric with dark, repeating patterns, and a narrower, lighter patterned strip directly above and below the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Fan-shaped ink wash painting of a landscape with a building, trees, a fence, and extensive calligraphy
long_description: The artwork presents a fan-shaped painting centrally placed on a plain, light brown rectangular background. The fan itself is off-white, with faint, radiating lines suggesting its structure. The painting within the fan is rendered in black and gray ink wash, depicting a landscape scene. On the left side of the fan, multiple columns of vertical black calligraphy are visible, extending from the top left curve towards the bottom center. Adjacent to the calligraphy, a large, dark-foliaged tree with a visible trunk stands prominently. Further to the right, another tree with similar dark foliage is depicted. In the middle ground, a low, dark fence or wall runs horizontally, partially obscuring a small, simple structure with a dark, sloped roof and lighter walls. A small, indistinct figure, possibly a person, is visible near this structure. More vertical black calligraphy occupies the upper right portion of the fan. Near the bottom left of the painted landscape, two small red seals are present. The ink wash technique creates varying tones and textures throughout the landscape elements.

metadata.title: 与謝蕪村筆　奥の細道図扇面|Scene from The Narrow Road to the Deep North
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Black calligraphy on light paper, framed by a green and patterned border
long_description: A rectangular artwork features a light beige paper panel with black calligraphy, centered within two decorative borders. The paper is horizontally oriented. The main body of calligraphy consists of several vertical lines of flowing script, starting from the upper right and extending downwards, occupying the right two-thirds of the paper. To the lower left, a smaller section of calligraphy appears, also in vertical lines. Below this smaller text, a square red seal with illegible characters is visible. The inner border surrounding the paper is a light brown or tan color with a subtle, repeating pattern. The outermost border is a wider band of green, exhibiting a fine vertical striped texture. The overall composition is balanced, with the text and seal providing the primary visual focus against the plain paper background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash landscape painting featuring a large tree, small figures, distant hills, and calligraphy
long_description: An ink wash painting on light beige paper depicts a serene landscape, framed by a patterned border. The central focus is a large, robust tree with a thick, light-colored trunk that branches into a dense canopy of dark gray foliage. The tree is rendered with varying shades of black and gray ink, creating depth and texture. To the left of the tree's base, several small, rounded, indistinct shapes, possibly figures or rocks, are visible on the ground. To the right, a smaller, more stylized tree or structure stands, depicted with darker, more defined vertical strokes. In the background, faint, horizontal, undulating lines suggest distant hills or a misty horizon, rendered with lighter ink washes. In the upper left corner, vertical black ink calligraphy is present, accompanied by a rectangular red seal below it.
