A smaller, square red seal is also visible in the lower right corner of the painting. The artwork is mounted within a wide border featuring a repeating, light orange-brown floral or geometric pattern.

metadata.title: 池大雅筆 「大雅堂画弁題詩」|Pine Tree and Calligraphy
metadata.medium: Album leaves mounted as  hanging scrolls; ink on paper

alt_text: A panoramic six-panel screen painting depicts a vast mountainous landscape with trees, water, small figures, and structures.
long_description: The artwork is a six-panel screen painting, presented horizontally, depicting a continuous, expansive landscape. The color palette is predominantly soft and muted, featuring various shades of light blue, gray, green, and brown, with occasional small accents of red and pink.Starting from the left, the first two panels show a steep, light-colored hillside covered densely with dark green trees. A narrow, light-colored path or stream descends from the upper left. In the lower left foreground, a small, simple wooden bridge spans a stream, with two small figures, one in white and one in light brown, walking across it. Below the bridge, several other small figures are visible near the water's edge. On the far left panel, vertical Japanese characters are inscribed in black ink, reading from top to bottom: 山水図 and 雪舟筆.Moving towards the center, the landscape opens into a wider valley or river area. Large, craggy mountains with textured gray and green surfaces rise prominently in the background. Several tall, dark green pine trees with gnarled trunks are scattered throughout the midground. Small groups of figures, some dressed in red, are seen engaged in various activities near the water, under trees, or near small, indistinct structures.The rightmost panels continue the mountainous terrain, featuring more rugged hills and peaks. A traditional building with a light-colored, gently sloped roof is nestled among the trees on a hillside in the upper right-center. Below this structure, a small red boat or raft is visible on a body of water. Further down the slope and towards the lower right, more small figures are depicted on the banks or in the water. The sky throughout the painting is a pale, almost white blue, suggesting a hazy or distant atmosphere. The overall composition integrates human presence within a grand natural setting.

metadata.title: 池大雅筆  蘭亭曲水図屏風  秋社図屏風|Orchid Pavilion Gathering; Autumn Harvest Festival
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of bamboo stalks and a large peony flower next to a textured rock formation.
long_description: A vertical ink painting on a light, off-white background depicts a composition of bamboo, a peony flower, and a large rock. The painting is framed by a dark blue border with a repeating geometric pattern, and a lighter blue patterned strip with floral motifs at the top and bottom. In the upper right portion of the central painting area, a slender bamboo stalk extends upwards, featuring several clusters of dark, pointed leaves. Three distinct groups of leaves are visible, with the topmost cluster reaching near the top edge. Below the bamboo, on the left side, a large peony flower with numerous petals is rendered in lighter ink washes, with darker outlines defining some petals and leaves. Several leaves and smaller buds surround the main flower. To the right of the peony, a substantial, vertical rock formation occupies the lower right quadrant. It is depicted with varied ink washes, creating a textured, rugged appearance, with darker lines emphasizing its contours and crevices. The rock appears to rise from the bottom edge of the painting. The background is a pale, light color, suggesting open space. The artwork is characterized by expressive brushstrokes and a balanced arrangement of natural elements.

metadata.title: 徳山玉瀾筆　牡丹に竹図|Peony and Bamboo
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink landscape painting on a fan showing mountains, a river, and dense trees under a light sky
long_description:
The image displays a fan-shaped painting, rendered in black ink on a light-colored surface, centered on a plain, light brown background. The fan itself has a thin, light pink border. The painting depicts a mountainous landscape with water and trees, executed with varying shades of ink wash and brushstrokes.

On the left side of the fan, a series of receding mountains are shown with lighter ink washes, suggesting distance and atmospheric perspective. Above these mountains, in the upper left quadrant, there is a vertical inscription of black characters, followed by a small, square red seal and a smaller rectangular red seal below it. The characters appear to be: 戊午秋日 寫於 清涼山館. Below these distant mountains, a body of water, possibly a river or lake, extends horizontally across the middle ground.

The central and right portions of the painting feature more prominent and densely rendered mountains. These mountains are depicted with darker, more textured ink strokes, indicating closer proximity and rugged terrain. Numerous trees, varying in size and density, are clustered along the base and slopes of these mountains, particularly in the mid-ground. Some trees appear as dense groves, while others are more sparsely distributed. A narrow strip of water is visible between the landmasses in the lower center, leading towards the right. The foreground on the right side consists of rocky formations and sparse vegetation, rendered with detailed brushwork. The sky above the mountains is left largely unpainted, creating a sense of open space.

metadata.title: 「残雨半村」図|“Lingering Rain over Half the Village”
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as a hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a tall, craggy mountain overlooking a river with a bridge and buildings
long_description: The image is a vertical ink wash painting, primarily in shades of black and gray on a light, aged paper, framed by a light brown border. The composition features a towering, dark, craggy mountain in the upper center, appearing as a stack of eroded rock formations with several dark, irregular openings. To the left of this prominent peak, lighter, more distant mountains recede into a misty background. In the upper left quadrant, vertical lines of black calligraphy are visible, reading from top to bottom: "久作甲戌", "仁印戊", "寫得谿聲", and "圖". Below the main mountain, a river flows horizontally across the mid-ground. On the left side of the river, a small, arched bridge spans the water, with two small figures visible on its surface. Further down the river, a small, dark boat or object floats. The right bank of the river is densely forested with a variety of trees; some have dark, full foliage, while others display delicate, bare branches. Nestled among these trees on the right is a small building with a distinctive pointed roof, resembling a pagoda or temple. The foreground features textured ground and sparse vegetation, contributing to the overall impression of a serene, misty landscape.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting on a fan, depicting mountains and trees on a blue background
long_description: A fan-shaped ink wash painting is centered on a deep blue, patterned background. The painting itself is on a light cream-colored surface, marked with faint vertical lines suggesting the pleats of a folding fan. The artwork depicts a landscape scene rendered in various shades of black and gray ink. On the far left, a cluster of tall, dark trees with dense foliage rises from a rocky base. Below these trees, a small section of vertical text in black ink is visible, which appears to read "西山畫" (Xīshān huà), followed by a square red seal. Moving right, the landscape transitions into a series of rolling hills and jagged mountains. These mountains are rendered with lighter ink washes for the broader forms and darker, more defined strokes for peaks and crevices, creating a sense of depth and texture. Some areas show sparse, lighter foliage. The composition flows horizontally across the fan, with the left side dominated by the darker, more detailed trees and the right side by the lighter, more expansive mountain range. The blue background features a subtle, repeating pattern of stylized clouds or waves.

metadata.title: 青木木米筆   山中喫茶図扇面|Preparing Tea by a Mountain Gorge
metadata.medium: Folding fan mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical ink painting depicts a mountainous landscape with dense trees, a small bridge, and a boat on a river.
long_description: A vertical ink painting on a scroll features a monochrome landscape with subtle reddish-brown accents, framed by a decorative border with green floral patterns on a gold background. The painting is rendered in various shades of black and gray ink, creating depth and texture. In the upper right section, several columns of vertical script in black ink are visible, with a red square seal positioned below the text. The top portion of the painting shows towering, craggy mountains or hills, their peaks partially obscured by a lighter, misty wash. Below these, dense clusters of trees with dark foliage and lighter trunks cover the slopes, extending downwards. A small, simple bridge with two vertical supports spans a narrow gap or stream on the left side, leading to a small, light-colored structure or path. Further down, a wide body of water, possibly a river, occupies the lower half of the composition, rendered with horizontal strokes suggesting ripples or currents. A small, flat-bottomed boat with a single figure holding a pole is depicted on the water, positioned towards the right. More trees and textured land define the banks of the river, with some faint reddish-brown dots suggesting blossoms or small details among the foliage.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Four vertical ink wash scrolls depict diverse monochromatic landscapes with mountains, trees, water, and small buildings
long_description: The image displays four vertical scroll paintings, each mounted with a patterned grey fabric border and a lighter, patterned inner border. Each scroll features an ink wash landscape on a light, aged-looking ground, primarily using black ink in varying shades to create a monochromatic palette.The leftmost scroll presents a scene dominated by tall, craggy mountains on the left, with a winding path or river in the foreground. Numerous trees, including pines and deciduous types, are scattered across the lower half, with small, simple structures nestled among them. Faint calligraphic text and a red seal are visible on the left side.The second scroll from the left depicts a central mountain peak under a circular light source in the sky. The foreground includes a body of water with a small boat, a bridge, and scattered trees. Distant structures are faintly visible. Calligraphic text and a red seal appear on the right side.The third scroll features dramatic, misty mountains with waterfalls cascading down their faces. Dense foliage and trees populate the foreground and midground, with small buildings situated at the base of the mountains. Calligraphic text and a red seal are on the right side.The rightmost scroll shows mountains receding into a misty background, with a wide body of water or river in the midground. Numerous trees, primarily pines, line the banks and small islands. Small structures and a boat are visible in the lower half. Calligraphic text and a red seal are on the right side.

metadata.title: 山本梅逸筆　四季山水図|Landscapes of the Four Seasons
metadata.medium: Set of four hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting featuring tall mountains, a cascading waterfall, dense trees, and buildings.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a mountainous landscape with a waterfall and buildings, rendered in a monochromatic palette of grays and blacks against a light, aged background. The upper half is dominated by tall, craggy mountains, with their peaks extending towards the top edge. These mountains are rendered with varying shades of ink, creating a sense of depth and texture, and appear to recede into the distance on the left. A narrow, white waterfall cascades down the left side of the main mountain range, disappearing behind a dense cluster of dark trees in the mid-ground. These trees form a heavy, shadowed area with visible trunks and branches. At the lower left, nestled at the base of the mountains and near the waterfall's base, is a small complex of buildings with tiled roofs, depicted with fine lines. The foreground features rocky ground and more sparse trees. In the upper left quadrant, there is vertical calligraphy in black ink, accompanied by several red square seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a tall waterfall cascading through misty mountains with trees and rocks
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a mountainous landscape in shades of grey and black on a light tan ground. The upper portion of the scroll shows faint, indistinct mountain peaks shrouded in mist, with only the suggestion of their forms emerging from the hazy background. On the left side, a tall, narrow waterfall descends from a high cliff, its white streaks contrasting with the darker rock face. The waterfall widens as it reaches the mid-ground, breaking into multiple cascades over large, dark rocks. To the right of the waterfall, a prominent, gnarled tree with bare branches stands on a rocky outcrop, its form detailed with fine brushstrokes. Other smaller trees and foliage are visible among the rocks. The base of the waterfall flows into a turbulent stream with visible ripples, moving towards the bottom center of the composition. The entire scene is enveloped in a soft mist, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere. A small, red rectangular seal with illegible characters is present in the lower right corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A central seated man with a halo surrounded by numerous smaller figures on clouds and a landscape
long_description: A vertical rectangular painting with a gold border depicts a central, large, light-skinned man with a shaved head, seated on a red platform. He wears a light green robe and a red sash, with a circular halo behind his head. His right leg is bent with the foot on the platform, while his left leg is extended. He holds a thin string or rope in his hands.Surrounding the central figure, and extending to the top and bottom of the composition, are numerous smaller figures. Many of these figures are seated on stylized white and grey clouds, some also featuring circular halos. Their robes are rendered in various shades of red, brown, green, and white. In the upper left, a figure in a brown robe sits on a cloud, holding an object. To their right, another figure in red is seated on a cloud. In the upper right, a figure in red sits on a cloud, and below them, another figure in red with a halo.In the lower section of the painting, the figures appear more diverse. On the lower left, a dark-skinned, corpulent figure is seated on a cloud. Further down, figures with fierce expressions, elaborate headwear, and flame-like elements are depicted. On the lower right, a figure with a halo plays a stringed instrument. The background consists of a muted green and brown landscape interspersed with the stylized clouds.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Side panel of a triptych of framed paintings; watercolor on linen

alt_text: A painting of a large central figure surrounded by numerous smaller figures, all seated in robes.
long_description: A vertical rectangular painting, framed in dark brown, depicts a complex scene with many figures. A large, bald figure with light skin sits prominently in the lower-middle, wearing a light green undergarment and a flowing red robe. This central figure's hands are clasped in front, and a large, pale halo surrounds its head. It is seated on a stylized red and white cloud or cushion. Numerous smaller figures, mostly seated, are scattered across the entire composition, surrounding the central figure. Many of these smaller figures also wear red robes, and some have halos. They are depicted on stylized cloud formations or landscape elements in shades of light green and white. In the upper section, several figures are arranged, including one at the very top center within a green halo. To the right of the central figure, one smaller figure holds a scroll. In the lower section, the background becomes more detailed with stylized clouds, rock formations, and smaller, more dynamic figures, some with red flame-like elements or dark, swirling clouds. The dominant colors are various shades of red for the robes, light green for the background and some garments, and white for clouds and halos, with accents of darker greens and grays.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Side panel of a triptych of framed paintings; watercolor on linen

alt_text: Two birds, one standing and one with head lowered, among tall reeds on a muted brown background.
long_description: A vertical, monochromatic painting depicts two large birds amidst tall, thin plant stalks on a light brown, aged-looking surface. The bird on the right stands upright, facing slightly right, with its long neck extended upwards. Its body is rendered with darker grey-brown tones, showing subtle feather details on its wings and tail. Its head is small with a dark eye. Its legs are visible, extending downwards into the lower portion of the frame. To the left and slightly behind the upright bird, a second bird is positioned with its head lowered and beak pointing towards the lower-left. Its body is less distinct, appearing lighter in tone, but also shows some feathering. Its neck is curved downwards. The birds are partially obscured by numerous thin, vertical, and diagonally sweeping lines that represent tall grasses or reeds. These lines are lighter in tone, almost blending with the background in some areas, particularly in the upper half and to the right of the birds. The lower portion of the painting suggests a ground or water line, with slightly darker, horizontal brushstrokes. The overall impression is one of subtle detail and a serene natural scene, rendered with a limited palette of browns and greys.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Full-length portrait of a man in ornate gold and red robes, seated on a dark wooden chair.
long_description: A full-length portrait depicts a man seated on a dark wooden chair against a plain, light brown background. The man faces forward, with a light-skinned face, a thin mustache, and a small goatee. He wears a tall, round, red hat with a dark brim and a decorative finial on top. His elaborate robe is primarily gold and orange, adorned with multiple white and light blue five-clawed dragons, clouds, and wave patterns. The robe features wide, dark brown fur-trimmed shoulders and cuffs. A long necklace of red and blue beads hangs around his neck, extending down to his waist. His hands are visible, resting on his lap, with one hand holding a string of smaller beads. He wears dark shoes with white soles. The dark wooden chair has ornate, curved armrests with light-colored decorative elements. Below the chair, a patterned rug with geometric and floral motifs in shades of gold, brown, and blue is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A full-body portrait of a person in an elaborate yellow robe and ornate headwear, seated on a wooden chair.
long_description: The full-body portrait depicts a person seated centrally, facing directly forward against a plain, light brown background. The figure wears an elaborate, dark, multi-tiered headpiece adorned with colorful floral motifs and a tall, pointed finial at the top. Two long, red beaded necklaces hang down the front of a high-collared, long-sleeved yellow robe. The robe is wide and falls to the floor, revealing a red inner lining with gold patterns of birds and clouds. Circular patterns are subtly visible on the yellow fabric of the robe. The hands are not visible, but the cuffs of the sleeves are intricately embroidered with blue, red, and gold designs. The figure's feet are covered by small, embroidered shoes, also with blue and gold patterns. The person is seated in a dark brown wooden chair with a high, curved back and armrests. The chair's legs are visible at the bottom. Below the chair, a colorful rug with geometric and floral patterns in shades of red, blue, green, and white covers the floor. On the right side of the plain background, vertical text in dark characters is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Full-length portrait of a person in ornate blue and gold robes seated on a red and gold throne
long_description: The image is a vertical, full-length portrait of a person seated on a throne, facing forward. The background is a plain, light brown or gold color, framed by a thin blue line and a wider brown border. The person has light skin, a round face, and dark hair visible at the sides of their head. They wear a red hat with a pointed top and a small red finial. Their elaborate robe is primarily dark blue, adorned with intricate gold, red, green, and white embroidery. Large, stylized dragons are prominent on the chest and shoulders. The sleeves are wide, and the cuffs are decorated with patterns. A long necklace of pink beads hangs around their neck, reaching to their waist. The person's hands are visible, resting on their lap or the arms of the throne. They hold decorative objects, possibly tassels or sashes, in each hand. They are seated on a large, ornate throne. The back of the throne is gold with circular patterns, and the seat and armrests are red with gold and multicolored designs. The throne sits on a raised platform, also red and gold, with a decorative border of green, blue, and red floral or geometric patterns at the base. The person's feet, wearing light-colored shoes, are visible at the bottom of the robe, resting on the platform.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A person in an ornate blue and gold robe and tall red hat sits on a decorated throne, facing forward
long_description: The image is a full-length portrait of a person seated centrally, facing forward, against a plain light brown background. The person wears an elaborate blue and gold robe with wide sleeves and a tall, ornate hat. The hat is predominantly red with gold embellishments and a black brim, topped with a golden finial. The person's face is pale with delicate features, dark hair visible beneath the hat, and small red lips. A long, multi-strand necklace of small white beads hangs down the front of the robe, reaching below the waist. The robe is richly decorated with intricate patterns in gold, red, green, and white on a dark blue background. Golden dragons and auspicious symbols are visible on the front and sleeves. The wide sleeves have blue cuffs. A long, narrow pink sash with floral embroidery hangs from the waist, extending down the front of the robe. The hem of the robe is wide and features a colorful striped pattern above a dark border. The person is seated on a large, ornate wooden throne or chair with a high back and armrests, carved with dragon-like figures in a light brown or gold color. The seat and back cushions are patterned with green, blue, and red designs. The throne rests on a multi-tiered platform, also in light brown or gold. Below the platform, the floor is covered with a patterned rug in red and light brown, featuring geometric and floral motifs. In the upper right corner of the light brown background, there is a vertical line of black characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Full-length portrait of a person in an elaborate, dragon-embroidered robe and a ceremonial hat
long_description: A full-length, black and white portrait depicts a person seated, facing forward, against a plain background. The figure's face is light-toned, with dark, narrow eyes and a small mouth. They wear a dark, wide, flat-topped hat adorned with circular motifs and long, rectangular, multi-tiered ornaments dangling from each side, reaching to the shoulders. The figure is dressed in a voluminous, long-sleeved robe that extends to the floor, covering the body from the neck down. The robe is intricately patterned with large, light-toned dragons amidst dark, swirling clouds and wave-like motifs. The central panel of the robe features two large, circular medallions with additional patterns. The sleeves are wide and rounded, also decorated with dragons and clouds. A lighter-toned, patterned border outlines the edges of the robe. The figure appears to be seated on a dark, low, rectangular base with curved supports visible at the bottom of the image. The background is a light, uniform tone with some subtle variations in shading.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A portly man in a white robe and turban sits cross-legged, holding prayer beads, against a yellow background
long_description: The artwork is a rectangular painting with a thick red border, framing an inner yellow background. In the center, a portly man with dark skin is seated in profile, facing towards the left side of the frame. He wears a white robe, or jama, with long sleeves, and a blue and gold striped sash tied around his waist. His legs are crossed, and his bare right foot is visible. On his head is a white, textured turban. His left hand holds a string of dark prayer beads, while his right hand rests on a red, circular cushion with a radiating pattern. Another red cushion is visible behind him. A white and gold tassel hangs from his right arm. He looks slightly upwards with his mouth closed. He sits on a purple and pink patterned rug with a floral motif. The background behind the man and cushions is a solid, bright yellow. Along the top edge of the yellow background, there is black script that reads "श्रीबदनीओउम्यलखा". The entire composition is enclosed by a thin black line, which is then surrounded by the wide, solid red border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink, opaque watercolor, and silver on paper

alt_text: A colorful illustration depicts a formal gathering with two seated figures and two kneeling figures in an ornate room.
long_description: This colorful illustration presents a formal gathering within an ornate interior space. At the back, two figures are seated on a raised red platform, framed by a dark brown structure with pink draped curtains and a blue and green patterned valance. The figure on the left wears an elaborate blue, green, and red patterned robe with a matching ornate headpiece. The figure on the right, with a white beard, wears a similar elaborate red, blue, and green patterned robe and a dark cap. To the left of the seated figures, four women stand in a row, each wearing blue and green patterned robes and matching elaborate blue headpieces. To the right, three men stand, dressed in dark blue robes with black and silver details, and dark caps. In the foreground, on a red rectangular rug, two figures kneel. The figure on the left wears a pink and blue patterned robe, kneeling with hands clasped. The figure on the right, wearing a dark blue robe with yellow trim, kneels facing the seated figures. The floor is covered in a blue and white patterned tile, and the walls feature subtle patterns. A window-like structure with pink flowers is visible on the far left, and a decorative brown element is on the right wall.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; ink and color on pith paper, bound in red damask

alt_text: Two women and a baby in an ornate room with a garden view, rendered in a traditional painting style
long_description: The image depicts an indoor scene with three figures, framed by elaborate architectural elements. On the left, a woman with dark hair styled in a bun holds a baby. She wears a light blue and green robe with a white sash and a patterned skirt. The baby, with light skin and a small tuft of hair, is dressed in a red garment and holds a small red object. The woman looks down at the baby, who faces towards the right. To the right, another woman with dark hair and a floral ornament stands with her arms outstretched towards the baby. She wears a light blue top with a pink sash and a patterned skirt. Her gaze is directed towards the baby. Between the two women, a dark wooden table with two green-topped objects sits on a lower, ornate wooden railing. The background features patterned blue wallpaper and dark wooden doorframes with intricate carvings. Through an opening on the far right, a lush green garden with trees and a building is visible. The entire scene is bordered by a light brown frame, with a highly decorative, carved wooden frieze across the top.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Painting of purple wisteria vines and pink, red, and white peonies on a light beige background
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts a vibrant floral arrangement against a light, warm beige background. On the left, long clusters of purple wisteria flowers hang downwards, interspersed with green leaves and thin vines. The wisteria extends from the top left corner towards the center. On the right side, a collection of peonies in various stages of bloom are visible. These peonies feature shades of pink, red, and white, with prominent green leaves and stems. Some of the pink peonies are large and full, while smaller white and red flowers are also present, appearing to grow from the lower right. The background has subtle vertical striations, suggesting the texture of paper or silk. In the far left margin, a vertical column of black calligraphic text is present, reading: "壬子小春寫於南山間吾與周君喜年". Below this text, a square red seal is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A seated figure in profile with dark hair and light skin, meditating amidst a dark, swirling landscape.
long_description: The vertical artwork depicts a solitary figure seated in profile against a dark, atmospheric landscape, rendered primarily in shades of sepia, brown, and dark grey. The central figure, positioned slightly below the vertical center and to the left, is shown from the waist up, facing right. She has dark hair pulled back, revealing a light-toned face with a distinct profile: a high forehead, a straight nose, and a small mouth. Her body is draped in flowing robes, outlined with simple, dark lines, and she appears to be seated in a meditative or contemplative posture on an irregular, dark surface, possibly a rock or cushion. The background is dominated by swirling, indistinct forms. In the upper left, a large, dark mass with textured edges suggests a mountain or a dense cloud formation. Similar dark, amorphous shapes extend across the top and right side of the composition, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere. In the middle ground, behind the seated figure, a lighter horizontal band stretches across, possibly depicting water or a distant plain, with a small, dark, irregular shape that could be an island or a distant landmass. The overall impression is one of a serene figure enveloped by a vast, somewhat ethereal natural environment.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two figures, a man and a woman, ride horses across a plain background framed by decorative borders
long_description: A painting depicts two figures on horseback, facing right, against a plain, textured background. The artwork is framed by an inner green border and a wider outer border of dark blue or black with intricate gold patterns. The figure on the left is a man with a beard, wearing a light-colored tunic, a hat, and boots. A quiver with arrows is visible on his back. He rides a light-colored horse, which has a dark saddle blanket adorned with a black and white pattern. The figure on the right is a woman, also wearing a light-colored tunic and a hat. She rides a reddish-brown horse. Both horses are depicted with bridles and reins. The overall composition is centered, with the figures and horses occupying the lower two-thirds of the central panel. The background is a uniform, light brown or tan color, showing some texture.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Five figures in traditional attire walk through a muted brown and green hilly landscape under a light sky
long_description:
A horizontal painting depicts five figures traversing a muted landscape of rolling hills and sparse vegetation. The overall color palette is dominated by browns and dark greens, with accents of red, blue, and white. The background features undulating hills in various shades of brown and dark green, with patches of lighter green foliage suggesting trees or bushes. In the upper center, a light, almost white, cloud-like formation is visible against the darker sky. The ground beneath the figures is a textured brown.

From left to right, the figures are arranged across the canvas. The leftmost figure is dressed in reddish-brown clothing, facing right, with a dark, indistinct object on their back or side. Next to them, a figure in yellowish-brown attire, wearing a hat, carries a dark rectangular object on their back, also facing right. The central figure wears a blue tunic over white undergarments and holds a white, possibly folded, object in their hands as they walk towards the right. To their right, another figure, dressed in a red tunic over white with a dark hat, bends slightly forward, looking down towards the ground with their right leg extended. The rightmost figure stands upright in reddish-brown clothing, facing towards the left, appearing to observe the other figures. The figures are spread out, suggesting a journey or procession through the natural environment.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: Multiple figures and a large bird-like creature in a muted, forested landscape
long_description: This horizontal painting depicts a muted, forested landscape with several figures and a large bird-like creature. The color palette is dominated by browns and greens, with some reds and whites on the figures. On the far left, two human-like figures are visible amidst green foliage and brown, undulating hills. One figure, positioned higher, wears reddish clothing and faces right. Below and to the right, another figure in lighter attire looks left. Moving towards the center-left, a figure in what appears to be armor, possibly a helmet, holds a long staff or weapon, standing near a small tree. At the center of the composition, a tall, slender bird with long legs, a small head, and a long neck stands prominently, its body a light color against the brown background. To the right of the bird, another armored figure, wearing a helmet and lighter clothing, faces left. A large tree with dense green foliage anchors the right side of the painting. Throughout the scene, various sizes of green trees and bushes are scattered, creating a sense of depth. A small, dark, indistinct figure is partially visible at the bottom center of the painting, near the base of the bird.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: Four figures, two standing and two seated, in a muted brown landscape with a small green bush
long_description: A horizontal painting depicts four figures within a muted, earthy landscape. The color palette is dominated by browns and greens, with some accents of red. On the far left, a standing figure with a round head and light-colored, striped lower garments faces towards the right. To its right and slightly lower, a small, bushy green plant with light green foliage is visible. Further to the right, a second standing figure, similar in appearance with a round head and striped lower body, also faces right with arms slightly extended. On the far right side of the composition, two figures are seated on the ground. The larger of the two wears a reddish-brown tunic and faces left, appearing to look down at an object in its lap. Beside it, a smaller figure, dressed in a brown tunic, also faces left with its hands held together in front of its chest. The background is a hazy, light brown, with faint, darker brown shapes in the upper right suggesting distant hills or mountains.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: Three figures walk through a muted landscape with trees, mountains, and an indistinct animal.
long_description: The horizontal painting depicts a muted landscape with three figures and an indistinct animal. On the far left, dense green and brown foliage forms a cluster of trees, partially obscuring a light brown, four-legged animal with a slender neck, possibly a deer, facing right. To its right, a figure in a pale pink or light brown tunic and trousers stands with arms raised, facing right. In the center, a figure in a long, deep red robe with a hood or head covering walks towards the right, head slightly bowed. To the right of this figure, another figure in a muted green or brown tunic and trousers holds a round, reddish-orange object in their hands, also facing right. The background features light brown and grey mountains with pointed peaks, particularly prominent behind the central figures. The ground is a flat, muted brown, with sparse green and yellow-green bushes scattered throughout. The sky is a uniform, faded brown. The overall color palette is subdued, dominated by browns, muted greens, and a single prominent red.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: A long, horizontal painting depicts a muted landscape with blue mountains, green trees, and a small figure
long_description: The artwork is a long, horizontal landscape painting with a muted color palette dominated by browns, greens, and blues. The scene depicts a mountainous and forested area, appearing somewhat faded. On the far left, a cluster of dark green trees with textured foliage occupies the lower and mid-left sections. Above these trees, a small, light-colored figure, possibly a person, is visible, facing towards the right. Moving towards the center, several prominent mountains rise from a hazy, light blue-grey mist or cloud layer. The mountains are rendered in shades of blue and dark grey, with their peaks appearing sharp. Behind these central mountains, more distant, lighter blue mountain forms are visible, fading into the background. The middle ground and foreground are primarily a textured brown, suggesting earth or rock, with scattered patches of green foliage, particularly on the lower right. The upper portion of the painting, above the mountains, is a dark, uniform brown, possibly representing the sky or a distant, obscured background. The overall impression is a serene, somewhat atmospheric natural scene.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: Four figures and a large white bird interact in a hilly landscape with green bushes and distant mountains
long_description:
A horizontal painting depicts a scene with four human figures and a large white bird set within a hilly landscape. The background features rolling hills in muted greens and browns, dotted with small, round green bushes. Some distant peaks appear lighter, possibly snow-capped. The sky above is a dark, muted brown. A small, dark bird flies in the upper left corner.

The midground is dominated by a wide, light brown path or ground area that stretches across the width of the painting. On the far left, a figure stands facing right, dressed in a blue top, a dark skirt, and a red head covering, holding a red, bowl-like object. To their right, two smaller figures, possibly children, are positioned. One, dressed in orange and red, reaches out towards the right, while the other, in blue and green, is close behind. In the center, a large white bird, resembling a swan or goose, stands with its long neck curved, facing towards the right.

Further to the right, another figure in red and blue clothing looks towards the white bird. On the far right, a fourth figure, dressed in blue and orange, holds a long, thin, flute-like object to their mouth. Faint, linear structures are visible in the far right background, blending into the landscape.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: Three figures, a dog, and a flying creature in a mountainous landscape with trees and bushes
long_description: The horizontal painting depicts a mountainous landscape with three figures, an animal, and a flying creature. The background is dominated by dark brown and green hills, with numerous green trees and bushes scattered throughout. A prominent light-colored, possibly snow-capped, mountain peak rises in the mid-left. In the upper left, a small, dark-colored flying creature with wings is visible against the dark sky. Below it, on the left side of the composition, a figure dressed in a pink or light red garment stands with arms outstretched, looking upwards and to the left. In front of this figure, a small, light-colored animal, possibly a dog or deer, is depicted in a crouching or running posture, facing towards the center of the painting. Towards the center, a second figure, also appearing to be a child, wears a red garment and stands facing right, with arms slightly raised. To the right of this central figure, a third figure, dressed in a green garment, holds a long, thin object resembling a stick or spear. This figure faces towards the left, looking towards the other figures. The ground is a muted brown, suggesting a dirt path or terrain. The overall impression is a scene of activity within a natural, rugged environment.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: A horizontal painting shows several figures in hats walking through a mountainous landscape with trees
long_description: The painting is a horizontal landscape rendered in muted, earthy tones. The upper half of the composition is dominated by a series of rugged mountains, depicted in shades of dark brown and grey, with some peaks exhibiting lighter blue-grey accents, possibly suggesting snow or distant haze. The sky above the mountains is a dark, indistinct brown. The lower half of the painting features a ground plane or path in a consistent muted brown. Green foliage, appearing as dense bushes or trees, occupies the far left of the foreground and is scattered in smaller clusters across the midground, providing a contrast to the brown landscape. Five figures are depicted walking across the scene from left to right. On the far left, a figure in light brown attire is partially obscured by green foliage, appearing to carry a yellow, rounded object on their back. To their right, a figure dressed in a dark robe and a wide-brimmed dark hat stands facing right, with another, less distinct figure positioned slightly behind them. Further to the right, two more figures walk in succession, both wearing wide-brimmed dark hats and light-colored robes. The leading figure in this pair appears to be holding a small, dark object. On the far right, the fifth figure, also adorned with a wide-brimmed dark hat and dark clothing, walks rightward, carrying a light-colored, possibly spherical, object in their arms. The overall impression is of a group traversing a natural, mountainous environment.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; color on silk

alt_text: A panoramic painting depicts a landscape with blue-green mountains, traditional buildings, trees, and water
long_description: The painting is a horizontal scroll, primarily in shades of brown, depicting a sprawling landscape. The composition features mountains, water, trees, and numerous architectural complexes. Starting from the left, a large, jagged mountain range with prominent blue-green and lighter green highlights dominates the foreground. Nestled among these peaks and on elevated platforms are several traditional buildings, characterized by their red roofs, blue eaves, and brown walls. A dense cluster of dark green trees, possibly pines, grows on a rocky outcrop in the lower left. Pathways and bridges connect some of these structures. Moving towards the center, the landscape opens into a wide expanse, possibly a body of water or a valley, with distant, softer mountains in the background rendered in lighter blue-green and brown tones. Small, dark shapes, possibly boats, are visible on the water. On the right side, another series of blue-green mountains and rocky formations rises. More architectural complexes, similar in style to those on the left, are situated on these elevated terrains, some connected by long, elevated walkways. Dark green trees are scattered throughout the landscape. The background continues with hazy mountains and a body of water extending into the distance. In the upper right corner, a faint red square with illegible characters is visible. The overall impression is one of a vast, detailed, and somewhat misty natural environment populated with human structures.

metadata.title: 明/清　佚名　趙伯駒(僞款)　漢宮春曉圖　卷|Spring Morning at the Palace of the Han Emperors
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two people in a room, one leaning on a chair, the other standing, with a window and a stringed instrument
long_description: An interior scene depicts two figures and various furnishings within a room with light brown walls and a patterned border at the top and right. The floor features faint diagonal lines. On the left, a long, dark brown stringed instrument rests on a light brown wooden stand. Below the instrument, a small, light brown animal, possibly a cat or dog, interacts with a dark object on the floor. Through an opening on the left wall, a red-orange railing is visible, with green foliage beyond. In the center, a person with a shaved head, dressed in a light green patterned robe and yellow pants, leans forward over the back of a light brown wooden chair. Their arms are crossed on the chair back, and their head rests on their arms, facing left. Their legs extend to the right. Behind this person, another figure stands, facing left, with their right hand near their mouth. This standing figure wears a light green patterned robe, with a pink pleated skirt visible below, and their dark hair is styled in a bun. To the right, a dark brown wooden desk holds a light-colored paper, a dark brown ink stone, and a small blue object. A dark brown cylindrical container filled with several brushes stands on the desk. Above the desk, a window reveals a landscape with a green hill, a light brown path, and a tree with white blossoms against a light background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash landscape with waterfall, pavilion on a hill, and flying bird, beside calligraphic text
long_description: This two-page artwork features an ink wash landscape painting on the left page and vertical calligraphic text on the right page, both rendered in black ink on light-colored paper. The left page depicts a mountainous scene dominated by a tall waterfall cascading down the left side. In the center, a large, rounded hill rises, its surface textured with concentric swirling lines. Perched atop this hill is a small, multi-tiered pavilion, surrounded by sparse foliage. Several pine trees with textured trunks and needle-like branches are visible in the foreground, extending from the lower center towards the right. A small, indistinct figure or boat is situated near the base of these trees. In the upper right portion of the painted area, a bird with outstretched wings flies. Faint, undulating mountain ranges appear in the distant background on the right. Two red seals are present on the painted page, one in the upper right and another in the lower right. The right page contains multiple columns of vertical text, written in black ink, with several red seals interspersed among and below the characters.

metadata.title: 清　詩午閑人　瀟湘八景詩畫　冊|Eight Landscape Scenes and Calligraphy
metadata.medium: Album of twenty-two leaves; ink and wash on paper

alt_text: Colorful illustration of a large pink peony, yellow chrysanthemums, a blue rose, and a butterfly.
long_description: A vibrant botanical illustration depicts a cluster of colorful flowers and a butterfly against a plain, light cream background, framed by a light blue fabric border. A large, full pink peony with numerous layered petals, ranging from deep pink at its center to lighter pink and white at its edges, dominates the center-left. To its upper left is a large yellow chrysanthemum with many thin, radiating petals, and a smaller yellow chrysanthemum appears below it. To the upper right of the peony, a single blue rose with layered petals, a vivid sky blue, stands out. Perched directly above the blue rose is a butterfly with dark brown wings, each featuring prominent orange and blue eye-spots. Its body is dark. Dark green leaves and stems, some with visible thorns, intertwine around and beneath the flowers. To the lower right, a cluster of small red berries on thin green stems extends outwards from the main floral arrangement.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; color on pith paper

alt_text: A traditional ink wash painting depicts a landscape with mountains, water, willow trees, and a pavilion with two figures.
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape with mountains, water, and a foreground featuring trees and a small structure. In the background, several large, dark grey mountains rise, their peaks dotted with small dark marks suggesting foliage. Behind these, lighter, more distant mountains are visible, some with soft pinkish-red and light blue washes along their upper edges, blending into a pale sky. The midground is dominated by a wide expanse of light-colored water or mist, with several dark, low-lying landmasses or islands scattered across it. In the right foreground, two prominent willow trees with dark, gnarled trunks and long, drooping branches extend upwards and outwards. Their branches are rendered with fine, dark lines, suggesting sparse foliage. Beneath the willows and extending over the water, a small, open-sided pavilion with a dark, peaked roof stands on stilts. Inside the pavilion, two figures are seated on the floor, facing each other. They are depicted in simple, light-colored robes. Dark, textured rock formations and smaller bushes are clustered around the base of the pavilion and the willow trees, extending into the water. On the left side of the foreground, clusters of light blue-green dots are scattered, representing low-lying bushes or water plants, also extending into the water. The overall color palette is muted, primarily consisting of various shades of grey and black ink, with subtle accents of pinkish-red, light blue, and light blue-green.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A traditional landscape painting depicts two figures on a bridge over a stream, with a temple nestled among trees and mountains.
long_description: This horizontal landscape painting features a muted color palette dominated by grays, greens, and light browns against a pale, hazy background. The composition is divided by a winding stream that flows from the right foreground towards the left midground. On the left side, a steep, dark gray mountain rises, covered with sparse, dark green foliage and small trees. In the distance, lighter gray, indistinct mountains are visible beneath a pale sky. In the midground, two figures are depicted on a light-colored arched bridge spanning the stream. The figure on the left, smaller, appears to be carrying something on their back. The figure on the right, larger, wears a light-colored robe and faces towards the left. The stream below the bridge shows light ripples. To the right of the stream and bridge, a complex of buildings with dark, tiled roofs and red-orange walls is nestled into a sloping hillside. These structures are partially obscured by dense clusters of bamboo and pine trees, rendered in various shades of green and gray. A large, gnarled pine tree with a thick, twisted trunk and long needles extends over the buildings from the upper right. The hillside itself is a mix of gray rock and dark green vegetation. The foreground consists of rocky banks and scattered dark green bushes. In the bottom left corner, a small, square red seal is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting a serene landscape with mountains, a body of water, boats, a village, and trees
long_description: This horizontal ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape. In the background, layered mountains in various shades of gray and light blue recede into a hazy distance, their peaks softly rendered. The middle ground features a wide expanse of light-colored water, likely a lake or river, with two small boats, each carrying a single figure, moving from left to right. Darker, textured land masses or islands are visible along the far bank of the water, at the base of the mountains. The foreground on the left side shows a cluster of small, simple houses with light roofs and dark walls, forming a village. Numerous trees with dark trunks and dense, dark green foliage are interspersed among the houses and along the water's edge. On the right side of the foreground, a small, open-sided pavilion with a dark roof stands on a small island or peninsula, surrounded by trees. A small, arched bridge connects this area to the village on the left, spanning a narrow channel of water. Another bare, gnarled tree is also visible on the right. The color palette is predominantly shades of gray and black ink, with subtle washes of light blue in the distant mountains and light brown for some roofs and tree trunks. The paper itself is a light, warm beige. A red square seal with illegible characters is visible in the upper left corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel painting of a garden with a winding stream, large trees, rocks, and white flowering plants
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal, multi-panel painting depicting a natural landscape. The background is a textured, speckled golden-brown, suggesting ground or earth. On the left side, a light-colored, winding stream or river flows from the upper left corner, curving towards the bottom center. Its surface is rendered with delicate, parallel wavy lines. Along the upper left bank of the stream and extending into the top left corner, dense bushes or trees with numerous small white flowers and green leaves are depicted. More sparse white flowers on slender branches are visible in the lower left foreground. In the central panels, several large trees with thick, dark brown trunks and broad, green foliage dominate the upper half. Beneath these trees, smaller plants with green leaves and a few clusters of reddish-pink flowers emerge from the speckled ground. The right side of the painting features more trees with green foliage in the upper right. Below them, a cluster of large, rounded rocks in varying shades of green and brown are arranged, appearing to form a small bank or outcrop. Further to the right, the speckled golden-brown ground continues, with a few sparse green plants bearing white flowers in the lower right foreground. The overall composition creates a sense of a lush, natural environment.

metadata.title: 渓流春秋草木図屏風|Spring Trees and Grasses by a Stream
metadata.medium: One of a pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, gold, and silver on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel screen painting depicting trees with yellow leaves and white flowers, plants, and a winding stream on a textured background.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal, multi-panel screen, likely composed of six vertical panels, framed by a dark brown border. The background of the entire composition is a mottled, textured surface, appearing as if made from gold leaf with a speckled or brushed pattern, predominantly in muted tones of gold, brown, and gray.A wide, light-colored, wavy band, resembling a stream or a stylized cloud formation, traverses horizontally across the middle of the panels. This band is interrupted in places but generally flows from the left side towards the right.On the far left, a tall, slender tree with numerous branches covered in bright yellow, autumnal leaves dominates the left two panels. To its immediate right, a smaller tree with a darker, curved trunk features clusters of white flowers with distinct red centers, interspersed with some yellow leaves. Below these trees, in the lower left, are a few green leafy plants and several rounded forms in shades of reddish-brown and dark green, suggesting rocks or mounds.The central panels continue the textured background, with the wavy band passing through. Here, sparser vegetation includes smaller green plants and clusters of tiny white flowers near the bottom edge. Further to the right, two prominent trees with thick, dark trunks and large, broad, brown leaves stand. One of these trees has a particularly gnarled trunk. To the far right, tall, slender stalks of golden-yellow grass or reeds rise from the bottom edge, extending upwards against the textured background and the winding light band. The overall color palette is earthy, featuring golds, browns, greens, and whites, with small accents of red.

metadata.title: 渓流春秋草木図屏風|Autumn Trees and Grasses by a Stream
metadata.medium: One of a pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, gold, and silver on paper

alt_text: A robed figure with a staff walks in a circular landscape with trees, next to columns of text.
long_description: The artwork is presented on a light brown, aged paper, divided into two main sections. On the left, a circular illustration depicts a muted landscape scene. A small figure, dressed in a red robe with green accents and dark hair styled in a bun, walks from left to right, holding a light brown staff. The figure is positioned in the lower right quadrant of the circle. To the left of the figure, two trees with light brown trunks and green-blue foliage grow on a small, grassy hill. The ground is a mix of light green and muted brown, with sparse tufts of green grass. In the background, faint, light brown hills are visible, suggesting a distant horizon over a flat, light-colored expanse that could be water or land. The colors within the circle are predominantly muted greens, browns, and a touch of red. To the right of the circular illustration, several columns of vertical text are written in black ink. The text is arranged in neat, narrow columns, filling the right half of the paper. The paper itself shows signs of age, with some creases and slight discoloration.

metadata.title: 十牛頌図巻|Ten Verses on Oxherding
metadata.medium: Handscroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Two figures with bows sit on a purple hill under a dark blue, starry night sky with a moon.
long_description: The rectangular image depicts a night scene with two figures seated on a large, undulating hill. The upper portion of the image is a dark blue sky, dotted with numerous small white stars. A pale, circular moon is visible in the upper center-right. A lighter blue band forms the horizon line beneath the starry sky. The central feature is a large, purple-brown hill with a wavy, textured surface, occupying the lower half of the image. On the left side of the hill, a figure with light skin, dark hair, and a topknot sits facing right. This figure wears an orange lower garment, a white and striped sash, and white arm and leg bands. A quiver of arrows is visible behind their back, and they hold a bow. To the right, a second figure with dark skin, dark hair, and a topknot sits facing left. This figure wears a yellow lower garment with red dots, a white and red beaded necklace, and white arm and leg bands. They also have a quiver of arrows and hold a bow. To the far left, a tall, slender tree with a light brown trunk and a dense, green, vertical, striped canopy stands. To the far right, behind the dark-skinned figure, a smaller tree with a brown trunk bears several clusters of yellow, banana-like fruit. The entire scene is framed by a thick, reddish-orange border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink, opaque watercolor, and silver on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicting a gathering of eight figures, including a warrior, sages, a woman, and animals
long_description: A vertical scroll painting on a light brown background features eight figures, animals, and various objects arranged in a clustered composition. At the top, a large, robust figure with a dark helmet, a red plume, and a long dark beard sits cross-legged. He wears green and white robes and holds a small, dark pagoda-like object. White ribbons or sashes flow around him. To his lower left, a bald, smiling man in a light brown robe sits, holding a dark cup to his mouth. Below these two, a group of six figures and several objects are arranged. On the left, a bald, bare-chested man with a beard smiles. Next to him, a large, older man with a long white beard and a pink robe sits, looking down. To his right, another bearded man in green robes sits, looking towards the woman. A white deer with small antlers sits beside the older man on the left. In the center of this lower group, a small table or tray holds a bowl of colorful fruits (red, green, yellow) and a stack of bamboo scrolls. To the right of the table, a man with a dark hat and white robes sits, looking towards the woman. On the far right, a woman with an elaborate dark hairstyle adorned with flowers sits, wearing a patterned green and pink kimono. She holds a small object in her hands. Near her, a dark jug and two small red cups are on the ground. A small turtle or tortoise is visible on the ground in the lower right. In the lower left corner, the inscription "二川" and a red seal are visible. The overall color palette is muted, with earthy tones, greens, pinks, and browns, against the light brown scroll background.

metadata.title: 長澤蘆洲筆 七福神図|Seven Gods of Good Fortune
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A seated person with a mustache, wearing a blue patterned robe, green lower garment, and black hat
long_description: A full-length, frontal portrait depicts a person seated against a plain, light brown background. The person has a round, light-skinned face with small, dark eyes, a thin mustache, and a small, red mouth. A black, somewhat rectangular hat sits atop their head, with dark hair visible pulled back. They wear a wide, blue robe adorned with a repeating pattern of gold and lighter blue swirling shapes. A strip of light pink fabric is visible beneath the blue robe, around the neck and chest area. The wide sleeves of the blue robe extend outwards, obscuring the hands. Below the robe, a light green garment covers the lower body, forming two large, rounded shapes as the person sits with bent legs. In the bottom left corner, a small, faded red square contains faint, illegible markings. The background is otherwise unadorned, with some minor discoloration visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Twelve small paintings; on silk?

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting delicate plant stems with leaves and clusters of flowers on a light background
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting features plant forms rendered in black, grey, and reddish-brown against a light, subtly textured background. The composition is dominated by several thin stems that extend diagonally across the canvas, primarily from the lower right towards the upper left. In the upper left quadrant, a slender stem rises vertically, adorned with small, light grey, elongated leaves and topped by a cluster of dark, looped forms resembling buds or flowers. Below this, a reddish-brown stem crosses diagonally, bearing similar light grey leaves. Towards the center and mid-right, a more complex arrangement of stems and foliage appears. Here, darker, broader strokes of black ink form dense, abstract leaf-like shapes, interspersed with lighter grey, more delicate looped forms that suggest blossoms. Several thin, dark vertical lines, some short and others longer, punctuate the composition, particularly in the lower right, where a few short strokes resemble blades of grass. The background is a soft, off-white or very light grey, with faint horizontal creases and subtle washes that add depth and texture to the paper. The brushwork varies from fine, precise lines to softer, more diffused washes, creating a sense of organic movement and lightness.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Isometric view of figures with long black hair in a traditional building, partially obscured by clouds
long_description: The image depicts an isometric view of a traditional building interior and an adjacent exterior garden, rendered in ink on a light-toned paper, with areas of stylized light brown clouds. On the left, several figures are visible, primarily defined by their long, flowing black hair, which appears as solid black shapes. Two figures are seated or kneeling in a room, one positioned near a small, rectangular, light-colored object. The room features patterned screens and wooden floorboards. Moving towards the center and right, more architectural elements of the building are shown, including additional rooms with pillars and railings, all rendered with fine black lines. Parts of these areas are obscured by large, amorphous shapes of light brown, representing stylized clouds. To the upper right, an exterior garden area is depicted, featuring tall, wispy grass and leafy plants, also drawn with fine black lines. The overall perspective allows for a simultaneous view into multiple spaces, both indoor and outdoor.

metadata.title: 土佐光則筆　源氏物語画帖|Albums of scenes from The Tale of Genji
metadata.medium: Two albums of thirty leaves; ink, red pigment, and gold on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel screen painting depicts a misty mountain landscape with trees and rocks in ink on a gold background
long_description: This six-panel screen painting presents a sweeping landscape rendered in ink wash on a gold background, framed by a dark brown border with a subtle geometric pattern. The overall impression is one of a misty or cloud-shrouded mountain scene. The background of each panel is a luminous, speckled gold, which serves as both sky and atmospheric mist, obscuring parts of the landscape. In the upper half of the composition, a series of rugged, angular mountains rise, depicted with varying shades of black and gray ink. These peaks appear and recede into the golden mist, with some showing sharp, defined edges and others fading into soft washes. The mountains are most prominent in the central panels, becoming fainter towards the left and right edges. The mid-ground and foreground feature clusters of trees and scattered rocks. On the left side, a tall, gnarled tree with delicate, bare branches stands out, surrounded by smaller, less defined trees and rocky formations. Further to the right, more groups of trees and distinct rock formations are visible, rendered with a combination of fine lines and ink washes. The ground beneath these elements is also suggested by soft gray washes. A vertical column of faint, dark text is visible in the lower left corner of the first panel. The use of ink on the shimmering gold creates a sense of depth and an ethereal, atmospheric quality throughout the expansive landscape.

metadata.title: 中林竹渓筆 夏秋山水図屏風|Summer and Autumn Landscapes
metadata.medium: Pair of six-panel folding screens; ink, color, and gold flecks on paper

alt_text: A folding fan displays a painted landscape of rolling hills, numerous trees, and several small figures
long_description: An open folding fan is presented against a black background, angled slightly downwards and to the right. The fan's paper surface is a light cream color, adorned with a detailed landscape painting. The scene features a series of rolling hills, rendered with soft washes of light blue, green, and brown, creating a sense of depth. Numerous trees, varying in size and shape, are depicted across these hills, with foliage in shades of dark green, yellowish-green, and brown. The brushstrokes for the trees are distinct, giving them a textured appearance. Several small human figures are visible within the landscape. One figure, dressed in blue, appears to be walking up a path on a hill towards the left. Another figure, also in blue, is positioned further to the right, seemingly engaged in an activity like fishing or carrying an object. Other less distinct figures are interspersed among the trees and hills. A small red mark, resembling a seal or signature, is visible on the painted surface near the bottom right of the central painted area. The fan's wooden ribs, a light brown color, fan out from a central pivot point at the bottom. The outermost ribs are thicker and decorated with a subtle pattern of small, dark shapes on a lighter background. Attached to the pivot point is a decorative element consisting of a silver-colored bead and a light-colored, fluffy tassel hanging downwards.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Folding fan; ink and color on paper, with mounting in ivory

alt_text: A colorful rooster stands on a rocky incline with bamboo and blue morning glories in a vertical scroll
long_description: A vertical Japanese hanging scroll features a vibrant rooster standing on a rocky incline. The rooster, positioned in the lower-center, faces left with its head slightly turned back, showcasing a prominent red comb and wattle. Its plumage is a mix of white and cream on the neck and head, transitioning to iridescent blues, dark browns, and black on its body and long, curving tail feathers. Its legs and feet are a pale, light color. To the left of the rooster, several slender bamboo stalks with dark green leaves rise vertically. To its right, a vine with green leaves and several blue and white morning glory flowers, some fully open, some in bud, grows on a small mound. The ground beneath the rooster is depicted with rocky formations and sparse, light green vegetation, accented with small gold flecks. The background is a light golden-brown wash, with subtle vertical brushstrokes. In the upper right corner, a vertical column of black calligraphic text is visible, followed by a small red square seal. The central painting is framed by a narrow gold band, which is then bordered by a wider dark brown fabric with a repeating gold floral pattern.

metadata.title: 宋紫山筆　嵐に鶏図|Rooster in a Storm
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A man and two women in traditional attire in a moonlit garden, one woman playing a stringed instrument
long_description: The painting depicts a night scene with three figures in a garden setting, framed by a dark border within a wider, distressed light brown border. The upper portion of the central scene features a dark blue night sky with a white crescent moon and scattered white stars. Below the sky, green hills rise in the background, with a white building featuring a pink roofline visible on the left. In the foreground, a man is seated on a light and dark checkered patio, facing towards the right. He wears a long, dark pink robe with a patterned, pleated dark skirt and a white turban adorned with a plume. To his left, a woman kneels, holding and playing a stringed instrument. She is dressed in an orange skirt, a yellow top, and a sheer veil. To the man's right, another woman stands beneath a large green tree with white blossoms. She wears a long red dress and holds a small white object in her right hand. A low red railing separates the patio from the viewer. The top of the painting, above the main scene, contains text in an Indian script: "अथदीपकुरागनीश्रीचंद्ररातगये".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink, opaque watercolor, silver and gold on paper

alt_text: A woman plays a stringed instrument to a deer in a hilly landscape, with two figures on a white building
long_description: A vertical rectangular painting features a vibrant scene framed by a wide red border and a thin blue inner border. The artwork depicts a hilly landscape with a prominent white multi-story building on the right. On the rooftop of this building, two figures are seated. The figure on the left has blue skin, wears elaborate headwear, and extends an arm towards the left. The figure on the right has lighter skin, also wears ornate headwear, and holds a fan-like object. Below them, on the right side of the building, a woman with light skin is depicted. She is dressed in a green sari-like garment and is playing a stringed instrument, possibly a veena, looking towards the left. In the center-left foreground, a grey deer with long, curved antlers stands, looking up and towards the woman. The landscape consists of rolling hills in shades of yellow and green, dotted with numerous small trees with green foliage and dark trunks. Some larger, bare trees are also visible on the hillsides. In the upper left, a white animal, possibly a rabbit or hare, is seen on a hillside. The sky above is blue with some white cloud-like formations and small black bird-like shapes. The overall color palette is rich with yellows, greens, blues, and reds.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink and opaque watercolor on cloth

alt_text: A crowned figure sits on a white animal, surrounded by clouds and dragons, beneath a moon and two red orbs
long_description: This vertical painting depicts a central, crowned figure seated on a white animal, set against a dark, wavy background. At the top, three circular elements are arranged horizontally: a white disc on the left, and two reddish-orange discs on the right, each resting on a lotus-like base. The central figure faces forward, wearing an elaborate gold crown and robes of green, red, and gold. The figure holds a vertical sword in its right hand. A fiery red and gold aura surrounds the figure, which sits upon a large, swirling cloud formation. Beneath the figure, a white, four-legged animal, resembling a fox or dog, lies on its stomach, also resting on clouds. The animal has a collar with small red elements. Below the white animal, two green and red dragons emerge from swirling clouds, facing outwards to the left and right. The entire central composition is framed by a patterned inner border and a wider gold outer border. The dominant colors are gold, dark brown, red, green, and white.

metadata.title: 荼枳尼天像|Dakini
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on hemp

alt_text: Faded painting on wood panel depicting a standing figure with a halo and clasped hands
long_description: A tall, narrow, rectangular wooden panel features a faded, vertical painting of a single standing figure. The figure is positioned centrally on the panel, facing forward with the head slightly tilted to the left and eyes cast downwards. A faint, lighter circular halo is visible behind the figure's head. Darker areas suggest hair or a headdress. The figure's body is elongated, covered in long, flowing robes that extend down the length of the panel. The hands are held together at chest level, with fingers faintly discernible. Vertical lines, possibly representing folds in drapery or decorative elements, run down the robes. The painting is significantly worn, with large areas of paint loss revealing the darker, textured wood grain beneath. The overall tonality is a mix of dark grays, lighter grays, and off-white where the paint is preserved, contrasting with the darker background of the exposed wood. The bottom section of the panel shows more extensive wear and less discernible detail of the figure's lower body or feet. The edges of the wooden panel appear rough and uneven.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Water-based pigment on wood

alt_text: A rectangular panel features a damaged painting of a frontal human face with dark hair and a neckband
long_description: A rectangular, light brown panel features a painted section in its upper-middle portion. This roughly rectangular painted area, predominantly dark-toned, depicts a frontal human face. The face has a light, warm brown skin tone, with open eyes outlined in dark pigment, gazing slightly towards the viewer's right. Dark, arched lines form the eyebrows, and a small, straight line represents the mouth. A small, reddish-orange mark is vertically positioned on the forehead between the eyebrows. Dark hair or a head covering frames the face, with a lighter band visible around the forehead. A prominent, thick, light-colored band encircles the neck. The background of the painted section is mostly dark, with areas of deep red visible on the left side. The painted surface shows significant wear and damage, including flaking paint and exposed darker underlayers, particularly around the edges of the painted area. The unpainted border of the panel is a uniform light brown.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: A damaged fresco fragment shows the upper body of a serene figure with a halo, crown, and draped garments.
long_description: A vertical, rectangular fragment of a painted artwork is mounted on a light brown board. The painted surface is heavily damaged, with large areas of paint missing and the plaster cracked and eroded. The central element is the upper body of a figure, facing slightly to the viewer's right, with the head turned to look forward. The figure has a light-colored face with elongated, downcast eyes, a small nose, and a small, closed mouth. A dark, thin line defines the eyebrows, and a prominent dark circular mark is on the forehead. The figure wears an elaborate, dark crown or headdress with visible patterns. Behind the head is a light-colored, circular halo or nimbus, outlined in dark grey. The figure's neck is adorned with a dark, multi-layered necklace. The shoulders and upper torso are draped in flowing garments. A prominent sash or scarf, colored a pale green-blue, drapes over the left shoulder and across the chest. Other parts of the garment are dark with lighter, curved lines suggesting folds or patterns. Armbands are visible on the upper arms. The lower part of the torso and arms are largely missing or heavily damaged. The dominant colors are muted greys, browns, and black for the outlines and details, with areas of pale green-blue for the sash and light grey for the skin. The background behind the figure is dark grey or black.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: A fragment of a painted human face with blue-grey skin and reddish features, set within a textured, light brown block
