long_description: A rectangular, light brown block features a deeply recessed, irregularly shaped area in its center. Within this recess, a fragment of a painted human face is visible. The face is depicted with light blue-grey skin tones, and its features are outlined in reddish-brown. Almond-shaped eyes with dark pupils and light irises are present, topped by arched eyebrows. A reddish-brown line defines the bridge and tip of the nose, extending to outline the upper lip, which is also rendered in reddish-brown. A band of reddish-brown is visible around the neck area. The painted surface is significantly damaged, with large areas of paint loss revealing the rough, textured material beneath. Patches of light blue, green, and brown paint are visible in the background areas surrounding the face, indicating a larger original composition. The fragment is oriented vertically, with the face looking directly forward.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: Damaged fresco fragment showing a face with an eye, nose, and mouth on a light brown background
long_description: The image displays a square, light brown panel with a heavily damaged, irregular fragment of a fresco embedded in its center. The fragment, roughly oval in shape, features a face rendered in muted tones, primarily light gray and white. The surface of the fragment is rough and cracked, with significant portions of the original material missing, particularly around its perimeter. Visible features of the face include a right eye, a nose, and a mouth. Above the eye, a blue arch is visible, with a blue circular shape to its left. A thin green line curves above the blue arch. The nose is a simple, elongated shape, and the mouth is a small, reddish-brown line. The face itself is light-colored, contrasting with the darker, textured areas of damage. The surrounding panel is a uniform, plain light brown, providing a neutral backdrop for the central artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Pigments on mud plaster

alt_text: A painting of a sprawling traditional architectural complex with red walls and dark roofs, set among mountains, trees, and water.
long_description:
The painting depicts a vast architectural complex with multiple buildings and courtyards, set within a natural landscape. In the background, several layers of misty, grey-blue mountains rise, with a body of water and smaller structures visible at their base on the left. The sky above is a pale, light grey, blending into the distant mountains.

The central and foreground areas are dominated by the complex, which features numerous buildings with dark grey, almost black, tiled roofs and prominent red walls and pillars. Many structures are connected by long, open-sided corridors, also with red pillars and dark roofs, forming large courtyards. The main building in the upper right-center is the largest, with a wide, dark roof and a large open courtyard in front of it. Smaller, multi-tiered pagoda-like structures are also visible within the complex.

Throughout the complex, small, indistinct figures in light-colored clothing are scattered, walking along pathways and within courtyards. Lush green trees with dark foliage are interspersed among the buildings, along with several trees featuring white blossoms, suggesting spring. Pine-like trees with dark green needles are visible in the lower foreground. The ground throughout the complex is a light, sandy beige color. The overall impression is one of a grand, traditional estate or temple complex.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a misty mountain landscape with cliffs, trees, a pavilion, and water
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting, rendered in shades of gray, depicts a serene mountainous landscape shrouded in mist. The upper third of the composition is dominated by a large, rounded mountain, its peak fading into the light gray background, suggesting distance and atmospheric haze. Below and to the right, a steep, jagged cliff face descends, densely covered with dark, textured trees that appear as clusters of vertical strokes. Midway down the cliff, a small, light-colored pavilion with a distinct pointed roof is perched on a prominent, dark rock outcrop that juts out towards the left. Below this outcrop, the landscape becomes more abstract, with swirling lighter grays indicating mist or flowing water, interspersed with darker, more defined rocky forms and scattered trees. In the lower right, a solitary, dark, gnarled tree stands on a lower rock formation. To the left, horizontal strokes of lighter gray suggest a body of water or rapids at the base of the scene. In the bottom right corner, small, dark calligraphic characters and a square red seal are visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two peacocks stand among pine branches and blooming peonies on a rocky landscape
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting depicting two peacocks amidst a natural setting of pine branches, rocks, and peonies. The background is a muted, earthy tan color, suggesting an aged silk or paper surface. In the upper left, a large peacock faces right, its head turned slightly upwards. It has a dark green-blue body with lighter blue feathers on its wings and a prominent white patch around its eye and a crest on its head. Its long, dark tail feathers, adorned with brown "eyes," extend downwards along the left side of the composition. To its right and slightly below, a second peacock faces left, its head also turned upwards. Its plumage is similar, with dark green-blue feathers and a white patch on its head. Its tail feathers are less visible, partially obscured by the first peacock's tail and the surrounding elements. Scattered around the peacocks are several large, full peonies. Two prominent pink peonies are visible near the center, one below the first peacock's chest and another slightly to the right. A large white peony blooms lower on the right, and a smaller red flower is visible towards the bottom left. Dark green pine branches with clustered needles extend from the top right and are interspersed throughout the rocky, textured ground that forms the base of the scene. The entire painting is framed by a light gold border with a subtle patterned texture.

metadata.title: 松牡丹孔雀図|Peacocks, Pine Tree, and Peonies
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of a small bird perched on bamboo branches with leaves, on a light scroll.
long_description: A monochrome ink painting on a light, aged paper depicts a bird perched on bamboo. The artwork is framed by a gold-colored fabric border with a subtle, repeating pattern. On the left side, two thick bamboo stalks rise vertically, rendered with varying shades of grey ink. Several dark, elongated bamboo leaves extend from these stalks and thinner branches. Slightly right of the center, a small, plump bird with a relatively long, pointed beak is perched on a thin bamboo branch. The bird faces left, its body detailed with darker ink on its back and wings, and lighter grey on its belly and throat. More dark bamboo leaves extend from branches above and below the bird, and towards the right side of the composition. In the bottom left corner, a vertical inscription in black ink is visible, accompanied by a square red seal directly below it. The paper background is a light, warm beige, showing some minor discoloration and small specks consistent with age.

metadata.title: 竹に翡翠図|Kingfisher and Bamboo
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A black and white ink painting on a scroll depicts a bird perched on a diagonal branch.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a bird perched on a branch, rendered in black ink on a light, aged paper background. The scroll has a gold-colored border with a subtle patterned texture on the left and right sides, and a plain gold border at the top and bottom. The painting itself occupies the central rectangular area. A small, dark-feathered bird with a pointed beak and a crest of feathers on its head is positioned in the lower-left-center. It faces left, with its body angled slightly downwards. Its legs are thin and dark, gripping a thick, gnarled branch that extends diagonally upwards from the lower-left towards the upper-right. The branch is rendered with varying shades of black ink, suggesting texture and depth. To the far right of the painting, a few thin, vertical lines, also in black ink, extend downwards from the top edge, resembling slender reeds or leaves. The background is a uniform, light, off-white color, providing a stark contrast to the dark ink elements. A small, square red seal with black characters is visible in the lower right corner of the painted area, near the base of the vertical lines.

metadata.title: 柳鷺図 (Ryūro zu)|Heron and Willow
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A bald, bearded man with large earrings sits in a loose robe, depicted in ink wash on a scroll
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting depicting a seated, bald, and bearded man rendered in black ink on a light-colored paper background. The man is positioned centrally, facing slightly to his left with his head turned to look directly forward. His eyes are wide and intense, with prominent, dark eyebrows. He has a full, dark beard and mustache. Large, circular, dark-colored earrings hang from his elongated earlobes. His head is bald, with some dark hair visible behind his ears. He wears a loose, flowing robe, indicated by broad, dark ink lines, which drapes over his shoulders and body, revealing a portion of his bare chest. His hands are not visible, as they are covered by the robe or positioned out of view. The figure is drawn with strong, expressive brushstrokes, particularly for the outlines of his body and facial features. To the right of the man's head, near his right shoulder, there are two small, square red seals. The central painting is framed by decorative borders on all four sides. The top and bottom borders are narrow strips of light gold with a subtle pattern. The wider side borders feature a dark green background with an intricate, repeating pattern of gold floral motifs.

metadata.title: 達磨図 (Daruma zu)|Bodhidharma (Daruma)
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting on a vertical scroll depicting a small bird in flight near a tall bamboo stalk
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a minimalist ink wash scene on a light beige background, framed by decorative borders. The central image depicts a single, thick bamboo stalk rendered in dark black ink, positioned on the right side of the composition and extending upwards from the bottom edge. The stalk shows distinct segments and a few broad leaves extending from its right side, also in dark ink. To the left of the bamboo, slightly above its midpoint, a small bird is depicted in mid-flight. The bird has outstretched wings and is rendered with varying shades of gray and black ink, showing details in its feathers. A small, square red seal is visible near the base of the bamboo stalk on the right. The main painting area is bordered by a light gold-colored fabric at the top, featuring a subtle pattern of floral motifs. The vertical side borders are made of a lighter beige fabric, interspersed with horizontal bands of gold and sections with stylized light blue and green cloud-like or mountain patterns.

metadata.title: 竹雀図 (Chikujaku zu)|Sparrow and Bamboo
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A large, dark bird of prey with spread wings and extended talons descends towards a light mass.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a large bird of prey against a plain, light brown background. The bird dominates the lower half of the composition, depicted in a dynamic, downward-swooping pose. Its wings are spread wide, showing individual feathers rendered in varying shades of dark grey and black, with lighter grey on the undersides. The bird's body is dark, while its head and neck are a lighter grey, almost white, with a sharp, hooked beak and a visible eye. Its powerful talons, rendered in white with dark claws, are extended forward and downward, grasping or reaching towards an indistinct, lighter-toned mass below it. This mass is rendered with soft, swirling brushstrokes in light grey, suggesting clouds or a turbulent surface. The bird's legs are dark and feathered. In the lower left corner, there is a vertical inscription in black ink, followed by a square red seal. The background is otherwise unadorned, a uniform light brown, with faint horizontal lines visible in the upper portion.

metadata.title: 猿を襲う鷲図|Eagle Attacking a Monkey
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A large bird of prey, a feline, and a snake in a dynamic struggle near a waterfall
long_description: A vertical monochromatic scroll painting depicts a dramatic scene in a natural setting. In the upper right, a waterfall cascades down a rocky cliff, rendered with varying shades of grey and black ink to suggest movement and depth. Below the waterfall and extending across the upper-middle section is a large bird of prey, possibly a hawk or eagle, with its wings partially spread and its head turned downwards, observing the action below. Its feathers are detailed with fine brushstrokes. In the lower-middle, a small, agile feline-like creature, with fur indicated by short, energetic strokes, is engaged in a struggle with a coiled snake. The feline appears to be pouncing or grappling with the snake, its claws visible. The snake's body is intertwined, suggesting movement and resistance. To the left of the central figures, a leafy branch with small berries extends into the scene. More foliage is visible on the right side, near the base of the waterfall. The background is a light, sepia-toned wash, providing contrast to the darker ink work of the figures and landscape elements. On the left side, mid-height, there is a vertical line of calligraphy and a square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A large white bird with an open beak perches on a gnarled tree trunk, while a small striped animal climbs above.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a large white bird perched on a gnarled tree trunk against a light tan background. The bird, positioned in the lower center, faces left with its head turned to the right, its dark beak open. It has dark markings around its eyes and its white feathers are rendered with subtle shading. Its talons firmly grip the textured, dark brown and black ink-washed tree trunk. This gnarled trunk extends from the bottom right corner upwards along the right side of the composition. In the upper right section of the tree trunk, a small, striped, squirrel-like animal is depicted climbing downwards, looking towards the bird. Sparse bamboo leaves, rendered in dark ink wash, are visible in the upper left and lower left areas of the painting. On the left side, near the bird's body, there is a vertical column of black text accompanied by a square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a large bird of prey perched on a gnarled rock, looking down at a running hare
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on light brown paper depicts a dynamic scene in shades of black and grey. In the upper center, a large bird of prey, likely a hawk or eagle, is perched on a rugged, gnarled rock formation or tree trunk. Its body is angled slightly to the left, with its wings partially spread, revealing detailed, mottled feathers. The bird's head is turned sharply to the right and angled downwards, its beak slightly open, and its sharp talons are visible gripping the textured surface of the rock. Below the bird, towards the lower left, a small animal resembling a hare or rabbit is depicted in mid-leap, running away from the bird across a rocky, undulating landscape. The foreground features sparse, jagged brushstrokes suggesting low hills and vegetation. In the upper background, faint, misty mountains rise, rendered with soft, diffused ink washes. To the right of the bird, vertical calligraphic text is visible, accompanied by a square red seal impression.

metadata.title: 兎を追う鷲図|Eagle Pursuing Rabbit
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Seated figure in white robes with golden skin, surrounded by trees, rocks, and a fish in water
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a seated figure with golden skin and white robes, set within a natural landscape rendered primarily in grayscale with gold accents. The central figure sits cross-legged on a dark, jagged rock formation. The figure wears flowing white garments with intricate folds, a golden necklace, and an elaborate golden headdress. The hands are clasped in front of the chest, holding a string of beads. A faint golden halo or moon-like disc is visible behind the figure's head. To the left, a willow tree with long, drooping branches extends downwards. To the right, a gnarled, dark tree trunk with bare branches rises. An ornate golden vessel with a lid rests on a rock at the base of this tree. The lower half of the image features dark rock formations and a body of water. Pine needles or similar foliage are scattered among the rocks. A large fish with golden scales swims in the water, positioned towards the lower left. The background is a lighter gray, suggesting a misty atmosphere. The overall palette is dominated by shades of gray, black, and white, with significant use of gold for the figure's skin, adornments, the vessel, and the fish.

metadata.title: 白衣観音図|White-Robed Kannon
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome ink painting of two dark birds perched on a pine branch, with one looking forward.
long_description: A monochrome ink painting depicts two dark birds perched on a gnarled pine branch against a light, unadorned background. The bird on the left is positioned slightly forward of the right bird, facing directly towards the viewer with its head turned. Its body is rendered in deep, almost solid black ink, with subtle variations suggesting feather texture. Its claws grip the branch. The bird on the right is positioned with its back to the viewer, its body also rendered in dark ink, appearing slightly larger and more upright than the left bird. Its wings are folded, and its head is not visible. Both birds are substantial in size, occupying the central vertical space of the composition. The pine branch, rendered in varying shades of dark grey and black ink, extends horizontally across the lower half of the image, with clusters of sharp, dark pine needles visible below and around the birds' feet. A thicker section of the branch extends upwards on the right side. In the lower right corner, dark calligraphic characters are visible above a square red seal.

metadata.title: 松に鴉図|Two Crows on a Pine Branch
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a snow-capped mountain above a rocky island with trees and a boat on water
long_description: The artwork is an ink wash painting, primarily in shades of black, gray, and white, on a light, off-white background. The composition features a large mountain in the upper center, a rocky island in the mid-ground, and water with a boat in the lower right. The prominent mountain, likely snow-capped, occupies the upper half of the painting. Its peak is rendered with sharp, dark lines defining ridges, while lighter gray washes suggest snow and rock faces. Wispy, lighter gray clouds or mist partially obscure its base, blending into the background. Below and to the left of the mountain, a large, dark, rocky island or cliff rises from the water. Its form is defined by strong, dark brushstrokes and contrasting lighter gray areas, indicating rugged terrain. Several small, dark trees with sparse, needle-like foliage are depicted on the upper slopes of this island. To the right of this main island, several smaller, dark rocks emerge from the water, also rendered with dark, textured strokes. The lower portion of the painting depicts water with stylized, undulating waves, created with light, curving lines and washes. A small, dark boat with a single sail is visible in the water to the right, appearing distant and partially obscured by mist or distance. The background is a light, uniform gray wash, suggesting a hazy or atmospheric sky. In the upper right corner, there is vertical text in dark characters, followed by two red square seals. The text reads: "知足常樂" and "朝聞道".

metadata.title: 富士図|Mount Fuji
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large, gnarled tree with many black birds, some flying, over a misty forest with a red sun.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape dominated by a large, gnarled tree on the right, rendered in varying shades of black and gray. The tree's thick, textured trunk and branches extend across much of the canvas, with delicate, sparse foliage depicted as small clusters of lines. Numerous small, black birds perch on its branches, with several more flying in a loose formation in the upper left corner against a light gray sky. To the lower left, a dense, misty forest emerges from a soft, light gray haze, featuring a variety of tree shapes and heights, also in black and gray washes. A prominent, solid red disc, representing the sun, is visible low on the horizon behind the trees in the lower-left quadrant, casting a subtle, warm glow. The overall palette is monochromatic with the exception of the red sun. Vertical text is present in the upper right corner, reading: 怪、吟、霜、画.

metadata.title: 旭に群鴉図|Flock of Crows at Dawn
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large bird with outstretched wings battles a dragon-like creature amidst turbulent waves in a monochrome ink painting
long_description: A monochrome ink painting depicts a dramatic struggle between a large bird and a dragon-like creature amidst turbulent waves. The powerful bird, positioned centrally, has its large, feathered wings spread wide, extending upwards and to the right. Its head, with a sharp beak, faces left, and its talons are firmly gripping the body of the serpentine creature below. The bird's feathers are rendered with varying shades of dark gray and black ink, creating texture and depth. Below the bird, the dragon-like creature is partially submerged in the tumultuous water. It has a scaly body, a head with an open mouth revealing sharp teeth, and prominent eyes. Its body twists and turns, with its tail extending towards the right side of the composition. The water fills the lower half of the painting and surrounds the battling figures, depicted with dynamic, swirling lines and splashes of dark and light gray ink, suggesting powerful waves and foam. On the far left, dark, jagged forms, possibly rocks, emerge from the water. The background is a light, unadorned gray, highlighting the intensity of the central conflict. In the upper left corner, a vertical column of black calligraphic text is visible, accompanied by a square red seal below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of a waterfall with three birds, two perched on rocks, one in flight
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a dynamic waterfall scene with three birds. A wide, light grey waterfall dominates the background, flowing from the top edge to the bottom, with subtle vertical lines indicating the water's movement. On the right side, a jagged, dark grey rocky outcrop extends into the waterfall, covered with sparse black vegetation resembling small leaves and thin branches. Two birds with dark bodies and lighter, possibly brownish, chests are perched on these rocks, facing towards the left. One bird is slightly in front of the other. Below these perched birds, on the same rocky formation, there is a small section of black calligraphic text and a square red seal. In the lower left quadrant, a third bird, similar in appearance with a dark body and lighter chest, is captured in mid-flight. Its wings are spread, and its beak is open, suggesting a call or a moment of action. The overall color palette is monochromatic, utilizing various shades of grey and black for the rocks, birds, and vegetation, contrasting with the lighter tones of the waterfall and the off-white background.

metadata.title: 滝に燕図|Swallows by a Waterfall
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Black ink wash painting of a crow perched among bamboo stalks, with red seals and text
long_description: This is a vertical, monochromatic ink wash painting depicting a crow and bamboo. A large, dark crow dominates the center-right of the composition, rendered with bold, thick black brushstrokes that define its body and feathers. The crow faces left, its head slightly turned, revealing a small, bright eye. Its two feet, with distinct talons, grip an unseen surface at the bottom of the frame. To the left of the crow, several tall, slender bamboo stalks extend upwards, painted with varying shades of gray and black ink, suggesting depth and movement. The background is a lighter, soft gray wash, creating a subtle atmospheric effect. Below the crow, a darker, textured ground line is indicated with short, sharp brushstrokes. In the upper right corner, there are two red square seals and several lines of black calligraphic text arranged vertically.

metadata.title: 水辺に鴉図|Crow and Reeds by a Stream
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two dark birds perch on a gnarled willow branch with drooping leaves in an ink wash painting
long_description: The artwork is a monochrome ink wash painting depicting two birds perched on a gnarled tree branch against a plain, light grey background. The composition is vertically oriented, with the tree branch dominating the right side of the frame, extending from the top right corner downwards and curving towards the bottom right. The branch is rendered with varying shades of dark grey and black ink, creating a textured, aged appearance. Numerous long, slender leaves, characteristic of a willow, droop gracefully from the upper and lower sections of the branch, painted with delicate, thin brushstrokes. Two dark-feathered birds are positioned on a thick part of the branch in the upper center of the painting. The upper bird is more prominent, facing towards the upper left with its head slightly raised, its small dark eye visible. Its body is depicted with layered dark grey and black ink, suggesting plumage. The second bird is positioned below and slightly in front of the first, partially obscured by the upper bird's body and the branch. It faces downwards and to the left, with its head and part of its back visible, also rendered in dark grey tones. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical inscription of dark characters, followed by a red square seal containing more characters. The background is a uniform, light grey, providing a subtle contrast to the detailed ink work of the foreground elements.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A grey-furred monkey curls around its pink-faced baby on a rocky ground with trees and a dark rock formation
long_description:
A vertical painting depicts a large, grey-furred monkey curled protectively around a smaller, pink-faced baby monkey. The adult monkey is positioned in the center, facing left with its eyes closed, its face, ears, and hands a reddish-pink. Its fur is rendered with fine, light grey brushstrokes, creating a soft, textured appearance. The baby monkey is nestled against the adult's chest, also curled up, with a small pink face visible. They rest on a dark, rocky ground, depicted with jagged, dark grey and black brushstrokes.

To the left and behind the monkeys, several trees with delicate, dark green foliage and thin, light brown branches rise against a warm, light beige background. The ground beneath these trees is also dark and rocky. To the right, a large, dark grey and black rock formation with jagged, irregular edges extends vertically from the bottom to the top of the frame, partially obscuring the background. In the upper right corner, vertical black text is visible, followed by a square red seal. The overall color palette is dominated by shades of grey, black, reddish-pink, light beige, and dark green.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts several fish swimming in swirling water with concentric ripples and smaller fish.
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a dynamic scene of fish swimming in water, framed by a thin gold border. The background is a light, muted gray, suggesting a watery environment. Two large fish dominate the central area, positioned horizontally. The upper large fish, dark gray with lighter scales and fins, faces left, its head and a prominent eye visible. Below it, another large fish, similar in color and detail, faces right, its head and eye also clearly depicted. Both large fish are partially obscured by concentric, light gray ripples that emanate outwards, creating a strong sense of movement and depth. Scattered around the larger fish, particularly in the upper half of the composition, are several smaller, lighter gray fish. These smaller fish are depicted swimming in various directions, some following the curve of the ripples. Faint, wavy lines, rendered in a slightly darker gray, are visible throughout the water, suggesting underwater currents or subtle aquatic vegetation, especially in the lower portion of the painting. The color palette is largely monochromatic, utilizing various shades of gray, black, and white, with subtle hints of light brown or tan in the fish scales. In the lower right corner, vertical black characters are visible, followed by a red square seal containing more characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a black crow perched on a bamboo stalk with leaves
long_description: This monochromatic ink wash painting depicts a large, dark crow perched on a bamboo stalk against a light grey background. The crow, rendered in solid black ink with visible brushstrokes suggesting feathers, occupies the left and central portions of the composition. Its head is turned to the left, revealing a bright white eye with a small black pupil and a pointed beak. Its sharp claws firmly grip a thick, horizontal bamboo stalk that extends from the lower left towards the right, featuring a distinct joint in the center. To the right, a second, thinner bamboo stalk rises vertically, also marked with joints. Dark, angular bamboo leaves, created with quick, expressive brushstrokes, are scattered around both stalks, appearing in the upper right, behind the crow, and in the lower left. The background is a uniform light grey, possibly textured paper. On the vertical bamboo stalk, a column of gold characters is visible, positioned vertically, with a small, rectangular red seal directly beneath it. Some faint ink splatters are present in the upper left area, near the crow's head.

metadata.title: 竹に鴉図|Crow on a Bamboo Branch
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome ink painting depicts towering, jagged mountains shrouded in mist with dense forests and a winding path.
long_description: This vertical ink painting, rendered in shades of gray and black, portrays a dramatic mountain landscape. The upper portion of the composition features a light gray, hazy sky with indistinct, darker cloud formations. Numerous tall, craggy mountains dominate the mid-ground, their sharp peaks often disappearing into the surrounding mist. The mountains are depicted with angular lines and varying tones of gray, creating a sense of rugged texture and depth. A prominent, centrally located mountain rises steeply, its faces appearing almost vertical. Lighter, less defined mountains recede into the background, suggesting distance. Dark, almost black brushstrokes indicate dense clusters of trees, primarily pines, clinging to the mountain slopes and forming thick forests at their bases, especially in the lower half of the painting. Wisps of lighter gray suggest mist or subtle waterfalls cascading down some mountain faces, particularly on the right side of the central peak. In the lower right quadrant, a winding path or series of steps ascends a forested slope, leading to small, rectangular structures nestled among the trees. On the left side, near the middle, vertical black text reads "安少圖". The entire artwork is bordered by a thin, golden-brown line.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome ink painting of an eagle diving beside a waterfall, with small animals on rocks below.
long_description: A vertical monochrome ink painting depicts a dynamic natural scene. A wide waterfall dominates the center, flowing from the top of the composition to the bottom, rendered in light gray and white ink with vertical strokes. To the right of the waterfall, a large bird of prey with outstretched wings descends, its head pointing downwards. Its body and feathers are detailed with darker ink strokes, suggesting texture. Dark, jagged rock formations frame the waterfall on both sides. On the right, dark, spiky pine branches extend from the rocks, partially obscuring the bird. On the left, a tall, dark rock face has sparse, leafy branches. At the bottom, below the waterfall's base, a cluster of small, furry, dark-colored animals, possibly monkeys or squirrels, are perched on a rock. Several tiny, dark, bird-like shapes fly near them. In the lower left corner, vertical calligraphic text in dark ink is accompanied by a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink painting depicts a large black crow with open beak and spread wings perched on a branch with sparse leaves.
long_description: This monochrome ink painting features a large, dark bird, likely a crow, positioned centrally and angled diagonally across the composition. The bird is rendered with bold, expressive black brushstrokes, depicting its body, spread wings, and tail feathers. Its head is turned slightly to the left, with its beak wide open, as if cawing. Visible claws grip a gnarled, dark branch that extends from the lower right towards the center. Above and behind the bird, several slender branches with sparse, delicate leaves extend upwards and to the right, also painted with varying shades of dark ink. The background is a uniform, light gray wash, providing a stark contrast to the dark bird and branches. In the upper right corner, vertical calligraphic characters are visible, accompanied by a square red seal below them.

metadata.title: 木に鴉図|Crow on a Branch
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two black and white rabbits among rocks and leafy vines with berries, rendered in ink wash
long_description: The artwork depicts two rabbits in a natural setting, rendered in ink wash on a light, off-white background. The overall color palette is monochromatic, primarily shades of gray, black, and white, with subtle hints of light brown or beige in the background and some details. The rabbit on the left is positioned in the lower-left quadrant, leaning forward with its head down, appearing to nibble on something in the grass. Its fur is a mottled pattern of white and dark gray or black patches. Its ears are long and pointed, with a lighter interior. A thin, dark, serpentine object is visible near its mouth and front paws. The ground beneath it is depicted with short, vertical strokes suggesting grass. Behind this rabbit, to the left, are dark, rounded rock formations. The second rabbit is positioned slightly above and to the right of the first, partially obscured by a dark, textured rock formation. It is also mottled white and dark gray/black, with prominent long ears. Its head is turned towards the viewer, and its mouth is open, revealing small teeth. Its front paws are raised, resting on the rock. Above and behind the rabbits, a dense network of vines and branches with numerous small, round berries and leaves extends across the upper half of the composition. These plants are rendered in varying shades of gray, creating depth. In the upper left corner, there is a vertical column of dark text followed by a red square seal. The entire composition is framed by a thin, light gold border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A dark bird with a red face is coiled by a snake amidst bamboo stalks.
long_description:
An ink painting depicts a large bird, resembling a pheasant, entangled by a snake. The bird, positioned centrally, faces left with its beak slightly open. Its body is predominantly dark-feathered, with lighter, patterned feathers visible on its chest and back. Long, striped tail feathers fan out to the right, extending beyond the bird's body. Its head and face are a distinct reddish-brown, contrasting with its dark plumage. Visible talons grip the ground below.

The snake, with a patterned body suggesting scales, is tightly coiled around the bird's torso. Its head is positioned near the bird's head, with a forked tongue extended. Sparse bamboo stalks with pointed leaves are depicted in dark ink in the upper left, upper right, and lower right portions of the composition. The ground beneath the bird and snake is rendered with light ink washes and short, dark strokes, suggesting grass or earth. The artwork is primarily in black and grey ink washes on a light, off-white paper, framed by a thin gold border. Calligraphy is visible in the upper left corner, with a red square seal directly below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two young children lean over a dark basin, playing in water, with a frog leaping in the patterned background
long_description: The artwork depicts two young children leaning over a dark, round basin filled with water, their hands submerged. The child on the left has dark, full hair and a smiling expression, wearing a light-colored kimono with a subtle floral pattern in grey and white. The child on the right has dark hair with a shaved patch on the crown and looks down intently at the water, wearing a kimono with horizontal stripes in brown and white. Both children have light skin tones. Ripples are visible in the water where their hands are. In the upper background, a dark-colored frog is shown mid-leap, with a thin, dark line extending from it upwards and to the right. The ground behind the children and the basin is covered with a dense pattern of small, dark green plant-like shapes. Further back, larger, dark, amorphous shapes, possibly rocks or bushes, are visible with sparse, dark foliage. The overall color palette is muted, featuring light skin tones, dark hair, and various shades of grey, brown, and dark green for clothing and background elements. Vertical text is present on the lower right side of the image, reading "空野晴信画".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of a bird with open beak perched on a leafy branch
long_description: A monochromatic ink painting depicts a bird perched on a slender, dark branch, with its beak open as if singing. The bird is positioned slightly to the left of the vertical center, facing left with its head tilted upwards. Its head and upper back are rendered in darker ink, while its chest and belly are lighter. Its wings are dark, and a long, dark tail extends upwards and to the right. The bird's dark legs grip the thin branch, which extends from the upper left corner downwards towards the bottom center. Sparse, dark leaves are visible on this branch near the top left. Another thicker, gnarled branch with more prominent dark leaves extends from the lower right corner, curving upwards and left. The background is a plain, light-colored surface with a subtle texture. In the upper right corner, dark calligraphic characters are visible, below which are two square red seals. To the far right, several vertical, dark, bamboo-like stalks are depicted.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A tabby cat crouches low, intently focused on a small frog in a marshy landscape, painted in ink.
long_description: This vertical ink painting depicts a tabby cat intently focused on a small frog in a marshy environment. The cat, positioned slightly right of center, is captured in a low crouch, its front paws extended towards the frog. Its fur is rendered with varying shades of grey and black ink, creating a striped, tabby pattern across its body and tail. The cat's large, round eyes, with light irises and dark pupils, are fixed on the frog. Its ears are perked, and its tail is raised and curved upwards, showing dark stripes. The small frog, rendered in lighter green and brown tones, sits on what appears to be a lily pad or large leaf in the lower right quadrant, directly in front of the cat's extended paw. The background and foreground are filled with tall, slender reeds and grasses, painted with dark ink washes and fine lines, suggesting a dense, wetland habitat. Some broader leaves are also visible among the reeds. The ground beneath the cat and frog is a lighter wash, indicating shallow water or mud. In the upper right corner, and along the right edge, there are vertical lines of text and a red square seal, indicating a signature or artist's mark.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome ink painting depicts a dark bird with a raised wing perched on a rock, with bamboo.
long_description: The artwork is a vertically oriented monochrome ink painting, primarily featuring a large, dark bird positioned slightly left of center. The bird, rendered in various shades of black and dark gray ink, is depicted with its head turned to the left, its eye visible as a small, light circle. Its body is robust, with visible feather details created by varying brushstrokes. One wing is distinctly raised, extending towards the upper left corner of the composition. The bird is perched on a dark, textured form that resembles a rock or a gnarled tree trunk, located in the lower central portion of the image. To the upper right, a cluster of dark, elongated bamboo leaves extends downwards, while a few more leaves are visible near the bird's feet on the lower left. The background is a light, unadorned surface, providing contrast to the dark ink elements. In the bottom left corner, there is vertical text in dark ink, followed by a red square seal with illegible characters.

metadata.title: 岩に鴉図|Crow on a Rock
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome ink painting depicting a vast mountainous landscape with waterfalls, pine trees, and small buildings
long_description: This vertical monochrome ink painting, framed by a thin gold border, depicts a vast, intricate mountainous landscape rendered in shades of gray and black on a light, parchment-colored background. The composition is dominated by towering, jagged mountains that fill the upper two-thirds of the image. These mountains feature steep, angular rock faces and numerous vertical crevices, with dense clusters of small, dark pine trees clinging to their slopes and ridges. Several prominent waterfalls cascade down the cliffs, appearing as lighter, almost white streaks against the darker rock. Nestled among the peaks and on ledges are small, multi-tiered buildings with curved roofs, particularly visible in the upper-middle and right-middle sections. A band of lighter, misty areas creates a sense of atmospheric depth, separating the upper mountain range from the lower foreground. The foreground consists of more rounded, undulating hills and rock formations, also dotted with trees. Here, the pine trees are larger and more distinctly rendered, with gnarled branches and textured foliage. At the bottom left, a small cluster of buildings with sloped roofs is situated at the base of a hill. A faint river or body of water is suggested on the far right. Vertical text is visible in the upper right corner of the painting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A bird flies above two rodents near a split fruit and tall grasses in a monochrome ink painting
long_description:
The artwork is a monochrome ink painting depicting a natural scene with animals and plants. In the upper portion, a bird with light plumage on its underside and darker wings is shown in flight, descending towards the left. Above and to the right of the bird, a vine with large, dark leaves and two prominent white, five-petaled flowers extends across the upper right quadrant. The vine also features thorny tendrils.

In the central foreground, two small, furry rodents are featured. One rodent, with dark grey-brown fur and a lighter belly, sits upright on top of a large, round, split fruit, facing forward with its paws held close to its chest. The other rodent is partially visible inside the split fruit, appearing to gnaw on the light-colored, textured interior. The fruit itself is dark-toned, possibly a gourd or melon, with a distinct opening revealing its contents.

Tall, thin blades of grass are depicted throughout the composition, creating a dense ground cover in both the foreground and background, suggesting a lush environment. The background also features lighter washes of ink, indicating a distant landscape or water. In the lower left corner, dark ink calligraphy is present, accompanied by a red square seal.

metadata.title: 瓜に鼠図|Rats and Gourd
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two spotted deer rest under a large tree with two monkeys in its branches, set in a mountainous landscape
long_description: This vertical artwork depicts a natural landscape rendered primarily in shades of black, gray, and white on a light beige ground, framed by a thin gold border. In the foreground, two large spotted deer rest on a light-colored ground. The deer on the left faces forward, its head turned slightly towards the viewer, displaying prominent, multi-pronged antlers. Its fur is a mix of light brown-gray with distinct white spots. The second deer, positioned to the right and slightly behind the first, faces left with its body turned away, also featuring antlers and white spots on its fur. A large, gnarled tree trunk with dark, dense foliage dominates the right side of the composition, extending upwards and across the top. Two dark-furred monkeys are visible within its branches. One monkey hangs from a branch in the upper left quadrant, its body suspended and one arm reaching downwards. The other monkey sits on a thick branch in the upper right, looking towards the left. In the background, rolling mountains and hills are depicted in lighter washes of gray, suggesting distance. Clusters of smaller trees and what appear to be a few small buildings or a village are visible in the mid-distance, near a body of water. A red seal and black calligraphic characters are present in the lower left corner of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink painting of a large dark bird perched on a gnarled branch with a pale moon behind it
long_description: A vertical ink painting depicts a large, dark bird perched on a gnarled branch against a light, textured background. The bird, rendered in varying shades of black and dark gray ink, occupies the upper center and right of the composition. Its body is angled slightly upwards to the right, with its head turned to the left and slightly downward, as if looking at something below. Detailed brushstrokes suggest individual feathers on its wings and body. Its prominent talons grip the thick, dark branch, which extends from the lower left towards the upper right. Behind the bird and the branches, a large, pale circular shape, resembling a full moon, is visible in the lower left and center. Below the main branch, additional thinner branches with sparse foliage are depicted with lighter ink washes. In the lower left corner, vertical columns of dark text are present, accompanied by a square red seal below them.

metadata.title: 月に鴉図|Crow and the Moon
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A dark bird preening on a skull-like object, with gray leaves and red berries.
long_description: An ink painting on a light gray background depicts a large, dark bird perched on a light-colored, irregularly shaped object. The bird, rendered with broad, dark brushstrokes, appears to be preening, with its head bent down towards its body and its wings slightly spread. Its feathers show varying shades of dark gray and black. The object it perches on is light gray with darker ink outlines and shading, strongly resembling a skull with visible eye sockets and other bone-like contours, or a gnarled, weathered piece of wood. Around the central figures, branches with gray leaves and small clusters of reddish-pink berries are visible. These branches extend from the upper left, upper right, and mid-left areas of the composition. The leaves are depicted with lighter gray ink, and the berries provide small points of color. In the lower right corner, there is vertical calligraphy in dark ink, which reads "惺々庵筆", followed by a square red seal containing characters that appear to be "白石". The overall palette is dominated by black, various shades of gray, and subtle reddish-pink accents.

metadata.title: 木に鴉図|Crow on a Branch
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two squirrels among chestnut branches with spiky husks and fallen nuts, rendered in ink wash
long_description: An ink wash painting depicts two squirrels amidst chestnut branches and foliage on a light, aged background. In the upper left, dark calligraphic characters are present, accompanied by a red square seal with lighter characters. A large chestnut branch extends from the top, featuring numerous broad, serrated leaves and several spiky chestnut husks, some of which are open to reveal the nuts inside. A squirrel with detailed fur is perched on a branch on the left, looking towards the right. To the right, another branch with smaller leaves and clusters of small, dark berries extends downwards. The lower portion of the painting shows a grassy ground with sparse, dark brushstrokes indicating individual blades of grass and several bamboo shoots. A second squirrel, rendered with similar detailed fur, sits on the ground in the lower right, holding a nut in its front paws and appearing to eat it. Another round nut lies on the ground nearby. The background features subtle, lighter washes, creating a gentle rise in the middle ground.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and gold on silk

alt_text: A gray monkey hangs from dark branches with leaves and berries, looking upward.
long_description: A vertical ink painting depicts a monkey hanging from a network of dark branches with leaves and berries against a light gray background. The monkey, positioned in the upper center, hangs with its head tilted upward and to the left, its body angled diagonally downward and to the right. Its fur is rendered in varying shades of gray, appearing soft and textured, with lighter tones on its belly. The monkey's face is a distinct pinkish-red, featuring dark, round eyes and a small nose. Its hands grip the dark branches firmly. The branches, painted in dark gray and black, are adorned with clusters of lighter gray leaves and small, round berries. The foliage is concentrated around the monkey and extends across the upper and right portions of the composition. The background is a plain, light gray, providing a stark contrast to the detailed monkey and branches. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text above two red square seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and red on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of two birds on a gnarled branch, one large and one small, both with open beaks
long_description: An ink wash painting depicts two birds perched on a gnarled branch against a light grey background. The larger bird is positioned in the upper center, facing left with its beak wide open. It is rendered in dark black ink, showing textured feathers and sharp claws gripping the branch. A distinct white circular patch is visible on its neck or upper chest. Below and to the left, a smaller bird is perched on the same branch, also facing left with its beak open. This bird is rendered in lighter grey and black ink, with visible wing feathers. The branch itself is thick and dark, extending from the lower left towards the right, with smaller, thinner branches and sparse leaves rendered with lighter ink washes. In the upper left and right corners, faint, dark ink washes suggest distant foliage or clouds. In the lower left corner, there is a red square seal with black calligraphy, and additional black calligraphy extends below it.

metadata.title: ムクドリ図|Starlings on a Branch
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A white egret with an open beak stands behind a dark bird preening in tall grass against a light background
long_description: The artwork features two birds amidst tall grasses, set against a light, muted background. A prominent white egret stands slightly right of center, facing left with its long neck extended and beak open, revealing a dark interior. Its body is rendered in white with subtle grey shading on its back and wings, suggesting feather texture. In front of and to the left of the egret, a smaller, dark-feathered bird is hunched over, preening its feathers. Its head is turned downwards and to the right, and its plumage is depicted in varying shades of dark grey and black, with hints of brown on its head and neck. Both birds are surrounded by numerous stalks of tall, slender grass, rendered in shades of grey and black ink, filling the lower half of the composition and extending upwards around the birds. The grass has feathery tops. In the upper left background, a soft, light orange, rounded shape is visible behind the egret, possibly a distant landform or celestial body. The rest of the background is a uniform light grey, creating a hazy, atmospheric effect. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of dark script are visible, followed by a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A fox pouncing on a bird, surrounded by sparse vegetation in a monochrome ink painting
long_description: This vertical ink painting, rendered in shades of gray and black on a light background, depicts a dynamic scene of a fox capturing a bird. The fox, positioned centrally, is shown in mid-air, its body arched and its long, bushy tail curving upwards towards the top right. Its fur is a light gray with darker accents defining its form. The fox's front paws are extended downwards, appearing to grasp a bird, while its mouth is open, seemingly holding the bird's head. The bird, significantly smaller than the fox, is dark-feathered with its wings spread wide and its beak open. It is positioned beneath the fox's head and front paws. The background features various types of vegetation. In the upper left, a dense cluster of leafy branches with numerous small, round berries is depicted in darker ink. Long, thin blades of grass or reeds extend upwards from the top right, curving gently. Towards the bottom right, a cluster of broader, darker leaves, possibly bamboo, grows from thin stalks. Sparse, thin blades of grass or reeds are scattered across the ground in the lower and middle sections of the painting. In the upper right corner, vertical black ink characters are visible, followed by a square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large, patterned bird of prey with a small bird in its talons perches on a snow-covered branch
long_description: The artwork depicts a large bird of prey, likely a hawk or falcon, perched on a snow-covered branch, rendered in ink wash on a light-colored ground. The bird dominates the left and center of the composition, facing left with its head turned slightly to the right, its yellow eye prominent. Its plumage is intricately detailed with varying shades of gray and black, creating a striped and mottled pattern across its body and wings. Its powerful talons grip the branch, and a small, dark-feathered bird is clutched within them, appearing lifeless. The branch itself is thick and extends diagonally from the lower left towards the upper right, heavily laden with white snow, contrasting with the darker tones of the underlying wood. Behind the main bird, to the right, another snow-covered branch or tree trunk is visible, rendered with broad, soft brushstrokes. The background is a muted, light gray, suggesting a hazy or distant environment. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical line of dark calligraphy and a square red seal. The entire image is framed by a narrow gold border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a wide-eyed owl on a branch, surrounded by smaller birds and tree foliage.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting features a large owl and several smaller birds on tree branches, rendered in shades of black, gray, and white, with the owl's eyes being a distinct yellow. The background is a light, uniform gray. A prominent, light-feathered owl with large, round yellow eyes is positioned slightly below the center, perched on a thick, dark tree branch that extends diagonally from the lower left to the upper right. The owl faces left, its beak slightly open, and its body is detailed with numerous feathers. Its talons firmly grip the branch. Above and to the right of the owl, a smaller bird with a dark head and lighter body is perched on a thinner branch, looking downwards. To the left of the owl, another small, brown and white bird with a striped back is depicted in mid-flight, appearing to approach the owl with its claws extended. A third small bird is partially visible clinging upside down to the underside of the main branch. The tree branches are rendered with bold, dark brushstrokes, and sparse foliage, including some long, drooping clusters, hangs from the upper branches. In the lower left corner, there is a calligraphic inscription in black ink, followed by a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a black crow with spread wings and an open beak, flying downwards
long_description: The artwork features a large, dark bird rendered in an ink wash style, positioned diagonally across a light, textured background. The bird is depicted in mid-flight or descent, angled from the upper left towards the lower right. Its body is a deep, matte black, with visible brushstrokes creating texture and varying shades. The wings are spread wide, with individual feathers suggested by distinct brushstrokes, particularly on the trailing edges. Some areas within the black ink, especially on the bird's body and under its wings, show subtle hints of a lighter blue-grey tone. The bird's head is turned slightly to the left, and its beak is wide open, as if in a call. Its eye is a small, bright white dot against the dark head. The background is a uniform light grey or off-white, with a faint, grid-like pattern visible across its surface, suggesting a woven material. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical column of gold-colored characters, followed by a square red seal containing dark characters. The entire composition is bordered by a thin, gold-colored frame.

metadata.title: 雪中鴉図|Crow Flying in the Snow
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a bird perched on thorny branches above a frog, with leaves and red berries.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink wash painting on a light gray background, framed by a thin gold border. A small bird, rendered in shades of gray and black, is perched on a thorny branch in the upper center, facing downwards and slightly to the left. Its feathers are detailed with fine brushstrokes, showing lighter tones on its belly and darker markings on its back and wings. Its beak is pointed towards the lower part of the image. Below the bird, a network of dark, gnarled branches with sharp thorns extends across the composition. Several clusters of dark gray leaves are interspersed among the branches. Small, round, reddish-orange berries appear in clusters on some of the branches, particularly on the right side and lower left. Further down and slightly to the right of the center, a light-colored frog is depicted clinging to a branch, its body elongated and its limbs splayed. Its skin appears textured, and it has prominent eyes. The frog is positioned below the bird, seemingly looking upwards or towards the left. In the upper right corner, vertical black calligraphic text is visible. The overall palette is dominated by grays and blacks, with subtle touches of red for the berries, against a pale, unadorned background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A black bird with open beak and spread wings flies past sparse branches in an ink painting
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink painting featuring a large, dark bird in the center, depicted in mid-flight or mid-leap. The bird is rendered in varying shades of black ink, with visible brushstrokes creating texture for its feathers. Its wings are spread wide, extending towards the left and right edges of the composition, and its long tail feathers point upwards and to the right. The bird's head is turned slightly to the left, with its beak wide open, suggesting a cry or call. Its eye is a small, dark dot. One leg is visible, bent and extended downwards with sharp talons. Above and to the left of the bird, several long, slender leaves or branches are painted with lighter grey ink washes, curving downwards. Below the bird, towards the bottom left, a thicker, gnarled branch is visible, also rendered in grey tones. More delicate branches with sparse leaves appear in the lower right corner. The background is a light, uniform beige or off-white. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of black calligraphic text are present, followed by a square red seal impression below them. The overall impression is dynamic, capturing a moment of intense movement.

metadata.title: 柳に鴉図|Crow and Willow Tree
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A large reddish-brown spiny lobster and a smaller gray shrimp are depicted on a light background.
long_description: The artwork depicts a large spiny lobster and a smaller shrimp against a plain, light-colored background. The lobster, positioned diagonally from the lower left to the upper right, is the dominant subject. Its body is a rich reddish-brown, with textured, spiny segments on its carapace and tail. Two very long, thin antennae extend upwards and to the right, almost reaching the top edge of the frame. Its eyes are prominent and dark. Several slender legs are visible beneath its body. The lobster's tail is curled beneath it, showing distinct, overlapping segments. Below and slightly to the right of the large lobster, a smaller, grayish shrimp is depicted. It appears somewhat translucent or faded compared to the lobster, with delicate legs and antennae. The shrimp is oriented horizontally, facing right. The background is a uniform, light cream or off-white color, providing a stark contrast to the marine creatures. In the upper left corner, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text, accompanied by a small, rectangular red seal impression below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A small bird perched on a dark branch with white blossoms and dark leaves against a light background
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a small bird perched on a flowering branch against a plain, light beige background. The main branch originates from the upper left corner, extending diagonally downwards and to the right, with several smaller offshoots. The branch is rendered in dark, almost black, ink with varying brushstrokes suggesting texture. A small bird, positioned slightly right of the vertical center, faces left with its head turned slightly upwards. It has a dark brown back and wings, a lighter, grayish-white belly, and a prominent white stripe above its eye. Its beak is slender and dark. Clusters of white blossoms with delicate petals and dark, almost black, leaves are distributed along the branch, particularly dense around the bird. Several individual white petals appear to be falling from the branch, scattered across the light background. In the lower right quadrant, a vertical inscription in black ink is visible, followed by a square red seal.

metadata.title: 桜に小禽図|Birds on a Flowering Branch
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three brown sparrows in various flight poses against a plain, light background
long_description: A vertical painting features three sparrows in various stages of flight against a plain, light beige background. The birds are arranged diagonally across the canvas, from the upper left to the lower right. The topmost sparrow is positioned in the upper left quadrant, flying downwards with its wings spread wide, revealing light gray undersides and brown upper feathers. Its head is turned slightly downwards, showing a dark beak and a white cheek patch. Below and slightly to the right, a second sparrow is depicted mid-flight, also descending with its wings fully extended. This bird's plumage is a mix of warm browns, lighter grays, and white, with a distinct dark patch on its cheek. The third sparrow is located in the lower right quadrant, mirroring the downward trajectory of the others, with its wings spread and head angled down. Its feathers display similar brown and white markings, with a prominent dark patch on its cheek. All three birds are rendered with detailed feathering, particularly on their wings. In the lower left corner, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text, accompanied by a square red seal below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Misty ink wash landscape with pine trees on rocky cliffs, distant mountains, and a winding stream
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a misty, mountainous landscape rendered in shades of gray, black, and white on a light beige ground. In the upper center, a prominent cluster of dark, spiky pine trees stands on a misty slope, with several small, dark birds flying in the pale sky to their left. Behind these trees, a large, lighter-toned mountain rises towards the upper right, its surface subtly textured with faint brushstrokes. Below the upper trees, a thick band of mist obscures the middle ground, from which another group of pine trees emerges on a rugged, rocky cliff face. This cliff, rendered with dark, angular brushstrokes, descends towards the lower left. At the base of the cliff, large, jagged rocks line a narrow, winding body of water or stream that extends from the lower left corner towards the center. The foreground is a lighter tone, suggesting a misty or snowy ground. In the lower right corner, a red square seal with dark characters is visible, accompanied by two vertical lines of dark script above it. The script reads: "弘邨".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two small brown and white birds perch on a branch with blue wisteria flowers and green leaves
long_description: A vertical painting depicts two small birds perched on a branch amidst wisteria flowers and leaves against a light, plain background. In the upper left quadrant, clusters of blue-purple wisteria flowers hang downwards, interspersed with broad, green leaves. A dark, gnarled branch extends from the left side of the frame, curving slightly as it moves towards the center. Two small birds are positioned on this branch, facing towards the left. The bird on the left is slightly lower and more prominent, featuring a reddish-brown back, wings, and head, with a pale, almost white, chest and belly. Its small, dark eye is visible. The second bird, positioned slightly behind and above the first, shares similar reddish-brown and pale plumage. More green leaves, some appearing faded or lighter in tone, are scattered above and around the birds. The background is a uniform, light beige or off-white. In the lower right corner, dark, vertical calligraphic text is present, accompanied by a square red seal below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three white egrets perched on a dark tree branch under a pale moon against a light grey background
long_description: A vertical painting depicts three white egrets perched on a dark, gnarled tree branch, set against a light grey background. The branch extends from the mid-left to the mid-right, with a thick, dark trunk and several smaller offshoots. The egrets are clustered on the left side of the branch. Two birds face left, with their heads tucked into their feathers, while the third bird faces right, also with its head slightly bowed. Their plumage is rendered in white with subtle grey and light brown shading, giving them a soft, textured appearance. The bird on the far right has visible dark legs with yellow feet. In the upper right quadrant, a large, pale, circular moon is visible, partially obscured by the tree branch and several dark, thin, hanging elements that resemble willow branches. These dark, elongated shapes extend downwards from the upper right, overlapping the moon and the branch. In the lower right corner, there are dark calligraphic characters and a rectangular red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A bird on a branch looks down at a spider dangling from a web, with red-brown leaves
long_description: This vertical painting depicts a bird perched on a slender branch, observing a spider. The background is a uniform, light beige or off-white. The bird, positioned in the upper left, faces right and slightly downward. It has a light brown underside, a greyish-blue back and wings, and a pale face with a dark eye and a small, dark, hooked beak. Its head is tilted, focusing its gaze towards the lower right. The thin, dark branch supporting the bird extends from the lower left, curving upwards. Clusters of leaves, rendered in shades of reddish-brown, muted green, and hints of orange, are attached to this branch and another branch in the upper right. These leaves appear to be autumn foliage. From an unseen point in the upper right, a fine, light-colored thread descends, with a small, dark spider hanging from it, positioned in the middle right of the composition. The spider is significantly smaller than the bird. Another dark, thicker branch extends from the middle right downwards, also bearing a few reddish-brown leaves. A small, dark calligraphic inscription with a red seal is visible in the lower left corner. The composition creates a sense of quiet observation within a natural setting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A gray goose with outstretched wings and yellow beak descends against a light, subtly textured background
long_description: This vertical artwork depicts a single bird, likely a goose or duck, in mid-descent against a plain, light background. The bird dominates the upper-center and left areas of the composition, angled downwards and to the left. Its head and long neck are a uniform dark gray, featuring a small white patch below a dark eye. The beak is yellow with a dark tip. Its large wings are spread wide, showcasing dark gray feathers with lighter gray and white accents along the edges and undersides. The left wing extends upwards and to the left, while the right wing stretches downwards and to the right, forming a strong diagonal. The bird's body is a lighter gray, with subtle reddish-brown or pinkish tones on its underside. Its webbed feet, with visible claws, are tucked beneath its body, rendered in shades of brown and orange. The background is a light beige or off-white, with faint, horizontal, wavy brushstrokes in light gray in the lower-left, suggesting water or a misty surface. In the lower right corner, a vertical column of dark, calligraphic text, consisting of two characters, is positioned above a red, square seal with a single character.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A kingfisher with blue and white feathers dives into water amidst dark reeds
long_description: This vertical painting depicts a kingfisher diving into water amidst reeds, rendered in a muted palette with a light grey background. The kingfisher is positioned slightly to the left of the center, captured mid-descent with its wings spread upwards and its head pointed downwards. Its back and head are a vibrant blue, contrasting with its white chest and a touch of orange-brown on its underside. Its long, dark beak is submerged or just touching the water, and it appears to be grasping a small, light-colored object, possibly a fish. To the left of the kingfisher, a cluster of dark, vertical brushstrokes represents reeds or tall grasses. These strokes vary in thickness and length, some extending from the bottom edge upwards and others appearing to emerge from the water. Further into the background, lighter, more diffuse grey strokes suggest additional reeds receding into the distance, creating a sense of depth. The lower portion of the painting features subtle horizontal lines, indicating the surface of the water. The overall background is a soft, uniform light grey, providing a serene and misty atmosphere. In the bottom left corner, there is a small, dark inscription followed by a red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three birds perch on a dark, gnarled branch with fan-shaped leaves against a light, textured background
long_description: The artwork depicts three birds perched on a dark, gnarled branch that extends diagonally from the upper right towards the lower left. The background is a plain, light beige fabric with a subtle woven texture. The bird at the top left is entirely white with a small, pointed red beak and a dark eye. To its right, a larger bird has mottled brown and grey feathers, a dark head, and a reddish beak. Below these two, a third bird, lighter brown and grey, faces left, partially obscured by the branch. All three birds have soft, rounded forms. The branch itself is rendered in dark, almost black, ink washes, with lighter grey areas suggesting depth. Several clusters of dark, fan-shaped leaves, resembling ginkgo leaves, emerge from the branch. Some of these clusters also feature small, round, light yellow-green fruits. The branch continues downwards and to the left, with more leaves and fruits. In the lower right corner, there is a small inscription in dark ink, followed by two square red seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of misty mountains, a rugged coastline with trees, and small boats on water
long_description: This monochrome ink wash painting depicts a serene landscape rendered in shades of grey and black on a light, off-white background. In the upper half, several large, rounded mountains rise, their forms softly defined and fading into the background, suggesting mist or distance. Below these, a prominent, dark, and jagged landmass extends from the lower left, across the middle, and curves upwards towards the right side of the canvas. This landmass features numerous clusters of dark, slender trees, resembling conifers, particularly dense on the peaks and slopes. The lower portion of the painting is dominated by water, rendered in a lighter grey, with several small, dark boats scattered across its surface. Two boats are positioned near the left shore of the landmass, while another single boat is further out in the water to the far left. In the upper right corner, there is vertical text in black ink, followed by a square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A dark blue deity embracing a lighter blue figure, seated on a lotus throne within a vibrant aura.
long_description: The artwork depicts two figures, a larger dark blue one and a smaller light blue one, seated together on a multi-tiered throne. The larger figure is positioned centrally, facing forward with its head slightly turned to the right. It has dark blue skin, a serene expression, and wears a golden crown with red accents, large golden hoop earrings, and multiple necklaces of gold and white beads. Its right arm is bent, with the hand resting near its chest, while its left arm wraps around the smaller figure. The larger figure wears a red and gold patterned skirt-like garment. The smaller, lighter blue figure is seated on the larger figure's lap, facing left and looking up at the larger figure. It also wears a golden crown, golden earrings, and necklaces. Its right arm is raised, holding a small golden object, and its left arm is around the larger figure's neck. This figure wears a red and gold patterned skirt. Both figures are seated on a red lotus pedestal with green and gold details, which rests on a rectangular, ornate platform. The platform features decorative patterns in red, green, and gold, and at its base, two small white lion-like creatures with red details are visible, one on each side. Behind the figures, a large, multi-colored aura or halo forms an arch, with layers of dark green, red, orange, yellow, and blue. The outermost border of the entire artwork is a distressed reddish-brown.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Opaque watercolor on paper

alt_text: Three small birds with brown, white, and blue-grey markings perch on a branch amidst dark foliage
long_description: This vertically oriented painting features three small birds perched on a thin branch against a light, textured background. The birds are clustered in the upper-middle right of the composition, facing generally towards the right. Each bird displays a brown chest, a white belly, a black cap, and a distinct white stripe above its eye, with blue-grey plumage visible on their backs and wings. Their small dark eyes and pointed beaks are visible. The branch they rest upon is a slender, dark line extending from the left. Above and to the left of the birds, broad, light grey brushstrokes suggest large leaves or foliage, extending from the top and left edges of the frame.
