Below the birds, a prominent, dark, triangular mass of foliage, rendered with bold, black and dark grey brushstrokes, rises from the bottom center of the artwork. To the right of this dark mass, another lighter grey mass of foliage is depicted. In the lower right corner, vertical lines of black text are present, accompanied by a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A young boy leads a large water buffalo through shallow water, with tall grass and birds in the sky.
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a young boy leading a water buffalo through shallow water. In the lower left, a barefoot boy, dressed in light-colored, loose-fitting robes, walks to the right. He holds a thin stick in his right hand and a rope, which is attached to the buffalo's nose, in his left. Beside him, a large, dark gray water buffalo with short, curved horns walks through the water, its body partially submerged. Ripples are visible around the animals' legs. Behind the boy and buffalo, a dense bank of tall, thin green grass rises from the water's edge, extending across the middle ground. The upper half of the painting features a pale, muted sky with a faint reddish-orange glow near the horizon on the right side. Two small, dark bird silhouettes fly in the upper right portion of the sky. In the upper left corner, two columns of dark characters are visible above a red square seal. The overall color palette is soft, dominated by muted grays, greens, and pale pinks.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash landscape with misty mountains, cliffs, water, trees, and small buildings under a hazy sky
long_description: A monochrome ink wash painting depicts a vast, misty landscape dominated by mountains, water, and trees. The upper portion of the image is a light, hazy gray, suggesting a sky or distant mist. In the top left corner, vertical lines of calligraphy are visible, accompanied by a square red seal below them. Below the misty upper area, a tall, dark, jagged cliff face descends from the left, with a faint vertical streak suggesting a waterfall. To the right of this cliff, a body of water, possibly a lake or wide river, stretches across the midground. Its shoreline is visible, with a small, multi-tiered building nestled on a gentle slope amidst sparse trees on the far side of the water. Another hazy, conical mountain peak rises in the distance behind this building. In the foreground, on the right, dark, angular rock formations and cliffs extend into the water. A gnarled, dark-leaved tree grows from these rocks, and a small, simple house with a peaked roof is visible at the very bottom right. On the left foreground, a cluster of thin, upward-reaching plants, resembling bamboo, emerges from the lower edge. Two small, dark boats are depicted on the surface of the water, one closer to the right foreground and another further back. The painting uses varying shades of gray and black ink to create depth and texture, with lighter washes for distant elements and darker, more defined strokes for closer features.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A bearded figure with a halo sits in prayer, facing a furry monster surrounded by flames on rocky terrain.
long_description: The artwork features a central bearded figure seated in a meditative pose, with hands pressed together at chest level. The figure wears flowing, light pinkish-orange robes that drape in soft folds, and has long dark hair and a dark beard. A large, pale yellow circular halo emanates from behind the figure's head, extending upwards and outwards. To the left of the seated figure, a large, furry, yellowish-brown monster stands on its hind legs, facing the figure. The monster has sharp claws, an open mouth revealing teeth, and two small horns on its head. Red and orange flames surround the monster, with some tendrils of flame extending towards the seated figure. Both figures are positioned on dark, jagged rocky terrain, which forms the foreground. In the background, dark, craggy mountains or cliffs rise on both sides. A small, multi-tiered structure, resembling a pagoda, is visible to the right of the seated figure. Vertical text is present on the lower right side of the image.

metadata.title: 釈迦降魔図|Shakyamuni Subjugating Demons
metadata.medium: Album leaf mounted as a hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two white egrets stand in shallow water with reeds, one looking up, the other preening
long_description: A vertical painting depicts two white egrets in a serene, misty landscape. The background is a light, muted gray, suggesting a hazy atmosphere, with faint, wispy brushstrokes in darker gray indicating distant foliage or reeds in the upper left. In the lower center, two large white egrets are the focal point, standing in shallow, light gray water that reflects their forms subtly. The egret on the left stands with its body angled slightly to the right, its long, slender neck curving upwards, and its yellow beak pointing towards the upper right. Its thin, dark legs are partially submerged. The egret on the right is positioned slightly behind and to the right of the first, facing left. Its head is bent downwards, with its beak tucked into its chest feathers, suggesting it is preening. Its right leg is lifted, while its left leg is planted on a dark, low-lying mass that appears to be a submerged rock or patch of land. To the right of this dark mass, darker green-gray reeds emerge from the water. In the lower left corner, there is a small, red, circular seal impression and some dark, calligraphic brushstrokes. The overall palette is subdued, dominated by whites, grays, and subtle dark accents, creating a tranquil scene.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A small bird stands near large white peonies, with a butterfly flying above, on a light background
long_description: The artwork depicts a natural scene on a light, muted gray-beige background. In the lower right, a small bird with speckled brown, white, and black feathers stands on thin, greenish-yellow legs and feet. Its head is turned to the left, looking towards a large, fully open white peony flower with a yellow center, positioned in the lower-center of the composition. Above and slightly to the right of this large peony, a smaller white peony bud with a yellow center is visible. Dark green-gray leaves and stems extend from the peony plants, with some lighter, faded leaves appearing to the left. Sparse, light green blades of grass are visible near the base of the bird and the peonies. In the upper-left quadrant, a small, light brown butterfly with darker markings on its wings flies to the right, towards the flowers. In the lower right corner, there are two red seals and some black calligraphic text.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A white rooster with a red comb and several chicks beneath bamboo stalks on a light background
long_description: A painting depicts a large white rooster with several small chicks and bamboo stalks on a light, neutral background. The rooster, positioned in the lower right and center, faces right with its head lowered, looking towards the ground. It has prominent white tail feathers, a bright red comb, and a red wattle. Its legs and claws are a golden-yellow hue. Clustered around the rooster's feet are several small chicks, some yellow and some with darker markings, also looking down as if pecking at the ground. To the left of the rooster, a cluster of bamboo stalks with pointed leaves extends upwards, rendered in dark ink washes. The background is a plain, light grey-tan color, providing a simple setting for the subjects.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a misty mountain landscape with a village, river, and gnarled trees
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a serene, misty landscape primarily in shades of gray, black, and subtle greens. The upper half is dominated by soft, light gray mist, through which several dark gray mountains emerge. The peaks are textured with small, dark dots suggesting foliage or rock. Below the mist, a winding river or lake is visible, with lighter gray water. On the left, a few sparse, dark willow-like trees with drooping branches stand near the water's edge. Further right, two small boats are visible on the water. The right side of the foreground features a steep, dark gray slope covered with several large, gnarled pine trees. Their trunks are twisted and dark, with sparse, dark green needles. In the lower center and left, a small village is nestled on a gentle slope. Several simple, rectangular buildings with dark roofs and light walls are visible. A small bridge with a dark railing crosses a narrow stream or path in the lower left. Two figures on horseback are seen on a path near the bridge. A red seal and some dark characters, which appear to be "張邦輔", are visible in the lower right corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Seven small, round birds with white eye-rings perch on a branch with muted leaves against a light background
long_description: The painting depicts a cluster of small birds perched on a branch with leaves, set against a plain, light grey background. A dark, thin branch extends from the upper left corner, curving downwards and to the right across the upper half of the composition. Several broad, muted leaves, in shades of brown, grey, and dull green, are attached to the branch, primarily in the upper left and center. Seven small, plump birds are clustered closely together on a section of the branch in the center-left. Each bird has a light green-yellow back, a white belly, and a distinctive white ring around its eye. Their beaks are small and dark, and their legs are thin and dark, gripping the branch. The birds face in various directions, with most looking towards the right. In the lower right corner, a vertical inscription in dark ink is visible, accompanied by a square red seal below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three ducks, two mallards and one brown duck, among dark reeds on a light gray background, one taking flight
long_description: The vertical artwork depicts three ducks amidst dark reeds on a light gray background. In the upper left, a mallard duck is captured mid-flight, its wings spread wide. This duck has a vibrant green head, a reddish-brown chest, and a prominent blue patch on its wings, which are mostly white and light brown. Its yellow beak points left. Behind and slightly to the right of the flying duck, a second duck, predominantly brown and gray, is partially obscured, its head lowered. In the lower right quadrant, a third mallard duck stands, its long green neck and head turned upwards and to the left. Its body is a mix of brown and gray feathers, with a distinct blue patch visible on its folded wing. Dark, broad brushstrokes, representing reeds or tall grasses, extend vertically from the top right and are scattered behind and around the ducks, creating a sense of depth. Some lighter, more faded strokes suggest distant foliage. The background is a uniform light gray, with small white speckles scattered across the surface, particularly around the flying duck, suggesting water spray or light reflections. A small vertical inscription of dark characters is visible on the right side, near the reeds.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A dark gray bird with white wing markings flies across a light gray background with faint mist
long_description: A single bird in flight dominates the center of a vertically oriented rectangular artwork. The bird is dark gray with prominent white markings on its wings. Its body is angled, with its head pointing towards the upper right. Its wings are spread wide, revealing the underside of the feathers, which are a lighter gray with distinct white bands along the leading edge and tips of the primary and secondary feathers. The bird's beak is yellow-orange, and a small white patch surrounds its eye. Its legs and feet are tucked beneath its body. The background is a soft, light gray, with subtle variations in tone that suggest a misty or cloudy atmosphere. Towards the bottom left, faint, lighter gray brushstrokes indicate distant land or clouds. Small white specks are scattered across the lower half of the background, resembling falling snow or mist. In the lower left corner, there are a few lines of dark, vertical text and a red rectangular seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Monochrome ink painting of a snow-covered winter landscape with mountains, trees, a winding river, and a small boat.
long_description: A monochrome ink painting depicts a serene winter landscape, rendered in shades of gray, black, and white. The upper portion of the image features a light gray sky that gradually darkens towards the top. Below, soft, undulating snow-covered mountains or hills recede into the distance, with a faint, winding path visible on one of the slopes in the upper right quadrant. In the upper left, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphy above a square red seal. The middle ground is dominated by a winding body of water, possibly a river or lake, which curves through the scene. A small, dark boat with a single figure is visible on the water, near a subtle bridge-like structure. Above the boat, in the upper right, a small flock of birds flies in formation. Several clusters of trees, heavily laden with snow, are scattered throughout the midground, appearing on islands within the water or on its banks. The foreground features more prominent, darker trees with gnarled branches, also covered in snow, alongside snow-dusted rocks. In the lower left corner, a small, simple structure with a peaked roof is partially visible amidst the snow.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a dark hawk perched on a pine branch against a light, monochromatic background
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting features a large hawk perched on a pine branch, rendered in shades of black, gray, and light brown against a pale, unadorned background. The hawk dominates the left-center of the composition, facing right with its head turned slightly to look towards the upper right. Its body is primarily dark gray and black, with lighter feathers on its chest and a distinct white head and neck. Its sharp, hooked beak is dark, and its eyes are small and dark. Its powerful talons grip the thick, gnarled branch that extends diagonally from the upper left to the lower right. Clusters of dark pine needles are visible on the branch, particularly on the left side near the hawk and extending towards the right. The background is a uniform, light gray wash, creating a sense of depth and atmosphere. In the lower left corner, there is a vertical inscription in black ink, followed by two red square seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting five ducks foraging in water near faint bamboo stalks on a light background.
long_description: An ink wash painting on a light, unadorned background depicts five ducks in the lower right and center, with faint bamboo stalks in the upper right. The ducks are rendered in varying shades of black and gray ink, showing textured feathers and distinct forms. One duck on the far left has its head dipped down, appearing to forage. Another duck in the center looks upwards, while the remaining three ducks are positioned with their heads down or slightly obscured, also appearing to forage or rest. The water beneath the ducks is suggested by subtle, lighter washes of ink. Above and to the right of the ducks, several slender bamboo stalks with sparse leaves are depicted with very light, gestural ink strokes, fading into the background. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical inscription in black ink, followed by a square red seal. The entire composition is framed by a patterned border in a light, muted gold or tan color.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on paper

alt_text: A small bird with a dark head and light body perches on a dark stump next to flowering branches
long_description: This painting features a small, plump bird perched on a dark, vertical stump, set against a plain, light gray background. The bird, positioned slightly above the center, has a light gray or off-white body, a distinct black head, and a small reddish-orange patch on its cheek. Its wings and tail feathers are rendered in darker gray and black strokes. The bird faces slightly to the left, its body turned towards the viewer. The stump it rests upon is a roughly textured, dark gray and black form, appearing to be a cut branch or tree trunk, extending vertically from the bottom edge of the composition. To the left of the stump, a delicate, thin dark branch extends diagonally upward and to the left, bearing several small, light-colored, five-petaled blossoms and a few tiny dark buds. To the right of the stump, a taller, very thin dark branch rises vertically, also adorned with small dark buds. The background is a uniform, unadorned light gray, providing a stark contrast to the dark elements. In the lower left corner, there is a column of black calligraphic text, followed by a square red seal with characters that are not clearly discernible. The entire painted area is bordered by a patterned, light gold-colored strip along the top, bottom, and right edges, and partially along the left.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on paper

alt_text: An ink painting depicts a squirrel clinging to a bamboo branch, with bamboo leaves above on a light background
long_description: This ink painting features a squirrel and bamboo on a light brown, unadorned background. In the upper left quadrant, a thick, dark bamboo branch extends diagonally downwards and to the right. Several elongated, dark bamboo leaves are attached to this branch, some overlapping. Below this main branch, in the lower left, are more dark bamboo leaves, along with a vertical line of dark calligraphic characters and a small, square red seal beneath them. In the lower right quadrant, a squirrel is depicted with light gray and black ink strokes, giving it a soft, furry texture. Its bushy tail curls upwards and to the left. The squirrel clings to a thinner, dark bamboo shoot or branch that extends diagonally upwards from the lower right. Its head is turned towards the right, and it appears to be holding a small, dark twig or shoot with its front paws. The composition is minimalist, with the figures rendered in varying shades of black ink against the plain, light background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A traditional painting depicts misty mountains, a river, and a small boat with figures, surrounded by flowering trees.
long_description: The artwork is a vertically oriented landscape painting rendered in muted tones of gray, green, and light blue, with accents of white. The upper portion of the image is dominated by a light gray, misty sky that gradually transitions into distant, softly rendered mountains, their peaks fading into the haze. Below these, a series of closer mountains rise, depicted with more defined contours and varying shades of gray and muted green. Dark green, almost black, clusters of trees dot the slopes of these mountains, particularly on the right side. A winding, light-colored path or stream descends from the upper left mountain. Towards the lower half of the painting, extensive areas of white blossoms cover the lower mountain slopes and extend to the riverbank. In the foreground, a wide, light blue river flows horizontally across the bottom of the composition. On the right bank of the river, a small cluster of dark green trees stands beside two small structures with thatched roofs. A small, light-colored boat with two figures is positioned on the river, slightly to the right of the center. One figure stands at the front of the boat, holding a long pole, while another figure is seated behind them. On the far left, a steep, light-colored cliff face is visible. In the lower left corner, there is vertical black text and a red square seal. The text reads: "玉堂" (Gyokudō).

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A misty landscape with a full moon, dense trees, a person on a bridge, and a flowing stream
long_description: A vertical, monochromatic landscape painting depicts a misty, moonlit scene. In the upper third, a bright, circular full moon is positioned slightly right of center against a light gray, hazy sky. Below the moon and extending across the upper-middle section, a dense forest of tall, dark green-gray trees stands prominently, with their canopies reaching towards the moon. More trees, lighter in shade, recede into the mist on the left and right sides of the main cluster. In the lower left quadrant, a small, dark figure of a person, appearing to carry a long pole over their left shoulder, walks across a narrow, light-colored wooden bridge. The bridge spans a stream or river that flows from the lower left foreground towards the right, disappearing into the misty background. Large, rounded rock formations or hills in various shades of gray define the banks of the stream and the foreground. The ground near the stream and bridge shows subtle horizontal lines, suggesting terraced land or fields, which also fade into the pervasive mist. The overall palette is dominated by grays, dark greens, and subtle blues, creating a serene and atmospheric composition. In the lower right corner, two columns of vertical characters are visible, accompanied by a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A landscape painting of towering mountains overlooking a body of water with scattered buildings and trees
long_description: The vertical painting depicts a serene mountainous landscape. On the right, a large, steep mountain dominates the mid-ground, its rugged slopes rendered in shades of brown, gray, and green, with darker lines defining its contours. Small clusters of trees cling to its upper ridges. A faint, winding path or stream descends from the upper right slope. In the distance on the left, layers of lighter, hazy mountains recede into the background, appearing in muted blue-gray tones. The sky above is a pale, almost white, with a subtle hint of pale yellow near the horizon on the far left. A calm body of water, possibly a lake or bay, occupies the middle ground, reflecting the soft light of the sky. A small, low-lying island or peninsula is visible in the water on the left. In the lower right foreground, several prominent pine trees with dark green, dense foliage and gnarled brown trunks stand on a hillside. Below these trees, nestled into the slope, are a few small, simple buildings with light brown, thatched roofs. A faint, light-colored path leads towards these structures. On the lower left, some lighter green foliage extends towards the water. The overall color palette is muted, featuring soft greens, browns, grays, and pale blues, creating a sense of depth and tranquility.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A coastal landscape painting featuring rocky islands, pine trees, and a small boat with figures on calm water.
long_description: The artwork is a vertically oriented landscape painting depicting a serene coastal scene. The upper third of the image shows a light, hazy sky, transitioning to a pale yellow horizon line where distant, muted green mountains are visible. Below the horizon, calm, light blue-grey water fills the middle and lower sections of the composition. Several rocky islands and cliffs emerge from the water, varying in size and proximity. In the midground, three prominent, rounded rock formations rise from the water, each topped with sparse green pine trees. The largest of these, on the left, features a natural archway at its base. Further back, more indistinct landmasses with trees line the distant shore. In the lower right foreground, a large, irregular rocky outcrop extends into the water, also adorned with a few gnarled pine trees. To the left of this outcrop, a small, narrow boat floats on the water. One figure stands in the stern, holding a long pole, while two other figures sit in the middle of the boat. The water around the boat and islands is a slightly darker blue-grey, with subtle ripples indicated by horizontal brushstrokes. A vertical column of dark script and a red seal are visible on the right side of the water, near the foreground island.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A small brown and white bird perches on a green stem above a large white flower with water droplets
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a small bird and a large white flower on a central green stem against a plain, light gray background. In the upper right, a small bird with brown and white plumage is perched on the thick, light green stem, facing downwards towards the flower. Its head is tilted, and its small, dark eye is visible. The stem extends vertically through the center of the composition, with several dark green leaves branching off it. In the lower half of the painting, a prominent, large white flower with multiple soft petals is shown. The flower has a yellow center, and numerous small, clear water droplets are visible on its petals, suggesting recent rain or dew. To the left of the main flower, several smaller green leaves and two reddish-brown flower buds are visible. A small, dark inscription or signature is present on one of the dark green leaves to the left of the large white flower. Another water droplet hangs from a leaf near the bottom right of the flower. The background is a uniform, light gray, providing a subtle contrast to the detailed subjects.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Three fish swim in rippled, light blue-gray water with dark vertical elements and faint script
long_description: The artwork depicts three fish swimming in a body of water, rendered in shades of light blue-gray and white. The overall composition is vertical, with the water filling most of the frame. The background is a light, textured beige border. The water itself is a soft, muted blue-gray, with lighter areas suggesting reflections or shallow depths, and darker, more defined ripples and swirls indicating movement. These ripples are most prominent around the fish and the dark vertical elements. Three fish, appearing to be carp or similar freshwater fish, are positioned diagonally across the image. The top fish is smaller and positioned towards the upper left. The middle fish is larger and located slightly below and to the right of the top fish, swimming towards the left. The bottom fish is the largest and is positioned in the lower-middle, swimming towards the left. All fish are depicted with light gray bodies, visible scales, and fins, with darker accents on their heads and tails. Their forms are slightly blurred, suggesting they are submerged. Several dark, vertical elements resembling submerged logs or posts are scattered throughout the water. One prominent, thick, dark gray element extends diagonally from the lower right towards the center. Another thinner, dark gray element is to its left. A smaller, dark gray element is visible in the upper left. In the upper right corner, there is vertical script written in dark ink, accompanied by two red square seals. The script is composed of several lines of characters. The first line from the right appears to read "辛卯仲夏", followed by "神田幽閑書". Below this, there are two red square seals, one above the other, with illegible characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A hawk in flight clutches a smaller bird, with snow-covered pine branches in the background.
long_description: The image depicts a hawk in mid-flight, positioned prominently in the center against a muted gray background. The hawk, facing left, has its wings spread wide, with the upper wing extending towards the top right and the lower wing angled downwards to the bottom right. Its plumage is rendered in shades of gray, white, and black, with distinct feather patterns visible on its wings and tail. The hawk's head is light gray with a dark beak and a striking yellow eye with a black pupil. In its talons, the hawk clutches a smaller bird, which appears to be a sparrow or similar small bird, rendered in shades of brown and yellow, with its wings slightly splayed. The smaller bird's head is visible, facing upwards. In the upper right portion of the background, a snow-covered pine branch is visible, with dark green needles contrasting with the white snow. Another lighter, more abstract white shape, possibly representing snow or clouds, is visible in the upper left and lower left. The overall color palette is subdued, dominated by grays, whites, and subtle greens, with touches of yellow and brown on the birds. A small, dark inscription is present in the middle right, near the hawk's tail.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A swallow with dark wings and a reddish head flies past dark leaves against a misty, light gray background
long_description: The vertical artwork features a single bird in flight, positioned slightly right of the central axis. The bird, a swallow, has a dark blue-black back and wings, a white belly, and a reddish-orange head and throat. Its wings are extended, with the left wing angled upwards and the right wing angled downwards, conveying motion. Its tail feathers are long and forked. To the left of the bird, a cluster of dark, reddish-brown leaves hangs from an unseen branch, extending from the upper left corner downwards towards the middle left. The leaves are distinctly lobed. Below these leaves, a small, light green or white object, possibly a berry or flower, is visible. The background is a soft, light gray, with subtle variations in tone that suggest a misty or cloudy atmosphere. Faint, darker gray brushstrokes or washes create a sense of depth behind the leaves and the bird. A small, red, rectangular seal or signature is visible in the lower left quadrant, beneath the leaves.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Seven fish, mostly gray, swim in a loose circular pattern in light, rippled water, with vertical text on the right
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular image depicting seven fish swimming in a light-colored body of water. The background is a pale, muted gray or off-white, with subtle, darker gray brushstrokes suggesting ripples or currents, particularly in a loose circular pattern around the fish. The fish are rendered in shades of gray and light brown, with some having darker markings. They vary slightly in size, appearing to be medium-sized. Six of the fish are arranged in a counter-clockwise curve, starting from the upper left, moving down through the center, and curving towards the lower right. The seventh fish is positioned slightly above and to the right of the main group, also facing generally downwards. The fish have distinct scales, fins, and tails. Some of the fish, particularly the larger ones in the lower center, show faint dark stripes or patches on their bodies and heads. One fish in the lower center has prominent barbels extending from its mouth area. The overall impression is of fish gracefully moving through shallow, clear water. In the upper right quadrant, there is a column of vertical text written in dark ink, followed by two red square seals. The text reads: "明陽袖江寫意".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A light-colored fish with small fins leaps from a turbulent grey and white body of water
long_description: A vertical rectangular artwork depicts a single fish leaping from a body of water. The upper two-thirds of the composition feature a light greyish-beige fish, oriented diagonally with its head pointing towards the upper left. The fish has an oval-shaped body, a small eye, and a slightly open mouth. Its dorsal and pectoral fins are small and blend with its body color, while its caudal fin is more distinct, appearing as a lighter, almost white, extension. Below the fish, in the lower third of the artwork, is a turbulent body of water rendered in shades of grey and white. Swirling brushstrokes suggest waves and movement, with lighter white accents indicating splashes or foam directly beneath the fish. The background is a plain, light greyish-beige, providing a neutral setting for the central action. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical inscription in black characters, accompanied by a small red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two fish swim beneath leafy branches with small white flowers on a light background
long_description: The artwork is a vertical composition featuring two fish swimming in a light, watery environment, with foliage hanging from the top right. The background is a pale, uniform color, suggesting water or a misty atmosphere. In the upper right quadrant, a cluster of green leaves on thin branches extends downwards and to the left. The leaves are depicted in varying shades of muted green, some appearing lighter and more translucent than others, suggesting depth or light filtering through. Small, delicate white flowers with five petals are interspersed among the leaves. Some leaves and branches are also faintly visible as if submerged or reflected below the main cluster. Below the foliage, in the central and lower-central part of the image, two fish swim. The upper fish is positioned slightly above and to the right of the lower fish. Both fish are depicted with light, muted grey-brown bodies, showing subtle shading to indicate their form. Their fins are visible, and their eyes are small dark points. The fish appear to be swimming towards the left side of the frame. The overall impression is one of tranquility and natural observation. In the bottom right corner, there is a vertical inscription of characters in dark ink, accompanied by a small, square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Misty mountain landscape with a village, river, and a lone figure walking a path.
long_description: The artwork is an ink wash painting depicting a vast, misty mountain landscape rendered primarily in shades of gray and black, with subtle hints of brown and green. The composition is vertically oriented, framed by a gold-colored border with a subtle pattern. In the upper half, towering, craggy mountains rise dramatically, their peaks fading into a light, ethereal mist that fills the valleys and obscures parts of the midground. The mountains are rendered with varied brushstrokes, showing texture and depth. A narrow waterfall is visible on one of the lower mountains on the left. The midground features a wide, winding river or body of water, its surface calm and reflecting the muted tones of the sky and distant land. Small, dark islands or landmasses dot the water. On the right, a steep hillside covered with tall, slender trees, some with reddish-brown foliage, slopes down towards the water. In the lower left, a small village is nestled on a hillside. Several traditional-style houses with dark roofs and light-colored walls are visible, surrounded by numerous trees with dense, dark green and brown foliage. A winding path leads from the village down towards the foreground. In the lower center, a lone figure, dressed in a light blue robe and holding a staff, walks along a path that curves from the left foreground towards the right midground. The figure is small in scale compared to the landscape. Further to the right, another small, dark figure appears to be on the water's edge or a small island. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of black text read "士表戊春日" and "月陽黒江画", followed by a red seal. A smaller red seal is also present in the lower left corner. The overall impression is one of serene, expansive natural beauty.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome painting depicts a snowy mountain landscape with a river, bare trees, and figures on a path
long_description: The vertical painting depicts a vast winter landscape rendered in muted gray and white tones, framed by a light brown, textured border. In the upper left, towering, craggy mountains rise, their peaks and slopes heavily covered in white snow, with darker gray shadows defining their forms. Nestled among these peaks, a small, multi-tiered structure, resembling a pagoda, is visible. The upper right features vertical lines of calligraphy in black ink, accompanied by a red seal. Below the mountains, a wide, flat expanse, likely a frozen river or snow-covered plain, stretches across the middle ground, appearing lighter gray. On the left bank of this expanse, a small cluster of buildings, forming a village, is visible. A thin, dark waterfall cascades down the left side of the mountains into the plain. Scattered across the landscape are numerous bare trees with delicate, branching limbs, their branches and trunks dusted with white. In the foreground, a winding path, covered in white snow, leads from the lower left towards the center. A small, arched bridge crosses a narrow stream. A figure on horseback, wearing a hat, crosses this bridge. Further along the path, in the lower right, another figure walks, carrying a bundle on their back. The ground in the foreground is undulating, with snow-covered mounds and depressions.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Three reddish-orange and white goldfish swim among faint green aquatic plants on a light background.
long_description: This vertical painting depicts three goldfish swimming amidst sparse aquatic plants on a light, almost white background. The background has a subtle vertical texture, suggesting paper or silk. The goldfish are rendered with soft washes of reddish-orange and white, giving them a translucent appearance. The largest goldfish is positioned in the lower right, facing towards the lower left. It has a reddish-orange head and body with white highlights, and a large, fanned, flowing tail that is predominantly white with pinkish hues. Above and slightly to its left, a smaller goldfish, mostly reddish-orange, swims horizontally, facing right. Its fins are also delicate and flowing. In the upper left quadrant, a third goldfish, appearing mostly white with faint reddish-pink patches, swims towards the right. Scattered throughout the lower half and extending into the upper left are faint, light green, feathery aquatic plants, rendered with delicate brushstrokes. In the bottom right corner, below the largest goldfish, there is a vertical inscription of black characters next to a small, square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two light-colored fish, one positioned above and slightly behind the other, against a pale background
long_description: The artwork depicts two light-colored fish against a pale, almost white background, rendered in a soft, watercolor-like style. The composition is vertical, with one fish positioned above and slightly to the right of the other. The upper fish is more distinctly rendered, facing left with its head slightly angled downwards. Its body is a light gray with visible scales, and its fins are subtly shaded. Its eye is round, with a dark pupil and a light, yellowish iris. The lower fish is positioned below and to the left of the upper fish, also facing left. It appears fainter and more translucent than the upper fish, with less defined scales and fins, almost blending into the pale background. Its eye is also visible but less sharp. The background is a uniform, very light gray wash, creating an ethereal atmosphere. In the lower right corner, there is a small, dark, vertical inscription, followed by a red, square seal. The entire image is framed by a narrow, textured golden border on the left, top, and right edges.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A painting depicts a mantis shrimp and a pufferfish in a light, watery setting with faint text.
long_description: A vertical painting features two aquatic creatures against a pale, light blue-grey background. In the upper right quadrant, a round, grey and white pufferfish is depicted, facing left with its body slightly angled downwards. Its eyes are dark, and small fins are visible. Below and to the left, occupying the lower half of the composition, is a larger mantis shrimp. This crustacean has an elongated, segmented body in shades of grey and light brown, with prominent raptorial claws extended forward and long, thin antennae. Its tail is fan-like with subtle red accents. The background suggests a watery environment with faint, wispy horizontal lines and a few sparse, dark green plant-like shapes near the mantis shrimp. In the lower right corner, a vertical column of dark characters is present, followed by two square red seals stacked vertically.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Three grey fish swim in light blue water with subtle ripples and a vertical inscription
long_description: The artwork is a vertical composition featuring three fish swimming in a light blue-grey body of water. The background is a pale, almost white, light blue-grey, with subtle, undulating lines suggesting water ripples or currents. The ripples are more pronounced around the fish, creating a sense of movement. The overall tone of the water lightens towards the top of the image and darkens slightly towards the bottom. Three fish, varying slightly in size, are depicted with greyish bodies and visible scales. Each fish has a distinct head, eyes, and fins. The topmost fish is positioned in the upper right quadrant, its head pointing towards the upper left, with its body angled downwards and to the left. Its tail fin is slightly blurred, suggesting motion. The second fish is located in the middle left quadrant, appearing slightly larger than the first. Its head is oriented towards the right, and its body angles downwards and to the right. This fish also has a visible eye and fins. The largest of the three fish is situated in the lower central part of the composition. Its head faces towards the lower left, and its body extends upwards and to the right. This fish shows more detailed scales and fins. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical column of dark text, followed by two red square seals stacked vertically. The text appears to be in a calligraphic style.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color silk

alt_text: Three grey fish swim in light blue water with subtle ripples, a traditional painting style
long_description: A vertical painting depicts three fish swimming in light blue-grey water with subtle ripples. The background is a pale, almost white, blue-grey, with faint horizontal lines suggesting the texture of the paper or water. Three fish are arranged diagonally across the lower two-thirds of the composition, all facing towards the left. The largest fish is positioned at the bottom left, with a medium-sized fish above and slightly to its right. A smaller, more faintly rendered fish is at the top center, appearing further away. All fish have grey bodies with lighter undersides and fins, and visible scales. The water around them shows gentle, undulating lines indicating movement or currents. In the bottom right corner, there is a vertical column of black calligraphic text, which reads "羽陽柚江寫", followed by two square red seals stacked vertically below the text.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color silk

alt_text: Three fish, one large and two smaller, swim in light blue water on a vertical scroll painting
long_description: A vertical painting depicts three fish swimming in pale, light blue water, framed by a patterned gold border. The largest fish is positioned in the lower right quadrant, facing left. It has a rounded head, a visible eye, and a body covered in distinct, textured scales, rendered in shades of gray and white. Its fins are visible, extending from its body. Above and to the left of the large fish are two smaller fish, also oriented towards the left. These smaller fish are lighter in color, with more subtle markings on their bodies and delicate fins. The background is a soft, light blue or off-white, with faint, undulating lines suggesting water currents. In the upper right corner, there is vertical black Japanese script, followed by two square red seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color silk

alt_text: Two birds in flight, one calling, above sparse reeds in a monochrome ink painting
long_description: The artwork is a monochrome ink painting on a light, off-white ground. Two birds are depicted in flight, with sparse reeds in the lower portion of the composition. The upper bird, positioned in the upper right quadrant, is smaller and shown with its wings spread wide, angled downwards as if descending. Its head is lowered, and its body is rendered with darker gray and black ink on its back and wings, contrasting with a lighter belly. The lower bird, larger and positioned centrally, also has its wings spread, but its body is more horizontal. Its head is tilted slightly upwards, and its beak is open, suggesting a call. This bird features a dark gray back and wings, a distinct white chest and throat, and a dark stripe through its eye. Below the birds, in the lower third of the painting, several thin, dark ink strokes represent reeds or tall grasses. They emerge from the bottom edge, extending diagonally upwards towards the center right. Some subtle, lighter gray washes are visible in the background, particularly in the lower left, suggesting a misty or watery environment. In the lower right corner, there is black calligraphy arranged vertically, which reads "玉峯". Below this, a square red seal is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting shows two ducks, one facing forward and the other with its back to the viewer, on a light background
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on a light, textured paper depicts two ducks in shades of gray and black. The background is a pale, almost white tone, suggesting a calm body of water with subtle, lighter gray washes around the ducks and faint ripple lines on the right side. In the foreground, slightly to the left of center, one duck is positioned with its back to the viewer. Its body is rendered in broad strokes of dark gray, with darker black feathers visible on its tail and the tips of its wings. Its head is turned to the right, revealing a dark black head, a white eye with a black pupil, and a dark beak. Behind and slightly to the right of this duck, the second duck faces forward, looking directly out from the painting. Its body is a lighter gray, with delicate, darker gray markings indicating feather patterns. Its head is also light gray, featuring a dark eye and a long, light-colored beak. In the lower left corner, black calligraphic text, which reads '玉章', is present, followed by two small, square red seals. The entire artwork is framed by a narrow, light gold-colored border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a black and grey cat with a light ribbon, looking upwards.
long_description: A minimalist ink wash painting depicts a cat seated in the lower-left portion of a light, textured background. The cat faces left and upwards, its head rendered in solid black with prominent pointed ears. Its mouth is open, revealing a lighter, possibly pinkish-brown interior, and delicate whiskers extend from its muzzle. A light brown ribbon or collar is tied around its neck. The cat's body transitions from dark grey at the shoulders to lighter grey and white tones towards its belly and hindquarters, created with varying ink washes. Its tail is curled around its left side, ending in a lighter, feathery brushstroke. The background is a plain, pale beige or off-white, with a subtle vertical texture. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of black text are accompanied by two red square seals.

metadata.title: 猫図|Cat Seen from Behind
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink and color on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting depicts a bird wading in shallow water with faint reeds in the background.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on a light, off-white background depicts a single bird wading in shallow water. The bird is positioned slightly to the left of the center, facing towards the right with its head lowered, as if looking for something in the water. Its body is rendered with varying shades of gray ink, darker on its back and wings, and lighter on its underside. The head is a darker gray, featuring a small, pointed beak and a distinct white ring around a dark, circular eye. Two slender legs are visible, one stepping into the water, the other partially obscured by the bird's body. The water is suggested by a few horizontal, wavy lines of dark ink in the lower foreground. Behind and to the left of the bird, faint, vertical brushstrokes in lighter gray ink indicate reeds or tall grasses. In the lower left corner, there are several vertical lines of black calligraphic text and two red square seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: A light-colored dog sits facing left, with a dark-furred dog peeking from behind it on a plain background
long_description: The artwork features two dogs rendered in ink wash on a light, textured background. A light-colored dog sits in the lower-left portion of the composition, facing towards the left edge of the frame. Its body is primarily defined by faint gray outlines, leaving its fur uncolored to match the light beige background. This dog has small, slightly pointed ears, a short muzzle, and dark, round eyes. Its front paws are visible, and its posture suggests it is sitting upright. Behind and slightly to the right of the light-colored dog, a second dog is partially visible. This dog is depicted with dark, almost black fur, rendered with varying shades of black and dark gray ink, giving it a textured and shaggy appearance. Its head is turned towards the viewer, with bright, alert eyes that stand out against its dark fur. Its ears are pointed, and its face shows some lighter fur around the eyes and muzzle. A bushy, curled tail extends from its body towards the lower-right corner of the frame. The background is a uniform, light beige or off-white color, with a subtle woven texture visible throughout. In the upper right corner, there is vertical black text, followed by two square red seals. The text reads "玉" and "甲".

metadata.title: 狗児図|A Pair of Puppies
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: An ink wash painting shows a squirrel with a bushy tail, crouching over two spiky chestnuts on the ground.
long_description: An ink wash painting depicts a squirrel in various shades of gray and black on a light, unadorned background. The squirrel is positioned in the lower left quadrant, facing right, with its body slightly hunched over. Its large, bushy tail, rendered with light, feathery brushstrokes, curves upwards and then slightly forward over its back. The squirrel's body is a darker gray, with its head and front paws rendered in darker tones. It has a small, round white eye with a black pupil, and faint whiskers extend from its snout. Its front paws are detailed with sharp claws, and it appears to be holding something small near its mouth. Below the squirrel's head are two chestnuts, each surrounded by spiky husks, rendered with fine, dark lines. One chestnut appears to be partially open. The background is a uniform light beige, providing a stark contrast to the dark ink of the squirrel and chestnuts. In the lower left corner, there is vertical text in black ink, followed by a square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a crane standing in shallow water with tall reeds on a light background
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a large crane standing in shallow water, rendered primarily in shades of gray and black on a light, off-white background. The crane occupies the left and central portion of the composition, facing left with its long neck slightly curved and its head raised. Its body is depicted with light gray washes, suggesting white plumage, while its wingtips and tail feathers are rendered with darker, more defined black ink strokes. A small reddish-brown mark is visible above its dark eye, and its long, pointed beak is dark gray. Two slender, dark gray legs extend into the water, which is indicated by subtle horizontal washes of light gray across the bottom third of the image. To the right of the crane, several tall, slender reeds rise vertically, depicted with bold, dark ink strokes. Smaller, darker clumps of foliage are visible at the base of these reeds, near the crane's tail. In the upper right quadrant, there is a vertical column of dark characters, followed by two red square seals. The background is a uniform, light, textured off-white.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicts a dark rooster with a large tail and a fluffy white hen on a light background.
long_description: The artwork is an ink wash painting featuring two birds, a dark rooster and a white hen, positioned centrally on a light, unadorned background. The rooster on the left is depicted in shades of dark grey and black. It has a prominent, upright black tail with multiple long, curved feathers. Its body is a solid dark grey, and its head, facing left, shows a bright red comb and wattle above and below its beak. Its eye is a small dark dot. Its legs and feet, rendered with fine black lines, are visible beneath its body. To the right of the rooster is a round, fluffy white hen. Its body is almost entirely white, with subtle grey lines suggesting feather texture. Its head, facing slightly forward and to the right, also features a bright red comb and wattle, and a small dark eye. Its legs and feet are visible, similar in style to the rooster's. The background is a plain, light beige or off-white, providing a stark contrast to the birds. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical column of dark calligraphic text, accompanied by two red square seals. The overall style uses varying ink washes and fine brushstrokes.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Four light-colored shrimp swim among sparse aquatic plants on a pale, subtly textured background with calligraphy
long_description: The artwork depicts four shrimp amidst sparse aquatic plants on a light, muted background. The overall color palette is soft, dominated by pale grays, light greens, and subtle pinkish-brown tones for the shrimp. The background is a pale, almost off-white or very light gray, with a visible fabric-like texture. Four shrimp are distributed across the central and lower portions of the composition. They are depicted with segmented bodies, long antennae, and multiple legs. Their bodies are a light, muted pinkish-brown or grayish-pink, with darker outlines and subtle shading that suggests volume. The top-most shrimp is positioned in the upper right quadrant, facing left and slightly downwards. Below and to the left of this shrimp, another shrimp is oriented diagonally, facing towards the lower left. In the lower left quadrant, a third shrimp faces towards the upper right. The fourth shrimp is in the lower right quadrant, facing towards the upper left. All shrimp have dark, small eyes. Their antennae are very long and delicate, extending significantly beyond their bodies. Scattered around and between the shrimp are clusters of thin, wispy aquatic plants. These plants are rendered in a light, muted green or gray-green, with fine, feathery fronds. They appear to be floating or growing from an unseen bottom. The plants are more concentrated in the lower half of the image, forming a loose, organic pattern. In the upper right corner, there is vertical text written in dark ink, followed by a red seal. The image has a narrow, light gold border with a subtle patterned texture along its edges.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: A large school of small, light-colored fish swims in a swirling pattern on a pale background with faint plants.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular image with a pale, light gray background, bordered by a narrow, textured gold frame. A large school of small, light-colored fish is the central subject, occupying the majority of the canvas. The fish, depicted with subtle shading in light gray and white tones, are uniformly small, each measuring approximately one to two inches in length. They are arranged in a dynamic, swirling formation, with the densest cluster located in the lower-center. From this central point, the fish fan out and upward in a broad, counter-clockwise arc, creating a sense of movement. Faint, broad, curved brushstrokes in a slightly darker gray suggest water currents or a vortex, particularly in the upper right and central areas, mirroring the fish's motion. In the lower portion of the image, beneath the main concentration of fish, sparse, delicate brushstrokes in a pale green-gray resemble underwater plants or reeds. In the bottom left corner, vertical text in dark ink is visible, followed by a square red seal. The text reads: "利 琇 拙 江 畫".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: A painting depicts a variety of fish and marine creatures, including sturgeon, a ray, and other fish, swimming in light blue water.
long_description: A vertical rectangular painting features several aquatic creatures against a pale, light blue background, framed by a thin gold border. The background suggests water with subtle, lighter wavy lines indicating currents. In the upper right, a single fish with visible scales and a rounded body swims left. Below and to its left, a light gray ray, flat and diamond-shaped with a long tail, also faces left. Dominating the center are two long, slender fish with pointed snouts and armored bodies, resembling sturgeon, swimming diagonally from the upper right towards the lower left. They are dark gray with lighter undersides. A third, fainter, similar long fish is partially visible further down and to the left, suggesting depth. In the lower right, a flat, oval-shaped fish, similar to a flounder, with both eyes on one side of its head, faces left. In the upper right corner, vertical black calligraphic text is present, alongside a circular red seal containing more characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Four different fish swimming in light blue water with subtle waves, depicted on a vertical scroll
long_description: The image is a vertical painting depicting four distinct fish against a light, subtly wavy background. The background is a pale blue-grey, with faint, undulating lines suggesting water. In the upper central area, a light grey, disc-shaped fish with small, pointed fins on its back and underside swims, facing slightly left. Below and to its right, a larger, elongated fish with a lizard-like head and prominent dorsal and ventral fins is depicted. Its body is light grey with visible scales, and it swims horizontally, facing right. In the lower left, a smaller, silvery-grey fish with a flat, oval body and pointed fins swims, facing left. To its right, in the lower central area, a reddish-brown fish with a spiky dorsal fin and a rounder body swims, facing right. In the bottom right corner, there are two columns of dark, vertical characters, followed by two red square seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Three grey otters swim in a light-colored body of water, one above two others
long_description: A vertical rectangular painting depicts three otters in a light, watery environment. The background is a soft, light grey or pale blue, with subtle variations suggesting water movement or depth. The overall impression is muted and serene. The otters are rendered in shades of grey, with darker outlines and subtle shading to define their forms. Their bodies are sleek and elongated, characteristic of otters. Each otter has small, dark eyes and a rounded head. The top otter is positioned in the upper right quadrant, swimming downwards and to the left. Its body is curved, with its tail extending upwards and its head pointing towards the lower left. Its front paws are visible, appearing webbed. Below and to the left of the top otter, two more otters swim side-by-side, moving towards the left. The otter on the left is slightly larger and positioned slightly behind the one on its right. Both have their heads turned slightly upwards and to the left, with their front paws visible. Their tails extend behind them. The composition places the three otters in a diagonal arrangement, creating a sense of movement through the water. The light background provides no distinct horizon or features, emphasizing the aquatic environment. In the lower right corner, there is vertical text in black ink, followed by two red square seals. The text reads: 利南 神江 雲

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Three marine creatures, including a flatfish, a long fish, and a ray, swim above shells and seaweed
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular image depicting marine life against a light blue-gray background, framed by a narrow gold border with a subtle pattern. In the upper left, a dark gray flatfish with visible scales swims horizontally, angled slightly downwards towards the left. Below and to its right, a lighter gray, slender fish with fins and a pointed head swims horizontally towards the right. In the lower right quadrant, a small, dark gray ray with a rounded body and a thin tail rests or swims close to the bottom, facing left. The lower portion of the image shows a seabed rendered with light green-gray, feathery seaweed-like plants. Among the plants, two shells are visible: one is a light gray spiral shell in the lower left, and the other is an elongated, darker gray shell to its right. On the far right side of the image, a vertical column of black Japanese characters is present, with two square red seals positioned directly below the text. The overall impression is of creatures in a calm, underwater environment.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Three long, slender fish with pointed snouts intertwined with branches and green leaves on a light background.
long_description: The artwork presents three long, slender fish with pointed snouts, arranged around a central cluster of branches and foliage against a plain, light beige background. The fish are depicted with light gray bodies, lighter undersides, and subtle dark gray markings along their backs and fins. Their eyes are small and dark. Two of the fish are positioned horizontally, their bodies curving around a gnarled, light brown branch. One fish is above, its head pointing left, and its tail curving down to the right. The second fish is below, its head pointing right, and its body curving upwards and to the left, crossing over the first fish's body. A third fish is positioned vertically on the left, its head pointing upwards and its tail extending downwards, partially obscured by the other elements. The branches are light brown with some darker accents, and they have small, feathery, dark green or brown shoots at their ends. To the left of the branches, a cluster of roundish, light green leaves with visible veins is depicted. Below the central arrangement, a few thin, white, wavy lines suggest water or movement. In the lower right corner, vertical text in dark ink reads "明陽柚江香", followed by two red square seals. The entire composition is framed by a thin, gold-colored border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Two pale eels intertwined with mushrooms and pine needles on a light background
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular composition featuring two pale, elongated, eel-like fish, a cluster of mushrooms, and a sparse bed of pine needles, all set against a plain, light beige background. The two fish are positioned in the upper-center, their bodies curving downwards and intertwining. The upper fish has its head facing left, with a small, dark eye and a subtle pinkish hue on its head, transitioning to a light beige body. Its body curves gracefully to the right and then down. The second fish is positioned slightly below and behind the first, also with its head facing left, mirroring the first's features. Its body intertwines with the lower portion of the first fish's tail, creating a sense of movement. Both fish exhibit delicate, feathery fins along their undersides, rendered in a slightly darker, grayish-brown tone. Below the intertwined fish, a cluster of approximately five to six mushrooms is arranged. These mushrooms have thick, light beige stems and rounded, dark brown or grayish-brown caps, some appearing partially open. They are nestled among a scattering of fine, light green or grayish-blue pine needles, which form a delicate base for the composition. The background is a uniform, light beige, subtly textured, suggesting a silk or paper surface. In the upper right corner, there is a vertical column of black calligraphic characters, followed by two red square seals, one directly below the text and another slightly below and to the right. The characters read: 利勝池江香.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; silk

alt_text: Two hanging scrolls depict flowering plants: one with white blossoms, the other with red berries and lotus.
long_description: The image displays two vertical hanging scrolls, presented side-by-side against a dark, plain background. Each scroll consists of a central painted panel, framed by decorative borders, and topped with a lighter fabric section from which it hangs. The scroll on the left features a painting on a light tan background. A tall, slender plant with delicate white, feathery blossoms dominates the composition, extending from the lower center upwards. Below these white flowers, darker, broader leaves, some appearing brown or dried, are visible. Thin green stems and other foliage are interspersed throughout the lower and middle sections of the plant. A small vertical inscription in dark characters is present in the upper left corner of the painted panel. The scroll on the right also has a light tan painted background. It depicts a vibrant branch laden with numerous small red berries and small green leaves, extending from the lower right towards the upper center. Below this branch, large, rounded green leaves, resembling lotus leaves, are prominent, with some appearing partially submerged or folded. Smaller white and green flowers and various foliage are scattered around the base of the composition. A small, dark-colored bird is perched subtly among the branches and leaves in the lower right quadrant. A small vertical inscription in dark characters is visible in the upper right corner of this painted panel. Both painted panels are bordered by a narrow band of dark blue fabric with a repeating gold pattern, which in turn is surrounded by a wider border of brown fabric featuring a subtle, embossed leaf or floral pattern. The uppermost and lowermost sections of each scroll are made of a muted, light green-gold fabric with a faint, wavy pattern. Silver-colored metal hanging bars and decorative ribbons are visible at the very top of each scroll.

metadata.title: 池田孤邨筆　四季花鳥画|Flowers and Birds of the Four Seasons
metadata.medium: Pair of hanging scrolls; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: Three vertical hanging scrolls depict a gold-toned landscape with mountains, flowering trees, a waterfall, and small figures
long_description: Three vertical hanging scrolls are presented side-by-side, each featuring a painted scene on a gold-toned background. Each scroll has a dark blue fabric border at the top and bottom, with two vertical gold strips on the upper blue section. A patterned gold border with repeating circular motifs frames the central painted area of each scroll. The overall composition suggests a continuous landscape across the three panels. The leftmost scroll depicts a misty landscape with rolling green hills and mountains. A large cluster of pink and red flowering trees cascades down the slopes on the left side, with smaller green trees and shrubs visible. The central scroll features a tall, steep cliff on the left, from which a waterfall flows downwards. Green pine trees are scattered on the cliff face and at its base. Two small figures, dressed in light-colored robes, are visible on a path or ledge near the bottom of the cliff. One figure appears to be standing, while the other is seated or kneeling. Faint, smaller figures or structures are visible higher up the cliff. The rightmost scroll shows a landscape dominated by rolling green hills covered in dense white flowering trees. The white blossoms are prominent across the hillsides, interspersed with green foliage. All three scrolls share a hazy, golden sky that blends into the misty landscapes.

metadata.title: 狩野常信筆　滝見業平図|Nunobiki Waterfall, Mount Yoshino, and Tatsuta River
metadata.medium: Triptych of hanging scrolls; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A gold illustration of a central seated figure surrounded by many smaller figures, mountains, and clouds, next to a dark blue text panel
long_description: The image displays an open book or scroll, divided into two main sections. The left section is a dark blue rectangular panel with a gold border. Within this panel, several columns of vertical text are rendered in gold. The visible text reads: "妙法蓮華經安樂行品第十四" and "今時文殊師利法王子善薩摩訶薩白佛言". The right section is a large, detailed illustration predominantly in gold tones. At the center of this illustration, a large, seated figure with a prominent halo is depicted on a multi-tiered lotus throne, surrounded by a large, circular aura. Numerous smaller figures, mostly seated and also with halos, are arranged in rows around the central figure, some appearing to be on clouds or platforms. The background features stylized mountains and clouds, with some trees visible among the peaks. In the foreground, more figures are visible, some with patterned robes, seated or standing on a ground with a dotted pattern. The entire illustration is rendered in varying shades of gold, creating a sense of depth and texture. A thin, patterned border runs along the right edge of the illustration, where a small purple and white ribbon is tied.

metadata.title: 「提婆達多品」 「安楽行品」 『(法華経)』|Lotus Sutra, Chapters 12 and 14
metadata.medium: Two handscrolls; gold, silver on indigo-dyed paper

alt_text: Ink and wash painting of misty mountains, trees, a river, and a small boat
long_description: The vertical scroll painting depicts a misty mountain landscape in an ink and wash style, framed by a golden-brown patterned border. In the upper half, towering, jagged mountains rise, with their peaks rendered in dark gray and their slopes covered in varying shades of green foliage. A prominent waterfall cascades down the right side of the largest mountain. Swirling white mist or clouds obscure the mid-sections of the mountains, creating a sense of atmospheric depth and distance. Below the mist, a series of rolling hills, also covered in green and brown foliage, extend across the middle ground. Several trees with reddish-orange leaves are scattered among the green, suggesting an autumn season. A small cluster of light-colored buildings is nestled on a hillside in the mid-left. In the foreground, a dark-trunked tree with dense, dark green and brown foliage stands on the left bank of a calm river or lake. A small, light-colored boat with a single figure is positioned on the water towards the lower right. The water reflects the muted tones of the surrounding landscape. Red seals and dark calligraphic script are visible in the lower left corner of the painting.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A standing figure with a halo and radiating lines on a dark background, standing on a lotus pedestal.
long_description: A vertical rectangular artwork depicts a standing figure rendered in gold and bronze tones against a dark blue-green background. The figure is centrally positioned, facing directly forward. The head features dark hair, small facial features, and elongated earlobes. A circular halo, composed of several concentric rings, surrounds the head. The figure's body is covered in a draped garment, intricately detailed with geometric and curvilinear patterns in gold. The right hand is raised to chest height with the palm facing outward, while the left hand hangs down alongside the body. The figure stands on a multi-layered, lotus-like pedestal, which shows hints of green and reddish-brown. Behind the figure, numerous straight, gold-colored lines radiate outwards from a point behind the figure's head, extending towards the top and sides of the dark background, creating a sunburst effect. The overall impression is one of symmetry and detailed ornamentation.

metadata.title: 方便法身尊影|Amida Manifesting in the Dharma-body of Expedient Means
metadata.medium: Ink, color, and cut silver on silk

alt_text: Black and white image of a standing figure with a halo and radiating lines, on a lotus pedestal
long_description: The image is a vertical, black and white depiction of a standing figure surrounded by radiating lines, positioned on a lotus pedestal. The central figure is tall and slender, facing forward. Its head is encircled by a large, circular halo, which is itself surrounded by a smaller, crescent-shaped inner halo. The figure's features are indistinct due to the image's monochrome nature and potential wear, but a general human form is discernible. The figure appears to be wearing long, flowing robes that fall to its feet. Its hands are raised slightly, possibly in a gesture, though details are unclear. Behind the figure and extending outwards from the halo are numerous straight, parallel lines that radiate upwards and outwards, creating a fan-like or sunburst effect. These lines alternate between lighter and darker tones, suggesting a striped pattern. The figure stands on a multi-layered lotus flower, which serves as its base. The lotus has several rows of petals, with the lower petals appearing more open and rounded. The overall impression is one of a revered or divine being emanating light or energy. The image shows signs of age, with some areas appearing faded or textured.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Painting on paper

alt_text: A standing robed figure with a large radiating halo and a lotus base, depicted in black and white.
long_description: A vertical, black and white image features a central standing figure. Behind the figure's head is a large, circular halo. From this halo, numerous straight, narrow rays extend outwards to the edges of the image, creating a fan-like or sunburst pattern. These rays alternate between dark and light tones, forming a striped background. The upper parts of the background show some lighter, irregular patches, suggesting wear or texture. The figure is slender and stands upright, facing forward. It is depicted in outline, with internal lines suggesting flowing robes that fall in vertical folds. The head is topped with a small, indistinct crown or headdress. The facial features are not clearly visible, appearing as a dark silhouette within the halo. The arms are held close to the body, with hands possibly clasped or in a gesture, though details are faint. The figure stands on a large, stylized lotus blossom. The lotus has multiple layers of petals, with the upper petals curving outwards and downwards, forming a platform for the figure's feet. The petals are outlined and show some internal detailing. The entire image is rendered in shades of black, white, and gray.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Painting on paper

alt_text: A standing figure in traditional attire with elaborate hair, holding a staff, surrounded by calligraphic text on a textured background
long_description: The image is a black and white depiction of a standing figure on a textured background with calligraphic text. The central figure is a person, seen from the waist up, facing slightly to the right with their head turned towards the viewer. They have an elaborate hairstyle, with dark hair piled high on their head. Their face is light-toned with delicate features, including small eyes, a small nose, and a small mouth. They wear a long, flowing garment with wide sleeves. The lower section of the garment has a dark, repeating pattern. The garment is dark in some areas and lighter in others, showing variations in tone. The figure holds a thin, dark staff or stick diagonally across their body, extending upwards to the right. The staff ends in a dark, circular shape resembling a flower or fan. The background is light-toned and appears aged, with visible cracks and variations in tone. Dark calligraphic text is present on both the left and right sides of the figure. On the left, the text is arranged vertically, with larger characters at the bottom. On the right, the text is also vertical, appearing more fragmented.

metadata.title: 虞子君図 (Gushigimi zu)|Consort Yu
metadata.medium: Ink and color on paper

alt_text: A standing figure in patterned robes with text and a table-like object on aged paper.
long_description: The image is a black and white depiction of a standing figure, rendered in a style resembling a painting or drawing on aged paper. The figure is positioned slightly to the left of the center, facing forward with her head turned slightly to her right. She wears elaborate, flowing robes adorned with floral patterns. Her hair is styled in a dark, intricate bun on top of her head. Her face is light-toned with delicate features. Her right arm is bent, holding a dark, slender object vertically near her chest. Her left arm is extended outwards, holding a wide, shallow, bowl-like object that also features floral patterns. The robes extend to the bottom of the frame, with the hem showing a scalloped edge and more floral designs. To the right of the figure, a dark, rectangular, table-like object with ornate legs is visible, angled into the frame from the right edge.
