Various lines of text in a calligraphic style are scattered across the background. To the upper left, a vertical column of text reads "一朝攜琴瑟入君門". Above the figure's head, another vertical column reads "奉質". To the upper right, "天作" is written. Near the bottom right, another vertical text block reads "楊貴妃". The background is a light, textured surface, showing cracks and imperfections consistent with an old document.

metadata.title: 楊貴妃図 (Yō Kihi zu)|Yang Guifei
metadata.medium: Ink and color on paper

alt_text: A standing figure in ornate robes and jewelry, holding a leafy branch, with a halo against a dark background
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll painting depicting a standing figure against a dark, faded background. The figure, positioned centrally, faces forward with its head slightly turned to the viewer's left. A faint, light blue-green halo encircles the figure's head. The figure has a pale complexion, with dark hair visible beneath an elaborate golden headdress adorned with small, colorful elements. Long, sheer, light-colored drapery flows from the headdress down past the shoulders. The upper body is adorned with multiple necklaces and pendants, including a prominent gold-colored piece with dangling elements over the chest. The figure's chest is partially exposed, revealing pale skin. The left hand, held at chest height, delicately grasps a leafy green branch. The right hand is raised slightly, palm facing forward in a gesture. The figure wears layered robes in various colors. An inner garment appears red with white patterns, while an outer robe is predominantly green with blue accents and intricate gold-colored patterns. Sheer, light-colored fabric drapes over the arms and down the sides of the body, creating a translucent effect. The lower part of the figure's body is obscured by the flowing robes, which pool around the feet. The figure stands on a base composed of stylized, colorful clouds or lotus petals in shades of red, green, and blue. The dark background shows signs of age and fading. A narrow, decorative border with small patterns frames the painting on the left and right sides.

metadata.title: 楊柳観音菩薩像 (Yōryū Kannon Bosatsu zō)|The Bodhisattva Willow Kannon (Avalokiteshvara)
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A standing figure in a black kimono with patterned circles, looking down, framed by a patterned border.
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a standing figure in a black kimono, positioned centrally against a plain, light brown background. The figure is shown in profile, facing left, with their head tilted downwards. Their skin is pale, and their black hair is styled in an elaborate updo. The black kimono is adorned with large, irregularly shaped patterns resembling circles or fans, in various colors including white, light blue, red, and gold. These patterns feature intricate designs such as grids, dots, and floral motifs. One hand is visible, holding a white object that appears to be a fan or a piece of cloth. The lower part of the kimono flares out, revealing a white undergarment or a stylized ground beneath it, and one bare foot is visible. The central image is framed by a wide, light brown border with a repeating pattern of darker, muted floral or geometric shapes. A narrower, lighter border with a repeating yellow or gold pattern runs along the top and bottom edges of the central image area, inside the wider border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on paper

alt_text: Full-length black and white portrait of a person in a patterned kimono, standing and looking downwards
long_description: The image is a vertical, full-length portrait of a single figure, rendered in black and white tones. The figure stands against a plain, dark background, framed by a decorative border on the left and right sides. The person is depicted in a three-quarter profile, facing towards the viewer's right, with their head gently tilted downwards. Their body is slightly turned, creating a subtle S-curve. They wear a long, flowing garment, likely a kimono, which is light-toned with dark outlines and details. The garment features wide, voluminous sleeves. Two circular emblems, each containing a complex geometric pattern, are prominently displayed on the upper sleeves. A dark, patterned obi, or sash, cinches the waist. The lower part of the garment extends to the ground, showing layers of fabric at the feet. The person's hair is dark, styled upwards into a bun on top of the head, with some strands framing the face. Their face is light-toned, with delicate features, and their gaze is directed downwards. One hand is partially visible, covered by the sleeve, near the chest. The background is a solid, dark gray. The left and right edges of the artwork are bordered by a repeating diamond pattern, where each diamond contains a smaller, lighter square. A small, rectangular white label is visible on the right border, near the middle.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on silk

alt_text: A long, vertical textile panel depicts multiple stylized red and blue-green dragons amidst a patterned floral background.
long_description: A tall, narrow, vertically oriented textile panel is framed in black. The panel features a series of stylized, mythical creatures, primarily dragons, against a densely patterned background. At the top, a large red creature with a prominent head, white eyes, and a long, flowing body extends downwards. Its body is accented with green and white details. Below this, another red, more abstract creature or part of the first one is visible, with swirling forms. In the middle section, a blue-green dragon with white eyes and red accents coils downwards, its scaled body detailed with lighter blue patterns. It appears to be holding a red orb or pearl near its head. Further down, a second blue-green dragon, similar in style and color, also coils, its body intertwining with the background patterns. The background throughout the panel is a rich tapestry of gold, muted green, and soft red, featuring intricate patterns of foliage and large, stylized flowers, possibly peonies or chrysanthemums. The overall color palette is earthy and rich, with the vibrant reds and blue-greens of the creatures standing out against the more subdued background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Framed painting; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A black and white landscape painting showing mountains, water, a large tree, and several figures with horses and an animal
long_description: A vertical, grayscale painting depicts a mountainous landscape with water, figures, and animals. The upper portion of the image features a light, misty sky with faint, distant peaks. In the upper right corner, vertical lines of text are visible. Below this, a series of rugged, dark-outlined mountains and cliffs dominate the mid-ground, extending from the left edge towards the right. These mountains have varied textures, with some appearing smooth and rounded, while others are sharply angular. A body of water or a flat, open area stretches across the middle left of the composition. On the far left, near the water's edge, a large, dark, four-legged animal, possibly a bear or a wild boar, is depicted. On the right side of the mid-ground, a prominent, dark-foliaged tree with a visible trunk grows on a rocky outcrop. Beneath this tree, a figure is seated, facing left, with dark clothing. In the lower half of the painting, closer to the viewer, more activity is present. On the left, two light-colored horses are depicted, one with dark spots. To their right, a dark-colored horse stands. Further down and to the left, two figures on horseback are shown, riding towards the right. The figure in front is on a light-colored horse, and the figure behind is on a slightly darker horse. The ground in the foreground is rocky and uneven.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Framed painting; ink on silk

alt_text: An old, bald man in dark robes stands on clouds, looking upwards, in a vertical grayscale painting.
long_description: A vertical, grayscale painting depicts an elderly man standing amidst stylized clouds. The man is positioned centrally, facing slightly to the right, with his head tilted back and his gaze directed towards the upper right. He is bald with a prominent forehead and visible wrinkles on his face, particularly around his eyes and mouth. He has a short, light-colored beard and mustache. His right hand is raised to his chest, holding a small, indistinct object or a fold of his garment. He wears long, flowing robes that appear dark in tone, with decorative borders along the collar, sleeve cuffs, and hem, featuring intricate, swirling patterns. A lighter-colored sash or belt is tied around his waist, with its ends hanging down. His feet, clad in what appear to be sandals or soft shoes, rest on a cluster of clouds at the bottom of the painting. The entire background is filled with numerous stylized clouds, rendered in varying shades of gray, creating a sense of depth and movement around the figure. The clouds are depicted as rounded, overlapping forms.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Framed painting; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A stern, elaborately dressed figure with a mustache and beard floats amidst swirling clouds, holding a ring
long_description: A vertical, framed artwork depicts a robust, stern-faced figure floating amidst swirling clouds, rendered in black and white tones. The central figure, positioned vertically in the middle, has a broad build, a prominent mustache, and a short beard. Their eyes are wide, and eyebrows are thick, conveying a serious expression. They wear a crown-like headpiece with decorative elements. The figure is dressed in elaborate, layered garments, including a dark outer robe with wide sleeves and a patterned border, and a lighter inner tunic with a circular design on the chest. A sash is tied around the waist. The figure's right hand, on the viewer's left, holds a circular ring. The left hand is partially obscured by the flowing clothing. The lower body shows dark, patterned boots, and the garment flows around the legs, suggesting movement or a floating posture. The background is entirely filled with stylized, swirling clouds, which are lighter in tone than the figure's darker clothing, creating a strong contrast. The entire composition is enclosed within a dark, decorative frame featuring intricate scrollwork patterns along its vertical sides.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Framed painting; ink and color on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a rooster with a long, pointed tail, head down, appearing to peck at the ground
long_description: A vertical, black and white ink wash painting depicts a rooster angled downwards from the upper right to the lower left. The rooster's long, slender tail feathers extend upwards towards the top edge of the frame, rendered with dark, sweeping brushstrokes that gradually lighten. Its body is composed of varying shades of grey wash, suggesting layered plumage, with darker, more defined strokes forming a prominent wing on the right side. The head is sharply angled downwards towards the lower left, with a lightly outlined, feathery comb and a small, dark eye. A dark, pointed beak is visible at the very bottom of the head. Two slender legs with distinct claws extend from the lower body, drawn with fine, dark lines. The background is a plain, light grey wash, providing a subtle contrast to the darker tones of the rooster.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Painting; color on paper

alt_text: A full-length black and white portrait of a standing woman in a patterned robe, adjusting her hair.
long_description: A full-length, black and white portrait depicts a standing woman against a plain, light gray background, framed by a dark, patterned border. The woman is positioned centrally, facing slightly to the viewer's left, with her head turned to the right. Her right arm is raised, with her hand near the side of her head, appearing to adjust her hair. Her left arm is held lower, with her hand resting on the front of her long, flowing robe. The robe is adorned with a scattered, dark pattern, possibly floral or abstract, and opens at the chest, revealing her upper torso. Her hair is styled in a large, dark bun on top of her head, with a thin, dark decorative pin visible. Her face is light, with downcast eyes and a small mouth. Her feet are visible at the bottom of the robe, with one foot slightly forward. Faint vertical text is visible on the left side of the robe, near her left arm. The dark border surrounding the image features a repeating, intricate pattern of leaves or abstract shapes.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Painting; color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink painting of a woman with an elaborate hairstyle and draped garment, with vertical text above her
long_description: This is a vertical ink painting on a light, aged background. The upper portion of the scroll features a block of vertical text in black ink, positioned towards the top right. The text reads: "敏核髴亂 口是心非 見不及雲 俗塵莫染 叱吒清風". Below the text, occupying the lower two-thirds of the scroll, is a depiction of a woman from the chest up. Her head is turned slightly to her right, and her gaze is directed in the same direction. She has a light complexion with delicate facial features, including narrow eyes, a small nose, and a faint mouth. Her hair is styled in a large, dark, elaborate bun, positioned high on her head and extending behind her ear. A light-colored, possibly silver, decorative hairpin with a looped design is visible in her hair on the left side. She wears a draped garment, rendered with light ink lines, showing folds and layers across her shoulders and chest. The overall palette is monochromatic, using shades of black and grey against the light, off-white background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Painting of a woman in an elaborate golden headdress and a flowing garment with red and gray patterns
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a single figure, likely a woman, against a plain, light beige background. The figure is positioned slightly to the left of center, angled with her body facing left and her head turned to look over her left shoulder towards the viewer. Her face is pale with dark, narrow eyes and a small mouth. Her black hair is styled in a large, dark mass on the right side of her head, adorned with an elaborate, golden or straw-colored headdress that extends upwards and outwards, featuring small red accents. She wears a flowing, multi-layered garment, possibly a kimono, that drapes around her body and spreads out at the bottom. The garment is primarily a muted gray-white, with prominent patterns of vibrant red, orange, and black lines that resemble flames or abstract organic shapes. Subtle green and brown elements are visible in the patterns, particularly on the left side of her body. Her left arm is bent, holding a part of the garment or a fan-like object, which appears green. The lower portion of the garment flows outwards, creating a sense of movement. Vertical red and black characters are visible in the upper right corner of the painting.

metadata.title: 地獄太夫図|The Hell Courtesan
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two swallows fly above a wave; a misty landscape with mountains, a waterfall, and houses.
long_description: This two-panel artwork features a natural scene against a light, neutral background, framed by gold borders. The left panel depicts two dark-bodied birds with white undersides, likely swallows, in flight. One bird is positioned higher and to the right, with wings spread, while the other is lower and to the left, with angled wings. Below them, a large, stylized wave in shades of grey and black curls upwards from the bottom left, its crest breaking towards the right. Two small red square seals are visible in the lower left corner of this panel. The right panel presents a misty landscape. In the upper half, a dark, rounded mountain peak emerges from a soft, grey mist that obscures the middle ground. A waterfall cascades down the right side of the mountain. Below the mist, several trees with green, needle-like foliage, resembling pines, are interspersed with trees bearing white blossoms. A winding river or stream flows from the upper left towards the lower center. In the lower center, two small structures with dark, thatched roofs are nestled among the trees. Two small red square seals are visible in the lower right corner of this panel.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album; silk

alt_text: A seated figure with dark blue-gray skin, long black hair, a mustache, and multiple necklaces, wearing a yellow striped garment.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical painting on a plain, light brown background, featuring a single, large figure in a seated or squatting position. The figure's skin is a dark blue-gray, with lighter, almost white, highlights on the chest, arms, and legs, creating a sense of volume. Long, black hair flows down the back and over the shoulders. The face is oval, with closed eyes, a prominent black mustache, and a small red dot on the forehead. Large, circular white earrings adorn both ears. The figure's bare chest is decorated with multiple strands of white beaded necklaces, some long and some shorter, with a few black beads interspersed. White bracelets are visible on the wrists and upper arms. The lower body is covered by a yellow garment with thick black horizontal stripes, resembling a dhoti, which extends to the ankles. A long, reddish-brown cloth with darker stripes is draped over the figure's left shoulder and across the back. A distinctive, long, black and yellow striped tail-like object emerges from behind the figure, curving downwards between the legs to the bottom edge of the image. Thin, delicate white lines crisscross over the figure's torso and limbs, forming a web-like pattern. The figure's legs are bent, and the feet are flat on the ground, facing forward. The overall style is illustrative with clear outlines.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink, opaque watercolor, and silver paint on paper

alt_text: A multi-headed, four-armed figure and a woman perform a ritual with fire and offerings in a stylized setting.
long_description: A detailed painting depicts a multi-headed, four-armed figure and a woman engaged in a ritual on a white platform. The central figure, with light skin and dark hair, sits cross-legged, facing forward. Four bearded heads are visible, stacked vertically. The figure wears a white dhoti with a brown and black floral pattern, multiple white beaded necklaces, and armbands. A red jewel hangs from the central necklace. The upper right hand holds a small, open white book, while the lower right hand holds a string of prayer beads. The upper left hand holds a pink lotus flower, and the lower left hand rests on the knee. To the left, a woman with light brown skin kneels, wearing a green blouse, a red skirt, and a patterned brown and black shawl. She holds a silver pitcher, pouring liquid towards a small, yellow flame on the platform. To the right of the flame, three small golden objects—a cup, a plate, and a spoon-like item—are arranged on the platform. The background features a lavender wall, topped by a white wall. To the left, a golden panel shows two stylized trees with green leaves and small orange fruits. To the right, another golden panel displays green foliage. Above, a pink canopy with gold dots and a green fringe extends across the top of the scene. The entire composition is framed by a thin gold border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink, opaque watercolor, and gold on paper

alt_text: A monochrome ink painting depicts a goose with an upturned head, standing in water near tall reeds
long_description: A vertical monochrome ink wash painting features a single bird, likely a goose, in a body of water with tall plants to its right. The bird is positioned in the lower-center, facing left with its long, slender neck arched sharply upwards and its beak slightly open. Its body is rendered with varying shades of dark gray and black ink, creating distinct feather patterns on its back and wings, while its underside is a lighter gray. Two webbed feet are visible, one slightly forward, appearing to be in motion. Small, horizontal brushstrokes to the bird's left indicate ripples in the water. To the right of the bird, several slender, dark-toned stalks with elongated, pointed leaves extend vertically upwards, suggesting reeds or bamboo. These plants are rendered with loose, expressive brushwork. The background is a light, uniform gray wash, creating a sense of open, watery space. In the lower right corner, vertical calligraphic text in dark ink is visible, accompanied by a circular red seal below it. The text appears to be "遠山木月".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A large, dark fish leaps from water next to a pink lotus bud on a vertical scroll.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a large fish and a lotus plant against a plain background. The central panel, a light tan color, is bordered by a patterned, light beige fabric. A dark-colored fish, possibly a carp, dominates the lower-center of the panel, depicted mid-leap from water. Its body is curved, with its head facing towards the upper right and its tail extending towards the lower left. The fish has prominent scales rendered with varying shades of dark gray and black ink, giving it a textured appearance. Its eye is round and dark with a lighter center, and its mouth is open. Below and around the fish's body, dark, swirling brushstrokes indicate water and movement. To the left of the fish's head, a light pink lotus bud emerges from the water, with several slender, dark green or black stems rising vertically behind it. One long, dark stem curves upwards and to the right, extending towards the top of the painting. In the lower left corner of the central panel, there is a vertical column of dark, calligraphic text, below which is a small, square red seal. The background of the central panel is a uniform, light yellowish-brown.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two fish, one larger and one smaller, swim in a vertical composition against a light, watery background.
long_description: The image is a vertical, monochromatic artwork depicting two fish in a light, indistinct background that suggests water. The overall tone is light gray, with subtle variations in shading. The larger fish is positioned in the upper-middle section, oriented diagonally with its head pointing towards the lower left and its tail curving upwards towards the upper right. Its body is detailed with visible scales, fins, and a distinct eye. The fish appears to be in motion, with its tail slightly bent. Below and slightly to the left of the larger fish, a second, smaller fish is partially visible. Its head is oriented towards the lower left, similar to the larger fish, but its body extends downwards and is less distinct, appearing somewhat faded or submerged. The background is a soft, mottled gray, lighter at the top and gradually becoming slightly darker and more textured around the fish, creating a sense of depth. In the lower right quadrant, a vertical column of small, dark characters is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A black and white scroll painting depicts a steeply angled thatched roof and a dark vertical post.
long_description: This vertical, black and white scroll painting features a minimalist depiction of a structure against a light, hazy background. In the upper right quadrant, a steeply angled thatched roof extends diagonally downwards towards the center. The underside of the roof is rendered with dark, textured brushstrokes, suggesting individual thatch strands or possibly icicle-like forms hanging from the eaves. Directly below the roof, a dark, vertical post descends, appearing to support the structure. The post has a somewhat faded and textured appearance, particularly towards its lower section. The background is a uniform, light gray, with subtle tonal variations that create a soft, atmospheric quality. In the lower right portion of the painting, a vertical column of dark, calligraphic text is visible. The overall composition emphasizes verticality and a sense of quiet solitude.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting on a scroll depicts a misty landscape with dark trees and a faint distant ridge
long_description: A vertical hanging scroll features an ink wash landscape painting on a light, warm-toned ground, framed by decorative borders. The central painting area is dominated by shades of grey and black ink, creating a sense of depth and mist. In the lower-left and central-left, a cluster of trees is rendered with darker, more defined ink strokes, showing distinct foliage and trunks. Moving upwards and to the right, other tree forms become progressively lighter and more indistinct, blending into a pervasive mist that fills much of the composition. A faint, arcing line, possibly suggesting a distant mountain ridge or cloud formation, extends from the upper-left towards the center-right. In the lower-left corner, there is vertical black text, followed by two stacked red square seals. The painting is bordered by an inner strip of light gold with a subtle floral pattern, and an outer wider border of dark blue-grey fabric adorned with a repeating pattern of small gold floral or geometric motifs.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A small bird perches on a branch with leaves, looking up, within a decorative scroll painting
long_description: The image is a vertical scroll with a central painted panel and decorative borders. The central panel is a light, warm beige or tan color. In the lower right quadrant, a small, light-colored bird with a dark eye perches on a thin, dark branch. Its head is tilted upwards, and its beak is slightly open. Its feathers are rendered with subtle gray and white washes. Below and to the left of the bird, a cluster of broad, dark green leaves with reddish stems emerges from another branch. Some leaves have a reddish tint at their tips. Above the bird, in the upper right, another thin branch extends downwards and to the left, with a few small, light green leaves and reddish buds. The background of the central panel is mostly empty, a uniform light tan. In the lower right corner of the central panel, there are two columns of dark vertical characters, followed by two small red square seals. The characters appear to be in a calligraphic style. The central painted panel is framed by a narrow border with a delicate, light gold, swirling floral or vine pattern. Outside this narrow border, the wider outer borders are a light olive green with a repeating pattern of overlapping fan shapes.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical ink wash painting shows a hazy landscape with distant mountains, a faint sun, and trees in the foreground.
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on light beige paper depicts a serene, hazy landscape. The top portion of the painting features a pale, almost monochromatic sky, with a faint, circular light source, possibly a sun or moon, positioned slightly to the right of the vertical center. Below this, a range of soft, indistinct mountains or hills emerges from a thick mist, rendered with graduated grey ink washes that suggest depth and distance. The middle ground is dominated by a flat, misty expanse, with subtle horizontal lines hinting at a distant shoreline or field. In the bottom left quadrant, a cluster of trees with dark, dense foliage and lighter trunks stands prominently. To their right, faint vertical brushstrokes suggest more distant trees or reeds receding into the mist. A small, dark, indistinct shape and a red rectangular seal with illegible characters are visible in the bottom left corner. The central painting is framed by light blue-grey borders, with decorative gold-beige patterned strips at the very top and bottom of the painted area.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a misty mountain landscape with a waterfall, trees, and a small boat.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a monochromatic landscape rendered in shades of brown, grey, and black ink on a light brown ground. The composition is dominated by towering, craggy mountains that rise from a dense mist, their peaks fading into the upper portion of the scroll. A waterfall cascades down the right side of one of the central mountains, disappearing into the mist below. In the upper right quadrant, vertical lines of black calligraphy are visible, accompanied by a red seal. The lower section of the painting depicts a rocky outcrop covered with dark, leafy trees on the left. Below this, a small, dark boat with a single figure is visible on a body of water, rendered with subtle horizontal strokes. The entire painted area is framed by decorative borders on the left and right, featuring a repeating pattern of light gold shapes against a darker, patterned background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: An ink wash landscape painting on a vertical scroll depicts misty mountains, water, a pagoda, and trees
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting on a light brown ground depicts a misty mountain and water landscape, framed by decorative fabric borders. The upper section features a vast, light brown expanse, with faint, distant mountains emerging from a haze. In the upper left, black calligraphic characters are visible above a red seal. Below these, a series of darker, more defined mountain peaks and landmasses extend horizontally, with dense, dark ink washes suggesting foliage or rocky textures on the left. The landscape transitions into a lighter, implied body of water. The lower half of the painting is dominated by a tall, dark, craggy rock formation or mountain on the left, heavily textured with dark ink washes that suggest dense trees at its summit. Nestled into the side of this formation, slightly to the left of center, is a multi-tiered pagoda-like structure, rendered with fine black lines and lighter washes, appearing to be built into the landscape. To the right of this large formation, a lighter, misty area extends, with a small, dark, boat-like structure visible on the water or a distant shore. Faint, indistinct landforms are visible at the very bottom, receding into the mist. The scroll is bordered on both sides by a light gray-green fabric with repeating gold-colored fan-like or shell-like motifs.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Two small birds among flowering plants on a light background, presented as a hanging scroll.
long_description: The image is a vertical painting on a light, unadorned background, framed as a hanging scroll with gold-patterned borders. In the upper left quadrant, a slender branch with elongated, pointed green leaves and clusters of small, delicate pink flowers extends diagonally downwards and to the right. To the right of this branch, a small bird with a dark gray back, white belly, and white markings on its wings is depicted in flight, facing left and slightly downwards, with its beak open. Below this, a larger plant with broad, deeply lobed green leaves and several large, open white flowers with pale pink centers occupies the lower half of the composition. Some flowers are fully bloomed, while others appear as buds. Another small bird, similar in coloration to the first with a dark gray back and white underside, perches on a stem of this lower plant in the bottom left quadrant, facing right. Below this bird, a small inscription of black characters is visible, followed by a red square seal. The overall palette is soft, featuring pale greens, whites, and pinks against the light background, with the dark birds providing contrast.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Two hanging scrolls depicting birds among flowering branches and leaves against a light background
long_description: Two vertical hanging scrolls are displayed side-by-side. Each scroll features a painting on a light cream-colored panel, framed by a gold-patterned border, with a solid grey fabric section at the top and bottom. The scrolls are suspended by thin, light-colored ribbons with gold-fringed ends, attached to a metal hanger at the very top. The left scroll depicts a composition of plants and birds. In the upper left, slender green branches with small clusters of light pink flowers extend downwards. A small bird with a dark head, white belly, and dark wings is perched on a branch in the upper right. Towards the bottom left, large, lobed green leaves and several white flowers with pink centers are depicted. Another small bird, similar in appearance, is partially visible beneath these leaves. A small red square seal is present in the lower left. The right scroll features a different botanical arrangement. A vine-like plant with numerous green leaves and clusters of pink roses extends from the upper right, curving downwards and to the left. A small bird, with a dark head and light body, is perched on a branch, facing downwards, in the middle left of the painting. Further down on the left, more green leaves and small white flowers with yellow centers are visible. A small red square seal is present in the lower right. Both paintings utilize a delicate brushwork style with soft colors.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a grape vine with two leaves and a cluster of grapes on a light background.
long_description: This is a monochromatic ink wash painting depicting a grape vine on a light, unadorned background. The central composition features a horizontal vine branch extending from the left, slightly curving upwards, then downwards. On the left, a large, five-lobed grape leaf is rendered in a lighter shade of gray, showing subtle vein details. Further along the vine to the right, a smaller, darker gray leaf with distinct lobes is visible. Below this smaller leaf, a cluster of light gray grapes hangs, with individual berries clearly defined. The vine itself is a medium gray, with a few lighter tendrils extending from it. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical inscription in dark ink, followed by a red square seal. The main painting is framed by a thin, light brown border, which is then surrounded by a wider, dark blue border patterned with light blue cloud-like motifs. The overall impression is one of delicate balance and natural simplicity.

metadata.title: 松村呉春筆　葡萄図|Grapevine
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A small figure in a red garment grapples with a large dark ox within a light circular frame on a scroll.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a central circular motif depicting a human figure and an ox. The scroll itself is a light, warm beige color, with decorative borders at the top and bottom. These borders display a pattern of stylized flowers and swirling vines in muted tones of blue, green, brown, and red against a lighter background. The main artwork is contained within a large, light-colored circular area, which is centered vertically on the scroll. Inside this circle, a large, dark gray or black ox stands on the left, facing right. It has prominent horns and a tail, and its front legs are slightly lifted, suggesting movement. A smaller human figure, dressed in a red garment, stands to the right of the ox, facing it. The figure appears to be grappling with the ox's head or horns. The ground beneath the figures is a very light, almost white, wash. To the right of the human figure, a bare tree or branch with thin, dark lines extends upwards. The background within the circular motif is a pale, almost white, wash. Below the circular artwork, vertical black ink text is visible, followed by a red seal impression. The overall composition is balanced, with the figures occupying the lower half of the circular frame.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting features a large pink flower, bamboo stalks, and a small bird on a light background
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a floral arrangement against a light, subtly banded background. The background transitions from a pale beige at the top and bottom to a light tan or orange-beige in horizontal bands across the middle. Tiny white speckles are scattered throughout the lower half of the background. Centered in the upper middle, a slender bamboo stalk extends upwards, bearing a few dark green leaves. A small, light brown bird with a dark eye is perched on one of these leaves. Below the bird, the bamboo stalk is gathered and tied with a light-colored, textured material, forming a bundle from which several broad, light green-grey leaves fan out downwards and to the sides. These leaves are rendered with visible brushstrokes, suggesting texture. Nestled among these fanning leaves, slightly to the left of the central axis, is a large, prominent pink flower with multiple layered petals and a bright yellow center. Below this large flower, a small, gnarled branch with several tiny pink blossoms extends from the lower left towards the center. In the lower right corner, there is dark calligraphic text and two red seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a gnarled tree branch with white plum blossoms against a light background
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a gnarled tree branch with white blossoms against a light tan background, framed by patterned borders. The main tree trunk, thick and dark brown with hints of greenish-brown, enters from the upper left corner and extends downwards, curving towards the center. Thinner, darker branches emerge from the main trunk, reaching further right and downwards across the central panel. Numerous small, white, five-petaled blossoms with tiny dark centers are clustered along these thinner branches, appearing delicate and sparse. The background is a uniform, light beige or tan, providing a soft contrast to the darker branches and bright white flowers. In the lower left quadrant, a vertical column of black calligraphic text is visible, followed by a square red seal below it. The central painted panel is bordered on all four sides by a decorative fabric. This border is a muted gold or light brown color, adorned with a repeating pattern of dark brown or olive-green floral and foliate motifs, creating a rich, textured frame for the central image.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A vertical scroll featuring black calligraphy at the top and an ink wash landscape with trees and mountains below.
long_description: This vertical, grayscale scroll features a composition divided into two main sections: calligraphy at the top and a landscape painting at the bottom, separated by a large expanse of blank space. The upper third of the scroll is filled with columns of black ink calligraphy, written in a flowing, cursive style. Several red seals are visible among the characters, particularly in the lower left portion of the calligraphy section. Below the calligraphy, a significant portion of the scroll is left blank, appearing as a light gray, textured surface. The bottom quarter of the scroll depicts an ink wash landscape. In the foreground, two dark, prominent trees with long, drooping branches stand on a small, dark landmass, surrounded by lighter water. To their left, another smaller landmass with faint trees is visible. Behind this, a wider band of land or hills stretches across the midground, dotted with numerous smaller, lighter trees or structures. In the far background, dark, jagged mountains rise, their peaks partially obscured by a lighter, misty effect. A few small, dark, bird-like shapes are visible in the sky above the midground landscape. The entire artwork is framed by narrow, dark borders with a subtle floral or cloud pattern at the very top and bottom.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting depicting bamboo stalks and leaves on a light brown ground with patterned borders
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring bamboo rendered in ink wash on a light brown, aged ground. A prominent, thick bamboo stalk rises from the lower left, extending upwards towards the center. This main stalk is segmented by horizontal lines, and its surface shows variations in dark gray and black ink, suggesting texture. Several thinner bamboo shoots emerge from the lower left, partially obscured by the main stalk. Clusters of dark, pointed bamboo leaves are depicted with varying shades of ink, some appearing dense and others more sparse. A significant group of leaves extends from the upper right of the main stalk, reaching towards the upper right corner of the central panel. Another cluster of leaves is visible lower on the main stalk, and a few individual leaves are scattered across the upper left and mid-right areas. A small, square red seal is visible on the left side of the main bamboo stalk, slightly above its midpoint. The central painted area is framed by decorative borders. The inner border consists of a thin, light green band with a subtle geometric pattern at the top and bottom. The outer borders on the left and right are wider, light beige, and feature a repeating floral or vine motif in a slightly darker, muted tone. The overall impression is one of a natural scene rendered with expressive brushwork.

metadata.title: 伝可翁筆 竹図|Bamboo
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A small bird with a dark head perches on a thin, curving branch in an ink wash painting.
long_description: This vertical ink wash painting depicts a small bird perched on a slender branch against a plain, light background. The bird is positioned slightly to the left of the vertical center, approximately halfway up the scroll. It faces left, with its body angled slightly upwards. The bird has a dark head, a dark back, and a lighter underside. Its small, pointed beak is visible. The thin, dark branch on which the bird rests extends diagonally upwards and to the right, curving gently. Below the bird, the branch continues downwards and slightly to the left, with a few fainter, thinner lines branching off. The background is a uniform light tone, suggesting empty space. In the lower right quadrant, a small, faint, dark inscription consisting of a few characters is visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A black and white ink painting shows tall, feathery grasses and leafy plants against a light background.
long_description: A vertical, black and white ink painting depicts a cluster of plants against a light, unadorned background. In the lower left, a dark, vertical stalk supports several smaller, lighter stalks that branch outwards. Attached to these are numerous small, rounded leaves, often grouped in threes, rendered in various shades of gray. Interspersed among the leaves are tiny, light-colored blossoms or seed pods. From the lower center, two prominent, tall, thin stalks rise, curving gently upwards and to the right. The leftmost of these stalks culminates in a long, feathery plume composed of many fine, parallel lines. A similar, slightly smaller plume is visible further to the right, positioned a bit lower. The background is a uniform light gray, with subtle tonal variations. In the lower left corner, dark, stylized characters are visible, appearing as '景文'.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting on a vertical scroll depicts a fox leaping downwards towards small fish in water
long_description: This vertical scroll painting features a single fox rendered in ink wash on a light, off-white background. The scroll is framed by a narrow dark blue band at the top and bottom, and wider gold-brown patterned borders along the left and right sides. The fox is positioned in the upper right quadrant, depicted in mid-air, angled downwards. Its head is turned to the left, with pointed ears, a long snout, and visible whiskers. Its front paws are raised, and its body is rendered with varying shades of gray and black ink, suggesting fur texture. A bushy tail extends downwards from its hindquarters. In the lower left portion of the painting, faint, small, light-colored shapes resembling fish are visible, positioned above a subtle horizontal line that suggests water. The background is otherwise plain and unadorned. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical column of black calligraphic characters, below which is a square red seal containing more characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting shows a plant with red flowers and green leaves on a light brown ground
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a flowering plant centered on a light brown background. The plant has a thick, gnarled, light brown trunk that rises from the bottom, branching into thinner stems. Numerous dark green, oval-shaped leaves are clustered along these branches, some showing lighter green undersides. Five prominent red flowers with distinct white centers are distributed among the leaves. Each flower has multiple overlapping petals, creating a full, rounded form. The plant is positioned slightly to the right of the vertical center, with its branches extending upwards and outwards. The main painting is bordered on the left and right by a light beige fabric with a subtle pattern of small, light brown dots. At the very top and bottom, horizontal decorative bands feature a dark blue background with gold and light green floral or cloud-like motifs. In the lower right quadrant of the main painting, there is a vertical inscription of dark characters, which read "上総画", followed by a square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; color on paper

alt_text: Two hanging scrolls with ink paintings: a bird on a branch with a long line, and a bird with a large flower.
long_description: Two tall, rectangular hanging scrolls are displayed side-by-side against a light background. Each scroll features a central light beige panel with an ink painting, framed by decorative borders. The top and bottom sections of both scrolls are a light, mottled golden-brown, with two dark, chain-like hangers attached to the top of each. Below the top section, a wider reddish-brown band with dark, stylized floral motifs frames the painting panel. A narrow black band with small, gold, repeating geometric shapes borders the top and bottom of the central painting area. The side borders of the painting panel are also reddish-brown with dark floral motifs. Light-colored rollers are visible at the very bottom of each scroll. On the left scroll, a small, dark bird with a lighter belly perches on a thin, gnarled branch rendered in light gray and black ink washes. The branch extends from the lower left, curving upwards. A very long, thin, dark vertical line extends from near the bottom of the panel almost to the top, passing behind the bird and branch. Sparse, delicate ink splatters or small leaves are visible around the branch. A small, red, rectangular seal and some black calligraphic marks are in the lower left. On the right scroll, a small, dark bird, similar in appearance to the one on the left, faces left and perches on a thick, gnarled branch or trunk, also rendered in light gray and black ink washes. Above and to the right of this bird, a large, dense cluster of ink-washed leaves or petals forms a prominent floral or plant element. A small, red, rectangular seal and some black calligraphic marks are in the lower right.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A black ink painting depicts a dark bird perched on a light branch with sparse, wispy foliage.
long_description: A vertical ink painting features a small, dark bird perched on a light-colored branch against a mostly blank, light background. The bird, rendered in solid black ink, is positioned slightly below the center of the canvas and faces towards the left. Its body is rounded, and a distinct tail extends downwards and to the right. The branch, painted with lighter, broader brushstrokes, curves from the upper right towards the lower left, supporting the bird. Above and to the right of the bird, a cluster of fine, dark, wispy brushstrokes suggests foliage or pine needles, extending upwards and outwards. The upper left and most of the lower half of the painting are left largely empty, creating a sense of open space. In the lower right corner, a vertical column of faint, dark characters is visible, accompanied by a small, circular red seal impression below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: An ink painting on a scroll depicts a dark gray fish leaping from water, surrounded by subtle waves.
long_description: A vertical scroll painting features a single dark gray fish leaping from water against a light beige background. The scroll has wide purple borders with a repeating gold wave-like pattern, framed by thin gold inner borders. The central image shows the fish positioned slightly below the vertical center, with its head angled upwards and slightly to the left. Its body is rendered in varying shades of dark gray, with visible scales and fins spread as if in motion. The fish's mouth is open, revealing small barbels, and its large, dark, round eye is prominent. Around the fish, light gray, fluid lines suggest splashing water and ripples, particularly beneath and to the sides of its body. The upper portion of the scroll is largely empty, providing a vast, unadorned space above the fish. In the lower left corner, a small vertical inscription in dark ink is visible, followed by a rectangular red seal.

metadata.title: 鯉図|Carp
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A multi-panel artwork depicts numerous figures, some human-like and some monstrous, on a gold background with architectural elements
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal, multi-panel composition on a shimmering gold background. The scene is populated by numerous figures, varying in size and appearance, engaged in various activities.On the far left, a large, diagonally striped canopy in red, black, and white patterns extends from the top left corner. Beneath it, several small, dark-robed figures are seated or standing in a room-like setting. Below the canopy, two large, ornate structures stand. The left structure is taller, featuring a tiered white and gold base topped with a large, flame-shaped golden ornament with intricate patterns and a central dark spiral. To its right, a similar but slightly smaller structure is visible. Faint, vertical text is visible in the upper left corner of the leftmost panel.In the lower left, a group of five figures in dark robes and white headwear are seated or kneeling, holding white fans. Above them, and extending rightwards, are several figures with green, scaly bodies and long, serpentine tails. One red figure with a long red ribbon trails behind it as it moves.The central and right panels are densely filled with figures in motion. Many are human-like, dressed in brown, white, or black robes, often with elaborate headwear or helmets, and some carry staffs or spears. Other figures are more fantastical, with exaggerated features, animalistic bodies, or vibrant colors like red and green. These figures are depicted in various dynamic poses, suggesting dancing, marching, or interaction. For example, in the upper central area, several figures in red and white costumes appear to be dancing or flying. Below them, a group of figures in brown robes are depicted. Towards the far right, more groups of figures, some with white and green patterns, and others with red and white, are visible. The figures are rendered with distinct outlines and flat areas of color, creating a lively and crowded scene against the shimmering gold background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Six-panel screen; ink, color, and gold on gilded paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a mountainous landscape with a waterfall and several figures, one playing an instrument
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting on aged, light brown paper depicts a monochrome mountainous landscape with figures. In the upper portion, jagged, dark mountains rise into a misty, lighter sky. A large, gnarled tree branch with sparse foliage extends from the right side, over a rocky outcrop. Below this, three figures are visible. Two figures are seated on a flat rock surface; one, facing left, appears to be playing a stringed instrument, while the other, facing right, observes. A third figure stands or kneels near a stream, looking downwards. In the lower left, a multi-tiered waterfall cascades down rocky formations, creating frothy white water. A fourth figure stands on a prominent rock to the left of the waterfall, holding a piece of cloth or garment, seemingly in the act of washing or drying it. The figures wear traditional robes. Calligraphy is visible on the right side of the painting, near the seated figures. The entire scene is rendered with varying shades of gray and black ink, creating depth and texture.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll mounted as a panel; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A fan-shaped painting of a snow-capped mountain with birds flying, set against a gold speckled background
long_description: The artwork is a rectangular image featuring a fan-shaped painting centered on a gold speckled background. The background is a uniform field of gold with small, irregular speckles of a slightly darker gold or brown, creating a textured appearance. The fan-shaped painting occupies the central horizontal space, with its widest part at the top and narrowing towards the bottom. The painting itself depicts a large, snow-capped mountain, rendered in shades of white and light brown, dominating the upper half of the fan. The peak is distinctly white, suggesting snow or ice. Below the mountain peak, the slopes are a lighter, warmer brown, with subtle brushstrokes indicating contours. In the mid-ground of the fan, to the left of the mountain's center, are three dark, silhouetted bird-like shapes, appearing to fly. One bird is slightly above and to the right of the other two, which are closer together. In the lower left corner of the fan-shaped painting, there are a few small, vertical black marks and two small, irregular red marks, possibly a seal or inscription. The overall color palette of the fan painting is muted, with whites, light browns, and dark accents, contrasting with the vibrant gold of the surrounding background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Fan painting mounted as album leaf; tempera on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a towering mountain landscape with buildings, trees, and a boat on water
long_description: A vertical ink wash painting depicts a misty mountain landscape rendered primarily in shades of black and gray, with subtle hints of reddish-brown. The upper half is dominated by a tall, craggy mountain peak, its slopes textured with dark, jagged lines and lighter, softer washes suggesting mist or clouds. Sparse, dark trees or brush cling to the mountain's upper reaches. Below the main peak, the landscape transitions into a series of rounded hills and valleys shrouded in lighter washes. On the left side, a small, simple building with a dark, gabled roof is nestled on a lower slope. On the right, a more elaborate, multi-story building with a reddish-brown tiled roof and dark eaves is perched on a hillside. A figure with reddish-brown clothing is visible inside an open window of this building. Below this structure, a narrow, vertical white streak suggests a waterfall or stream cascading down the mountain. The lower portion of the painting features a body of water, likely a river or lake, with a flat-bottomed boat or barge docked near the left bank. Another small, simple structure with a dark roof stands on the water's edge. Trees and dense foliage are scattered throughout the mid-ground and foreground, particularly around the buildings and along the water. On the right side, near the middle, there is vertical text in dark ink, followed by a red seal impression below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on paper

alt_text: A highly decorated, multi-colored headpiece or mask with white fluffy elements and cords on a light background
long_description: The artwork depicts an ornate, multi-colored headpiece or mask resting on a light, unadorned background. The object is positioned slightly off-center to the left, with its longer, flatter end pointing towards the lower left and its more voluminous, rounded end towards the upper right. The headpiece features a complex design with various patterns and textures. The main body of the object is covered in geometric patterns, primarily hexagons in shades of green, blue, and brown, interspersed with lighter, swirling motifs. Several stylized white cranes with orange beaks and feet are integrated into these patterns, particularly on the flatter, lower-left section. The upper-right section of the headpiece is more rounded and features two prominent white, fluffy, spherical elements. This section also incorporates dark brown and reddish-brown areas, along with more subtle patterns. From the lower-left side of the headpiece, several thin, white cords or tassels extend outwards, forming loops and lines against the light background. The background itself is a plain, light cream or beige color. A decorative border frames the central image on the top, bottom, and left sides. This border is a darker tan color with a repeating pattern of stylized, swirling shapes. On the right side of the central image, there is vertical text written in black characters, and below it, a red square seal.

metadata.title: 柴田是真作　翁面図|Mask for the Noh Play Okina
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; pigments, lacquer, mother-of-pearl, gold foil, and ink on paper

alt_text: White crane with an open beak stands in swirling water beside a blossoming tree with fruits.
long_description: The artwork depicts a large white crane standing in swirling water, positioned slightly right of center. The crane faces left, its long neck extended and its beak open. Its body is primarily white, with layered feathers indicated by light brown outlines. The tips of its wings are dark gray to black. A small red patch is visible on its head, and its eye is a small black dot. The water around the crane is rendered with numerous light gray, wavy lines that create a sense of movement and depth, particularly around the crane's legs and the rocky outcrop in the lower left. This rock is dark gray and black, with textured brushstrokes. To the right of the crane, a dark, textured tree trunk rises vertically, its bark depicted with rough, dark brushstrokes. Branches extend from the tree, reaching over the crane. These branches bear small clusters of pink blossoms with yellow centers, green leaves, and several round, peach-like fruits with reddish-orange and yellow hues. The background is a plain, light cream or off-white color. In the upper right corner, there is dark calligraphic text and a square red seal.

metadata.title: 桃に鶴図|Flowers and Birds
metadata.medium: Album of twelve leaves; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A full-length painting on a scroll depicts a warrior in elaborate, colorful armor holding a long polearm and a quiver
long_description: The artwork is a vertical scroll painting featuring a full-length depiction of a warrior standing centrally against a plain, light gray background that darkens slightly towards the bottom. The warrior faces forward, wearing an elaborate, multi-colored suit of armor. A golden helmet with prominent side flaps and a central crest sits on his head. His face has a light complexion, a dark mustache, and a small dark beard. He wears a green tunic under his armor, which includes a chest plate, shoulder guards, and arm guards in various shades of blue, red, orange, and gold, with intricate patterns. A long, curved polearm with a silver blade is held upright in his left hand, resting on the ground. A sword with a golden hilt is tucked into his belt on his left hip. On his right side, a quiver filled with white-fletched arrows is visible, with a golden, feather-like element extending from it. His lower body is covered by orange, baggy pants and leg armor with patterned socks and dark, rounded shoes. The painting is framed by a light brown border, with a decorative white pattern at the top edge of the inner painting area. There is some faint, dark text in the lower left corner.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A dark, misty landscape scroll with sparse, spiky vegetation and a winding path under a dark sky
long_description: A vertical scroll painting depicts a somber, misty landscape in a muted palette of dark grays, blacks, and off-whites. The upper third of the painting is a deep, dark gray, almost black, suggesting a night sky or heavy mist, with a few faint, lighter specks scattered within it. As the eye moves downward, the scene gradually lightens. The middle ground reveals undulating, lighter gray terrain, possibly snow-covered hills or mounds, with dark, sparse, spiky vegetation emerging from the shadows. A winding, lighter path or river meanders through this middle section, disappearing into the darker background. More prominent clusters of dark, thin, spiky reeds or tall grasses are visible in the lower half, particularly on the left side, extending diagonally upwards from the lower left corner. The foreground is the lightest area, rendered in soft off-white and light gray tones, suggesting snow or thick mist. A small, rectangular red seal or mark is visible in the lower left quadrant, near the edge of the painted area.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold on silk

alt_text: A spotted deer with antlers stands on a rocky slope under branches with red maple leaves
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a deer in an autumn landscape, rendered in ink and light colors on a light background. The upper portion features branches of a gnarled, grey tree extending from the left, adorned with numerous bright red maple leaves and a few lighter, possibly yellow-green, leaves. The background is a soft, misty grey, suggesting depth and atmosphere. In the central foreground, a large, light-colored deer with prominent, multi-tined antlers stands on a rocky, uneven slope. The deer faces towards the right, its head turned slightly forward, and its gaze directed to the right. Its body is subtly spotted with lighter dots. Its front left leg is slightly lifted, suggesting movement or a pause. Below the deer, the slope is detailed with dark grey rock formations, patches of light brown grass, and small clusters of blue-green foliage. Several individual red maple leaves are depicted falling or resting on the ground around the deer and along a winding path or stream bed that descends towards the lower right. In the bottom left corner, there is a block of vertical calligraphy in black ink, accompanied by a square red seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A dark wooden panel with a large, light-colored peony, green leaves, and a red seal with text
long_description: The artwork is a rectangular wooden panel, oriented horizontally, with a dark brown, textured surface showing visible wood grain and some signs of wear. Dominating the center-right is a large, light yellow or cream-colored flower, depicted with numerous overlapping petals that give it a full, rounded appearance. The petals have a slightly textured, almost raised quality. Extending from the upper left and surrounding the main flower are several green leaves and stems. The leaves are broad and lobed, rendered in a muted green with some lighter highlights. To the upper left of the main flower, a smaller cluster of green leaves and a bud-like form with a small, bright red accent are visible. The stems are thin and dark green, connecting the various floral elements. In the upper right corner, a small, square red seal is present, positioned above a vertical line of dark, stylized characters. The overall composition places the floral elements diagonally across the panel, with the large flower as the central focus against the dark wood background. The edges of the panel appear slightly worn.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink, color, and powdered shell on wood

alt_text: Two figures in elaborate robes and hats sit in a landscape with trees and mountains.
long_description: The artwork is a painting on multiple vertical wooden panels, framed in black. It depicts two figures in a landscape setting. The figure on the left is seated or kneeling, facing towards the right. This figure wears a white robe with red and black details, and a green, pointed hat. A sword or similar weapon is visible behind their back. Their hands are raised, with one palm facing outwards. The figure on the right is also seated or kneeling, facing towards the left, slightly turned away from the viewer. This figure wears a green robe with red and black sections, and a red rectangular object on their back, possibly a shield or part of their attire. Both figures have dark hair. The background features a large brown tree with sparse, light brown foliage on the right side, extending towards the top. On the left, blue-grey mountains or rock formations are visible. The ground beneath the figures is a light brown or tan color. The colors in the painting appear somewhat muted or faded, with visible brushstrokes and the texture of the wooden panels.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink and color on cryptomeria (sugi) wood

alt_text: Two figures, one seated and one kneeling, in a landscape with a structure and stylized clouds, within a decorative border
long_description: A rectangular artwork depicts two figures in a landscape, framed by a dark brown decorative border. The scene is divided horizontally into a lighter upper section and a darker lower section. The upper section, primarily white with areas of light brown, features several stylized black cloud or wave motifs, some resembling a radiating sunburst pattern. The lower section is a solid dark brown, representing the ground. On the left side of the lower section, a dark brown, tent-like structure with a pointed top is visible. To its right, a central figure is seated on the ground, facing right. This figure wears an elaborate, tall, dark headpiece and ornate clothing with gold and dark brown details. Their hands appear to be engaged with an object in front of them. To the right of the seated figure, a second figure kneels on the dark brown ground, facing left towards the seated figure. This kneeling figure wears lighter-colored clothing, possibly white or light brown, with dark accents. The entire image is enclosed by a wide, dark brown border with a repeating scalloped or wave-like carved pattern along its inner edge.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Ink and color on cryptomeria (sugi) wood

alt_text: A central deity figure on a lotus throne, surrounded by twenty-four smaller seated figures on a dark background.
long_description: The artwork depicts a large central figure seated on a lotus throne, surrounded by twenty-four smaller figures arranged in rows below. The central figure has pale skin and wears an elaborate golden crown with multiple tiers and dangling ornaments. Their long, dark hair falls over their shoulders. They are dressed in flowing robes of green, white, and red, adorned with intricate patterns and jewelry, including necklaces and armbands. Their right hand is raised in a gesture, while the left hand rests on their lap. Behind the central figure is a large golden halo with radiating lines, set against a dark blue background. Below the central figure, twenty-four smaller figures are seated on a patterned ground. They are arranged in four rows, with six figures in each row, twelve on the left and twelve on the right of the central axis. Most of these figures are depicted with bald heads and simple robes in shades of brown, green, and red. Some figures hold small objects or have their hands in various gestures. Small white rectangular labels with black text are placed next to many of these seated figures. The ground they sit on features a repeating geometric pattern in green and gold. The entire composition is framed by a narrow golden border with a delicate floral or scroll pattern.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink, color, and gold leaf on silk

alt_text: A vertical scroll painting depicts a snowy mountain landscape with a building, a bare tree, and two figures
long_description: This vertical scroll painting depicts a serene, snow-covered mountain landscape rendered primarily in shades of gray and white. The artwork is framed by decorative borders at the top and bottom, featuring green and yellow cloud-like patterns, and a narrow blue and white patterned strip along the sides. The top section of the painting features a pale, almost white sky that gradually transitions into the soft, rounded forms of distant mountains. These mountains are outlined with subtle dark ink and filled with light gray washes, suggesting a snowy or misty atmosphere. In the middle ground, a prominent mountain range dominates the composition. On the right side of the central mountain, a small, dark-roofed building with an arched entrance is nestled into a crevice, appearing partially obscured by the surrounding terrain. A faint, winding path can be seen leading up towards this structure. The lower third of the painting presents a flat, expansive white ground, indicative of a snow-covered plain. On the left, a tall, dark, gnarled tree with a thick trunk and sparse, bare branches stands beside a small, dark bridge. To the right of the tree, two small figures are depicted. One figure appears to be riding a small animal, possibly a donkey or horse, while the other walks alongside it. Below the tree, dark calligraphic characters are visible, accompanied by a square red seal impression.

metadata.title: 雪中山水図|Winter Landscape
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A black bird with an open beak stands on a scroll with decorative borders and faint background elements
long_description: This vertical scroll painting features a dark bird rendered in ink on a light, aged paper background. The central painted area is framed by decorative fabric borders. The bird, likely a crow or raven, is positioned in the lower-middle section, facing towards the left with its head slightly turned and its beak wide open. Its body is depicted with varying shades of dark gray and black ink, showing distinct feathers on its wings and tail. Its slender legs and sharp talons are visible, gripping an unseen surface. Below and to the left of the bird, a few dark ink splatters are present. In the upper right quadrant of the painted area, a small red rectangular seal is visible. Faint, thin ink lines, resembling reeds or bamboo, extend vertically along the right edge of the central painting. The lower portion of the painting features a lighter wash of ink, suggesting a ground or water element. The central artwork is bordered on the left and right by a light green fabric adorned with a repeating pattern of gold circular motifs and swirling lines. The top and bottom edges of the scroll are finished with a narrower band of gold fabric, featuring a more intricate, darker gold pattern of foliage or abstract designs.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: An ink wash painting of a crested bird perched on a gnarled tree stump, framed by gold fabric.
long_description: This vertical scroll features an ink wash painting of a bird perched on a tree stump, set against a light, unadorned background. The bird, positioned in the upper-middle section, faces towards the left with its head slightly raised. It has a dark head with a distinct crest, and its body is rendered with varying shades of dark gray and black ink, showing feather details with lighter edges. Its underside appears lighter. The bird's small, dark feet grip the top of a dark, gnarled tree stump. The stump extends downwards, rendered with broad, dark ink washes, and features several small, bare branches protruding from its sides. Towards the bottom, the stump dissolves into lighter ink washes and a few thin, dark lines suggesting sparse foliage or roots. The painting itself is bordered by a wide, decorative gold fabric with intricate floral or cloud patterns, which is wider and more ornate at the top and bottom edges.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A small bird perches on a blossoming branch in a black and white ink painting.
long_description: The artwork is a horizontal, monochromatic ink painting, rendered in shades of black and gray on a light background. In the lower left quadrant, a thick, dark, gnarled branch or tree trunk emerges, extending diagonally upwards and towards the right. This main trunk exhibits varied ink washes, creating a textured appearance. From this substantial base, a thinner, dark branch extends horizontally across the middle of the composition, gradually tapering as it reaches towards the right edge. Several small, delicate blossoms, depicted as clusters of light circles with dark centers, are visible along this thinner branch, predominantly to the left of the central figure. A small, light-colored bird, with darker markings on its back and wings and a lighter belly, is perched on the horizontal branch, positioned slightly to the right of the image's center. The bird faces slightly left, its gaze directed towards the blossoming section of the branch. The background is a plain, light gray wash, providing a sense of open, undefined space around the central elements. In the upper left corner, a vertical column of dark characters is contained within a light rectangular border, with additional characters appearing below the rectangle.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Two hanging scrolls display ink wash paintings of birds and reeds on light yellow panels.
long_description:
Two vertical hanging scrolls are presented side-by-side against a light-colored wall. Each scroll features a mounting with a dark brown top and bottom section, a patterned light blue border, and a central rectangular panel of light yellow paper. A narrow gold-colored strip separates the blue border from the yellow panel at the top of the painted area.

The artwork on both scrolls is executed in ink wash, depicting birds and reeds in varying shades of black and gray. The style is minimalist, with fluid brushstrokes.

On the left scroll, two birds are positioned near the bottom. One larger bird, rendered with dark ink for its body and lighter gray for its head and belly, faces right. A smaller, darker bird is partially visible below and to its right. Thin, dark lines representing reeds extend upwards from the bottom left, crossing behind the birds. Faint, vertical calligraphic marks are visible to the left of the birds.

The right scroll mirrors the composition, also featuring two birds and reeds. A larger bird, similar in rendering to the one on the left, faces left. A smaller, darker bird is positioned below and to its left. Reeds extend upwards from the bottom right, with some crossing behind the birds. Faint calligraphic marks are visible to the right of the birds.

Both scrolls are suspended by two light brown fabric straps attached to a metal hanger at the top. The bottom sections are rolled, with white cylindrical weights visible.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Diptych of hanging scrolls; ink on silk

alt_text: A tall ink wash painting shows a powerful waterfall descending through misty mountains and dark, rocky terrain.
long_description:
This vertical ink wash painting depicts a dramatic mountainous landscape with a prominent waterfall. The upper portion of the artwork features a light, hazy sky above distant, softly rendered mountain peaks that fade into the mist. A narrow, powerful waterfall emerges from a dark, V-shaped gorge in the upper-middle section, cascading vertically down the center of the composition. The water appears bright white against the darker, textured cliffs that flank it.

As the waterfall descends, the surrounding mountains become more defined, with darker ink washes indicating rocky slopes and sparse, dark green trees clinging to the sides. Mist or clouds are suggested by lighter areas of wash, particularly around the mid-section of the falls. In the lower half, the waterfall widens slightly before crashing into a turbulent pool. Large, dark, rounded boulders dominate the immediate foreground, with water flowing around and over them, creating smaller cascades and ripples. A small cluster of pine-like trees is visible on a ridge to the right of the lower falls. A square red seal is present in the upper right corner, and faint vertical script is visible on the left side, midway down the waterfall.

metadata.title: 田崎草雲筆　養老の滝|Yōrō Waterfall
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: A monochrome painting depicts a figure on horseback riding through a misty, snowy landscape with a small hut and tree.
long_description: This vertical, monochrome artwork features a figure on horseback in the upper middle, moving from left to right. The rider, dressed in loose, flowing garments, sits atop a horse depicted in mid-stride, with its front legs lifted. Both the rider and horse are rendered in darker tones against a lighter, hazy background that suggests mist or snow. Small, light specks are scattered across the upper portion of the image, possibly indicating falling snow or stars. In the lower left quadrant, a small, gabled structure, resembling a hut or house, is partially visible, appearing to be covered in snow. Adjacent to it, a dark, dense tree with visible branches and foliage stands. The ground around the structure and tree is indistinct, blending into the atmospheric background. Below the structure, a vertical column of faint, dark characters is present, followed by a small, square seal impression. The entire scene is rendered in shades of gray, creating a sense of depth and an ethereal atmosphere.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper
