alt_text: A smiling, bald, corpulent figure in ink wash holds a staff and fan under a faint moon.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink wash painting on light-colored paper, mounted as a scroll. A single, corpulent figure dominates the lower half of the composition, rendered in varying shades of black and gray ink. The figure is bald, with a round, smiling face, and a prominent belly. They are depicted in a walking or standing pose, facing slightly left and looking forward. The figure wears loose robes, indicated by broad, dark brushstrokes, which leave the chest and belly exposed. In their right hand, they hold a tall, dark staff that extends upwards beyond their head. Attached to the staff, behind the figure's right shoulder, is a large, ribbed fan. A small, dark object hangs from a cord near their left hip. The background is a light, unadorned beige, with a faint, circular shape, lighter than the surrounding paper, visible in the upper right quadrant. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical line of black script and a small, square red seal. The painting is framed by a light blue-gray fabric border on the sides and decorative patterned borders at the top and bottom.

metadata.title: 布袋図 (Hotei zu)|Hotei
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: Ink painting of a dark bird with ruffled feathers looking down, on a light background with faint brushstrokes
long_description: The image displays a vertical ink painting on a light, tan-colored surface. A dark bird, rendered in varying shades of black and dark gray ink, is the central subject, positioned slightly above the lower center and angled towards the right. The bird's body is broad and appears somewhat hunched, with its head tilted downwards and to the right. Its feathers are depicted with loose, expressive brushstrokes, creating a textured or ruffled appearance, particularly on its back and wings. Lighter areas of the background material are visible through the ink in places, suggesting underlying form or highlights. The bird's beak is small and pointed, and a few short, dark lines indicate feathers around its eye. Its legs and feet are minimally rendered with a few dark strokes, appearing beneath its body. In the lower portion of the image, below the bird, are faint, horizontal brushstrokes in lighter gray and black, suggesting ground cover or distant elements. To the upper left of the bird, a few thin, dark, vertical and curved lines are visible, resembling abstract calligraphic elements or sparse branches. The overall artwork is characterized by fluid, painterly brushwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink on silk

alt_text: Painting of various potted plants and decorative rocks arranged on a dark, gnarled display stand.
long_description: A painting depicts an arrangement of several potted plants and decorative rocks on a dark, irregular display stand against a plain, light background. The stand, resembling a gnarled tree trunk or rock formation, has a flat top surface and extends downwards and to the left, with a textured, dark brown and black appearance. On the upper surface, from left to right, are three pots. The leftmost is a round, red pot with white decorative patterns, containing a small green plant with delicate leaves and a textured brown rock. Next to it is a smaller, yellow, cylindrical pot holding a sparse green plant. To the right, a rectangular white pot with black and gold scrollwork patterns contains a dense cluster of tall, thin green plants. Below the upper surface, on the lower left side of the stand, an oval, dark green pot with small feet holds a green plant with many small, branching leaves. Behind it, two white pots, one with a mountain-like design, contain sparse green plants with thicker, lighter green stems. In the lower right corner of the painting, black calligraphic characters are visible above a red square seal. The entire artwork is enclosed within a gold-colored frame.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer on paper

alt_text: A dark, bottle-shaped object with a flowering branch extending right, and a small dish with a smoking element on top.
long_description: The artwork presents a still life composition against a plain, light cream background, enclosed by a textured gold border. On the left side, a tall, dark, bottle-shaped object stands prominently. Its body is a deep brown or black, wider at the base and tapering to a slender neck. Three vertical rectangular panels, two light gray and one darker gray, are visible on the front of the bottle, creating a striped pattern. Resting on the narrow neck of the bottle is a small, shallow, circular dish with a distinct red rim. From this dish, a thin, dark, stick-like object extends upwards, accompanied by a faint, dark, vertical wisp of smoke rising above it. A gnarled, dark brown branch originates from the lower left side of the bottle, curving upwards and extending across the center of the image towards the right. This branch is adorned with numerous smaller twigs and buds. Several small, delicate white flowers, each featuring a subtle yellow center, are scattered along the branch, predominantly on its right side. In the lower left corner, near the base of the bottle, a vertical column of dark, stylized characters is visible, beneath which is a small red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer on paper

alt_text: A painting depicts thatched structures, a tree with hanging objects, dragonflies, and a field.
long_description: The vertical rectangular painting features a light beige background with a gold border. On the right side, three large, conical structures with golden-brown thatched exteriors and darker brown tops stand on thin, dark poles, some appearing to be bamboo. They are arranged diagonally, receding from the foreground right towards the mid-ground left. A dark, gnarled tree branch extends from the upper center-right, reaching towards the left. This branch has sparse, small, dark reddish-brown leaves. Hanging from the branch are multiple light-colored, thin lines forming a loose, net-like arrangement. Below this, three rectangular, light-colored objects with dark markings are suspended. Several small, dark dragonflies are scattered across the upper half of the composition; one is on the far left, another near the tree branch, and a cluster of five or six are near the top of the rightmost thatched structure, some appearing to hover around a thin green stalk. The lower portion of the painting depicts a field of short, dark brown and lighter brown brushstrokes, suggesting cultivated land or stubble. Longer, wispy brown grasses are visible in the immediate foreground, particularly on the right. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical column of dark characters, followed by two red square seals.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer on paper

alt_text: A large grasshopper on a vine with a white flower and two green gourds on a light background
long_description: The vertical artwork features a large, light brown grasshopper positioned centrally on a dark green vine against a plain, light beige background. The grasshopper faces left, its segmented body and folded wings detailed in shades of tan and brown, with delicate antennae extending forward. It clings to the main stem of the vine, which curves from the upper left, descending and then ascending towards the upper right. Numerous slender tendrils and small, dark green leaves sprout from the vine. A single white flower with a yellow center blooms from the vine in the upper central area, just above the grasshopper. Two large, elongated green gourds are partially visible, framing the central elements. One gourd hangs vertically from the top edge on the left side, while the other extends downwards from the top edge on the right side. Both gourds are a deep, uniform green. In the bottom right corner, there is vertical black calligraphic text, followed by a red square seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer on paper

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a dark bird on a rock in water, with a faint moon and abstract background
long_description: The artwork is a vertical ink wash painting rendered in shades of black, dark brown, and off-white on a light-toned paper. In the lower-left quadrant, a dark-feathered bird stands on one leg atop a dark, irregularly shaped rock. The bird's body is mostly black with hints of dark brown, and its head is tucked into its back feathers. Below the rock and extending across the bottom of the frame, a body of water is depicted with subtle, dark horizontal lines suggesting ripples. In the upper-left background, a large, faint, light-grey circular shape is visible. To the right of this, a series of dark, vertical, abstract forms with dripping or flowing edges extend downwards from the top of the frame, suggesting a waterfall or misty mountain peaks. In the bottom right corner, vertical calligraphic text in black ink is present, accompanied by two red square seals stacked vertically.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; ink, color, and lacquer on paper

alt_text: A painting shows a large, layered straw hut, two trees, and a small bird standing in shallow water
long_description: A painting depicts a natural scene with a large straw structure, two trees, and a small bird in shallow water, set against a plain, light background. Dominating the lower left is a large, conical structure made of layered, golden-brown straw, tied at its pointed top with a lighter straw band. Below this structure, in the bottom left corner, a red seal and black calligraphic characters are visible. Behind the straw structure, two dark, slender tree trunks rise vertically. The left tree has gnarled, dark branches with sparse reddish-brown leaves. The right tree has straighter branches, some with small, dark, hanging objects, and one prominent red berry. In the lower center and right, a shallow pool of light gray water is depicted, with green reeds growing in the water in the lower center. Dry, light brown grass or reeds are also visible in the water on the right. A small, brown bird stands in the water on the right, facing left and looking down, with faint ripples around its feet. The background is a plain, off-white color.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer on paper

alt_text: Still life painting featuring a tall bamboo scroll holder, a brown ceramic teapot, a dark gourd dish, and green plant sprigs.
long_description: A still life painting depicts various objects arranged on a light cream background, framed by a gold border. A tall, light olive-green bamboo container stands upright on the left, slightly angled to the right. It has a vertical opening revealing a white scroll with several vertical lines of black and red characters, including the character "喜". The top and bottom edges of the container are dark brown. To the right and slightly in front of the bamboo container is a dark brown, textured ceramic teapot with a rounded body. It features a short spout extending to the left and another short spout or handle extending to the right. A small, light brown, mushroom-shaped stopper or lid rests on top. The teapot has lighter brown horizontal bands. Below the teapot and slightly to the left is a dark brown, gourd-shaped dish or tray, lying flat. It has two distinct lobes, with the left lobe appearing slightly smaller. A sprig of green plant with small, light orange-yellow flowers extends from the lower left, curving upwards and to the right, passing behind the gourd dish and in front of the bamboo container. Another thin green vine extends from behind the teapot upwards to the right. In the lower right corner, there are vertical black characters, including "美畫" and "六", next to a red square seal with indistinct characters. The background is a uniform, light cream color.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer on paper

alt_text: A decorated float or drum with a figure seated on a platform, under pine trees
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular image, framed in gold, depicting a scene with a large, ornate structure on the left and trees on the right, set against a light, neutral background. The dominant feature on the left is a tall, elaborately decorated structure, possibly a float or a large drum. Its upper section is tapered and predominantly red, adorned with intricate patterns of green, blue, and white cloud-like motifs. Within these patterns, two green dragons with red accents are depicted, one on each side, facing inwards. At the center of the structure is a large, circular drum-like object. It features a black center, a wide rim with alternating white and black stripes, and a prominent gold, three-pronged swirling symbol (a tomoe) in its middle. Below this circular element, a red wooden platform with railings extends horizontally. The platform's base is decorated with dark, geometric patterns. Seated on this red platform, facing towards the right, is a figure dressed in a peach or light orange robe with dark patterns and a dark, possibly red, hat. Black steps lead downwards from the platform towards the bottom left corner of the image. On the right side of the composition, a large pine tree with dark green needles and a reddish-brown trunk extends from the upper right, its branches curving over the ornate structure. Behind this pine tree, several slender, dark tree trunks rise vertically, with minimal foliage indicated by dark, vertical brushstrokes. The ground beneath the trees is a light, neutral color, with sparse dark grass-like markings. In the bottom left corner, there is black text that reads "是山" and a red square seal with illegible characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer on paper

alt_text: A large white peony and a bud on a dark branch, set against a gold background with dark rocks.
long_description: A vertical rectangular painting depicts a large white peony flower and a bud on a dark branch, set against a shimmering gold background with dark rock formations. The prominent peony, located in the left-center, features numerous layers of white petals, some with subtle blue-green washes, and a cluster of yellow stamens at its core. Above and slightly to the left of the main flower, a smaller, closed bud emerges from a dark calyx. Both are attached to a thick, gnarled branch that extends from the upper left, curving downwards and to the left. This branch is adorned with dark green leaves, some showing lighter brown veins, and several small, reddish-pink buds. On the right side of the composition, a large, dark, textured rock formation rises from the bottom, extending upwards towards the top right corner. Its surface is mottled with shades of dark brown, black, and hints of gold. Below this main rock, several smaller, similarly textured rocks are scattered. Sparse, thin, dark plant stems with fine lines emerge from the ground in the lower right. The background is a luminous gold, with areas of darker, mottled texture, particularly around the rock formations. Near the center right, adjacent to the large rock, there is a vertical line of dark text and a square red seal with additional dark characters.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer and gold on paper

alt_text: A painting of various butterflies with different colors and patterns on a light background, framed in gold.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular composition featuring multiple butterflies against a light, cream-colored background, enclosed within a gold frame. The butterflies are depicted in various sizes and colors, scattered across the surface. In the upper left, a light green butterfly with black and white patterned wings is shown in profile, facing right. Below it, a smaller, similarly patterned butterfly is visible. Towards the upper right and center, a large, dark brown butterfly with intricate patterns and long, slender tails on its lower wings dominates the space, also facing right. Adjacent to it, on the right edge, a smaller, dark blue-black butterfly is partially visible. Midway down the right side, a small white butterfly with delicate black spots on its wings is depicted, facing left. Below it, two tiny, oval-shaped yellow-orange butterflies are shown. In the mid-left area, a medium-sized butterfly with complex brown, black, and white patterns on its wings is positioned, facing slightly left. Near the bottom left, a small yellow-orange butterfly is paired with a larger white butterfly that has subtle light blue accents on its wings, both facing right. In the bottom left corner, vertical black script is present, followed by a red square seal. The script reads: "時七十有七歳春 寫於南窓下 抱一".

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Lacquer and mother-of-pearl fragments

alt_text: A vertical scroll featuring a large reddish-orange circle against a beige background with red horizontal streaks, framed by dark patterned borders
long_description: A vertical scroll presents a central rectangular panel of light beige, flanked by decorative borders. The upper portion of the central panel features horizontal streaks of reddish-orange, which gradually fade into the beige. A large, distinct reddish-orange circle is positioned slightly above the vertical center of the panel, overlapping both the red streaks and the lighter beige area below. The lower section of the central panel is a uniform light beige. In the lower-right quadrant of this central panel, there is vertical black script accompanied by a small, square red seal stamp. The central panel is bordered on both vertical sides by wide, dark, almost black strips adorned with intricate gold floral and vine patterns. Thin gold strips also cap the very top and bottom edges of the central beige panel.

metadata.title: 旭日図|Rising Sun
metadata.medium: Hanging scroll; ink and color on silk

alt_text: Ink wash painting of a large, snow-capped mountain towering over a village with trees and small figures
long_description: An ink wash painting depicts a vast, snow-covered mountain dominating the upper half of the composition. The mountain is rendered in light grey and white, with darker grey washes defining its left slope and suggesting contours. Its peak is pointed, and its base extends across the width of the central image. Below the mountain, a village spreads across the mid-ground, composed of numerous small, simple structures with dark, sloped roofs. These buildings are depicted with minimal lines, suggesting a clustered settlement. Several tall, dark, conical trees, resembling pines, are scattered among and to the left of the village houses. Small, dark, stick-like figures are visible moving between the buildings, indicating human presence. The ground throughout the village and leading up to the mountain is a light, almost white tone, suggesting snow or mist. In the lower left corner of the painted scene, there is a vertical line of dark, calligraphic text, accompanied by a small, square red seal below it. The central painted area is framed by decorative borders at the top and bottom, featuring a repeating pattern of gold-colored motifs on a light beige background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Mounted and hanging scroll; ink on paper

alt_text: A still life with a dark vessel, a container of brushes, and blue blocks on a textured gold background
long_description: The artwork depicts a still life against a textured gold background that fills the entire frame. In the lower left quadrant, a dark, possibly ceramic, vessel with a wide, rounded body rests on four short, stubby legs. It features a curved spout on its left side and a small, rounded handle on its right. A thin, light-colored, curved object, possibly a spoon or stirrer, extends from within the vessel. In the upper right quadrant, a tall, light brown cylindrical container holds a cluster of several brushes. These brushes have varying handle colors, including reddish-brown and dark brown, and their tips are either white or black. From behind the brush container, several thin, dark, wavy lines extend upwards and to the left, resembling wisps or strands. To the right of the brush container, two rectangular blue objects are stacked horizontally, appearing like books or blocks. Below these blue objects, a vertical column of dark, stylized characters is visible, accompanied by a small, square red seal bearing additional dark characters. The gold background has a visible texture, suggesting a metallic or fibrous surface.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on gold paper

alt_text: A rooster with a red comb and orange feathers perches on a large, orange-brown drum against a dark, textured background
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular composition featuring a rooster perched on a drum against a dark, textured background. The background is a mottled, dark gray or silver, appearing aged with lighter flecks and darker streaks. A large, cylindrical drum occupies the lower half of the image, angled slightly upwards from left to right. Its main body is a warm orange-brown. The visible end of the drum is black, featuring a gold, three-part swirling design. This black end is bordered by a ring of small, light gray or silver dots. The rooster is positioned on the top surface of the drum, facing towards the left side of the frame. It has a prominent bright red comb and wattle. Its body feathers are a blend of orange and light brown, with some black feathers visible on its underside. The rooster's long, fanned tail feathers are black, extending upwards and to the right. Its slender legs and feet are depicted as light brown lines on the drum's surface. A small, square red seal is visible in the lower right corner of the dark background.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on silver paper

alt_text: A reddish-brown gourd and a black rectangular box with a red handle on a textured gold background
long_description: The artwork features a reddish-brown gourd and a black rectangular box against a textured gold background. The gold background has a slightly mottled appearance with visible brushstrokes or paper fibers. On the left side, a double-lobed gourd, colored in a muted reddish-brown, rests on the lower portion of the image. A thin red string is tied around its narrow middle section, with a small loop extending downwards. To the right, a tall, rectangular black box stands vertically. It has a prominent red handle that arches over its top and extends down its sides. The black surfaces of the box are decorated with a pattern of small, stylized gold shapes resembling ginkgo leaves, interspersed with thin, wavy white lines. Several small, irregular gray shapes are scattered across the gold background, primarily to the left of the gourd and above it. A small red square with illegible characters is visible in the bottom right corner of the black box, near the bottom edge of the artwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on gold paper

alt_text: Two reddish birds fly near a dark, jagged cliff against a textured silver background with wispy golden lines.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular composition featuring a dark, jagged landform on the left and a textured silver background on the right. The landform, which occupies roughly the left third of the image, is rendered in shades of golden-brown and dark brown, with a rough, almost feathery texture and irregular, pointed edges that extend towards the center. Fine, wispy lines of light golden-yellow emanate from the edges of this landform, curving upwards and to the right, suggesting movement or atmospheric effects against the silver background. The right two-thirds of the image is dominated by a mottled silver-gray surface, which has a slightly reflective, textured appearance. Two small birds are depicted against this silver expanse. The upper bird, positioned in the upper right quadrant, is reddish-orange with dark, pointed wings, appearing to be in mid-flight or descending. The lower bird, located in the lower right quadrant, is also reddish-orange with dark wings, depicted in a similar posture, slightly below and to the right of the upper bird. In the lower left corner, on the golden-brown landform, there is a vertical column of black calligraphic text, followed by a square red seal at its base.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; brown and gold lacquer on silver paper

alt_text: A minimalist painting on gold, showing a suspended container with fire, a building, and a rake-like object.
long_description: The artwork is a minimalist painting on a textured gold background. In the upper left, a dark brown square container hangs from a thin dark line, emitting a vibrant red-orange flame or glow upwards. This container is suspended from a small hook, which is attached to a long, thin, dark brown pole extending diagonally towards the upper right. In the upper right quadrant, a dark cylindrical object stands next to a red-orange structure that resembles a sloped roof with vertical supports. Above these elements, in the far upper right, there is a vertical column of dark, stylized characters, possibly a signature or seal, with a smaller red rectangular mark below it. In the lower right, a red-orange object with five curved, radiating lines, resembling a rake or a fan, is depicted. This object is attached to a thin dark brown pole that extends diagonally upwards and to the left, crossing the lower part of the image. The overall composition uses a limited color palette of gold, dark brown, and red-orange.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on gold paper

alt_text: A light brown cage with a red ribbon and a dark fan with grass designs on a speckled silver background.
long_description: The artwork features two primary objects, a tall, light brown cage and a dark, oval-shaped fan, set against a textured, speckled silver background. The cage, positioned on the left side of the composition, is elongated and appears to be constructed from thin, vertical light brown slats or reeds, giving it a cylindrical or slightly tapered form. A bright red ribbon is tied around the top, forming a bow, and extends vertically down the front of the cage. The cage rests on a low, red, U-shaped stand. To the right and slightly below the cage, a dark, almost black, oval fan is depicted. Its surface is adorned with delicate, thin, light gray lines that resemble blades of grass or reeds, interspersed with a few clusters of short, light brown, feathery elements. A light brown handle extends from the lower left side of the fan, around which a small red cord is tied. In the lower right corner of the background, a tiny, dark insect, possibly an ant or beetle, is visible. On the left side, near the middle, there is a vertical column of black calligraphic text, below which a small, square red seal is imprinted. The background itself is a mottled dark silver or metallic gray, with irregular dark splatters and a textured appearance.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on silver paper

alt_text: A branch with red persimmons and a wasp nest hangs over a brown fence on a gold background
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular composition set against a shimmering gold background. In the upper left quadrant, a dark brown branch extends diagonally downwards and to the right, featuring several round, red-orange fruits, resembling persimmons, and dark green, oval-shaped leaves. The fruits are depicted with subtle variations in color, suggesting ripeness. To the right of the branch, in the upper-middle section, a large, textured, brown wasp nest hangs. It has a rounded, somewhat irregular shape, with visible layers and a darker, more complex opening at its bottom. A small, dark insect, possibly a wasp, is depicted near the lower part of the nest, appearing to be either entering or exiting. In the upper right corner, vertical black calligraphic characters are present, reading "是小", beneath which is a small, square red seal. The lower half of the composition is dominated by a dense, reddish-brown, textured pattern that resembles a woven fence or a thatched structure. This pattern consists of numerous short, vertical, parallel brushstrokes in varying shades of dark red and brown, creating a sense of depth and texture. The top edge of this structure forms a diagonal line, rising from the lower left corner towards the middle right side of the image. The gold background is visible above this structure and around the branch and nest, providing a luminous contrast to the darker elements.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on gold paper

alt_text: A textured painting shows a golden moon above a dense cluster of reddish-brown cattails.
long_description: A vertical painting depicts a moonlit scene with cattails against a textured, dark background. The background has a metallic, possibly silver leaf, appearance with a mottled bluish-grey and brownish-grey coloration, showing signs of wear or intentional distressing. In the upper left quadrant, a large, circular moon appears, rendered in a golden-brown hue with a textured surface. Below the moon and extending across the lower half of the composition is a dense cluster of cattail plants. These plants feature numerous long, slender stems, primarily in shades of yellowish-green and light brown. Atop many of these stems are distinctive, cylindrical seed heads, rendered in a rich reddish-brown color. The cattails are arranged closely together, filling much of the lower and central areas of the artwork. In the bottom right corner, vertical dark script is visible, accompanied by a small, square red seal below it.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on silver paper

alt_text: A stylized artwork on a golden background shows a steaming pot, a small dish with an item, and a bowl.
long_description: The artwork features a stylized depiction of objects on a textured golden background. In the lower left, a large, dark brown, rounded pot or kettle sits on a lighter brown, U-shaped stand. This stand rests on a black, irregular rectangular base. A light, hazy area above the pot suggests steam rising, and a thin, reddish-brown stick or handle extends from the top of the pot towards the right. To the right of the pot, a small, reddish-brown, round dish or stand holds a small, light yellow, irregularly shaped object. Below and slightly to the right of this dish, a dark gray or black bowl with a rounded bottom and a slightly flared rim is positioned. The entire background is a shimmering, textured golden color. In the bottom left corner, there are black calligraphic characters and a small red rectangular seal.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on gold paper

alt_text: Two baskets of golden grain and a woven hat on a pole against a dark, textured background with flying birds.
long_description: The artwork features a dark, mottled background that appears metallic or aged, with subtle variations in tone. Two large, round, reddish-brown woven baskets are positioned diagonally across the composition. The upper basket is in the upper right quadrant, and the lower basket is in the lower left quadrant. Both baskets are filled with a voluminous, golden-orange, spiky material, resembling harvested grain or straw. In the center of the image, slightly below the horizontal midpoint, is a smaller, round, light brown woven object, possibly a hat, with dark lines and a small red knot-like detail on its surface. A long, thin, reddish-brown pole extends from the upper right basket, passing behind the central woven object, and continues towards the lower left basket, though its full length is not visible. In the upper left corner, a flock of small, dark, bird-like shapes flies in a loose V-formation. In the lower right corner, there are several vertical dark characters, followed by a rectangular red seal. The overall palette consists of dark grays, reddish-browns, golden-oranges, and touches of red and black.

metadata.title: 柴田是真筆籠・菅笠図|Flower Baskets and Farmer's Hat
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer, ink, and silver leaf on paper

alt_text: Three figures gaze upwards at a landscape painting with mountains and a bridge, set against a gold background.
long_description: The artwork is vertically oriented and divided into two main horizontal sections, both set against a textured gold background. The upper section, occupying approximately the top two-fifths of the composition, depicts a landscape scene. This scene is framed by dark, angled borders, suggesting a view through an opening or a painting within the artwork. The landscape features dark, rugged mountains or hills on the left and right, with a light-colored, arched bridge spanning a gap between them. Below the bridge, the ground is textured with lines, indicating terrain. At the bottom center of this landscape, a small, red, arch-like structure with a dark brown interior is visible. The background of this landscape is also gold, with dark brushstrokes defining the forms. The lower section, occupying the bottom three-fifths, shows three figures from behind, positioned in the lower left and right. The figure on the far left wears a red garment and has a light-colored head. The central figure wears a garment with light blue, white, and dark vertical stripes, and also has a light-colored head with some dark lines. The figure on the far right wears a red garment and has a dark, rounded head. All three figures appear to be looking upwards, towards the upper landscape scene. In the upper left corner of this lower section, there is a vertical column of black text, followed by a red square seal. The characters read '慶応六年'. The gold background throughout the lower section is textured, similar to the upper part.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on gold paper

alt_text: A large red circle above flowering branches on a light background, with faint water lines and a gold border.
long_description: A vertical painting features a large, solid red circle positioned in the upper right quadrant, with its bottom edge showing a soft, brush-like texture. From the upper left, a dark brown branch extends downwards and to the right, adorned with numerous small, dark red blossoms or buds. Another lighter brown branch originates from the lower right, curving upwards and to the left, also bearing similar small, dark red blossoms. One of these branches reaches towards the bottom of the red circle. In the lower left corner, faint, wavy lines in a light brown hue suggest water. Below these lines, vertical dark brown text is visible, followed by a square red seal. The background of the painting is a uniform light cream color. The entire composition is framed by a textured gold border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on paper

alt_text: A brown furry animal with claws crouches, looking at three small crabs on a light background.
long_description: The artwork features a large, brown, furry animal in a crouching posture, positioned in the upper right and facing towards the lower left. Its body is rendered with numerous short, dark brown brushstrokes, creating a shaggy texture. The animal has a pointed snout, small, dark eyes, and visible teeth or fangs. Its front paws are extended forward, each displaying prominent, sharp claws. One paw is positioned directly above a small, reddish-brown crab, while another crab is slightly to its left, and a third crab is further to the left, forming a small group. The crabs are depicted with small, rounded bodies and multiple thin legs. The background is a plain, light cream color, providing a stark contrast to the darker figures. In the lower right corner, there is vertical text in dark ink, followed by a red square seal. The entire composition is framed by a thin, gold-colored border.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on paper

alt_text: A painting depicts two large bamboo shoots with smaller bamboo stalks on a light background.
long_description: A vertical rectangular painting features two prominent bamboo shoots and several bamboo stalks on a light, unadorned background. The painting is framed by a narrow gold border. The two main bamboo shoots are positioned in the lower left and center of the composition. The larger shoot, in the center, is depicted with numerous overlapping, curved, scale-like layers in shades of light brown and yellow, detailed with fine, parallel lines. Its tip is dark and pointed, extending towards the upper left. A smaller, similarly rendered bamboo shoot is visible below and slightly to the left of the larger one. To the right of the main shoots, a cluster of slender bamboo stalks with small, pointed leaves extends upwards and to the right, rendered in a darker brown. A lighter, more abstract form with small reddish-brown dots is visible to the right of the main shoots. In the lower left corner, there is vertical text in dark ink, followed by a small red square seal. The background is a uniform, light cream color, providing a stark contrast to the brown and yellow tones of the plants.

metadata.title: 柴田是真筆筍図|Bamboo Shoots
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on paper

alt_text: A wisteria vine with pale flowers hangs over water, next to a large brown rock or tree trunk.
long_description:
The artwork is a vertical composition set against a light, creamy beige background. A large, irregular mass of mottled dark brown and lighter brown occupies the entire right side of the image, extending from the top edge to the bottom edge. This mass has a textured appearance, suggesting a rock face or a tree trunk, with darker brown areas and lighter, almost golden-brown specks.

From the upper right and central areas, a wisteria vine descends. It features numerous small, light green leaves arranged in pairs along slender stems. Clusters of small, pale, pendulous flowers, appearing light brown or faded purple, hang from the vine. Several thin, winding tendrils extend from the main vine, reaching upwards and to the left, with some delicate, light brown leaf-like shapes at the very top left.

In the lower left quadrant, a body of water is depicted with a few concentric, thin, light brown lines that suggest ripples on the surface. Two small, dark brown, elongated shapes, possibly water plants or floating leaves, are visible within these ripples. A few smaller, darker brown specks are also present in the water.

In the lower right corner, a vertical inscription in dark brown brushstrokes is present, followed by a small, square red seal. The characters are "応挙" (Ōkyo). The red seal contains illegible white characters. The overall impression is one of natural elements rendered with delicate brushwork.

metadata.title: Untitled
metadata.medium: Album leaf; lacquer on paper

alt_text: A painting depicts a large dark mountain sloping down to a village by water, with smaller mountains in the background
long_description: The artwork is a vertical painting with a light, warm beige background. A large, dark green mountain dominates the right side of the composition, its peak extending towards the top right corner. The mountain slopes steeply downwards to the bottom center, where its base meets a body of water. The dark green color of the mountain is textured, with lighter green and some darker specks visible. To the left of the large mountain, in the middle ground, are several smaller, rounded mountains rendered in a lighter, warm brown hue. These mountains appear to recede into the distance towards the left edge of the painting. Along the base of the large mountain and extending along the edge of the body of water, which occupies the lower left portion of the painting, is a village. The village comprises numerous small structures, each with a distinct reddish-brown, conical or rounded roof and lighter, possibly white or beige, walls. These structures are clustered closely together, appearing to line the water's edge and extending further into the background on the left side. In the foreground, near the bottom center, are several short, dark green brushstrokes, suggesting foliage or reeds. In the bottom right corner, a red square seal is visible, containing indistinct black characters. Above this seal, a few faint, vertical black characters are present. The overall impression is a serene landscape scene.

alt_text: A brown and red seaweed arrangement with two small shells on a light background, with calligraphic text.
long_description: The artwork features a composition of marine plants and shells against a plain, light cream-colored background. A large, broad piece of brown-orange seaweed extends diagonally from the upper left towards the lower right. Its upper edge is textured with dark brown, wavy lines, while the main body is a lighter, mottled brown-orange. Emerging from the upper left of this large seaweed is a darker brown, branched structure resembling a small, gnarled tree trunk. Above the main brown seaweed and to its left, a cluster of delicate, fern-like red seaweed branches spreads outwards. To the right, resting on the large brown seaweed, are two small, round, light brown objects, one appearing distinctly coiled like a snail shell. In the lower left corner, dark, vertical calligraphic characters are visible, accompanied by a small, square red seal below them. The overall impression is a detailed study of marine life elements.

alt_text: A brown and white patterned butterfly hovers near a dark green vine with leaves and a cluster of red berries.
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular composition on a light, off-white background. A dark green vine extends from the top left corner, curving slightly inward before descending vertically along the left side of the frame. Several dark green leaves, varying in size, branch off the upper portion of the vine. A thin, dark green tendril curls from the top right of the main vine. In the upper right quadrant, a butterfly with light brown and white patterned wings is depicted, appearing to hover or be attached to a thin, dark line that extends from the vine. Its wings are open, showcasing intricate patterns of white lines and small, light brown circles with darker centers. The butterfly's body is a darker brown, and two delicate antennae extend from its head. Two small, reddish-pink appendages are visible at the bottom of its body. At the bottom left, a cluster of approximately ten small, round, bright red berries hangs from a thin, dark stem that branches off the main vine. In the lower right quadrant, there is a vertical column of dark, calligraphic text, below which is a square red seal containing intricate patterns or characters.

alt_text: A painting of a miniature garden with a green rock and plants in two pots on a light background
long_description: The artwork depicts a miniature garden arrangement set against a plain, light-colored background, framed by a narrow gold border. In the lower center, two distinct pots hold different elements. The pot on the left is a shallow, white, rectangular vessel with a textured, possibly cracked or patterned, surface and small feet. Within this pot, a prominent, dark green, irregularly shaped rock formation stands, appearing mossy with several lighter, circular indentations or features on its surface. To the left of this rock, a small cluster of thin, dark green plant stalks rises. To the right, slightly overlapping the first pot, is a second, larger container. This pot is a shallow, irregularly shaped vessel, predominantly brown with lighter, yellowish-brown areas, suggesting a glazed or mottled surface. It contains a plant with several long, broad leaves that curve upwards and outwards. These leaves are a mix of dark green and brown, with some appearing more brown towards their tips. The overall composition is balanced, with the plants and rock occupying the central lower portion of the light background. In the lower left corner, vertical dark ink characters are visible, followed by a square red seal.

alt_text: Sepia ink drawing of a morning glory flower, bud, and leaves on a light background
long_description: A sepia ink drawing depicts a morning glory plant on a light, rectangular background. The composition features a central open flower, a bud, and several leaves connected by winding stems and tendrils, all rendered in various shades of brown. In the upper left, a thin stem extends upwards, bearing two small, light brown leaves. To its right, a delicate, tightly curled tendril emerges from another stem. The prominent morning glory flower is positioned slightly to the left of the center. It is depicted with a dark brown outline, and its broad, open petals show subtle lighter brown shading, suggesting depth. The flower's center is also outlined. Below and to the left of the open flower are two larger, broad leaves, rendered in a darker, more saturated brown, with visible brushstrokes. To the right of the main flower, a slender stem rises, culminating in a closed morning glory bud. This bud is also outlined in dark brown and has small, spiky sepals at its base. Another small, dark brown leaf is visible near the base of this bud's stem. All plant elements are interconnected by thin, dark brown stems that curve and intertwine across the composition. In the lower right corner, a vertical column of dark brown calligraphic characters is present, accompanied by a small, square red seal directly beneath them. The overall palette is limited to various tones of brown against the pale, unadorned background.

alt_text: A painting depicts a large, conical straw structure in a grassy landscape with faint hills.
long_description: The vertical painting features a limited palette of browns, beige, and light gray, depicting a rural landscape. Dominating the midground is a large, conical structure, rendered in various shades of brown, appearing to be made of straw or thatch. Its top is rounded and features a distinct, tied-off bundle of straw. The structure is supported by several thin, dark brown poles that angle outwards from its base. On the right side of the structure, a ladder-like element with horizontal rungs is visible, also in dark brown. The foreground and lower midground are filled with brushstrokes of light and dark brown, representing tall, reedy grass or vegetation. In the lower left, scattered small, dark brown dots are interspersed within the grass. In the upper left and upper right background, faint, rounded hills are depicted with soft, light gray-brown washes. In the lower right corner, there is a vertical line of dark brown calligraphic text, followed by a square red seal with more characters.

alt_text: A painting of various autumn leaves, mostly red maple, on a light background with a gold border
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular painting framed by a narrow, textured gold border. The central field is a light, creamy beige color. In the upper right portion, a large, five-lobed maple leaf is prominently displayed in a vibrant, deep red. Lighter red lines indicate its veins, radiating from the stem. A small, dark green leaf, also with a lobed shape, is partially visible in the upper left corner, its stem extending towards the large red leaf. On the left side, slightly below the center, there is a vertical column of black calligraphic text, followed by a small, square red seal with illegible characters. Below this text, in the lower left quadrant, a cluster of various leaves is depicted. This includes several smaller red maple leaves, some with visible stems, and a group of delicate, elongated leaves in shades of yellowish-brown. Further to the right, in the lower right quadrant, a single, smaller five-lobed leaf is shown, colored in muted green and light orange hues. The leaves are arranged in a scattered, naturalistic composition across the light background.

alt_text: A painting of a tree with red clusters, a small bird, and several straw bundles on a light background
long_description: A vertical painting on light beige paper features a central tree with a small bird and straw bundles below, all framed by a gold border. The tree has a dark brown trunk and numerous thin, reddish-brown branches that spread upwards and outwards. Small, round red clusters, resembling berries or blossoms, are scattered across the branches. A small, dark bird perches on an upper branch towards the right side of the tree. Below the tree, a horizontal bar extends from the main trunk, supporting three light brown, bell-shaped straw bundles with fringed bottoms. To the left of these, two larger, tiered straw bundles are depicted, each with three layers of ruffled, fan-like shapes, also in light brown. A small red seal or mark is visible on the lower left, near the base of the leftmost straw bundles. The background is a plain, unadorned light beige.

alt_text: An anthropomorphic fox-like creature in a dark robe sits beside a small fire with rising smoke or cooking food.
long_description: This artwork depicts an anthropomorphic fox-like creature seated on a light-colored background, framed by a textured gold border. The creature, positioned on the left side of the composition, has reddish-brown pointed ears, a white face, and a white body. It wears a dark green or black robe with wide sleeves, and its paws are visible near a small ground-level fire. To the right of the creature, a small area of red and dark brown strokes suggests flames and embers, with a few thin, dark lines resembling sticks or utensils. Above this fire, several light-brown, round, cloud-like shapes rise diagonally upwards and to the right, possibly representing smoke or cooking food items. The background is a plain, light beige. In the upper left corner, there is a vertical column of black calligraphic text, beneath which a square red seal is visible.

alt_text: A dark brown ink painting of a bird perched on a gnarled tree branch, with a gold border
long_description: The artwork is a vertical rectangular painting framed by a gold border. The central image is painted on a light, cream-colored background. A gnarled tree, rendered in dark brown ink, dominates the composition. Its thick, textured trunk rises from the lower right, curving upwards and then branching out. A prominent branch extends to the left, forming a gentle arc. Perched on this curved branch, slightly to the left of the center, is a small, dark brown bird, facing towards the right. Its body is compact, and its head is slightly raised. Below the main trunk, towards the bottom left, are smaller branches with delicate leaves, also depicted in dark brown ink. On the right side of the painting, vertically aligned, are several lines of dark brown text, followed by a square red seal at the bottom right of the text block. The brushstrokes for the tree are varied, showing both thick, solid lines for the trunk and finer details for the branches and leaves. The gold border surrounds the cream-colored painting on all four sides.
